   ____________________________Adhyāya 1____________________________	____________________________ADyAyaH 1____________________________
   # bhāmatī.#	# BAmatI.#
   anirvācyāvidyādvitayasacivasya prabhavato vivartā yasyaite viyadanilatejo	anirvAcya avidyA dvitaya sacivasya praBavataH vivartA yasya ete viyat anila tejaH 
   'bavanayaḥ /	abavanayaH /
   yataścābhūdviśvaṃ caramacaramuccāvacamidaṃ	yatas ca aBUt viSvam caramacaram uccAvacam idam
   namāmastahbrahmāparimitasukhajñānamamṛtam //1 //	namAmastahbrahma aparimita suKa jQAnam amRtam //1 //
   niḥśvasitamasya vedā vīkṣitametasya pañca bhūtāni /	niHSvasitam asya vedAH vIkzitam etasya paQca BUtAni /
   smitametasya carācaramasya ca suptaṃ mahāpralayaḥ //2 //	smitam etasya carAcaram asya ca suptam mahApralayaH //2 //
   ṣaḍbhiraṅgairupetāya vividhairavyayairapi /	zaxBiH aFgEH upetAya viviDEH avyayEH api /
   śāśvatāya namaskurmo vedāya ca bhavāya ca //3 //	SASvatAya namaskurmaH vedAya ca BavAya ca //3 //
   mārtaṇḍatilakasvāmimahāgaṇapatīn vayam /	mArtaNxa tilaka svAmi mahAgaNapatIn vayam /
   viśvavandyānnamasyāmaḥ sarvasiddhividhāyinaḥ //4 //	viSva vandyAt namasyAmaH sarva sidDi viDAyinaH //4 //
   brahmasūtrakṛte tasmai vyāsāyāparavedhase /	brahmasUtra kRte tasmE vyAsAya apara veDase /
   jñānaśaktyavatārāya namo bhagavato hareḥ //5 //	jQAna Sakti avatArAya namaH BagavataH hareH //5 //
   natvā viśuddhavijñānaṃ śaṅkaraṃ karuṇānidhim /	natvA viSudDa vijQAnam SaFkaram karuNA niDim /
   bhāṣyaṃ prasannagambhīraṃ tatpraṇītaṃ vibhajyate //6 //	BAzyam prasanna gamBIram tat praNItam viBajyate //6 //
   ācāryakṛtiniveśanamapyavadhūtaṃ vaco 'smadādīnām /	AcArya kRti niveSanam api avaDUtam vacaH asmad AdInAm /
   rathyodakamiva gaṅgāpravāhapātaḥ pavitrayati //7 //	raTyA udakam iva gaFgA pravAha pAtaH pavitrayati //7 //
   atha yadasaṃdigdhamapirayojanaṃ ca na tatprekṣāvatpratipitsāgocaraḥ, yathā	aTa yat asaMdigDam apiH ayojanam ca na tad prekzA vat pratipitsA gocaraH, yaTA
   samanaskendriya  saṃnikṛṣṭaḥ sphītālokamadhyavartī ghaṭaḥ, karaṭadantā vā	sa manaska indriya saMnikRzwaH sPIta Aloka maDya vartI GawaH, karawa dantA vA
   ; tathā cedaṃ brabmeti vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhiḥ /	; taTA ca idam brabma iti vyApaka virudDa upalabDiH /
   tathā hi   bṛhattvādbṛṃhaṇatvādvātmaiva brahmeti gīyate /	taTA hi  bRhat tvAt bRMhaNa tvAt vAtmA eva brahma iti gIyate /
   sa cāyam ākīṭapataṅgebhya ā ca devarṣibhyaḥ	sa ca ayam AkIwa pataFgeByaH A ca devaRziByaH
   prāṇabhṛnmātrasyedaṅkārāspadebhyo dehendriyamanobuddhiviṣayebhyo vivekena	prANa BRt mAtrasyet aFkAra AspadeByaH deha indriya manaH budDi vizayeByaH vivekena
   'aham' ityasaṃdigdhāviparyastāparokṣānubhavasiddha iti na jijñāsārapadam /	aaham a iti asaMdigDa aviparyasta aparokza anuBava sidDaH iti na jijQAsAra padam /
   na hi jātu kaścidatra saṃdigdhe 'ahaṃ vā nāhaṃ vā' iti /	na hi jAtu kaScid atra saMdigDe aaham vA na aham vA a iti /
   na ca viparyasyati 'nāhameva' iti /	na ca viparyasyati anAham eva a iti /
   na ca 'ahaṃ kṛśaḥ, sthūlaḥ, gacchāmi'	na ca aaham kRSaH, sTUlaH, gacCAmi a
   ityādidehadharmasāmānādhikaraṇyadarśanāddehālamno 'yamahaṅkāra iti	ityAdi deha Darma sAmAnADikaraNya darSanAt deha alamnaH ayam ahaFkAraH iti
   sāṃpratam /	sAMpratam /
   tadālambanatve hi 'yo 'haṃ bālye pitarāvanvabhūvaṃ sa eva sthāvire	tad Alambana tve hi ayaH aham bAlye pitarO= anu aBUvam saH eva sTAvire
   praṇaptṝnanubhavāmi' iti pratisaṃdhānaṃ na bhavet /	praNaptLn anuBavAmi a iti pratisaMDAnam na Bavet /
   na hi bālasthavirayoḥ śarīrayorasti manāgapi pratyabhijñānagandho	na hi bAla sTavirayoH SarIrayoH asti manAk api pratyaBijQAna ganDaH 
   yenaikatvaṃ adhyavasīyeta /	yena ekatvam aDyavasIyeta /
   tasmādyeṣu vyāvartamāneṣu yadanuvartate tattebhyo bhinnaṃ yathā	tasmAt yezu vyAvartamAnezu yat anuvartate tat teByaH Binnam yaTA
   kusumebhyaḥ sūtram /	kusumeByaH sUtram /
   tathā ca bālādiśarīreṣu vyāvartamāneṣvapi	taTA ca bAla Adi SarIrezu vyAvartamAnezu api
   parasparamahaṅkārāspadamanuvartamānaṃ tebhyo bhidyate /	parasparam ahaFkAra Aspadam anuvartamAnam teByaH Bidyate /
   api ca svapnānte divyaṃ śarīrabhedamāsthāya taducitānbhogānbhuñjāna eva	api ca svapna ante divyam SarIra Bedam AsTAya tad ucitAn BogAn BuQjAnaH eva
   pratibuddho manuṣyaśarīramātmānaṃ paśyan 'nāhaṃ devo manuṣya eva' iti	pratibudDaH manuzya SarIram AtmAnam paSyan anAham devaH manuzyaH eva a iti
   devaṣaśarīre bādhyamāne 'pyahamāspadamabādhyamānaṃ śarīrādbhinnaṃ	devaza SarIre bADyamAne api aham Aspadam abADyamAnam SarIrAt Binnam
   pratipadyate /	pratipadyate /
   api ca yogavyāghraḥ śarīrabhede 'pyātmānamabhinnamanubhavatīti	api ca yoga vyAGraH SarIra Bede api AtmAnam aBinnam anuBavati iti
   nāhaṅkārālambanaṃ dehaḥ /	na ahaFkAra Alambanam dehaH /
   ata eva nendriyāṇyapyasyālambanam, indriyabhede 'pi 'yo 'hamadrākṣaṃ sa	atas eva na indriyANi api asya Alambanam, indriya Bede api ayaH aham adrAkzam sa
   evaitarhi spṛśāmi' ityahamā lambanasya pratyabhijñānāt /	eva etarhi spRSAmi a iti aham A lambanasya pratyaBijQAnAt /
   viṣayebhyastvasya vivekaḥ sthavīyāneva /	vizayeByaH tu asya vivekaH sTavIyAn eva /
   buddhimanasośca karaṇayoḥ 'aham' iti	budDi manasoH ca karaNayoH aaham a iti
   kartṛpratibhāsaprakhyānālambanatvāyogaḥ /	kartR pratiBAsa praKyAnAlambana tva ayogaH /
   'kṛśo 'ham' 'andho 'ham' ityādayastu prayogā asatyapyabhede kathañcit	akRSaH aham a aanDaH aham a iti AdayaH tu prayogAH asati api aBede kaTaQcid 
   'mañcāḥ krośanti' ityādivadaupacārikā iti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ /	amaQcAH kroSanti a iti Adi vat OpacArikAH iti yuktam utpaSyAmaH /
   tasmādidaṅkārāspadebhyo dehendriyamanobuddhiviṣayebhyo vyāvṛttaḥ	tasmAt idaFkAra AspadeByaH deha indriya manaH budDi vizayeByaH vyAvRttaH
   sphuṭatarāhamanubhavagamya ātmā saṃśayābhāvādajijñāsya iti siddham /	sPuwatarAham anuBava gamyaH AtmA saMSaya aBAvAt ajijQAsyaH iti sidDam /
   aprayojanatvācca /	aprayojana tvAt ca /
   tathā hi  saṃsāranivṛttirapavarga iha prayojanaṃ vivakṣitam /	taTA hi saMsAra nivRttiH apavargaH iha prayojanam vivakzitam /
   saṃsāraśca ātmayāthātmyānanubhavanimitta ātmayāthātmyajñānena nivartanīyaḥ	saMsAraH ca Atma yATAtmyAn anuBava nimittaH AtmayATAtmya jQAnena nivartanIyaH
   sa cedayamanādiranādinā ātmayāthātmyajñānena sahānuvartate, kuto 'sya	sa ced ayama nAdiH anAdinA AtmayATAtmya jQAnena saha anuvartate, kutas asya
   nivṛttiḥ avirodhāt ? kutaścātmayāthātmyānanubhavaḥ ? na hi 'aham'	nivRttiH aviroDAt ? kutas ca Atma yATAtmyAn anuBavaH ? na hi aaham a
   ityanubhavādanyadātmayāthātmyajñānamasti /	iti anuBavAt anyat Atma yATAtmya jQAnam asti /
   na ca 'aham' iti sarvajanīnasphuṭatarānubhavasamarthita ātmā	na ca aaham a iti sarva janIna sPuwatara anuBava samarTitaH AtmA
   dehendriyādivyatiriktaḥ śakya upaniṣadāṃ sahasrairapyanyathayitum,	deha indriya Adi vyatiriktaH SakyaH upanizadAm sahasrEH api anyaTayitum,
   anubhavavirodhāt /	anuBava viroDAt /
   na hyāgamāḥ sahasramapi ghaṭaṃ paṭayitumīśate /	na hi AgamAH sahasram api Gawam pawayitum ISate /
   tasmādanubhavavirodhādupacaritārthā evopaniṣada iti yuktamutpaśyāma	tasmAt anuBava viroDAt upacarita arTAH eva upanizadaH iti yuktam utpaSyAma
   ityāśayavānāśaṅkya pariharati  yuṣmadasmatpratyayagocarayoḥ iti /	iti ASayavAn ASaFkya pariharati yuzmad asmad pratyaya gocarayoH iti /
   atra ca yuṣmadasmat ityādiḥ mithyeti bhavituṃ yuktaṃ ityantaḥ	atra ca yuzmad asmat ityAdiH miTyA iti Bavitum yuktam iti antar 
   śaṅkāgranthaḥ /	SaFkA granTaH /
   tathāpi ityādiḥ parihāragranthaḥ /	taTA api ityAdiH parihAra granTaH /
   tathāpi ityabhisaṃbandhācchaṅkāyāṃ yadyapīti paṭhitavyam /	taTA api iti aBisaMbanDAt SaFkAyAm yadi api iti paWitavyam /
   idamasmatpratyayagocarayoriti vaktavye	idam asmad pratyaya gocarayoH iti vaktavye
   yuṣmadgrahaṇamatyantabhedopalakṣaṇārtham /	yuzmad grahaNam atyanta Beda upalakzaNa arTam /
   yathā hyahaṅkārapratiyogī tvaṅkāro naivamidaṅkāraḥ, 'ete vayam, ime vayam,	yaTA hi ahaFkAra pratiyogI tu aFkAraH na evam idaFkAraH, aete vayam, ime vayam,
   āsmahe' iti bahulaṃ prayogadarśanāditi /	Asmahe a iti bahulam prayoga darSanAt iti /
   citsvabhāva ātmā viṣayī, jaḍasvabhāvā buddhīndriyadehaviṣayā viṣayāḥ /	cit svaBAvaH AtmA vizayI, jaxa svaBAvAH budDIndriya deha vizayAH vizayAH /
   ete hi cidātmānaṃ visinvanti avabadhnanti ; svena rūpeṇa nirūpaṇīyaṃ	ete hi cit AtmAnam visinvanti avabaDnanti ; svena rUpeNa nirUpaNIyam
   kurvantīti yāvat /	kurvanti iti yAvat /
   parasparānadhyāsahetau atyantavailakṣaṇye dṛṣṭāntaḥ   tamaḥ prakāśavat iti	para sparAn aDyAsa hetO atyanta vElakzaNye dRzwAntaH  tamaH prakASa vat iti
   na hi jātu kaścitsamudācāradvṛttinī prakāśatamasī parasparātmatayā	na hi jAtu kaScid samudAcArat vRttinI prakASa tamasI paraspara Atma tayA
   pratipattumarhati /	pratipattum arhati /
   tadidamuktam   itaretarabhāvānupapattau iti /	tat idam uktam  itaretara BAva anupapattO iti /
   itaretarabhāvaḥ itaretaratvam, tādātmyamiti yāvat ; tasyānupapattāviti /	itaretara BAvaH itaretara tvam, tAdAtmyam iti yAvat ; tasya anupapattO= iti /
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   mā bhūddharmiṇoḥ parasparabhāvaḥ ; taddharmāṇāṃ tu	mA BUt DarmiNoH paraspara BAvaH ; tad DarmANAm tu
   jāḍyacaitanyanityatvānityatvādīnāṃ itaretarādhyāso bhaviṣyati /	jAxya cEtanya nitya tva anitya tva AdInAm itaretara aDyAsaH Bavizyati /
   dṛśyate hi dharmiṇorvivekagrahaṇe 'pi taddharmāṇāmadhyāsaḥ, yathā	dRSyate hi DarmiNoH viveka grahaNe api tad DarmANAm aDyAsaH, yaTA
   kusumādbhedena gṛhyamāṇe 'pi sphaṭikamaṇāvatisvacchatayā	kusumAt Bedena gRhyamANe api sPawi ka maNO= atisvacCa tayA
   japākusumapratibimbodgrāhiṇi 'aruṇaḥ sphaṭikaḥ' ityāruṇyavibhrama ityata	japA kusuma pratibimba udgrAhiNi aaruNaH sPawikaH a iti AruNya viBramaH iti ata
   idamuktam   taddharmāṇāmapi iti /	idam uktam  tad DarmANAm api iti /
   itaretaratra dharmiṇi dharmāṇāṃ bhāvo vinimayaḥ, tasyānupapattiḥ /	itaretaratra DarmiNi DarmANAm BAvaH vinimayaH, tasya anupapattiH /
   ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ   rūpavaddhi dravyamatisvacchatayā rūpavato dravyāntarasya	ayam aBisaMDiH  rUpavat hi dravyam ati svacCa tayA rUpavataH dravya antarasya
   tadvivekena gṛhyamāṇasyāpi cchāyāṃ gṛhṇīyāt, cidātmā tu nīrūpo viṣayī na	tad vivekena gRhyamANasya api cCAyAm gRhNIya at, cit AtmA tu nIrUpaH vizayI na
   viṣayacchāyāmudgrāhayitumarhati /	vizaya= CAyAm udgrAhayitum arhati /
   yathāhuḥ 	yaTA AhuH 
   'śabdagandharasādīnāṃ kīdṛśī pratibimbatā' iti /	aSabda ganDa rasa AdInAm kIdRSI pratibimba tA a iti /
   tadiha pāriśeṣyādviṣayaviṣayiṇoranyonyātmasaṃbhedenaiva taddharmāṇāmapi	tat iha pAriSezyAt vizaya vizayiNoH anyonya Atma saMBedena eva tad DarmANAm api
   parasparasaṃbhedena vinimayātmanā bhavitavyam , tau ceddharmiṇau	paraspara saMBedena vinimaya AtmanA Bavitavyam , tO ced DarmiNO
   atyantavivekena gṛhyamāṇāvasaṃbhinnau, asaṃbhinnāḥ sutarāṃ tayordharmāḥ,	atyanta vivekena gRhyamANO= asaMBinnO, asaMBinnAH sutarAm tayoH DarmAH,
   svāśrayābhyāṃ vyavadhānena dūrāpetatvāt /	sva ASrayAByAm vyavaDAnena dUra apeta tvAt /
   tadidamuktam   sutarāṃ iti /	tat idam uktam  sutarAm iti /
   tadviparyayeṇa iti /	tad viparyayeNa iti /
   viṣayaviparyayeṇetyarthaḥ /	vizaya viparyayeNa iti arTaH /
   mithyāśabdaḥ apahnavavacanaḥ /	miTyA SabdaH apahnava vacanaH /
   etaduktaṃ bhavati   adhyāso bhedāgraheṇa vyāptaḥ, tadviruddhaścehāsti	etat uktam Bavati  aDyAsaH Beda agraheNa vyAptaH, tad virudDaH ca iha asti
   bhedagrahaḥ, sa bhedāgrahaṃ nivartayaṃstadvyāptamadhyāsamapi nivartayatīti	Beda grahaH, sa Beda agraham nivartayan= tat vyAptam aDyAsam api nivartayati iti
   mithyeti bhavituṃ yuktaṃ yadyapi tathāpīti yojanā /	miTyA iti Bavitum yuktam yadi api taTA api iti yojanAH /
   idamatrākūcam   bhavedetadevaṃ yadi 'aham' ityanubhave ātmatatvaṃ	idam atra akUcam  Bavet etat evam yadi aaham a iti anuBave Atmata tvam
   prakāśeta /	prakASeta /
   na tvetadasti /	na tu etat asti /
   tath hi	taT hi
   samastopādhyanavacchinnānantānandacaitanyaikarasamudāsīnamkamadvitīyamātmatattvaṃ	samasta upADi anavacCinna ananta Ananda cEtanya ekarasam udAsInamkam advitIyam Atma tattvam
   śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇeṣu gīyate /	Sruti smRti itihAsa purANezu gIyate /
   na caitānyupakramaparāmarśopasaṃhāraiḥ	na ca etAni upakrama parAmarSa upasaMhArEH
   kriyāsamabhihāreṇedṛgātmatattvamabhidadhati tatparāṇi santi śakyāni	kriyA samaBihAreNa IdRS Atma tattvam aBidaDati tad parANi santi SakyAni
   śakreṇāpyupacaritārthāni kartum /	SakreNa api upacarita arTAni kartum /
   abhyāse hi bhūyastvamarthasya bhavati yathā 'aho darśanīyā aho darśanīyā'	aByAse hi BUyas tvam arTasya Bavati yaTA aaho darSanIyAH aho darSanIyA a
   iti, nālpatvamapi prāgevopacaritatvamiti /	iti, na alpa tvam api prAk eva upacarita tvam iti /
   ahamanubhavastu	aham anuBavaH tu
   prādeśikamanekavidhaśokaduḥkhādiprapañcopaplutamātmānamādarśayan	prAdeSikam anekaviDa Soka duHKa Adi prapaQca upaplutam AtmAnam AdarSayan
   kathamātmatattvagocaraḥ kathaṃ vānupaplavaḥ ? na ca	kaTam Atma tattva gocaraH kaTam vA anupaplavaH ? na ca
   jyeṣṭhapramāṇapratyakṣavirodhādāmnāyasyaiva	jyezWa pramANa pratyakza viroDAt AmnAyasya eva
   tadapekṣasyāprāmāṇyamupacaritārthatvaṃ veti yuktam, tasyāpauruṣeyatayā	tad apekzasya aprAmANyam upacarita arTa tvam vA iti yuktam, tasya apOruzeya tayA
   nirastasamastadoṣāśaṅkasya, bodhakatayā ca svataḥsiddhapramāṇabhāvasya	nirasta samasta doza ASaFkasya, boDaka tayA ca svatas sidDa pramANa BAvasya
   svakārye pramitāvanapekṣatvāt /	sva kArye pramitO= anapekza tvAt /
   pramitāvanapekṣatve 'pyutpatau	pramitO= anapekza tve api utpatO
   pratyakṣāpekṣatvāttadvirodhādanutpattilakṣaṇamasyāprāmāṇyamiti cet, na,	pratyakza apekza tvAt tad viroDAt anutpatti lakzaNam asya aprAmANyam iti cet, na,
   utpādakāpratidvandvitvāt /	utpAdaka apratidvandvi tvAt /
   na hyāgamajñānaṃ sāṃvyavahārikaṃ pratyakṣasya prāmāṇyamupahanti yena	na hi Agama jQAnam sAMvyavahArikam pratyakzasya prAmANyam upahanti yena
   kāraṇābhāvānna bhavet ; api tu tāttvikam /	kAraNa aBAvAt na Bavet ; api tu tAttvikam /
   na ca tāttvikamasyotpādakam, atāttvikapramāṇabhāvebhyo 'pi	na ca tAttvikam asya utpAdakam, atAttvika pramANa BAveByaH api
   sāṃvyavahārikapramāṇebhyastattvajñānotpattidarśanāt /	sAMvyavahArika pramANeByaH tattva jQAna utpatti darSanAt /
   tathā ca varṇe hrasvatvadīrghatvādayo 'nyadharmā api samāropitāḥ	taTA ca varNe hrasva tva dIrGa tva AdayaH anya DarmAH api samAropitAH
   tattvapratipattihetavaḥ /	tattva pratipatti hetavaH /
   na hi laukikāḥ 'nāgaḥ' iti vā"nagaḥ"iti vā padātkuñcaraṃ vā taruṃ vā	na hi lOkikAH anAgaHa iti vA"nagaH"iti vA padAt kuQcaram vA tarum vA
   pratipadyamānā bhavanti bhrāntāḥ /	pratipadyamAnAH Bavanti BrAntAH /
   na cānanyaparaṃ vākyaṃ svārtha upacaritārthaṃ yuktam /	na ca ananya param vAkyam sva arTaH upacarita arTam yuktam /
   uktaṃ hi   'na vidhau paraḥ śabdārthaḥ' iti /	uktam hi  ana viDO paraH Sabda arTaH a iti /
   jyeṣṭhatvaṃ ca anapekṣitasya bādhyatve hetuḥ na tu bādhakatve,	jyezWa tvam ca anapekzitasya bADya tve hetuH na tu bADaka tve,
   rajatajñānasya jyāyasaḥ śuktijñānena kanīyasā bādhadarśanāt /	rajata jQAnasya jyAyasaH Sukti jQAnena kanIyasA bADa darSanAt /
   tadamapabādhane tadapabādhātmanaḥ tasyotpatteranupapatteḥ /	tat am apa bADane tad apabADa AtmanaH tasya utpatteH anupapatteH /
   darśitaṃ ca tāttvikapramāṇabhāvasyānapekṣitatvam /	darSitam ca tAttvika pramANa BAvasya anapekzita tvam /
   tathā ca pāramarṣaṃ sūtram   'paurvāparye pūrvadaurbalyaṃ prakṛtivat' iti	taTA ca pAramarzam sUtram  apOrvAparye pUrva dOrbalyam prakRti vat a iti
   tathā ca  	taTA ca  
   pūrvātparabalīyastvaṃ tatra nāma pratīyatām /	pUrvAt para balIyaH tvam tatra nAma pratIyatAm /
   anyonyanirapekṣāṇāṃ yatra janma dhiyāṃ bhavet //	anyonya nirapekzANAm yatra janma DiyAm Bavet //
     iti //	 iti //
   api ca ye 'pyahaṅkārāspadamātmānamāsthiṣata tairapyasya na	api ca ye api ahaFkAra Aspadam AtmAnam AsTizata tEH api asya na
   tāttvikatvamabhyupetavyam, 'ahamihaivāsmi sadane jānānaḥ' iti	tAttvika tvam aByupetavyam, aaham iha eva asmi sadane jAnAnaH a iti
   sarvavyāpinaḥ prādeśikatvena grahaṇāt uccataragiriśikharavartiṣu	sarva vyApinaH prAdeSika tvena grahaNAt uccatara giri SiKara vartizu
   mahātaruṣu bhūmiṣṭhasya dūrvāpravālanirbhāsapratyayavat /	mahAtaruzu BUmizWasya dUrvA pravAla nirBAsa pratyaya vat /
   na cedaṃ dehasya prādeśikatvamanubhūyate na tvātmana iti sāṃpratam /	na ca idam dehasya prAdeSika tvam anuBUyate na tu AtmanaH iti sAMpratam /
   na hi tadaivaṃ bhavati 'aham' iti, gauṇatve vā na 'jānānaḥ' iti /	na hi tadA evam Bavati aaham a iti, gONa tve vA na ajAnAnaH a iti /
   api ca paraśabdaḥ paratra lakṣyamāṇaguṇayogena vartata iti yatra	api ca para SabdaH paratra lakzyamANa guNa yogena vartate iti yatra
   prayoktṛpratipattroḥ saṃpratipattiḥ sa gauṇaḥ /	prayoktR pratipattroH saMpratipattiH sa gONaH /
   sa ca bhedapratyayapuraḥsaraḥ /	sa ca Beda pratyaya puraHsaraH /
   tadyathā, naiyamikāgnihotravacane 'gnihotraśabdaḥ	tat yaTA, nEyamika agnihotra vacane agnihotra SabdaH
   prakaraṇāntarāvadhṛtabhede kuṇḍapāyināmayanagate karmaṇi 'māsamagmihotraṃ	prakaraNa antara avaDRta Bede kuNxapAyinAm ayana gate karmaNi amAsamagmi hotram
   juhoti' ityatra sādhyasādṛśyena gauṇaḥ, māṇavake cānubhavasiddhabhede	juhoti a iti atra sADya sAdRSyena gONaH, mANavake ca anuBava sidDa Bede
   siṃhātsiṃhaśabdaḥ /	siMhAt siMha SabdaH /
   na tvahaṅkārasya mukhyor'tho nirluṭhitagarbhatayā dehādibhyo bhinno	na tu ahaFkArasya muKyor aTo nirluWita garBa tayA deha AdiByaH Binno
   'nubhūyate, yena paraśabdaḥ śarīrādau gauṇo bhavet /	anuBUyate, yena para SabdaH SarIra AdO gONaH Bavet /
   na cātyantanirūṭhatayā gauṇe 'pi na gauṇatvābhimānaḥ sārṣapādiṣu	na ca atyanta nirUWa tayA gONe api na gONa tva aBimAnaH sArzapa Adizu
   tailaśabdavaditi veditavyam /	tEla Sabda vat iti veditavyam /
   tatrāpi snehāttilabhavādbhede siddha eva sārṣapādīnāṃ	tatra api snehAt tila BavAt Bede sidDaH eva sArzapa AdInAm
   tailaśabdavācyatvābhimānaḥ, na tvarthayostailasārṣapayorabhedādhyavasāyaḥ	tEla Sabda vAcya tva aBimAnaH, na tu arTayoH tEla sArzapayoH aBeda aDyavasAyaH
   tatsiddhaṃ gauṇatvamubhayadarśino gauṇamukhyavivekavijñānena vyāptam,	tad sidDam gONa tvam uBaya darSinaH gONa muKya viveka vijQAnena vyAptam,
   tadiha vyāpakaṃ vivekavijñānaṃ nivartamānaṃ gauṇatāmapi nivartayatīti /	tat iha vyApakam viveka vijQAnam nivartamAnam gONa tAm api nivartayati iti /
   na ca bālasthaviraśarīrabhede 'pi 'so 'ham' ityekasyātmanaḥ	na ca bAla sTavira SarIra Bede api asaH aham a iti ekasya AtmanaH
   pratisaṃdhānadehādibhyo bhedenāstyātmānubhava iti vācyam /	pratisaMDAna deha AdiByaH Bedena asti Atma anuBavaH iti vAcyam /
   parīkṣakāṇāṃ khalviyaṃ kathā, na laukikānām /	parIkzakANAm Kalu iyam kaTA, na lOkikAnAm /
   parīkṣakā api hi vyavahārasamaye na lokasāmāmyamativartante /	parIkzakAH api hi vyavahAra samaye na loka sAmAmyam ativartante /
   vakṣyatyanantarameva hi bhagavānbhāṣyakāraḥ  'paśvādibhiścāviśeṣāt' iti /	vakzyati anantaram eva hi BagavAn BAzya kAraH  apaSu AdiBiH ca aviSezAt a iti /
   bāhyā apyāhuḥ  'śāstracintakāḥ khalvevaṃ vivecayanti na pratipattāraḥ' iti	bAhyAH api AhuH   aSAstra cintakAH Kalu evam vivecayanti na pratipattAraH a iti
   tatpāriśeṣyāccidātmagocaramahaṅkāram 'ahamihāsmi sadane' iti prayuñjāno	tad pAriSezyAt cit Atma gocaram ahaFkAram aaham iha asmi sadane a iti prayuQjAnaH 
   laukikaḥ śarīrādyabhedagrahādātmanaḥ prādeśikatvamabhimanyate nabhasa iva	lOkikaH SarIra Adi a Beda grahAt AtmanaH prAdeSika tvam aBimanyate naBasaH iva
   ghaṭamaṇikamallikādyupādhyavacchedāditi yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ /	Gawa maNika mallikA Adi upADi avacCedAt iti yuktam utpaSyAmaH /
   na cāhaṅkāraprāmāṇyāya dehādivadātmāpi prādeśika iti yuktam /	na ca ahaFkAra prAmANyAya deha Adi vat AtmA api prAdeSikaH iti yuktam /
   tadā khalvayamaṇuparimāṇo vā syāddehaparimāṇo vā /	tadA Kalu ayamaNu parimANaH vA syAt deha parimANaH vA /
   aṇupariṃmāṇatve 'sthūlo 'ham, dīrghaḥ' iti ca na syāt /	aNu pariMmANa tve asTUlaH aham, dIrGaH a iti ca na syAt /
   dehaparimāṇatve tu sāvayavatayā dehavadanityatvaprasaṅgaḥ /	deha parimANa tve tu sa avayava tayA deha vat anitya tva prasaFgaH /
   kiñca asminpakṣe avayavasamudāyo vā cetayet, pratyekaṃ vāvayavāḥ /	kiQca asmin pakze avayava samudAyaH vA cetayet, pratyekam vA avayavAH /
   pratyekaṃ cetanatvapakṣe bahūnāṃ cetanānāṃ	pratyekam cetana tva pakze bahUnAm cetanAnAm
   svatantrāṇāmekavākyatābhāvādaparyāyaṃ viruddhadikkriyatayā	svatantrANAm eka vAkya tA BAvAt aparyAyam virudDa dikkriya tayA
   śarīramunmathyeta, akriyaṃ vā prasajyeta //	SarIram unmaTi eta, akriyam vA prasajyeta //
   samudāyasya tu caitanyayoge vṛkṇa ekasminnavayave cidātmano 'pyavayavo	samudAyasya tu cEtanya yoge vRkNaH ekasmin= avayave cit AtmanaH api avayavaH 
   vṛkṇa iti na cetayet /	vRkNaH iti na cetayet /
   na ca bahūnāmavayavānāṃ parasparāvinābhāvaniyamo dṛṣṭaḥ /	na ca bahUnAm avayavAnAm paraspara avinABAva niyamaH dRzwaH /
   ya evāvayavo yadā viśīrṇastadā tadabhāve na cetayet /	yaH eva avayavaH yadA viSIrNaH tadA tad aBAve na cetayet /
   vijñānālambanatve 'pi ahaṃpratyayasya bhrāntatvaṃ tadavasthameva, tasya	vijQAna Alambana tve api ahaMpratyayasya BrAnta tvam tad avasTam eva, tasya
   sthiravastunirbhāsatvādasthiratvācca vijñānānām /	sTira vastu nirBAsa tvAt asTira tvAt ca vijQAnAnAm /
   etena 'sthūlo 'ham andho 'ham gacchāmi' ityādayo 'pi adhyāsatayā	etena asTUlaH aham anDaH aham gacCAmi a ityAdayaH api aDyAsa tayA
   vyākhyātāḥ /	vyAKyAtAH /
   tadevamuktena krameṇa ahaṃpratyaye pūtikūṣmāṇḍīkṛte bhagavatī śrutiḥ	tat evam uktena krameNa ahaMpratyaye pUti kUzmANxIkRte BagavatI SrutiH
   apratyūhaṃ	apratyUham
   kartṛtvabhoktṛtvasukhaduḥkhaśokādyātmatvamahamanubhavaprasañjitamātmano	kartR tva BoktR tva suKa duHKa Soka Adi Atma tvam aham anuBava prasaQjitam AtmanaH 
   niṣeddhumarhatīti /	nizedDum arhati iti /
   tadevaṃ	tat evam
   sarvapravādaśrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇaprathitamithyābhāvasyāhaṃpratyayasya	sarva pravAda Sruti smRti itihAsa purANa praTita miTyA BAvasya ahaMpratyayasya
   svarūpanimittaphalairupavyākhyānam   anyonyasmin ityādi /	svarUpa nimitta PalEH upavyAKyAnam  anyonyasmin ityAdi /
   anyonyasmindharmiṇyātmaśarīrādau anyonyātmakatāmadhyasya   ahamidaṃ	anyonya smin DarmiNI Atma SarIra AdO anyonya Atmaka tA maDyasya  aham idam
   śarīrāditi /	SarIrAt iti /
   'idam' iti ca vastutaḥ, na pratītitaḥ /	aidam a iti ca vastutaH, na pratItitaH /
   lokavyavahāraḥ lokānāṃ vyavahāraḥ /	loka vyavahAraH lokAnAm vyavahAraH /
   sa ca 'ayamaham' iti vyapadeśaḥ /	sa ca aayam aham a iti vyapadeSaH /
   iti śabdasūcitaśca śarīrādyanukūlaṃ pratikūlaṃ ca prameyajātaṃ pramāṇena	iti Sabda sUcitaH ca SarIra Adi anukUlam pratikUlam ca prameya jAtam pramANena
   pramāya tadupādānaparivarjanādiḥ /	pramAya tad upAdAna parivarjana AdiH /
   anyonyadharmāṃścādhyasya anyonyasmindharmiṇi dehādidharmān	anyonya DarmAn= ca aDyasya anyonya smin DarmiNi deha Adi DarmAn
   janmamaraṇajarāvyādhyādīnātmani dharmiṇi adhyastadehādibhāve samāropya,	janma maraNa jarA vyADi AdIn Atmani DarmiNi aDyasta deha Adi BAve samAropya,
   tathā caitanyādīnātmadharmān dehādāvadhyastātmabhāve samāropya 'mamedaṃ	taTA cEtanya AdIn a Atma DarmAn deha AdO= aDyasta Atma BAve samAropya amamedam
   jarāmaraṇaputrapaśusvāmyādi' iti vyavahāro vyapadeśaḥ /	jarA maraNa putra paSu svAmya Adi a iti vyavahAraH vyapadeSaH /
   itiśabdasūcitaśca tadanurūpaḥ pravṛttyādiḥ /	iti Sabda sUcitaH ca tad anurUpaH pravRtti AdiH /
   atra ca adhyāsavyavahārakriyābhyāṃ yaḥ kartā unnītaḥ sa samāna iti	atra ca aDyAsa vyavahAra kriyAByAm yaH kartA unnItaH sa samAnaH iti
   samānakartṛkatvena 'adhyasya vyavahāraḥ' ityupapannam /	samAna kartRka tvena aaDyasya vyavahAraHa iti upapannam /
   pūrvakālatvasūcitamadhyāsasya vyavahārakāraṇatvaṃ sphuṭayati  	pUrva kAla tva sUcitam aDyAsasya vyavahAra kAraNa tvam sPuwayati  
   mithyājñānanimittaḥ vyavahāraḥ iti /	miTyAjQAna nimittaH vyavahAraH iti /
   mithyājñānamadhyāsaḥ, tannimittaḥ,	miTyAjQAnam aDyAsaH, tad nimittaH,
   tadbhāvābhāvānuvidhānādvyavahārabhāvābhāvayorityarthaḥ /	tad BAva aBAva anuviDAnAt vyavahAra BAva aBAvayoH iti arTaH /
   tadevamadhyāsasvarūpaṃ phalaṃ ca vyavahāramuktvā tasya nimittamāha  	tat evam aDyAsa svarUpam Palam ca vyavahAram uktvA tasya nimittam Aha  
   itaretarāvivekena iti /	itaretara avivekena iti /
   vivekagrahaṇenetyarthaḥ /	viveka grahaNena iti arTaH /
   atha aviveka eva kasmānna bhavati, tathā ca nādhyāsa ityata āha  	aTa avivekaH eva kasmAt na Bavati, taTA ca na aDyAse iti atas Aha  
   atyantaviviktayordharmadharmiṇoḥ /	atyanta viviktayoH Darma DarmiNoH /
   paramārthato dharmiṇoratādātmyaṃ vivekaḥ dharmāṇāṃ cāsaṃkīrṇatā vivekaḥ /	paramArTataH DarmiNoH atAdAtmyam vivekaH DarmANAm ca asaMkIrNa tA vivekaH /
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   viviktayorvastusatorbhedāgrahanibandhanastādātmyavibhramo yujyate	viviktayoH vastu satoH Beda Agraha nibanDanaH tAdAtmya viBramaH yujyate
   śukteriva rajatādbhedāgrahe rajatatādātmyavibhramaḥ /	SukteH iva rajatAt Beda agrahe rajata tAdAtmya viBramaH /
   iha tu paramārthasataḥ cidātmano 'nyanna dehādyasti vastusat, tatkutaḥ	iha tu paramArTa sataH cit AtmanaH anyat na deha Adi asti vastu sat, tad kutas 
   cidātmano bhedāgrahaḥ kutaśca tādātmyavibhramaḥ ityata āha   satyānṛte	cit AtmanaH Beda AgrahaH kutas ca tAdAtmya viBramaH iti atas Aha  satya anRte
   mithunīkṛtya iti /	miTunIkRtyaH iti /
   vivekāgrahādadhyasyeti yojanā /	viveka agrahAdaDi asya iti yojanAH /
   satyaṃ cidātmā, anṛtaṃ buddhīndriyadehādiḥ ; te dve dharmiṇī mithunīkṛtya	satyam cit AtmA, anRtam budDIndriya deha AdiH ; te dve DarmiNI miTunIkRtya
   yugalīkṛtyetyarthaḥ /	yugalIkRtya iti arTaH /
   na ca saṃvṛtiparamārthasatoḥ pāramārthakaṃ	na ca saMvRti parama arTa satoH pAramArTakam
   mithunamastītyabhūtatadbhāvārthasya cveḥ prayogaḥ /	miTunam asti iti aBUta tad BAva arTasya cveH prayogaH /
   etaduktaṃ bhavati   apratītasyāropāyogādāropyasya pratītirupayujyate na	etat uktam Bavati  apratItasya Aropa ayogAt Aropyasya pratItiH upayujyate na
   vastusatteti /	vastu sattA iti /
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   āropyasya pratītau satyāṃ pūrvadṛṣṭasya samāropaḥ samāropanibandhanā ca	Aropyasya pratItO satyAm pUrva dRzwasya samAropaH samAropa nibanDanA ca
   pratītiriti durvāraṃ parasparāśrayatvamityata āha   naisargika iti /	pratItiH iti durvAram paraspara ASraya tvam iti atas Aha  nEsargikaH iti /
   śvābhāvikaḥ anādirayaṃ vyavahāraḥ /	SvABAvikaH anAdiH ayam vyavahAraH /
   vyavahārānāditayā tatkāraṇasyādhyāsasya, anāditoktā, tataśca	vyavahAra anAdi tayA tad kAraNasya aDyAsasya, anAdita uktA, tatas ca
   pūrvapūrvamithyājñānopadarśitasya buddhīndriyaśarīrādeḥ	pUrva pUrva miTyA jQAna upadarSitasya budDIndriya SarIra AdeH
   uttarottarādhyāsopayoga ityanāditvāt bījāṅkuravanna	uttara uttara aDyAsa upayogaH iti anAdi tvAt bIja aFkura vat na
   parasparāśrayatvamityarthaḥ /	paraspara ASraya tvam iti arTaH /
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   advā pūrvapratītimātramupayujyate ārope, na tu pratīyamānasya	advA pUrva pratIti mAtram upayujyate Arope, na tu pratIyamAnasya
   paramārthasattā /	parama arTa sattA /
   pratītireva tu atyantāsato gaganakamalinīkalpasya dehendriyādeḥ	pratItiH eva tu atyanta asataH gagana kamalinI kalpasya deha indriya AdeH
   nopapadyate /	na upapadyate /
   prakāśamānatvameva hi cidātmano 'pi sattvaṃ na tu tadatiriktaṃ	prakASamAna tvam eva hi cit AtmanaH api sattvam na tu tad atiriktam
   sattāsāmānyasamavāyor'thakriyākāritā vā dvaitāpatteḥ /	sattA sAmAnya samavAyoH aTa kriyA kAritAH vA dvEta ApatteH /
   sattāyāścārthakriyākāritāyāśca sattāntarārthakriyākāritāntarakalpane	sattAyAH ca arTa kriyA kAritAyAH ca sattA antara arTa kriyA kArita antara kalpane
   anavasthāpātāt prakāśamānataiva sattā abhyupetavyā /	anavasTApAtAt prakASamAnatA eva sattA aByupetavyAH /
   tathā ca dehādayaḥ prakāśamānatvānnāsantaḥ cidātmavat, asattve vā na	taTA ca deha AdayaH prakASamAna tvAt na asantaH cit Atmavat, asattve vA na
   prakāśamānāḥ ; tatkathaṃ satyānṛtayormithunībhāvaḥ ?	prakASamAnAH ; tat kaTam satya anRtayoH miTunIBAvaH ?
   tadabhāve vā kasya kuto bhedāgrahaḥ ? tadasaṃbhave kuto 'dhyāsaḥ ?	tad aBAve vA kasya kutas Beda AgrahaH ? tad asaMBave kutas aDyAsaH ?
   ityāśayavān āha ākṣeptā  ko 'yamadhyāso nāma iti /	iti ASayavAn Aha AkzeptA kaH ayam aDyAsaH nAma iti /
   ka ityākṣepe /	kaH iti Akzepe /
   samādhātā lokasiddhamadhyāsalakṣaṇamācakṣāṇa evākṣepaṃ pratikṣipati 	samADAtA loka sidDam aDyAsa lakzaNam AcakzANaH eva Akzepam pratikzipati 
   ucyate  smṛtirūpaḥ paratra pūrvadṛṣṭāvabhāsa iti /	ucyate smRti rUpaH paratra pUrva dRzwa avaBAsaH iti /
   avasannaḥ avamato vā bhāsaḥ avabhāsaḥ /	avasannaH avamataH vA BAsaH avaBAsaH /
   pratyayāntarabādhaścāsya avasādo 'vamāno vā /	pratyaya antara bADaH ca asya avasAdaH avamAnaH vA /
   etāvatā mithyājñānamityuktaṃ bhavati /	etAvatA miTyAjQAnam iti uktam Bavati /
   tasyedamupavyākhyānam 'pūrvadṛṣṭa ' ityādi /	tasya idam upavyAKyAnam apUrva dRzwa  a ityAdi /
   pūrvadṛṣṭasyāvabhāsaḥ pūrvadṛṣṭāvabhāsaḥ /	pUrva dRzwasya avaBAsaH pUrva dRzwa avaBAsaH /
   mithyāpratyayaśca āropaviṣayāropaṇīyamithunamantareṇa na bhavatīti	miTyA pratyayaH ca Aropavizaya AropaNIya miTunam antareNa na Bavati iti
   pūrvadṛṣṭagrahaṇenānṛtamāropaṇīyamupasthāpayati /	pUrva dRzwa grahaNena anRtam AropaNIyam upasTApayati /
   tasya ca dṛṣṭatvamātramupayujyate na vastusatteti dṛṣṭagrahaṇam /	tasya ca dRzwa tva mAtram upayujyate na vastu sattA iti dRzwa grahaNam /
   tathāpi vartamānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ darśanaṃ nāropopayogīti pūrva  ityuktam /	taTA api vartamAnam dRzwam darSanam na Aropa upayogI iti pUrva iti uktam /
   tacca pūrvadṛṣṭaṃ svarūpeṇa sadapyāropaṇīyatayā anirvācyamityanṛtam /	tat ca pUrva dRzwam sva rUpeNa sat api AropaNIya tayA anirvAcyam iti anRtam /
   āropaviṣayaṃ satyamāha  paratra iti /	Aropavizayam satyam Aha paratra iti /
   paratra śuktikādau paramārthasati /	paratra SuktikA AdO parama arTa sati /
   tadanena satyānṛtamithunamuktam /	tat anena satya anRta miTunam uktam /
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   paratra pūrvadṛṣṭāvabhāsa ityalakṣaṇam , ativyāpakatvāt /	paratra pUrva dRzwa avaBAsaH iti alakzaNam , ati vyApaka tvAt /
   asti hi svastimatyāṃ gavi pūrvadṛṣṭasya gotvasya paratra	asti hi svastimatyAm gavi pUrva dRzwasya go tvasya paratra
   kālākṣyāmavabhāsaḥ /	kAla akzyAm avaBAsaH /
   asti ca pāṭaliputre pūrvadṛṣṭasya devadattasya paratra	asti ca pAwaliputre pUrva dRzwasya devadattasya paratra
   māhiṣmatyāmavabhāsaḥ samīcīnaḥ /	mAhizmatyAm avaBAsaH samIcInaH /
   avabhāsapadaṃ ca samīcīne 'pi pratyaye prasiddham, yathā nīlasyāvabhāsaḥ	avaBAsa padam ca samIcIne api pratyaye prasidDam, yaTA nIlasya avaBAsaH
   pītasyāvabhāsa iti /	pItasya avaBAsaH iti /
   ata āha  smṛtirūpa iti /	atas Aha smRti rUpaH iti /
   smṛteḥ rūpamiva rūpamasyeti smṛtirūpaḥ /	smRteH rUpam iva rUpam asya iti smRti rUpaH /
   asaṃnihitaviṣayatvaṃ ca smṛtirūpatvam /	asaMnihita vizaya tvam ca smRti rUpa tvam /
   saṃnihitaviṣayaṃ ca pratyabhijñānaṃ samīcīnamiti nātivyāptiḥ /	saMnihita vizayam ca pratyaBijQAnam samIcInam iti na ati vyAptiH /
   nāpyavyāptiḥ, svapnajñānasyāpi snṛtivibhramarūpasyaivaṃrūpatvāt /	na api avyAptiH, svapna jQAnasya api snRti viBrama rUpasya evaMrUpa tvAt /
   tatrāpi hi smaryamāṇe pitrādau nidropaplavavaśādasaṃnidhānāparāmarśe,	tatra api hi smaryamANe pitR AdO nidrA upaplava vaSAt asaMniDAna aparAmarSe,
   tatra tatra pūrvadṛṣṭasyaiva saṃnihitadeśakālatvasya samāropaḥ /	tatra tatra pUrva dRzwasya eva saMnihita deSa kAla tvasya samAropaH /
   evam 'pītaḥ śaṅkhaḥ' 'tikto guḍaḥ' ityatrāpyetallakṣaṇaṃ yojanīyam /	evam api itaH SaFKaHa atiktaH guxaH a iti atra api etat lakzaNam yojanIyam /
   tathā hi  bahirvinirgacchajatyacchanayanaraśmisaṃpṛktapittadravyavartinīṃ	taTA hi bahis vinirgacCa jati acCa nayana raSmi saMpRkta pitta dravya vartinIm
   pītatāṃ pittarahitāmanubhavan, śaṅkhaṃ ca doṣācchāditaśuklimānamanubhavan,	pIta tAm pitta rahitAm anuBavan, SaFKam ca doza AcCAdita Sukli mAnam anuBavan,
   pītatāyāśca śaṅkhāsaṃbandhamananubhavan, asaṃbandhāgrahaṇasārūpye 'pītaṃ	pIta tAyAH ca SaFKa asaMbanDam ananuBavan, asaMbanDa agrahaNa sArUpye api itam
   tapanīyapiṇḍaṃ' 'pītaṃ bilvaphalaṃ' ityādau pūrvadṛṣṭaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ	tapanIya piNxama apItam bilva Palama ityAdO pUrva dRzwam sAmAnADikaraNyam
   pītatvaśaṅkhatvayorāropyāha 'pītaḥ śaṅkhaḥ' iti /	pIta tva SaFKa tvayoH Aropya Aha api itaH SaFKaHa iti /
   etena 'tikto guḍaḥ' iti pratyayo vyākhyātaḥ /	etena atiktaH guxaHa iti pratyayaH vyAKyAtaH /
   evaṃ vijñātṛpuruṣābhimukheṣvādarśodakādiṣu svaccheṣu cākṣuṣaṃ tejo	evam vijQAtR puruza aBimuKezu AdarSa udaka Adizu su acCezu cAkzuzam tejaH 
   lagnamapi balīyasā saureṇa tejasā pratisrotaḥ pravartitaṃ mukhasaṃyuktaṃ	lagnam api balIyasA sOreNa tejasA pratisrotas pravartitam muKa saMyuktam
   mukhaṃ grāhayet, doṣavaśāttaddeśatāmanabhimukhatāṃ ca mukhyasyāgrāhayat,	muKam grAhayet, doza vaSAt tad deSa tAm anaBimuKa tAm ca muKyasya agrAhayat,
   pūrvadṛṣṭābhimukhādarśodakadeśatāmābhimukhyaṃ ca mukhasyāropayatīti	pUrva dRzwa aBimuKa AdarSa udaka deSa tAm ABimuKyam ca muKasya Aropayati iti
   pratibimbavibhramo 'pi lakṣito bhavati /	pratibimba viBramaH api lakzitaH Bavati /
   etena dvicandradiṅmohālātacakragandharvanagaravaṃśoragādivibhrameṣvapi	etena dvi candra diS moha alAta cakra ganDarvanagara vaMSa uraga Adi viBramezu api
   yathāsaṃbhavaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yojanīyam /	yaTAsaMBavam lakzaNam yojanIyam /
   etaduktaṃ bhavati  na prakāśamānatāmātraṃ sattvam, yena dehendriyādeḥ	etat uktam Bavati na prakASam AnatA mAtram sattvam, yena deha indriya AdeH
   prakāśamānatayā sadbhāvo bhavet /	prakASamAna tayA sadBAvaH Bavet /
   na hi sarpātadabhāvena rajjvādayo vā sphaṭikādayo vā raktādiguṇayogino na	na hi sarpa atada BAvena rajju AdayaH vA sPawika AdayaH vA rakta Adi guNa yoginaH na
   pratibhāsante, pratibhāsamānā vā bhavanti tadātmānastaddharmāṇo vā /	pratiBAsante, pratiBAsamAnAH vA Bavanti tad A AtmAnaH tad DarmANaH vA /
   tathā sati maruṣu marīcikānicayam	taTA sati maruzu marIcikA nicayam
   'uccāvacamuccalattuṅgataraṅgabhaṅgamāleyamabhyarṇabhavatīrṇā mandākinī'	auccAvacam uccalat tuFga taraFga BaFga mAlA iyam aByarNa Bava tIrNA mandAkinI a
   ityabhisaṃdhāya pravṛttaḥ tattoyamāpīya pipāsāmupaśamayet /	iti aBisaMDAya pravRttaH tat toyam ApIya pipAsAm upaSamayet /
   tasmādakāmenāpi prakāśamānasyāpyāropitasya na vastusattvamabhyupagamanīyam	tasmAt akAmena api prakASamAnasya api Aropitasya na vastu sattvam aByupagamanIyam
   na ca marīcirūpeṇa salilamavastusat svarūpeṇa tu paramārthasadeva	na ca marIci rUpeNa salilam avastusat sva rUpeNa tu paramArTa sadeva
   dehendriyādayastu svarūpeṇāpyasanta ityanubhavāgocaratvātkathamāropyanta	deha indriya AdayaH tu svarUpeNa api asantaH iti anuBava agocara tvAt kaTam Aropyanta
   iti sāṃpratam ; yato yadyasanto nānubhavagocarāḥ kathaṃ tarhi	iti sAMpratam ; yatas yadi asantaH na anuBava gocarAH kaTam tarhi
   marīcyādīnāmasatāṃ toyādyātmatayānubhavagocaratvam ? na ca svarūpasattvena	marIci AdInAm asatAm toya Adi Atma tayA anuBava gocara tvam ? na ca svarUpa sattvena
   toyādyātmanāpi santo bhavanti /	toya Adi AtmanA api santaH Bavanti /
   yadyucyeta  nābhāvo nāma bhāvādanyaḥ kaścidasti, api tu bhāva eva	yadi ucyeta na aBAvaH nAma BAvAt anyaH kaScid asti, api tu BAvaH eva
   bhāvāntarātmanā abhāvaḥ svena rūpeṇa tu bhāvaḥ /	BAva antarAtmanA aBAvaH svena rUpeNa tu BAvaH /
   yathāhuḥ 	yaTA AhuH 
   'bhāvāntaramabhāvo hi kayācittu vyapekṣayā' /	aBAva antaram aBAvaH hi kayAcid tu vyapekzayAa /
   iti /	iti /
   tataśca bhāvātmanopākhyeyatayā asya yujyeta anubhavagocaratā /	tatas ca BAva AtmanA upAKyeya tayA asya yujyeta anuBava gocara tA /
   prapañcasya punaratyantāsato nirastasamastasāmarthyasya nistattvasya kuto	prapaQcasya punar atyanta asataH nirasta samasta sAmarTyasya nistattvasya kuto
   'nubhavaviṣayabhāvaḥ, kuto vā cidātmanyāropaḥ ? na ca viṣayasya	anuBava vizaya BAvaH, kutas vA cit Atmani AropaH ? na ca vizayasya
   samastasāmarthyavirahe 'pi vijñānameva tattādṛśaṃ	samasta sAmarTya virahe api vijQAnam eva tat tAdRSam
   svapratyayasāmarthyādadṛṣṭāntasiddhasvabhāvabhedamupajātamasataḥ	sva pratyaya sAmarTyAt adRzwAnta sidDa svaBAva Bedam upajAtam asataH
   prakāśanam, tasmādasatprakāśanaśaktirevāsyāvidyeti sāṃpratam /	prakASanam, tasmAt asat prakASana SaktiH eva asya avidyA iti sAMpratam /
   yato yeyamasatprakāśanaśaktirvijñānasya kiṃ punarasyāḥ śakyam ? asaditi	yatas yA iyam asat prakASana SaktiH vijQAnasya kim punar asyAH Sakyam ? asat iti
   cet, kimetatkāryam, āhosvidasyā jñāpyam ? na tāvatkāryam,	cet, kim etat kAryam, Ahosvit asyAH jQApyam ? na tAvat kAryam,
   asatastattvānupapatteḥ /	asataH tattva anupapatteH /
   nāpi jñāpyam, jñānāntarānupalabdheḥ, anavasthāpātācca /	na api jQApyam, jQAna antara anupalabDeH, anavasTA pAtAt ca /
   vijñānasvarūpameva asataḥ prakāśa iti cet. kaḥ punareṣa sadasatoḥ	vijQAna svarUpam eva asataH prakASaH iti cet. kaH punar eza sat asatoH
   saṃbandhaḥ ? asadadhīnanirūpaṇatvaṃ sato jñānasya asatā saṃbandha iti cet,	saMbanDaH ? asat aDIna nirUpaNa tvam sataH jQAnasya asatA saMbanDaH iti ced ,
   aho batāyamatinirvṛtaḥ pratyayatapasvī yadasya asatyapi nirūpaṇamāyatate /	aho bata ayam ati nirvRtaH pratyaya tapasvI yat asya asatI api nirUpaNam Ayatate /
   na ca pratyayastatrādhatte kiñcit, asata ādhāratvāyogāt /	na ca pratyayaH tatra ADatte kiQcit, asataH ADAra tva ayogAt /
   asadantareṇa pratyayo na prathata iti pratyayasyaivaiṣa svabhāvaḥ na	asat antareNa pratyayaH na praTate iti pratyayasya eva eza svaBAvaH na
   tvasadadhīnamasya kiñciditi cet, aho batāsya asatpakṣapātaḥ	tu asat aDInam asya kiQcid iti cet, aho bata asya asat pakzapAtaH
   yadayamatadutpattiḥ atadātmā ca tadavinābhāvaniyataḥ pratyaya iti /	yat ayam atad utpattiH atadAtmA ca tad avinA aBAva niyataH pratyayaH iti /
   tasmādatyantāsantaḥ śarīrendriyādayo nistattvā nānubhavaviṣayā	tasmAt atyanta asantaH SarIra indriya AdayaH nistattvA na anuBava vizayA
   bhavitumarhantīti /	Bavitum arhanti iti /
   atra brūmaḥ  nistattvaṃ cennānubhavagocaraḥ, tatkimidānīṃ marīcayo 'pi	atra brUmaH nistattvam ced na anuBava gocaraH, tat kim idAnIm marIcayaH api
   toyātmanā satattvāḥ yadanubhavagocarāḥ syuḥ /	toya AtmanA sa tattvAH yad anuBava gocarAH syuH /
   na satattvāḥ, tadātmanā marīcīnāmasattvāt /	na sa tattvAH, tad AtmanA marIcI nAm asattvAt /
   dvividhaṃ ca vastūnāṃ tattvam  sattvamasattvaṃ ca tatra pūrvaṃ svataḥ,	dviviDam ca vastUnAm tattvam sattvam asattvam ca tatra pUrvam svataH,
   paraṃ tu parataḥ /	param tu paratas /
   yathāhuḥ 	yaTA AhuH 
   'svarūpapararūpābhyāṃ nityaṃ sadasadātmake /	asvarUpa para rUpAByAm nityam sat asat Atmake /
   vastuni jñāyate kiñcidrūpaṃ kaiścitkadācana //	vastuni jQAyate kiQcid rUpam kEScid kadAcana //
    iti /	 iti /
   tatkiṃ marīciṣu toyanirbhāsapratyayastattvagocaraḥ ? tathā ca samīcīna iti	tat kim marIcizu toya nirBAsa pratyayaH tattva gocaraH ? taTA ca samIcInaH iti
   na bhrānto nāpi bādhyeta /	na BrAntaH na api bADyeta /
   addhā ! na bādhyeta yadi marīcīnayaṃ atoyātmatattvānatoyātmanā gṛhṇīyāt /	adDA ! na bADyeta yadi marIcIn ayam atoya Atma tattvAnatoya AtmanA gRhNIyAt /
   toyātmanā tu gṛhṇan kathama bhrāntaḥ, kathaṃ vā abādhyaḥ ? hanta !	toya AtmanA tu gRhNan kaTama BrAntaH, kaTam vA abADyaH ? hanta !
   toyābhāvātmanāṃ marīcināṃ toyabhāvātmatvaṃ tāvanna sat, teṣāṃ	toya aBAva AtmanAm marIcinAm toya BAva Atma tvam tAvat na sat, tezAm
   toyābhāvādabhedena toyabhāvātmatānupapatteḥ /	toya aBAvAt aBedena toya BAva Atma tA anupapatteH /
   nāpyasat ; vastvantarameva hi vastvantarasyāsattvamāsthīyate /	na api asat ; vastu antaram eva hi vastu antarasya asattvam AsTIyate /
   'bhāvāntaramabhāvo 'nyo na kaścidanirūpaṇāt' iti vadadbhiḥ /	aBAva antaram aBAvaH anyaH na kaScid anirUpaNAt a iti vadadBiH /
   na cāropitaṃ rūpaṃ vastvantaram ; taddhi marīcayo vā bhavet, gaṅgādigataṃ	na ca Aropitam rUpam vastu antaram ; tat hi marIcayaH vA Bavet, gaFgA Adi gatam
   toyaṃ vā /	toyam vA /
   pūrvasminkalpe 'marīcayaḥ' iti pratyayaḥ syāt, na 'toyam' iti /	pUrvasmin kalpe amarIcayaH a iti pratyayaH syAt, na atoyama iti /
   uttarasmiṃstu 'gaṅgāyāṃ toyam' iti syāt, na punaḥ 'iha' iti /	uttarasmin= tu agaFgAyAm toyam a iti syAt, na punar aihaa iti /
   deśabhedāsmaraṇe 'toyam' iti syāt, na pula 'iha' iti /	deSa Beda asmaraNe atoyam a iti syAt, na pula aihaa iti /
   na cedamatyantamasat nirastasamastasvarūpamalīkamevāstu iti sāṃpratam,	na ca idam atyantam asat nirasta samasta svarUpam alIkam eva astu iti sAMpratam,
   tasyānubhavagocaratvānupapatteḥ, ityuktamadhastāt /	tasya anuBava gocara tva anupapatteH, iti uktam aDastAt /
   tasmānna sat, nāsat, nāpi sadasat parasparavirodhāt,	tasmAt na sat, na asat, na api sat asat paraspara viroDAt,
   ityanirvācyamevāropaṇīyaṃ marīciṣu toyamāstheyam ; tadanena	iti anirvAcyam eva AropaNIyam marIcizu toyam AsTeyam ; tad anena
   krameṇādhyastaṃ toyaṃ paramārthatoyamiva, ata eva pūrvadṛṣṭamiva ;	krameNa aDyastam toyam parama arTa toyam iva, atas eva pUrva dRzwam iva ;
   tattvatastu na toyam, na ca pūrvadṛṣṭam ; kiṃ tu anṛtam anirvācyam /	tattvataH tu na toyam, na ca pUrva dRzwam ; kim tu anRtam anirvAcyam /
   evaṃ ca dehendriyādiprapañco 'pi anirvācyaḥ ; apūrvo 'pi	evam ca deha indriya Adi prapaQcaH api anirvAcyaH ; apUrvaH api
   pūrvamithyāpratyayopadarśita iva paratra cidātmanyadhyasyata iti	pUrva miTyA pratyaya upadarSitaH iva paratra cit Atmani aDyasyate iti
   upapannam, adhyāsalakṣaṇayogāt /	upapannam, aDyAsa lakzaNa yogAt /
   dehendriyādiprapañcabādhanaṃ ca upapādayiṣyate /	deha indriya Adi prapaQca bADanam ca upapAdayizyate /
   cidātmā tu śrutismṛtītihāsapurāmagocaraḥ	cit AtmA tu Sruti smRti itihAsa purAm agocaraH
   tanmūlatadaviruddhanyāyanirṇītaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvaḥ sattvenaiva	tad mUla tadavirudDa nyAya nirNIta SudDa budDa mukta svaBAvaH sattvena eva
   nirvācyaḥ /	nirvAcyaH /
   abādhitā svayaṃprakāśataiva asya sattā, sā ca svarūpameva cidātmanaḥ, na	abADitA svayaMprakASa tA eva asya sattA, sA ca svarUpam eva cit AtmanaH, na
   tu tadatiriktaṃ sattāsāmānyasamavāyaḥ arthakriyākāritā vā iti	tu tat atiriktam sattA sAmAnya samavAyaH arTa kriyA kAritAH vA iti
   sarvamavadātam /	sarvam avadAtam /
   sa cāyamevaṃlakṣaṇako 'dhyāsaḥ anirvacanīyaḥ sarveṣāmeva saṃmataḥ	sa ca ayam evaMlakzaNakaH aDyAsaH anirvacanIyaH sarvezAm eva saMmataH
   parīkṣakāṇām ; tadbhede paraṃ vipratipattirityanirvacanīyatāṃ	parIkzakANAm ; tad Bede param vipratipattiH iti anirvacanIya tAm
   draḍhayitumāha  taṃ kecit iti /	draXayitum Aha tam kecid iti /
   anyadharmasya jñānadharmasya rajatasya ; jñānākārasyeti yāvat /	anya Darmasya jQAna Darmasya rajatasya ; jQAna AkArasya iti yAvat /
   adhyāsaḥ anyatra bāhye /	aDyAsaH anyatra bAhye /
   sautrāntikanaye tāvadbāhyamasti vastusat ; tatra jñānākārasyāropaḥ /	sOtra antika naye tAvat bAhyam asti vastusat ; tatra jQAna AkArasya AropaH /
   vijñānavādināmapi, yadyapi na bāhyaṃ vastusat	vijQAna vAdinAm api, yadi api na bAhyam vastu sat
   tathāpyanādyavidyāvāsanāropitamalīkaṃ bāhyam ; tatra jñānākārasyāropaḥ /	taTA api anAdya vidyA vAsana Aropitam alIkam bAhyam ; tatra jQAna AkArasya AropaH /
   upapattiśca  yadyādṛśamanubhavasiddhaṃ rūpaṃ tattādṛśameva	upapattiH ca yat yAdRSam anuBava sidDam rUpam tat tAdRSam eva
   abhyupetavyamityutsargaḥ ; anyathātvaṃ punarasya	aByupetavyam iti utsargaH ; anyaTAtvam punar asya
   balavadbādhakapratyayavaśāt ; 'nedaṃ rajatam' iti bādhakasya	balavat bADaka pratyaya vaSAt ; anedam rajatam a iti bADakasya
   idantāmātrabādhenāpyupapattau na rajatagocaratocitā /	idantA mAtra bADena api upapattO na rajata gocaratA ucitAH /
   rajatasya dharmiṇo bhādhe hi rajataṃ ca tasya dharma idantā ca bādhite	rajatasya DarmiNaH BADe hi rajatam ca tasya DarmaH idantA ca bADite
   bhavetām ; tadvaramidantaivāsya dharmo bādhyatām, na punā rajatamapi	BavetAm ; tat varam idantA eva asya DarmaH bADya tAm, na punA rajatam api
   dharmi ; tathā ca rajataṃ bahirbādhitamarthādāntare jñāne vyavatiṣṭhata	Darmi ; taTA ca rajatam bahis bADitam arTAda antare jQAne vyavatizWata
   iti jñānākārasya bahiradhyāsaḥ sidhyati /	iti jQAna AkArasya bahis aDyAsaH siDyati /
   kecittu  jñānākārakhyātāvaparituṣyanto vadanti  yatra yadadhyāsaḥ	kecid tu jQAna AkAra KyAtO= aparituzyantaH vadanti yatra yat aDyAsaH
   tadvivekāgrahanibandhano bhrama iti /	tad viveka agraha nibanDanaH BramaH iti /
   aparitoṣakāraṇaṃ cāhuḥ  vijñānakāratā rajatāderanubhavādvā vyavasthāpyeta,	aparitoza kAraNam ca AhuH vijQAna kAra tA rajata AdeH anuBavAt vA vyavasTA apya ita,
   anumānādvā /	anumAnAt vA /
   tatrānumānamupariṣṭānnirākariṣyate /	tatra anumAnam uparizwAt nirAkarizyate /
   anubhavo 'pi rajatapratyayo vā syāt, bādhakapratyayo vā /	anuBavaH api rajata pratyayaH vA syAt, bADaka pratyayaH vA /
   na tāvadrajatānubhavaḥ /	na tAvat rajata anuBavaH /
   sa hi idaṅkārāspadaṃ rajatamāvedayati na tvāntaram /	sa hi idaFkAra Aspadam rajatam Avedayati na tvA antaram /
   'aham' iti hi tadā syāt, pratipattuḥ pratyayādavyatirekāt /	aaham a iti hi tadA syAt, pratipattuH pratyayAt avyatirekAt /
   bhrāntaṃ vijñānaṃ svākārameva bāhyatayādhyavasyati, tathā ca	BrAntam vijQAnam su a AkAram eva bAhya tayA aDyavasyati, taTA ca
   nāhaṅkārāspadamasya gocaraḥ, jñānākāratā punasya	na ahaFkAra Aspadam asya gocaraH, jQAna AkAra tA punar ya
   bādhakapratyayamālocayatvāyuṣmān /	bADaka pratyayam Alocayatva AyuzmAn /
   sa kiṃ purovarti dravyaṃ rajatādvivecayati āho jñānākāratāmapyasya	sa kim purovarti dravyam rajatAt vivecayati Aho jQAna AkAra tAm api asya
   darśayati ? tatra jñānākāratopadarśanavyāpāraṃ bādhakapratyayasya bruvāṇaḥ	darSayati ? tatra jQAna AkAra topadarSana vyApAram bADaka pratyayasya bruvANaH
   ślāghanīyaprajño devānāṃ priyaḥ /	SlAGanIya prajQaH devAnAm priyaH /
   purovartitvapratiṣedhādarthādasya jñānākārateti cet, na /	puras varti tva pratizeDAt arTAt asya jQAna AkAra tA iti cet, na /
   asaṃnidhānāgrahaniṣedhādasaṃnihito bhavati /	asaMniDAna Agraha nizeDAt asaMnihitaH Bavati /
   pratipatturatyantasaṃnidhānaṃ tvasya pratipatrātmakaṃ kutastyam ? na caiṣa	pratipattuH atyanta saMniDAnam tu asya pratipatra Atmakam kutastyam ? na ca eza
   rajatasya niṣedhaḥ, na ca idantāyāḥ, kiṃ tu vivekāgrahaprasañjitasya	rajatasya nizeDaH, na ca idantAyAH, kim tu viveka Agraha prasaQjitasya
   rajatavyavahārasya /	rajata vyavahArasya /
   na ca rajatameva śuktikāyāṃ prasañjitaṃ rajatajñānena /	na ca rajatam eva SuktikAyAm prasaQjitam rajata jQAnena /
   na hi rajatanirbhāsasya śuktikālambanaṃ yuktam, anubhavavirodhāt /	na hi rajata nirBAsasya SuktikA Alambanam yuktam, anuBava viroDAt /
   na khalu sattāmātreṇālambanam, atiprasaṅgāt /	na Kalu sattA mAtreNa Alamba nam, atiprasaFgAt /
   sarveṣāmarthānāṃ sattvāviśeṣādālambanatvaprasaṅgāt /	sarvezAm arTAnAm sattva aviSezAt Alambanatva prasaFgAt /
   nāpi kāraṇatvena, indriyādīnāmapi kāraṇatvāt /	na api kAraNa tvena, indriya AdInAm api kAraNa tvAt /
   tathā ca bhāsamānataivālambanārthaḥ /	taTA ca BAsamAna tA eva Alambana arTaH /
   na ca rajatajñāne śuktikā bhāsate, iti kathamālambanam ?	na ca rajata jQAne SuktikA BAsate, iti kaTam Alambanam ?
   bhāsamānatābhyupagame vā kathaṃ nānubhavavirodhaḥ ? api cendriyādīnāṃ	BAsamAna tA aByupagame vA kaTam na anuBava viroDaH ? api ca indriya AdInAm
   samīcīnajñānopajanane sāmarthyamupalabdhamiti kathamebhyo	samIcIna jQAna upajanane sAmarTyam upalabDam iti kaTam eByaH 
   mithyājñānasaṃbhavaḥ ? doṣasahitānāṃ teṣāṃ mithyāpratyaye 'pi	miTyAjQAna saMBavaH ? doza sahitAnAm tezAm miTyA pratyaye api
   sāmarthyamiti cet, na, doṣāṇāṃ kāryopajananasāmarthyavidhātamātre hetutvāt	sAmarTyam iti cet, na, dozANAm kArya upajanana sAmarTya viDAta mAtre hetu tvAt 
   ; anyathā pluṣṭādapi kuṭajabījādvaṭāṅkurotpattiprasaṅgāt /	; anyaTA pluzwAt api kuwaja bIjAt vawa aFkura utpatti prasaFgAt /
   api ca svagocaravyabhicāre vijñānānāṃ sarvatrānāśvāsaprasaṅgaḥ /	api ca sva gocara vyaBicAre vijQAnAnAm sarva tra anASvAsa prasaFgaH /
   tasmātsarvaṃ jñānaṃ samīcīnamāstheyam /	tasmAt sarvam jQAnam samIcInam AsTeyam /
   tathā ca 'rajatam','idam' iti ca dve vijñāne smṛtyanubhavarūpe /	taTA ca arajatam a, aidam a iti ca dve vijQAne smRti anuBava rUpe /
   tatra 'idaṃ' iti purovartidravyamātragrahaṇam,	tatra aidama iti purovarti dravya mAtra grahaNam,
   doṣavaśāttadgataśuktitvasāmānyaviśeṣasyāgrahāt tanmātraṃ ca gṛhītaṃ	doza vaSAt tadgata Sukti tva sAmAnya viSezasya agrahAt tanmAtram ca gRhItam
   sadṛśatayā saṃskārodbodhakrameṇa rajate smṛtiṃ janayati /	sadRSa tayA saMskAra udboDa krameNa rajate smRtim janayati /
   sā ca gṛhītagrahaṇasvabhāvāpi doṣavaśādgṛhītatvāṃśapramoṣāc	sA ca gRhIta grahaNa svaBAvA api doza vaSAt gRhIta tva aMSa pramoza At 
   grahaṇamātramavatiṣṭhate /	grahaNa mAtram avatizWate /
   tathā ca rajatasamṛteḥ purovartidravyamātragrahaṇasya ca mithaḥ svarūpato	taTA ca rajata samRteH puras varti dravya mAtra grahaNasya ca miTas svarUpataH 
   viṣayataśca bhedāgrahaṇāt, saṃnihitarajatagocarajñānasārūpyeṇa 'idam',	vizayataH ca Beda agrahaNAt, saMnihita rajata gocara jQAna sArUpyeNa aidam a,
   ṭarajatam', iti dve ete api grahaṇasmaraṇe abhedavyavahāraṃ	warajatam a, iti dve ete api grahaNa smaraNe aBeda vyavahAram
   sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśaṃ ca pravartayataḥ /	sAmAnADikaraNya vyapadeSam ca pravartayataH /
   kvacitpunargrahaṇe e mithaḥ agṛhītabhede, yathā 'pītaḥ śaṅkhaḥ' iti /	kvacid punar grahaNe e miTas agRhIta Bede, yaTA api itaH SaFKaHa iti /
   atra hi vinirgacchannayanaraśmivartinaḥ pittadravyasya kācasyeva	atra hi vinirgacCat nayana raSmi vartinaH pitta dravyasya kAcasya iva
   svacchasya pītatvaṃ gṛhyate pittaṃ tu na gṛhyate /	svacCasya pIta tvam gRhyate pittam tu na gRhyate /
   śaṅkho 'pi doṣavaśācchuklaguṇarahitaḥ svarūpamātreṇa gṛhyate /	SaFKaH api doza vaSAt Sukla guNa rahitaH sva rUpa mAtreNa gRhyate /
   tadanayorguṇaguṇinorasaṃsargāgrahasārūpyāt	tad anayoH guNa guNinoH asaMsarga AgrahasA ArUpyAt 
   pītatapanīyapiṇḍapratyayāviśeṣeṇābhedavyavahāraḥ	pIta tapanIya piNxa pratyaya aviSezeNa aBeda vyavahAraH
   sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśaśca /	sAmAnADikaraNya vyapadeSaH ca /
   bhedāgrahaprasañjitābhedavyavahārabādhanācca 'nedam' iti vivekapratyayasya	Beda Agraha prasaQjita aBeda vyavahAra bADanAt ca anedam a iti viveka pratyayasya
   bādhakatvamapyupapadyate ; tadupapattau ca prāktanasya pratyayasya	bADaka tvam api upapadyate ; tad upapattO ca prAktanasya pratyayasya
   bhrāntatvamapi lokasiddhaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /	BrAnta tvam api loka sidDam sidDam Bavati /
   tasmādyathārthāḥ sarve vipratipannāḥ saṃdehavibhramāḥ, pratyayatvāt,	tasmAt yaTArTAH sarve vipratipannAH saMdeha viBramAH, pratyaya tvAt,
   ghaṭādipratyayavat /	Gawa Adi pratyaya vat /
   tadidamuktam  yatra yadadhyāsa iti /	tat idam uktam yatra yat aDyAsaH iti /
   yasmin śuktikādau yasya rajatāderadhyāsa iti lokaprasiddhiḥ	yasmin SuktikA AdO yasya rajata AdeH aDyAse iti loka prasidDiH
   nāsāvanyathākhyātinibandhanā, kiṃ tu gṛhītasya rajatādestatsmaraṇasya ca	na asO= anyaTA AKyAti nibanDanA, kim tu gRhItasya rajata AdeH tad smaraNasya ca
   gṛhītatāṃśapramoṣeṇa gṛhītamātrasya yaḥ 'idam' iti puro	gRhIta tA aMSa pramozeNa gRhIta mAtrasya yaH aidam a iti puro
   'vasthitāddravyamātrāttatprajñānācca vivekaḥ, tadagrahaṇanibandhano	avasTitAt dravya mAtrAt tad prajQAnAt ca vivekaH, tad agrahaNa nibanDanaH 
   bhramaḥ /	BramaH /
   bhrāntatvaṃ ca grahaṇasmaraṇayoritaretarasāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśo	BrAnta tvam ca grahaNa smaraNayoH itareta rasAmAna aDikaraNya vyapadeSaH 
   rajatādivyavahāraśceti /	rajata Adi vyavahAraH ca iti /
   anye tu  atrāpyaparituṣyantaḥ  yatra yadadhyāsastasyaiva	anye tu atra api aparituzyantaH yatra yat aDyAsaH tasya eva
   viparītadharmakalpanāmācakṣate /	viparIta Darma kalpanAm a Acakzate /
   atredamākūtam  asti tāvadrajatārthinaḥ 'rajatamidam' iti	atra idam AkUtam asti tAvat rajata arTinaH arajatam idam a iti
   pratyayātputovartini dravye pravṛttiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśaśceti	pratyayAt putovartini dravye pravRttiH sAmAnADikaraNya vyapadeSaH ca iti
   sarvajanīnām /	sarva janInAm /
   tadetanna tāvadgrahaṇasmaraṇayostadgocarayośca mitho	tat etat na tAvat grahaNa smaraNayoH tad gocarayoH ca miTas 
   bhedāgrahamātrādbhavitumarhati /	Beda agraha mAtrAt Bavitum arhati /
   grahaṇanibandhanau hi cetanasya vyavahāravyapadeśau	grahaNa nibanDanO hi cetanasya vyavahAra vyapadeSO
   kathamagrahaṇamātrādbhavetām ? nanūktaṃ nāgrahaṇamātrāt, kiṃ tu	kaTam agrahaNa mAtrAt BavetAm ? nanu uktam na agrahaNa mAtrA at, kim tu
   grahaṇasmaraṇe eva mithaḥ svarūpato viṣayataścāgṛhītabhede,	grahaNa smaraNe eva miTas svarUpataH vizayataH ca agRhIta Bede,
   samīcīnapuraḥsthitarajatavijñānasādṛśyenābhedavyavahāraṃ	samIcIna puraH sTita rajata vijQAna sAdRSyena aBeda vyavahAram
   sāmānādhikaṇyavyapadeśaṃ ca pravartayataḥ /	sAmAna aDikaNya vyapadeSam ca pravartayataH /
   atha samīcīnajñānasārūpyamanayorgṛhyamāṇaṃ vā vyavahārapravṛttihetuḥ,	aTa samIcIna jQAna sArUpyam anayoH gRhyamANam vA vyavahAra pravRtti hetuH,
   agṛhyamāṇaṃ vā sattāmātreṇa /	agRhyamANam vA sattA mAtreNa /
   gṛhyamāṇe 'pi 'samīcīnajñānasārūpyamanayoridamiti rajatamiti ca jñānayoḥ'	gRhyamANe api asamI cIna jQAna sArUpyam anayoH idam iti rajatam iti ca jQAnayoH a
   iti grahaṇam, atha vā 'tayoreva svarūpato viṣayataśca mitho bhedāgrahaḥ'	iti grahaNam, aTa vA atayoH eva svarUpataH vizayataH ca miTas Beda agrahaH a
   iti grahaṇam /	iti grahaNam /
   tatra na tāvatsamīcīnajñānasadṛśī iti jñānaṃ	tatra na tAvat samIcIna jQAna sadRSI iti jQAnam
   samīcīnajñānavadvyavahārapravartakam /	samIcIna jQAna vat vyavahAra pravartakam /
   na hi 'gosadṛśo gavayaḥ' iti jñānaṃ gavārthinaṃ gavaye pravartayati /	na hi ago sadRSaH gavayaH a iti jQAnam gavArTinam gavaye pravartayati /
   'anayoreva bhedāgrahaḥ' iti tu jñānaṃ parāhatam ; na hi bhedāgrahe	aanayoH eva Beda agrahaH a iti tu jQAnam parAhatam ; na hi Beda agrahe
   anayoriti bhavati, anayoriti grahe bhedāgrahaṇamiti na bhavati /	anayoH iti Bavati, anayoH iti grahe Beda agrahaNam iti na Bavati /
   tasmātsattāmātreṇa bhedāgrahaḥ agṛhīta eva vyavahāraheturiti vaktavyam /	tasmAt sattA mAtreNa Beda AgrahaH agRhItaH eva vyavahAra hetuH iti vaktavyam /
   tatra kimayamāropotpādakrameṇa vyavahārahetuḥ, āho anutpāditāropa eva	tatra kim ayam Aropa utpAda krameNa vyavahAra hetuH, Aho anutpAdita AropaH eva
   svata iti ? vayaṃ tu paśyāmaḥ  cetanavyavahārasya	svatas iti ? vayam tu paSyAmaH cetana vyavahArasya
   ajñānapūrvakatvānupapatteḥ āropajñānotpādakrameṇaiva  iti /	ajQAna pUrvakatva anupapatteH Aropa jQAna utpAda krameNa eva iti /
   nanu satyaṃ cetanavyavahāro nājñānapūrvakaḥ, kiṃ tu	nanu satyam cetana vyavahAraH na ajQAna pUrvakaH, kim tu
   aviditavivekagrahaṇasmaraṇapūrvaka iti /	avidita viveka grahaNa smaraNa pUrvakaH iti /
   maivam /	mA evam /
   na hi rajataprātipadikārthamātrasmaraṇaṃ pravṛttāvupayujyate /	na hi rajata prAtipadika arTa mAtra smaraNam pravRttO= upayujyate /
   idaṅkārāspadābhimukhī khalu rajatārthināṃ pravṛttirityavivādam /	idaFkAra Aspada aBimuKI Kalu rajata arTinAm pravRttiH iti avivAdam /
   kathaṃ cāyamidaṅkārāspade pravarteta yadi tu na tadicchet ?	kaTam ca ayam idaFkAra Aspade pravarteta yadi tu na tat icCet ?
   anyadicchatyanyatkarotīti vyāhatam /	anyat icCati anyat karoti iti vyAhatam /
   na cedidaṅkārāspadaṃ rajatamiti jānīyāt kathaṃ rajatārthī tadicchet ? yadi	na cedi daFkAra Aspadam rajatam iti jAnIyAt kaTam rajata arTI tad icCet ? yadi
   atathātvenāgrahaṇāt iti brūyāt, sa ca prativaktavyaḥ, atha	ataTAtvena agrahaNAt iti brUyAt, sa ca prativaktavyaH, aTa
   tathātvenāgrahaṇāt kasmānnopekṣeteti /	taTA tvena agrahaNAt kasmAt na upekzeta iti /
   so 'yamupādānopekṣābhyāmubhayata ākṛṣyamāṇaścecanaḥ avyavasthitaḥ	saH ayam upAdAna upekzAByAm uBayatas AkRzyamANaH cecanaH avyavasTitaH
   idaṅkārāspade rajatasamāropeṇopādāna eva vyavasthāpyate, iti bhedāgrahaḥ	idaFkAra Aspade rajata samAropeNa upAdAnaH eva vyavasTApyate, iti Beda AgrahaH
   samāropotpādakrameṇa cetanapravṛttihetuḥ /	samAropa utpAda krameNa cetana pravRtti hetuH /
   tathā hi   bhedāgrahādidaṅkārāspade rajatatvaṃ samāropya,	taTA hi  Beda agraha Adi daFkAra Aspade rajata tvam samAropya,
   tajjātīyasyopakārahetubhāvamanucintya, tajjātīyatayedaṅkārāspade rajate	tad jAtIyasya upakAra hetu BAvam anucintya, tat jAtIyatayet aFkAra Aspade rajate
   tamanumāya, tadarthī pravartate ityānupūrvyaṃ siddham /	tam anumAya, tad arTI pravartate iti AnupUrvyam sidDam /
   na ca taṭastharajatasmṛtiḥ	na ca tawa sTa rajata smRtiH
   idaṅkārāspadasyopakārahetubhāvamanumāpayitumarhati, rajatatvasya	idaFkAra Aspadasya upakAra hetu BAvam anumApayitum arhati, rajata tvasya
   hetorapakṣadharmatvāt /	hetoH apakza Darma tvAt /
   ekadeśadarśanaṃ khalvanumāpakaṃ na tvanekadeśadarśanam /	eka deSa darSanam Kalu anumApakam na tu aneka deSa darSanam /
   yadāhuḥ "jñātasaṃbandhasyaikadeśadareśanāt"iti /	yat AhuH  "jQAta saMbanDasya eka deSa dara ISanAt"iti /
   samārope tvekadeśadarśanamasti /	samArope tu eka deSa darSanam asti /
   tatsiddham  etadvivādādhyāsitaṃ rajatādijñānaṃ purovartivastuviṣayam,	tad sidDam etad vivAda aDyAsitam rajata Adi jQAnam purovarti vastu vizayam,
   rajatādyarthinastatra niyamena pravartakatvāt, yadyadarthinaṃ yatra	rajata Adi arTinaH tatra niyamena pravartaka tvAt, yat yat arTinam yatra
   niyamena pravartakatvāt ; yadyadarthinaṃ yatra niyamena pravartayati	niyamena pravartaka tvAt ; yat yat arTinam yatra niyamena pravartayati
   tajjñānaṃ tadviṣayaṃ yathobhayasiddhasamīcīnarajatajñānam ; tathā cedam ;	tat jQAnam tat vizayam yaTA uBaya sidDa samIcIna rajata jQAnam ; taTA ca idam ;
   tasmāttathā  iti /	tasmAt taTA iti /
   yaccoktam anavabhāsamānatayā na śuktirālambanamiti, tatra bhavān pṛṣṭo	yat ca uktam anavaBAsamAna tayA na SuktiH Alambanam iti, tatra BavAn pRzwaH 
   vyācaṣṭām  kiṃ śuktikātvasya 'idaṃ rajatam' iti jñānaṃ pratyanālambanatvam	vyAcazwAm kim SuktikAtvasya aidam rajatam a iti jQAnam pratyanAlambana tvam
   āhosvit dravyamātrasya puraḥsthitasya sitabhāsvarasya ? yadi śuktikātvasya	Ahosvit dravya mAtrasya puras sTitasya sita BAsvarasya ? yadi SuktikAtvasya
   anālambanatvam, addhā ! uttarasyānālambanatvaṃ bruvāṇasya	anAlambana tvam, adDA ! uttarasya anAlambana tvam bruvANasya
   tavaivānubhavavirodhaḥ /	tava eva anuBava viroDaH /
   tathā hi 'rajatamidam' ityanubhavannanubhavitā purovarti vastu aṅgulyādinā	taTA hi  arajatam idam a iti anuBavan= anuBavitA purovarti vastu aFgulI AdinA
   nirdiśati /	nirdiSati /
   dṛṣṭaṃ ca duṣṭānāṃ kāraṇānāmautsargikakāryapratibandhena	dRzwam ca duzwAnAm kAraNAnAm Otsargika kArya pratibanDena
   kāryāntaropajananasāmarthyam, yathā dāvāgnidagdhānāṃ vetrabījānāṃ	kArya antara upajanana sAmarTyam, yaTA dAva agni dagDAnAm vetra bIjAnAm
   kadalīkāṇḍajanakatvam, bhasmakaduṣṭasya caudaryasya tejaso	kadalI kANxa janaka tvam, Basmaka duzwasya ca Odaryasya tejasaH 
   bahvannapacanamiti /	bahu anna pacanam iti /
   pratyakṣabādhāpahṛtaviṣayaṃ ca vibhramāṇāṃ yathārthatvānumānamābhāsaḥ,	pratyakza bADa apahRta vizayam ca viBramANAm yaTArTa tva anumAnam ABAsaH,
   hutavahānuṣṇatvānumānavat /	hutavaha an uzNa tva anumAna vat /
   yaccoktaṃ mithyāpratyayasya vyabhicāre sarvapramāṇeṣvanāśvāsa iti, tat	yat ca uktam miTyA pratyayasya vyaBicAre sarva pramANezu anASvAsaH iti, tat 
   bodhakatvena svataḥprāmāṇyaṃ nāvyabhicāreṇeti vyutpādayadbhirasmābhiḥ	boDaka tvena svatas prAmANyam na avyaBicAreNa iti vyutpAdayadBiH asmABiH
   parihṛtaṃ nyāyakaṇikāyāmiti neha pratanyate /	parihRtam nyAya kaNikAyAm iti na iha pratanyate /
   diṅmātraṃ cāsya smṛtipramoṣabhaṅgasyoktam ; vistarastu	diS mAtram ca asya smRti pramoza BaFgasya uktam ; vistaraH tu
   brahmatattvasamīkṣāyāmavagantavya iti /	brahma tattva samIkzAyAm avagantavyaH iti /
   tadidamuktam  anye tu yatra yadadhyāsastasyaiva	tat idam uktam anye tu yatra yat aDyAsaH tasya eva
   viparītadharmakalpanāmācakṣate iti /	viparIta Darma kalpanAm a Acakzate iti /
   yatra śuktikādau yasya rajatāderadhyāsastasyaiva	yatra SuktikA AdO yasya rajata AdeH aDyAsaH tasya eva
   śuktikāderviparītadharmakalpanāṃ rajatatvadharmakalpanāmiti yojanā /	SuktikA AdeH viparIta Darma kalpanAm rajatatva Darma kalpanAm iti yojanA /
   nanu santu nāma parīkṣakāṇāṃ vipratipattayaḥ, prakṛte tu kimāyātamityata	nanu santu nAma parIkzakANAm vipratipattayaH, prakRte tu kim AyAtam iti ata
   āha  sarvathāpi iti /	Aha sarvaTA api iti /
   anyasyānyadharmakalpanā anṛtatā, sā ca	anyasya anya Darma kalpanA anRta tA, sA ca
   anirvacanīyatetyadhastādupapādayitum /	anirvacanIyatA iti aDastAt upapAdayitum /
   tena sarveṣāmeva parīkṣakāṇāṃ mate	tena sarvezAm eva parIkzakANAm mate
   anyasyānyadharmakalpanānirvacanīyāvaśyaṃbhāvinītyanirvacanīyatā	anyasya anya Darma kalpanAniH vacanIya avaSyaMBAvinI iti anirvacanIya tA
   sarvatantrasiddhānta ityarthaḥ /	sarva tantra sidDAntaH iti arTaH /
   akhyātivādibhirakāmairapi	aKyAti vAdiBiH akAmEH api
   sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśapravṛttiniyamasnehādidamabhyupeyamiti bhāvaḥ /	sAmAnADikaraNya vyapadeSa pravRtti niyama snehAt idam aByupeyam iti BAvaH /
   na kevalamiyamanṛtatā parīkṣakāṇāṃ siddhā, api tu laukikānāmapītyāha 	na kevalam iyam anRta tA parIkzakANAm sidDA, api tu lOkikAnAm api iti Aha 
   tathā ca loke anubavaḥ śuktikā hi rajatavadavabhāsata iti /	taTA ca loke anubavaH SuktikA hi rajata vat ava BAsate iti /
   na punā rajatamidamiti śeṣaḥ /	na punA rajatam idam iti SezaH /
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   anyasyānyātmatāvibhramo lokasiddhaḥ, ekasya tvabhinnasya bhedabhramo na	anyasya ani a Atma tA viBramaH loka sidDaH, ekasya tu aBinnasya Beda BramaH na
   dṛṣṭa iti kutaḥ cidātmano 'bhinnānāṃ jīvānāṃ bhedavibhrama ityata āha 	dRzwaH iti kutas cit AtmanaH aBinnAnAm jIvAnAm Beda viBramaH iti atas Aha 
   ekaścandraḥ sadvitīyavat iti /	ekaH candraH sa dvitIya vat iti /
   punarapi cidātmanyadhyāsamākṣipati  kathaṃ punaḥ iti /	punar api cit Atmani aDya asamAkzipati kaTam punar iti /
   ayamarthaḥ  cidātmā prakāśate na vā ? na cet prakāśate,	ayam arTaH cit AtmA prakASate na vA ? na ced prakASate,
   kathamasminnadhyāso viṣayataddharmāṇām ? na khalvapratibhāsamāne	kaTam asmin= aDyAsaH vizaya tad DarmANAm ? na Kalva pratiBAsamAne
   purovartini dravye rajatasya vā taddharmāṇāṃ vā samāropaḥ saṃbhavati /	puras vartini dravye rajatasya vA tad DarmANAm vA samAropaH saMBavati /
   pratibhāsamāne vā na tāvadayamātmā jaḍo ghaṭādivatparādhīnaprakāśa iti	pratiBAsamAne vA na tAvat ayam AtmA jaxaH Gawa Adi vat para aDIna prakASaH iti
   yuktam /	yuktam /
   na khalu sa eva kartā ca karma ca bhavati, virodhāt /	na Kalu saH eva kartA ca karma ca Bavati, viroDAt /

   kathamasyāḥ karma ? na ca tadeva svaṃ ca paraṃ ca, virodhāt /	kaTam asyAH karma ? na ca tat eva svam ca param ca, viroDAt /

   samastatīrthakaraiśca prāmāṇyānabhyupagamādadhyāsatvam /	samasta tIrTakarEH ca prAmANya anaByupagamAt aDyAsa tvam /
   evaṃ ca vedāntā nāvivakṣitārthāḥ, nāpi upacaritārthāḥ, kiṃ tu uktakṣaṇāḥ /	evam ca vedAntAH na avivakzita arTAH, na api upacarita arTAH, kim tu ukta kzaNAH /

   viditapadapadārthasaṃbandhānāṃ samadhigataśābdanyāyatattvānāṃ	vidita pada padArTa saMbanDAnAm samaDigata SAbda nyAya tattvAnAm

   vākyārthapratyayotpatteḥ /	vAkya arTa pratyaya utpatteH /
   anutpattau vā vidhiniṣedhavākyārthapratyayābhāvena	anutpattO vA viDi nizeDa vAkya arTa pratyaya aBAvena
   tadarthānuṣṭhānaparivarjanābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /	tad arTa anuzWAna parivarjana aBAva prasaFgaH /
   tadbodhatastu tadarthānuṣṭhānaparivarjane parasparāśrayaḥ, tasmin sati	tat boDataH tu tad arTa anuzWAna parivarjane paraspara ASrayaH, tasmin sati
   tadarthānuṣṭhānaparivarjanaṃ tataśca tadbodha iti /	tad arTa anuzWAna parivarjanam tatas ca tad boDaH iti /
   na ca vedāntavākyānāmeva svārthapratyāyane karmāpekṣā na vākyāntarāṇāmiti	na ca vedAnta vAkyAnAm eva sva arTa pratyAyane karma apekzA na vAkya antarANAm iti
   sāṃpratam, viśeṣahetoḥ abhāvāt /	sAMpratam, viSeza hetoH aBAvAt /
   nanu 'tattvamasi' iti vākyāt tvaṃpadārthasya kartṛbhoktṛrūpasya jīvātmano	nanu atat tvam asi a iti vAkyAt tvaMpadArTasya kartR BoktR rUpasya jIva AtmanaH

   śraddadhānāyogyatāvagamapuraḥsaraṃ tādātmyamavagamiṣyantīti cet,	SraddaDAna ayogya tA avagama puraHsaram tAdAtmyam avagamizyanti iti ced ,

   vaktumadhyavasito 'si, pratyakṣādyatiriktaṃ vā karmāpi pramāṇam /	vaktu maDya vasitaH asi, pratyakza Adi atiriktam vA karma api pramANam /
   vedāntāviruddhatanmūlanyāyabalena tu yogyatāvadhāraṇe kṛtaṃ karmabhiḥ /	vedAnta avirudDa tad mUla nyAya balena tu yogyatA avaDAraNe kRtam karmaBiH /

   gṛhītvā, tanmūlayā copapattyā vyavasthāpya, tadupāsanāyāṃ	gRhItvA, tad mUlayA ca upapattyA vyavasTApya, tad upAsanAyAm

   vīryārthatām, 'ekasya tūbhayārthatve saṃyogapṛthaktvam' iti nyāyāt /	vIrya arTa tAm, aekasya tu uBaya arTa tve saMyoga pRTaktvam a iti nyAyAt /
   ata eva pāramarṣaṃ sūtram 'sarvāpekṣā ca yajñādiśruteraśvavat' iti /	atas eva pAramarzam sUtram asarva apekzA ca yajQa Adi SruteH aSvavat a iti /

   tasmāt yadi śrutyādayaḥ pramāṇaṃ yadi vā pāramarṣaṃ sūtraṃ sarvathā	tasmAt yadi Sruti AdayaH pramANam yadi vA pAramarzam sUtram sarvaTA
   yajñādikarmasamuccitā brahmopāsanā viśeṣaṇatrayavatī	yajQa Adi karma samuccitA brahma upAsanA viSezaNa trayavatI
   anādyavidyātadvāsanāsamucchedakrameṇa brahmasākṣātkārāya mokṣāparanāmne	anAdya vidyA tad vAsanA samucCeda krameNa brahma sAkzAtkArAya mokza apara nAmne
   kalpata iti tadarthaṃ karmāṇyanuṣṭheyāni /	kalpate iti tad arTam karmANi anuzWeyAni /
   na caitāni	na ca etAni
   dṛṣṭādṛṣṭasāmavāyikārādupakārahetubhūtaupadeśikātideśikakramaparyantāṅgagrāmasahitaparasparavibhinnakarmasvarūpatadadhikāribhedaparijñānaṃ	dRzwa adRzwa sAma vAyi kArAt upakAra hetu BUta OpadeSika ati deSika krama paryanta aFga grAma sahita paraspara viBinna karma svarUpa tad aDikAri Beda pari
   vinā śakyānyanuṣṭhātum /	vinA SakyAni anuzWAtum /
   na ca dharmamīmāṃsāpariśīlanaṃ vinā tatparijñānam /	na ca Darma mImAMsA pariSIlanam vinA tad parijQAnam /
   tasmātsādhūktam 'karmāvabodhānantaryaṃ viśeṣaḥ' iti /	tasmAt sADu uktam akarma avaboDa Anantaryam viSezaHa iti /

   tadetannirākaroti  na iti /	tat etat nirAkaroti naH iti /
   kutaḥ ? karmāvabodhāt prāgapyadhītavedāntasya brahmajijñāsopapatteḥ /	kutas ? karma avaboDAt prAk api aDIta vedAntasya brahma jijQAsA upapatteH /

   ityuktam /	iti uktam /
   tatra brūmaḥ  kva punarasyāḥ karmāpekṣā ? kiṃ kārye yathāgneyādīnāṃ	tatra brUmaH kva punar asyAH karma apekzA ? kim kArye yaTA agneya AdInAm
   paramāpūrve cirabhāviphalānukūle janayitavye samidādyapekṣā ? svarūpe vā	paramA pUrve cira BAvi Pala anukUle janayitavye samiD Adi apekzA ? svarUpe vA
   yathā teṣāmeva dviravattapuroḍāśādidravyāgnidevatādyapekṣā ? na	yaTA tezAm eva dvis avatta puroxASa Adi dravya agni devatA Adi apekzA ? na
   tāvatkārye, tasya vikalpāsahatvāt /	tAvat kArye, tasya vikalpa asaha tvAt /
   tathā hi  brahmopāsanāyā brahmasvarūpasākṣātkāraḥ kāryamabhyupeyaḥ /	taTA hi brahma upAsanAyAH brahma svarUpa sAkzAtkAraH kAryam aByupeyaH /
   sa cotpādyo vā syāt yathā saṃyavanasya piṇḍaḥ, vikāryo vā yathāvaghātasya	sa ca utpAdyaH vA syAt yaTA saMyavanasya piNxaH, vikAryaH vA yaTA avaGAtasya
   vrīhayaḥ, saṃskāryo vā yathā prokṣaṇasyolūkhalādayaḥ, prāpyo vā yathā	vrIhayaH, saMskAryaH vA yaTA prokzaNasya ulUKala AdayaH, prApyaH vA yaTA
   dohanasya payaḥ /	dohanasya payaH /
   na tāvadutpādyaḥ /	na tAvat utpAdyaH /

   saṃskāryastu anirvacanīyāvidyādvayapidhānāpanayanena bhaviṣyati,	saMskAryaH tu anirvacanIya avidyA dvaya piDAna apanayanena Bavizyati,

   nanūktaṃ śrutamayena jñānena jīvātmanaḥ paramātmabhāvaṃ gṛhītvā	nanu uktam Sruta mayena jQAnena jIva AtmanaH paramAtma BAvam gRhItvA

   sākṣātkārarūpo hi viparyāsaḥ sākṣātkārarūpeṇaiva tattvajñānenocchidyate,	sAkzAtkAra rUpaH hi viparyAsaH sAkzAtkAra rUpeNa eva tattva jQAnena ucCidyate,
   na tu parokṣāvabhāsena,	na tu parokza avaBAsena,
   diṅmohālātacakracaladvṛkṣamarumarīcisalilādivibhrameṣvaparokṣāvabhāsiṣu	diS moha alAta cakra calat vRkza maru marIci salila Adi viBramezu aparokza avaBAsizu

   no khalvāptavacanaliṅgādiniścitadigāditattvānāṃ diṅmohādayo nivartante /	no Kalu Apta vacana liFga Adi niScita diS Adi tattvAnAm diS moha AdayaH nivartante /
   tasmāt tvaṃpadārthasya tatpadārthatvena sākṣātkāra eṣitavyaḥ /	tasmAt tvaMpadArTasya tad padArTa tvena sAkzAtkAraH ezitavyaH /
   etāvatā hi tvaṃpadārthasya duḥkhiśokitvādisākṣātkāranivṛttiḥ, nānyathā /	etAvatA hi tvaMpadArTasya duHKi Sokitva Adi sAkzAtkAra nivRttiH, na anyaTA /
   na caiṣa sākṣātkāro mīmāṃsāsahitasyāpi śabdapramāṇasya phalam, api tu	na ca eza sAkzAtkAraH mImAMsA sahitasya api Sabda pramANasya Palam, api tu
   pratyakṣasya, tasyaiva tatphalatvaniyamāt ; anyathā kuṭajabījādapi	pratyakzasya, tasya eva tad Pala tva niyamAt ; anyaTA kuwaja bIjAt api
   vaṭāṅkurotpattiprasaṅgāt /	vawa aFkura utpatti prasaFgAt /
   tasmānnirvicikitsavākyārthabhāvanāparipākasahitamantaḥkaraṇaṃ	tasmAt nirvicikitsa vAkya arTa BAvanA paripAka sahitam antaHkaraNam

   tatpadārthatāmāvirbhāvayatīti yuktam /	tad padArTa tAm AvirBAvayati iti yuktam /
   na cāyamanubhavato brahmasvabhāvo yena na janyeta, api tu	na ca ayam anuBavataH brahma svaBAvaH yena na janyeta, api tu
   antaḥkaraṇasyaiva vṛttibhedo brahmaviṣayaḥ /	antaHkaraNasya eva vRtti BedaH brahma vizayaH /
   na caitāvatā brahmaṇo 'pi parādhīnaprakāśatā /	na ca etAvatA brahmaNaH api para aDIna prakASa tA /
   na hi śābdajñānaprakāśyaṃ brahma svayaṃ prakāśaṃ na bhavati /	na hi SAbda jQAna prakASyam brahma svayam prakASam na Bavati /
   sarvopādhivihīnaṃ hi svayañjyotiriti gīyate, na tūpahitamapi /	sarva upADi vihInam hi svayan jyotiH iti gIyate, na tu upahitam api /
   yathāha sma bhagavānbhāṣyakāraḥ  'na tāvadayamekāntenāviṣayaḥ' iti /	yaTA Aha sma BagavAn BAzya kAraH ana tAvat ayam ekAntena avizayaH a iti /
   na cāntaḥkaraṇavṛttāvapyasya sākṣātkāre sarvopādhivinirmokaḥ, tasyaiva	na ca antaHkaraNa vRttO= api asya sAkzAtkAre sarva upADi vinirmokaH, tasya eva
   tadupādhervinaśyadavasthasya svaparopādhivirodhino vidyamānatvāt /	tad upADeH vinaSyat avasTasya sva para upADi viroDinaH vidyamAna tvAt /
   anyathā caitanyacchāyāpattiṃ vināntaḥkaraṇavṛtteḥ svayamacetanāyāḥ	anyaTA cEtanya= CAyA pattim vinA antaH karaNa vRtteH svayam acetanAyAH
   svaprakāśatvānupapattau sākṣātkāratvāyogāt /	sva prakASa tva anupapattO sAkzAtkAra tva ayogAt /
   na cānumitabhāvitavahnisākṣātkāravat pratibhātvenāsyāprāmāṇyam, tatra	na ca anumita BAvita vahni sAkzAt kAra vat pratiBA tvena asya aprAmANyam, tatra
   vahnisvalakṣaṇasya parokṣatvāt /	vahni sva lakzaNasya parokza tvAt /
   iha tu brahmasvarūpasya upādhikaluṣitasya jīvasya prāgapyaparokṣatvāt /	iha tu brahma svarUpasya upADi kaluzitasya jIvasya prAk api aparokza tvAt /
   na hi śuddhabuddhatvādayo vastutastato 'tiricyante /	na hi SudDa budDa tva AdayaH vastutas tatas atiricyante /
   jīva eva tu tattadupādhirahitaḥ śuddhabuddhatvādisvabhāvo brahmeti gīyate	jIvaH eva tu tad tad upADi rahitaH SudDa budDa tva Adi svaBAvaH brahma iti gIyate
   na ca tattadupādhiviraho 'pi tato 'tiricyate /	na ca tad tad upADi virahaH api tatas atiricyate /
   tasmāt yathā gāndharvaśāstrārthajñānābhyāsāhitasaṃskārasacivaḥ	tasmAt yaTA gAnDarva SAstra arTa jQAna aByAsa Ahita saMskAra sacivaH
   śrotrendriyeṇa ṣaḍjādisvaragrāmamūrchanābhedamadhyakṣamanubhavati, evaṃ	Srotra indriyeNa zaxja Adi svara grAma mUrCana aBedam aDyakzam anuBavati, evam

   mā bhūdagnihotrayavāgūpākavadarthaḥ kramaḥ ; śrautastu bhaviṣyanti ; 'gṛhī	mA BUt agni hotra yavAgU pAka vat arTaH kramaH ; SrOtaH tu Bavizyanti ; agRhI

   caitadubhayamapyastītyāha  phalajijñāsyabhedācca /	ca etat uBayam api asti iti Aha Pala jijQAsya BedAt ca /

   bhavatyanubhavopapattibhyām /	Bavati anuBava upapattiByAm /

   tasminvirāgo nāmānābhogātmikopekṣābuddhiḥ /	tasmin virAgaH nAma anABoga AtmikA upekzA budDiH /
   tataḥ śamadamādisādhanasaṃpat /	tatas Sama dama Adi sADana saMpad /
   rāgādikaṣāyamadirāmattaṃ hi manaḥ teṣu teṣu viṣayeṣūccāvacamindriyāṇi	rAga Adi kazAya madirA mattam hi manaH tezu tezu vizayezu ucca avacam indriyANi
   pravartayat vividhāśca pravṛttīḥ puṇyāpuṇyaphalā bhāvayat puruṣamatighore	pravartayat viviDAH ca pravRttIH puNya apuNya PalAH BAvayat puruzam ati Gore
   vividhaduḥkhajvālājaṭāle saṃsārahutabhuji juhoti /	viviDa duHKa jvAlA jawAle saMsAra hutaBuji juhoti /
   prasaṃkhyānābhyāsalabdhavairāgyaparipākabhagnarāgādikaṣāyamadirāmadaṃ tu	prasaMKyAna aByAsa labDa vErAgya paripAka Bagna rAga Adi kazAya madirA madam tu
   manaḥ puruṣeṇāvajīyate vaśīkriyate /	manaH puruzeNa avajIyate vaSIkriyate /
   so 'yamasya vairāgyahetuko manovijayaḥ śama iti vaśīkarasaṃjña iti	saH ayam asya vErAgya hetukaH manaH vijayaH SamaH iti vaSIkara saMjQaH iti
   cākhyāyate /	ca AKyAyate /
   vijitaṃ ca manastattvaviṣayaviniyogayogyatāṃ nīyate ; seyamasya yogyatā	vijitam ca manaH tattva vizaya viniyoga yogya tAm nIyate ; sA iyam asya yogyatA
   damaḥ, yathā dānto 'yaṃ vṛṣabhayuvā halaśakaṭādivahanayogyaḥ kṛta iti	damaH, yaTA dAntaH ayam vRzaBa yuvA hala Sakawa Adi vahana yogyaH kRtaH iti
   gamyate /	gamyate /
   ādi grahaṇena ca viṣayatitikṣātaduparamatattvaśraddhāḥ saṃgṛhyante /	Adi grahaNena ca vizaya titikzA tad u parama tattva SradDAH saMgRhyante /
   ata eva śrutiḥ  'tasmācchānto dānta uparatastitikṣuḥ śraddhāvitto	atas eva SrutiH atasmAt SAntaH dAntaH uparataH titikzuH SradDA vittaH 
   bhūtvātmanyevātmānaṃ paśyet, sarvamātmani paśyati' iti /	BUtvA Atmani eva AtmAnam paSyet, sarvam Atmani paSyati a iti /
   tadetasya śamadamādirūpasya sādhanasya saṃpat, prakarṣaḥ,	tat etasya Sama dam a Adi rUpasya sADanasya saMpat, prakarzaH,
   śamadamādisādhanasaṃpat /	Sama dama Adi sADana saMpad /
   tato 'sya saṃsārabandhanānmumukṣā bhavatītyāha  mumukṣutvaṃ ca iti /	tatas asya saMsAra banDanAt mumukzA Bavati iti Aha mumukzu tvam ca iti /
   tasya ca nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvabrahmajñānaṃ mokṣasya	tasya ca nitya SudDa budDa mukta svaBAva brahma jQAnam mokzasya
   kāraṇamityupaśrutya tajjijñāsā bhavati dharmajijñāsāyāḥ prāgūrdhvaṃ ca ;	kAraNam iti upaSrutya tad jijQAsA Bavati Darma jijQAsAyAH prAk UrDvam ca ;
   tasmātteṣāmevānantaryaṃ na dharmajijñāsāyā ityāha  teṣu hi iti /	tasmAt tezAm eva Anantaryam na Darma jijQAsAyAH iti Aha tezu hi iti /
   na kevalaṃ jijñāsāmātram, api tu jñānamapītyāha  jñātuṃ ca /	na kevalam jijQAsA mAtram, api tu jQAnam api iti Aha jQAtum ca /
   upasaṃharati  tasmāt iti /	upasaMharati tasmAt iti /
   kramaprāptamataḥśabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe  ataḥśabdo hetvarthaḥ /	krama prAptam atas Sabdam vyAcazwe atas SabdaH hetu arTaH /
   tamevātaḥśabdasya heturūpamarthamāha  yasmādveda eva iti /	tam eva atas Sabdasya hetu rUpam arTam Aha yasmAt vedaH eva iti /
   atraivaṃ paricodyate  satyaṃ yathoktasādhanasaṃpattyanantaraṃ	atra evam paricodyate satyam yaTA ukta sADana saMpatti anantaram
   brahmajijñāsā bhavati /	brahma jijQAsA Bavati /
   saiva tvanupapannā, ihāmutraphalabhogavirāgasyānupapatteḥ /	sA eva tu anupapannA, iha amutra Pala Boga virAgasya anupapatteH /
   anukūlavedanīyaṃ hi phalam, iṣṭalakṣaṇatvātphalasya /	anukUla vedanIyam hi Palam, izwa lakzaNa tvAt Palasya /
   na cānurāgahetāvasya vairāgyaṃ bhavitumarhati /	na ca anurAga hetO= asya vErAgyam Bavitum arhati /
   duḥkhānuṣaṅgadarśanātsukhe 'pi vairāgyamiti cet, hanta bhoḥ	duHKa anuzaFga darSanAt suKe api vErAgyam iti cet, hanta BoH
   sukhānuṣaṅgādduḥkhe 'pyanurāgo na kasmādbhavati ? tasmāt sukhe upādīyamāne	suKa anuzaFgAt duHKe api anurAgaH na kasmAt Bavati ? tasmAt suKe upAdIyamAne
   duḥkhaparihāre prayatitavyam ; avarjanīyatayā duḥkhamāgatamapi parihṛtya	duHKa parihAre prayatitavyam ; avarjanIya tayA duHKam Agatam api parihRtya
   sukhamātraṃ bhokṣyate /	suKa mAtram Bokzyate /
   tadyathā  matsyārthī saśalkānsakaṇṭakānmatsyānupādatte, sa yāvadādeyaṃ	tat yaTA matsya arTI sa SalkAn sa kaNwakAn matsyAn upAdatte, sa yAvat Adeyam
   tāvadādāya nivartate ; yathā vā dhānyārthī sapalālāni dhānyānyāharati, sa	tAvat AdAya nivartate ; yaTA vA DAnya arTI sa palAlAni DAnyAni Aharati, sa
   yāvadādeyaṃ tāvadādāya nivartate /	yAvat Adeyam tAvat AdAya nivartate /
   tasmādduḥkhabhayānnānukūlavedanīyamaihikaṃ vāmuṣmikaṃ vā sukhaṃ	tasmAt duHKa BayAt na anukUla vedanIyam Ehikam vA amuzmikam vA suKam
   parityaktumucitam /	parityaktum ucitam /

   nādhiśrīyante /	na aDiSrIyante /
   api ca dṛṣṭaṃ sukhaṃ candanavanitādisaṅgajanma kṣayitālakṣaṇena	api ca dRzwam suKam candana vanitA Adi saFga janma kzayitA lakzaNena
   duḥkhenāghrātatvādatibhīruṇā tyajyetāpi, na tvāmuṣmikaṃ svargādi,	duHKena AGrAta tvAt ati BIruNA tyajyeta api, na tu Amuzmikam svarga Adi,
   tasyāvināśitvāt /	tasya avinASi tvAt /
   śrūyate hi  'apāma somamamṛtā abhūma' iti ; tathā ca 'akṣayyaṃ ha vai	SrUyate hi aapAma somam amRtA aBUma a iti ; taTA ca aakzayyam ha vE
   cāturmāsyayājinaḥ sukṛtaṃ bhavati' iti /	cAturmAsya yAjinaH sukRtam Bavati a iti /
   na ca kṛtakatvahetukaṃ vināśitvānumānamatra saṃbhavati,	na ca kRtaka tva hetukam vinASitvA anumAnam atra saMBavati,
   naraśiraḥkapālaśaucānumānavadāgamabādhitaviṣayatvāt /	nara SiraH kapAla SOca anumAna vat Agama bADita vizaya tvAt /
   tasmādyathoktasādhanasaṃpattyabhāvānna brahmajijñāseti prāptam /	tasmAt yaTA ukta sADana saMpatti aBAvAt na brahma jijQAsA iti prAptam /
   evaṃ prāpte āha bhagavānsūtrakāraḥ 'ataḥ' iti ; tasyārthaṃ vyācaṣṭe	evam prApte Aha BagavAn sUtra kAraH aataHa iti ; tasya arTam vyAcazwe
   bhāṣyakāraḥ  yasmādveda eva iti /	BAzya kAraH yasmAt vedaH eva iti /
   ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ  satyaṃ mṛgabhikṣukādayaḥ śakyāḥ parihartuṃ	ayam aBisaMDiH satyam mRga Bikzuka AdayaH SakyAH parihartum
   pācakakṛṣīvalādibhiḥ ; duḥkhaṃ	pAcaka kRzIvala AdiBiH ; duHKam
   tvanekavidhānekakāraṇasaṃpātajamaśakyaparihāram ; antataḥ	tu anekaviDa aneka kAraNa saMpAta jama Sakya parihAram ; antatas 
   sādhanāpāratantryakṣayitalakṣaṇayorduḥkhayoḥ	sADana ApAratantrya kzayita lakzaNayoH duHKayoH
   samastakṛtakasukhāvinābhāvaniyamāt /	samasta kRtaka suKa avinABAva niyamAt /
   na hi madhuviṣasaṃpṛktamannaṃ viṣaṃ parityajya madhumiśraṃ śakyaṃ	na hi maDu viza saMpRktam annam vizam parityajya maDu miSram Sakyam
   śilpivareṇāpi bhoktum /	Silpi vareNa api Boktum /
   kṣayitānumānopodvalitaṃ ca 'tadyatheha karmacitaḥ' ityādivacanaṃ	kzayitA anumAna upodvalitam ca atat yaTA iha karma citaH a ityAdi vacanam
   kṣayitāpratipādakam, 'apāma somam' ityādikaṃ vacanaṃ mukhyāsaṃbhave	kzayitA pratipAdakam, aapAma somam a iti Adikam vacanam muKya asaMBave
   jaghanyavṛttitāmāpādayati /	jaGanya vRtti tAm ApAdayati /
   yathāhuḥ paurāṇikāḥ 	yaTA AhuH pOrANikAH 
   'ābhūtasaṃplavaṃ sthānamamṛtatvaṃ hi bhāṣyate' iti /	aABUtasaMplavam sTAnam amRta tvam hi BAzyate a iti /

   sa ca yogyatvāt 'tadyatheha karmacitaḥ' ityādiḥ 'ataḥ' iti sarvanāmnā	sa ca yogya tvAt atat yaTA iha karma citaH a ityAdiH aataHa iti sarva nAmnA
   parāmṛśya hetupañcamyā nirdiśyate /	parAmRSya hetu paQcamyA nirdiSyate /
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   yathā svargādeḥ kṛtakasya sukhasya duḥkhānuṣaṅgaḥ tathā brahmaṇo 'pītyata	yaTA svarga AdeH kRtakasya suKasya duHKa anuzaFgaH taTA brahmaNaH api iti ata
   āha  tathā brahmavijñānādapi iti /	Aha taTA brahma vijQAnAt api iti /
   tenāyamarthaḥ  ataḥ svargādīnāṃ kṣayitāpratipādakāt brahmajñānasya ca	tena ayam arTaH atas svarga AdInAm kzayitA pratipAdakAt brahma jQAnasya ca
   paramapuruṣārthatāpratipādakāt āgamāt yathoktasādhanasaṃpat ; tataśca	parama puruza arTatA pratipAdakAt AgamAt yaTA ukta sADana saMpad ; tatas ca
   jijñāseti siddham /	jijQAsA iti sidDam /
   brahmajijñāsāpadavyākhyānamāha  brahmaṇa iti /	brahma jijQAsA pada vyAKyAnam Aha brahmaNaH iti /
   ṣaṣṭhīsamāsapradarśanena prācāṃ vṛttikṛtāṃ brahmaṇe jijñāsā	zazWI samAsa pradarSanena prAcAm vRtti kRtAm brahmaNe jijQAsA
   brahmajijñāseti caturthīsamāsaḥ parāsto veditavyaḥ /	brahma jijQAsA iti caturTI samAsaH parAstaH veditavyaH /
   'tādarthyasamāse prakṛtivikṛtigrahaṇaṃ kartavyam' iti kātyāyanīyavacanena	atAdarTya samAse prakRti vikRti grahaNam kartavyam a iti kAtyAyanIya vacanena

   bhaviṣyanti' ityaśvaghāsādiṣu ṣaṣṭhīsamāsapratividhānāt /	Bavizyanti a iti aSva GAsa Adizu zazWI samAsa prativiDAnAt /
   ṣaṣṭhīsamāse 'pi ca brahmaṇo vāstavaprādhānyopapatteriti /	zazWI samAse api ca brahmaNaH vAstava prADAnya upapatteH iti /
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   brahmaṇo jijñāsetyukte tatrānekārthatvādbrahmaśabdasya saṃśayaḥ  kasya	brahmaNaH jijQAsA iti ukte tatra aneka arTa tvAt brahma Sabdasya saMSayaH kasya
   brahmaṇo jijñāsā ?  iti /	brahmaNaH jijQAsA ? iti /

   bhavati' iti /	Bavati a iti /
   tamimaṃ saṃśayamapākaroti  brahma ca vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇam iti /	tam imam saMSayam apAkaroti brahma ca vakzyamANa lakzaNam iti /
   yato brahmajijñāsāṃ pratijñāya tajjñāpanāya paramātmalakṣaṇaṃ praṇayati	yatas brahma jijQAsAm pratijQAya tat jQApanAya paramAtma lakzaNam praNayati
