   ityarthaḥ /	iti arTaH /
   ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaparigrahe 'pi neyaṃ karmaṣaṣṭhī, kiṃ tu śeṣalakṣaṇā ;	zazWI samAsa parigrahe api na iyam karma zazWI, kim tu Seza lakzaNAH ;
   saṃbandhamātraṃ ca śeṣa iti brahmaṇo jijñāsetyukte brahmasaṃbandhinī	saMbanDa mAtram ca SezaH iti brahmaNaH jijQAsA iti ukte brahma saMbanDinI
   jijñāsetyuktaṃ bhavati /	jijQAsA iti uktam Bavati /
   tathā ca brahmasvarūpapramāṇayuktisādhanaprayojanajijñāsāḥ sarvā	taTA ca brahma svarUpa pramANa yukti sADana prayojana jijQAsAH sarvA
   brahmajijñāsārthā brahmajijñāsayāvaruddhā bhavanti, sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā	brahma jijQAsA arTAH brahma jijQAsayA avarudDA Bavanti, sAkzAt pAramparyeNa vA
   brahmasaṃbandhāt /	brahma saMbanDAt /
   karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhyāṃ tu brahmaśabdārthaḥ karma ; sa ca svarūpameveti	karmaNi zazWyAm tu brahma Sabda arTaH karma ; sa ca svarUpam eva iti
   tatpramāṇādayo nāvarudhyeran ; tathā cāpratijñātārthacintā pramāṇādiṣu	tad pramANa AdayaH na avaruDyeran ; taTA ca apratijQAta arTa cintA pramANa Adizu
   bhavet  iti ye manyante tānpratyāhabrahmaṇa iti karmaṇi iti /	Bavet iti ye manyante tAn pratyAha brahmaNaH iti karmaNi iti /
   atra hetumāha  jijñāsya iti /	atra hetum Aha jijQAsyaH iti /
   icchāyāḥ pratipattyanubandho jñānam, jñānasya ca jñeyaṃ brahma /	icCAyAH pratipatti anubanDaH jQAnam, jQAnasya ca jQeyam brahma /
   no khalu jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ vinā nirūpyate, na ca jijñāsā jñānaṃ vinā, iti	no Kalu jQAnam jQeyam vinA nirUpyate, na ca jijQAsA jQAnam vinA, iti
   pratipattyanubandhatvāt prathamaṃ jijñāsā karmaivāpekṣate, na tu	pratipatti anubanDa tvAt praTamam jijQAsA karma eva apekzate, na tu
   saṃbandhimātram, tadantareṇāpi sati karmaṇi tannirūpaṇāt /	saMbanDi mAtram, tad antareNa api sati karmaNi tad nirUpaNAt /
   na hi candramasamādityaṃ vopalabhya kasyāyamiti saṃbandhyanveṣaṇā bhavati	na hi candramasam Adityam vA upalaBya kasya ayam iti saMbanDi anvezaNA Bavati
   bhavati tu jñānamityukte viṣayānveṣaṇā kiṃviṣayamiti /	Bavati tu jQAnam iti ukte vizaya anvezaNA kiMvizayam iti /
   tasmātprathamamapekṣitatvāt karmatayaiva brahma saṃbadhyate, na tu	tasmAt praTamam apekzita tvAt karma tayA eva brahma saMbaDyate, na tu
   saṃbandhitāmātreṇa, tasya jaghanyatvāt /	saMbanDitA mAtreNa, tasya jaGanya tvAt /
   tathā ca karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī, ityarthaḥ /	taTA ca karmaNi zazWI, iti arTaH /
   nanu satyaṃ na jijñāsyamantareṇa jijñāsā nirūpyate ; jijñāsyāntaraṃ tvasyā	nanu satyam na jijQAsyam antareNa jijQAsA nirUpyate ; jijQAsya antaram tu asyAH 
   bhaviṣyati ; brahma tu śeṣatayā saṃbhantsyata ityata āha  jijñāsyāntara	Bavizyati ; brahma tu Seza tayA saMBantsyate iti atas Aha jijQAsya antara
   iti /	iti /
   nigūḍhābhiprāyaścodayati  nanu śeṣaṣaṣṭhīparigrahe 'pi iti /	nigUXa aBiprAyaH codayati nanu Seza zazWI parigrahe api iti /
   sāmānyasaṃbandhasya viśeṣasaṃbandhāvirodhena karmatāyā avighātena	sAmAnya saMbanDasya viSeza saMbanDa aviroDena karmatAyAH aviGAtena
   jijñāsānirūpaṇopapatterityarthaḥ /	jijQAsA nirUpaNa upapatteH iti arTaH /
   nigūḍhābhiprāya eva dūṣayati  evamapi pratyakṣaṃ brahmaṇa iti /	nigUXa aBiprAyaH eva dUzayati evam api pratyakzam brahmaNaH iti /
   vācyasya karmatvasya jijñāsayā prathamamapekṣitasya	vAcyasya karma tvasya jijQAsayA praTamam apekzitasya

   saṃbandhimātrasya saṃbandho, jaghanyaḥ prathamaḥ prathamaśca jaghanyaḥ,	saMbanDi mAtrasya saMbanDo, jaGanyaH praTamaH praTamaH ca jaGanyaH,
   iti suvyāhṛtaṃ nyāyatattvam /	iti su vyAhRtam nyAya tattvam /
   pratyakṣaparokṣatābhidhānaṃ ca	pratyakza parokzata aBiDAnam ca
   prāthamyāprāthamyasphuṭatvāsphuṭatvābhiprāyam /	prATamyA prATamya sPuwa tva asPuwa tva aBiprAyam /
   cedakaḥ svābhiprāyamudghāṭayati  na vyarthaḥ brahmāśritāśeṣa iti /	cedakaH sva aBiprAyam udGAwayati na vyarTaH brahma ASrita aSezaH iti /
   vyākhyātametadadhastāt /	vyAKyAtam etat aDastAt /
   samādhātā svābhisaṃdhimudghāṭayati  na, pradhānaparigraha iti /	samADAtA sva aBisaMDim udGAwayati na, praDAna parigrahaH iti /
   vāstavaṃ prādhānyaṃ brahmaṇaḥ /	vAstavam prADAnyam brahmaNaH /
   śeṣaṃ sanidarśanamatirohitārtham /	Sezam sa nidarSanam ati rohita arTam /
   śrutyanugamaścātirohitaḥ /	Sruti anugamaH ca ati rohitaH /
   tadevamabhimataṃ samāsaṃ vyavasthāpya jijñāsāpadārthamāha  jñātum iti /	tat evam aBimatam samAsam vyavasTApya jijQAsA padArTam Aha jQAtum iti /
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   na jñānamicchāviṣayaḥ /	na jQAnam icCA vizayaH /
   sukhaduḥkhāvāptiparihārau vā tadupāyo vā taddvāreṇecchāgocaraḥ /	suKa duHKa avApti parihArO vA tad upAyaH vA tad dvAreNa icCA gocaraH /
   na caivaṃ brahmajñānam /	na ca evam brahma jQAnam /
   na khalvetadanukūlamiti vā pratikūlanivṛttiriti vānubhūyate /	na Kalu etat anukUlam iti vA pratikUla nivRttiH iti vA anuBUyate /
   nāpi tayorupāyaḥ ; tasminsatyapi sukhabhedasyādarśanāt, anuvartamānasya ca	na api tayoH upAyaH ; tasmin sati api suKa Bedasya adarSanAt, anuvartamAnasya ca
   duḥkhasyānivṛtteḥ /	duHKasya anivRtteH /
   tasmānna sūtrakāravacanamātrādiṣikarmatā jñānasyetyata āha 	tasmAt na sUtrakAra vacana mAtra Adizi karma tA jQAnasya iti atas Aha 
   avagatiparyantam iti /	avagati paryantam iti /
   na kevalaṃ jñānamiṣyate kiṃ tvavagatiṃ sākṣātkāraṃ kurvadavagatiparyantaṃ	na kevalam jQAnam izyate kim tu avagatim sAkzAtkAram kurvat avagati paryantam
   sanvācyāyā icchāyāḥ karma /	sanvAcyAyAH icCAyAH karma /
   kasmāt ? phalaviṣayatvādicchāyāḥ tadupāyaṃ phalaparyantaṃ gocarayatīccheti	kasmAt ? Pala vizaya tvAt icCAyAH tat upAyam Pala paryantam gocarayati icCA iti
   śeṣaḥ /	SezaH /
   nanu bhavatvavagatiparyantaṃ jñānam ; kimetāvatāpīṣṭaṃ bhavati ? na	nanu Bavatu avagati paryantam jQAnam ; kim etAvat A api izwam Bavati ? na

   hi pramāṇenāvagantumiṣṭaṃ brahma /	hi pramANena avagantum izwam brahma /
   bhavatu brahmaviṣayāvagatiḥ, evamapi kathamiṣṭetyata āha  brahmāvagatirhi	Bavatu brahma vizaya avagatiH, evam api kaTam izwa iti atas Aha brahma avagatiH hi
   puruṣārthaḥ /	puruza arTaH /
   kimabhyudayaḥ ? na, kiṃ tu niḥśreyasaṃ	kim aByudayaH ? na, kim tu niHSreyasam
   vigalitanikhiladuḥkhānuṣaṅgaparamānandaghanabrahmāvagatirbrahmaṇaḥ	vigalita niKila duHKa anuzaFga parama Ananda Gana brahma avagatiH brahmaNaH
   svabhāva iti saiva niḥśreyasaṃ puruṣārtha iti /	svaBAvaH iti sA eva niHSreyasam puruza arTaH iti /
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   na brahmāvagatiḥ puruṣārthaḥ /	na brahma avagatiH puruza arTaH /
   puruṣavyāpāravyāpyo hi puruṣārthaḥ /	puruza vyApAra vyApyaH hi puruza arTaH /
   na cāsyā brahmasvabhāvabhūtāyā utpattivikārasaṃskāraprāptayaḥ saṃbhavanti,	na ca asyAH brahma svaBAva BUtAyAH utpatti vikAra saMskAra prAptayaH saMBavanti,
   tathā satyanityatvena tatsvābhāvyānupapatteḥ /	taTA satya nitya tvena tat svABAvya anupapatteH /
   na cotpattyādyabhāve vyāpāravyāpyatā /	na ca utpatti Adi aBAve vyApAra vyApyatA /
   tasmānna brahmāvagatiḥ puruṣārtha ityata	tasmAt na brahma avagatiH puruza arTaH iti ata

   tathāpyanirvacanīyānādyavidyāvaśādbrahmasvabhāvo 'parādhīnaprakāśo 'pi	taTA api anirvacanIyAnAdi a vidyA vaSAt brahma svaBAvaH apara aDIna prakASaH api
   pratibhānapi na pratibhātīva parādhīnaprakāśa iva dehendriyādibhyo bhinno	pratiBAn api na pratiBAti iva para aDIna prakASaH iva deha indriya AdiByaH Binno
   'pyabhinna iva bhāsata iti saṃsārabījāvidyādyanarthanibarhaṇātprāgaprāpta	api aBinnaH iva BAsate iti saMsAra bIja avidyA Adi anarTa nibarhaNAt prAc aprApta
   iva tasminsati prāpta iva bhavatīti puruṣeṇārthyamānatvātpuruṣārtha iti	iva tasmin sati prAptaH iva Bavati iti puruzeNa arTyamAna tvAt puruza arTaH iti
   yuktam /	yuktam /

   draṣṭavyam /	drazwavyam /

   pravartitatvāt, dharmagrahaṇasya ca	pravartita tva at, Darma grahaNasya ca

   śakyate, tathāpi prācyā mīmāṃsayā na tadvyutpādyate, nāpi brahmamīmāṃsāyā	Sakyate, taTA api prAcyA mImAMsayA na tat vyutpAdyate, na api brahmamImAMsAyAH 
   adhyayanamātrānantaryamiti brahmamīmāṃsārambhāya	aDyayana mAtra Anantaryam iti brahma mImAMsa AramBAya

   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   etena sūtreṇa brahmajñānaṃ pratyupāyatā mīmāṃsāyāḥ pratipādyata ityuktam ;	etena sUtreNa brahma jQAnam pratyupAya tA mImAMsAyAH pratipAdyate iti uktam ;
   tadayuktam, vikalpāsahatvāt, iti codayati  tatpunarbrahma iti /	tat ayuktam, vikalpa asaha tva at, iti codayati tat punar brahma iti /
   vedāntebhyo 'pauruṣeyatayā svataḥsiddhaprāmāṇyebhyaḥ prasiddhamaprasiddhaṃ	vedAnteByaH apOruzeya tayA svatas sidDa prAmANyeByaH prasidDam aprasidDam
   vā syāt /	vA syAt /
   yadi prasiddham, vedāntavākyasamutthena niścayajñānena viṣayīkṛtam ; tato	yadi prasidDam, vedAnta vAkya samutTena niScaya jQAnena vizayIkRtam ; tatas 
   na jijñāsitavyam, niṣpāditakriye karmaṇi aviśeṣādhāyinaḥ sādhanasya	na jijQAsitavyam, nizpAdita kriye karmaNi aviSeza ADAyinaH sADanasya
   sādhananyāyātipātāt /	sADana nyAya atipAtAt /

   sarvathāprasiddhaṃ naiva śakyaṃ jijñāsitum /	sarvaTA prasidDam na eva Sakyam jijQAsitum /
   anubhūte hi priye bhavatīcchā na tu sarvathānanubhūtāpūrve /	anuBUte hi priye Bavati icCA na tu sarvaTA ananuBUta apUrve /

   sa cettannāvabodhayati, kutastasya tatra prāmāṇyam ? na ca pramāṇānantaraṃ	sa ced tat na avaboDayati, kutas tasya tatra prAmANyam ? na ca pramANa anantaram
   brahmaṇi prakramate /	brahmaNi prakramate /

   pariharati  ucyate  asti tāvadbrahma nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvam /	pariharati ucyate asti tAvat brahma nitya SudDa budDa mukta svaBAvam /

   somyedamagra āsīt' ityupakramāt 'tattvamasi' ityantātsaṃdarbhāt	somya idam agre AsIt a iti upakramAt atat tvam asi a iti antAt saMdarBAt

   atra ca brahmetyādināvagamyena tadviṣayamavagamaṃ lakṣayati, tadastitvasya	atra ca brahma ityAdinA a= agamyena tad vizayam avagamam lakzayati, tat astitvasya
   sati vimarśe vicārātprāganirṇayāt /	sati vimarSe vicArAt prAc anirNayAt /

   syādetat /	syAt etat /

   taddharmajanmajarāmaraṇādiduḥkhayogādityata uktam  mukta iti /	tad Darma janma jarA maraNa Adi duHKa yogAt iti atas uktam muktaH iti /

   ityarthaḥ /	iti arTaH /

   ātmatvāt /	Atma tvAt /
   etadeva sphuṭayati  sarvo hi iti /	etat eva sPuwayati sarvaH hi iti /
   pratītimeva apratītinirākaraṇena draḍhayati  na na iti /	pratItim eva apratIti nirAkaraNena draXayati na naH iti /

   gamayitavyam /	gamayitavyam /
   pariharati  naḥ ; kutaḥ ? tadviśeṣaṃ prati vipratipatteḥ /	pariharati naH ; kutas ? tad viSezam prati vipratipatteH /

   viruddhā hi pratipattayo vipratipattayaḥ ; na cānāśrayāḥ pratipattayo	virudDAH hi pratipattayaH vipratipattayaH ; na ca anASrayAH pratipattayaH 
   bhavanti, anālambanatvāpatteḥ ; na ca bhinnāśrayā viruddhāḥ /	Bavanti, anAlambanatva ApatteH ; na ca Binna ASrayAH virudDAH /
   na hi 'anityā buddhiḥ' 'nitya ātmā' iti pratipattivipratipattī /	na hi aanityA budDiHa anityaH AtmA a iti pratipatti vipratipattI /
   tasmāttatpadārthasya śuddhatvādervedāntebhyaḥ pratītiḥ, tvaṃpadārthasya ca	tasmAt tad padArTasya SudDa tva AdeH vedAnteByaH pratItiH, tvaMpadArTasya ca
   jīvātmano lokataḥ siddhiḥ sarvatantrasiddhāntaḥ /	jIvAtmanaH lokataH sidDiH sarva tantra sidDAntaH /
   tadābhāsatvānābhāsatvatattadviśeṣeṣu paramatra vipratipattayaḥ /	tad ABAsa tvAnABAsa tva tad tad viSezezu param atra vipratipattayaH /

   yuktastadviśeṣeṣu saṃśayaḥ /	yuktaH tad viSezezu saMSayaH /
   tatra tvaṃpadārthe tāvadvipratipattīrdarśayati  dehamātram ityādinā	tatra tvaMpadArTe tAvat vipratipattIH darSayati deha mAtram ityAdinA
   bhoktaiva kevalaṃ na karttā ityantena /	BoktA eva kevalam na karttA iti antena /
   atra dehendriyamanaḥkṣaṇikavijñānacaitanyapakṣe na	atra deha indriya manaH kzaNika vijQAna cEtanya pakze na
   tatpadārthanityatvādayaḥ tvaṃpadārthena saṃbadhyante, yogyatāvirahāt /	tad padArTa nitya tva AdayaH tvaMpadArTena saMbaDyante, yogya tA virahAt /
   śūnyapakṣe 'pi sarvopākhyārahitamapadārthaḥ kathaṃ tattvamorgocaraḥ ?	SUnya pakze api sarva upAKyA rahitam apadArTaH kaTam tattva moH gocaraH ?
   kartṛbhoktṛsvabhāvasyāpi pariṇāmitayā tatpadārthanityatvādyasaṃgatireva /	kartR BoktR svaBAvasya api pariNAmitayA tad padArTa nitya tva Adi asaMgatiH eva /
   akartṛtve 'pi bhoktṛtvapakṣe pariṇāmitayā nityatvādyasaṃgatiḥ /	akartR tve api BoktR tva pakze pariNAmitayA nitya tva Adi asaMgatiH /
   abhoktṛtve 'pi nānātmatvapakṣe	aBoktR tve api nAnA Atma tva pakze
   nānātvenāvacchinnatvādanityatvādiprasaktāvadvaitahānācca	nAnA tvena avacCinna tvAt anitya tva Adi prasaktA vat vEta hAnAt ca
   tatpadārthāsaṃgatistadavasthaiva /	tad padArTa asaMgatiH tad avasTA eva /
   tvaṃpadārthavipratipattyā ca tatpadārthe 'pi vipratipattirdarśitā 	tvaMpadArTa vipratipattyA ca tad padArTe api vipratipattiH darSitA

   na ca bhāvābhāvayoravirodhaḥ, sahāvasthānāsaṃbhavāt /	na ca BAva aBAvayoH aviroDaH, saha avasTAna asaMBavAt /

   bhedasyābhedāvirodhāt /	Bedasya aBeda aviroDAt /
   api ca kaṭakasya hāṭakādabhede yathā hāṭakātmanā kaṭakamukuṭakuṇḍalādayo	api ca kawakasya hAwakAt aBede yaTA hAwaka AtmanA kawaka mukuwa kuNxala AdayaH 
   na bhidyante evaṃ kaṭakātmanāpi na bhidyeran, kaṭakasya hāṭakādabhedāt /	na Bidyante evam kawaka AtmanA api na Bidyeran, kawakasya hAwakAt aBedAt /
   tathā ca hāṭakameva vastusat na kaṭakādayaḥ, bhedasyāpratibhāsanāt /	taTA ca hAwakam eva vastu sat na kawaka AdayaH, Bedasya apratiBAsanAt /
   atha hāṭakatvenaivābhedo na kaṭakatvena ; tena tu bheda eva kuṇḍalādeḥ /	aTa hAwaka tvena eva aBedaH na kawaka tvena ; tena tu BedaH eva kuNxala AdeH /

   vibhāgo na syāt, kasyacit kvacit kadācit kathañcidvivekahetorabhāvāt /	viBAgaH na syAt, kasyacid kvacid kadAcid kaTaQcid viveka hetoH aBAvAt /

   nanu na bhavatyartho vidheyaḥ ; siddhe bhavitari labdharūpasya bhavanaṃ	nanu na Bavati arTaH viDeyaH ; sidDe Bavitari labDa rUpasya Bavanam
   pratyakartṛtvāt ; na khalu gaganaṃ bhavati ; nāpyasiddhe,	pratyakartR tvAt ; na Kalu gaganam Bavati ; na api asidDe,

   viṣayaḥ /	vizayaH /

   gocarayet ? na hi 'ghaṭaṃ kuru' ityatrāpi sākṣānnāmārthaṃ ghaṭaṃ	gocarayet ? na hi aGawam kuru a iti atra api sAkzAt nAma arTam Gawam

   evaṃ 'kāryānvayaṃ vinā siddharūpe brahmaṇi mānatā /	evam akArya anvayam vinA sidDa rUpe brahmaNi mAnatA /
   puruṣārthe svayaṃ tāvadvedāntānāṃ prasādhitā //	puruza arTe svayam tAvat vedAntAnAm prasADitAH //
   ' brahmajijñāsāṃ pratijñāya 'janmādyasya yataḥ' ityādinā 'tattu	a brahma jijQAsAm pratijQAya ajanma Adyasya yataH a ityAdinA atat tu
   samanvayāt' ityantena sūtrasaṃdarbheṇa sarvaśaktau	samanvayAt a iti antena sUtra saMdarBeNa sarva SaktO
   jagadutpattisthitivināśakāraṇe prāmāṇyaṃ vedāntānāmupapāditam /	jagat utpatti sTiti vinASa kAraNe prAmANyam vedAntAnAm upapAditam /
   tacca brahmaṇīti paramārthataḥ /	tat ca brahmaNi iti paramArTataH /
   tvadyāpi brahmaṇyeveti vyutpāditam /	tu adya api brahmaNi eva iti vyutpAditam /
   tadtra saṃdihyate  tajjagadupādānakāraṇaṃ kiṃ cetanamutācetanamiti /	tat tra saMdihyate tat jagat upAdAna kAraNam kim cetana muta acetanam iti /
   atra ca vipratipatteḥ pravādīnāṃ viśeṣānupalambhe sati saṃśayaḥ /	atra ca vipratipatteH pravAdInAm viSeza anupalamBe sati saMSayaH /
   tatra ca pradhānamacetanaṃ	tatra ca praDAnam acetanam
   jagadupādānakāraṇamanumānasiddhamanuvadantyupaniṣada iti sāṃkhyāḥ /	jagat upAdAna kAraNam anumAna sidDam anuvadanti upanizadaH iti sAMKyAH /
   jīvāṇuvyatiriktacetaneśvaranimittādhiṣṭhitāścaturvidhāḥ paramāṇavo	jIva aNu vyatirikta cetaneSvara nimitta aDizWitAH caturviDAH paramANavaH 
   jagadupādānakāraṇamanumitamanuvadantīti kāṇādāḥ /	jagat upAdAna kAraNam anumitam anuvadanti iti kANAdAH /
   ādigrahaṇenābhāvopādānatvādi grahītavyam /	Adi grahaNena aBAva upAdAna tva Adi grahItavyam /
   anirvacanīyānādyavidyāśaktimañcetanopādānaṃ jagadāgamikamiti brahmavidaḥ /	anirvacanIyAnAdi a vidyA Saktim aQcetana upAdAnam jagadAgamikam iti brahma vidaH /
   etāsāṃ ca vipratipattīnāmanumānavākyānumānavākyatadābhāsā bījam /	etAsAm ca vipratipattInAm anumAna vAkya anumAna vAkya tad ABAsA bIjam /
   tadevaṃ vipratipatteḥ saṃśaye kiṃ tāvatprāptam /	tat evam vipratipatteH saMSaye kim tAvat prAptam /
   tatra jñānakriyāśaktyabhāvadbrahmaṇo 'pariṇāminaḥ /	tatra jQAna kriyA Sakti aBAvat brahmaNaH apariNAminaH /
   na sarvaśaktivijñāne pradhāne tvasti saṃbhavaḥ //	na sarva Sakti vijQAne praDAne tu asti saMBavaH //
   jñānakriyāśaktī khalu jñānakriyākāryadarśanonneyasadbhāve /	jQAna kriyA SaktI Kalu jQAna kriyA kArya darSana unneya sadBAve /
   na ca jñānakriye cidātmani staḥ, tasyāpariṇāmitvādekatvācca /	na ca jQAna kriye cit Atmani staH, tasya apariNAmi tvAt eka tvAt ca /
   triguṇe tu pradhāne pariṇāmini saṃbhavataḥ /	triguNe tu praDAne pariNAmini saMBavataH /
   yadyapi ca sāmyāvasthāyāṃ pradhāne samudācaradvṛttinī kriyājñāne na staḥ,	yadi api ca sAmya avasTAyAm praDAne samudAcarat vRttinI kriyA jQAne na staH,
   tathāpyavyaktena śaktyātmanā rūpeṇa saṃbhavata eva /	taTA api avyaktena Sakti AtmanA rUpeNa saMBavataH eva /
   tathā ca pradhānameva sarvajñaṃ ca sarvaśakti ca /	taTA ca praDAnam eva sarvajQam ca sarva Sakti ca /
   na tu brahma /	na tu brahma /
   svarūpacaitanyaṃ tvasyāvṛttitamanupayogi jīvātmanāmivāsmākam /	sva rUpa cEtanyam tu asya AvRttitam anupayogi jIvAtmanAm iva asmAkam /
   na ca svarūpacaitanye kartṛtvam, akāryatvāttasya /	na ca svarUpa cEtanye kartR tvam, akArya tvAt tasya /
   kāryatve vā na sarvadā sarvajñatā /	kAryatve vA na sarvadA sarvajQa tA /
   bhogāpargalakṣaṇapuruṣārthadvayaprayuktānādipradhānapuruṣasaṃyoganimittastu	Boga aparga lakzaNa puruza arTa dvaya prayuktAn Adi praDAna puruza saMyoga nimittaH tu
   mahadahaṅkārādikrameṇācetanasyāpi cetanānadhiṣṭhitasya pradhānasya	mahat ahaFkAra Adi krameNa acetanasya api cetana anaDizWitasya praDAnasya
   pariṇāmaḥ sargaḥ /	pariNAmaH sargaH /
   dṛṣṭaṃ cācetanaṃ cetanānadhiṣṭhitaṃ puruṣārthe pravartamānam /	dRzwam ca acetanam cetanA anaDizWitam puruza arTe pravartamAnam /
   yathā vatsavivṛddhyarthamacetanaṃ kṣīraṃ pravartate /	yaTA vatsa vivRdDi arTam acetanam kzIram pravartate /
   'tadaikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeya' ityādyāśca śrutayo 'cetane 'pi	atadEkzata bahu syAm prajAyeya a ityAdyAH ca SrutayaH acetane api
   cetanavadupacārātsvakāryonmukhamādarśayanti, yathā kūlaṃ pipatiṣatīti /	cetana vat upacArAt sva kArya unmuKam AdarSayanti, yaTA kUlam pipatizati iti /
   'yatprāye śrūyate yacca tattādṛgavagamyate /	ayat prAye SrUyate yat ca tat tAdRS avagamyate /
   bhāktaprāye śrutamidamato bhīktaṃ pratīyate //	BAkta prAye Srutam idam atas BIktam pratIyate //
   ' api cāhurvṛddhāḥ  yathāgryaprāye likhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā vadanti	a api ca AhuH vRdDAH yaTA agrya prAye liKitam dRzwvA vadanti
   bhavedayamagryaḥ iti, tathedapi 'tā āpa aikṣanta' tatteja aikṣata	Bavet ayam agryaH iti, taTA idapi atAH ApaH Ekzanta a tat tejaH Ekzata
   ityādyupacāraprāye kṣutam tadaikṣata ityaupacārikameva vijñeyam /	ityAdi upacAra prAye kzutam tad A EkzataH iti OpacArikam eva vijQeyam /
   anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi iti ca pradhānasya	anena jIvena AtmanA anupraviSya nAma rUpe vyAkaravANi iti ca praDAnasya
   jīvātmatvaṃ jīvārthakāritayāha /	jIva Atma tvam jIva arTa kAritayA Aha /
   yathā hi bhadraseno rājārthakārī rājñā bhadraseno mamātmetyupacaryate,	yaTA hi BadrasenaH rAja arTa kArI rAjQA BadrasenaH mama AtmA iti upacaryate,
   evaṃ tattvamasi ityādyāḥ śrutayo bhāktāḥ saṃpattyarthā vā draṣṭavyāḥ /	evam tat tvam asi ityAdyAH SrutayaH BAktAH saMpatti arTAH vA drazwavyAH /
   svamapīto bhavati iti ca niruktaṃ jīvasya pradhāne svakīye 'pyayaṃ	svam apItaH Bavati iti ca niruktam jIvasya praDAne svakIye api ayam
   suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ brūte /	suzupta avasTAyAm brUte /
   pradhānāṃśatamaḥsamudrake hi jīvonidrāṇastamasīva magno bhavati /	praDAna aMSa tamaH samudrake hi jIvaH nidrANaH tamasi iva magnaH Bavati /
   yathāhuḥ  abhāvapratyayālambanā vṛttirnidrā iti /	yaTA AhuH aBAva pratyaya AlambanA vRttiH nidrA iti /
   vṛttīnāmanyāsāṃ pramāṇādīnāmabhāvastasya pratyayakāraṇaṃ tamastadālambamā	vRttInAm anyAsAm pramANa AdInAm aBAvaH tasya pratyaya kAraNam tamaH tad AlambamA
   nidrā jīvasya vṛttirityarthaḥ /	nidrA jIvasya vRttiH iti arTaH /
   tathā sarvajñaṃ prastutya śvetāśvataramantrro 'pi   sakārāṇāṃ	taTA sarvajQam prastutya Sveta aSvatara mantrraH api  sakArANAm
   karaṇādhipādhipa  iti prādhānābhiprāyaḥ /	karaNa aDipa aDipa iti prADAna aBiprAyaH /
   pradhānasyaiva sarvajñatvaṃ pratipāditamadastāt /	praDAnasya eva sarvajQa tvam pratipAdita madastAt /
   tasmādacetanaṃ pradhānaṃ jagadupādānamanuvadanti śrutaya iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ	tasmAt acetanam praDAnam jagat upAdAnam anuvadanti SrutayaH iti pUrvaH pakzaH
   evaṃ kāṇādādimate 'pi kathañcidyojananīyāḥ śrutayaḥ /	evam kANAt Adi mate api kaTaQcid yojananIyAH SrutayaH /
   akṣarārthastu # pradhānakāraṇapakṣe 'pīti pradhānasyāpīti.# /	akzara arTaH tu # praDAna kAraNa pakze api iti praDAnasya api iti.# /
   apikārāvevakārārthau /	apikArO= eva kAra arTO /
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   sattvasaṃpattyā cedasya sarvajñatātha tamaḥsaṃpattyāsarvajñataivāsya	sattva saMpattyA ced asya sarvajQa tA aTa tamaH saMpatti A sarvajQa tA eva asya
   kasmānna bhavatītyāha  # tena ca sattvadharmeṇa jñāneneti.# /	kasmAt na Bavati iti Aha # tena ca sattva DarmeNa jQAnena iti.# /
   sattvaṃ hi prakāśaśīlaṃ niratiśayotkarṣaṃ sarvajñatābījam /	sattvam hi prakASa SIlam niratiSaya utkarzam sarvajQa tA bIjam /
   tathāhuḥ niratiśayaṃ sarvajñatābījaṃ iti /	taTA AhuH niratiSayam sarvajQa tA bIjam iti /
   yatkhalu sātiśayaṃ tatkvacinniratiśayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ, yathā kuvalāmalakabilveṣu,	yat Kalu sa atiSayam tat kvacid niratiSayam dRzwan, yaTA kuvala Amalaka bilva izu,
   sātiśayaṃ mahattvaṃ vyomni paramamahati niratiśayam /	sa atiSayam mahat tvam vyomni parama mahati niratiSayam /
   evaṃ jñānamapyekadvibahuviṣayatayā sātiśayamityanenāpi kvacinniratiśayena	evam jQAnam api ekat vi bahu vizaya tayA sa atiSayam iti anena api kvacid niratiSayena
   bhavitavyam /	Bavitavyam /
   idameva cāsya niratiśayatvaṃ yadviditasamastaveditavyam /	idam eva ca asya niratiSaya tvam yat vidita samasta veditavyam /
   tadidaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ sattvasya niratiśayotkarṣatve saṃbhavati /	tat idam sarvajQa tvam sattvasya niratiSaya utkarza tve saMBavati /
   etaduktaṃ bhavati  yadyapi rajastamasī api staḥ tathāpi	etat uktam Bavati yadi api rajaH tamasI api staH taTA api
   puruṣārtaprayuktaguṇavaiṣamyātiśayātsattvasya niratiśayotkarṣe sārvajñyaṃ	puruza Arta prayukta guNa vEzamya atiSayAt sattvasya niratiSaya utkarze sArvajQyam
   kāryamutpadyata iti pradhānavasthāyāmapi tanmātraṃ vivakṣitvāvivakṣitvā ca	kAryam utpadyate iti praDAnavasTAyAm api tanmAtram vivakzitvO= ivakzitvA ca
   tamaḥkāryaṃ pradhānaṃ sarvajñamupacaryata iti /	tamaH kAryam praDAnam sarvajQam upacaryate iti /
   apibhyāmavadhāraṇasya vyavacchedyamāha  # na kevalasyeti.# /	apiByAm avaDAraNasya vyavacCedyamAha # na kevalasya iti.# /
   nahi kiñcidekaṃ kāryaṃ janayedapi tu bahūni /	nahi kiQcid ekam kAryam janayet api tu bahUni /
   cidātmā caikaḥ, pradhānaṃ tu triguṇamiti tata eva kāryamutpattimarhati, na	cit AtmA ca ekaH, praDAnam tu triguNam iti tatas eva kAryam utpattim arhati, na
   cidītmana ityarthaḥ /	cidItmanaH iti arTaH /
   tavāpi ca yogyatāmātreṇaiva cidātmanaḥ rvajñatābhyupagamo na	tava api ca yogyatA mAtreNa eva cit AtmanaH rvajQa tA aByupagamaH na
   kāryayogādityāha  # tvayāpīti.# /	kArya yoga Aditya aha # tvayA api iti.# /
   na kevalasyākāryakāraṇasyetyetatsihāvalokena prapañcayati  #	na kevalasya akArya kAraNasya iti etat siha avalokena prapaQcayati #
   prāgutpatteriti /	prAk utpatteH iti /
   api ca pradhānasyeti.# /	api ca praDAnasya iti.# /
   castvarthaḥ /	caH tu arTaH /
   evaṃ prāpta ucyate  # īkṣaternāśabdam.# /	evam prAptaH ucyate # IkzateH na aSabda m.# /
   nāmarūpaprapañcalakṣaṇakāryadarśanādetatkāraṇamātravaditi	nAma rUpa prapaQca lakzaNa kArya darSanAt etat kAraNa mAtra vat iti
   sāmānyakalpamāyāmiti pramāṇaṃ, na tu tadacetanaṃ cetanamiti vā	sAmAnya kalpa mAyAm iti pramANan, na tu tat acetanam cetanam iti vA
   viśeṣakalpanāyāmastyanumānamityupariṣṭātpravedayiṣyate /	viSeza kalpanAyAm asti anumAnam iti uparizwAt pravedayizyate /
   tasmānnāmarūpaprapañcakāraṇabhedapramāyāmāmnāya eva bhagavānupāsanīyaḥ /	tasmAt nAma rUpa prapaQca kAraNa Beda pramAyAm AmnAyaH eva BagavAn upAsanIyaH /
   tadevamāmnāyaikasamadhigamanīye jagatkāraṇaṃ	tat evam AmnAya eka samaDigamanIye jagat kAraNam
   'paurvāparyaparāmarśādyadāmnāyo 'ñjasā vadet /	apOrvA parya parAmarSAt yat AmnAyaH aQjasA vadet /
   jagadbījaṃ tadeveṣṭaṃ cetane ca sa āñjasaḥ //	jagat bIjam tat eva izwam cetane ca saH AQjasaH //
   teṣu teṣu khalvāmnāyapradeśeṣu tadaikṣata ityevañjātīyakairvākyairīkṣituḥ	tezu tezu Kalu AmnAya pradeSezu tat A EkzataH iti evan jAtIyakEH vAkyEH IkzituH
   kāraṇajjagajjanmākhyāyata iti /	kAraNat jagat janma AKyAyate iti /
   na ca pradhānaparamāṇvāderacetanasyekṣitṛtvamāñjasam /	na ca praDAna paramANu AdeH acetanasya IkzitRtvamAn jasam /
   sattvāṃśenekṣitṛ pradhānaṃ, tasya prakāśakatvāditi cenna /	sattva aMSena IkzitR praDAnaM, tasya prakASaka tvAt iti ced na /
   tasya jāḍyena tattvānupapatteḥ /	tasya jAxyena tattva anupapatteH /
   kastarhi rajatastamobhyāṃ sattvasya viśeṣaḥ /	kaH tarhi rajataH tamoByAm sattvasya viSezaH /
   svacchatāṣa /	svacCa tAza /
   svacchaṃ hi sattvam /	svacCam hi sattvam /
   asvacche ca rajastamasī /	asvacCe ca rajaH tamasI /
   svacchasya ca caitanyabimbodgrahitayā prakāśakatvavyapadeśe netarayoḥ,	svacCasya ca cEtanya bimba udgrahitayA prakASaka tva vyapadeSe na itarayoH,
   asvacchatayā tadgrāhikatvābāvāt /	asvacCatayA tad grAhika tva AbAvAt /
   pārthivatve tulya iva maṇerbimbodgrāhitā na loṣṭādīnām /	pArTiva tve tulyaH iva maNeH bimba udgrAhitA na lozwa AdInAm /
   brahmaṇastvīkṣitṛtvamāñjasaṃ, tasyāmnāyato nityajñānasvabhāvatvaviniścāt /	brahmaNaH tu IkzitR tvamAn jasan, tasyAmnA AyataH nitya jQAna svaBAva tva viniScAt /
   nanvata evāsya nekṣitṛtvaṃ, nityasya	nanu atas eva asya na IkzitR tvaM, nityasya
   jñānasvabhāvabhūtasyekṣaṇasyākriyātvena brahmaṇastatprati	jQAna svaBAva BUtasya IkzaNasya akriyA tvena brahmaNaH tad prati
   nimittabhāvābhāvāt /	nimitta BAva aBAvAt /
   akriyānimittasya ca kārakatvanivṛttau tadvyāptasya tadviśeṣasya	akriyA nimittasya ca kAraka tva nivRttO tad vyAptasya tad viSezasya
   kartṛtvasya nivṛtteḥ /	kartR tvasya nivRtteH /
   satyaṃ, brahmasvabhāvaścaitanyaṃ nityatayā na kriyā, tasya	satyan, brahma svaBAvaH cEtanyam nitya tayA na kriyA, tasya
   tvanavacchinnasya tattadviṣayopadhānamedāvacchedena	tu anavacCinnasya tad tad vizaya upaDAna medA avacCedena
   kalpitabhedasyānityatvaṃ kīryatvaṃ copapadyate /	kalpita Bedasya anitya tvam kIrya tvam ca upapadyate /
   tathā caivaṃlakṣaṇa īkṣaṇe sarvaviṣaye brahmaṇaḥ svātantryalakṣaṇaṃ	taTA ca evaMlakzaNaH IkzaNe sarva vizaye brahmaNaH svAtantrya lakzaNam
   kartṛtvamupapannam /	kartR tvam upapannam /
   yadyapi ca kūṭasthanityasyāpariṇāmina audāsīnyamasya vāstavaṃ	yadi api ca kUwasTa nityasya apariNAminaH OdAsIn yam asya vAstavam
   tathāpyanādyanirvacanīyavidyāvacchinnasya vyāpāravattvabhavabhāsata iti	taTA api anAdya nirvacanIya vidyA avacCinnasya vyApAravat tva Bava BAsate iti
   kartṛtvopapattiḥ /	kartR tva upapattiH /
   parairapi ca cicchekte  kūṭasthanityāyā vṛttīḥ prati	parEH api ca cicCekte kUwasTa nityAyAH vRttIH prati
   kartṛtvamīdṛśamevābhyupeyaṃ, caitanyasāmānyādhikaraṇyena jñātṛtvopalabdheḥ	kartR tvam IdRSam eva aByupeyaM, cEtanya sAmAnya aDikaraNyena jQAtR tva upalabDeH
   nahi prādhānikānyantarbahiḥkaraṇāni trayodaśa sattvaguṇapradhānānyapi	na hi prADAnikAni antar bahis karaNAni trayodaSa sattva guNa praDAnAni api
   svayamevācetanāni, tadvṛttayā svaṃ vā paraṃ vā veditumutsahante /	svayam eva acetanAni, tad vRttayA svam vA param vA veditum utsahante /
   no khalvandhāḥ sahasramapi pānthāḥ panthānaṃ vidanti /	no Kalu anDAH sahasram api pAnTAH panTAnam vidanti /
   cakṣuṣmatā caikena cedvedyate, sa eva tarhi mārgadarśī svatantraḥ kartā	cakzuzmatA ca ekena ced vedyate, saH eva tarhi mArgadarSI svatantraH kartA
   netā teṣām /	netA tezAm /
   evaṃ buddhisattvasya svayamacetanasya citibimbasaṃkrāntyā cedāpannaṃ	evam budDi sattvasya svayam acetanasya citi bimba saMkrAntyA ced Apannam
   caitanyasya jñātṛtvaṃ, citireva jñātrī svatantrā,	cEtanyasya jQAtR tvaM, citiH eva jQAtrI svatantrA,
   nāntarbahiṣkaraṇānyandhasahasrapratimānyasvasantrāṇi /	na antar bahizkaraNAni anDa sahasra pratimA anya sva santrANi /
   na cāsyaściteḥ asti vyāpārayogaḥ /	na ca asyaH citeH asti vyApAra yogaH /
   na ca tadayoge 'pyajñātṛtvaṃ, vyāpāravatāmapi jaḍānāmajñatvāt /	na ca tad ayoge api ajQAtR tvaM, vyApAravatAm api jaxAnAm ajQa tvAt /
   tasmādantaḥkaraṇavartinaṃ vyāpāramāropya citiśaktau kartṛtvābhimānaḥ /	tasmAt antaHkaraNa vartinam vyApAram Aropya citi SaktO kartR tva aBimAnaH /
   antaḥkaraṇe vā caitanyamāropya tasya jñātṛtvābhimānaḥ /	antaHkaraNe vA cEtanyam Aropya tasya jQAtR tva aBimAnaH /
   sarvathā bhavanmateṣaḍapi nedaṃ svābhāvikaṃ kvacidapi jñātṛtvaṃ, api tu	sarvaTA Bavat mata Izaz api na idam svABAvikam kvacid api jQAtR tvaM, api tu
   sāṃvyavahārārikameveti paramārthaḥ /	sAMvyavahArArikam eva iti parama arTaH /
   nityasyātmano jñānaṃ pariṇāma iti ca bhedābhedapakṣamapākurvadbhirapāstam	nityasya AtmanaH jQAnam pariNAmaH iti ca Beda aBeda pakzam apAkurvadBiH apAH tam
   kūṭasthasya nityasyātmano 'vyāpāravata eva bhinnaṃ jñānaṃ dharma iti	kUwasTasya nityasya AtmanaH avyApAravataH eva Binnam jQAnam DarmaH iti
   copariṣṭādapākariṣyate /	ca uparizwAt apAkarizyate /
   tasmādvastuto 'navacchinnaṃ caitanyaṃ	tasmAt vastutas anavacCinnam cEtanyam
   tattvānyatvābhyāmanirvacanīyāvyākṛtavyācikīrṣitanāmarūpaviṣayāvacchinnaṃ	tattva anya tva aByAm anirvacanIya avyAkRta vyAci kIrzita nAma rUpa vizaya avacCinnam

   siddham /	sidDam /
   tathā ca śrutiḥ  tapasā cīyate brahma tato 'nnamabhijāyate /	taTA ca SrutiH tapasA cIyate brahma tatas annam aBijAyate /
   annātprāṇo manaḥ satyaṃ lokāḥ karmasu cāmṛtam //	annAt prANaH manaH satyam lokAH karmasu ca amRtam //

   pūrvasmādetatparaṃ kāryaṃ brahma /	pUrvasmAt etat param kAryam brahma /

   satyam, paramārthayo 'bhede 'pyavidyāropitaṃ bhedamupāśritya	satyam, paramArTayaH aBede api avidyA Aropitam Bedam upASritya
   labdhṛlabdhavyabhāva upapadyate /	labDR labDa vyaBAvaH upapadyate /
   jīvo hyavidyayā parabrahmaṇo bhinno darśitaḥ, na tu jīvādapi /	jIvaH hi avidyayA para brahmaNaH BinnaH darSitaH, na tu jIvAt api /
   tathā cānandamayaścejjīvaḥ, na jīvasyāvidyayāpi svato bhedo darśita iti na	taTA ca Ananda mayaH ced jIvaH, na jIvasya avidyayA api svatas BedaH darSitaH iti na
   labdhṛlabdhavyabhāva ityarthaḥ /	labDR labDa vyaBAvaH iti arTaH /
   bhedābhedau ca na jīvaparabrahmaṇorityuktamadhastāt /	Beda aBedO ca na jIva para brahmaNoH iti uktam aDastAt /
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   yathā parameśvarādbhinno jīvātmā draṣṭā na bhavatyevaṃ jīvātmano 'pi	yaTA parameSvarAt BinnaH jIvAtmA drazwA na Bavati evam jIva AtmanaH api
   draṣṭurna bhinnaḥ parameśvara iti jīvasyānirvācyatve parameśvaro	drazwuH na BinnaH parameSvaraH iti jIvasya anirvAcya tve parameSvaraH 
   'pyanirvācyaḥ syāt /	api anirvAcyaH syAt /
   tathā ca vastusannityata āha  # parameśvarastvavidyākalpitāditi.# /	taTA ca vastu sannityataH Aha # parameSvaraH tu avidyA kalpitAt iti.# /
   rajataṃ hi rāmāropitaṃ na śuktito bhidyate /	rajatam hi rAma Aropitam na SuktitaH Bidyate /
   na hi tadbhedenābhedena vā śakyaṃ nirvaktum /	na hi tad Bedena aBedena vA Sakyam nirvaktum /
   śuktistu paramārthasatī nirvacanīyā anirvacanīyādrajatādbhidyata eva /	SuktiH tu parama arTa satI nirvacanIyAH anirvacanIyAt rajatAt Bidyate eva /
   atraiva sarūpamātraṃ dṛṣṭāntamāha  # yathā māyāvina iti.# /	atra eva sarUpa mAtram dRzwAntam Aha # yaTA mAyAvinaH iti.# /
   etadaparitoṣeṇātyantasarūpaṃ dṛṣṭāntamāha  # yathā vā ghaṭākāśāditi.# /	etat aparitozeNa atyanta sarUpam dRzwAntam Aha # yaTA vA GawAkASAt iti.# /
   śeṣamatirohitārtham //17 ḥ ḥ18 //	Sezam ati rohita arTam //17 H H18 //
   svamataparigrahārthamekadeśimataṃ dūṣayati  # idaṃ tviha vaktavyamiti.# /	sva mata parigraha arTam eka deSi matam dUzayati # idam tu iha vaktavyam iti.# /
   eṣa tāvadutsargo yat  brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭheti brahmaśabdātpratīyate /	eza tAvat utsargaH yat brahma pucCam pratizWA iti brahma SabdAt pratIyate /
   viśuddhaṃ brahma vikṛtaṃ tvānandamayaśabdataḥ //	viSudDam brahma vikRtam tu Ananda maya SabdataH //
   ' tatra kiṃ pucchapadasamabhivyāhārāt annamayādiṣu cāsyāvayavaparatvena	a tatra kim pucCa pada samaBivyAhArAt anna maya Adizu ca asya avayava paratvena
   prayogāt, ihāpyavayavaparatvātpucchapadasya tatsamānādhikaraṇaṃ	prayoga at, iha api avayava para tvAt pucCa padasya tad samAna aDikaraNam
   brahmapadamapi svārthatyāgena kathañcidavayavaparaṃ vyākhyāyātām /	brahma padam api sva arTa tyAgena kaTaQcid avayava param vyAKyAyAtAm /
   ānandamayapadaṃ cānnamayādivikāravāciprāyapaṭhitaṃ vikāravāci vā,	Ananda maya padam ca anna maya Adi vikAra vAci prAya paWitam vikAra vAci vA,
   kathañcitpracurānandavāci vā, brahmaṇyaprasiddhaṃ kayācidvṛtyā brahmaṇi	kaTaQcid pracura Ananda vAci vA, brahmaNi aprasidDam kayAcid vRtyA brahmaNi
   vyākhyāyātām /	vyAKyAyAtAm /
   ānandapadābhyāsena ca jyotiḥ padeneva jyotiṣṭoma anandamayo lakṣyatāṃ,	Ananda pada aByAsena ca jyotiH padena iva jyotizwoma ananda mayaH lakzyatAM,
   utānandamayaṃ vikārārthamastu, brahmapadaṃ ca brāhmaṇyeva svārthe 'stu,	uta Ananda mayam vikAra arTam astu, brahma padam ca brAhmaNI A iva sva arTe astu,
   ānandamapadābhyāsaśca svārthe,	Anandam apada aByAsaH ca sva arTe,
   pucchapadamātramavayavaprāyalikhitamadhikaraṇaparatayā vyākriyatāmiti	pucCa pada mAtram avayava prAya liKitam aDikaraNa para tayA vyAkriyatAm iti
   kṛtabuddhya eva vidāṅkurvantu /	kRtabudDyaH eva vidAFkurvantu /
   tatra 'prāyapāṭhaparityāgo mukhyatritayalaṅghanam /	tatra aprAya pAWa parityAgaH muKya tritaya laFGanam /
   pūrvasminnuttare pakṣe prāyapāṭhasya bādhanam /	pUrvasmin= uttare pakze prAya pAWasya bADanam /
   pucchapadaṃ hi vāladhau mukhyaṃ sadānandamayāvayave gauṇameveti	pucCa padam hi vAlaDO muKyam sat Ananda maya avayave gONam eva iti
   mukhyaśabdārthalaṅghanamavayavaparatāyāmaṅikaraṇaparatāyāṃ ca tulyam /	muKya Sabda arTa laFGanam avayava para tAyAm aFikaraNa para tAyAm ca tulyam /
   avayavaprāyalekhabādhaśca vikāraprāyalekhabādhena tulyaḥ /	avayava prAya leKa bADaH ca vikAra prAya leKa bADena tulyaH /
   brahmapadamānandamayapadamānandapadamiti tritayalaṅghanaṃ tvadhikam /	brahma padam Ananda maya padam Ananda padam iti tritaya laFGanam tu aDikam /
   tasmānmukhyatritayalaṅghanādasādhīyānpūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /	tasmAt muKya tritaya laFGanAt a sADIyAn pUrvaH pakzaH /
   mukhyatrayānuguṇyena tūttara eva pakṣo yuktaḥ /	muKya traya anuguNyena tu uttaraH eva pakzaH yuktaH /
   api cānandamayapadasya brahmārthatve, brahma puccham iti na samañjasam /	api ca Ananda maya padasya brahma arTa tve, brahma pucCam iti na samaQjasam /
   na hi tadevāvayavyavayavaśceti yuktam /	na hi tat eva avayavi avayavaH ca iti yuktam /
   ādhāraparatve ca pucchaśabdasya, pratiṣṭhetyetadapyupapannataraṃ bhavati /	ADAra paratve ca pucCa Sabdasya, pratizWA iti etat api upapannataram Bavati /
   ānandamayasya cāntaratvamannamayādikośāpekṣayā /	Ananda mayasya ca antara tvam anna maya Adi koSa apekzayA /
   brahmaṇāstvāntaratvamānandamayādarthādgamyata iti na śrutyoktam /	brahmaNA aH tu Antara tvam Ananda mayAt arTAt gamyate iti na SrutyA uktam /
   evaṃ cānnamayādivadānandamayasya priyādyavayavayogo yuktaḥ /	evam ca anna maya Adi vat Ananda mayasya priya Adi avayava yogaH yuktaH /
   vāṅmanasāgocare tu parabrahmaṇyupādhimantarbhāvya priyādyavayavayogaḥ,	vAc manasA gocare tu para brahmaNi upADim antarBAvya priya Adi avayava yogaH,
   prācuryaḥ ca, kleśena vyākhyāyeyātām /	prAcuryaH ca, kleSena vyAKyAyeyAtAm /
   tathā ca māntravarṇikasya brahmaṇā eva brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti	taTA ca mAntra varNikasya brahmaNA eva brahma pucCam pratizWA iti
   svapradhānasyābhidhānāt, tasyaivādhikāro nānandamayasyeti /	sva praDAnasya aBiDAnAt, tasya eva aDikAraH na Ananda mayasya iti /
   so 'kāmayeta' ityādyā api śrutayo brahmaviṣayā ityarthasaṃkṣepaḥ /	saH akAmayeta a ityAdyAH api SrutayaH brahma vizayAH iti arTa saMkzepaH /
   sugamamanyat /	sugamam anyat /
   # sūtrāṇi tvevaṃ vyākhyeyānīti.# /	# sUtrANi tu evam vyAKyeyAni iti.# /
   vedasūtrayorvirodhe 'guṇe tvanyāyyakalpanā' iti sūtrāṇyanyathā netavyāni /	veda sUtrayoH viroDe aguNe tu anyAyi akalpanAa iti sUtrANi anyaTA netavyAni /
   ānandamayaśabdena tadvākyasya brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā ityetadgataṃ	Ananda maya Sabdena tad vAkyasya brahma pucCam pratizWA iti etat gatam
   brahmapadamupalakṣyate /	brahma padam upalakzyate /
   etaduktaṃ bhavati  ānandamaya ityādivākye yat brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti	etat uktam Bavati Ananda mayaH ityAdi vAkye yat brahma pucCam pratizWA iti
   brahmapadaṃ tatsvapradhānameveti /	brahma padam tad sva praDAnam eva iti /
   yattu brahmādhikaraṇameveti vaktavye brahma puccham ityāha śrutiḥ,	yat tu brahma aDikaraNam eva iti vaktavye brahma pucCam iti Aha SrutiH,
   tatkasya hetoḥ, pūrvamavayavapradhānaprayogāttatprayogasyaiva buddhau	tat kasya hetoH, pUrvam avayava praDAna prayogAt tad prayogasya eva budDO
   saṃnidhānāt tenāpi cādhiraraṇalakṣaṇopapatteriti /	saMniDAnAt tena api ca aDiraraNa lakzaNa upapatteH iti /
   # māntravarṇikameva ca.#	# mAntra varNikam eva ca.#
   # gīyate.# // 1.9 //	# gIyate.# // 1.9 //
   yat satyaṃ jñānam' ityādinā mantravarṇena brahmoktaṃ tadevopāyabhūtena	yat satyam jQAnam a ityAdinA mantra varNena brahma uktam tat eva upAya BUtena
   brāhmaṇena svapradhānyena gīyate  brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti /	brAhmaNena sva praDAnyena gIyate brahma pucCam pratizWA iti /
   avayavavacanatve tvasya mantre prādhānyaṃ, brāhmaṇe	avayava vacana tve tu asya mantre prADAnyaM, brAhmaNe
   prādhānyamityupāyopeyayormantrabrāhmaṇayorvipratipattiḥ syāditi /	prADAnyam iti upAya upeyayoH mantra brAhmaNayoH vipratipattiH syAt iti /
   # netaro 'nupapatteḥ.# //16 //	# na itaraH anupapatteH.# //16 //
   atra 'itaścānandamayaḥ iti bhāṣyasya sthāne itaśca brahma pucchaṃ	atra aitaH ca Ananda mayaH iti BAzyasya sTAne itas ca brahma pucCam
   pratiṣṭhā iti paṭhitavyam /	pratizWA iti paWitavyam /
   # bhedavyapadeśācca.# //17 //	# Beda vyapadeSAt ca.# //17 //
   atrāpi itaścānandamayaḥ ityasya ca ānandamayādhikāre ityasya ca bhāṣyasya	atra api itas ca Ananda mayaH iti asya ca Ananda maya aDikAre iti asya ca BAzyasya
   sthāne brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti brahmapucchādhikāre iti ca	sTAne brahma pucCam pratizWA iti brahma pucCa aDikAre iti ca
   paṭhitavayam /	paWita vayam /
   # kāmācca nānumānāpekṣā.# // 1.8 //	# kAmAt ca na anumAna apekzA.# // 1.8 //
   # asminnasya ca tadyogaṃ śāsti.# // 1.9 //	# asmin= asya ca tad yogam SAsti.# // 1.9 //
   ityanayorapi sūtrayorbhāṣye ānandamayasthāne brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti	iti anayoH api sUtrayoH BAzye Ananda maya sTAne brahma pucCam pratizWA iti
   pāṭho draṣṭavyaḥ /	pAWaH drazwavyaH /
   # taddhetuvyapadeśācca.# //14 //	# tad hetu vyapadeSAt ca.# //14 //
   vikārasyānandamayasya brahma pucchamavayavaścetkathaṃ sarvasyāsya	vikArasya Ananda mayasya brahma pucCam avayavaH ced kaTam sarvasya asya
   vikārajātasya sānandamayasya brahma pucchaṃ kāraṇamucyeta idaṃ	vikAra jAtasya sa Ananda mayasya brahma pucCam kAraNa mucyeta idam
   sarvamasṛjata /	sarvam asRjata /
   yadidaṃ kiñca iti śrutyā /	yat idam kiQca iti SrutyA /
   nahyānandamayavikārāvayavo brahma vikāraḥ san sarvasya kāraṇamupapadyate /	na hi Ananda maya vikAra avayavaH brahma vikAraH san sarvasya kAraNam upapadyate /
   tasmādānandamayavikārāvayavo brahmeti tadavayavayogyānandamayo vikāra iha	tasmAt Ananda maya vikAra avayavaH brahma iti tad avayava yogya Ananda mayaH vikAraH iha
   nopāsyatvena vivakṣitaḥsa kintu svapradhānamiha brahma pucchaṃ	na upAsya tvena vivakzitaHsa kintu sva praDAnam iha brahma pucCam
   jñeyatveneti siddham // 1.9 //	jQeya tvena iti sidDam // 1.9 //
   # antakarastaddharmopadeśāt.# /	# anta karaH tad Darma upadeSAt.# /
   pūrvasminnadhikaraṇe	pUrvasmin= aDikaraNe
   'pāstasamastaviśeṣabrahmapratipattyarthamupāyatāmātreṇa pañca kośā	apAsta samasta viSeza brahma pratipatti arTam upAya tA mAtreNa paQca koSA
   upādhayaḥ sthitāḥ, natu vivakṣaitāḥ /	upADayaH sTitAH, na tu vivakzA etAH /
   brahmaiva tu pradhānaṃ brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti jñeyatvenopakṣiptamiti	brahma eva tu praDAnam brahma pucCam pratizWA iti jQeya tvena upakziptam iti
   nirṇītam /	nirNItam /
   saṃprati tu brahma vivakṣitopādhimupasyatvenopakṣipyate, natu	saMprati tu brahma vivakzita upADim upasya tvena upakzipyate, na tu
   vidyākarmātiśayalabdhotkarṣo jīvātmādityapadavedanīya iti nirṇīyate /	vidyA karma atiSaya labDa utkarzaH jIvAtma Aditya pada vedanIyaH iti nirNIyate /
   tatra maryādādhārarūpāṇi saṃsāriṇi pare na tu /	tatra maryAdA ADAra rUpANi saMsAriNi pare na tu /
   tasmādupāsyaḥ saṃsāri karmānadhikṛto raviḥ //	tasmAt upAsyaH saMsAri karma anaDikRtaH raviH //
   piraṇyaśmaśruḥ ityādirūpaśravaṇāt, ya eṣo 'ntarāditye, ya eṣo 'ntarakṣiṇī	piraNyaSmaSruH ityAdi rUpa SravaNa at, yaH ezaH antarAditye, yaH ezaH antarakziNI
   iti cādhārabhehaśravaṇāt, ye cāmuṣmātparāñco lokāsteṣāṃ ceṣṭe devakāmānāṃ	iti ca ADAra Beha SravaNa at, ye ca amuzmAt parAQcaH lokAH tezAm ca izwe deva kAmAnAm
   ca ityaiśvaryādāśruteśca saṃsāryeva kāryakāraṇasaṃghātātmako	ca iti ESvaryAdA SruteH ca saMsArya iva kArya kAraNa saMGAta AtmakaH 
   rūpādisaṃpanna ihopāsyaḥ, natu paramātmā aśabdamasparśam ityādiśrutibhiḥ	rUpa Adi saMpannaH iha upAsyaH, na tu paramAtmA aSabdam asparSam iti Adi SrutiBiH
   apāstasamastarūpāśca, sve mahimni ityādiśrutibhirapākṛtādhāraśca, eṣa	apAsta samasta rUpAH ca, sve mahimni ityAdi SrutiBiH apAkRta ADAraH ca, eza
   sarveśvaraḥ ityādiśrutibhiradhigatanirmaryādaiśvaryaśca śakya	sarva ISvaraH iti Adi SrutiBiH aDigata nirmaryAda ESvaryaH ca Sakya
   upāsyatveneha pratipattum /	upAsya tvena iha pratipattum /
   sarvapāpmavirahaścādityapuruṣe saṃbhavati, śāstrasya manuṣyādhikāratayā	sarva pApma virahaH ca Aditya puruze saMBavati, SAstrasya manuzya aDikAra tayA
   devatāyāḥ puṇyupāpayoranadhikārāt /	devatAyAH puNyu pApayoH anaDikArAt /
   rūpādimattvānyānupapattyā ca kāryakāraṇātmake jīve upāsyatvena vivakṣite	rUpa Adimattva anyA anupapattyA ca kArya kAraNa Atmake jIve upAsya tvena vivakzite
   yattāvadṛgādyātmakatayāsya sarvātmakatvaṃ śrūyate	yatta avadRS Adi a Atmaka tayA asya sarva Atmaka tvam SrUyate
   tatkathañcidādityapuruṣasyaiva stuturiti ādityapuruṣa evopāsyo na	tad kaTaQcid Aditya puruzasya eva stutuH iti Aditya puruzaH eva upAsyaH na
   paramātmatyevaṃ prāptam /	paramAtmati evam prAptam /
   anādhāratve ca nityatvaṃ sarvagatatvaṃ ca hetuḥ /	anADAra tve ca nitya tvam sarva gata tvam ca hetuH /
   anityaṃ hi kāryaṃ kāraṇādhāramiti nānādhāraṃ, nityamapyasarvagataṃ ca	anityam hi kAryam kAraNa ADAram iti nAnA DAraM, nityam api asarva gatam ca
   yattasmādadharabhāvenāsthitaṃ tadeva tasyottarasyādhāra iti nānādhāraṃ,	yat tasmAt aDara BAvena AsTitam tat eva tasya uttarasya ADAraH iti nAnA DAraM,
   tasmādubhayamuktam /	tasmAt uBayam uktam /
   evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate 'antastaddharmopadeśāt' /	evam prApte aBiDIyate  aantaH tad Darma upadeSAt a /
   'sārvātmyasarvaduritavirahābhyāmihocyate /	asArvAtmya sarva durita virahAByAm iha ucyate /
   brahmaivāvyabhicāribhyāṃ sarvaheturvikāravat //	brahma eva avyaBicAriByAm sarva hetuH vikAra vat //
   ' nāmaniruktena hi sarvapāpmāpādānatayasyodaya ucyate /	a nAma niruktena hi sarva pApmA apAda Anatayasya udayaH ucyate /
   na cādityasya devatāyāḥ karmānadhikāre 'pi sarvapāpmavirahaḥ	na ca Adityasya devatAyAH karma anaDikAre api sarva pApma virahaH
   prāgbhavīyadharmarūpapāpmasaṃbhave sati /	prAc BavIya Darma rUpa pApma saMBave sati /
   na caiteṣāṃ prāgbhavīyo dharma evāsti na pāpmeti sāṃpratam /	na ca etezAm prAc BavIyaH DarmaH eva asti na pApmA iti sAMpratam /
   vidyākarmātiśayasamudācāre 'pyanādibhavaparaṃparopārjitānāṃ pāpmanāmapi	vidyA karma atiSaya samudAcAre api anAdi Bava paraMpara upArjitAnAm pApmanAm api
   prasuptānāṃ saṃbhavāt /	prasuptAnAm saMBavAt /
   naca śrutiprāmāṇyādidātyaśarīrābhimāninaḥ sarvapāpmaviraha iti yuktaṃ,	na ca Sruti prAmANya Adi dAtya SarIra aBimAninaH sarva pApma virahaH iti yuktaM,
   brahmaviṣayatvenāpyasyāḥ prāmāṇyopapatteḥ /	brahma vizaya tvena api asyAH prAmANya upapatteH /
   naca vinigamanāhetvabhāvaḥ, tatra tatra sarvapāpmavirahasya bhūyobhūyo	na ca vinigamanA hetu aBAvaH, tatra tatra sarva pApma virahasya BUyas BUyas 
   brahmaṇyeva śravaṇāt /	brahmaNi eva SravaNAt /
   tasyaiva ceha pratyabhijñāyamānasya vinigamanāhetorvidyamānatvāt /	tasya eva ca iha pratyaBijQAyamAnasya vinigamanA hetoH vidyamAna tvAt /
   apica sārvātmyaṃ jagatkāraṇasya brahmaṇa evopapadyate,	api ca sArvAtmyam jagat kAraNasya brahmaNaH eva upapadyate,
   kāraṇādabhedātkāryajātasya, brahmaṇaśca jagatkāraṇatvāt /	kAraNAt aBedAt kArya jAtasya, brahmaNaH ca jagat kAraNa tvAt /
   ādityaśarīrābhimāninastu jīvātmano na jagatkāraṇatvam /	Aditya SarIra aBimAninaH tu jIva AtmanaH na jagat kAraNa tvam /
   naca mukhyārthasaṃbhave prāśastyalakṣaṇayā stutyarthatā yuktā /	na ca muKya arTa saMBave prASasti alakzaNayA stuti arTa tA yuktAH /
   rūpavattvaṃ cāsya parānugrahāya kāyanirmāṇena vā, tadvikāratayā vā	rUpavat tvam ca asya para anugrahAya kAya nirmANena vA, tad vikAra tayA vA
   sarvasya kāryajātasya, vikārasya ca vikāravato	sarvasya kArya jAtasya, vikArasya ca vikAravataH 
   'nanyatvāttādṛśarūpabhedenopadiśyate, yathā '   gandhaḥ saḥ iti /	ananya tvAt tAdRSa rUpa Bedena upadiSyate, yaTA a   ganDaH saH iti /
   naca brahmanirmitaṃ māyārūpamanuvadacchāstramaśāstraṃ bhavati, apitu tāṃ	na ca brahma nirmitam mAyA rUpam anuvadat SAstram aSAstram Bavati, api tu tAm
   kurvat iti māśāstratvaprasaṅgaḥ /	kurvat iti mASAstra tva prasaFgaH /
   yatra tu nirastasamastopādhibhedaṃ jñeyatvenopakṣipyate, tatra	yatra tu nirasta samasta upADi Bedam jQeya tvena upakzipyate, tatra
   śāstram 'aśabdamasparśamarūpamavyayam' iti pravartate /	SAstram   aaSabdam asparSam arUpam avyayam a iti pravartate /

   'yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati'	ayadA suptaH svapnam na kaQcana paSyati aTa asmin prANaH eva ekaDA Bavati a

   kathācitpraṇāḍyā /	kaTAcid praNAxyAH /
   'vāgvai gāyatrī vāgvā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ gāyati ca trāyate ca'	avAc vE gAyatrI vAc vA idam sarvam BUtam gAyati ca trAyate ca a

   # yathā soka iti.# /	# yaTA sokaH iti.# /

   tena yathopāṃśuyājavākye jāmitādoṣopakrame tatpratisamādhānopasaṃhāre	tena yaTA upAMSu yAja vAkye jAmitA doza upakrame tad pratisamADAna upasaMhAre
   caikavākyatvāya 'prajāpaturupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ' ityādayo na pṛthagvidhayaḥ	ca eka vAkya tvAya aprajApatuH upAMSu yazwavyaH a ityAdayaH na pRTagviDayaH
   kintvarthavādā iti nirṇītaṃ, tathehāmāmevi vijānīhi' ityupakramya 'prāṇo	kintu arTa vAdAH iti nirNItan, taTA ihAmAm evi vijAnIhi a iti upakramya aprANaH 
   'smi prajñātmā' ityuktvānte 'sa prāṇa eva prajñātmānando 'jaro 'mṛtaḥ'	asmi prajQA AtmAa iti uktvA ante asa prANaH eva prajQA Atma AnandaH ajaraH amRtaH a
   ityupasaṃhārādbrahmaṇyekavākyatvāvagatau satyāṃ jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅge api	iti upasaMhArAt brahmaNi eka vAkya tva avagatO satyAm jIva muKya prANa liFge api
   tadanuguṇatayā netavye /	tad anuguNa tayA netavye /
   anyathā vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt /	anyaTA vAkya Beda prasaFgAt /
   yatpunarbhedadarśanaṃ 'saha hyetau' iti, tajjñānakriyāśaktibhedena	yat punar Beda darSanam asaha hi etO a iti, tad jQAna kriyA Sakti Bedena
   buddhiprāṇayoḥ pratyagātmopādhibhūtayornirdeśaḥ	budDi prANayoH pratyagAtma upADi BUtayoH nirdeSaH
   pratyagātmānamevopalakṣayitum /	pratyak AtmAnam eva upalakzayitum /

   bhedenopalakṣayati 'prāṇa eva prajñātmā' iti /	Bedena upalakzayati  aprANaH eva prajQA AtmAa iti /
   'tasmādananyathāsiddhibrahmaliṅgānusārātaḥ /	atasmAt ananyaTA sidDi brahma liFga anusArAtaH /
   ekavākyabalātprāṇajīvaliṅgopapādanam' iti saṃgrahaḥ //28 //	eka vAkya balAt prANa jIva liFga upapAdanam a iti saMgrahaH //28 //
   # na brahmavākyaṃ bhavitumarhatīti.# /	# na brahma vAkyam Bavitum arhati iti.# /
   naiṣa saṃdarbho brahmavākyameva bhavitumarhatīti, kintu tathāyogaṃ	na eza saMdarBaH brahma vAkyam eva Bavitum arhati iti, kintu taTA ayogam
   kiñcidatra jīvavākyaṃ, kiñcinmukhyaprāṇavākyaṃ,	kiQcid atra jIva vAkyan, kiQcid muKya prANa vAkyaM,
   kiñcidbrahmavākyamityarthaḥ /	kiQcid brahma vAkyam iti arTaH /
   # prajñāsādhanaprāṇāntarāśrayatvāditi.# /	# prajQA sADana prANa antara ASraya tvAt iti.# /
   prāṇāntarāṇīndriyāṇi, tāni hi mukhye prāṇe pratiṣṭhitāni /	prANa antarANi indriyANi, tAni hi muKye prANe pratizWitAni /
   jīvamukhyaprāṇayoranyatara ityupakramamātram /	jIva muKya prANayoH anyataraH iti upakrama mAtram /
   ubhāviti tu pūrvapakṣatattvam /	uBO= iti tu pUrva pakza tattvam /
   brahma tu dhruvam /	brahma tu Druvam /
   # na brahmeti.# /	# na brahma iti.# /
   na brahmaivetyarthaḥ /	na brahma eva iti arTaH /
   # daśānāṃ būtamātrāṇāmiti.# /	# daSAnAm bUta mAtrANAm iti.# /
   pañca śabdādayaḥ, pañca pṛthivyādaya iti daśa bhūtamātrāḥ /	paQca Sabda AdayaH, paQca pRTivI AdayaH iti daSa BUtamAtrAH /
   pañca buddhīndriyāṇi pañca buddhasya iti daśa prajñāmātrāḥ /	paQca budDIndriyANi paQca budDasya iti daSa prajQAmAtrAH /
   tadevaṃ svamatena vyākhyāya prācāṃ vṛttikṛtāṃ matena vyācaṣṭe  #	tat evam sva matena vyAKyAya prAcAm vRtti kRtAm matena vyAcazwe #
   athaveti.# /	aTavA iti.# /
   pūrvaṃ prāṇasyaikamupāsanamaparaṃ jīvasyāparaṃ brahmaṇa	pUrvam prANasya ekam upAsanam aparam jIvasya aparam brahmaNa
   ityupāsanātraividhyena vākyabhedaprasaṅgo dūṣaṇamuktam /	iti upAsana atrEviDyena vAkya Beda prasaFgaH dUzaNam uktam /
   iha tu brahmaṇa ekasyaivopāsātrayaviśiṣṭasya vidhānānna vākyabeda	iha tu brahmaNaH ekasya eva upAsA traya viSizwasya viDAnAt na vAkya beda
   ityabhimānaḥ prācāṃ vṛttikṛtām /	iti aBimAnaH prAcAm vRtti kRtAm /
   tadetadālocanīyaṃ kathaṃ na vākyabheda iti /	tat etat AlocanIyam kaTam na vAkya BedaH iti /
   yuktaṃ 'somena yajeta' ityādau somādiguṇaviśiṣṭayāgavidhānaṃ,	yuktam asomena yajeta a ityAdO soma Adi guNa viSizwa yAga viDAnaM,
   tadguṇaviśiṣṭasyāpūrvasya vidhiviṣayatvāt /	tad guNa viSizwasya apUrvasya viDi vizaya tvAt /
   iha tu siddharūpaṃ brahma na vidhiviṣayo bhavitumarhati, abhāvārthatvāt /	iha tu sidDa rUpam brahma na viDi vizayaH Bavitum arhati, aBAva arTa tvAt /
   bhāvārthasya vidhiviṣayatvaniyamāt /	BAva arTasya viDi vizaya tva niyamAt /
   vākyāntarebhyaśca brahmavagateḥ prāptatvāttadanūdyāprāptopāsanā bhāvārthaḥ	vAkya antareByaH ca brahma vagateH prApta tvAt tad anUdyA prApta upAsanAH BAva arTaH
   vidheyastasya ca bedādvidhyāvṛttilakṣaṇo vākyabedo 'tisphuṭa iti bāṣyakṛtā	viDeyaH tasya ca bedAt viDyAvRtti lakzaNaH vAkya bedaH ati sPuwaH iti bAzya kRtA
   nodghāṭitaḥ, svavyākhyānenaivoktaprayatvāditi sarvaṃvadātam //31 //	na udGAwitaH, sva vyAKyAnena eva ukta prayatvAt iti sarvaMvadAtam //31 //
   iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite bhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ prathamasyādhyāyasya	iti SrI vAcaspati miSravi racite BAzya viBAge BAmatyAm praTamasya aDyAyasya
   prathamaḥ pādaḥ //1 //	praTamaH pAdaH //1 //
   # iti prathamasyādhyāyasya spaṣṭabrahmaliṅgaśrutisamanvayākhyaḥ prathamaḥ	# iti praTamasya aDyAyasya spazwa brahma liFga Sruti samanvaya AKyaH praTamaH
   pādaḥ.# //	pAdaH.# //
   # prathamādhyāye dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ.# /	# praTama aDyAye dvitIyaH pAdaH.# /
   atha dvitīyaṃ pādamāripsuḥ pūrvoktamarthaṃ smārayati vakṣyamāṇopayogitayā 	aTa dvitIyam pAdam AripsuH pUrva uktam arTam smArayati vakzyamANa upayogi tayA 
   # prathame pāda iti.# /	# praTame pAdaH iti.# /
   uttaratra hi brahmaṇo vyāpitvanityatvādayaḥ siddhavaddhetutayopadekṣyante	uttaratra hi brahmaNaH vyApi tva nitya tva AdayaH sidDa vat hetu tayA upadekzyante
   na caite sākṣātpūrvamupapāditā iti kathaṃ hetubhāvena na śakyā	na ca ete sAkzAt pUrvam upapAditAH iti kaTam hetu BAvena na SakyA
   upadeṣṭumityata uktam  # samastajagatkāraṇasyeti.# /	upadezwum iti atas uktam # samasta jagat kAraNasya iti.# /
   yadyapyete na pūrvaṃ kaṇṭhata uktāstathāpi brahmaṇo	yadi api ete na pUrvam kaNWataH uktAH taTA api brahmaNaH 
   jagajjanmādikāraṇatvopapadānenādhikaraṇasiddhāntanyāyenopakṣiptā	jagat janma Adi kAraNa tva upapadAnena aDikaraNa sidDAnta nyAyena upakziptA
   ityupapannasteṣāmuttaratra hetubhāvenopanyāsa ityarthaḥ /	iti upapannaH tezAm uttaratra hetu BAvena upanyAsaH iti arTaH /
   # arthāntaraprasiddhānāṃ ceti.# /	# arTa antara prasidDAnAm ca iti.# /
   yatrārthāntaraprasiddhā evākāśaprāṇajyotirādayo brahmaṇi vyākhyāyante,	yatra arTa antara prasidDAH eva AkASa prANa jyotiH AdayaH brahmaNi vyAKyAyante,
   tadavyabhicāriliṅgaśravaṇāt /	tat avyaBicAri liFga SravaNAt /
   tatra kaiva kathā manomayādīnāmarthāntaraṃ prasiddhānāṃ padānāṃ	tatra kA eva kaTA manaH maya AdInAm arTa antaram prasidDAnAm padAnAm
   brahmagocaratvanirṇayaṃ pratītyabhiprāyaḥ /	brahma gocara tva nirNayam prati iti aBiprAyaH /

   # sarvatra prasiddhopadeśāt /	# sarvatra prasidDa upadeSAt /

   sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahmaḥ.# /	sarvam Kalu idam brahmaH.# /

   tasmiṃścāniti sthitikāle ceṣṭata iti tadanaṃ jagat tasmātsarvaṃ khalvidaṃ	tasmin= ca aniti sTiti kAle cezwataH iti tat anam jagat tasmAt sarvam Kalu idam
   jagadbrahma /	jagat brahma /

   sannupāsīta /	san= upAsIta /
   # atha khalu kratumayaḥ puruṣo yathākraturasmiṃlloke puruṣo bhavati	# aTa Kalu kratu mayaH puruzaH yaTAkratuH asmin= loke puruzaH Bavati
   tathetaḥ pretya bhavati sa kratuṃ kurvīta manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīra ityādi.# /	taTA itas pretya Bavati sa kratum kurvIta manaH mayaH prANa SarIraH ityAdi.# /
   tatra saṃśayaḥ kimiha manomayatvādibhirdharmaiḥ śārīra	tatra saMSayaH kim iha manaH maya tva AdiBiH DarmEH SArIra
   ātmopāsyatvenopadiśyate āhosvidbrahmeti /	Atma upAsya tvena upadiSyate Ahosvit brahma iti /

   kutaḥ /	kutas /
   'kratum' ityādivākyena vihitāṃ kratubhāvanāmanūdya 'sarvam' ityādivākyaṃ	akratum a ityAdi vAkyena vihitAm kratu BAva nAm anUdya asarvam a ityAdi vAkyam
   śamaguṇe vidhiḥ /	Sama guNe viDiH /
   tathā ca 'sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma' iti vākyaṃ	taTA ca asarvam Kalu idam brahma a iti vAkyam
   prathamapaṭhitamapyarthālocanayā parameva, tadarthopajīvitvāt /	praTama paWitam api arTa AlocanayA param eva, tad arTa upajIvi tvAt /
   evaṃ ca saṃkalpavidhiḥ prathamo nirviṣayaḥ sannaparyavasyanviṣayāpekṣaḥ	evam ca saMkalpa viDiH praTamaH nirvizayaH sanna paryavasyan vizaya apekzaH
   svayamanirvṛtto na vidhyantareṇopajīvituṃ śakyaḥ, anupapadākatvāt /	sva yamanirvRttaH na viDi antareNa upajIvitum SakyaH, anupapadAka tvAt /
   tasmācchāntatāguṇavidhānātpūrvameva 'manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīraḥ'	tasmAt SAntatA guNa viDAnAt pUrvam eva amanaH mayaH prANa SarIraH a
   ityādibhirviṣayopanāyakaiḥ saṃbadhyate /	ityAdiBiH vizaya upanAyakEH saMbaDyate /
   manomayatvādi ca kāryakāraṇasaṃghātātmano jīvātmana eva nirūḍhamiti	manaH maya tva Adi ca kArya kAraNa saMGAta AtmanaH jIva AtmanaH eva nirUXam iti
   jīvātmanopāsyenoparaktopāsanā na paścāt brahmaṇā saṃbaddhumarhati,	jIvAtmanA upAsyena uparakta upAsanA na paScAt brahmaNA saMbadDum arhati,
   utpattiśiṣṭaguṇāvarodhāt /	utpatti Sizwa guNa avaroDAt /
   naca 'sarvaṃ khalvidam' iti vākyaṃ brahmaparamapi tu	na ca asarvam Kalu idam a iti vAkyam brahma param api tu
   śamahetuvannigadārthavādaḥ śāntatāvidhiparaḥ, 'śūrpeṇa juhoti' 'tena	Sama hetu vat nigadArTa vAdaH SAnta tA viDi paraH, aSUrpeNa juhoti a atena
   hyannaṃ kriyate' itivat /	hi annam kriyate a iti vat /
   na cānyaparādapi brahmāpekṣitatayā svīkriyata iti yuktaṃ,	na ca anya parAt api brahma apekzita tayA svIkriyate iti yuktaM,
   manomayatvādibhirdharmairjīve	manaH maya tva AdiBiH DarmEH jIve
   suprasiddhairjīvaviṣayasamarpaṇenānapekṣitatvāt /	su prasidDEH jIva vizaya samarpaNena anapekzita tvAt /
   sarvakarmatvādi tu jīvasya paryāyeṇa bhaviṣyati /	sarva karma tva Adi tu jIvasya paryAyeNa Bavizyati /
   evaṃ cāṇīyastvamapyupapannam /	evam ca aNIyaH tvam api upapannam /
   paramātmanastvaparimeyasya tadanupapattiḥ /	paramAtmanaH tu aparimeyasya tad anupapattiH /
   prathamāvagatena cāṇīyastvena jyāyastvaṃ tadanuguṇatayā vyākhyeyam /	praTama avagatena ca aNIyaH tvena jyAyaH tvam tad anuguNa tayA vyAKyeyam /
   vyākhyāṃ ca bhāṣyakṛtā /	vyAKyAm ca BAzya kRtA /
   evaṃ karmakartṛvyapadeśaḥ saptamīpraṇamāntatā cābhede 'pi jīvātmani	evam karma kartR vyapadeSaH saptamI praNama anta tA ca aBede api jIvAtmani
   kathañcidbhedopacāreṇa rāhoḥ śira itivaddraṣṭavyā /	kaTaQcid Beda upacAreNa rAhoH SiraH itivat drazwavyA /
   'etadbrahma' iti ca jīvaviṣayaṃ, jīvasyāpi dehādibṛṃhaṇatvena brahmātvāt /	aetat brahma a iti ca jIva vizayan, jIvasya api deha Adi bRMhaNa tvena brahmA tvAt /
   evaṃ satyasaṃkalpatvādayo 'pi paramātmavartino jīve 'pi saṃbhavanti,	evam satya saMkalpa tva AdayaH api paramAtma vartinaH jIve api saMBavanti,
   tadavyatirekāt /	tat avyatirekAt /
   tasmājjīva evopāsyatvenātra vivakṣitaḥ, na paramātmeti prāptam /	tasmAt jIvaH eva upAsya tvena atra vivakzitaH, na paramAtmA iti prAptam /
   evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate 'samāsaḥ sarvanāmārthaḥ saṃnikṛṣṭamapekṣate /	evam prApte aBiDIyate  asamAsaH sarva nAma arTaH saMnikRzwam apekzate /
   taddhitārtho 'pi sāmānyaṃ nāpekṣāyā nivartakaḥ //	tad Dita arTaH api sAmAnyam na apekzAyAH nivartakaH //
   tasmādapekṣitaṃ brahma grāhyamanyaparādapi /	tasmAt apekzitam brahma grAhyam anya parAt api /
   tathā ca satyasaṃkalpaprabhṛtīnāṃ yathārthatā //	taTA ca satya saMkalpa praBRtInAm yaTArTa tA //
   ' bhavedetadevaṃ yadi prāṇaśarīra ca sarvanāmārthaṃ saṃprāpya	a Bavet etat evam yadi prANa SarIra ca sarva nAma arTam saMprApya
   tadabhidhānaṃ paryavasyet /	tad aBiDAnam paryavasyet /
   tatra manomayapadaṃ paryamasitābhidhānaṃ tadabhidhānaparyavasānāyālaṃ,	tatra manaH maya padam paryamasita aBiDAnam tad aBiDAna paryavasAnAya AlaM,
   tadeva tu manovikāro vā manaḥpracuraṃ vā kimarthamityadyāpi na vijñāyate /	tat eva tu manaH vikAraH vA manaH pracuram vA kimarTam iti adya api na vijQAyate /
   tadyatraiṣa śabdaḥ samavetārtho bhavati sa samāsārthaḥ /	tat yatra eza SabdaH samaveta arTaH Bavati sa samAsArTaH /
   na caiṣa jīva eva samavetātho na brahmaṇīti, tasya 'aprāṇo hyamanāḥ'	na ca eza jIvaH eva samavetA aTaH na brahmaNi iti, tasya aaprANaH hi amanAH a
   ityādibhistadvirahapratipādanāditi yuktam, tasyāpi sarvavikārakāraṇatayā,	ityAdiBiH tad viraha pratipAdanAt iti yuktam, tasya api sarva vikAra kAraNa tayA,
   vikārāṇāṃ ca svakāraṇādabhedātteṣāṃ ca manomatayā brahmaṇastatkāraṇasya	vikArANAm ca sva kAraNAt aBedAt tezAm ca manaH matayA brahmaNaH tad kAraNasya
   manomayatvopapatteḥ /	manaH maya tva upapatteH /
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   jīvasya sākṣānmanomayatvādayaḥ, brahmaṇastu taddvārā /	jIvasya sAkzAt manaH maya tva AdayaH, brahmaNaH tu tad dvArA /
   tatra prathamaṃ dvārasya buddhisthatvāttadevopāsyamastu, na punarjaghanyaṃ	tatra praTamam dvArasya budDi sTa tvAt tat eva upAsyam astu, na punar jaGanyam
   brahma /	brahma /
   brahmaliṅgāni ca jīvasya brahmaṇo 'bhedājjīve 'pyupapatsyante /	brahma liFgAni ca jIvasya brahmaNaH aBedAt jIve api upapatsyante /
   tadetadatra saṃpradhāryam kiṃ brahmaliṅgairjīvānāṃ tadabhinnānāmastu	tat etat atra saMpraDAryam  kim brahma liFgEH jIvAnAm tad aBinnAnAm astu
   tadvattā, tathāca jīvasya manomayatvādibhiḥ	tadvat tA, taTA ca jIvasya manaH maya tva AdiBiH
   prathamamavagamāttasyaivopāsyatvaṃ, uta na jīvasya brahmaliṅgavattā	praTamam avagamAt tasya eva upAsya tvan, uta na jIvasya brahma liFga vat tA
   tadabhinnasyāpi /	tat aBinnasya api /
   jīvaliṅgaistu brahma tadvata, tathāca brahmaliṅgānāṃ darśanāt, teṣāṃ ca	jIva liFgEH tu brahma tadvata, taTA ca brahma liFgAnAm darSanAt, tezAm ca
   jīve 'nupapatterbrahmaivopāsyamiti /	jIve anupapatteH brahma eva upAsyam iti /
   vayaṃ tu paśyāmaḥ 'samāropyasya rūpeṇa viṣayo rūpavānbhavetṣa viṣayasya tu	vayam tu paSyAmaH  asamAropyasya rUpeNa vizayaH rUpavAn Bavetza vizayasya tu
   rūpeṇa samāropyaṃ na rūpavat //	rUpeNa samAropyam na rUpavat //
   ' samāropitasya hi rūpeṇa bhujaṅgasya bhīṣaṇatvādinā rajjū rūpavatī, natu	a samAropitasya hi rUpeNa BujaFgasya BIzaNa tva AdinA rajjuH rUpavatI, na tu
   rajjūrūpeṇābhigamyatvādinā bhujaṅgo rūpavān /	rajjU rUpeNa aBigamya tva AdinA BujaFgaH rUpavAn /
   tadā bhujaṅgasyaivābhāvātkiṃ rūpavat /	tadA BujaFgasya eva aBAvAt kim rUpavat /
   bhujaṅgadaśāyāṃ tu na nāsti vāstavī rajjuḥ /	BujaFga daSAyAm tu na na asti vAstavI rajjuH /
   tadiha samāropitajīvarūpeṇa vastusadbrahma rūpavadyujyate, natu	tat iha samAropita jIva rUpeNa vastu sat brahma rUpavat yujyate, na tu
   brahmarūpairnityatvādibhirjīvastadvānbhavitumarhati, tasya	brahma rUpEH nitya tva AdiBiH jIvaH tadvAn Bavitum arhati, tasya
   tadānīmasaṃbhavāt /	tadAnIm asaMBavAt /
   tasmādbrahmaliṅgadarśanājjīve ca tadasaṃbhavādbrahmaivopāsyaṃ na jīva iti	tasmAt brahma liFga darSanAt jIve ca tad asaMBavAt brahma eva upAsyam na jIvaH iti
   siddham /	sidDam /
   etadupalakṣaṇaṇāya ca 'sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma' iti vākyamupanyastamiti	etad upalakzaNaNAya ca asarvam Kalu idam brahma a iti vAkyam upanyastam iti
   # yadyapyapauruṣeya iti.# /	# yadi api apOruzeyaH iti.# /
   śāstrayonitve 'pīśvarasya	SAstra yoni tve api ISvarasya
   pūrvapūrvasṛṣṭiracitasaṃdarbhāpekṣaracanatvenāsvātantryādapauruṣeyatvābhidhānaṃ,	pUrva pUrva sRzwi racita saMdarBa apekza racana tvena asvAtantryAt apOruzeya tva aBiDAnaM,

   brahmaṇaiva sarūpeṇa na tu buddhyā virūpayā //1 //	brahmaNA eva sarUpeNa na tu budDyA virUpayA //1 //
   prathamaṃ sadvitīyatve brahmaṇāvagate sati /	praTamam sa dvitIya tve brahmaNA avagate sati /
   guhāśrayatvaṃ caramaṃ vyākhyeyamavirodhataḥ //2 //	guhA ASraya tvam caramam vyAKyeyam aviroDataH //2 //
   gauḥ sadvitīyetyukte sajātīyenaiva gavāntareṇāvagamyate, na tu	gOH sa dvitIya iti ukte sajAtIyena eva gavA antareNa avagamyate, na tu
   vijātīyenāśvādinā /	vijAtIyena ASva AdinA /

   pratīyate, na tvacetanayā virūpayā buddhyā /	pratIyate, na tu acetanayA virUpayA budDyA /

   tadidamuktam  # taddarśanāditi.# /	tat idam uktam # tad darSanAt iti.# /

   hovācācāryo 'rcirādikāṃ gatiṃ vaktumanāḥ, yaduktamagnibhiḥ prāṇo brahma	ha uvAca AcAryaH arciH AdikAm gatim vaktu manAH, yat uktam agniBiH prANaH brahma

   takṣādiraśarīrastu nātmāntaryamitāṃ bhajet //1 //	takza AdiH a SarIraH tu na Atma antaryamitAm Bajet //1 //

   kasminpratiṣṭhitaḥ sve mahimni' itivat /	kasmin pratizWitaH sve mahimni a iti vat /

   tatkarmopārjitaṃ taccettadavidyārjitaṃ jagat //	tad karma upArjitam tat ced tat avidyA arjitam jagat //
   ' śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇeṣu tāvadatrabhavataḥ sarvajñasya sa4vaśakteḥ	a Sruti smRti itihAsa purANezu tAvat atraBavataH sarvajQasya sa4vaSakteH
   parameśvarasya jagadyonitvamavagamyate /	parameSvarasya jagat yoni tvam avagamyate /

   tathāca sarvaṃ vikārajātaṃ tadavidyāśaktipariṇāmastasya śarīrendriyasthāne	taTA ca sarvam vikAra jAtam tad avidyA Sakti pariNAmaH tasya SarIra indriya sTAne

   pṛthivyādidevatādīñchaknoti niyantum /	pRTivI Adi devatA AdIn Saknoti niyantum /
   na cānavasthā /	na ca anavasTA /
   nahi niyantrantaraṃ tena niyamyate, kintu yo jīvo niyantā lokasiddhaḥ sa	na hi niyantR antaram tena niyamyate, kintu yaH jIvaH niyantA loka sidDaH sa
   paramātmaivopādhyavacchedakalpitabhedastathā vyākhyāyata	paramAtmA eva upADi avacCeda kalpita BedaH taTA vyAKyAyata

   tathāca 'nānyo 'to 'sti draṣṭā' ityādyā api śrutaya upapannārthāḥ /	taTA ca anAnyaH atas asti drazwA a ityAdyAH api Srutaye upapanna arTAH /
   paramārthato 'ntaryāmiṇo 'nyasya jīvātmano draṣṭurabhāvāt /	paramArTataH antaryAmiNaH anyasya jIva AtmanaH drazwuH aBAvAt /
   avidyākalpitajīvaparamātmabhedāśrayāstu jñātṛjñeyabhedaśrutayaḥ,	avidyA kalpita jIva param Atma Beda ASrayAH tu jQAtR jQeya Beda SrutayaH,
   pratyakṣādini pramāṇāni, saṃsārānubhavaḥ, vidhiniṣedhaśāstrāṇi ca /	pratyakza Adini pramANAni, saMsAra anuBavaH, viDi nizeDa SAstrANi ca /

   bhavati, 'yaḥ sarvāṃllokān' 'yaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni' ityatra ya	Bavati, ayaH sarvAn= lokAna ayaH sarvANi BUtAni a iti atra ya
   ityekavacanamupapadyate /	iti eka vacanam upapadyate /
   amṛtatvaṃ ca paramātmani samañjasaṃ nānyatra /	amRta tvam ca paramAtmani samaQjasam na anyatra /
   'ya ātmani tiṣṭhan' ityādau cābhede 'pi bhedopacārakleśo na bhaviṣyati /	ayaH Atmani tizWana ityAdO ca aBede api Beda upacAra kleSaH na Bavizyati /

   bastireva rayiḥ	bastiH eva rayiH

   'vāyunā vai gautama sūtreṇāya ca lokaḥ paraśca lokaḥ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni	avAyunA vE gOtama sUtreNAya ca lokaH paraH ca lokaH sarvANi ca BUtAni
   saṃdṛbdhāni bhavanti' iti śruteḥ /	saMdRbDAni Bavanti a iti SruteH /
   yadi punarasya dyubhvādyāyatanasya sārvajñyaśruteratrāpi na parituṣyami,	yadi punar asya dyuBva Adi Ayatanasya sArvajQya SruteH atra api na parituzyami,
   bhavatu tato hiraṇyagarbha eva bhagavān sarvajñaḥ sūtrātmā	Bavatu tatas hiraNyagarBaH eva BagavAn sarvajQaH sUtra AtmA
   dyubhvādyāyatanam /	dyuBva Adi Ayatanam /

   sarvamupapadyate /	sarvam upapadyate /
   ayamapi 'vāyunā vai gotama sūtreṇa' iti śrutimupanyasyatā sūcitaḥ /	ayam api avAyunA vE gotama sUtreNa a iti Srutim upanyasyatA sUcitaH /
   tasmādayaṃ dyuparbhṛtīnāmāyatanamityevaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate /	tasmAt ayam dyuparBRtInAm Ayatanam iti evam prApte aBiDIyate /
   dyabhvādyāyatanaṃ paraṃ brahmaiva, na	dyaBva Adi Ayatanam param brahma eva, na

   vābhyupeyate /	vA aByupeyate /

   pravartsyati /	pravartsyati /

   # apara āheti.# /	# aparaH Aha iti.# /

   tu tajjñānavāgvimocane iti sāṃpratam /	tu tad jQAna vAc vimocane iti sAMpratam /

   vidheyasya vyāpārasyaiva yogyatayā guṇo 'pi parāmṛśyate //1 //	viDeyasya vyApArasya eva yogyatayA guNaH api parAmRSyate //1 //
   # muktopasṛpyavyapadeśāt.# /	# mukta upasRpyavyapadeSAt.# /

   prasiddham /	prasidDam /

   sanatkumāra ekagranthena 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' iti	sanatkumAraH eka granTena aeza tu vA ativadati yaH satyena ati vat ati a iti

   ' naca prāṇāt kiṃ bhūya iti pṛṣṭam /	a na ca prANAt kim BUyas iti pRzwam /

   bhavitumarhati /	Bavitum arhati /
