   paramātmaivākṣaramiti siddham //12 //	paramAtmA eva akzaram iti sidDam //12 //
   # īkṣatikarmavyapadeśātsaḥ.# /	# Ikzati karma vyapadeSAt saH.# /
   'kāryabrahmajanaprāptiphalatvādarthabedataḥ /	akArya brahma jana prApti Pala tvAt arTa bedataH /
   darśanadhyānayordhyeyamaparaṃ brahma gamyate //	darSana DyAnayoH Dyeyam aparam brahma gamyate //
   ' 'brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati' iti śruteḥ sarvagataparabrahmavedena	a abrahma veda brahmA eva Bavati a iti SruteH sarva gata para brahma vedena
   tadbhāvāpattau 'sa sāmabhirunnīyate brahmalokam iti na	tad BAva ApattO asa sAmaBiH unnIyate brahma lokam iti na
   deśaviśeṣaprāptirupapadyate /	deSa viSeza prAptiH upapadyate /
   tasmādaparameva brahmeha dhyeyatvena codyate /	tasmAt aparam eva brahma iha Dyeya tvena codyate /
   na cekṣaṇasya loke tattvaviṣayatvena prasiddheḥ parasyaiva	na ca IkzaNasya loke tattva vizaya tvena prasidDeH parasya eva
   brahmaṇastathābhāvāt, dhyāyateśca tena samānaviṣayatvāt,	brahmaNaH taTA aBAvAt, DyAyateH ca tena samAna vizaya tva at,
   parabrahmaviṣayameva dhyānamiti sāṃpratam, samānaviṣayatvasyaivāsiddheḥ /	para brahma vizayam eva DyAnam iti sAMpratam, samAna vizaya tvasya eva asidDeH /
   paro hi puruṣo dhyānaviṣayaḥ, parātparastu darśanaviṣayaḥ /	paraH hi puruzaH DyAna vizayaH, parAtparaH tu darSana vizayaH /
   naca tattvaviṣayameva sarvaṃ darśanaṃ, anṛtaviṣayasyāpi tasya darśanāt /	na ca tattva vizayam eva sarvam darSanan, anRta vizayasya api tasya darSanAt /
   naca mananaṃ darśanaṃ, tacca tattvaviṣayameveti sāṃpratam /	na ca mananam darSanan, tat ca tattva vizayam eva iti sAMpratam /
   mananādbhedena tatra tatra darśanasya nirdeśāt /	mananAt Bedena tatra tatra darSanasya nirdeSAt /
   naca mananamapi tarkāparanāmāvaśyaṃ tattvaviṣayam /	na ca mananam api tarka apara nAma avaSyam tattva vizayam /
   yathāhuḥ 'tarko 'pratiṣṭhaḥ' iti /	yaTA AhuH  atarkaH apratizWaH a iti /
   tasmādaparameva brahmeha dhyeyam /	tasmAt aparam eva brahma iha Dyeyam /
   tasya ca paratvaṃ śarīrāpekṣayeti /	tasya ca paratvam SarIra apekzayA iti /
   evaṃ prāpta ucyate 'īkṣaṇadhyānayorekaḥ kāryakāraṇabhūtayoḥ /	evam prAptaH ucyate  aIkzaNa DyAnayoH ekaH kArya kAraNa BUtayoH /
   artha autsargikaṃ tattvaviṣayatvaṃ yathekṣateḥ //	arTaH Otsargikam tattva vizaya tvam yaTekzateH //
   ' dhyānasya hi sākṣātkāraḥ phalam /	a DyAnasya hi sAkzAtkAraH Palam /
   sākṣātkāraścotsargatastattvaviṣayaḥ /	sAkzAtkAraH ca utsargataH tattva vizayaH /
   kkacittu bādhakopanipāte samāropitagocaro bhavet /	kkacid tu bADaka upanipAte samAropita gocaraH Bavet /
   na cāsatyapavāde śakya utsargastyaktum /	na ca asati apavAde SakyaH utsargaH tyaktum /
   tathā cāsya tattvaviṣayatvāttatkāraṇasya dhyānasyāpi tattatvaviṣayatvam /	taTA ca asya tattva vizaya tvAt tad kAraNasya DyAnasya api tad tatva vizaya tvam /
   apica vākyaśeṣeṇaikavākyatvasaṃbhave na vākyabhedo yujyate /	api ca vAkya SezeNa eka vAkya tva saMBave na vAkya BedaH yujyate /
   saṃbhavati ca parapuruṣaviṣayatvenārthapratyabhijñānāt	saMBavati ca para puruza vizaya tvena arTa pratyaBijQAnAt
   samabhivyāhārāccaikavākyatā /	samaBivyAhArAt ca eka vAkya tA /
   tadanurodhena ca parātpara ityatra parāditi jīvaghanaviṣayaṃ draṣṭavyam /	tad anuroDena ca parAtparaH iti atra parAt iti jIva Gana vizayam drazwavyam /
   tasmāttu paraḥ puruṣo dhyātavyaśca draṣṭavyaśca bhavati /	tasmAt tu paraH puruzaH DyAtavyaH ca drazwavyaH ca Bavati /
   tadidamuktam  # na cātra jīvaghanaśabdena prakṛto 'bhidhyātavyaḥ paraḥ	tat idam uktam # na ca atra jIva Gana Sabdena prakRtaH aBiDyAtavyaH paraH
   puruṣaḥ parāmṛśyateḥ.#kintu jīvaghanāt parāt paro yo dhyātavyo	puruzaH parAmRSyateH.#kintu jIva GanAt parAt paraH yaH DyAtavyaH 
   draṣṭavyaśca tameva kathayituṃ jīvaghano jīvaḥ /	drazwavyaH ca tam eva kaTayitum jIva GanaH jIvaH /
   khilyabhāvamupādhivaśādāpannaḥ sa ucyate /	Kilya BAvam upADi vaSAt ApannaH saH ucyate /
   'sa sāmabhirunnīyate brahmalokam' ityanantaravākyanirdiṣṭo brahmaloko vā	asa sAmaBiH unnIyate brahma lokam a iti anantara vAkya nirdizwaH brahma lokaH vA
   jīvaghanaḥ /	jIva GanaH /
   sa hi samastakaraṇātmanaḥ sūtrātmano hiraṇyagarbhasya bhagavato	sa hi samasta karaNa AtmanaH sUtra AtmanaH hiraNyagarBasya BagavataH 
   nivāsabhūmitayā karaṇaparivṛtānāṃ jīvānāṃ saṃghāta iti bhavati jīvaghanaḥ	nivAsa BUmitayA karaNa parivRtAnAm jIvAnAm saMGAtaH iti Bavati jIva GanaH
   tadevaṃ trimātroṅkārāyatanaṃ parameva brahmopāsyam /	tat evam tri mAtra uFkAra Ayatanam param eva brahma upAsyam /
   ata eva cāsya deśaviśeṣādhigatiḥ phalamupādhimattvāt, krameṇa ca	atas eva ca asya deSa viSeza aDigatiH Palam upADimat tva at, krameNa ca
   samyagdarśanotpattau muktiḥ /	samyak darSana utpattO muktiH /
   'brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati' iti tu nirupādhibrahmavedanaviṣayā śrutiḥ	abrahma veda brahmA eva Bavati a iti tu nirupADi brahma vedana vizayA SrutiH
   aparaṃ tu brahmaikaimātrāyatanamupāsyamiti mantavyam //13 //	aparam tu brahma ekEmAtra Ayatanam upAsyam iti mantavyam //13 //
   # dahara uttarebhyaḥ.# /	# daharaH uttareByaH.# /
   'atha yadidamāsmin brahmapure daharam' sūkṣmaṃ guhāprāyaṃ	aaTa yat idam A asmin brahma pure daharam a sUkzmam guhA prAyam
   puṇḍarīkasaṃniveśaṃ veśma 'daharo	puNxarIka saMniveSam veSma adaharaH 
   'sminnantarākāśastasminyadantastadanveṣṭavyam' āgamācāryopadeśābhyāṃ	asmin= antara AkASaH tasmin yat antar tat anvezwavyam a Agama AcArya upadeSAByAm
   śravaṇaṃ ca, tadavirodhinā tarkeṇa mananaṃ ca, tadanveṣaṇam /	SravaNam ca, tad aviroDinA tarkeNa mananam ca, tad anvezaNam /
   tatpūrvakeṇa cādaranairantaryadīrghakālāsevitena dhyānābhyāsaparipākena	tad pUrvakeNa ca Adara nErantarya dIrGa kAla Asevitena DyAna aByAsa paripAkena
   sākṣātkāro vijñānam /	sAkzAtkAraH vijQAnam /
   viśiṣṭaṃ hi tajjñānaṃ pūrvabhyaḥ /	viSizwam hi tat jQAnam pUrvaByaH /
   tadicchā vijijñāsanam /	tad icCA vijijQAsanam /
   atra saṃśayamāha  # tatreti.# /	atra saMSayam Aha # tatra iti.# /
   tatra prathamaṃ tāvadevaṃ saṃśayaḥ kiṃ daharākāśādanyadeva	tatra praTamam tAvat evam saMSayaH kim dahara AkASAt anyadeva
   kiñcidanveṣṭavyaṃ vijijñāsitavyaṃ ca uta daharākāśa iti /	kiQcid anvezwavyam vijijQAsitavyam ca uta dahara AkASaH iti /
   yadāpi daharākāśo 'nveṣṭavyastadāpi kiṃ bhūtākāśa āho śārīra ātmā kiṃ vā	yadA api dahara AkASaH anvezwavyaH tadA api kim BUta AkASaH Aho SArIraH AtmA kim vA
   paramātmeti /	paramAtmA iti /
   saṃśayahetuṃ pṛcchati  # kuta iti.# /	saMSaya hetum pRcCati # kutas iti.# /
   taddhetumāha #  ākāśabrahmapuraśabdābhyāmiti.# /	tat hetum Aha #  a AkASa brahma pura SabdAByAm iti.# /
   tatra prathamaṃ tāvadbhūtākāśa eva dahara iti pūrvapakṣayati #	tatra praTamam tAvat BUtAkASaH eva daharaH iti pUrvapakzayati #
    tatrākāśaśabdasya bhūtākāśe rūḍhatvāditi.# /	 tatra AkASa Sabdasya BUtAkASe rUXa tvAt iti.# /
   eṣa tu bahutarottarasaṃdarbhavirodhāttucchaḥ pūrvapakṣa ityaparitoṣeṇa	eza tu bahutara uttara saMdarBa viroDAt tucCaH pUrva pakzaH iti aparitozeNa
   pakṣāntaramālambate pūrvapakṣī athavā jīvo dahara iti prāptam /	pakza antaram Alambate pUrva pakzI  aTavA jIvaH daharaH iti prAptam /
   yuktamityarthaḥ /	yuktam iti arTaH /
   tatra 'ādheyatvādviśeṣācca puraṃ jīvasya ujyate /	tatra aADeya tvAt viSezAt ca puram jIvasya ujyate /
   deho na brahmaṇo yukto hetudvayaviyogataḥ //	dehaH na brahmaNaH yuktaH hetu dvaya viyogataH //
   ' asādhāraṇyena hi vyapadeśatā bhavanti /	a asADAraNyena hi vyapadeSa tA Bavanti /
   tadyathā kṣitijalapavanabījādisāmagrīsamavadhānajanmāpyaṅkuraḥ śālibījena	tat yaTA kziti jala pavana bIja Adi sAmagrI samavaDAna janma api aFkuraH SAli bIjena
   vyapadiśyate śālyaṅkura iti /	vyapadiSyate SAli aFkuraH iti /
   natu kṣityādibhiḥ, teṣāṃ kāryāntareṣvapi sādhāraṇyāt /	na tu kziti AdiBiH, tezAm kArya antarezu api sADAraNyAt /
   tadiha śarīraṃ brahmavikāro 'pi na brahmaṇā vyapadeṣṭavyam, brahmaṇaḥ	tat iha SarIram brahma vikAraH api na brahmaNA vyapadezwavyam, brahmaNaH
   sarvavikārakāraṇatvenātisādhāraṇyāt /	sarva vikAra kAraNa tvena ati sADAraNyAt /
   jīvabhedadharmādharmopārjitaṃ tadityasādhāraṇakāraṇatvājjīvena	jIva Beda Darma aDarma upArjitam tat iti asADAraNa kAraNa tvAt jIvena
   vyapadiśyata iti yuktam /	vyapadiSyate iti yuktam /
   apica brahmapura iti saptamyadhikaraṇe smaryate, tenādheyenānena	api ca brahmapuraH iti saptamI aDikaraNe smaryate, tena ADeyena anena
   saṃbaddhavyam /	saMbadDavyam /
   naca brahmaṇaḥ sve mahimni vyavasthitasyānādheyasyādhārasaṃbandha kalpate	na ca brahmaNaH sve mahimni vyavasTitasya anADeyasya ADAra saMbanDa kalpate
   jīvastvārāgramātra ityādheyo bhavati /	jIvaH tvAra agra mAtraH iti ADeyaH Bavati /
   tasmādbrahmaśabdo rūḍhiṃ parityajya dehādibṛṃhaṇatayā jīve yaugike vā	tasmAt brahma SabdaH rUXim parityajya deha Adi bRMhaNa tayA jIve yOgike vA
   bhākto vā vyākhyeyaḥ /	BAktaH vA vyAKyeyaH /
   caitanyaṃ ca bhaktiḥ /	cEtanyam ca BaktiH /
   upādhānānupadhāne tu viśeṣaḥ /	upADAna anupaDAne tu viSezaH /
   vācyatvaṃ gamyatvam /	vAcya tvam gamya tvam /
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   jīvasya puraṃ bhavatu śarīraṃ, puṇḍarīkadaragocaratā tvanyasya bhaviṣyati,	jIvasya puram Bavatu SarIran, puNxarIka dara gocara tA tu anyasya Bavizyati,
   vatsarājasya pura ivojjayinyāṃ bhaitrasya sajñmetyata āha  # tatra	vatsa rAjasya puras iva ujjayinyAm BEtrasya sa jQmA iti atas Aha # tatra
   purasvāmina iti.# /	pura svAminaH iti.# /
   ayamarthaḥveśma khalvadhikaraṇamanirdiṣṭhādheyamādheyaviśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ	ayam arTaH veSma Kalu aDikaraNam anirdizWA Deyam ADeya viSeza apekzAyAm
   purasvāminaḥ prakṛtatvāttenaivādheyena saṃbaddhaṃ sadanapekṣaṃ	pura svAminaH prakRta tvAt tena eva ADeyena saMbadDam sat anapekzam
   nādheyāntareṇa saṃbandhaṃ kalpayati /	na ADeya antareNa saMbanDam kalpayati /
   nanu tathāpi śarīramevāsya bhogāyatanamiti ko hṛdayapuṇḍarīkasya viseṣo	nanu taTA api SarIram eva asya Boga Ayatanam iti kaH hRdaya puNxarIkasya visezaH 
   yattadevāsya sajñmetyata āha  # manaupādhikaśca jīva iti.# /	yat tat eva asya sa jQmA iti atas Aha # manOpADikaH ca jIvaH iti.# /
   nanu mano 'pi calatayā sakaladehavṛtti paryāyeṇetyata āha  # manaśca	nanu manaH api calatayA sakala deha vRtti paryAyeNa iti atas Aha # manaH ca
   prāyeṇeti.# /	prAyeNa iti.# /
   ākāśaśabdaścārūpatvādinā sāmānyena jīve bhāktaḥ /	AkASa SabdaH ca arUpatva AdinA sAmAnyena jIve BAktaH /
   astu vā bhūtākāśa evāyamākāśaśabdo 'daharo 'sminnantarākāśaḥ' iti,	astu vA BUta AkASaH eva ayam AkASa SabdaH adaharaH asmin= antara AkASaH a iti,
   tathāpyadoṣa ityāha  # na cātra daharasyākāśasyānveṣyatvamiti.# /	taTA api adozaH iti Aha # na ca atra daharasi a AkASasya anvezya tvam iti.# /
   evaṃ prāpta ucyate bhūtākāśasya tāvanna daharatvaṃ,	evam prAptaH ucyate  BUta AkASasya tAvat na dahara tvaM,
   'yāvanvāyamākāśastāvānoṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśaḥ' ityupamānavirodhāt /	ayAvan vA ayam AkASaH tAvAn ozaH antar hRdayaH AkASaH a iti upamAna viroDAt /
   tathāhi 'tena tasyopameyatvaṃ rāmarāvaṇayuddhavat /	taTA hi  atena tasya upameya tvam rAma rAvaNa yudDa vat /
   agatyā bhedamāropya gatau satyāṃ na yujyate //	agatyA Bedam Aropya gatO satyAm na yujyate //
   ' asti tu daharākāśasya brahmatvena bhūtākāśādbhedenopamānasya gatiḥ /	a asti tu dahara AkASasya brahma tvena BUta AkASAt Bedena upamAnasya gatiH /
   na cānavacchinnaparimāṇamavacchinnaṃ bhavati /	na ca anavacCinna parimANam avacCinnam Bavati /
   tathā satyavacchedānupapatteḥ /	taTA satya vat Ceda anupapatteH /
   na bhūtākāśamānatvaṃ brahmaṇo 'tra vidhīyate, yena 'jyāyānākāśāt' iti	na BUtAkASa mAna tvam brahmaNaH atra viDIyate, yena ajyAyAna AkASAt a iti
   śrutivirodhaḥ syāt, api tu bhūtākāśopamānena puṇḍarīkopādhiprāptaṃ	Sruti viroDaH syAt, api tu BUtAkASa upamAnena puNxarIka upADi prAptam
   daharatvaṃ nivartyate /	dahara tvam nivartyate /
   apica sarva evottare hetavo daharākāśasya bhūtākāśatvaṃ vyāsedhantītyāha 	api ca sarve eva uttare hetavaH dahara AkASasya BUtAkASa tvam vyAseDanti iti Aha 
   # naca kalpitabheda iti.# /	# na ca kalpita BedaH iti.# /
   nāpi daharākāśo jīva ityāha  # yadyapyātmaśabda iti.# /	na api dahara AkASaH jIvaH iti Aha # yadi api Atma SabdaH iti.# /
   'upalabdheradhiṣṭhānaṃ brahmaṇo deha iṣyate /	aupalabDeH aDizWAnam brahmaNaH dehaH izyate /
   tānāsādhāraṇatvena deho brahmapuraṃ bhavet //	tAn AsA DAraNa tvena dehaH brahma puram Bavet //
   ' dehe hi brahmopalabhyata ityasādhāraṇatayā deho brahmapuramiti	a dehe hi brahma upalaByate iti asADAraNa tayA dehaH brahmapuram iti
   vyapadiśyate, na tu brahmavikāratayā /	vyapadiSyate, na tu brahma vikAra tayA /
   tathāca brahmaśabdārtho mukhyo bhavati /	taTA ca brahma Sabda arTaH muKyaH Bavati /
   astu vā brahmapuraṃ jīvapuraṃ, tathāpi yathā vatsarājasya pure ujjayinyāṃ	astu vA brahma puram jIva puraM, taTA api yaTA vatsa rAjasya pure ujjayinyAm
   maitrasya sajñma bhavati, evaṃ jīvasya pure hṛtpuṇḍarīkaṃ brahmasadanaṃ	mEtrasya sa jQma Bavati, evam jIvasya pure hRd puNxarIkam brahma sadanam
   bhaviṣyati, uttarebhyo brahmaliṅgebhyo brahmaṇo 'vadhāraṇāt /	Bavizyati, uttareByaH brahma liFgeByaH brahmaNaH avaDAraNAt /
   brahmaṇo hi bādhake pramāṇe balīyasi jīvasya ca sādhake pramāṇe sati	brahmaNaH hi bADake pramANe balIyasi jIvasya ca sADake pramANe sati
   brahmaliṅgāni kathañcidabhedavivakṣayā jīve vyākhyāyante /	brahma liFgAni kaTaQcid aBeda vivakzayA jIve vyAKyAyante /
   na ceha brahmaṇo bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ, sādhakaṃ vāsti jīvasya /	na ca iha brahmaNaH bADakam pramANan, sADakam vA asti jIvasya /
   brahmapuravyapadeśaścopapādito brahmopalabdhisthānatayā /	brahma pura vyapadeSaH ca upapAditaH brahma upalabDi sTAna tayA /
   arbhakaukastvaṃ coktam /	arBakOkaH tvam ca uktam /
   tasmāt sati saṃbhave brahmaṇi, talliṅgānāṃ nābrahmaṇi vyākhyānamucitamiti	tasmAt sati saMBave brahmaNi, tad liFgAnAm na abrahmaNi vyAKyAnam ucitam iti
   brahmaiva daharākāśo na jīvabhūtākāśāviti /	brahma eva dahara AkASaH na jIva BUta AkASO= iti /
   śravaṇamananamanuvidya brahmānubhūya caraṇaṃ cārasteṣāṃ kāmeṣu caraṇaṃ	SravaNa mananam anuvidya brahma anuBUya caraNam cAraH tezAm kAmezu caraNam
   bhavatītyarthaḥ /	Bavati iti arTaH /
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   daharākāśasyānveṣyatve siddhe tatra vicāro yujyate, natu tadanveṣṭavyam,	dahara AkASasya anvezya tve sidDe tatra vicAraH yujyate, na tu tad anvezwavyam,
   apitu tadādhāramanyadeva kiñcidityuktamityanubhāṣate  # yadapyetaditi.# /	api tu tat ADAram anyat eva kiQcid iti uktam iti anuBAzate # yat api etat iti.# /
   anubhāṣitaṃ dūṣayati atra brūma iti /	anuBAzitam dUza yati  atra brUmaH iti /
   yadyākāśādhāramanyadanyeṣṭavyaṃ bhavettadevopari vyutpādanīyaṃ,	yadi AkASa ADAram anyat anyA izwavyam Bavet tat eva upari vyutpAdanIyaM,
   ākāśavyutpādanaṃ tu kkopayujyata ityarthaḥ /	AkASa vyutpAdanam tu kkopa yujyate iti arTaH /
   codayati  # nanvetadapīti.# /	codayati # nanu etat api iti.# /
   ākāśakathanamapi tadantarvartivastusadbhāvapradarśanāyaiva /	AkASa kaTanam api tad antar varti vastu sadBAva pradarSanAya eva /
   athākāśaparameva kasmānna bhavatītyata āha  # taṃ cedbrūyariti.# /	aTa AkASa param eva kasmAt na Bavati iti atas Aha # tam ced brUyariti.# /
   ācāryeṇa hi 'daharo 'sminnantakarākāśastasminyadantastadanveṣṭavyaṃ	AcAryeNa hi adaharaH asmin= anta kara AkASaH tasmin yat antar tad anvezwavyam
   tadvāva vijijñāsitavyam' ityupadiṣṭe 'tevāsinākṣiptam 'kiṃ tadatra vidyate	tadvAva vijijQAsitavyam a iti upadizwe ateva asinA Akziptam  akim tat atra vidyate
   yadanveṣṭavyam' /	yat anvezwavyam a /
   puṇḍarīkameva tāvatsūkṣmataraṃ, tadavaruddhamākāśaṃ sūkṣmatamam /	puNxarIkam eva tAvat sUkzmataran, tat avarudDam AkASam sUkzmatamam /
   tasminsūkṣmatame kimaparamasti /	tasmin sUkzmatame kim aparam asti /
   nāstyevetyarthaḥ /	na asti eva iti arTaH /

   kimatrāpaśyatāmiti /	kim atra apaSyatAm iti /

   praticchāyātmavajjīvaṃ paramātmano vastuto bhinnamapyamṛtābhayātmatvena	praticCAyA Atma vat jIvam paramAtmanaH vastutas Binnam api amRtA aBaya Atma tvena
   grāhayitvā paścātparamātmānamṛtābhayādimantaṃ prajāpatirgrāhyati, na	grAhayitvA paScAt paramAtmAnamRta aBaya Adimantam prajApatiH grAhyati, na
   tvayaṃ jīvasya paramātmabhāvamācaṣṭe chāyātmana ivetyata āha  # nāpi	tu ayam jIvasya parama Atma BAvam Acazwe CAyA AtmanaH iva iti atas Aha # na api
   praticchāyātmāyamakṣilakṣita iti.# /	praticCAyA AtmA ayam akzi lakzitaH iti.# /

   # nahi khalvayamevamiti.# /	# na hi Kalu ayam evam iti.# /

   # śabdādeva pramitaḥ.# /	# SabdAt eva pramitaH.# /

   bhūtabhavyeśitā jīve nāñjasī tena saṃśayaḥ //	BUta Bavya ISitA jIve na aQjasI tena saMSayaH //
   ' kimaṅguṣṭhamātraśrutyanugrahāya jīvopāsanāparametadvākyamastu,	a kim aFguzWa mAtra Sruti anugrahAya jIva upAsana aparam etat vAkyam astu,
   tadanurodhena ceśānaśrutiḥ kathañcidvāyākhyāyatām,	tad anuroDena ca ISAna SrutiH kaTaQcid vAya AKyAyatAm,
   āhosvidīśānaśrutyanugrahāya brahmaparametadastu,	Ahosvit ISAna Sruti anugrahAya brahma param etat astu,
   tadanurodhenāṅguṣṭhamātraśrutiḥ kathañcinnīyatām /	tad anuroDena aFguzWa mAtra SrutiH kaTaQcid nIyatAm /
   tatrānyatarasyānyatarānurodhaviṣaye prathamānurodho nyāṭya	tatra anyatarasya anyatara anuroDa vizaye praTama anuroDaH nyAwya
   ityaṅguṣṭhaśrutyanurodheneśānaśrutirnetavyā /	iti aFguzWa Sruti anuroDena ISAna SrutiH netavyAH /
   apica yuktaṃ hṛtpuṇḍarīkadaharasthānatvaṃ paramātmānaḥ,	api ca yuktam hRd puNxarIka da hara sTAna tvam paramAtmAnaH,
   parimāṇamātranirdeśāt /	parimANa mAtra nirdeSAt /
   naca 'madhya ātmani' ityatra sthānabhedo 'vagamyate /	na ca amaDyaH Atmani a iti atra sTAna BedaH avagamyate /
   ātmaśabdo hyayaṃ svabhāvavacano vā jīvavacano vā brahmavacano vā syāt /	Atma SabdaH hi ayam svaBAva vacanaH vA jIva vacanaH vA brahma vacanaH vA syAt /
   tatra svabhāvasya svabhavitradhīnanirūpaṇatayā svasya ca	tatra svaBAvasya sva Bavitra DIna nirUpaNa tayA svasya ca
   bhavituranirdeśānna jñāyate kasya madhya iti /	BavituH anirdeSAt na jQAyate kasya maDye iti /
   naca jīvaparayorasti madhyamañjaseti naiṣa sthānanirdeśo vispaṣṭaḥ /	na ca jIva parayoH asti maDyam aQjasA iti na eza sTAna nirdeSaH vispazwaH /
   spaṣṭastu parimāṇanirdeśaḥ /	spazwaH tu parimANa nirdeSaH /
   parimāṇabhedaśca parasminna saṃbhavatīti jīvātmaivāṅguṣṭhamātraḥ /	parimANa BedaH ca parasmin na saMBavati iti jIva AtmA eva aFguzWa mAtraH /
   sa khalvantaḥkaraṇādyupādhikalpito bhāgaḥ paramātmanaḥ /	sa Kalu antaHkaraNa Adi upADi kalpitaH BAgaH paramAtmanaH /
   antaḥkaraṇaṃ ca prāyeṇa hṛtkamalakośasthānaṃ, hṛtkamalakośaśca	antaHkaraNam ca prAyeNa hRd kamala koSa sTAnaM, hRd kamala koSaH ca
   manuṣyāṇāmaṅguṣṭhamātra iti tadavacchinno jīvātmāpyaṅguṣṭhamātraḥ, nabha	manuzyANAm aFguzWa mAtraH iti tad avacCinnaH jIva AtmA api aFguzWa mAtraH, naBa
   iva vaṃśaparvāvacchinnamaratnimātram /	iva vaMSa parva avacCinnam aratni mAtram /
   api ca jīvātmanaḥ spaṣṭamaṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ smaryate 'aṅguṣṭhamātraṃ	api ca jIva AtmanaH spazwam aFguzWa mAtra tvam smaryate  aaFguzWa mAtram
   puruṣaṃ niścakarṣa yamo balāt' iti /	puruzam niScakarza yamaH balAt a iti /
   nahi sarveśasya brahmaṇo yamena balānniṣkarṣaḥ kalpate /	na hi sarva ISasya brahmaNaH yamena balAt nizkarzaH kalpate /
   yamo hi jagau 'hariguruvaśago 'smi na svatantraḥ prabhavati saṃyamane	yamaH hi jagO  ahari guru vaSa gaH asmi na svatantraH praBavati saMyamane
   mamāpi viṣṇuḥ' iti /	mama api vizNuHa iti /
   tenāṅguṣṭhamātratvasya jīve niśchayādāpekṣikaṃ kiñcidbhūtabhavyaṃ prati	tena aFguzWa mAtra tvasya jIve niSCayAt Apekzikam kiQcid BUta Bavyam prati
   jīvasyeśānatvaṃ vyākhyeyam /	jIvasya ISAna tvam vyAKyeyam /

   evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate 'praśnottaratvādīśānaśravaṇasyāviśeṣataḥ /	evam prApte aBiDIyate  apraSna uttara tvAt ISAna SravaNasya aviSezatas /
   jīvasya brahmarūpatvapratyāyanaparaṃ vacaḥ //	jIvasya brahma rUpa tva pratyAyana param vacaH //
   ' iha hi bhūtabhavyamātraṃ prati niraṅkuśamīśānatvaṃ pratīyate /	a iha hi BUta Bavya mAtram prati niraFkuSam ISAna tvam pratIyate /

   śuklābhi4yajurvedavihitakarmakusumebhya āhṛtyāgnau hutaṃ somādi	Sukla aBi4yajurveda vihita karma kusumeByaH AhRtya agnO hutam soma Adi
   pūrvavadamṛtabhāvamāpannaṃ yajurvedamantrabhramarā ādityamaṇḍalamānayanti,	pUrvavat amRta BAvam Apannam yajurveda mantra BramarAH Aditya maNxalam Anayanti,
   tadetamṛtaṃ rudrā upajīvanti /	tat etam Rtam rudrAH upajIvanti /

   seyamekasminvākye gatiḥ /	sA iyam ekasmin vAkye gatiH /
   yatra tu vākyasyaikasya vākyāntareṇa saṃbandhastatra lokānusārato	yatra tu vAkyasya ekasya vAkya antareNa saMbanDaH tatra loka anusArataH

   tattadviśiṣṭārthapratyāyanena paryavasitavṛttinaḥ paścātkutaściddhetoḥ	tad tad viSizwa arTa pratyAyanena paryavasita vRttinaH paScAt kutaScid hetoH
   prayojanāntarāpekṣāyāmanvayaḥ kalpyate /	prayojana antara apekzAyAm anvayaH kalpyate /

   evainaṃ bhūtiṃ gamayati vāyavyaṃ śvetamālabheta' ityatra /	eva enam BUtim gamayati vAyavyam SvetamAla Beta a iti atra /

   vai yūpaḥ' 'yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ' ityevamādayaḥ, tatra yathā	vE yUpaH a ayajamAnaH prastaraHa iti evamAdayaH, tatra yaTA
   pramāṇāntarāvirodhaḥ, yathā ca stutyārthatā, tadubhayasiddhyarthaṃ	pramANa antara aviroDaH, yaTA ca stutyA arTa tA, tad uBaya sidDi arTam

   sa ca tatra tatrānviṣyan kkacidativivekte dese śakaṭasyādhastāt pāmānaṃ	sa ca tatra tatra anvizyan kkacid ativivekte dese Sakawasya aDastAt pAmAnam
   kaṇḍūyamānaṃ brāhmaṇāyanamadrākṣīt /	kaNxUyamAnam brAhmaNAyanam adrAkzIt /
   taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā raikko 'yaṃ bhaviteti pratibhāvānupaviśya savinayamaprākṣīt,	tam ca dRzwvA rEkkaH ayam BavitA iti pratiBAvAn upaviSya sa vinayam aprAkzIt,
   tvamasi he bhagavan, sayugvā raikka iti /	tvam asi he Bagavan, sayugvA rEkkaH iti /
   tasya ca raikkabhāvānumatiṃ ca taistairiṅgitairgārhasthyecchāṃ dhanāyāṃ	tasya ca rEkka BAva anumatim ca tEH tEH iFgitEH gArhasTya icCAm DanAyAm
   connīya yantā rājñe nivedayāmāsa /	ca unnIya yantA rAjQe nivedayAmAsa /
   rājā tu taṃ niśamya gavāṃ ṣaṭśatāni niṣkaṃ ca hāraṃ cāśvatarīrathaṃ cādāya	rAjA tu tam niSamya gavAm zaz SatAni nizkam ca hAram ca aSvatarI raTam ca AdAya
   satvaraṃ raikkaṃ praticakrame /	sa tvaram rEkkam praticakrame /
   gatvā cābhyuvāda /	gatvA ca aByuvAda /
   hai raikka, gavāṃ ṣaṭśatānīmāni niṣkaśca hāra ścāyamaśvatarīrathaḥ,	hEH rEkka, gavAm zaz SatAni imAni nizkaH ca hAra Sca ayam aSvatarI raTaH,
   etadādatsva, anuśādhi māṃ bhagavanniti /	etat Adat sva, anuSADi mAm Bagavan= iti /
   tamevamuktavantaṃ prati sāṭopaṃ ca saspṛhaṃ covāca raikkaḥ /	tam evam uktavantam prati sa Awopam ca sa spRham ca uvAca rEkkaH /
   aha hāretvā śūdra, tavaiva saha gobhirastviti /	aha hAretvA SUdra, tava eva saha goBiH astu iti /
   aheti nipātaḥ sāṭopamāmantraṇe /	ahA iti nipAtaH sa AwopamA mantraNe /
   hāreṇa yuktā itvā gantrī ratho hāretvā sa gobhiḥ saha tavaivāstu,	hAreNa yuktAH itvA gantrI raTaH hAretvA sa goBiH saha tava eva astu,
   kimetanmātreṇa mama dhanenākalpavartino gārhasthyasya nirvāhānupayogineti	kim etanmAtreNa mama Danena akalpa vartinaH gArhasTyasya nirvAha anupayoginA iti
   bhāvaḥ /	BAvaH /
   āharetveti tu pāṭhonarthakatayā ca gobhiḥ sahetyatra	AharetvA iti tu pAWonarTaka tayA ca goBiH saha iti atra

   'pyavayavavyutpattyā vaktum /	api avayava vyutpattyA vaktum /

   sūcayāmāsa /	sUcayAmAsa /

   ucyate  # tadādravaṇāt.# /	ucyate # tadA dravaNAt.# /

   # kṣatriyatvagateścottaratra caitrarathena liṅgāt /	# kzatriya tva gateH ca uttaratra cEtraraTena liFgAt /

   caitrarathenābhipratāriṇā niścitakṣātriyatvena samānāyāṃ saṃvargavidyāyāṃ	cEtraraTena aBipratAriNA niScita kzAtriya tvena samAnAyAm saMvarga vidyAyAm

   'atha ha śaunakaṃ ca kāpeyamabhipratāriṇaṃ ca kākṣaseniṃ sūdena	aaTa ha SOnakam ca kApeyam aBipratAriNam ca kAkzasenim sUdena

   kāpeyenābhiprayāriṇo yogaḥ pratīyate /	kApeyena aBiprayAriNaH yogaH pratIyate /

   nahi jātu brahmacārī śūdrān bhikṣate /	na hi jAtu brahmacArI SUdrAn Bikzate /
   yājakena ca kāpeyena yogādyājyo 'bhipratārī /	yAjakena ca kApeyena yogAt yAjyaH aBipratArI /
   kṣatriyatvaṃ cāsya caitrarathitvāt /	kzatriya tvam ca asya cEtraraTi tvAt /

   caitrarathitvaṃ cāsya kāpeyena yājakena yogāt /	cEtraraTi tvam ca asya kApeyena yAjakena yogAt /
   # etena vai citrarathaṃ kāpeyā ayājayanniti.#chandogānāṃ dvirātre śrūyate	# etena vE citraraTam kApeyAH ayAjayan= iti.#CandaH gAnAm dvi rAtre SrUyate

   yadi caitrarathiḥ syāt samānānvayānāṃ hi prāyeṇa samānānvayā yājakā	yadi cEtraraTiH syAt samAna anvayAnAm hi prAyeNa samAna anvayA yAjakA

   # saṃskāraparāmarśāttadabhāvābhilāpācca.# /	# saMskAra parAmarSAt tad aBAva aBilApAt ca.# /
   na kevalamupanītādhyayanavidhiparāmarśena na śūdrasyādhikāraḥ kintu teṣu	na kevalam upanIta aDyayana viDi parAmarSena na SUdrasya aDikAraH kintu tezu

   iti //36 //	iti //36 //
   # tadabhāvanirdhāraṇe ca pravṛtteḥ.# /	# tad aBAva nirDAraNe ca pravRtteH.# /
   satyakāmo ha vai jābālaḥ pramītapitṛkaḥ svāṃ mātaraṃ jabālāṃ prapaccha,	satyakAmaH ha vE jAbAlaH pramIta pitRkaH svAm mAtaram jabAlAm prapacCa,
   ahamācāryakule brahmacaryaṃ cariṣyāmī, tadbravītu bhavatī kiṅgotro 'hamiti	aham AcArya kule brahmacaryam carizyAmI, tat bravItu BavatI kiFgotraH aham iti
   sābravīt /	sA bravIt /
   tvajjanakaparicaraṇaparatayā nāhamajñāsiṣaṃ gotraṃ taveti /	tvad janaka paricaraNa para tayA na aham ajQAsizam gotram tava iti /
   sa cvācāryaṃ gautamamupasasāda /	sa cu AcAryam gOtamam upasasAda /
   upasadyovāca, he bhagavan, brahmacaryamupeyāṃ tvayīti /	upasadya uvAca, he Bagavan, brahmacaryam upeyAm tvayi iti /
   sa hovāc, nāvijñātagotra upanīyata iti kiṅgotro 'sīti /	sa ha uvAc, na avijQAta gotraH upanIyate iti kiFgotraH asi iti /
   athovāca satyakāmo nāhaṃ veda svaṃ gotraṃ, svāṃ mātaraṃ jabālāmapṛcchaṃ,	aTa uvAca satyakAmaH na aham veda svam gotraM, svAm mAtaram jabAla Am apRcCan,
   sāpi na vedeti /	sA api na veda iti /
   tadupaśrutyābhyadhādgautamaḥ, nādvijanmana ārjavayuktamīdṛśaṃ vacaḥ,	tad upaSrutya aByaDAt gOtamaH, na advijanmanaH Arjava yuktam IdRSam vacaH,
   tenāsminna śūdratvasaṃbhāvanāstīti tvāṃ dvijātijanmānamupaneṣya	tena asmin na SUdra tva saMBAvanA asti iti tvAm dvijAti janmAnam upanezya

   # śravaṇādhyayanārthapratiṣedhātsamṛteśca.# /	# SravaNa aDyayana arTa pratizeDAt samRteH ca.# /

   atirohitārthamanyat //38 //	atirohita arTam anyat //38 //
   kampanāt /	kampanAt /
   prāṇavajraśrutihalādvākyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ ca bhaṅktvā vāyuḥ	prANa vajra Sruti halAt vAkyam prakaraNam ca BaFktvA vAyuH
   pañcavṛttirādhyātmiko bāhyaścātra pratipādyaḥ /	paQca vRttiH ADyAtmikaH bAhyaH ca atra pratipAdyaH /
   tathāhi prāṇaśabdo mukhyo vāyavādhyātmike, vajraśabdaścāśanau /	taTA ahi prANa SabdaH muKyaH vAyava ADyAtmike, vajra SabdaH ca aSanO /
   aśaniśca vāyupariṇāmaḥ /	aSaniH ca vAyu pariNAmaH /
   vāyureva hi vāhyo dhūmajyotiḥsalilasaṃvalitaḥ parjanyabhāvena pariṇato	vAyuH eva hi vAhyaH DUma jyotiH salila saMvalitaH parjanya BAvena pariNataH 
   vidyutstanayitnuvṛṣṭyaśanibhāvena vivartate /	vidyut stanayitnu vRzwi aSani BAvena vivartate /
   yadyapi ca sarvaṃ jagaditi savāyukaṃ pratīyate tathāpi sarvaśabda āpekṣiko	yadi api ca sarvam jagat iti sa vAyukam pratIyate taTA api sarva SabdaH ApekzikaH 
   'pi na svābhidheyaṃ jahāti kintu saṃkucadvṛttirbhavati /	api na sva aBiDeyam jahAti kintu saMkucat vRttiH Bavati /
   prāṇavajraśabdau tu brahmaviṣayatve svārthameva tyajataḥ /	prANa vajra SabdO tu brahma vizaya tve sva arTam eva tyajataH /
   tasmāt svārthatyāgādvaraṃ vṛttisaṃkocaḥ, svārthaleśāvasthānāt /	tasmAt sva arTa tyAgAt varam vRtti saMkocaH, sva arTa leSa avasTAnAt /
   amṛtaśabdo 'pi maraṇābhāvavacano na sārvakālikaṃ tadabhāvaṃ brūte,	amRta SabdaH api maraNa aBAva vacanaH na sArvakAlikam tad aBAvam brUte,
   jyotirjīvitayāpi tadupapatteḥ /	jyotiH jIvitayA api tad upapatteH /
   yathā amṛtā devā iti /	yaTA amRtAH devAH iti /
   tasmātprāṇavajraśrutyanurodhādvāyurevātra vivakṣito na brahmeti prāptam /	tasmAt prANa vajra Sruti anuroDAt vAyuH eva atra vivakzitaH na brahma iti prAptam /
   evaṃ prāpta ucyate  # kampanāt.# /	evam prAptaH ucyate # kampanAt.# /

   maṇḍūkaplutyānuṣajjate /	maNxUka plutyAn uzajjate /

   maryādāmativartate /	maryAdAm ativartate /

   pūrvāparavākyaikavākyatāprakaraṇābhyāṃ saṃvalitaḥ śrutisaṃkocaḥ /	pUrva apara vAkya eka vAkyatA prakaraNAByAm saMvalitaH Sruti saMkocaH /

   tadanena vākyaikavākyatā darśitā /	tat anena vAkya eka vAkya tA darSitAH /
   # prakaraṇādapi.#iti bhāṣyeṇa prakaraṇamuktam /	# prakaraNAt api.#iti BAzyeNa prakaraNam uktam /

   'apapunarmṛtyuṃ jayati' iti śrutyā hyapamṛtyorvijaya ukto natu	aapa punar mRtyum jayati a iti SrutyA hi apamRtyoH vijayaH uktaH na tu

   nahyārtābyāsādanārto bhavatīti bhāvaḥ //39 //	nahi ArtAbya AsAt ana ArtaH Bavati iti BAvaH //39 //
   jyotirdarśanāt /	jyotiH darSanAt /
   atra hi jyotiḥśabdasya tejasi mukhyatvāt, brahmaṇi jaghanyatvāt,	atra hi jyotiH Sabdasya tejasi muKya tva at, brahmaNi jaGanya tva at,
   prakaraṇācca śruterbalīyastvāt, pūrvavacchutisaṃkocasya cātrābhāvāt,	prakaraNAt ca SruteH balIyaH tvA at, pUrvavat Suti saMkocasya ca atra aBAvAt,
   pratyuta brahmajyotiḥpakṣe ktvāśruteḥ pūrvakālārthāyāḥ pīḍanāprasaṅgāt,	pratyuta brahmajyotiH pakze ktvA aSruteH pUrva kAla arTAyAH pIxana aprasaFgAt,
   samutthānaśruteśca teja eva jyotiḥ /	samutTAna SruteH ca tejaH eva jyotiH /
   tathāhi samutthanāmudgamanamucyate, na tu vivekavijñānam /	taTA hi  samutTanAm udgamanam ucyate, na tu viveka vijQAnam /
   udgamanaṃ ca tejaḥpakṣe 'rcirādimārgeṇopapadyate /	udgamanam ca tejaH pakze arciH Adi mArgeNa upapadyate /
   ādityaścārcirādyapekṣayā paraṃ jyotirbhavatīti tadupasaṃpadya tasya samīpe	AdityaH ca arciH Adi apekzayA param jyotiH Bavati iti tat upasaMpadya tasya samIpe
   bhūtvā svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate, kāryabrahmalokaprāptau krameṇa mucyate /	BUtvA svena rUpeNa aBinizpadyate, kArya brahma loka prAptO krameNa mucyate /
   brahmajyotiḥpakṣe tu brahma bhūtvā kā parā svarūpaniṣpattiḥ /	brahma jyotiH pakze tu brahma BUtvA kA parA sva rUpa nizpattiH /
   naca dehādiviviktabrahmasvarūpasākṣātkāro vṛttirūpo 'bhiniṣpattiḥ /	na ca deha Adi vivikta brahma svarUpa sAkzAtkAraH vRtti rUpaH aBinizpattiH /
   sā hi brahmabhūyātprācīnā na tu parācīnā /	sA hi brahma BUyAt prAcInA na tu parAcInA /
   seyamupasaṃpadyeti ktvāśruteḥ pīḍā /	sA iyam upasaMpadya iti ktvA aSruteH pIxA /
   tasmāttisṛbhiḥ śrutibhiḥ prakaraṇabādhanātteja evātra jyotiriti prāptam /	tasmAt tisRBiH SrutiBiH prakaraNa bADanAt tejaH eva atra jyotiH iti prAptam /

   tasya hīha prakaraṇe anuvṛttirdṛśyate.# /	tasya hi iha prakaraNe anuvRttiH dRSyate.# /
   yatkhalu pratijñāyate, yacca madhye parāmṛśyate, yaccopasaṃhriyate, sa eva	yat Kalu pratijQAyate, yat ca maDye parAmRSyate, yat ca upasaMhriyate, saH eva
   pradhānaṃ prakaraṇārthaḥ /	praDAnam prakaraNa arTaH /
   tadantaḥpātinastu sarve tadanuguṇatayā netavyāḥ, natu śrutyanurodhamātreṇa	tad antaHpAtinaH tu sarve tad anuguNa tayA netavyAH, na tu Sruti anuroDa mAtreNa
   prakaraṇādapakraṣṭavyā iti hi lokasthitiḥ /	prakaraNAt apakrazwavyAH iti hi loka sTitiH /
   anyathopāṃśuyājavākye jāmitādoṣopakrame tatpratisādhānopasaṃhāre ca	anyaTA upAMSu yAja vAkye jAmitA doza upakrame tad pratisADAna upasaMhAre ca

   pṛthagvidhayaḥ prasajyeran /	pRTagviDayaH prasajyeran /

   tatraiva dvādaśopasattāṃ vidhattām /	tatra eva dvAdaSa upasattAm viDattAm /

   prakaraṇādapakarṣa /	prakaraNAt apakarza /

   niṣprayojanatvāt /	nizprayojana tvAt /

   svābhidheyasaṃsargatātparyaparityāgaprasaṅgāt dvādaśāhīnasyeti tu vākye	sva aBiDeya saMsarga tAtparya parityAga prasaFgAt dvAdaSa ahInasya iti tu vAkye

   sāhnasyaiva dvādaśopasattāṃ vidhātumarhati,	sAhnasya eva dvAdaSa upasattAm viDAtum arhati,

   prakaraṇādeva tadavagateḥ /	prakaraNAt eva tad avagateH /

   jyotiḥ paraṃ brahma pratīyate /	jyotiH param brahma pratIyate /
   yattūktaṃ mumukṣorādityaprāptirabhihiteti /	yat tu uktam mumukzoH Aditya prAptiH aBihitA iti /

   naca kramamuktyabhiprāyaṃ svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata iti vacanam /	na ca krama mukti aBiprAyam svena rUpeNa aBinizpadyate iti vacanam /

   tathā ca śrutiḥ 'na tasmāt prāṇā utkrāmanti atraiva samavanīyante' iti /	taTA ca SrutiH  ana tasmAt prANAH utkrAmanti atra eva samavanIyante a iti /
   naca taddvāreṇa kramamuktiḥ /	na ca tad dvAreNa krama muktiH /
   arcirādimārgasya hi kāryabrahmalokaprāpakatvaṃ na tu brahmabhūyahetubhāvaḥ	arciH Adi mArgasya hi kArya brahma loka prApaka tvam na tu brahma BUya hetu BAvaH
   jīvasya tu nirūpādhinityaśuddhabuddhabrahmabhāvasākṣātkārahetuke mokṣe	jIvasya tu nirUpa ADi nitya SudDa budDa brahma BAva sAkzAtkAra hetuke mokze
   kṛtamarcirādimārgeṇa kāryabrahmalokaprāptyā /	kRtam arciH Adi mArgeNa kArya brahma loka prAptyA /
   atrāpi brahmavidastadupapatteḥ /	atra api brahma vidaH tad upapatteH /
   tasmānna jyotirādityamupasaṃpadya saṃprasādasya jīvasya svena rūpeṇa	tasmAt na jyotiH Adityam upasaMpadya saMprasAdasya jIvasya svena rUpeNa

   apica paraṃ jyotiḥ sa uttamapuruṣa itihaivopariṣṭādviśeṣaṇāttejaso	api ca param jyotiH saH uttama puruzaH itiha eva uparizwAt viSezaNAt tejasaH

   jyotiḥ na tu teja iti siddham //40 //	jyotiH na tu tejaH iti sidDam //40 //
   # ākāśor'thāntaratvādivyapadeśāt.# /	# AkASor aTa antara tva Adi vyapadeSAt.# /
   yadyapi 'ākāśastalliṅgāt' ityatra brahmaliṅgadarśanādākāśaḥ paramātmeti	yadi api aAkASaH tad liFgAt a iti atra brahma liFga darSanAt AkASaH paramAtmA iti
   vyutpāditaṃ, tathāpi tadvadatra	vyutpAditaM, taTA api tadvat atra
   paramātmaliṅgadarśanābhāvānnāmarūpanirmahaṇasya bhūtākāśe	paramAtma liFga darSana aBAvAt nAma rUpa nirmahaNasya BUtAkASe

   brahmeti ca nākāśasya nāmarūpayornirvahiturantarālatvamāha, api tu	brahma iti ca na AkASasya nAma rUpayoH nirvahituH antarAla tvam Aha, api tu
   brahmaṇaḥ, tena bhūtākāśo nāmarūpayornirvahitā /	brahmaNaH, tena BUtAkASaH nAma rUpayoH nirvahitA /

   nahi suśikṣito 'pi vijñānī svena skandhenātmānaṃ voḍhumutsahate /	na hi su SikzitaH api vijQAnI svena skanDena AtmAnam voXum utsahate /

   iti ca sraṣṭṛtvamatisphuṭaṃ brahmaliṅgamatra pratīyate /	iti ca srazwR tvam ati sPuwam brahma liFgam atra pratIyate /

   evaṃ ca nirvahiturevanātarālatopapatteranyo	evam ca nirvahituH evana AtarAlatA upapatteH anyaH

   # suṣuptyutkrāntyorbhedena.# /	# suzupti utkrAntyoH Bedena.# /
   'ādimadhyāvasāneṣu saṃsāripratipādanāt /	aAdi maDya avasAnezu saMsAri pratipAdanAt /
   tatpare granthasaṃdarbhe sarvaṃ tatraiva yojyate //	tad pare granTa saMdarBe sarvam tatra eva yojyate //
   ' saṃsāryeva tāvadātmāhaṅkārāspadaprāṇādiparītaḥ sarvajanasiddhaḥ /	a saMsArya iva tAvat AtmA ahaFkAra Aspada prANa Adi parItaH sarva jana sidDaH /
   tameva ca 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu' ityādiśrutisaṃdarbha	tam eva ca ayaH ayam vijQAna mayaH prANa izu a ityAdi Sruti saMdarBa
   ādimadhyāvasāneṣvāmṛśatīti tadanuvādaparo bhavitumarhati /	Adi maDya avasAnezu AmRSati iti tad anuvAda paraH Bavitum arhati /
   evaṃ ca saṃsāryātmaiva kiñcidapekṣya mahān, saṃsārasya	evam ca saMsArya AtmA eva kiQcid apekzya mahAn, saMsArasya
   cānāditvenānāditvādaja ucyate, na tu tadatiriktaḥ kaścidatra	ca anAdi tvena anAdi tvAt ajaH ucyate, na tu tad atiriktaH kaScid atra
   nityaśuddhabuddhamuktatvabhāvaḥ pratipādyaḥ /	nitya SudDa budDa mukta tva BAvaH pratipAdyaH /
   yattu suṣuptyutkrāntyoḥ prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvakta iti bhedaṃ manyase,	yat tu suzupti utkrAntyoH prAjQena AtmanA saMparizvaktaH iti Bedam manyase,
   nāsau bhedaḥ kintvayamātmaśabdaḥ svabhāvavacanaḥ, tena	na asO BedaH kintu ayam Atma SabdaH svaBAva vacanaH, tena
   suṣuptyutkrāntyavasthāyāṃ viśeṣaviṣayābhāvātsaṃpiṇḍitaprajñeva	suzupti utkrAnti avasTAyAm viSeza vizaya aBAvAt saMpiNxita prajQA iva
   prājñenātmanā svabhāvenā pariṣvakto na kiñcidvedetyabhede 'pi	prAjQena AtmanA svaBAvenA parizvaktaH na kiQcid veda iti aBede api
   bhedavadupacāreṇa yojanīyam /	Beda vat upacAreNa yojanIyam /
   yathāhuḥ 'prājñaḥ saṃpiṇḍitaprajñaḥ' iti /	yaTA AhuH  aprAjQaH saMpiNxita prajQaHa iti /
   patyādayaśca śabdāḥ saṃsāriṇyeva kāryakaraṇasaṃghātātmakasya jagato	pati AdayaH ca SabdAH saMsAriNI A iva kArya karaNa saMGAta Atmakasya jagataH 
   jīvakarmārjitatayā tadbhogyatayā ca yojanīyāḥ /	jIva karma arjita tayA tad Bogya tayA ca yojanIyAH /
   tasmātsaṃsāryevānūdyate na tu paramātmā pratipadyata iti prāptam /	tasmAt saMsAri eva anUdyate na tu paramAtmA pratipadyate iti prAptam /
   evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate 'suṣuptyutkrāntyorbhedena vyapadeśādityanuvartate	evam prApte aBiDIyate  asuzupti utkrAntyoH Bedena vyapadeSAt iti anuvartate
   ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ kiṃ saṃsāriṇo 'nyaḥ paramātmā nāsti,	ayam aBisaMDiH kim saMsAriNaH anyaH paramAtmA nAsti,
   tasmātsaṃsāryātmaparaṃ 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu' iti vākyam,	tasmAt saMsAri a Atma param ayaH ayam vijQAna mayaH prANa izu a iti vAkyam,
   āhosvidiha saṃsārivyatirekeṇa paramātmano	Ahosvit iha saMsAri vyatirekeNa paramAtmanaH 
   'saṃkīrtanātsaṃsāriṇaścādimadhyāvasāneṣvavamarśanātsaṃsāryātmaparaṃ, na	asaMkIrtanAt saMsAriNaH ca Adi maDya avasAnezu avamarSanAt saMsAri Atma paran, na
   tāvatsaṃsāryatiriktasya tasyābhāvaḥ /	tAvat saMsAri atiriktasya tasya aBAvaH /
   tatpratipādakā hi śataśa āgamāḥ 'īkṣaternāśabdam' 'gatisāmānyāt' ityādibiḥ	tad pratipAdakAH hi SataSas AgamAH aIkzateH na aSabdam a agati sAmAnyAt a iti AdibiH
   sūtrasaṃdarbhairupapāditāḥ /	sUtra saMdarBEH upapAditAH /
   na cātrāpi saṃsāryatiriktaparamātmasaṃkīrtanābhāvaḥ,	na ca atra api saMsAri atirikta paramAtma saMkIrtana aBAvaH,
   suṣuptyutkrāntyestatsaṃkīrtanāt /	suzupti utkrAntyeH tad saMkIrtanAt /
   naca prājñasya paramātmano jīvādbhedena saṃkīrtanaṃ sati saṃbhave rāhoḥ	na ca prAjQasya paramAtmanaH jIvAt Bedena saMkIrtanam sati saMBave rAhoH
   śira itivadaupacārikaṃ yuktam /	SiraH itivat OpacArikam yuktam /
   naca prājñaśabdaḥ prajñāprakarṣaśālini nirūḍhavṛttiḥ kathañcidajñaviṣayo	na ca prAjQa SabdaH prajQA prakarza SAlini nirUXa vRttiH kaTaQci d ajQa vizayaH 
   vyākhyātumucitaḥ /	vyAKyAtum ucitaH /

   'nyatra saṃbhavati /	anyatra saMBavati /
   na cetthaṃbhūto jīvātmā /	na ca itTaMBUtaH jIvAtmA /

   'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ' ityādinā jīvātmānaṃ lokasiddhamanūdya tasya	ayam vijQAna mayaHa ityAdinA jIva AtmAnam loka sidDam anUdya tasya
   paramātmabhāvo 'nanadhigataḥ pratipādyate /	paramAtma BAvaH ananaDi gataH pratipAdyate /
   naca jīvātmanuvādamātraparāṇyetāni vacāṃsi /	na ca jIva Atma nuvAda mAtra parANi etAni vacAMsi /
   anadhigatārthāvabodhanaparaṃ hi śābdaṃ pramāṇaṃ, na tvanuvādamātraniṣṭhaṃ	anaDigata arTa avaboDana param hi SAbdam pramANan, na tu anuvAda mAtra nizWam
   bhavitumarhati /	Bavitum arhati /

   'ajo hyeko juṣamāṇo 'nuśete jahātyenāṃ bhuktabhogāmajo 'nyaḥ' iti	aajaH hi ekaH juzamANaH anuSete jahAti enAm Bukta BogAm ajaH anyaHa iti
   tvātmabhedaśravaṇāt sāṃkhyasmṛterevātra mantravarṇe pratyabhijñānaṃ na	tu Atma Beda SravaNAt sAMKya smRteH eva atra mantra varNe pratyaBijQAnam na
   tvavyākṛtaprakriyāyāḥ /	tu avyAkRta prakriyAyAH /

   lohitatvādayastairiti /	lohita tvAt ayaH tEH iti /
   # prajāstraiguṇyānvitā iti.# /	# prajAH trEguNya anvitA iti.# /
   sukhaduḥkhamohātmikāḥ /	suKa duHKa moha AtmikAH /

   prati sattvasya samudbhavāt /	prati sattvasya samudBavAt /
   tathāca tatsapatnīnāṃ duḥkhaṃ, tat kasya hetoḥ, tāḥ prati	taTA ca tad sapatnInAm duHKaM, tat kasya hetoH, tAH prati

   hetoḥ, taṃ prati tamaḥsamudbhavāt /	hetoH, tam prati tamaH samudBavAt /
   narmadayā ca sarve bhāvā vyākhyātāḥ /	narmadayA ca sarve BAvAH vyAKyAtAH /
   tadidaṃ traiguṇyānvitatvaṃ prajānām /	tat idam trEguNya anvita tvam prajAnAm /

   viṣayā hi śabdādayaḥ prakṛtivikārastraiguṇyena sukhaduḥkhamohātmāna	vizayAH hi Sabda AdayaH prakRti vikAraH trEguNyena suKa duHKa moha AtmAna
   indriyamano 'haṅkārapraṇālikayā buddhisattvamupasaṃkrāmanti /	indriya manaH ahaFkAra praNAlikayA budDi sattvam upasaMkrAmanti /

   pariṇamate /	pariNamate /

   tadidamuktam  # sukhī duḥkhī mūḍho 'hamityavivekatayā saṃsarati.# /	tat idam uktam # suKI duHKI mUXaH aham iti aviveka tayA saMsarati.# /
   ekaḥ /	ekaH /

   evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate na tāvat 'ajo hyeko juṣamāṇo 'nuśete jahātyenāṃ	evam prApte aBiDIyate na tAvat aajaH hi ekaH juzamANaH anuSete jahAti enAm
   bhuktabhogamajo 'nyaḥ' ityetadātmabhedapratipādanaparamapi tu	Bukta Bogam ajaH anyaHa iti etat Atma Beda pratipAdana param api tu

   sarvabhūtāntarātmā'	sarva BUta antarAtmA a

   camasavākyavatpariplavamānaṃ na svatantrapradhānaniścayāya paryāptam /	camasa vAkya vat pariplavamAnam na svatantra praDAna niScayAya paryAptam /
   tadidamuktaṃ sūtrakṛtā 'camasavadaviśeṣāt' iti //8 //	tat idam uktam sUtra kRtA  acamasa vat aviSezAt a iti //8 //

   sūtramavatārayati  # atra brūmaḥ /	sUtram avatArayati # atra brUmaH /

   tejo 'bannalakṣaṇā	tejaH abanna lakzaNA

   pratipattavyā, 'rohitaśuklakṛṣṇām' iti rohitādirupatayā tasyā eva	pratipattavyA, arohita Sukla kRzNAma iti rohita AdiH upatayA tasyAH eva
   pratyabhijñānāt /	pratyaBijQAnAt /

   eva vā kecit /	eva vA kecid /

   vācyam /	vAcyam /

   evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate #  na saṃkhyopasaṃgrahādapi pradhānādīnāṃ	evam prApte aBiDIyate #  na saMKyA upasaMgrahAt api praDAna AdInAm

   naiṣāṃ pañcaśaḥ pañcaśaḥ sādhāraṇadharmo 'sti.# /	na ezAm paQcaSas paQcaSas sADAraNa DarmaH asti.# /
   na khalu sattvarajastamohadahaṅkārāṇāmekaḥ kriyā dā guṇo vā dravyaṃ vā	na Kalu sattva rajaH ta maH hat ahaFkArANAm ekaH kriyA dAH guNaH vA dravyam vA

   pañcakā bhavitumarhati /	paQcakAH Bavitum arhati /
   pūrvapakṣaikadeśinamutthāpayati  # athocyeta pañcaviṃśasaṃkhyaiveyamiti.#	pUrva pakza eka deSinam utTApayati # aTa ucyeta paQcaviMSa saMKyA eva iyam iti.#
   yadyapi parasyāṃ saṃkhyāyāmavāntarasaṃkhyā dvitvādikā nāsti tathāpi	yadi api parasyAm saMKyAyAm avAntara saMKyA dvi tva AdikA na asti taTA api
   tatpūrvaṃ tasyāḥ saṃbhavāt paurvāparyalakṣaṇayā pratyāsattyā	tat pUrvam tasyAH saMBavAt pOrvAparya lakzaNayA pratyAsattyA
   parasaṃkhyopalakṣaṇārthaṃ pūrvasaṃkhyopanyasyata iti dūṣayati  #	para saMKyA upalakzaNa arTam pUrva saMKyA upanyasyate iti dUzayati #
   ayamevāsminpakṣe doṣa iti.# /	ayam eva asmin pakze dozaH iti.# /
   naca pañcaśabdo janaśabdena samasto 'samastaḥ śakyo vaktumityāha  #	na ca paQca SabdaH jana Sabdena samastaH asamastaH SakyaH vaktum iti Aha #
   paraścātra pañcaśabda iti.# /	paraH ca atra paQca SabdaH iti.# /
   nanu bhavatu samāsastathāpi kimityata āha  # samastatvācceti.# /	nanu Bavatu samAsaH taTA api kim iti atas Aha # samasta tvAt ca iti.# /
   api ca vīpsāyāṃ pañcakadvayagrahaṇe daśaiva tattvānīti na	api ca vIpsAyAm paQcaka dvaya grahaNe daSa eva tattvAni iti na
   sāṃkhyasmṛtipratyabhijñānamityasamāsamabhyupetyāha  # na ca	sAMKya smRti pratyaBijQAnam iti asamAsam aByupetya aha # na ca
   pañcakadvayagrahaṇaṃ pañca pañceti.# /	paQcaka dvaya grahaNam paQca paQca iti.# /
   na caikā pañcasaṃkhyā pañcasaṃkhyāntareṇa śakyā viśeṣṭum /	na ca ekA paQca saMKyA paQca saMKyA antareNa SakyAH viSezwum /
   pañcaśabdasya saṃkhyopasarjanadravyavacanatvena saṃkhyāyā upasarjanatayā	paQca Sabdasya saMKyA upasarjana dravya vacana tvena saMKyAyAH upasarjana tayA
   viśeṣaṇenāsaṃyogādityāha  # ekasyāḥ pañcasaṃkhyāyā iti.# /	viSezaNena asaMyogAt iti a aha # ekasyAH paQca saMKyAyAH iti.# /
   tadevaṃ pūrvapakṣaikadeśini dūṣite paramapūrvapakṣiṇamutthāpayati #	tat evam pUrva pakza eka deSini dUzite parama pUrva pakziNam utTApayati #
    nanvāpannapañcasaṃkhyākā janā eveti.# /	 nanu Apanna paQca saMKyAkAH janAH eva iti.# /
   atra tāvadrūḍhau satyāṃ na yogaḥ saṃbhavatīti vakṣyate /	atra tAvat rUXO satyAm na yogaH saMBavati iti vakzyate /
   tathāpi yaugikaṃ pañcajanaśabdamabhyupetya dūṣayati  # yuktaṃ	taTA api yOgikam paQcajana Sabdam aByupetya dUzayati # yuktam
   yatpañcapūlīśabdasyeti.# /	yad paQca pUlI Sabdasya iti.# /
   pañcapūlītyatra yadyapi pṛthaktvaikārthasaṃvāyinī	paQca pUlI iti atra yadi api pRTaktvA eka arTa saMvAyinI
   pañcasaṃkhyāvacchedikāsti tathāpīha samudāyino 'vacchinatti na samudāyaṃ	paQca saMKyA avacCedikA asti taTA api iha samudAyinaH avacCinatti na samudAyam
   samāsapadagamyamatastasmin kati te samudāyā ityapekṣāyāṃ padāntarābhihitā	samAsapada gamyam atas tasmin kati te samudAyAH iti apekzAyAm pada antara aBihitA
   pañcasaṃkhyā saṃbadhyate pañceti /	paQca saMKyA saMbaDyate paQca iti /
   pañcajanā ityatra tu pañcasaṃkhyayotpattiśiṣṭatayā	paQcajanAH iti atra tu paQca saMKyayA utpatti Sizwa tayA
   janānāmavacchinnatvātsamudāyasya ca pañcapūlīvadatrāpratīterna	janAnAm avacCinna tvAt samudAyasya ca paQca pUlI vat atra apratIteH na
   padāntarābhihitā saṃkhyā saṃbadhyate /	pada antara aBihitA saMKyA saMbaDyate /
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   saṃkhyeyānāṃ janānāṃ mā bhūcchabdāntaravāvyasaṃkhyāvacchedaḥ /	saMKyeyAnAm janAnAm mA BUt Sabda antara vAvya saMKyA avacCedaH /
   pañcasaṃkhyāyāstu tayāvacchedo bhaviṣyati /	paQca saMKyAyAH tu tayA avacCedaH Bavizyati /
   nahi sāpyavacchinnetyata āha  # bhavadapīdaṃ viśeṣaṇamiti.# /	na hi sA api avacCinnA iti atas Aha # Bavat api idam viSezaNam iti.# /
   ukto 'tra doṣaḥ /	uktaH atra dozaH /
   nahyupasarjanaṃ viśeṣaṇena yujyate pañcaśabda eva	nahi upasarjanam viSezaNena yujyate paQca SabdaH eva
   tāvatsaṃkhyeyopasarjanasaṃkhyāmāha viśeṣatastu pañcajanā ityatra samāse /	tAvat saMKyeya upasarjana saMKyAm Aha viSezataH tu paQcajanAH iti atra samAse /
   viśeṣaṇāpekṣāyāṃ tu na samāsaḥ syāt, asāmarthyāt /	viSezaNa apekzAyAm tu na samAsaH syAt, asAmarTyAt /
   nahi bhavati ṛddhasya rājapuruṣa iti samāso 'pi tu (pada) vṛttireva	na hi Bavati RdDasya rAja puruzaH iti samAsaH api tu (pada) vRttiH eva
   ṛddhasya rājñaḥ puruṣa iti /	RdDasya rAjQaH puruzaH iti /
   sāpekṣatvenāsāmarthyādityarthaḥ /	sa apekza tvena asAmarTyAt iti arTaH /
   # atirekācceti.# /	# atirekAt ca iti.# /
   abhyuccayamātram /	aByuccaya mAtram /
   yadi sattvarajastamāṃsi pradhānenaikīkṛtyātmākāśau tattvebhyo vyatiricyete	yadi sattva rajaH tamAMsi praDAnena ekIkRtya Atma AkASO tattveByaH vyatiricyete
   tadā siddhāntavyākopaḥ /	tadA sidDAnta vyAkopaH /
   atha tu sattvarajastamāṃsi mitho bhedena vivakṣyante tathāpi	aTa tu sattva rajaH tamAMsi miTas Bedena vivakzyante taTA api
   vastutattvavyavasthāpane ādhāratvenātmā niṣkṛṣyatām /	vastu tattva vyavasTApane ADAra tvena AtmA nizkRzyatAm /
   ādheyāntarebhyastvākāśasyādheyasya vyatirecanamanarthakamiti gamayitavyam	ADeya antareByaH tu AkASasya ADeyasya vyatirecanam anarTakam iti gamayitavyam
   # kathaṃ ca saṃkhyāmātraśravaṇe satīti.# /	# kaTam ca saMKyA mAtra SravaNe sati iti.# /
   'diksaṃkhye saṃjñāyām' iti saṃjñāyāṃ samāsasmaraṇāt	adiS saMKye saMjQAyAm a iti saMjQAyAm samAsa smaraNAt 
   pañcajanaśabdastāvadayaṃ kkacinnirūḍhaḥ /	paQcajana SabdaH tAvat ayam kkacid nirUXaH /
   naca rūḍhau satyāmavayavaprasiddhergrahaṇaṃ, sāpekṣatvāt, nirapekṣatvācca	na ca rUXO satyAm avayava prasidDeH grahaNan, sa apekza tvAt, nirapekza tvAt ca
   rūḍheḥ /	rUXeH /
   tadyadi rūḍhau mukhyor'thaḥ prāpyate tataḥ sa eva grahītavyo 'tha tvasau	tat yadi rUXO muKyor aTaH prApyate tatas saH eva grahItavyaH aTa tu asO
   na vākye saṃbandhārhaḥ pūrvāparavākyavirodhī vā /	na vAkye saMbanDa arhaH pUrva apara vAkya viroDI vA /
   tato rūḍhyaparityāgenaiva vṛttyantareṇārthāntaraṃ kalpayitvā	tatas rUXya parityAgena eva vRtti antareNa arTa antaram kalpayitvA
   vākyamupapādanīyam /	vAkyam upapAdanIyam /
   yathā 'śyenenābhicaran yajeta' iti śyenaśabda śakuniviśeṣe	yaTA aSyenena aBicaran yajeta a iti Syena Sabda Sakuni viSeze
   nirūḍhavṛttistadaparityāgenaiva nipatyādānasādṛśyenārthavādikena	nirUXa vRttiH tad aparityAgena eva nipatya AdAna sAdRSyena arTavAdikena
   kratuviśeṣe vartate, tathā pañcajanaśabdo 'vayavārthayogānapekṣa	kratu viSeze vartate, taTA paQcajana SabdaH avayava arTa yoga anapekza
   ekasminnapi vartate /	ekasmin= api vartate /
   yathā saptarṣiśabdo vasiṣṭha ekasmin saptasu ca vartate /	yaTA saptarzi SabdaH vasizWaH ekasmin saptasu ca vartate /
   na caiṣa tattveṣu rūḍhaḥ /	na ca eza tattvezu rUXaH /
   pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyānurodhena tattveṣu vartayitavyaḥ /	paQcaviMSati saMKyA anuroDena tattvezu vartayitavyaH /
   rūḍhau satyāṃ pcaviṃśatereva saṃkhyāyā abhāvātkathaṃ tattveṣu vartate //11	rUXO satyAm pcaviMSateH eva saMKyAyAH aBAvAt kaTam tattvezu vartate //11
   evaṃ ca ke te pañcajanā ityapekṣāyāṃ kiṃ vākyaśeṣagatāḥ prāṇādayo	evam ca ke te paQcajanAH iti apekzAyAm kim vAkya Seza gatAH prANAdayaH 
   gṛhyantāmuta pañcaviṃśatistattvānīti viśaye tattvānāmaprāmāṇikatvāt,	gRhyantAm uta paQcaviMSatiH tattvAni iti viSaye tattvAnAm aprAmANika tvAt,
   prāṇādīnāṃ ca vākyaśeṣe śravaṇāttatparityāge	prANa AdInAm ca vAkya Seze SravaNAt tad parityAge
   śrutahānyaśrutakalpanāprasaṅgātprāṇādaya eva pañcajanāḥ /	Sruta hAnya Sruta kalpanA prasaFgAt prANa AdayaH eva paQcajanAH /
   naca kāṇḍavamādhyandinayorvirodhānna prāṇādīnāṃ vākyaśeṣagatānāmapi	na ca kANxavam ADyandinayoH viroDAt na prANa AdInAm vAkya Seza gatAnAm api
   grahaṇamiti sāṃpratam, virodhe 'pi tulyabalatayā	grahaNam iti sAMpratam, viroDe api tulya balatayA
   ṣoḍaśigrahaṇavadvikalpopapatteḥ /	zoxaSi grahaNa vat vikalpa upapatteH /
   na ceyaṃ vastusvarūpakathā, apitūpāsanānuṣṭhānavidhiḥ,	na ca iyam vastu svarUpa kaTA, apitu upAsana anuzWAna viDiH,
   'manasaivānudraṣṭavyam' iti vidhiśravaṇāt /	amanasA eva anudrazwavyam a iti viDi SravaNAt /
   # kathaṃ punaḥ praṇādiṣu janaśabdaprayoga iti.# /	# kaTam punar praNAdizu jana Sabda prayogaH iti.# /
   janavācakaḥ śabdo janaśabdaḥ /	janavAcakaH SabdaH jana SabdaH /
   pañcajanaśabda iti yāvat /	paQcajana SabdaH iti yAvat /
   tasya kathaṃ prāṇādiṣvajaneṣu prayoga iti vyākhyeyam /	tasya kaTam prANa Adizu ajanezu prayogaH iti vyAKyeyam /
   anyathā tu pratyastamitāvayavārthe samudāyaśabdārthe janaśabdārtho	anyaTA tu pratyasta mita avayava arTe samudAya Sabda arTe jana Sabda arTaH 
   nāstītyaparyanuyoga eva /	na asti iti aparyanuyogaH eva /
   rūḍhyaparityāgenaiva vṛttyantaraṃ darśayati  # janasaṃbandhācceti.# /	rUXya parityAgena eva vRtti antaram darSayati # jana saMbanDAt ca iti.# /
   janaśabdabhājaḥ pañcajanaśabdabhājaḥ /	jana Sabda BAjaH paQcajana Sabda BAjaH /
   nanu satyāmavayavaprasiddhau samupāyaśaktikalpanamanupapannaṃ, saṃbhavati	nanu satyAm avayava prasidDO samupAya Sakti kalpanam anupapannan, saMBavati
   ca pañcaviṃśatyāṃ tattveṣvavayavaprasiddhirityata āha  # samāsabalācceti.#	ca paQcaviMSatyAm tattvezu avayava prasidDiH iti atas Aha # samAsa balAt ca iti.#
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   samāsabalāccedrūḍhirāsthīyate hanta na dṛṣṭastarhi tasya prayogo	samAsa balAt ced rUXiH AsTIyate hanta na dRzwaH tarhi tasya prayogaH 
   'śvakarṇādivadvṛkṣādiṣu /	aSva karNa Adi vat vRkza Adizu /
   tathāca lokaprasiddhyabhāvānna rūḍhityākṣipati  # kathaṃ punarasatīti.# /	taTA ca loka prasidDi aBAvAt na rUXiti Akzi pati # kaTam punar asati iti.# /
   janeṣu tāvatpañcajanaśabdaśca prathamaḥ prayogo lokeṣu dṛṣṭa ityasati	janezu tAvat paQcajana SabdaH ca praTamaH prayogaH lokezu dRzwaH iti asati
   prathamaprayoga ityasiddhamiti sthavīyastayānabhidhāyābhyupetya	praTama prayogaH iti asidDam iti sTavIyaH tayA anaBiDAya aByupetya
   prathamaprayogābhāvaṃ samādhatte śakyodbhidādivaditi /	praTama prayoga aBAvam samADatte  Sakya udBidAdi vat iti /
   ācāryadeśīyānāṃ matabhedeṣvapi na pañcaviṃśatistattvāni sidhyanti /	AcArya deSIyAnAm mata Bedezu api na paQcaviMSatiH tattvAni siDyanti /
   paramārthatastu pañcajanā vākyaśeṣagatā evetyāśayavānāha #  kaiścittviti.#	paramArTataH tu paQcajanAH vAkya Seza gatAH eva iti ASayavAn Aha #  kEScittu iti.#
   śeṣamatirohitārtham //12 //	Sezam ati rohita arTam //12 //
   # kāraṇatvena cākāśādiṣu yathāvyapadiṣṭokteḥ.# /	# kAraNa tvena ca AkASa Adizu yaTAvyapadizwa ukteH.# /
   atha samanvayalakṣaṇe keyamakāṇḍe virodhāvirodhacintā, bhavitā hi tasyāḥ	aTa samanvaya lakzaNe kA iyam akANxe viroDa aviroDa cintA, BavitA hi tasyAH
   sthānamavirodhalakṣaṇamityata āha  # pratipāditaṃ brahmaṇa iti.# /	sTAnam aviroDa lakzaNam iti atas Aha # pratipAditam brahmaNaH iti.# /
   ayamarthaḥ nānekaśākhāgatatattadvākyālocanayā vākyārthāvagame paryavasite	ayam arTaH na aneka SAKA gata tad tad vAkya AlocanayA vAkya arTa avagame paryavasite
   sati pramāṇāntaravirodhena	sati pramANa antara viroDena
   vākyārthāgateraprāmāṇyamāśaṅkyāvirodhavyutpādanena	vAkya arTa AgateH aprAmANyam ASaFkya aviroDa vyutpAdanena
   prāmāṇyavyavasthāpanamavirodhalakṣaṇārthaḥ /	prAmANya vyavasTApanam aviroDa lakzaNa arTaH /
   prāsaṅgikaṃ tu tatra sṛṣṭiviṣayāṇāṃ vākyānāṃ	prAsaFgikam tu tatra sRzwi vizayANAm vAkyAnAm
   parasparamavirodhapratipādanaṃ na tu lakṣaṇārthaḥ /	parasparam aviroDa pratipAdanam na tu lakzaNa arTaH /
   tatprayojanaṃ ca tatraiva pratipādayiṣyate /	tad prayojanam ca tatra eva pratipAdayizyate /
   iha tu vākyānāṃ sṛṣṭipratipādakānāṃ parasparavirodhe brahmaṇi jagadyonau	iha tu vAkyAnAm sRzwi pratipAdakAnAm paraspara viroDe brahmaNi jagat yonO
   na samanvayaḥ seddhumarhati /	na samanvayaH sedDum arhati /
   tathāca na jagatkāraṇatvaṃ brahmaṇo lakṣaṇaṃ, naca tatra gatisāmānyaṃ,	taTA ca na jagat kAraNa tvam brahmaNaH lakzaNaM, na ca tatra gati sAmAnyaM,
   naca tatsiddhaye pradhānasyāśabdatvapratipādanaṃ, tasmādvākyānāṃ	na ca tad sidDaye praDAnasya aSabda tva pratipAdanaM, tasmAt vAkyAnAm
   virodhāvirodhābyāmuktārthākṣepasamādhānābhyāṃ samanvayaḥ evopapādyata iti	viroDa aviroDa abya amukta arTa Akzepa samADAnAByAm samanvayaH eva upapAdyate iti
   samanvayalakṣaṇe saṃgatamidamadhikaraṇam /	samanvaya lakzaNe saMgatam idam aDikaraNam /
   'vākyānāṃ kāraṇe kārye parasparavirodhataḥ /	avAkyAnAm kAraNe kArye paraspara viroDataH /
   samanvayo jagadyonau na sidhyati parātmani //	samanvayaH jagat yonO na siDyati para Atmani //
   ' 'sadeva somyedamagra āsīt' ityādīnāṃ kāraṇaviṣayāṇāṃ, 'asadvā idamatra	a asat eva somya idam agre AsIt a ityAdInAm kAraNa vizayANAM, aasat vA idam atra
   āsīt' ityādibhirvākyaiḥ kāraṇaviṣayairvirodhaḥ /	AsIt a ityAdiBiH vAkyEH kAraNa vizayEH viroDaH /
   kāryaviṣayāṇāmapi vibhinnakramākramotpattipratipādakānāṃ virodhaḥ /	kArya vizayANAm api viBinna krama Akrama utpatti pratipAdakAnAm viroDaH /
   tathāhi kānicidanyakartṛkā jagadutpattimācakṣate vākyani /	taTA hi kA nicid anya kartRkA jagat utpattim Acakzate vAkyani /
   kānicitsvayaṅkartṛkām /	kAnicid svayaFkartRkAm /
   sṛṣṭyā ca kāryeṇa tatkāraṇatayā brahma lakṣitam /	sRzwyA ca kAryeNa tad kAraNa tayA brahma lakzitam /
   sṛṣṭivipratipattau tatkāraṇatāyāṃ brahmalakṣaṇe vipratipattau satyāṃ	sRzwi vipratipattO tad kAraNa tAyAm brahma lakzaNe vipratipattO satyAm
   bhavati tallakṣye brahmaṇyapi vipratipatti /	Bavati tat lakzye brahmaNi api vipratipatti /
   tasmādbrahmaṇi samanvayābhāvānna samanvayāgamyaṃ brahma /	tasmAt brahmaNi samanvaya aBAvAt na samanvaya agamyam brahma /
   vedāntāstu kartrādipratipādanena karmavidhiparatayopacaritārthā	vedAntAH tu kartR Adi pratipAdanena karma viDi para tayA upacarita arTA
   avivakṣitārthā vā japopayogina iti prāptam /	avivakzita arTAH vA japa upayoginaH iti prAptam /
   kramādīti /	krama Adi iti /
   ādigrahaṇenākramo gṛhyate /	Adi grahaNena AkramaH gRhyate /
   evaṃ prāpta ucyate 'sargakramavivāde 'pi na sa sṛṣṭari vidyate /	evam prAptaH ucyate  asarga krama vivAde api na sa sRzwari vidyate /
   satastvasadvaco bhaktyā nirākāryatayā kkacit //	sataH tu asat vacaH BaktyA nirAkArya tayA kkacid //
   ' na tāvadasti sṛṣṭikrame vigānaṃ, śrutīnāmavirodhāt /	a na tAvat asti sRzwi krame vigAnaM, SrutInAm aviroDAt /
   tathāhi anekaśilpaparyavadāto devadattaḥ prathamaṃ cakradaṇḍādi karoti,	taTA hi aneka Silpa paryavadAtaH devadattaH praTamam cakradaNxa Adi karoti,
   atha tadupakaraṇaḥ kumbhaṃ, kumbhopakaraṇaścāharatyudakaṃ,	aTa tad upakaraNaH kumBaM, kumBa upakaraNaH ca aharati udakaM,
   udakopakaraṇaśca saṃyavanena godhūmakaṇikānāṃ karoti piṇḍaṃ,	udaka upakaraNaH ca saMyavanena goDUma kaNikAnAm karoti piNxaM,
   piṇḍopakaraṇastu paṭati ghṛtapūrṇaṃ, tadasya devadattasya sarvatraitāsmin	piNxa upakaraNaH tu pawati GRta pUrNaM, tat asya devadattasya sarvatra etAsmin
   kartṛtvācchakyaṃ vaktuṃ devadattāccakrādi saṃbhūtaṃ tasmāccakrādeḥ	kartR tvAt Sakyam vaktum deva dattAt cakra Adi saMBUtam tasmAt cakra AdeH
   kumbhādīti /	kumBa Adi iti /
   śakyaṃ ca devadattātkumbhaḥ samudbhūtastasmādudakāharaṇādītyādi /	Sakyam ca devadattAt kumBaH samudBUtaH tasmAt udaka AharaNa Adi ityAdi /
   nahyastyasaṃbhavaḥ sarvatrāsmin kāryajāte kramavatyapi devadattasya	na hi asti asaMBavaH sarvatra asmin kArya jAte kramavatI api devadattasya
   sākṣātkarturanusyūtatvāt /	sAkzAt kartuH anusyUta tvAt /
   tathehāpi yadyapyākāśādikrameṇaiva sṛṣṭistathāpyākāśānakālānilādau tatra	taTA iha api yadi api AkASa Adi krameNa eva sRzwiH taTA api AkASAn akAla anila AdO tatra
   tatra sākṣāt parameśvarasya kartṛtvācchakyaṃ vaktuṃ parameśvarādākāśaḥ	tatra sAkzAt parameSvarasya kartR tvAt Sakyam vaktum parameSvarAt AkASaH
   saṃbhūta iti /	saMBUtaH iti /

   svātantryalakṣaṇasya mukhyasya brahmaṇyeva saṃbhavādanyeṣāṃ	svAtantrya lakzaNasya muKyasya brahmaNi eva saMBavAt anyezAm

   ityāderjīvādhikaraṇabhavanāpādanapraśnasya 'yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana	iti AdeH jIva aDikaraNa Bavana ApAdana praSnasya ayadA suptaH svapnam na kaQcana
   paśyatyathāsmin prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati' ityāderuttasya ca	paSyati aTa asmin prANaH eva ekaDA Bavati a iti AdeH uttasya ca
   brahmaṇyevopapatterbrahmaviṣayatvaṃ niścīyate /	brahmaNi eva upapatteH brahma vizaya tvam niScIyate /
   atha kasmānna bhavato hiraṇyagarbhagocare eva praśnottare,	aTa kasmAt na BavataH hiraNyagarBa gocare eva praSna uttare,
   tathā ca naitābhyāṃ brahmaviṣayatvasiddhirityetannirācikīrṣuḥ	taTA ca na etAByAm brahma vizaya tva sidDiH iti etat nirAcikIrzuH

   # etaduktaṃ bhavati.# /	# etat uktam Bavati.# /

   so 'yaṃ suptapuruṣotthāpanena prāṇādivyatiriktopadeśa iti //18 //	saH ayam supta puruza utTApanena prANa Adi vyatirikta upadeSaH iti //18 //

   tattacchabdabhedaḥ /	tad tad Sabda BedaH /

   śrutiḥ 'sa yathārdraidho 'grerabhyāhitasya pṛthagdhūnā viniścarantyevaṃ vā	SrutiH  asa yaTA Ardra eDaH agreH aByAhitasya pRTak DUnAH viniScaranti evam vA

   mantra uktaḥ /	mantraH uktaH /

   visphuliṅgānāmupādānām /	visPuliFgAnAm upAdAnAm /
   atha tato visphuliṅgā vyuccaranti /	aTa tatas visPuliFgAH vyuccaranti /
   na caite 'gnestattvānyatvābhyāṃ śakyantaṃ nirvuktam /	na ca ete agneH tattva anya tvAByAm Sakyantam nirvuktam /

   nimittakāraṇeṣveva nopādāneṣu karhicit //	nimitta kAraNezu eva na upAdAnezu karhicit //

   āgamasya kāraṇamātre paryavasānādanumānasya tadviśeṣaniyamamāgamo na	Agamasya kAraNa mAtre paryavasAnAt anumAnasya tad viSeza niyamam AgamaH na
   pratikṣipatyapi tvanumanyata evetyāha  # pāriśeṣyādbrahmaṇo 'nyaditi.# /	pratikzipati api tu anumanyataH eva iti Aha # pAriSezyAt brahmaNaH anyat iti.# /
   brahmopādānatvasya prasaktasya pratiṣedhe	brahma upAdAna tvasya prasaktasya pratizeDe
   'nyatrāprasaṅgātsāṃkhyasmṛtiprasiddhamānumānikaṃ pradhānaṃ śiṣyata iti /	anyatra aprasaFgAt sAMKya smRti prasidDa mAnumAnikam praDAnam Sizyate iti /
   ekavijñānena ca sarvavijñānapratijñānam 'uta tamādeśam' ityādinā, 'yathā	eka vijQAnena ca sarva vijQAna pratijQAnam auta tam AdeSam a ityAdinA, ayaTA
   somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍena' iti ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ, paramātmanaḥ prādhānyaṃ sūcayataḥ	somya ekena mRd piNxena a iti ca dRzwAntaH, paramAtmanaH prADAnyam sUcayataH
   yathā somaśarmaṇaikena jñātena sarve kaṭhā jñātā bhavanti /	yaTA somaSarmaNA ekena jQAtena sarve kaWAH jQAtAH Bavanti /
   evaṃ prāpta ucyate #  prakṛtiśca.# /	evam prAptaH ucyate #  prakRtiH ca.# /
   na kevalaṃ brahma nimittakāraṇaṃ, kutaḥ, pratijñādṛṣṭāntayoranuparodhāt /	na kevalam brahma nimitta kAraNaM, kutaH, pratijQA dRzwAntayoH anuparoDAt /
   nimittakāraṇatvamātre tu tāvuparudhyeyātām /	nimitta kAraNatva mAtre tu tO= uparuDyeyAtAm /
   tathāhiḥ 'na mukhye saṃbhavatyarthe jaghanyā vṛttiriṣyate /	taTA hiH  ana muKye saMBavati arTe jaGanyA vRttiH izyate /
   na cānumānikaṃ yuktamāgamenāpabādhitam //	na ca anumAnikam yuktam Agamena apabADitam //
   sarve hi tāvadvedāntāḥ paurvāparyeṇa vīkṣitāḥ /	sarve hi tAvat vedAntAH pOrvAparyeNa vIkzitAH /
   aikāntikādvaitaparā dvaitamātraniṣedhataḥ //	EkAntikA dvEta parAH dvEta mAtra nizeDataH //
   ' tadihāpi pratijñādṛṣṭāntau mukhyārthāveva yuktau na tu 'yajamānaḥ	a tat iha api pratijQA dRzwAntO muKya arTO= eva yuktO na tu ayajamAnaH
   prastaraḥ' itivadguṇakalpanayā netavyau, tasyārthavādasyātatparatvāt /	prastaraH a iti vat guNa kalpanayA netavyO, tasya arTa vAdasya atatparatvAt /
   pratijñādṛṣṭantavākyayostvadvaitaparatvādupādānakāraṇātmakatvāccopādeyasya	pratijQA dRzwanta vAkyayoH tvad vEta para tvAt upAdAnakAraNa Atmaka tvAt ca upAdeyasya
   kāryajātasyopādānajñānena tajjñānopapatteḥ /	kArya jAtasya upAdAna jQAnena tad jQAna upapatteH /
   nimittakāraṇaṃ tu kāryādatyantabhinnamiti na tajjñāne kāryajñānaṃ bhavati	nimitta kAraNam tu kAryAt atyanta Binnam iti na tad jQAne kArya jQAnam Bavati
   ato brahmopādānakāraṇaṃ jagataḥ /	atas brahma upAdAna kAraNam jagataH /
   naca brahmaṇo 'nyannimittakāraṇaṃ jagata ityapi yuktam /	na ca brahmaNaH anyat nimitta kAraNam jagataH iti api yuktam /
   pratijñādṛṣṭāntoparodhādeva /	pratijQA dRzwAnta uparoDAt eva /
   nahi tadānīṃ brahmaṇi jñāte sarvaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati /	na hi tadAnIm brahmaNi jQAte sarvam vijQAtam Bavati /
   jagannimittakāraṇasya brahmaṇo 'nyasya	jagat nimitta kAraNasya brahmaNaH anyasya
   sarvamadhyapātinastajjñānenāvijñānāt /	sarva maDya pAtinaH tad jQAnena avijQAnAt /
   yata iti ca pañcamī na kāraṇamātre smaryate api tu prakṛtau, 'janikartuḥ	yatas iti ca paQcamI na kAraNa mAtre smaryate api tu prakRtO, ajanikartuH
   prakṛtiḥ' iti /	prakRtiH a iti /
   tato 'pi prakṛtitvamavagacchāmaḥ /	tatas api prakRti tvam avagacCAmaH /
   dundubhigrahaṇaṃ dundubhyāghātagrahaṇaṃ ca	dunduBi grahaNam dunduBi AGAta grahaNam ca
   tadgataśabdatvasāmānyopalakṣaṇārtham //23 //	tad gata Sabda tva sAmAnya upalakzaNa arTam //23 //
   anāgatecchāsaṃkalpo 'bhidhyā /	anAgata icCA saMkalpaH aBiDyA /
   etayā khalu svātantryalakṣaṇena kartṛtvena nimittatvaṃ darśitam /	etayA Kalu svAtantrya lakzaNena kartR tvena nimitta tvam darSitam /
   'bahu syām' iti ca svaviṣayatayopādānatvamuktam //24 //	abahu syAm a iti ca sva vizaya tayA upAdAna tvam uktam //24 //
   # ākāśādeva.# /	# AkASAt eva.# /
   brahmaṇa evetyarthaḥ /	brahmaNaH eva iti arTaH /
   sākṣāditi ceti sūtrāvayavamanūdya tasyārthaṃ vyācaṣṭe  # ākāśādeveti.# /	sAkzAt iti ca iti sUtra avayavam anUdya tasya arTam vyAcazwe # AkASAt eva iti.# /
   śrutirbrahmaṇo jagadupādānatvamavadhārayantī upādānāntarābhāvaṃ sākṣādeva	SrutiH brahmaNaH jagat upAdAna tvam avaDArayantI upAdAna antara aBAvam sAkzAt eva
   darśayatīti # sākṣāditi.#sūtrāvayavena darśitamiti yojanā //25 //	darSayati iti # sAkzAt iti.#sUtra avayavena darSitam iti yojanAH //25 //
   # ātmakṛteḥ pariṇāmāt.# /	# Atma kRteH pariNAmAt.# /
   prakṛtigrahaṇamupalakṣaṇaṃ, nimittamityapi draṣṭavyaṃ,	prakRti grahaNam upalakzaNan, nimittam iti api drazwavyaM,
   karmatvenopādānatvātkartṛtvena ca tatprati nimittatvāt /	karma tvena upAdAna tvAt kartR tvena ca tat prati nimitta tvAt /
   # kathaṃ punariti.# /	# kaTam punar iti.# /
   siddhasādhyayorekatrāsamavāyo virodhāditi /	sidDa sADyayoH eka tra asamavAyaH viroDAt iti /
   # pariṇāmāditi brūma iti.# /	# pariNAmAt iti brUmaH iti.# /
   pūrvasiddhasyāpyanirvacanīyavikārātmanā pariṇāmo	pUrva sidDasya api anirvacanIya vikAra AtmanA pariNAmaH 
   'nirvacanīyatvādbhedenābhinna iveti siddhasyāpi sādhyatvamityarthaḥ /	anirvacanIya tvAt Bedena aBinnaH iva iti sidDasya api sADya tvam iti arTaH /
   ekavākyatvena vyākhyāyā pariṇāmādityavacchinna vyācaṣṭe  # pariṇāmāditi	eka vAkya tvena vyAKyAyA pariNAmAt iti a vacCinna vyAcazwe # pariNAmAt iti
   veti.# /	vA iti.# /
   saccatyacceti dve brahmaṇo rūpe /	sat catyat ca iti dve brahmaNaH rUpe /
   sacca sāmānyaviśeṣeṇāparokṣatayā nirvācyaṃ, pṛthivyaptejolakṣaṇam /	sat ca sAmAnya viSezeNa aparokza tayA nirvAcyan, pRTivI ap tejaH lakzaNam /
   tyacca parokṣamata evānirvācyamidantayā vāṭvākāśalakṣaṇaṃ, kathaṃ ca	tyat ca parokzam atas eva anirvAcyam idantayA vA awu AkASa lakzaNaM, kaTam ca
   tadbrahmaṇo rūpaṃ yadi tasya brahmopādānaṃ, tasmātpariṇāmādbrahma bhūtānāṃ	tat brahmaNaH rUpam yadi tasya brahma upAdAnan, tasmAt pariNAmAt brahma BUtAnAm
   prakṛtiriti //26 //	prakRtiH iti //26 //
   pūrvapakṣiṇo 'numānamanubhāṣyāgamavirodhena dūṣayati #  yatpunariti.# /	pUrva pakziNaH anumAnam anuBAzya Agama viroDena dUzayati #  yat punar iti.# /
   etaduktaṃ bhavati īśvaro jagato nimittakāraṇameva īkṣāpūrvajagatkartṛtvāt,	etat uktam Bavati ISvaraH jagataH nimitta kAraNam eva IkzA pUrva jagat kartR tvAt,
   kumbhakartukulālavat /	kumBaka Rtu kulAla vat /
   atreśvarasyāsiddherāśrayāsiddho hetuḥ pakṣaścāprasiddhaviśeṣaḥ /	atra ISvarasya asidDeH ASraya asidDaH hetuH pakzaH ca aprasidDa viSezaH /
   yathāhuḥ 'nānupalabdhe nyāyaḥ pravartate' iti /	yaTA AhuH  anAnupalabDe nyAyaH pravartate a iti /
   āgamāttatsiddhiriti cet, hanta tarhi yādṛśamīśvaramāgamo gamayati tādṛśo	AgamAt tad sidDiH iti cet, hanta tarhi yAdRSam ISvaram AgamaH gamayati tAdRSaH 
   'bhyupagatavyaḥ sa ca nimittakāraṇaṃ copādānakāraṇaṃ ceśvaramavagamayati /	aByupagatavyaH sa ca nimitta kAraNam ca upAdAna kAraNam ca ISvaram avagamayati /
   viśeṣyāśrayagrāhyāgamavirodhānnānumānamudetamurhatīti kutastena	viSezya ASraya grAhya Agama viroDAt na anumAnam udetam urhati iti kutas tena
   nimittatvāvadhāraṇetyarthaḥ /	nimitta tva avaDAraNA iti arTaH /
   iyaṃ copādānapariṇāmādibhāṣā na vikārābhiprāyeṇāpi tu tathā	iyam ca upAdAna pariNAma Adi BAzA na vikAra aBiprAyeNa api tu taTA
   sarpasyopādānaṃ rajjurevaṃ brahma jagadupādānaṃ draṣṭavyam /	sarpasya upAdAnam rajjuH evam brahma jagat upAdAnam drazwavyam /
   na khalu nityasya niṣphalasya brahmaṇaḥ sarvātmanaikadeśena vā pariṇāmaḥ	na Kalu nityasya nizPalasya brahmaNaH sarva AtmanA eka deSena vA pariNAmaH
   saṃbhavati, nityatvādanekadeśatvādityuktam /	saMBavati, nitya tvAt aneka deSa tvAt iti uktam /
   naca mṛdaḥ śaravādayo bhidyante, na cābhinnāḥ, na vā bhinnābhinnāḥ	na ca mRdaH Sarava AdayaH Bidyante, na ca aBinnAH, na vA Binna aBinnAH
   kintvanirvacanīyā eva /	kintu a nirvacanIyAH eva /
   yathāha śrutiḥ 'mṛttiketyeva satyam' iti /	yaTA Aha SrutiH  amRttikA iti eva satyam a iti /
   tasmādadvaitopakramādupasaṃhārācca sarva eva vedāntā aikāntikādvaitaparāḥ	tasmAt advEta upakramAt upasaMhArAt ca sarve eva vedAntAH EkAntikAt vEta parAH
   santaḥ sākṣādeva kkacidadvaitamāhuḥ, kkaciddvaitaniṣedhena,	santaH sAkzAt eva kkacid advEtam AhuH, kkacid dvEta nizeDena,
   kkacidbrahmopādānatvena jagataḥ /	kkacid brahma upAdAna tvena jagataH /
   etāvatāpi tāvadbhedo niṣiddho bhavati, na tūpādānatvābhidhānamātreṇa	etAvatA api tAvat BedaH nizidDaH Bavati, na tu upAdAna tva aBiDAna mAtreNa
   vikāragraha āstheyaḥ /	vikAra grahaH AsTeyaH /
   nahi vākyaikadeśasyārtho 'stīti //27 //	na hi vAkya eka deSasya arTaH asti iti //27 //
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   mā bhūtpradhānaṃ jagadupādānaṃ tathāpi na brahmopādānatvaṃ sidhyati,	mA BUt praDAnam jagat upAdAnam taTA api na brahma upAdAna tvam siDyati,
   paramāṇavādīnāmapi tadupādānānāmupaplavamānatvāt, teṣāmapi hi	paramANava AdInAm api tad upAdAnAnAm upaplavamAna tvAt, tezAm api hi
   kiñcidupodbalakamasti vaidikaṃ liṅgamityāśaṅkāmapanetumāha sūtrakāraḥ  #	kiQcid upodbalakam asti vEdikam liFgam iti ASaFkAm apanetum Aha sUtra kAraH #
   etena sarve vyākhyātā vyākhyātāḥ.# /	etena sarve vyAKyAtAH vyAKyAtAH.# /
   nigadavyākhyātena bhāṣyeṇa vyākhyātaṃ sūtram /	nigada vyAKyAtena BAzyeNa vyAKyAtam sUtram /
   'pratijñālakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyamāṇe padasamanvayaḥ vaidikaḥ sa ca tatraiva	apratijQA lakzaNam lakzyamANe pada samanvayaH vEdikaH sa ca tatra eva
   nānyatretyatra sādhitam //28 //	na anyatra iti atra sADitam //28 //
   ' iti śrīmadvācaspatimiśraviracite śrīmacchārīrakabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ	a iti SrImat vAcaspati miSravi racite SrImat SArIraka BAzya viBAge BAmatyAm
   prathamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //4 //	praTama aDyAyasya caturTaH pAdaH //4 //
   iti prathamādhyāye 'vyaktādisaṃdigdhapadamātrasamanvayākhyaścaturthaḥ	iti praTama aDyAye avyakta Adi saMdigDa pada mAtra samanvaya AKyaH caturTaH
   pādaḥ	pAdaH
   iti śrīmadbrahmasūtraśāṅkarabhāṣye samanvayākhyaḥ prathamo 'dhyāyaḥ	iti SrImat brahmasUtra SAFkara BAzye samanvaya AKyaH praTamaH aDyAyaH
   ____________________________Adhyāya 2____________________________ /	____________________________ADyAyaH 2____________________________ /
   # atha dvitīyo 'dhyāyaḥ.# /	# aTa dvitIyaH aDyAyaH.# /
   # smṛtyanavakāśadoṣaprasaṅga iti cennānyasmṛtyanavakāśadoṣaprasaṅgāt.# /	# smRti anavakASa doza prasaFgaH iti ced na anya smRti anavakASa doza prasaFgAt.# /
   vṛttavartiṣyamāṇayoḥ samanvayavirodhaparihāralakṣaṇayoḥ	vRttavartizyamANayoH samanvaya viroDa parihAra lakzaNayoH
   saṃgatipradarśanāya sukhagrahaṇasya caitanyoḥ saṃkṣepatastātparyārthamāha 	saMgati pradarSanAya suKa grahaNasya cEtanyoH saMkzepataH tAtparya arTam Aha 
   # prathame 'dhyāya iti.# /	# praTame aDyAyaH iti.# /
   anapekṣavedāntavākyasvarasasiddhasamanvayalakṣaṇasya	anapekza veda anta vAkya svarasa sidDa samanvaya lakzaNasya
   virodhatatparihārābhyāmākṣepasamādhānakaraṇādanena lakṣaṇenāsti	viroDa tad parihArAByAm Akzepa samADAna karaNAt anena lakzaNena asti
   viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ saṃbandhaḥ /	vizaya vizayi BAvaH saMbanDaH /
   pūrvalakṣaṇārtho hi viṣaśayastadgocaratvādākṣepasamādhānayoreṣa ca	pUrva lakzaNa arTaH hi viza SayaH tad gocara tvAt Akzepa samADAnayoH eza ca
   viṣayīti /	vizayi iti /
   tadevamadhyāyamavatārya tadavayavamadhikaraṇamavatārayati  # tatra	tat evam aDyAyam avatArya tat avayavam aDikaraNam avatArayati # tatra
   prathamaṃ tāvaditi.# /	praTamam tAvat iti.# /
   tantryate vyutpādyate mokṣasādhanamaneneti tantraṃ, tadevākhyā yasyāḥ sā	tantryate vyutpAdyate mokza sADanam anena iti tantraM, tat eva AKyAH yasyAH sA
   smṛtistantrākhyā paramarṣiṇā kapilenādividuṣā praṇītā /	smRtiH tantra AKyA parama RziNA kapilena Adi viduzA praNItA /
   anyāścāsuripañcaśikhādipraṇītā smṛtayastadanusāriṇyaḥ /	anyAH ca Asuri paQca SiKA Adi praNItA smRtayaH tad anusAriNyaH /
   na khalvamūṣāṃ smṛtīnāṃ manvādismṛtivadanyo 'vakāśaḥ śakyo vaditumṛte	na Kalu a mUzAm smRtInAm manu Adi smRti vat anyaH avakASaH SakyaH vaditum Rte
   mokṣasādhanaprakāśanāt /	mokza sADana prakASanAt /
   tadapi cennābhidadhyuranavakāśāḥ satyo 'pramāṇaṃ prasajyeran /	tat api ced nABi daDi uH anavakASAH satyaH apramANam prasajyeran /
   tasmāttadavirodhena kathañcidvedāntā vyākhyātavyāḥ /	tasmAt tat aviroDena kaTaQcid veda antAH vyAKyAtavyAH /
   pūrvapakṣamākṣipati  # kathaṃ punarīkṣatyādibhya iti.# /	pUrva pakzam Akzipati # kaTam punar Ikzati AdiByaH iti.# /
   prasādhitaṃ khalu dharmamīmāṃsāyāṃ 'virodhe tvanapekṣaṃ syādasati	prasADitam Kalu Darma mImAMsAyAm aviroDe tu anapekzam syAt asati
   hyanumānam' ityatra, yathā śrutiviruddhānāṃ smṛtīnāṃ	hi anumAnam a iti atra, yaTA Sruti virudDAnAm smRtInAm
   durbalatayānapekṣaṇīyatvaṃ tasmānna durbalānurodhena balīyasīnāṃ śrutīnāṃ	durbala tayA anapekzaNIya tvam tasmAt na durbala anuroDena balIyasInAm SrutInAm
   yuktamupavarṇanam, api tu svataḥsiddhapramāṇabhāvāḥ śrutayo durbalāḥ	yuktam upavarNa nam, api tu svatas sidDa pramANa BAvAH SrutayaH durbalAH
   smṛtīrbādhanta eveti yuktam /	smRtIH bADantaH eva iti yuktam /
   pūrvapakṣī samādhatte  # bhavedayamiti.# /	pUrva pakzI samADatte # Bavet ayam iti.# /
   prasādhito 'pyarthaḥ śraddhājaḍānprati punaḥ prasādhyata ityarthaḥ /	prasADitaH api arTaH SradDA jaxAn prati punar prasADyate iti arTaH /
   āpātataḥ samādhānamuktvā paramasamādhānamāha pūrvapakṣī  #	ApAtatas samADAnam uktvA parama samADAnam Aha pUrva pakzI #
   kapilaprabhṛtīnāṃ cārṣamiti.# /	kapila praBRtInAm ca Arzam iti.# /
   ayamasyābhaisaṃdhiḥ brahma hi śāstrasya kāraṇamuktaṃ 'śāstrayonitvāt' iti,	ayam asya ABEsaMDiH brahma hi SAstrasya kAraNam uktam aSAstra yoni tvAt a iti,
   tenaiṣa vedarāśirbrahmaprabhavaḥ	tena eza veda rASiH brahma praBavaH
   sannājānasiddhānāvaraṇabhūtārthamātragocaratabuddhaipūrvako yathā tathā	sanna ajAna sidDa an AvaraNa BUta arTa mAtra gocarata budDEpUrvakaH yaTA taTA
   kapilādīnāmapi śrutismṛtiprathitājānasiddhabhāvānāṃ smṛtayo	kapila AdInAm api Sruti smRti praTita ajAna sidDa BAvAnAm smRtayo
   'nāvaraṇasarvaviṣayatadbuddhiprabhavā iti na śrutibhyo 'mūṣāmasti	anAvaraNa sarva vizaya tad budDi praBavAH iti na SrutiByaH amUzAm asti
   kaścidviśeṣaḥ /	kaScid viSezaH /
   na caitāḥ sphuṭataraṃ pradhānādipratipādanaparāḥ śakyante 'nmathayitacum /	na ca etAH sPuwataram praDAna Adi pratipAdana parAH Sakyante anmaTayitacum /
   tasmāttadanurodhena kathañcicchutaya eva netavyāḥ /	tasmAt tad anuroDena kaTaQcid SutayaH eva netavyAH /
   api ca tarko 'pi kapilādismṛtiranumanyate, tasmādapyetadeva prāptam /	api ca tarkaH api kapila Adi smRtiH anumanyate, tasmAt api etat eva prAptam /
   evaṃ prāpta āha  # tasya samādhiriti.# /	evam prAptaH Aha # tasya samADiH iti.# /
   yathā hi śrutīnāmavigānaṃ brahmaṇi gatisāmānyāt, naiṣaṃ	yaTA hi SrutInAm avigAnam brahmaNi gati sAmAnyAt, na ezam
   smṛtīnāmavigānamasti pradhāne, tāsāṃ bhūyasīnāṃ	smRtInAm avigAnam asti praDAne, tAsAm BUyasInAm
   brahmopādānatvapratipādanaparāṇāṃ tatra tatra darśanāt /	brahma upAdAna tva pratipAdana parANAm tatra tatra darSanAt /
   tasmādavigānācchraita evārtha āvastheyo na tu smārto vigānāditi /	tasmAt avigAnAt SrEtaH eva arTaH AvasTeyaH na tu smArtaH vigAnAt iti /
   tatkimidānīṃ parasparavigānātsarvā eva smṛtayo 'vaheyā ityata āha  #	tat kim idAnIm paraspara vigAnAt sarvAH eva smRtayaH avaheyAH iti atas Aha #
   vipratipattau ca smṛtīnāmiti /	vipratipattO ca smRtInAm iti /
   na cātīndriyārthāniti.# /	na ca atIndriya arTa aniti.# /
