   na cehāsti samānaviṣayatā, dharmavadbrahmaṇo 'pi	na ca iha asti samAna vizaya tA, Darmavat brahmaNaH api
   mānāntarāviṣayatayātarkyatvenānapekṣāmnāyaikagocaratvādityarthaḥ /	mAna antara avizaya tayA tarkya tvena anapekza AmnAya eka gocara tvAt iti arTaH /
   samādhatte  # bhavedayamiti.# /	samADatte # Bavet ayam iti.# /
   'mānāntarasyāviṣayaḥ siddhavastvavagāhinaḥ /	amAna antarasya avizayaH sidDa vastu avagAhinaH /
   dharmo 'stu kāryarūpatvādbrahma siddhaṃ tu gocaraḥ //	DarmaH astu kArya rUpa tvAt brahma sidDam tu gocaraH //
   ' tasmātsamānaviṣayatvādastyatra tarkasyāvakāśaḥ /	a tasmAt samAna vizaya tvAt asti atra tarkasya avakASaH /
   nanvastu virodhaḥ, tathāpi tarkādare ko heturityata āha  # yathā ca	nanu astu viroDaH, taTA api tarka Adare kaH hetuH iti atas Aha # yaTA ca
   śrutīnāmiti.# /	SrutInAm iti.# /
   sāvakāśā vahvayo 'pi śrutayo 'navakāśaikaśrutivirodhe tadanuguṇatayā yathā	sa avakASAH vahvayaH api SrutayaH anavakASa eka Sruti viroDe tad anuguNa tayA yaTA
   nīyante evamanavakāśaikatarkavirodhe tadanuguṇatayā bahvayo 'pi śrutayo	nIyante evam anavakASa eka tarka viroDe tad anuguNa tayA bahvayaH api Srutayo
   guṇakalpanādibhirvyākhyānamarhantītyarthaḥ /	guNa kalpanAdiBiH vyAKyAnam arhanti iti arTaH /
   api ca brahmasākṣātkāro virodhitayānādimavidyāṃ nivartayan dṛṣṭenaiva	api ca brahma sAkzAtkAraH viroDita yA ana AdimavidyAm nivartayan dRzwena eva
   rūpeṇa mokṣasādhanamiṣyate /	rUpeNa mokza sADanam izyate /
   tatra brahmasākṣātkārasya mokṣasādhanatayā pradhānasyānumānaṃ	tatra brahma sAkzAtkArasya mokza sADana tayA praDAnasya anumAnam
   dṛṣṭasādharmyeṇādṛṣṭaviṣayaṃ viṣayato 'ntaraṅgaṃ, bahiraṅgaṃ	dRzwa sADarmyeNa adRzwa vizayam vizayataH antaraFgaM, bahis aFgam
   tvatyantaparokṣagocaraṃ śābdaṃ jñānaṃ, tena	tu atyanta parokza gocaram SAbdam jQAnaM, tena
   pradhānapratyāsattyāpyanumānameva balīya ityāha  # dṛṣṭasādharmyeṇa ceti.#	praDAna pratyAsattyA api anumAnam eva balIyaH iti Aha # dRzwa sADarmyeNa ca iti.#
   api ca śrutyāpi brahmaṇi tarka ādṛta ityāha  # śrutiriti.# /	api ca SrutyA api brahmaNi tarkaH AdRtaH iti Aha # SrutiH iti.# /
   so 'yaṃ brahmaṇo jagadupādānatvākṣepaḥ punastarkeṇa prastūyate 'prakṛtyā	saH ayam brahmaNaH jagat upAdAna tva AkzepaH punar tarkeNa prastUyate  aprakRtyA
   ca śrutyāpi vikārāṇāmavasthitam /	ca SrutyA api vikArANAm avasTitam /
   jagadbrahmasarūpaṃ ca neti no tasya vikriyā //	jagat brahma sarUpam ca na iti no tasya vikriyA //
   viśuddhaṃ cetanaṃ brahma jagajjaḍamaśuddhibhāka /	viSudDam cetanam brahma jagat jaxam aSudDi BAka /
   tena pradhānasārūpyātpradhānasyaiva vikriyā //	tena praDAna sArUpyAt praDAnasya eva vikriyA //
   ' tathāhi eka eva strīkāyaḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakatayā patyuśca sapartnānāṃ	a taTA hi ekaH eva strI kAyaH suKa duHKa moha Atmaka tayA patyuH ca sa partnAnAm
   ca caitrasya ca straiṇasya tāmavindato 'paryāyaṃ sukhaduḥkhaviṣādānādhatte	ca cEtrasya ca strENasya tAm avindataH aparyAyam suKa duHKa vizAdAn ADatte
   striyā ca sarve bhāvā vyākhyātāḥ /	striyA ca sarve BAvAH vyAKyAtAH /
   tasmātsukhaduḥkhamohātmatayā ca svarganarakādyuccāvacaprapañcatayā ca	tasmAt suKa duHKa moha Atma tayA ca svarga naraka Adi uccAvaca prapaQca tayA ca
   jagadaśuddhamacetanaṃ ca, brahma tu cetanaṃ viśuddhaṃ ca, niratiśayatvāt /	jagat aSudDam acetanam ca, brahma tu cetanam viSudDam ca, niratiSaya tvAt /
   tasmātpradhānasyāśuddhasyācetanasya vikāro jaganna tu brahmaṇa iti yuktam	tasmAt praDAnasya aSudDasya acetanasya vikAraH jagat na tu brahmaNaH iti yuktam
   ye tu cetanabrahmavikāratayā jagaccaitanyamāhustānpratyāha  # acetanaṃ	ye tu cetana brahma vikAra tayA jagat cEtanyam AhuH tAn pratyAha # acetanam
   cedaṃ jagaditi.# /	ca idam jagat iti.# /
   vyabhicāraṃ codayati nanu cetanamapīti /	vyaBicAram codayati nanu cetanam api iti /
   pariharati  # na svāmibhṛtyayorapīti.# /	pariharati # na svAmi BRtyayoH api iti.# /
   nanu mā nāma sākṣāccetanaścetanāntarasyopakāṣīnt,	nanu mA nAma sAkzAt cetanaH cetana antarasya upakAzInt,
   tatkāryakaraṇabuddhyādiniyogadvāreṇa tūpakariṣyatītyata āha  # niratiśayā	tad kArya karaNa budDi Adi niyoga dvAreNa tu upakarizyati iti atas Aha # niratiSayA
   hyakartāraścetanā iti.# /	hi akartAraH cetanA iti.# /
   upajanāpāyavaddharmayogo 'tiśayaḥ, tadabhāvo niratiśayatvam /	upajana apAya vat Darma yogaH atiSayaH, tad aBAvaH niratiSaya tvam /
   ata eva nirvyāpāratvādakartāraḥ /	atas eva nirvyApAra tvAt akartAraH /
   tasmātteṣāṃ buddhyādiprayoktṛtvamapi nāstītyarthaḥ /	tasmAt tezAm budDi Adi prayoktR tvam api na asti iti arTaH /
   codako 'nuśayabījamuddhāṭayati  # yopīti.# /	ca udakaH anuSaya bIjam udDAwayati # yopI iti.# /
   abhyupetyāpātataḥ samādhānamāha  # tenāpi kathañciditi.# /	aByupetya apAtataH samADAnam Aha # tena api kaTaQcid iti.# /
   paramasādhānaṃ tu sūtrāvayavena vaktuṃ tamevāvatārayati  # na cetaradapi	parama sADAnam tu sUtra avayavena vaktum tam eva avatArayati # na ca itarat api
   vilakṣaṇatvamiti.# /	vilakzaNa tvam iti.# /
   sūtrāvayavābhisaṃdhimāha  # anavagamyamānameva hīdamiti.# /	sUtra avayava aBisaMDi mAha # anavagamyamAnam eva hi idam iti.# /
   śabdārthāt khalu cetanaprakṛtitvāccaitanyaṃ	Sabda arTAt Kalu cetana prakRti tvAt cEtanyam
   pṛthivyādīnāmavagamyamānamupodvalitaṃ mānāntareṇa	pRTivI AdInAm avagamyamAnam upodvalitam mAna antareNa
   sākṣācchūyamāṇamapyacaitanyamanyathayet /	sAkzAt SUyamANam api acEtanyam anyaTayet /
   mānāntarābhāve vārthor'thaḥ śrutyarthenāpabādhanīyaḥ, na tu tadbalena	mAna antara aBAve vA arTor aTaH Sruti arTena apabADanIyaH, na tu tad balena
   śrutyartho 'nyathayitavya ityarthaḥ //4 //	Sruti arTaH anyaTayitavyaH iti arTaH //4 //
   sūtrāntaramavatārayituṃ codayati  # nanu cetanatvamapi kkacidapi.# /	sUtra antaram avatArayitum codayati # nanu cetana tvam api kkacid api.# /
   na pṛthivyādīnāṃ caitanyamāthameva, kintu bhūyasīnāṃ śrutīnāṃ	na pRTivI AdInAm cEtanyam ATam eva, kintu BUyasInAm SrutInAm
   sākṣādevārtha ityarthaḥ /	sAkzAt eva arTaH iti arTaH /
   sūtramavatārayati  # ata uttaraṃ paṭhati abhimānivyapadeśastu	sUtram avatArayati # atas uttaram paWati  aBimAni vyapadeSaH tu
   viśeṣānugatibhyām.# /	viSeza anugatiByAm.# /
   vibhajate  # tuśabda iti.# /	viBajate # tuSabdaH iti.# /
   naitāḥ śrutayaḥ sākṣānmṛdādīnāṃ vāgādīnāṃ ca caitanyamāhuḥ, api tu	na etAH SrutayaH sAkzAt mRd AdInAm vAc AdInAm ca cEtanyam AhuH, api tu
   tadadhiṣṭhātrīṇāṃ devatānāṃ cidātmanāṃ, tenaitacchutibalena na mṛdādīnāṃ	tad aDizWAtrINAm devatAnAm cit AtmanAM, tena etat Suti balena na mRd AdInAm
   vāgādīnāṃ ca caitanyamāśaṅkanīyamiti /	vAc AdInAm ca cEtanyam ASaFkanIyam iti /
   kasmātpunaretadevamityata āha  # viśeṣānugatibhyām.# /	kasmAt punar etat evam iti atas Aha # viSeza anugatiByAm.# /
   tatra viśeṣaṃ vyācaṣṭe  # viśeṣo hīti.# /	tatra viSezam vyAcazwe # viSezaH hi iti.# /
   bhoktṛṇāmupakāryatvādbhūtendriyāṇāṃ copakāratvāt sāmye ca tadanupapatteḥ	BoktRNAm upakArya tvAt BUta indriyANAm ca upakAra tvAt sAmye ca tad anupapatteH
   sarvajanaprasiddheśca 'vijñānaṃ cābhavat' iti śruteśca	sarva jana prasidDeH ca avijQAnam ca aBavat a iti SruteH ca
   viśeṣaścetanācetanalakṣaṇaḥ prāguktaḥ sa nopapadyeta /	viSezaH cetanA acetana lakzaNaH prAk uktaH sa na upapadyeta /
   devatāśabdakṛto vātra viśeṣo viśeṣaśabdenocyata ityāha  # api ca	devatA Sabda kRtaH vA atra viSezaH viSeza Sabdena ucyate iti Aha # api ca
   kauṣītakinaḥ prāṇasaṃvāda iti.# /	kOzItakinaH prANa saMvAdaH iti.# /
   anugatiṃ vyācaṣṭe  # anugatāśceti.# /	anugatim vyAcazwe # anugatAH ca iti.# /
   sarvatra bhūtendriyādiṣvanugatā devatā abhimāninīrūpadiśanti mantrādayaḥ /	sarvatra BUta indriya Adizu anugatAH devatAH aBimAninI rUpa diSanti mantra AdayaH /
   api ca bhūyasyaḥ śrutayaḥ 'agnirvāg bhūtvā mukhaṃ prāviśadvāyuḥ prāṇo	api ca BUyasyaH SrutayaH aagniH vAc BUtvA muKam prAviSat vAyuH prANaH 
   bhūtvā nāsike prāviśadādityaścakṣurbhūtvākṣiṇī prāviśat' ityādaya	BUtvA nAsike prAviSat AdityaH cakzuH BUtvA akziNI prAviSat a iti Adaya
   indriyaviśeṣagatā devatā darśayanti /	indriya viSeza gatAH devatAH darSayanti /

   tatteja aikṣatetyapīti.# /	tat tejaH Ekzata iti api iti.# /
   yadyapi prathame 'dhyāye māktatvena varṇitaṃ tathāpi mukhyatayāpi	yadi api praTame aDyAye mAkta tvena varNitam taTA api muKya tayA api
   kathañcinnetuṃ śakyamiti draṣṭavyam /	kaTaQcid netum Sakyam iti drazwavyam /
   pūrvapakṣamupasaṃharati  # tasmāditi.# //5 //	pUrva pakzam upasaMharati # tasmAt iti.# //5 //
   siddhāntasūtram  # dṛśyate tu.# /	sidDAnta sUtram # dRSyate tu.# /
   prakṛtivikārabhāve hetuṃ sārūpyaṃ vikalpa dūṣayati  # vilakṣaṇatvena ca	prakRti vikAra BAve hetum sArUpyam vikalpa dUzayati # vilakzaNa tvena ca
   kāraṇeneti.# /	kAraNena iti.# /
   sarvasvabhāvānanuvartanaṃ prakṛtivikārabhāvāvirodhi /	sarva svaBAvAn anuvartanam prakRti vikAra BAva aviroDi /
   tadanuvartane tādātmyena prakṛtivikārabhāvābhāvāt /	tad anuvartane tAdAtmyena prakRti vikAra BAva aBAvAt /
   myamastvasiddhaḥ /	myamaH tu asidDaH /
   tṛtīyastu nidarśanābhāvādasādhāraṇa ityarthaḥ /	tRtIyaH tu nidarSana aBAvAt asADAraNaH iti arTaH /
   atha jagadyonitayāgamādbrahmaṇo 'vagamādāgamabādhitaviṣayatvamanumānasya	aTa jagat yonitayA AgamAt brahmaNaH avagamAt Agama bADita vizaya tvam anumAnasya
   kasmānnodbhāvyata ityata āha  # āgamavirodhastviti.# /	kasmAt na udBAvi ate iti atas Aha # Agama viroDaH tu iti.# /
   na cāsminnāgamaikasamadhigamanīye brahmaṇi pramāṇāntarasyāvakāśo 'sti,	na ca asmin= Agama eka samaDigamanIye brahmaNi pramANa antarasya avakASaH asti,
   yena tadupāyāgama ākṣipyetetyāśayavānāha  # yattūktaṃ	yena tad upAya AgamaH Akzipyeta iti ASa yavAn Aha # yattu uktam
   pariniṣpannatvādbrahmaṇīti.# /	parinizpanna tvAt brahmaNi iti.# /
   yathā hi kāryatvāviśeṣa'pi 'ārogyakāmaḥ pathyamaśrīyāt' 'svarakāmaḥ	yaTA hi kAryatva aviSeza api aArogya kAmaH paTyam aSrIyAt a asvara kAmaH
   sikatāṃ bhakṣayet' ityādīnāṃ mānāntarāpekṣatā, na tu 'darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ	sikatAm Bakzayet a ityAdInAm mAna antara apekza tA, na tu adarSa pUrNamAsAByAm
   svargakāmo yajeta' ityādīnām /	svarga kAmaH yajeta a ityAdInAm /
   tatkasya hetoḥ /	tat kasya hetoH /
   asya kāryabhedasya pramāṇāntarāgocaratvāt /	asya kArya Bedasya pramANa antara agocara tvAt /
   evaṃbhūtatvāviśeṣe 'pi pṛthivyādīnāṃ mānāntaragocaratvaṃ, na tu bhūtasyāpi	evaMBUta tva aviSeze api pRTivI AdInAm mAna antara gocara tvan, na tu BUtasya api
   brahmaṇaḥ, tasmāmnāyaikagocarasyātipatitasamastamānāntarasīmatayā	brahmaNaH, tasmAmnAya eka gocarasya ati patita samasta mAna antara sImatayA
   smṛtyāgamasiddhatvādityarthaḥ /	smRti Agama sidDa tvAt iti arTaH /
   yadi smṛtyāgamasiddhaṃ brahmaṇastarkāviṣayatvaṃ, kathaṃ tarhi	yadi smRtyAgama sidDam brahmaNaH tarka avizaya tvan, kaTam tarhi
   śravaṇātiriktamananavidhānamityata āha  # yadapi śravaṇavyatirekeṇeti.# /	SravaNa atirikta manana viDAnam iti atas Aha # yat api SravaNa vyatirekeNa iti.# /
   tarko hi pramāṇaviṣayavivecakatayā taditikartavyatābhūtastadāśrayo 'sati	tarkaH hi pramANa vizaya vivecaka tayA tad itikartavya tA BUtaH tad ASrayaH asati
   pramāṇe 'nugrāhyasyāśrayasyābhāvācchuṣkatayā nādriyate /	pramANe anugrAhyasya ASrayasya aBAvAt Suzka tayA na Adriyate /
   yastvāgamapramāṇāśrayastadviṣayavivecakastadavirodhī sa mantavya iti	yaH tu Agama pramANa ASrayaH tad vizaya vivecakaH tad aviroDI sa mantavyaH iti
   vidhīyate /	viDIyate /
   # śrutyanugṛhīteti.# /	# Sruti anugRhIta iti.# /
   śrutyāḥ śravaṇasya paścāditikartavyatātvena gṛhītaḥ /	SrutyAH SravaNasya paScAt itikartavya tA tvena gRhItaH /
   # anubhavāṅgatveneti.# /	# anuBava aFga tvena iti.# /
   mato hi bhāvyamāno bhāvanāyā viṣayatayānubhūto bhavatīti	mataH hi BAvyamAnaH BAvanAyAH vizaya tayA anuBUtaH Bavati iti
   mananamanubhavāṅgam /	mananam anuBava aFgam /
   # ātmano 'nanvāgatatvamiti.# /	# AtmanaH ananvAgata tvam iti.# /
   svapnādyavasthābhirasaṃpṛktatvam /	svapna Adi avasTABiH asaMpRkta tvam /
   udāsīnatvamityarthaḥ /	udAsIna tvam iti arTaH /
   api ca cetanakāraṇavādibhiḥ kāraṇasālakṣaṇye 'pi kāryasya	api ca cetana kAraNa va AdiBiH kAraNa sAlakzaNye api kAryasya
   kathañciccaitanyāvirbhāvānāvirbhāvābhyāṃ vijñānaṃ cāvijñānaṃ cābhavaditi	kaTaQcid cEtanya AvirBAva anAvirBAvAByAm vijQAnam ca avijQAnam ca aBavat iti
   jagatkāraṇe yojayituṃ śakyam /	jagat kAraNe yojayitum Sakyam /
   acetanapradhānakāraṇavādināṃ tu duryojametat /	acetana praDAna kAraNa vAdinAm tu duryojam etat /
   nahyacetanasya jagatkāraṇasya vijñānarūpatā saṃbhavinī /	na hi acetanasya jagat kAraNasya vijQAna rUpa tA saMBavinI /
   cetanasya jagatkāraṇasya suṣuptādyavyavasthāsviva sato 'pi	cetanasya jagat kAraNasya suzupta Adi a vyavasTAsu iva sataH api
   caitanyasthānāvirbhāvatayā śakyameva kathañcidavijñānātmatvaṃ	cEtanya sTAna AvirBAva tayA Sakyam eva kaTaQcid avijQAna Atma tvam
   yojayitumityāha  # yo 'pi cetanakāraṇaśravaṇabaleneti.# /	yojayitum iti Aha # yaH api cetana kAraNa SravaNa balena iti.# /
   parasyaiva tvacetanapradhānakāraṇavādinaḥ sāṃkhyasya na yujyeta /	parasya eva tu acetana praDAna kAraNa vAdinaH sAMKyasya na yujyeta /
   # pratyuktatvāttu vailakṣaṇyasyeti.# /	# pratyukta tvAt tu vElakzaNyasya iti.# /
   vailakṣaṇye kāryakāraṇabhāvo nāstītyabhyupetyedamuktam /	vElakzaNye kArya kAraNa BAvaH na asti iti aByupetya idam uktam /
   paramārthatastu nāsmābhiretadabhyupeyata ityarthaḥ //6 //	paramArTataH tu na asmABiH etat aByupeyate iti arTaH //6 //
   # asaditi cenna pratiṣedhamātratvāt.# /	# asat iti ced na pratizeDa mAtra tvAt.# /
   na kāraṇātkāryamabhinnam, abhede kāryatvānupapatteḥ, kāraṇavatsvātmani	na kAraNAt kAryam aBinnam, aBede kAryatva anupapatteH, kAraNa vatsvAtmani
   vṛttivirodhāt, śuddhyaśudadhyādiviruddhadharmasaṃsargācca /	vRtti viroDAt, SudDi aSudaDi Adi virudDa Darma saMsargAt ca /
   atha cidātmanaḥ kāraṇasya jagataḥ kāryādbhedaḥ, tathā cedaṃ jagatkāryaṃ	aTa cit AtmanaH kAraNasya jagataH kAryAt BedaH, taTA ca idam jagat kAryam
   sattve 'pi cidātmanaḥ kāraṇasya prāgutpatternāsti, nāsti cedasadutpadyata	sattve api cit AtmanaH kAraNasya prAk utpatteH na asti, na asti ced asat utpadyata
   iti satkāryavādavyākopa ityāha  # yadi cetanaṃ śuddhamiti.# /	iti satkArya vAda vyAkopaH iti Aha # yadi cetanam SudDam iti.# /
   pariharati  # naiṣa doṣa iti.# /	pariharati # na eza dozaH iti.# /
   kutaḥ, # pratiṣedhamātratvāt.# /	kutas , # pratizeDa mAtra tvAt.# /
   vibhajate  # pratiṣedhamātraṃ hīdamiti.# /	viBajate # pratizeDa mAtram hi idam iti.# /
   pratipādayiṣyati hi 'tadananyatvamārambhaṇaśabdādibhyaḥ' ityatra /	pratipAdayizyati hi atat ananya tvam AramBaNa Sabda AdiByaH a iti atra /
   yathā kāryaṃ svarūpeṇa sadasattvābhyāṃ nirvacanīyam /	yaTA kAryam svarUpeNa sat asat tvAByAm nirvacanIyam /
   api tu kāraṇarūpeṇa śakyaṃ sattvena nirvaktumiti /	api tu kAraNa rUpeNa Sakyam sattvena nirvaktum iti /

   pūrvapakṣanyāyotprekṣitamapyudāhṛtya vyutpādyanta iti kenacidaṃśenetyuktam	pUrva pakza nyAya utprekzitam api udAhRtya vyutpAdyante iti kenacid aMSena iti uktam
   sugamamanyat //12 //	sugamam anyat //12 //
   # bhokrāpatteravibhāgaścetyāllokavat.# /	# BokrApatteH aviBAgaH cetyAt lokavat.# /
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   atigambhīrajagatkāraṇaviṣayatvaṃ tarkasya nāsti,	ati gamBIra jagat kAraNa vizaya tvam tarkasya nAsti,
   kevalagamagamyametadityuktam, tatkathaṃ punastarkanimitta ākṣepa ityata	kevala gama gamyam etat iti uktam, tat kaTam punar tarka nimittaH AkzepaH iti ata
   āha  # yadyapi śrutiḥ pramāṇamiti.# /	Aha # yadi api SrutiH pramANam iti.# /
   pravṛttā hi śrutiranapekṣatayā svataḥpramāṇatvena na pramāṇāntaramapekṣate	pravRttA hi SrutiH anapekza tayA svatas pramANa tvena na pramANa antaram apekzate
   pravartamānā punaḥ sphuṭatarapratiṣṭhitaprāmāṇyatarkavirodhena	pravartamAnA punar sPuwatara pratizWita prAmANya tarka viroDena
   mukhyārthātpracyāvya jaghanyavṛttitāṃ nīyate, yathā	muKya arTAt pracyAvya jaGanya vRtti tAm nIyate, yaTA
   mantrārthavādāvityarthaḥ /	mantra arTa vAdO= iti arTaH /
   atirohitārthaṃ bhāṣyam /	atirohita arTam BAzyam /
   # yathā tvadyatva iti.# /	# yaTA tvad yatvaH iti.# /
   yadyatītānāgatayoḥ sargayoreṣa vibhāgo na bhavet /	yadi atIta anAgatayoH sargayoH eza viBAgaH na Bavet /
   tatastadevādyatanasya vibhāgasya bādhakaṃ syāt /	tatas tat eva adyatanasya viBAgasya bADakam syAt /
   svapnadarśanasyeva jāgradarśanam /	svapna darSanasya iva jAgra darSanam /
   na tvetadasti /	na tu etat asti /
   abādhitādyatadarśanena tayorapi tathātvānumānādityarthaḥ /	abADitAt yata darSanena tayoH api taTA tva anumAnAt iti arTaH /
   imāṃ śaṅkāmāpātato 'vicāritalokasiddhadṛṣṭāntopadarśanamātreṇa nirākaroti	imAm SaFkAm ApAtatas avicArita loka sidDa dRzwAnta upadarSana mAtreNa nirAkaroti
   sūtrakāraḥ  # syāllokavat.# //13 //	sUtra kAraH # syAt lokavat.# //13 //
   parihārarahasyamāha  # tadananyatvamārambhaṇaśabdādibhyaḥ.# /	parihAra rahasyam Aha # tad ananya tvam AramBaNa Sabda AdiByaH.# /
   pūrvasmādavirodhādasya viśeṣābhidhānopakramasya vibhāgamāha  #	pUrvasmAt aviroDAt asya viSeza aBiDAna upakramasya viBAgam Aha #
   abhyupagamya cemamiti.# /	aByupagamya ca imam iti.# /
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   yadikāraṇāt paramārthabhūtādananyatvamākāśādeḥ prapañcasya kāryasya	yadi kAraNAt parama arTa BUtAt ananya tvam AkASa AdeH prapaQcasya kAryasya
   kutastarhi na vaiśeṣikādyuktadoprapañcāvatāra ityata āha  #	kutas tarhi na vESezika Adi ukta dA uprapaQca avatAraH iti atas Aha #
   vyatirekeṇābhāvaḥ kāryasyāvagamyata iti.# /	vyatirekeNa aBAvaH kAryasya avagamyate iti.# /
   na khalvananyatvamityabhedaṃ brūmaḥ, kintu bhedaṃ vyasedhāmaḥ, tataśca	na Kalu ananya tvam iti aBedam brUmaH, kintu Bedam vyaseDAmaH, tatas ca
   nābhedāśrayadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ /	nABeda ASraya doza prasaFgaH /
   kintvabhedaṃ vyāsedhadbhirvaiśeṣikādibhirasmāsu sāhāyakamevācaritaṃ	kintva Bedam vyAseDadBiH vESezika AdiBiH asmAsu sAhAyakam eva Acaritam
   bhavati. bhedaniṣedhahetuṃ vyācaṣṭe ārambhaṇaśabdastāvaditi /	Bavati. Beda nizeDa hetum vyAcazwe a AramBaNa SabdaH tAvat iti /
   evaṃ hi brahmavijñānena sarvaṃ jagattattvato jñāyeta yadi brahmaiva	evam hi brahma vijQAnena sarvam jagat tattvataH jQAyeta yadi brahmA eva
   tattvaṃ jagato bhavet /	tattvam jagataH Bavet /
   yathā rajjvāṃ jñātāyāṃ bhujaṅgatattvaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati /	yaTA rajjvAm jQAtAyAm BujaFga tattvam jQAtam Bavati /
   sā hi tasya tattvam /	sA hi tasya tattvam /
   tattvajñānaṃ ca jñānamato 'nyanmidhyājñānamajñānameva /	tattva jQAnam ca jQAnam atas anyat miDyA jQAnam ajQAnam eva /
   atraiva vaidiko dṛṣṭāntaḥ  # yathā somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍeneti.# /	atra eva vEdikaH dRzwAntaH # yaTA somya ekena mRd piNxena iti.# /
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   mṛdi jñātāyāṃ kathaṃ mṛmnayaṃ ghaṭādi jñātaṃ bhavati /	mRdi jQAtAyAm kaTam mRmnayam Gawa Adi jQAtam Bavati /
   nahi tanmṛdātmakamityupapāditamadhastāt /	na hi tat mRdA Atmakam iti upapAditam aDastAt /
   tasmāttattvato bhinnam /	tasmAt tattvataH Binnam /
   na cānyasminvijñāte 'nyadvijñātaṃ bhavatītyata āha śrutiḥ 'vācārambhaṇaṃ	na ca anyasmin vijQAte anyat vijQAtam Bavati iti atas Aha SrutiH  avAcA AramBaNam
   vikāro nāmadheyam /	vikAraH nAmaDeyam /
   vācayā kevalamārabhyate vikārajātaṃ, na tu tattvato 'sti, yato	vAcayA kevalam AraByate vikAra jAtaM, na tu tattvataH asti, yatas 
   nāmadheyamātrametat /	nAmaDeya mAtram etat /
   yathā puruṣasya caitanyamiti rāhoḥ śira iti vikalpamātram /	yaTA puruzasya cEtanyam iti rAhoH SiraH iti vikalpa mAtram /
   yathāhurvikalpavidaḥ 'śabdajñānānupātī vastuśūnyo vikalpaḥ' iti /	yaTA AhuH vikalpa vidaH  aSabda jQAna anupAtI vastu SUnyaH vikalpaHa iti /
   tathā cāvastutayānṛtaṃ vikārajātaṃ, mṛttiketyeva satyam /	taTA ca avastutayA anRtam vikAra jAtaM, mRttikA iti eva satyam /
   tasmādghaṭaśarāvodañcanādīnāṃ tattvaṃ mṛdeva, tena mṛdi jñātāyāṃ yeṣāṃ	tasmAt Gawa SarAva udaQcana AdInAm tattvam mRdeva, tena mRdi jQAtAyAm yezAm
   sarveṣāmeva tattvaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati /	sarvezAm eva tattvam jQAtam Bavati /
   tadidamuktam  # na cānyathaikavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ saṃpadyata iti.# /	tat idam uktam # na ca anyaTA eka vijQAnena sarva vijQAnam saMpadyate iti.# /
   nidarśanāntaradvayaṃ darśayannupasaṃharati  # tasmādyathā	nidarSana antara dvayam darSayan= upasaMharati # tasmAt yaTA
   ghaṭakarakādyākāśānāmiti.# /	Gawa karaka Adi AkASAnAm iti.# /
   ye hi dṛṣṭanaṣṭasvarūpā na te vastusanto yathā mṛgatṛṣṇikodakādayaḥ, tathā	ye hi dRzwa nazwa svarUpAH na te vastu santaH yaTA mRgatRzNikA udaka AdayaH, taTA
   ca sarvaṃ vikārajātaṃ tasmādavastusat /	ca sarvam vikAra jAtam tasmAt avastusat /
   tathāhi yadasti sadastyeva, yathā cidātmā /	taTA hi yat asti sat asti eva, yaTA cit AtmA /
   nahyasau kadācit kkacit kathañcidvāsti /	na hi asO kadAcid kkacid kaTaQcid vA asti /
   kintu sarvadā sarvatra sarvathāstyeva, na nāsti /	kintu sarvadA sarvatra sarvaTA asti eva, na na asti /
   na caivaṃ vikārajātaṃ, tasya kadācit kathañcit kutracidavasthānāt /	na ca evam vikAra jAtaM, tasya kadAcid kaTaQcid kutracid avasTAnAt /
   nahi rūpaṃ kadācit kkacit kathañcidvā gandho bhavati /	na hi rUpam kadAcid kkacid kaTaQcid vA ganDaH Bavati /
   atha yasya sadasattve dharmau, te ca svakāraṇādhīnajanmatayā kadācideva	aTa yasya sat asat tve DarmO, te ca sva kAraNa aDIna janma tayA kadAcid eva
   bhavataḥ, tattarhi vikārajātaṃ daṇḍāyamānaṃ sadātanamiti na vikāraḥ	BavataH, tat tarhi vikAra jAtam daNxAyamAnam sadAtanam iti na vikAraH
   kasyacit /	kasyacid /
   athāsattvasamaye tannāsti, kasya tarhi dharmo 'sattvam /	aTa asattva samaye tat na asti, kasya tarhi DarmaH asattvam /
   nahi dharmiṇyapratyutpanne taddharmo 'sattvaṃ pratyutpannamupapadyate /	na hi DarmiNI apratyutpanne tad DarmaH asattvam pratyutpannam upapadyate /
   athāsya na dharmaḥ kintvarthāntarasamattvam /	aTa asya na DarmaH kintu arTa antara samattvam /
   kimāyātaṃ bhāvasya /	kim AyAtam BAvasya /
   nahi ghaṭe jāte paṭasya kiñcidbhavati /	na hi Gawe jAte pawasya kiQcid Bavati /
   asattvaṃ bhāvavirodhīti cet /	asattvam BAva viroDi iti ced /
   na /	na /
   akiñcitkarasya tattvānupapatteḥ /	akiQcitkarasya tattva anupapatteH /

   athāsyāsattvaṃ nāma kiñcinna jāyate kintu sa eva na bhavati /	aTa asya asattvam nAma kiQcid na jAyate kintu saH eva na Bavati /
   yathāhuḥ 'na tasya kiñcidbhavati na bhavatyeva kevalam' iti /	yaTA AhuH  ana tasya kiQcid Bavati na Bavati eva kevalam a iti /
   athaiṣa prasajyapratiṣedho nirucyatāṃ, kiṃ tatsvabhāvo bhāva uta	aTa eza prasajya pratizeDaH nirucyatAn, kim tad svaBAvaH BAvaH uta
   bhāvasvabhāvaḥ sa iti /	BAva svaBAvaH saH iti /
   tatra pūrvasmin kalpe bhāvānāṃ tatsvabhāvatayā tucchatayā jagacchūnyaṃ	tatra pUrvasmin kalpe BAvAnAm tad svaBAvatayA tucCatayA jagat SUnyam
   prasajyeta /	prasajyeta /
   tathā ca bhāvānubhāvābhāvaḥ /	taTA ca BAva anuBAva aBAvaH /
   uttarasmiṃstu sa4vabhāvanityatayā nābhāvavyavahāraḥ syāt /	uttarasmin= tu sa4vaBAva nityatayA na aBAva vyavahAraH syAt /
   kalpanāmātranimittatve 'pi niṣedhasya bhāvanityatāpattistadavasthaiva	kalpanA mAtra nimitta tve api nizeDasya BAva nitya tA ApattiH tad avasTA eva
   tasmādbhinnamasti kāraṇādvikārajātaṃ na vastu sat /	tasmAt Binnam asti kAraNAt vikAra jAtam na vastu sat /
   ato vikārajātamanirvacanīyamanṛtacam /	atas vikAra jAtam anirvacanIyam anRtacam /
   tadanena pramāṇena siddhamanṛtatvaṃ vikārajātasya kāraṇasya nirvācyatayā	tat anena pramANena sidDam anRta tvam vikAra jAtasya kAraNasya nirvAcya tayA
   sattvaṃ 'mṛttiketyeva satyam' ityādinā prabandhena dṛṣṭāntatayānuvadati	sattvam amRttikA iti eva satyam a ityAdinA prabanDena dRzwAnta tayA anuvadati
   śrutiḥ /	SrutiH /
   'yatra laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ' iti cākṣapādasūtraṃ	ayatra lOkika parIkzakANAm budDi sAmyam sa dRzwAntaH a iti ca akzapAda sUtram
   pramāṇasiddho dṛṣṭānta ityetatparaṃ, na punarlokasiddhatvamatra	pramANa sidDaH dRzwAntaH iti etat paraM, na punar loka sidDa tvam atra
   vivakṣitam, anyathā teṣāṃ paramāṇvādirna dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt /	vivakzitam, anyaTA tezAm paramANu AdiH na dRzwAntaH syAt /
   nahi paramāṇvādirnaisargikavainayikabuddhyatiśayarahitānāṃ laukikānāṃ	na hi paramANu AdiH nEsargika vEnayika budDi atiSaya rahitAnAm lOkikAnAm
   siddha iti /	sidDaH iti /
   saṃpratyanekantavādinamutthāpayati  # nanvanekātmakamiti.# /	saMprati anekanta vAdinam utTApayati # nanu aneka Atmakam iti.# /
   anekābhiḥ śaktibhiryāḥ pravṛttayo nānākāryasṛṣṭayastadyuktaṃ brahmaikaṃ	anekABiH SaktiBiH yAH pravRttayaH nAnA kArya sRzwayaH tat yuktam brahma ekam
   nānā ceti /	nAnA ca iti /
   kimato yadyevamityata āha  # tatraikatvāṃśeneti.# /	kim atas yadi evam iti atas Aha # tatra ekatva aMSena iti.# /
   yadi punarekatvameva vastusadbhavet tato nānātvābhāvādvaidikaḥ	yadi punar eka tvam eva vastu sadBavet tatas nAnAtva aBAvAt vEdikaH
   karmakāṇḍāśrayo laukikaśca vyavahāraḥ samasta evocchidyeta /	karma kANxa ASrayaH lOkikaH ca vyavahAraH samastaH eva ucCidyeta /
   brahmagocarāśca śravaṇamananādayaḥ sarve dattajalāñjalayaḥ prasajyeran /	brahma gocarAH ca SravaNa manana AdayaH sarve datta jala aQjalayaH prasajyeran /
   evaṃ cānekātmakatve brahmaṇo mṛdādidṛṣṭāntā anurūpā bhaviṣyantīti /	evam ca aneka Atmaka tve brahmaNaH mRd Adi dRzwAntAH anurUpAH Bavizyanti iti /
   tamimamanekāntavādaṃ dūṣayati  # naivaṃ syāditi.# /	tam imam anekAnta vAdam dUzayati # na evam syAt iti.# /
   idaṃ tāvadatra vaktavyam, mṛdātmanaikatvaṃ ghaṭaśarāvādyātmanā nānātvamiti	idam tAvat atra vaktavyam, mRdA AtmanA ekatvam Gawa SarAva Adi AtmanA nAnAtvam iti
   vadataḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ parasparaṃ kimabhedo 'bhimataḥ, āho bhedaḥ, uta	vadataH kArya kAraNayoH parasparam kim aBedaH aBimataH, Aho BedaH, uta
   bhedābhedāviti /	Beda aBedO= iti /
   tatrābheda aikāntike mṛdātmaneti ca ghaṭaśarāvādyātmaneti collekhadvayaṃ	tatra aBedaH EkAntike mRdA AtmanA iti ca Gawa SarAva Adi AtmanA iti ca ulleKa dvayam
   niyamaśca nopapadyate /	niyamaH ca na upapadyate /
   bhede collekhadvayaniyamāvupapannau, ātmaneti tvasamañjasam /	Bede ca ulleKa dvaya niyamO= upapannO, AtmanA iti tu asamaQjasam /
   nahyanyasyānya ātmā bhavati /	na hi anyasya anyaH AtmA Bavati /
   na cānekāntavādaḥ /	na ca anekAnta vAdaH /
   bhedābedakalpe tullekhadvayaṃ bhavedapi /	Beda Abeda kalpe tulleKa dvayam Bavet api /
   niyamastvayuktaḥ /	niyamaH tu ayuktaH /
   nahi dharmiṇoḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ saṃkare taddharmāvekatvanānātve na	na hi DarmiNoH kArya kAraNayoH saMkare tad DarmO= eka tva nAnAtve na
   saṃkīryete iti saṃbhavati /	saMkIryete iti saMBavati /
   tataśca mṛdātmanaikatvaṃ yāvadbhavati tāvadghaṭaśarāvādyātmanāpi syāt,	tatas ca mRdA AtmanA ekatvam yAvat Bavati tAvat Gawa SarAva Adi AtmanA api syAt ,
   evaṃ ghaṭaśarāvādyātmanā nānātvaṃ yāvadbhavati tāvanmṛdātmanā nānātvaṃ	evam Gawa SarAva Adi AtmanA nAnAtvam yAvat Bavati tAvat mRdA AtmanA nAnA tvam
   bhavet /	Bavet /
   so 'yaṃ niyamaḥ kāryakāraṇayoraikāntikaṃ bhedamupakalpayati,	saH ayam niyamaH kArya kAraNayoH EkAntikam Bedam upakalpayati,
   anirvacanīyatāṃ vā kāryasya /	anirvacanIyatAm vA kAryasya /
   parākrāntaṃ cāsmābhiḥ prathamādhyāye tat /	parAkrAntam ca asmABiH praTama aDyAye tat /
   āstāṃ tāvat /	AstAm tAvat /
   tadetadyuktinirākṛtamanuvadantīṃ śrutimudāharati  # mṛttiketyeva	tat etat yukti nirAkRtam anuvadantIm Srutim udAha rati # mRttikA iti eva
   satyamiti.# /	satyam iti.# /
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   na brahmaṇo jīvabhāvaḥ kālpanikaḥ, kintu bhāvikaḥ /	na brahmaNaH jIva BAvaH kAlpanikaH, kintu BAvikaH /
   aṃśo hi saḥ, tasya karmasāhitena jñānena brahmabhāva ādhīyata ityata āha 	aMSaH hi saH, tasya karma sAhitena jQAnena brahma BAvaH ADIyate iti atas Aha 
   # svayaṃ prasiddha hīti.# /	# svayam prasidDa hi iti.# /
   svābhāvikasyānāderiti /	svABAvikasya anAdeH iti /
   yaduktaṃ nānātvāṃśena tu karmakāṇḍāśrayo laukikaśca vyavahāraḥ setsyatīti,	yat uktam nAnAtva aMSena tu karma kANxa ASrayaH lOkikaH ca vyavahAraH setsyati iti,
   tatrāha  # bādhite ceti.# /	tatra aha # bADite ca iti.# /
   yāvadabādhaṃ hi sarvo 'yaṃ vyavahāraḥ svapnadaśāyāmiva	yAvat abADam hi sarvaH ayam vyavahAraH svapna daSAyAm iva
   tadupadarśitapadārthajātavyavahāraḥ /	tad upadarSita padArTa jAta vyavahAraH /
   sa ca yathā jāgradanasthāyāṃ bādhakānnivartate evaṃ	sa ca yaTA jAgrat anasTAyAm bADakAt nivartate evam
   tattvamasyādivākyaparibhāvanābhyāsaparipākabhuvā śārīrasya	tattvam asya Adi vAkya pariBAvana aByAsa paripAka BuvA SArIrasya
   brahmātmabhāvasākṣātkāreṇa bādhakena nivartate /	brahma Atma BAva sAkzAtkAreNa bADakena nivartate /
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttat kena kaṃ paśyet' ityādinā	ayatra tu asya sarvam AtmA eva aBUt tat kena kam paSyet a ityAdinA
   mithyājñānādhīno vyavahāraḥ kriyākārakādilakṣaṇaḥ samyagjñānenāpanīyata	miTyAjQAna aDInaH vyavahAraH kriyA kAraka Adi lakzaNaH samyak jQAnena apanIyata
   itri na brūte, kintvavasthābhedāśrayo vyavahāro 'vasthāntaraprāptyā	itri na brUte, kintu avasTA Beda ASrayaH vyavahAraH avasTA antara prAptyA
   nivartate, yathā bālakasya kāmacāravādabhakṣatopanayanaprāptau nivartate /	nivartate, yaTA bAlakasya kAma cAra vAda Bakza tA upanayana prAptO nivartate /
   naca tāvatāsau mithyājñānanibandhano bhavatyevamatrāpītyata āha  # na	na ca tAvatA asO miTyAjQAna nibanDanaH Bavati evam atra api iti atas Aha # na
   cāyaṃ vyavahārābhāva iti.# /	ca ayam vyavahAra aBAvaH iti.# /
   kutaḥ, # tattvamasīti brahmātmabhāvasyeti.# /	kutas , # tat tvam asi iti brahma Atma BAvasya iti.# /
   na khalvetadvākyamavasthāviśeṣaviniyataṃ brahmātmabhāvamāha jīvasya, api	na Kalu etat vAkyam avasTA viSeza viniyatam brahma Atma BAvam Aha jIvasya, api
   tu na bhujaṅgo rajjuriyamitivat sadātanaṃ tamabhivadati /	tu na BujaFgaH rajjuH iyam itivat sadAtanam tam aBivadati /
   api ca satyānṛtābhidhānenāpyetadeva yuktamityāha  # taskaradṛṣṭāntena ceti	api ca satya anRta aBiDAnena api etat eva yuktam iti Aha # taskara dRzwAntena ca iti
   na cāsmindarśana iti.# /	na ca asmin darSanaH iti.# /
   nahi jātu kāṣṭhasya daṇḍakamaṇḍalukuṇḍalaśālinaḥ kuṇḍalitvajñānaṃ	na hi jAtu kAzWasya daNxa ka maNxalu kuNxala SAlinaH kuNxali tva jQAnam

   cotpattirucyamāneti.# /	ca utpattiH ucyamAnA iti.# /

   na cotpādanaivotpattiḥ, prayojyaprayojakavyāpārayorbhedāt /	na ca utpAdana eva utpattiH, prayojya prayojaka vyApArayoH BedAt /

   tasmāt karotikārayatyoriva	tasmAt karotikArayatyoH iva

   'bhyupetavyaḥ, tatra kapāsakulālādīnāṃ siddhānāmutpādanādhiṣṭhānānāṃ	aByupetavyaH, tatra kapAsa kulAla AdInAm sidDAnAm utpAdana aDizWAnAnAm

   śaṅkate  # atha svakāraṇasattāsaṃbandha evotpattiriti.# /	SaFkate # aTa sva kAraNa sattA saMbanDaH eva utpattiH iti.# /

   sādhayatyeva, tasmānnādvitīyaṃ brahma jagadupādānamiti prāpte, ucyate  #	sADayati eva, tasmAt na advitIyam brahma jagat upAdAnam iti prApte, ucyate #

   uttarasmiṃstu kalpe yadi	uttarasmin= tu kalpe yadi

   parimāṇāditi /	parimANAt iti /

   malinatāmupaiti,na ca tadvastuto malinaṃ , naca bimbātpratibimbaṃ vastuto	malina tAm upEti,na ca tat vastutas malinam , na ca bimbAt pratibimbam vastu tas 
   bhidyate, atha tasmin pratibimbe malinādarśopadhānānmalinatā padaṃ labhate	Bidyate, aTa tasmin pratibimbe malina AdarSa upaDAnAt malina tA padam laBate

   śeṣamatirohitārtham //11 //	Sezam ati rohita arTam //11 //
   # ubhayathāpi na karmātastadabhāvaḥ.# /	# uBayaTA api na karma atas tad aBAvaH.# /
   paramāṇūnāmādyasya karmaṇaḥ kāraṇābhyupagame 'nabhyupagame vā na	paramANUnAm Adyasya karmaNaH kAraNa aByupagame anaByupagame vA na

   sargābhāvaḥ /	sarga aBAvaH /
   nimittakāraṇatāmātreṇa tvīśvarasyādhiṣṭhātṛtvamupariṣṭānnirākariṣyate /	nimitta kAraNa tA mAtreNa tu ISvarasya aDizWAtR tvam uparizwAt nirAkarizyate /

   svānugataiḥ svasaṃbaddhaiḥ /	sva anugatEH sva saMbadDEH /

   pañcamabhūtasyānavayavatvāt # tānīmāni catvāri bhūtānīti.# /	paQcama BUtasya anavayava tvAt # tAni imAni catvAri BUtAni iti.# /
   tatra paramāṇukāraṇavāde iyamabhidhīyate sūtram /	tatra paramANu kAraNa vAde iyam aBiDIyate sUtram /

   tadā tadākāratayaiva prathante na tu prathāyāmeṣāmasti svātantryaṃ,	tadA tad AkAra tayA eva praTante na tu praTAyAm ezAm asti svAtantryaM,

   bhavati, abdhāturbījaṃ snehayati, tejodhāturbījaṃ paripācayati,	Bavati, abDAtuH bIjam snehayati, tejaH DAtuH bIjam paripAcayati,
   vāyudhāturbījamabhinirharati yato 'ṅkuro bījānnirgacchati,	vAyuDAtuH bIjam aBinirharati yatas aFkuraH bIjAt nirgacCati,
   ākāśadhāturbījasyānāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karoti, ṛturapi bījasya pariṇāmaṃ karoti,	AkASa DAtuH bIjasya anAvaraNa kRtyam karoti, RtuH api bIjasya pariNAmam karoti,
   tadeteṣāmavikalānāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāye bīje rohityaṅkuro jāyate nānyathā /	tat etezAm avikalAnAm DAtUnAm samavAye bIje rohiti aFkuraH jAyate na anyaTA /
   tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ bījasya saṃgrahakṛtyaṃ	tatra pRTivI DAtoH na evam Bavati aham bIjasya saMgraha kRtyam
   karomīti,yāvadṛtornaivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ bījasya pariṇāmaṃ karomīti /	karomi iti,ya avadRtoH na evam Bavati aham bIjasya pariNAmam karomi iti /
   aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavatyahamebhiḥ pratyayairnirvartita iti /	aFkurasya api na evam Bavati aham eBiH pratyayEH nirvartitaH iti /
   tathādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ bhavati	taTA ADyAtmikaH pratItyasamutpAdaH dvAByAm kAraNAByAm Bavati

   . api tu nānāhetusamavadhānajanmā /	. api tu nAnA hetu samavaDAn a janmA /

   saṃprati pratyayopanibandhanaṃ pratītyasamutpādamāstāya codayati   # atha	saMprati pratyaya upanibanDanam pratItyasamutpAdam AstAya codayati  # aTa

   asthirā api hi bhāvāḥ sadā saṃhatā evodayante vyante ca /	asTirAH api hi BAvAH sadA saMhatAH eva udayante vyante ca /
   na punaratistato 'vasthitāḥ kenacit puñjīkriyante /	na punar atiH tatas avasTitAH kenacid puQjIkriyante /
   tathā ca kṛtamatra saṃhantrā cetaneneti bhāvaḥ /	taTA ca kRtam atra saMhantrA cetanena iti BAvaH /
   # anādau.#iti parasparāśrayaṃ nivartayati /	# anAdO.#iti paraspara ASrayam nivartayati /
   tadetadvikalpya dūṣayati   # tathāpi saṃghātāditi.# /	tat etat vikalpya dUzayati  # taTA api saMGAta At iti.# /
   sa khalu saṃghātasaṃtativarti dharmādharmāhvayaḥ saṃskārasaṃtāno	sa Kalu saMGAta saMtati varti Darma aDarma AhvayaH saMskAra saMtAnaH 
   yathāyathaṃ sukhaduḥkhe janayannāgantukaṃ kañcanānāsādya svata eva	yaTAyaTam suKa duHKe janayan= Agantukam kaQcanAn AsAdya svatas eva
   janayet,āsādya vā /	janayet,a AsAdya vA /
   anāsādyajanane sadaiva sukhaduḥkhe janayet,	anAsAdya janane sadA eva suKa duHKe janayet ,
   samarthasyānapekṣasyākṣepāyogāt /	samarTasya anapekzasi a Akzepa ayogAt /
   āsādya janane tadāsādanakāraṇaṃ prekṣāvānabhyupeyaḥ /	AsAdya janane tad AsAdana kAraNam prekzAva anaByupeyaH /
   tathāca na pratyayopanibandhanaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ /	taTA ca na pratyaya upanibanDanaH pratItyasamutpAdaH /
   tasmādanenāgatantukānapekṣasya saṃdhātasaṃtānasyaiva sadṛśajanane	tasmAt anenAga tantuka anapekzasya saMDAta saMtAnasya eva sadRSa janane
   visadṛśajanane vā svabhāva āstheyaḥ /	visadRSa janane vA svaBAvaH AsTeyaH /
   tathā ca bhāṣyoktaṃ dūṣaṇamiti /	taTA ca BAzya uktam dUzaNam iti /
   # api ca yadbhogārthaḥ saṃghātaḥ syāditi.# /	# api ca yad Boga arTaH saMGAtaH syAt iti.# /
   aprāptabhogo hi bhogamāptukāmastatsādhane pravartata iti pratyātmasiddham	aprApta BogaH hi Bogam Aptu kAmaH tad sADane pravartate iti pratyAtma sidDam
   seyaṃ pravṛttirbhogādanyasmin sthire bhoktari bhogatatsādhanasamayavyāpini	sA iyam pravRttiH BogAt anyasmin sTire Boktari Boga tad sADana samaya vyApini
   kalpyate nāsthire /	kalpyate na asTire /
   naca bhogādananyasmin /	na ca BogAt ananyasmin /
   nahi bhogo bhogāya kalpate nāpyanyo bhogāyānyasya /	na hi BogaH BogAya kalpate na api anyaH BogAya anyasya /
   evaṃ mokṣe 'pi draṣṭavyam /	evam mokze api drazwavyam /
   tatra bubhukṣumumukṣū cet sthirāvāsthīyeyātāṃ tadābhyupetahānam, asthairyā	tatra buBukzu mumukzU ced sTirO= AsTIyeyAtAm tadA aByupeta hAnam, asTEryA
   vā pravṛttiprasaṅga ityarthaḥ /	vA pravRtti prasaFgaH iti arTaH /
   # na tu saṃghātaḥ sidhyedbhoktrabhāvāditi.# /	# na tu saMGAtaH siDyet BoktraBAvAt iti.# /
   bhoktrabhāvena pravṛttyanupapatteḥ kartrabhāvaḥ /	Boktra BAvena pravRtti anupapatteH kartR aBAvaH /
   tataḥ karmabhāvātsaṃghātāsiddhirityarthaḥ //19 // //	tatas karma BAvAt saMGAta asidDiH iti arTaH //19 // //
   # uttarotpāde ca pūrvanirodhāt.# /	# uttara utpAde ca pUrva niroDAt.# /
   pūrvasūtreṇa saṃgatimasyāha   # uktametaditi.# /	pUrva sUtreNa saMgatim asya aha  # uktam etat iti.# /
   hetūpanibandhanaṃ pratītyasamutpadamabhyupetya pratyayopanibandhanaḥ	hetu upanibanDanam pratItyasamutpadam aByupetya pratyaya upanibanDanaH
   pratītyasamutpādo dūṣitaḥ /	pratItyasamutpAdaH dUzitaH /
   saṃprati hetūpanibandhanamapi taṃ dūṣayatītyarthaḥ /	saMprati hetu upanibanDanam api tam dUzayati iti arTaH /
   dūṣaṇamāha   # idamidānīmiti /	dUzaNam Aha  # idam idAnIm iti /
   nirudhyamānasyeti.# /	niruDyamAnasya iti.# /
   na tāvadvaiśeṣikavannirodhakāraṇasāṃnidhyaṃ nirudhyamānatvaṃ vaktavyam /	na tAvat vESezika vat niroDa kAraNa sAMniDyam niruDyamAna tvam vaktavyam /
   niruddhatvaṃ ca ciraniruddhatvaṃ vivakṣitatvaṃ, tathā	nirudDa tvam ca cira nirudDa tvam vivakzita tvaM, taTA
   cobhayorapyabhāvagrastatvāddhetutvānupapattiḥ /	ca uBayoH api aBAva grasta tvAt hetutva anupapattiH /
   śaṅkate   # atha bhāvabhūta iti.# /	SaFkate  # aTa BAva BUtaH iti.# /
   kāraṇasya hi kāryotpādāt prākkālasattār'thavatī na kāryakālā, tadā	kAraNasya hi kArya utpAdAt prAk kAla sattAr aTavatI na kArya kAlA, tadA
   kāryasya siddhatvena tatsidydharthāyāḥ sattāyā anupayogāditi bhāvaḥ /	kAryasya sidDa tvena tad sidyDarTAyAH sattAyAH anupayogAt iti BAvaH /
   tadetallokadṛṣṭyā dūṣayati   # bhāvabhūtasyeti.# /	tat etat loka dRzwyA dUzayati  # BAva BUtasya iti.# /
   bhūtvā vyāpṛtya bhāvāḥ prayeṇa hi kāryaṃ kurvanto loke dṛśyante /	BUtvA vyApRtya BAvAH prayeNa hi kAryam kurvantaH loke dRSyante /
   tathā ca sthiratvam, itarathā tu lokavirodha iti /	taTA ca sTira tvam, itaraTA tu loka viroDaH iti /
   punaḥ śaṅkate   # atha bhāva eveti.# /	punar SaFkate  # aTa BAvaH eva iti.# /
   yathāhuḥ   'bhūtiryeṣāṃ kriyā saiva kārakaṃ saiva cocyate 'iti /	yaTA AhuH   aBUtiH yezAm kriyA sA eva kArakam sA eva ca ucyate aiti /
   bhavatyevaṃ vyāpāravattā tathāpi kṣaṇikasya na kāraṇatvamityāha   #	Bavati evam vyApAravat tA taTA api kzaNikasya na kAraNa tvam iti Aha  #
   tathāpi naivopapadyate.#kṣaṇikasya kāraṇabhāvaḥ /	taTA api na eva upapadyate.#kzaNikasya kAraNa BAvaH /
   mṛtsuvarṇakāraṇā hi ghaṭādayaśca rūcakādaya mṛtsuvarṇātmāno 'nubhūyante /	mRd suvarNa kAraNAH hi Gawa AdayaH ca rUcaka Adaya mRd suvarNa AtmAnaH anuBUyante /
   yadi ca na kāryasamaye kāraṇaṃ sat kathaṃ teṣāṃ tadātmanānubhāvaḥ /	yadi ca na kArya samaye kAraNam sat kaTam tezAm tad AtmanA anuBAvaH /
   naca kāraṇasādṛśyaṃ kāryasya na tu tādātmyamiti vācyam /	na ca kAraNa sAdRSyam kAryasya na tu tAdAtmyam iti vAcyam /
   asati kasyacidrūpasyānugame sādṛśyasyāpyanupapatteḥ /	asati kasyacid rUpasya anugame sAdRSyasya api anupapatteH /
   anugame vā tadeva kāraṇaṃ, tathā ca tasya kāryatādātmyamiti	anugame vA tat eva kAraNan, taTA ca tasya kArya tAdAtmyam iti
   siddhimakṣaṇikatvamityarthaḥ /	sidDi makzaNika tvam iti arTaH /
   sarvathā vailakṣaṇye tu hetuphalabhāvastantughaṭādāvapi prāptaṃ	sarvaTA vElakzaNye tu hetu Pala BAvaH tantu Gawa AdO= api prAptam
   ityatiprasaṅga ityāha   # vinaiva veti.# /	iti atiprasaFgaH iti Aha  # vinA eva vA iti.# /
   naca tadbhāvabhāvo niyāmakaḥ, tasyaikasmin kṣaṇe 'śakyagrahatvāt,	na ca tad BAva BAvaH niyAmakaH, tasya ekasmin kzaNe aSakya graha tvAt,
   sāmānyasya cākāraṇatvāt /	sAmAnyasya ca akAraNa tvAt /
   kāraṇatve vā kṣaṇikatvahānerasmatpakṣapātaprasaṅgacceti bhāvaḥ /	kAraNa tve vA kzaNika tva hAneH asmad pakza pAta prasaFgat ca iti BAvaH /
   api ca cotpādanirodhayorvikalpatraye 'pi vastunaḥ śāśvatatvaprasaṅga	api ca ca utpAda niroDayoH vikalpa traye api vastunaH SASvata tva prasaFga
   ityāha   # api cotpādanirodhau nāmeti.# /	iti Aha  # api ca utpAda niroDO nAma iti.# /
   paryāyatvāpādane 'pi nityatvāpādanaṃ mantavyam /	paryAyatva ApAdane api nitya tva ApAdanam mantavyam /
   # vastūtpādanirodhābhyāmasaṃsṛṣṭamiti vastunaḥ śāśvatatvaprasaṅgaḥ.# /	# vastu utpAda niroDAByAm asaMsRzwam iti vastunaH SASvata tva prasaFgaH.# /
   saṃsarge 'pyasatā saṃsargānupapatteḥ /	saMsarge api asatA saMsarga anupapatteH /
   sattvābhyupagame śāśvata śāśvatatvamiti draṣṭavyam /	sattva aByupagame SASvata SASvata tvam iti drazwavyam /
   śeṣaṃ nigadavyākhyātam //20 //	Sezam nigada vyAKyAtam //20 //
   # asati pratijñoparodho yaugapadyamanyathā.# /	# asati pratijQA uparoDaH yOgapadyam anyaTA.# /
   nīlābhāsasya hi cittasya nīlādālambanapratyayānnīlākāratā /	nIla ABAsasya hi cittasya nIlAt Alambana pratyayAt nIla AkAra tA /
   samanantarapratyayātpūrvavijñānādbodharūpatā /	samanantara pratyayAt pUrva vijQAnAt boDa rUpa tA /
   cakṣuṣo 'dhipatipratyayādrūpagrahaṇapratiniyamaḥ /	cakzuzaH aDipati pratyayAt rUpa grahaNa pratiniyamaH /
   ālokātsahakāripratyayādhetoḥ spaṣṭārthatā /	AlokAt sahakAri pratyaya ADetoH spazwa arTa tA /
   evaṃ sukhādīnāmapi caittānāṃ cittābhinnahetujānāṃ catvāryotānyeva kāraṇāni	evam suKa AdInAm api cEttAnAm citta aBinna hetu jAnAm catvAryotAni eva kAraNAni
   seyaṃ pratijñā caturvidhān hetūn pratītya cittacaittā utpadyanta	sA iyam pratijQA caturviDAn hetUn pratItya citta cEttAH utpadyanta
   ityabhāvakāraṇatva uparudhyeta /	iti aBAva kAraNa tvaH uparuDyeta /
   # athottarakṣaṇotpattiṃ yāvattāvadavatiṣṭhata iti.# /	# aTa uttara kzaNa utpattim yAvat tAvat avatizWate iti.# /
   utpattirutpadyamānādbhāvādabhinnā, tathā ca kṣaṇikatvahāniriti	utpattiH utpadyamAnAt BAvAt aBinnA, taTA ca kzaNika tva hAniH iti
   pratijñāhāniḥ //21 //	pratijQA hAniH //21 //
   # pratisaṃkhyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhāprāptiravicchedāt.# /	# pratisaMKyA pratisaMKyA niroDa aprAptiH avi= CedAt.# /
   bhāvapratīpā saṃkhyā buddhiḥ pratisaṃkhyā , tayā nirodhaḥ	BAva pratIpA saMKyA budDiH pratisaMKyA , tayA niroDaH
   pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ /	pratisaMKyA niroDaH /
   santamimamasantaṃ karomītyevamākāratā ca buddherbhāvapratīpatvam /	santam imam asantam karomi iti evam AkAra tA ca budDeH BAva pratIpa tvam /
   etenāpratisaṃkhyānirodho 'pi vyākhyātaḥ /	etena apratisaMKyA niroDaH api vyAKyAtaH /
   saṃtānagocaro vā nirodhaḥ, saṃtānikṣaṇagocaro vā /	saMtAna gocaraH vA niroDaH, saMtAnikzaNa gocaraH vA /
   na tāvatsaṃtānasya nirodhaḥ saṃbhavati /	na tAvat saMtAnasya niroDaH saMBavati /
   hetuphalabhāvena hi vyavasthitāḥ saṃtānina evodayavyayadharmāṇaḥ saṃtānāḥ	hetu Pala BAvena hi vyavasTitAH saMtAninaH eva udaya vyaya DarmANaH saMtAnAH
   tatra yo 'sāvantyaḥ saṃtānī, yannirodhātsaṃtānocchedena bhavitavyam, sa	tatra yaH asO= antyaH saMtAnI, yat niroDAt saMtAna ucCedena Bavitavyam, sa
   kiṃ phalaṃ kiñcidārabhate na vā /	kim Palam kiQcid AraBate na vA /
   ārabhate cet, nāntyaḥ /	AraBate cet, na antyaH /
   tathā ca na saṃtānocchedaḥ /	taTA ca na saMtAna ucCedaH /
   anārambhe tu bhavedantyaḥ saḥ, kintu syādasan, arthakriyākāritāyāḥ	anAramBe tu Bavet antyaH saH, kintu syAt asan, arTa kriyA kAritAyAH
   sattālakṣaṇasya virahāt /	sattA lakzaNasya virahAt /
   tadasatve tajjanakamapyasajjanakatvenāsadityanena krameṇāsantaḥ sarva eva	tat asatve tat janakam api asat janaka tvena asat iti anena krameNa asantaH sarve eva
   saṃtānina iti tatsaṃtāno nitarāmasanniti kasya pratisaṃkhyayā nirodha  /	saMtAninaH iti tad saMtAnaH nitarAmasan= iti kasya pratisaMKyayA niroDa /
   naca sabhāgānāṃ saṃtānināṃ hetuphalabhāvaḥ saṃtānaḥ, tasya visabhāgotpādo	na ca sa BAgAnAm saMtAninAm hetu Pala BAvaH saMtAnaH, tasya visaBAga utpAdaH 
   nirodhaḥ, visabhāgotpādaka eva cakṣaṇaḥ saṃtānasyāntyaḥ /	niroDaH, visaBAga utpAdakaH eva cakzaNaH saMtAnasya antyaH /
   tathāsati rūpavijñānapravāhe rasādivijñānotpattau saṃtānocchedaprasaṅgaḥ /	taTA asati rUpa vijQAna pravAhe rasa Adi vijQAna utpattO saMtAna ucCeda prasaFgaH /
   kathañcitsārūpye vā visabhāge 'pyantataḥ sattayā tadastīti na	kaTaQcid sA ArUpye vA visaBAge api antatas sat tayA tat asti iti na
   saṃtānocchedaḥ /	saMtAna ucCedaH /
   tadanenābhisaṃdhināha   # sarveṣvapi saṃtāneṣu	tad anena aBisaMDinAha  # sarvezu api saMtAnezu
   saṃtānināmavicchinnenahetuphalabhāvena saṃtānavicchedasyāsaṃbhavāditi /	saMtAninAm avicCinnena hetu Pala BAvena saMtAna vicCedasya asaMBavAt iti /
   nāpi bhāvagocarau saṃbhavataḥ.#pratisaṃkhyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhau /	na api BAva gocarO saMBavataH.#pratisaMKyA pratisaMKyA niroDO /
   atra tāvadutpannamātrāpravṛttasya bhāvasya na pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ	atra tAvat utpanna mAtrA pravRttasya BAvasya na pratisaMKyA niroDaH
   saṃbhavati, tasya puruṣaprayatnāpekṣābhāvādityastyeva dūṣaṇaṃ, tathāpi	saMBavati, tasya puruza prayatna apekzA BAvAt iti asti eva dUzaNaM, taTA api
   doṣāntaramubhayasminnapi nirodho brūte   # na hi bhāvānāmiti.# /	doza antaram uBayasmin= api niroDaH brUte  # na hi BAvAnAm iti.# /
   yato niranvayo vināśo na saṃbhavatyato nirūpākhyo 'pi na saṃbhavati,	yatas niranvayaH vinASaH na saMBavati atas nirUpa AKyaH api na saMBavati,
   tenaivānvayinā rūpeṇa bhāvasya naṣṭasyāpyupākhyeyatvāt /	tena eva anvayinA rUpeNa BAvasya nazwasya api upAKyeya tvAt /
   niranvayavināśābhāve hetumāha   # sarvāsvapyavasthāsviti.# /	niranvaya vinASa aBAve hetum Aha  # sarvAsu api avasTAsu iti.# /
   yadyadanvayirūpaṃ tattatparamārthasadbhāvaḥ /	yat yat anvayi rUpam tad tad parama arTa sadBAvaH /
   avasthāstu viśeṣākhyā upajanāpāyadharmāṇaḥ, tāsāṃ sarvasāmanirvacanīyatayā	avasTAH tu viSeza AKyAH upajana apAya DarmANaH, tAsAm sarva sAma nirvacanIya tayA
   svato na paramārthasattvam /	svatas na parama arTa sattvam /
   anvayyeva tu rūpaṃ tāsāṃ tattvam /	anvayyeva tu rUpam tAsAm tattvam /
   tasya ca sarvatra pratyabhijñāyamānatvānna vināśa ityavasthāvato	tasya ca sarvatra pratyaBijQAyamAna tvAt na vinASaH iti avasTAvataH 
   'vināśānnāvasthānāṃ niranvayo vināśa iti /	avinASAt na avasTAnAm niranvayaH vinASaH iti /
   tāsāṃ tattvasyānvayinaḥ sarvatrāvicchedāt /	tAsAm tattvasya anvayinaH sarvatra avicCedAt /
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   mṛtpiṇḍamṛdghaṭamṛtkapālādiṣu sarvatra mṛttattvapratyabhijñānādbhavatvevam	mRd piNxa mRd Gawa mRd kapAla Adizu sarvatra mRd tattva pratyaBijQAnAt Bavatu evam
   taptopalatalapatitanaṣṭasya tūdabindoḥ kimasti rūpamanvayi	tapta upalatala patita nazwasya tu udabindoH kim asti rUpam anvayi
   pratyabhijñāyamānaṃ, yenāsya na niranvayo nāśaḥ syādityata āha   #	pratyaBijQAyamAnan, yena asya na niranvayaH nASaH syAt iti atas Aha  #
   aspaṣṭapratyabhijñānāsvapīti.# /	aspazwa pratyaBijQAnAsu api iti.# /
   atrāpi tattoyaṃ tejasā mārtaṇḍamaṇḍalamambudatvāya nīyata ityanumeyaṃ,	atra api tat toyam tejasA mArtaNxa maNxalam ambuda tvAya nIyate iti anumeyaM,
   mṛdādīnīmanvayināmavicchedadarśanāt /	mRdAdInIm anvayinAma vicCeda darSanAt /
   śakyaṃ tatra vaktum'udambindau ca sindhau ca toyabhāvona bhidyate /	Sakyam tatra vaktum audambindO ca sinDO ca toya BAvona Bidyate /
   vinaṣṭe 'pi tato bindāvasti tasyānvayo 'mbudhau //	vinazwe api tatas bindO= asti tasya anvayaH ambuDO //
   'tasmānna kaścidapi niranvayo nāśa iti siddham //22 //	atasmAt na kaScid api niranvayaH nASaH iti sidDam //22 //
   # ubhayathā ca doṣāt.# /	# uBayaTA ca dozAt .# /
   parikaraḥ sāmagrī samyagjñānasya yamaniyamādiḥ śravaṇamananādiśca /	parikaraH sAmagrI samyak jQAnasya yama niyama AdiH SravaNam ananAdiH ca /
   mārgāḥ kṣaṇikanairātmyādibhāvanāḥ /	mArgAH kzaNika nErAtmya Adi BAvanAH /
   atirohitamanyat //23 //	atirohitam anyat //23 //
   # ākāśo cāviśeṣāt.# /	# AkASaH ca aviSezAt.# /
   etadvyācaṣṭe   # yacca teṣāmiti.# /	etat vyAcazwe  # yat ca tezAm iti.# /
   vedaprāmāṇye vipratipannānapi pratiśabdaguṇānumeyatvamākāśasya vaktavyam /	veda prAmANye vipratipannAn api prati Sabda guNa anumeya tvam AkASasya vaktavyam /
   tathāhi   jātimattvena sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyebhyo vibhaktasya	taTA hi  jAtimat tvena sAmAnya viSeza samavAyeByaH viBaktasya
   śabdasyāsparśatve sati bāhyaikendriyagrāhyatvena	Sabdasya asparSa tve sati bAhya eka indriya grAhya tvena
   gandhādivadguṇatvamanumitam /	ganDa Adi vat guNa tvam anumitam /
   nāyamātmaguṇo bāhyendrigocaratvāt /	na ayam Atma guNaH bAhya indri gocara tvAt /
   ata eva na manoguṇaḥ, tadguṇānāmapratyakṣatvāt /	atas eva na manaH guNaH, tad guNAnAm apratyakza tvAt /
   na pṛthivyādiguṇaḥ, tadguṇagandhādisāhacaryānupalabdheḥ /	na pRTivI Adi guNaH, tad guNa ganDa Adi sAha caryA anupalabDeH /
   tasmādguṇo bhūtvā gandhādivadasādhāraṇendriyagrāhyo yadravyamanumāpayati	tasmAt guNaH BUtvA ganDa Adi vat asADAraNa indriya grAhyaH yat ravyam anumApayati
   tadākāśaṃ pañcamaṃ bhūtaṃ vastviti /	tad AkASam paQcamam BUtam vastu iti /

   yadi tvabhāvādbhāvotpattiḥ syāttato 'bhāvatvāviśeṣāt śaśaviṣāṇādibhyo	yadi tu aBAvAt BAva utpattiH syAt tatas aBAva tva aviSezAt SaSa vizANa AdiByaH 
   'pyaṅgurotpattiḥ /	api aFgura utpattiH /
   nahyabhāvo viśiṣyate /	na hi aBAvaH viSizyate /

   viśeṣaṇayogamabhāvasyābhyupetyāha  # nāpyabhāvaḥ kasyacidutpattiheturiti.#	viSezaNa yogam aBAvasya aByupetya aha # na api aBAvaH kasyacid utpatti hetuH iti.#
   api ca yadyenānanvitaṃ na tattasya vikāraḥ, yathā ghaṭaśarāvodañcānādayo	api ca yadi ena ananvitam na tat tasya vikAraH, yaTA Gawa SarAva udaQca AnAdayaH 
   hemnānanvitā na hemavikāraḥ /	hemnAn anvitA na hema vikAraH /

   sthiro 'pi bhāvaḥ kramavatsahakārisamavadhānāt krameṇa kāryāṇi karoti /	sTiraH api BAvaH krama vat sahakAri samavaDAnAt krameNa kAryANi karoti /

   kintvanirvācya eva /	kintva nirvAcyaH eva /

   na caitāvatā sthirasyākāraṇatvaṃ, tadupādānatvātkāryasya,	na ca etAvatA sTirasya akAraNa tvan, tad upAdAna tvAt kAryasya,
   rajjūpādānatvamiva bhujaṅgasyetyuktam /	rajju upAdAna tvam iva BujaFgasya iti uktam /
   tathā ca śrutiḥ  mṛttiketyeva satyam' iti /	taTA ca SrutiH mRttikA iti eva satyam a iti /
   apica ye 'pi sarvato vilakṣaṇāni svalakṣaṇāni vastusantyāsthiṣata,	api ca ye api sarvatas vilakzaNAni sva lakzaNAni vastu santyA asTizata,
   teṣāmapi kimiti bījajātīyebhyo 'ṅkurajātīyānyeva jāyante kāryāṇi, natu	tezAm api kim iti bIja jAtIyeByaH aFkura jAtIyAni eva jAyante kAryANi, na tu
   kramelakajātīyāni /	kramelaka jAtIyAni /

   naca bījāṅguratve sāmānye paramārthasatī, yenaitayorbhāvikaḥ	na ca bIja aFgura tve sAmAnye parama arTa satI, yena etayoH BAvikaH

   atha pramātā pramāṇaṃ prameyaṃ pramitiriti hi catusṛṣu vidhāsu	aTa pramAtA pramANam prameyam pramitiH iti hi catusRzu viDAsu

   tasmādanena vijñānaskandhamātraṃ tattvaṃ vyavasthāpayatā catasro vidhā	tasmAt anena vijQAna skanDa mAtram tattvam vyavasTApayatA catasraH viDA
   eṣitavyāḥ, tathāca na vijñānaskandhamātraṃ tattvam /	ezitavyAH, taTA ca na vijQAna skanDa mAtram tattvam /

   evaṃ ca siddhasādhanam /	evam ca sidDa sADanam /

   nīlāditi /	nIlAt iti /
   tathāhi  svarūpaṃ vijñānasyāsatyākārayuktaṃ prameyaṃ prameyaprakāśanaṃ	taTA hi svarUpam vijQAnasya asati a AkAra yuktam prameyam prameya prakASanam

   # bāhyer'tha iti.# /	# bAhyer aTa iti.# /

   yadi jñānasthe eva pramāṇaphale bhavataḥ /	yadi jQAna sTe eva pramANa Pale BavataH /
   na ca jñānaṃ svalakṣaṇamanaṃśamaṃśābhyāṃ vastusabhdyāṃ yujyate /	na ca jQAnam sva lakzaNam anaMSam aMSAByAm vastu saBdyAm yujyate /
   tadeva jñānamajñānavyāvṛttikalpitajñānatvāṃśaṃ phalam /	tat eva jQAnam ajQAna vyAvRtti kalpita jQAna tva aMSam Palam /

   tathā cāhuḥ   'nahi vittisattaiva tadvedanā yuktā, tasyāḥ sarvatrāviśeṣāt	taTA ca AhuH   anahi vitti sattA eva tad vedanA yuktA, tasyAH sarvatra aviSezAt
   tāṃ tu sārūpyamāviśatsarūpayattadghaṭayet' iti /	tAm tu sArUpyam AviSat sarUpayat tat Gawayet a iti /
   praśnapūrvakaṃ bāhyārthābhāva upapattīrāha   # kathaṃ.#	praSna pUrvakam bAhya arTa aBAvaH upapattIH Aha  # kaTaM.#
   # punaravamyata iti.# /	# punar avamyate iti.# /
   sa hi vijñānālambanatvābhimato bāhyor'thaḥ paramāṇustāvanna saṃbhavati /	sa hi vijQAna Alambanatva aBimataH bAhyor aTaH paramANuH tAvat na saMBavati /
   ekasthūlanīlābhāsaṃ hi jñānaṃ na paramasūkṣmaparamāṇvābhāsam /	eka sTUla nIla ABAsam hi jQAnam na parama sUkzma paramANu ABAsam /
   na cānyābhāsamanyagocaraṃ bhavitumarhati /	na ca anya ABAsamanya gocaram Bavitum arhati /

   yadi pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ, advā, tathāsati hi svāṃśālambanameva	yadi pUrvaH kalpaH, advA, taTA asati hi sva aMSa Alambanam eva
   vijñānamabhyupetaṃ bhavati /	vijQAnam aByupetam Bavati /

   sthaulyam /	sTOlyam /

   sāṃvṛtaṃ pratibhāsasthaṃ tadekātmanyasaṃbhavāt //1 //	sAMvRtam pratiBAsa sTam tat eka Atmani asaMBavAt //1 //
   naca taddarśanaṃ bhrāntaṃ nānāvastugrahādyataḥ /	na ca tad darSanam BrAntam nAnA vastu grahAt yatas /
   sāṃvṛtaṃ grahaṇaṃ nānyatra ca vastugraho bhramaḥ //2 //	sAMvRtam grahaNam na anyatra ca vastu grahaH BramaH //2 //
   'iti /	aiti /
   tanna /	tat na /
   nairantaryāvabhāsasya bhrāntatvāt /	nErantarya avaBAsasya BrAnta tvAt /

   bhavitumarhanti /	Bavitum arhanti /

   tatra coktaṃ dūṣaṇam /	tatra ca uktam dUzaNam /
   bhede tu gavāśvasyevātyantavailakṣaṇyamiti na tādātmyam /	Bede tu gavASvasi A iva atyanta vElakzaNyam iti na tAdAtmyam /
   samavāyaśca nirākṛta iti /	samavAyaH ca nirAkRtaH iti /
   evaṃ bhedābhedavikalpena jātiguṇakarmādīnapi pratyācakṣīta /	evam Beda aBeda vikalpena jAti guNa karma AdIn api pratyAcakzIta /

   apratibhāsamānasadbhāve ca pramāṇābhāvānna bāhyālambanāḥ pratyayā iti /	apratiBAsamAna sadBAve ca pramANa aBAvAt na bAhya AlambanAH pratyayAH iti /
   api ca na tāvadvijñānamindriyavannilīnamarthaṃ pratyakṣayitumarhati /	api ca na tAvat vijQAnam indriya vat nilInam arTam pratyakzayitum arhati /
   nahi yathendriyamarthaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ janayatyevaṃ vijñānamaparaṃ vijñānaṃ	na hi yaTA indriyam arTa vizayam jQAnam janayati evam vijQAnam aparam vijQAnam
   janayitumarhati /	janayitum arhati /
   tatrāpi samānatvādanuyogasyānavasthāprasaṅgāt /	tatra api samAna tvAt anuyogasya anavasTA prasaFgAt /
   na cārthādhāraṃ prākaṭyalakṣaṇaṃ phalamādhātumutsahate /	na ca arTa ADAram prAkawya lakzaNam Palam ADAtum utsahate /
   atītānāgateṣu tadasaṃbhavāt /	atIta anAgatezu tad asaMBavAt /

   tasmājjñānasvarūpapratyakṣataivārthapratyakṣatābhyupeyā /	tasmAt jQAna svarUpa pratyakzatA eva arTa pratyakza tA aByupeyAH /
   taccānākāraṃ sadājānato bhedābhāvāt kathamarthabhedaṃ vyavasthāpayediti	tat ca anAkAram sat AjAnataH Beda aBAvAt kaTam arTa Bedam vyavasTApayet iti
   tadbhedavyavasthāpanāyākārabhedo 'syaiṣitavyaḥ /	tad Beda vyavasTApanAya AkAra BedaH asya ezitavyaH /
   taduktam   'na hi vittisattaiva tadvedanā yuktā, tasyāḥ sarvatrāviśeṣāt /	tat uktam   ana hi vitti sattA eva tad vedanA yuktA, tasyAH sarvatra aviSezAt /
   tāṃ tu sārūpyamāviśatsarūpayattadghaṭayet' iti /	tAm tu sArUpyam AviSat sarUpayat tat Gawayet a iti /
   ekaścāyamākāro 'nubhūyate /	ekaH ca ayam AkAraH anuBUyate /
   sa cedvijñānasya nārthasadbhāve kiñcana pramāṇamastītyāha   #	sa ced vijQAnasya na arTa sadBAve kiQcana pramANam asti iti Aha  #
   apicānubhavamātreṇa sādhāraṇātmano jñānasyeti /	apicA anu Bava mAtreNa sADAraNa AtmanaH jQAnasya iti /
   api ca sahopalambhaniyamāditi.# /	api ca saha upalamBa niyamAt iti.# /
   yadyena saha niyatasahopalambhanaṃ tattato na bhidyate,	yat yena saha niyata saha upalamBanam tat tatas na Bidyate,
   yathaikasmāccandramaso dvitīyaścandramāḥ /	yaTA ekasmAt candramasaH dvitIyaH candramAH /
   niyatasahopalambhanaścārtho jñāneneti vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhiḥ /	niyata saha upalamBanaH ca arTaH jQAnena iti vyApaka virudDa upalabDiH /
   niṣedhyo hi bhedaḥ sahopalambhāniyamena vyāpto yathā bhinnāvaśvinau	nizeDyaH hi BedaH saha upalamBa aniyamena vyAptaH yaTA BinnO= aSvinO
   nāvaśyaṃ sahopavabhyete kadācidabhrāpidhāne 'nyatarasyaikasyopalabdheḥ /	na avaSyam saha upavaByete kadAcid aBra apiDAne anyatarasya ekasya upalabDeH /
   so 'yamiha bhedavyāpakāniyamavirūddho niyama upalabhyamānastadvyāpyaṃ	saH ayam iha Beda vyApakAn iyama virUdDaH niyamaH upalaByamAnaH tat vyApyam
   bhedaṃ nivartayatīti /	Bedam nivartayati iti /
   taduktam   'sahopalambaniyamādabhedo nīlataddhiyoḥ /	tat uktam   asaha upalamba niyamAt aBedaH nIla tad DiyoH /
   bhedaśca bhrāntivijñānairddṛśyatendāvivādvaye //	BedaH ca BrAnti vijQAnEH ddRSyata indO= iva advaye //
   'iti. # svapnādivaccedaṃ draṣṭavyam.# /	aiti. # svapna Adi vat ca idam drazwavyam .# /
   yo yaḥ pratyayaḥ sa sarvo bāhyānāvambanaḥ, yathā svapnamāyādipratyayaḥ,	yaH yaH pratyayaH sa sarvaH bAhyAnAvambanaH, yaTA svapna mAyA Adi pratyayaH,
   tathā caiṣa vivādādhyāsitaḥ pratyaya iti svabhāvahetuḥ /	taTA ca eza vivAda aDyAsitaH pratyayaH iti svaBAva hetuH /
   bāhyānālambanatā hi pratyayatvamātrānubandhinī vṛkṣateva	bAhya anAlambanatA hi pratyaya tva mAtra anubanDinI vRkzatA iva
   śiṃśapātvamātrānubandhinīti tanmātrānubandhini nirālambanatve sādhye	SiMSapAtu amAtra anubanDinI iti tanmAtra anubanDini nirAlambana tve sADye
   bhavati pratyayatvaṃ svabhāvahetuḥ /	Bavati pratyaya tvam svaBAva hetuH /
   atrāntare sautrāntikaścodayati   # kathaṃ punarasi bāhyer'the.#nīlamidaṃ	atra antare sOtra antikaH codayati  # kaTam punar asi bAhyer aTe.#nIlam idam
   pītamityādi # pratyayavaicitryamupapadyate.# /	pItam ityAdi # pratyaya vEcitryam upapadyate.# /
   sa hi mene ye yasmin satyapi kādācitkāste sarve tadatiriktahetusāpekṣāḥ,	sa hi mene ye yasmin sati api kAdAcid kAH te sarve tad atirikta hetu sApekzAH,
   yathāvivakṣatyajigamiṣati mayi vacanagamanapratibhāsāḥ	yaTA avivakzati ajigamizati mayi vacana gamana pratiBAsAH
   pratyayāścetanasaṃtānāntarasāpekṣāḥ /	pratyayAH cetana saMtAna antara sApekzAH /
   tathā ca vivādādhyāsitāḥ satyapyālayavijñānasaṃtāne ṣaḍapi	taTA ca vivAda aDyAsitAH sati api Alaya vijQAna saMtAne zaz api
   pravṛttipratyayā iti svabhāvahetuḥ /	pravRtti pratyayAH iti svaBAva hetuH /
   yaścāsāvālayavijñānasaṃtānātiriktaḥ kādācitkapravṛttijñānabhedahetuḥ sa	yaH ca asO= Alaya vijQAna saMtAna atiriktaH kAdAcid ka pravRtti jQAna Beda hetuH sa
   bāhyor'thaṃ iti /	bAhyor aTam iti /
   vāsanāparipākapratyayakādācitkatvāt kadācidutpāda iti cet /	vAsanA paripAka pratyaya kAdAcitka tvAt kadAcid utpAdaH iti ced /
   nanvekasaṃtatipatitānāmālayavijñānānāṃ	nanu eka saMtati patitAnAm Alaya vijQAnAnAm
   tatpravṛttivijñānajananaśaktirvāsanā , tasyāśca svakāryopajanaṃ	tad pravRtti vijQAna janana SaktiH vAsanAH , tasyAH ca sva kArya upajanam
   pratyābhimukhyaṃ paripākastasya ca pratyayaḥ svasaṃtānavartī pūrvakṣaṇaḥ	pratyABimuKyam paripAkaH tasya ca pratyayaH sva saMtAna vartI pUrvakzaNaH
   saṃtānāntarāpekṣānabhyupagamāt, tathāca sarve 'pyālayasaṃtānapatitāḥ	saMtAna antara apekzA anaByupagamAt, taTA ca sarve api Alaya saMtAna patitAH
   paripākahetavo bhaveyuḥ /	paripAka hetavaH BaveyuH /
   na vā kaścidapi, ālayasaṃtānapātitvāviśeṣāt /	na vA kaScid api, Alaya saMtA ana pAti tva aviSezAt /
   kṣaṇabhedācchaktibhedastasya ca kādācitkatvātkāryakādācitkatvamiti cet /	kzaNa BedAt Sakti BedaH tasya ca kAdAcid ka tvAt kAryakAdAcid ka tvam iti ced /
   nanvevamekasyaiva nīlajñānopajanasāmarthyaṃ tatprabodhasāmarthyaṃ ceti	nanu evam ekasya eva nIla jQAna upajana sAmarTyam tad praboDa sAmarTyam ca iti
   kṣaṇāntarasyaitanna syāt /	kzaNa antarasya etat na syAt /
   satve vā kathaṃ kṣaṇabhedātsāmarthyabheda ityālayasaṃtānavartinaḥ sarve	satve vA kaTam kzaNa BedAt sAmarTya BedaH iti Alaya saMtAna vartinaH sarve
   samarthā iti samarthahetusadbhāve kāryakṣepānupapatteḥ /	samarTAH iti samarTa hetu sadBAve kArya kzepa anupapatteH /
   svasaṃtānamātrādhīnatve niṣedhyasya kādācitkatvasya viruddhaṃ sadātanatvaṃ	sva saMtAna mAtra aDIna tve nizeDyasya kAdAcid ka tvasya virudDam sadAtana tvam
   tasyopalabdhyā kādācitkatvaṃ nivartamānaṃ hetvantarāpekṣatve vyavatiṣṭhata	tasya upalabDyA kAdAcid ka tvam nivartamAnam hetu antara apekza tve vyavatizWata
   iti pratibandhasiddhiḥ /	iti pratibanDa sidDiH /
   naca jñānasaṃtānāntaranibandhanatvaṃ sarveṣāmiṣyate pravṛttivijñānānāṃ	na ca jQAna saMtAna antara nibanDana tvam sarvezAm izyate pravRtti vijQAnAnAm
   vijñānavādibhirapi tu kasyacideva vicchinnagamanavacanapratibhāsasya	vijQAna vAdiBiH api tu kasyacid eva vicCinna gamana vacana pratiBAsasya
   pravṛttivijñānasya /	pravRtti vijQAnasya /
   api ca sattvāntarasaṃtānanimittatve tasyāpi sadā saṃnidhānānna	api ca sattva antara saMtAna nimitta tve tasya api sadA saMniDAnAt na
   kādācitkatvaṃ syāt /	kAdAcid ka tvam syAt /
   na hi sattvāntarasaṃtānasya deśataḥ kālato vā viprakarṣasaṃbhavaḥ /	na hi sattva antara saMtAnasya deSataH kAlataH vA viprakarza saMBavaH /
   vijñānavāde vijñānātiriktadeśānābhyupagamādamūrtatvācca	vijQAna vAde vijQAna atirikta deSAnAByupagamAt amUrta tvAt ca
   vijñānānāmadeśātmakatvātsaṃsārasyādimatvāprasaṅgenāpūrvasattvaprādurbhāvānabhyupagamācca	vijQAnAnAm adeSa Atmaka tvAt saMsArasya AdimatvA prasaFgena apUrva sattva prAdurBAva anaByupagamAt ca
   na kālato 'pi viprakarṣasaṃbhavaḥ /	na kAlataH api viprakarza saMBavaH /

   iti sautrāntikāḥ pratipedire, tānnirākaroti   #	iti sOtra antikAH pratipedire, tAn nirAkaroti  #

   heturanaikāntikaḥ /	hetuH anEkAntikaH /
   tathāhi   bāhyanimittakatve 'pi kathaṃ kadācit nīlasaṃvedanaṃ kadācit	taTA hi  bAhya nimittaka tve api kaTam kadAcid nIla saMvedanam kadAcid 
   pītasaṃvedanam /	pIta saMvedanam /
   bāhyanīlapītasaṃnidhānāsaṃnidhānābhyāmiti cet /	bAhya nIla pIta saMniDAna asaMniDAnAByAm iti ced /
   atha pītasaṃnidhāne 'pi kimiti nīlajñānaṃ na bhavati, pītajñānaṃ bhavati /	aTa pIta saMniDAne api kim iti nIla jQAnam na Bavati, pIta jQAnam Bavati /
   tatra tasya sāmarthyādasāmarthyāccetarasminniti cet /	tatra tasya sAmarTyAt asAmarTyAt ca itarasmin= iti ced /

   hetubhedāditi cet /	hetu BedAt iti ced /
   evaṃ tarhi kṣaṇānāmapi svakāraṇabhedanibandhaḥ śaktibhedo bhaviṣyati /	evam tarhi kzaNAnAm api sva kAraNa Beda nibanDaH Sakti BedaH Bavizyati /
   saṃtānino hi kṣaṇāḥ kāryabhedahetavaste ca pratikāryaṃ bhidyante ca /	saMtAninaH hi kzaNAH kArya Beda hetavaH te ca pratikAryam Bidyante ca /
   na ca saṃtāno nāma kaścideka utpādakaḥ kṣaṇānāṃ yadabhedāt kṣaṇā na	na ca saMtAnaH nAma kaScid ekaH utpAdakaH kzaNAnAm yat aBedAt kzaNAH na
   bhidyeran /	Bidyeran /

   kṣaṇānāmekasāmarthyopalabdheḥ /	kzaNAnAm eka sAmarTya upalabDeH /

   jāyeran. tatsamarthasyātītatvāt, kṣaṇāntarāṇāṃ cāsāmarthyāt /	jAyeran. tad samarTasya atIta tvAt, kzaNa antarANAm ca asAmarTyAt /
   tasmāt kṣaṇabhede 'pi na sāmarthyabhedaḥ, saṃtānabhede tu sāmarthyaṃ	tasmAt kzaNa Bede api na sAmarTya BedaH, saMtAna Bede tu sAmarTyam
   bhidyata iti /	Bidyate iti /
   tanna /	tat na /
   yadi bhinnānāṃ saṃtānānāṃ naikaṃ sāmarthyaṃ, hanta tarhi nīlasaṃtānānāmapi	yadi BinnAnAm saMtAnAnAm na ekam sAmarTyan, hanta tarhi nIla saMtAnAnAm api
   mitho bhinnānāṃ naikamasti nīlākārādhānasāmarthyamiti saṃnidhāne 'pi	miTas BinnAnAm na ekam asti nIla AkAra ADAna sAmarTyam iti saMniDAne api
   nīlasaṃtānāntarasya na nīlajñānamupajāyeta /	nIla saMtAna antarasya na nIla jQAnam upajAyeta /

   keṣāñcideva sāmarthyabhedaḥ keṣāñcinneti vaktavyam /	kezAQcid eva sAmarTya BedaH kezAQcit na iti vaktavyam /
   tathā caikālayajñānasaṃtānapatiteṣu kasyacideva jñānakṣaṇasya sa tādṛśaḥ	taTA ca eka Alaya jQAna saMtAna patitezu kasyacid eva jQA na kzaNasya sa tAdRSaH
   sāmarthyātiśayo vāsanāparanāmā svapratyayāsāditaḥ /	sAmarTya atiSayaH vAsanA para nAmA sva pratyaya AsAditaH /
   yato nīlākāraṃ pravṛttivijñānaṃ jāyate na pītākāram /	yatas nIla AkAram pravRtti vijQAnam jAyate na pIta AkAram /
   kasyacittu sa tādṛśo yataḥ pītākāraṃ jñānaṃ na nīlākāramiti	kasyacid tu sa tAdRSaH yatas pIta AkAram jQAnam na nIla AkAram iti
   vāsanāvaicitryādeva svapratyayāsāditājjñānavaicitryasiddherna	vAsanA vEcitryAt eva sva pratyaya AsAditAt jQAna vEcitrya sidDeH na

   tadvaicitryānnīlādyanubhavavaicitryaṃ, pūrvanīlādyanubhavavaicitryācca	tad vEcitryAt nIla Adi anuBava vEcitryan, pUrva nIla Adi anuBava vEcitryAt ca
   vāsanāvaicitryamityanāditānayorvijñānavāsanayoḥ /	vAsanA vEcitryam iti anAdita anayoH vijQAna vAsanayoH /

   anvayavyatirekābhyāmapi vāsanāvaicitryasyaiva jñānavaicitryahetutā	anvaya vyatirekAByAm api vAsanA vEcitryasya eva jQAna vEcitrya hetu tA
   nārthavaicitryasyetyāha   # api cānvayavyatirekābhyāmiti /	na arTa vEcitryasya iti Aha  # api ca anvaya vyatirekAByAm iti /
   evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ /	evam prApte brUmaH /
   nābhāva upalabdheriti.# /	na aBAvaH upalabDeH iti.# /

   bāhyāviṣayatvādvā, satyapi bāhyaviṣayatve	bAhya avizaya tvAt vA, sati api bAhya vizaya tve

   upalabdheriti.# /	upalabDeH iti.# /

   vaktumityarthaḥ /	vaktum iti arTaH /
   dvitīyaṃ pakṣamavalambate   # nanu nāhamevaṃ bravīmīti.# /	dvitIyam pakzam avalambate  # nanu na aham evam bravImi iti.# /
   nirākaroti   # bāḍhamevaṃ bravīṣi.# /	nirAkaroti  # bAXam evam bravIzi.# /
   upalabdhigrāhiṇā hi sākṣiṇopalabdhirgṛhyamāṇā bāhyaviṣayatvenaiva gṛhyate	upalabDi grAhiNA hi sAkziNA upalabDiH gRhyamANA bAhya vizaya tvena eva gRhyate
   nopalabdhimātramityarthaḥ /	na upalabDi mAtram iti arTaH /
   # ataśca.#iti vakṣyamāṇopapattiparāmarśaḥ /	# atas ca.#iti vakzyamANa upapatti parAmarSaH /

   nirākaroti   # nāyaṃ sādhuradhyavasāya iti.# /	nirAkaroti  # na ayam sADuH aDyavasAyaH iti.# /
   idamatrākūtam   ghaṭapaṭādayo hi sthūlā bhāsante na tu paramasūkṣmāḥ /	idam atra AkUtam  Gawa pawa AdayaH hi sTUlAH BAsante na tu parama sUkzmAH /
   tatredaṃ nānādigdeśavyāpitvalakṣaṇaṃ sthaulyaṃ yadyapi	tatra idam nAnA diS deSa vyApi tva lakzaNam sTOlyam yadi api
   jñānākāratvenāvaraṇānāvaraṇalakṣaṇena viruddhadharmasaṃsargeṇa yujyate	jQAna AkAra tvena AvaraNa an AvaraNa lakzaNena virudDa Darma saMsargeNa yujyate
   jñānopādheranāvṛtatvādeva tathāpi	jQAna upADeH anAvRta tvAt eva taTA api
   taddeśatvātaddeśatvakampatvaraktāraktatvalakṣaṇairviruddhadharmasaṃsargairasya	tad deSa tva Atad deSa tva kampa tva raktA raktatva lakzaNEH virudDa Darma saMsargEH asya
   nānātvaṃ prasajyamānaṃ jñānākāratve 'pi na śakyaṃ śakreṇāpi vārayitum /	nAnAtvam prasajyamAnam jQAna AkAra tve api na Sakyam SakreNa api vArayitum /
   vyatirekāvyatirekavṛttivikalpau ca paramāṇoraṃśavattvaṃ copapāditāni	vyatireka avyatireka vRtti vikalpO ca paramANoH aMSavat tvam ca upapAditAni
   vaiśeṣikaparīkṣāyām /	vESezika parIkzAyAm /

   ākārāṇāṃ vā jñānatādātmyādekatvaprasaṅgāt /	AkArANAm vA jQAna tAdAtmyAt eka tva prasaFgAt /
   na ca yāvanta ākārāstāvantyeva jñānāni, tāvatāṃ jñānānāṃ mitho	na ca yAvantaH AkArAH tAvanti eva jQAnAni, tAvatAm jQAnAnAm miTas 
   vārtāmabhijñatayā sthūlānubhavābhāvaprasaṅgāt /	vArtAm aBijQa tayA sTUla anuBava aBAva prasaFgAt /

   ekatra pratiṣiddhatvādbahuṣvapi na saṃbhavaḥ //	ekatra pratizidDa tvAt bahuzu api na saMBavaH //
   'iti /	aiti /
   tasmādbhavatāpi jñānākāraṃ sthaulyaṃ samarthayamānena #	tasmAt BavatA api jQAna AkAram sTOlyam samarTayamAnena #
   pramāṇapravṛttyapravṛttipūrvakau saṃbhavāsaṃbhavā.#vāstheyau /	pramANa pravRtti apravRtti pUrvakO saMBava asaMBavA. #vAsTeyO /
   tathā cedantāspadamaśakyaṃ jñānādbhinnaṃ yabāhyamapahnotumiti /	taTA ced anta Aspadam aSakyam jQAnAt Binnam yabAhyam apahnotum iti /
   yacca jñānasya pratyarthaṃ vyavasthāyai viṣayasārūpyamāsthitaṃ, naitena	yat ca jQAnasya pratyarTam vyavasTAyE vizaya sArUpyam AsTitaM, na etena
   viṣayo 'pahnotuṃ śakyaḥ, asatyarthe tatsārūpyasya	vizayaH apahnotum SakyaH, asati arTe tad sArUpyasya
   tadvyavasthāyāścānupapatterityāha  # na ca jñānasya viṣayasārūpyāditi..# /	tad vyavasTAyAH ca anupapatteH iti Aha # na ca jQAnasya vizaya sArUpyAt iti..# /
   yaśca sahopalambhaniyama uktaḥ śo 'pi vkalpaṃ na sahate /	yaH ca saha upalamBa niyamaH uktaH SaH api vkalpam na sahate /
   yadi jñānārthayoḥ sāhityenopalambhastato viruddho heturnābhedaṃ	yadi jQAna arTayoH sAhityena upalamBaH tatas virudDaH hetuH na aBedam
   sādhayitumarhati, sāhityasya tadviruddhabhedavyāptatvādabhede	sADayitum arhati, sAhityasya tad virudDa Beda vyApta tvAt aBede
   tadanupapatteḥ /	tad anupapatteH /
   athaikopalambhaniyamaḥ /	aTa eka upalamBa niyamaH /
   na ekatvasyāvācakaḥ sahaśabdaḥ /	na eka tvasya avAcakaH saha SabdaH /
   api ca kimekatvenopalambha āho eka upālambho jñānārthayoḥ /	api ca kim eka tvena upalamBaH Aho ekaH upAlamBaH jQAna arTayoH /
   na tāvadekatvenopalambha ityāha   # bahirupalabdheśca viṣayasya.# /	na tAvat eka tvena upalamBaH iti Aha  # bahis upalabDeH ca vizayasya.# /
   athaikopalambhaniyamaḥ, tatrāha   # ata eva sahopalambhaniyamo 'pi	aTa eka upalamBa niyamaH, tatra aha  # atas eva saha upalamBa niyamaH api
   pratyayaviṣayo 'rupāyopeyabhāvahetuko nābhedahetuka ityavagantavyam.# /	pratyaya vizayaH aru pAya upeya BAva hetukaH nABeda hetukaH iti avagantavyam .# /
   yathā hi sarvaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ prabhārūpānuviddhaṃ buddhibodhyaṃ niyamena	yaTA hi sarvam cAkzuzam praBA rUpa anuvidDam budDi boDyam niyamena
   manujairupalabhyate, na caitāvatā ghaṭādirūpaṃ prabhātmakaṃ bhavati,kintu	manujEH upalaByate, na ca etAvatA Gawa Adi rUpam praBA Atmakam Bavati,kintu
   prabhopāyatvānniyamaḥ,	praBA upAya tvAt niyamaH,
   evamihāpyātmasākṣikānubhavopāyatvādarthasyaikopalambhaniyama iti /	evam iha api Atma sAkzika anuBava upAya tvAt arTasya eka upalamBa niyamaH iti /
   api ca yatraikavijñānagocarau ghaṭapaṭau tatrārthabhedaṃ vijñānabhedaṃ	api ca yatra eka vijQAna gocarO Gawa pawO tatra arTa Bedam vijQAna Bedam
   cādyavasyanti pratipattāraḥ /	ca adyavasyanti pratipattAraH /
   na caitadekātmye 'vakalpata ityāha   # tathā ghaṭadarśanaṃ paṭajñānamiti.#	na ca etat ekAtmye avakalpate iti Aha  # taTA Gawa darSanam pawa jQAnam iti. #
   tathārthābhede 'pi vijñānabhedadarśanānna vijñānātmakatvamarthasyetyāha  	taTA arTa aBede api vijQAna Beda darSanAt na vijQAna Atmaka tvam arTasya iti Aha  
   # tathā ghaṭadarśanaṃ ghaṭasmaraṇamiti.# /	# taTA Gawa darSanam Gawa smaraNam iti.# /
   api ca svarūpamātraparyavasitaṃ jñānaṃ jñānāntaravārtānabhijñamiti	api ca sva rUpa mAtra paryavasitam jQAnam jQAna antara vArtAn aBijQam iti
   yayorbhedaste dve na gṛhīte iti bhedo 'pi tadgato na gṛhīta iti /	yayoH BedaH te dve na gRhIte iti BedaH api tad gataH na gRhItaH iti /
   evaṃ kṣaṇikaśūnyānātmatvādayo	evam kzaNika SUnyAnAtma tvAt ayaH 
   'pyanekapratijñāhetudṛṣṭāntajñānabhedasādhyāḥ /	api aneka pratijQA hetu dRzwAnta jQAna Beda sADyAH /
   evaṃ svamasādhāraṇamanyato vyāvṛtaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yasya tadapi yadvyāvartate	evam svam asADAraNam anyatas vyAvRtam lakzaNam yasya tat api yat vyAvartate
   yataśca vyāvartate tadanekajñānasādhyam /	yatas ca vyAvartate tad aneka jQAna sADyam /
   evaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇamapi vidhirūpamanyāpoharūpaṃ vānekajñānagamyam /	evam sAmAnya lakzaNam api viDi rUpam anya apoha rUpam vA aneka jQAna gamyam /
   evaṃ vāsyavāsakabhāvo 'nekajñānasādhyaḥ /	evam vAsya vAsaka BAvaH aneka jQAna sADyaH /
   evamavidyopaplavavaśena yatsadasaddharmatvaṃ yathā nīlamiti saddharmaḥ,	evam avidyA upaplava vaSena yat sat asat Darma tvam yaTA nIlam iti sadDarmaH,
   naraviṣāṇāmityasaddharmaḥ, amūrtamiti sadasaddharmaḥ /	nara vizANAm iti asat DarmaH, amUrtam iti sat asat DarmaH /
   śakyaṃ hi śaśaviṣāṇamamūrtaṃ vaktum /	Sakyam hi SaSa vizANam amUrtam vaktum /
   śakyaṃ ca vijñānamamūrtaṃ vaktum /	Sakyam ca vijQAnam amUrtam vaktum /
   yathoktam   'anādivāsanodbhūtavikalpapariniṣṭhitaḥ /	yaTA uktam  aanAdi vAsanA udBUta vikalpa parinizWitaH /
   śabdārthastrividho dharmo bhāvābhāvobhayāśrayaḥ //	Sabda arTaH triviDaH DarmaH BAva aBAva uBayASrayaH //
   'iti /	aiti /
   evaṃ mokṣapratijñā ca yo mucyate yataśca mucyate yena mucyate	evam mokza pratijQA ca yaH mucyate yatas ca mucyate yena mucyate
   tadanekajñānasādhyā /	tad aneka jQAna sADyAH /
   evaṃ vipratipannaṃ pratipādayituṃ pratijñeti yatpratipādayati yena	evam vipratipannam pratipAdayitum pratijQA iti yat pratipAdayati yena
   pratipādayati yaśca	pratipAdayati yaH ca
   tadanekajñānasādhyetyasatyekasminnanekārthajñānapratisaṃghātari	tad aneka jQAna sADya iti asati ekasmin= aneka arTa jQAna pratisaMGAtari
   nopapadyate /	na upapadyate /
   tatsarvaṃ vijñānasya svāṃśālambane 'nupapannamityāha   # api ca	tat sarvam vijQAnasya sva aMSa Alambane anupapannam iti Aha  # api ca
   dvayorvijñānayoḥ pūrvottarakālayoriti.# /	dvayoH vijQAnayoH pUrva uttara kAlayoH iti.# /
   api ca bhedāśrayaḥ karmaphalabhāvo nābhinne jñāne bhavitumarhati /	api ca Beda ASrayaH karma Pala BAvaH na aBinne jQAne Bavitum arhati /
   no khalu chidā chidyate kintu dāru /	no Kalu CidA Cidyate kintu dAru /
   nāpi pākaḥ pacyate 'pi tu taṇḍulāḥ /	na api pAkaH pacyate api tu taNxulAH /
   tadihāpi na jñānaṃ svāṃśena jñeyamātmani vṛttivirodhādapi tu	tat iha api na jQAnam sva aMSena jQeyam Atmani vRtti viroDAt api tu
   tadatiriktor'thaḥ,pācyā iva taṇḍulāḥ pākātiriktā iti /	tad atiriktor aTaH,pAcyAH iva taNxulAH pAka atiriktAH iti /
   bhūmiracanāpūrvakamāha  #   kiñcānyat /	BUmi racana apUrvakam Aha #  kiQca anyat /
   vijñānaṃ vijñānamityabhyupagaccheteti.# /	vijQAnam vijQAnam iti aByupagacCeta iti.# /
   codayati #   nanu vijñānasya svarūpavyatiriktagrāhyatva iti.# /	codayati #  nanu vijQAnasya svarUpa vyatirikta grAhya tvaH iti.# /
   ayamarthaḥ   svarūpādatiriktamarthaṃ cedvijñānaṃ gṛhṇāti	ayam arTaH  svarUpAt atiriktam arTam ced vijQAnam gRhNAti
   tatastadapratyakṣaṃ sannarthaṃ pratyakṣayitumarhati /	tatas tad apratyakzam sannarTam pratyakzayitum arhati /
   na hi cakṣuriva tannilīnamarthe kañcanātiśayamādhatte,	na hi cakzuH iva tad nilInam arTe kaQcana atiSayam ADatte,
   yenārthamapratyakṣaṃ satpratyakṣayet /	yena arTam apratyakzam sat pratyakzayet /
   apitu tatpratyakṣataivārthapratyakṣatā /	api tu tad pratyakzatA eva arTa pratyakza tA /
   yathāhuḥ   'apratyakṣopalambhasya nārthadṛṣṭiḥ prasidhyati'iti /	yaTA AhuH   aapratyakza upalamBasya na arTa dRzwiH prasiDyati aiti /
   taccet jñānāntareṇa pratīyeta tadapratītaṃ nārthaviṣayaṃ	tat ced jQAna antareNa pratIyeta tat apratItam na arTa vizayam
   jñānamaparokṣayitumarhati /	jQAnam aparokzayitum arhati /
   evaṃ tattadityanavasthā tasmādanavasthāyā bibhyatā varaṃ svātmani	evam tat tat iti anavasTA tasmAt anavasTAyAH biByatA varam sva Atmani
   vṛttirāsthitā /	vRttiH AsTitA /
   apica yathā pradīpo na dīpāntaramapekṣate, evaṃ jñānamapi na	api ca yaTA pradIpaH na dIpa antaram apekzate, evam jQAnam api na
   jñānāntaramapekṣitumarhati samatvāditi /	jQAna antaram apekzitum arhati sama tvAt iti /
   tadetatpariharati   # tadubhayamapyasat /	tat etat pariharati  # tat uBayam api asat /
   vijñānagrahaṇamātra eva vijñānasākṣiṇo	vijQAna grahaNa mAtraH eva vijQAna sAkziNaH 
   grahaṇākāṅkṣānutpādādanavasthāśaṅkānupapatteḥ.# /	grahaNa AkAFkza anutpAdAt anavasTA SaFkA anupapatteH.# /
   ayamarthaḥ   satyamapratyakṣasyopalambhasya nārthadṛṣṭiḥ prasidhyati, na	ayam arTaH  satyam apratyakzasya upalamBasya na arTa dRzwiH prasiDyati, na
   tūpalabdhāraṃ prati tatpratyakṣatvāyopalambhāntaraṃ prārthanīyam, apitu	tu upalabDAram prati tad pratyakza tvAya upalamBa antaram prArTanIyam, apitu
   tasminnindriyārthasaṃnikarṣādantaḥ karaṇavikārabheda utpannamātra eva	tasmin= indriya arTa saMnikarzAt antar karaNa vikAra BedaH utpanna mAtre eva
   prabhāturarthaścopalambhaśca pratyakṣau bhavataḥ /	praBAtuH arTaH ca upalamBaH ca pratyakzO BavataH /
   artho hi nilīnasvabhāvaḥ pramātāraṃ prati	arTaH hi nilIna svaBAvaH pramAtAram prati
   svapratyakṣatvāyāntaḥkaraṇavikārabhedamanubhavamapekṣate, anubhavastu jaḍo	sva pratyakza tvAya antaHkaraNa vikAra Bedam anuBavam apekzate, anuBavaH tu jaxaH 
   'pi svacchatayā caitanyūbimbodgrahaṇāya nānubhavāntaramapekṣate,	api svacCa tayA cEtanyUbimba udgrahaNAya na anuBava antaram apekzate,
   yenānavasthā bhavet /	yena anavasTA Bavet /
   nahyasti saṃbhavo 'nubhava utpannaśca,na ca pramātuḥ pratyakṣo bhavati,	na hi asti saMBavaH anuBavaH utpannaH ca,na ca pramAtuH pratyakzaH Bavati,
   yathā nīlādiḥ /	yaTA nIla AdiH /
   tasmādyathā chettā chidayā chedyaṃ vṛkṣādi vyāpnoti, na tu chidā	tasmAt yaTA CettA CidayA Cedyam vRkza Adi vyApnoti, na tu CidA
   chidāntareṇa, nāpi chidaiva chetrī, kintu svata eva devadattādiḥ, yathā vā	CidA antareNa, na api CidA eva CetrI, kintu svatas eva devadatta AdiH, yaTA vA
   paktā pākyaṃ pākena vyāpnoti nanu pākaṃ pākāntareṇa, nāpi pāka eva paktā	paktA pAkyam pAkena vyApnoti nanu pAkam pAka antareNa, na api pAkaH eva paktA
   kintu svata eva devadettādiḥ, evaṃ pramātā prameyaṃ nīlādi pramayā	kintu svatas eva devadetta AdiH, evam pramAtA prameyam nIla Adi pramayA
   vyāpnoti na tu pramāṃ pramāntareṇa, nāpi pramaiva pramātrī, kintu svata	vyApnoti na tu pramAm pramA antareNa, na api pramA eva pramAtrI, kintu svata
   eva pramāyāḥ pramātā vyāpakaḥ /	eva pramAyAH pramAtA vyApakaH /
   na ca pramātari kūṭasthanityacaitanye pramāpekṣāsaṃbhavo yataḥ pramātuḥ	na ca pramAtari kUwasTa nitya cEtanye pramA pekzA saMBavaH yatas pramAtuH
   pramāyāḥ pramātrantarāpekṣāyāmanavasthā bhavet /	pramAyAH pramAtR antara apekzAyAm anavasTA Bavet /
   tasmāt suṣṭhūktaṃ 'vijñānagrahaṇamātra eva vijñānasākṣiṇaḥ pramātuḥ	tasmAt suzWu uktam avijQAna grahaNa mAtraH eva vijQAna sAkziNaH pramAtuH
   kūṭasthanityacaitanyasya grahaṇakāṅkṣānutpādāt' iti /	kUwasTa nitya cEtanyasya grahaNa kAFkzA nutpAdAt a iti /

   tatrāha  # sākṣipratyayayośca	tatra aha # sAkzi pratyayayoH ca
   svabhāvavaiṣamyādupalabdhrupalabhyabhāvopapatteḥ.# /	svaBAva vEzamyAt upalabDrupalaBya BAva upapatteH.# /

   bāhyārthasya, phale phalāntarānupapatteḥ. yathāhuḥ   'na saṃvidaryate	bAhya arTasya, Pale Pala antara anupapatteH. yaTA AhuH   ana saMvidaryate
   phalatvāt' iti /	Pala tvAt a iti /

   prakaṭā /	prakawAH /
   yathāhuranye   nāsyāḥ karmabhāvo vidyate iti /	yaTA AhuH anye  na asyAH karma BAvaH vidyate iti /
   syādetatṣa yatprakāśate tadanyena prakāśyate yathā jñānārthau tathā ca	syAt etat za yat prakASate tad anyena prakASyate yaTA jQAna arTO taTA ca
   sākṣiti nāsti pratyayasākṣiṇorvaiṣamyamityata āha   # svayaṃsiddhasya ca	sAkziti na asti pratyaya sAkziNoH vEzamyam iti atas Aha  # svayaMsidDasya ca
   sākṣiṇo 'pratyākhyeyatvāt.# /	sAkziNaH apratyAKyeya tvAt.# /
