   nityasākṣātkāratānāgantukaprakāśatve ghaṭate /	nitya sAkzAtkAra tAn Agantuka prakASa tve Gawate /
   tathāhi   pramātā saṃdihāno 'pyasaṃdigdho viparyasyannapyaviparītaḥ	taTA hi  pramAtA saMdihAnaH api asaMdigDaH viparyasyan= api aviparItaH
   parokṣamarthamutprekṣamāṇo 'pyaparokṣaḥ smarannapyanubhavikaḥ	parokzam arTam ud prekzamANaH api aparokzaH smaran= api anuBavikaH
   prāṇabhṛnmātrasya /	prANaBRt mAtrasya /
   na caitadanyādhīnasaṃvedanatve ghaṭe /	na ca etat anya aDIna saMvedana tve Gawe /
   anavasthāprasaṅgaścoktaḥ /	anavasTA prasaFgaH ca uktaH /
   tasmātsvayaṃsiddhatāsyānicchatāpyapratyākhyeyā pramāṇamārgayattatvāditi /	tasmAt svayaMsidDatA asya anicCatA api apratyAKyeyA pramANa mArga yat ta tvAt iti /
   kiñcoktena krameṇa jñānasya svayamavagantṛtvābhāvātpramāturanabhyupagame #	kiQca uktena krameNa jQAnasya svayam avagantR tva aBAvAt pramAtuH anaByupagame #
   ca pradīpavadvijñānamavabhāsakāntaranirapekṣaṃ svayameva prathata iti	ca pradIpa vat vijQAnam avaBAsaka antara nirapekzam svayam eva praTate iti
   bruvatāpramāṇagamyaṃ vijñānamanavagantṛkamityuktaṃ syāt /	bruvata apramANa gamyam vijQAnam anavagantRkam iti uktam syAt /
   śilāghanamadhyasthapradīpasahasraprathanavat.# /	SilA Gana maDya sTa pradIpa sahasra praTanavat.# /
   avagantuścetkasyacidapi na prakāśate kṛtamavagamena svayaṃprakāśeneti /	avagantuH ced kasyacid api na prakASate kRtam avagamena svayaMprakASena iti /
   vijñānamevāvagantriti manvānaḥ śaṅkate   # bāḍhamevam /	vijQAnam eva avagantriti manvAnaH SaFkate  # bAXam evam /
   anubhavarūpatvāditi.# /	anuBava rUpa tvAt iti.# /
   na phalasya kartṛtvaṃ karmatvaṃ vāstīti pradīpavatkartrantarameṣitavyaṃ,	na Palasya kartR tvam karma tvam vA asti iti pradIpa vat kartR antaram ezitavyaM,
   tathā ca na siddhasādhanamiti pariharati   # na /	taTA ca na sidDa sADanam iti pariharati  # na /
   anyasyāvaganturiti.# /	anyasya avagantuH iti.# /
   nanu sākṣisthāne 'stvasmadabhimatameva vijñānaṃ tathā ca nāmnyeva	nanu sAkzi sTAne astu asmad aBimatam eva vijQAnam taTA ca nAmni eva
   vipratipattirnārthā iti śaṅkate   # sākṣiṇo 'vagantuḥ	vipratipattiH na arTAH iti SaFkate  # sAkziNaH avagantuH
   svayaṃsiddhatāmupakṣipatā.#abhipreya # tā svayaṃ prathate vijñānamityeṣa	svayaMsidDa tAm upakzipatA.#aBipreya # tA svayam praTate vijQAnam iti eza
   eveti.# /	eva iti.# /
   nirākaroti   # neti.# /	nirAkaroti  # na iti.# /
   bhavanti hi vijñānasyotpādādayo dharmā abhyupetāstathā cāsya phalatayā	Bavanti hi vijQAnasya utpAda AdayaH DarmAH aByupetAH taTA ca asya Pala tayA
   nāvagantṛtvaṃ, kartṛphalabhāvasyaikatra virodhāt /	na avagantR tvaM, kartR Pala BAvasya ekatra viroDAt /
   kintu pradīpāditulyatetyarthaḥ //28 //	kintu pradIpa Adi tulya tA iti arTaH //28 //
   # vaidharmyācca na svapnādivat.# /	# vEDarmyAt ca na svapna Adivat.# /
   bādhābādhau vaidharmyam /	bADA bADO vEDarmyam /
   svapnapratyayo bādhito jāgratpratyayaścābādhitaḥ /	svapna pratyayaH bADitaH jAgrat pratyayaH ca AbADitaH /
   tvayāpi cāvaśyaṃ jāgratpratyayasyābādhitatvamāstheyaṃ, tena hi	tvayA api ca avaSyam jAgrat pratyayasya AbADita tvam AsTeyan, tena hi
   svapnapratyayo bādhito mithyetyavagamyate /	svapna pratyayaH bADitaH miTyA iti avagamyate /
   jāgratpratyayasya tu bādhyatve svapnapratyayasyāsau na bādhako bhavet /	jAgrat pratyayasya tu bADya tve svapna pratyayasya asO na bADakaH Bavet /
   nahi bādhyameva bādhakaṃ bhavitumarhati /	na hi bADyam eva bADakam Bavitum arhati /
   tathā ca na svapnapratyayo mithyeti sādhyavikalo dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt	taTA ca na svapna pratyayaH miTyA iti sADya vikalaH dRzwAntaH syAt 
   svapnavaditi /	svapna vat iti /
   tasmādbādhābādhābhyāṃ vaidharmyānna svapnapratyayadṛṣṭāntena	tasmAt bADa AbADAByAm vEDarmyAt na svapna pratyaya dRzwAntena
   jāgratpratyayasya śakyaṃ nirālambanatvamadhyavasātum /	jAgrat pratyayasya Sakyam nirAlambana tvam aDyavasAtum /
   # nidrāglānamiti.# /	# nidrA glAnam iti.# /
   karaṇadoṣābhidānam /	karaNa doza aBidAnam /
   mithyātvāya vaidharmyāntaramāha  #   api ca smṛtireveti.# /	miTyA tvAya vEDarmya antaram Aha #  api ca smRtiH eva iti.# /
   saṃskāramātrajaṃ hi vijñānaṃ smṛtiḥ /	saMskAra mAtra jam hi vijQAnam smRtiH /
   pratyutpannendriyasaṃprayogaliṅgaśabdasārūpyānyathānupapadyamānayogyapramāṇānutpattilakṣaṇasāmagrīprabhavaṃ	pratyutpanna indriya saMprayoga liFga Sabda sArUpyAni aTa anupapadyamAna yogya pramANa an utpatti lakzaNa sAmagrI praBavam
   tu jñānamupalabghiḥ /	tu jQAnam upalabGiH /
   tadiha nidrāṇasyasāmagryantaravirahātsaṃskāraḥ pariśiṣyate, tena	tat iha nidrANasya sAmagryantara virahAt saMskAraH pariSizyate, tena
   saṃskārajatvātsmṛtiḥ, sāpi ca nidrādoṣādviparītāvartamānamapi pitrādi	saMskAra ja tvAt smRtiH, sA api ca nidrA dozAt viparIta AvartamAnam api pitR Adi
   vartamānatayā bhāsayati /	vartamAna tayA BAsayati /
   tena smṛtereva tāvadupalabdherviśeṣastasyāśca smṛtervaiparītyamiti /	tena smRteH eva tAvat upalabDeH viSezaH tasyAH ca smRteH vEparItyam iti /
   ato mahadantaramityarthaḥ /	atas mahat antaram iti arTaH /
   api ca svataḥprāmāṇye siddhe jāgratpratyayānāṃ	api ca svatas prAmANye sidDe jAgrat pratyayAnAm
   yathārthatvamanubhavasiddhaṃ nānumānenānyathayituṃ śakyam,	yaTArTa tvam anuBava sidDam na anumAnena anyaTayitum Sakyam,
   anubhavavirodhena tadanutpādāt /	anuBava viroDena tad anutpAdAt /
   abāditaviṣayatāpyanumānotpādasāmagrīgrāhyatayā pramāṇam /	abAdita vizaya tA api anumAna utpAda sAmagrI grAhya tayA pramANam /
   na ca kāraṇābhāve kāryamutpattumarhatītyāśayavānāha  # api	na ca kAraNa aBAve kAryam utpattum arhati iti ASa yavAn Aha # api
   cānubhavavirodhaprasaṅgāditi /	ca anuBava viroDa prasaFgAt iti /
   na bhāvo 'nupalabdheḥ.# /	na BAvaH anupalabDeH.# /
   yathālokadarśanaṃ cānvayavyatirekāvanuśriyamāṇāvartha evopalabdherbhavato	yaTA loka darSanam ca anvaya vyatirekO= anuSriyamANO= arTaH eva upalabDeH BavataH 
   nārthānapekṣāyāṃ vāsanāyām /	na arTa anapekzAyAm vAsanAyAm /

   tatrāpi pravartitamīśvareṇa	tatra api pravartitam ISvareNa

   cakṣuṣmatā hyandho nīyate nāndhāntareṇa /	cakzuzmatA hi anDaH nIyate na anDa antareNa /
   tathehāpi dvāvapi pravartyāviti kaḥ kaṃ pravartayedityarthaḥ /	taTA iha api dvO= api pravartyO= iti kaH kam pravartayet iti arTaH /
   apica naiyāyikānāmīśvarasya nirdeṣatvaṃ svasamayaviruddhamityāha   #	api ca nEyAyikAnAm ISvarasya nirdeza tvam sva samaya virudDam iti Aha  #
   apiceti.# /	apicA iti.# /
   asmākaṃ tu nāyaṃ samaya iti bhāvaḥ /	asmAkam tu na ayam samayaH iti BAvaH /
   nanu kāruṇyādapi pravartamāno jano dṛśyate /	nanu kAruNyAt api pravartamAnaH janaH dRSyate /
   na ca kāruṇyaṃ doṣa ityata āha   # svārthaprayukta eva ceti.# /	na ca kAruNyam dozaH iti atas Aha  # sva arTa prayuktaH eva ca iti.# /
   kāruṇye hi satyasya duḥkhaṃ bhavati tena tatprahāṇāya pravartata iti	kAruNye hi satyasya duHKam Bavati tena tad prahANAya pravartate iti
   kāruṇikā api svārthaprayuktā eva pravartanta iti /	kAruNikAH api sva arTa prayuktAH eva pravartante iti /
   nanu svārthaprayukta eva pravartatāmevamapi ko doṣa ityata āha   #	nanu sva arTa prayuktaH eva pravartatAm evam api kaH dozaH iti atas Aha  #
   svārthavatvādīsvarasyeti.# /	sva arTava tvAdI svarasya iti.# /
   arthitvādityarthaḥ /	arTi tvAt iti arTaH /
   # puruṣasya caudāsīnyābhyupagamānna.#vāstavī pravṛttiriti //37. //	# puruzasya ca OdAsInya aByupagamAnna.#vAstavI pravRttiH iti //37. //
   aparamapi dṛṣṭānusāreṇa dūṣaṇamāha   # saṃbandhānupapatteśca.# /	aparam api dRzwa anusAreNa dUzaNam Aha  # saMbanDa anupapatteH ca.# /
   dṛṣṭo hi sāvayavānāmasarvagatānāṃ ca saṃyogaḥ /	dRzwaH hi sAvayavAnAm asarva gatAnAm ca saMyogaH /
   aprāptipūrvikā hi prāptiḥ saṃyogo na sarvagatānāṃ	aprApti pUrvikA hi prAptiH saMyogaH na sarva gatAnAm
   saṃbhavatyaprāpterabhāvānniravayavatvācca /	saMBavati aprApteH aBAvAt niravayava tvAt ca /
   avyāpyavṛttitā hi saṃyogasya svabhāvaḥ /	avyApya vRtti tAH hi saMyogasya svaBAvaH /
   na ca niravayaveṣvavyāpyavṛttitā saṃyogasya saṃbhavatītyuktam /	na ca niravayavezu avyApya vRtti tA saMyogasya saMBavati iti uktam /
   tasmādavyāpyavṛttitāyāḥ saṃyogasya vyāpikāyā nivṛttestadvyāpyasya	tasmAt avyApya vRtti tAyAH saMyogasya vyApikAyAH nivRtteH tat vyApyasya
   saṃyogasya vinivṛttiriti bhāvaḥ /	saMyogasya vinivRttiH iti BAvaH /
   nāpi samavāyalakṣaṇaḥ /	na api samavAya lakzaNaH /
   sa hyayutasiddhānāmādhārādheyabhūtānāmihapratyayahetuḥ saṃbandha	sa hi ayutasidDAnAm ADAra ADeya BUtAnAm iha pratyaya hetuH saMbanDa
   ityabhyupeyate /	iti aByupeyate /
   na ca pradhānapuruṣeśvarāṇāṃ mitho 'styādhārādheyabhāva ityarthaḥ /	na ca praDAna puruza ISvarANAm miTas asti ADAra ADeya BAvaH iti arTaH /
   nāpi yogyatālakṣaṇaḥ kāryagamyasaṃbandha ityāha   # nāpyanya iti.# /	na api yogya tA lakzaNaH kArya gamya saMbanDaH iti Aha  # na api anyaH iti.# /
   nahi pradhānasya mahadahaṅkārādikāraṇatvamadyāpi siddhamiti /	na hi praDAnasya mahat ahaFkAra Adi kAraNa tvam adya api sidDam iti /
   śaṅkate   # brahmavādina iti.# /	SaFkate  # brahma vAdinaH iti.# /
   nirākaroti  # na.# /	nirAkaroti # na.# /
   kutaḥ /	kutas /
   # tasya.#mate 'nirvacanīya # tādātmyalakṣaṇasaṃbandhopapatteḥ /	# tasya.#mate anirvacanIya # tAdAtmya lakzaNa saMbanDa upapatteH /
   apiceti.# /	apicA iti.# /
   āgamo hi pravṛttiṃ prati na dṛṣṭāntamapekṣata ityadṛṣṭapūrve tadviruddhe	AgamaH hi pravRttim prati na dRzwAntam apekzate iti adRzwa pUrve tad virudDe
   ca pravartituṃ samarthaḥ /	ca pravartitum samarTaH /
   anumānaṃ tu dṛṣṭānusāri naivaṃvidhe pravartitumarhatīti /	anumAnam tu dRzwa anusAri na evaMviDe pravartitum arhati iti /

   pariharati  # neti.# /	pariharati # na iti.# /

   bhāvaḥ //38 //	BAvaH //38 //
   # adhiṣṭhānānupapatteśca.# /	# aDizWAna anupapatteH ca.# /

   prasmartavyam /	prasmartavyam /
   sugamamanyat //39 //	sugamam anyat //39 //
   # karaṇavaccenna bhogādibhyaḥ /	# karaNa vat ced na Boga AdiByaH /
   rūpādihīnamiti.# /	rUpa Adi hInam iti.# /
   anudbhūtarūpamityarthaḥ. rūpādihīnakaraṇādhiṣṭhānaṃ hi puruṣasya	anudBUta rUpam iti arTaH. rUpa Adi hIna karaNa aDizWAnam hi puruzasya
   svabhogādāveva dṛṣṭaṃ nānyatra /	sva Boga AdO= eva dRzwam na anyatra /
   nahi bāhyaṃ kuṭhārādyaparidṛṣṭaṃ vyāpārayan kaścidupalabhyate /	na hi bAhyam kuWAra Adya paridRzwam vyApArayan kaScid upalaByate /
   tasmādrūpādihīnaṃ karaṇaṃ vyāpārayata īsvarasya bhogādiprasaktiḥ tathā	tasmAt rUpa Adi hInam karaNam vyApArayataH Isvarasya Boga Adi prasaktiH taTA
   cānīśvaratvamiti bhāvaḥ /	ca anISvara tvam iti BAvaH /
   kalpāntaramāha   # anyatheti..# /	kalpa antaram Aha  # anyaTA iti..# /

   śarīramuktam /	SarIram uktam /

   saṃprati tu śarīritvena bhogādiprasaṅgādanīśvaratvamuktamiti viśeṣaḥ //40	saMprati tu SarIri tvena Boga Adi prasaFgAt anISvara tvam uktam iti viSezaH //40
   # antavatvamasarvajñatā vā.# /	# antava tvam asarvajQa tA vA.# /

   saṃkhyābedavattvamantavattvaṃ ca dravyatvāt saṃkhyānyatve sati	saMKyA bedavat tvam antavat tvam ca dravya tvAt saMKyA anya tve sati
   prameyatvādvānumātavyaṃ, tataścāntavattvamasarvajñatā vā /	prameya tvAt vA anumAtavyan, tatas ca antavat tvam asarvajQa tA vA /

   bhāvaḥ /	BAvaH /
   # svarūpaparimāṇamapi.#yasya yādṛśamaṇu mahat paramamahaddīrghaṃ hrasvaṃ	# svarUpa parimANam api.#yasya yAdRSam aNu mahat parama mahat dIrGam hrasvam
   ceti /	ca iti /
   # atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa ityuttaro vikalpaḥ.# /	# aTa mA BUt eza dozaH iti uttaraH vikalpaH.# /
   yasyānto 'sti tasyāntavattvāgrahaṇamasarvajñatāmāpādayet /	yasya antaH asti tasya antavat tva agrahaNam asarvajQa tAm ApAdayet /
   yasya tvanta eva nāsti tasya tadagrahaṇaṃ nāsarvajñatāmāvahati /	yasya tu ante eva na asti tasya tad agrahaNam na asarvajQa tAm Avahati /
   nahi śaśaviṣāṇādyajñānādajño bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /	na hi SaSa vizANa At yajQAnAt ajQaH Bavati iti BAvaH /
   pariharati   # tata iti.# /	pariharati  # tatas iti.# /
   āgamānapekṣasyānumānameṣāmantavattvamavagamayatītyuktam //41 //	Agama anapekzasya anumAnam ezAm antavat tvam avagamayati iti uktam //41 //
   # utpattyasaṃbhavāt.# /	# utpatti asaMBavAt.# /
   anyatra vedāvisaṃvādādyatrāṃśe visaṃvādaḥ sa nirasyate /	anyatra veda avisaMvAdAt i atra aMSe visaMvAdaH sa nirasyate /
   tamaṃśamāha   # yatpunaridamucyate vāsudevātsaṃkarṣaṇo.#jīva # iti.# /	tam aMSam Aha  # yat punar idam ucyate vAsudevAt saMkarzaNaH .#ji iva # iti.# /
   jīvasya kāraṇavatve satyanityatvam, anityatveparalokino	jIvasya kAraNava tve satya nitya tvam, anitya tva Ipara lokinaH 
   'bhāvātparalokābhāvaḥ, tataśca	aBAvAt para loka aBAvaH, tatas ca
   svarganarakāpavargābhāvāpatternāstikyamityarthaḥ /	svarga naraka apavarga aBAva ApatteH na Astikyam iti arTaH /
   anupapannā ca jīvasyotpattirityāha   # pratiṣedhiṣyati ceti //42 //	anupapannA ca jIvasya utpattiH iti Aha  # pratizeDizyati ca iti //42 //
   na ca kartuḥ karaṇam.# /	na ca kartuH karaNam.# /

   ca prayatnenendriyārthātmamanaḥ saṃnikarṣalakṣaṇaṃ	ca prayatnena indriya arTa Atma manaH saMnikarza lakzaNam

   pradyumnākhyaṃ manaḥ karaṇaṃ kuryāt /	pradyumna AKyam manaH karaNam kuryAt /

   akaraṇādeva nikhilakāryasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ //43 //	akaraNAt eva niKila kArya sidDiH iti BAvaH //43 //
   # vijñānādibhāve vā tadapratiṣedhaḥ.# /	# vijQAna Adi BAve vA tat apratizeDaH.# /
   # vāsudevā evaite.#saṃkarṣamādayo # nirdeṣā.#avidyādidoṣarahitāḥ /	# vAsudevAH eva ete.#saMkarzam AdayaH # nirdezA. #a vidyA Adi doza rahitAH /
   # niradhiṣṭhānā.#nirūpādānāḥ /	# niraDizWA nA.#nirUpa AdAnAH /
   ata eva # niravadyā.#anityatvādidoṣarahitāḥ /	atas eva # niravadya a.#a nitya tva Adi doza rahitAH /
   tasmādutpattyasaṃbhavo 'nuguṇatvānna doṣa ityarthaḥ /	tasmAt utpatti asaMBavaH anuguNa tvAt na dozaH iti arTaH /
   # atrocyate   evamapīti.# /	# atra ucyate  evam api iti.# /
   mā bhūdabyupagamena doṣaḥ, prakārāntareṇa tvayameva doṣaḥ /	mA BUt abi upagamena dozaH, prakAra antareNa tu ayam eva dozaH /
   praśnapūrvaṃ prakārāntaramāha  # katham /	praSna pUrvam prakAra antaram Aha # kaTam /
   yadi tāvaditi.# /	yadi tAvat iti.# /
   na tāvadete parasparaṃ bhinnā īśvarāḥ parasparavyāhatecchā bhavitumarhanti	na tAvat ete parasparam BinnAH ISvarAH paraspara vyAhata icCA Bavitum arhanti
   vyāhatakāmatve ca kāryānutpādāt /	vyAhata kAma tve ca kArya anutpAdAt /

   kṛtatvādānarthakyamitareṣām /	kRta tvAt AnarTakyam itarezAm /

   kalpāntaramupanyasyotpattyasaṃbhavenāpākaroti   # athāyamabhiprāya iti.# /	kalpa antaram upanyasya utpatti asaMBavena apAkaroti  # aTa ayam aBiprAyaH iti.# /
   sugamamanyat //44 //	sugamam anyat //44 //
   # vipratiṣedhācca.# /	# vipratizeDAt ca.# /
   guṇibhyaḥ khalvātmabhyo jñānādīn guṇān bhedenoktvā punarabhedaṃ brūte   #	guNiByaH Kalu AtmaByaH jQAna AdIn guNAn Bedena uktvA punar aBedam brUte  #

   ādigrahaṇena pradyumnāniruddhayormano 'haṅkāralakṣaṇatayātmano	Adi grahaNena pradyumna anirudDayoH manaH ahaFkAra lakzaNa tayA AtmanaH

   vedavipratiṣedho vyākhyātaḥ //45 //	vedavipratizeDaH vyAKyAtaH //45 //
   iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ	iti SrI vAcaspati miSravi racite SArIraka Bagavat pAda BAzya viBAge BAmatyAm
   dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2 //	dvitIya aDyAyasya dvitIyaH pAdaH //2 //
   # iti dvitīyādhyāyasya sāṃkhyādimatānāṃ duṣṭatvapradarśanaṃ nāma	# iti dvitIya aDyAyasya sAMKya Adi matAnAm duzwa tva pradarSanam nAma
   dvitīyaḥpādaḥ.#	dvitIyaH pAdaH.#
   # dvidīyādhyāye tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ.# /	# dvidIya aDyAye tRtIyaH pAdaH.# /
   # na viyadaśruteḥ.# /	# na viyat aSruteH.# /
   pūrvaṃ pramāṇāntaravirodhaḥ śruternirākṛtaḥ /	pUrvam pramANa antara viroDaH SruteH nirAkRtaH /
   saṃprati tu śrutīnāmeva parasparavirodho nirākriyate /	saMprati tu SrutInAm eva paraspara viroDaH nirAkriyate /
   tatra sṛṣṭiśrutīnāṃ parasparavirodhamāha  # vedānteṣu tatra tatreti.# /	tatra sRzwi SrutInAm paraspara viroDa mAha # vedAntezu tatra tatra iti.# /
   śrutivipratiṣedhācca parapakṣāṇāmanapekṣitatvaṃ sthāpitaṃ	Sruti vipratizeDAt ca para pakzANAm anapekzita tvam sTApitam
   tadvatsvapakṣasya śrutivipratiṣedhāditi /	tadvat sva pakzasya Sruti vipratizeDAt iti /
   # tadarthanirmalatvamar.#thābhāsavinivṛttyārthatattvapratipādanam /	# tad arTa nirmala tvam ar.#Ta ABAsa vinivRttya arTa tattva pratipAdanam /
   tasya phalaṃ svapakṣasya jagato brahmakāraṇatvasyānapekṣatvāśaṅkānivṛttiḥ	tasya Palam sva pakzasya jagataH brahma kAraNa tvasya anapekza tva ASaFkA nivRttiH
   iha hi pūrvapakṣe śrutīnāṃ mitho virodhaḥ pratipādyate, siddhānte	iha hi pUrva pakze SrutInAm miTas viroDaH pratipAdyate, sidDAnte
   tvavirodhaḥ /	tu aviroDaH /
   tatra siddhāntyekadeśinovacanaṃ 'na viyadaśruteḥ' iti /	tatra sidDAnti eka deSinaH vacanam ana viyat aSruteH a iti /
   tasyābhisaṃdhiḥ yadyapi taittirīyake viyadutpattiśrutirasti tathāpi tasyāḥ	tasya aBisaMDiH yadi api tEttirIyake viyat utpatti SrutiH asti taTA api tasyAH
   pramāṇāntaravirodhādbahuśrutivirodhācca gauṇatvam /	pramANa antara viroDAt bahu Sruti viroDAt ca gONa tvam /

   śrutīnāmiti /	SrutInAm iti /
   tadidamuktam  # prathamaṃ tāvadākāśamāśritya cintyate	tat idam uktam # praTamam tAvat AkASam ASritya cintyate
   kimasyākāśasyotpattirastyuta nāstīti.# /	kim asya AkASasya utpattiH asti uta na asti iti.# /

   athāsti tataḥ śrutivirodha iti tatparihārāya	aTa asti tatas Sruti viroDaH iti tad parihArAya
   prayatnāntaramāstheyamityarthaḥ //1 //	prayatna antaram AsTeyam iti arTaH //1 //
   tatra pūrvapakṣasūtram  # asti tu.# /	tatra pUrva pakza sUtram # asti tu.# /
   taittirīye hi sargaprakaraṇe kevalasyākāśasyaiva prathamaḥ sargaḥ śrūyate	tEttirIye hi sarga prakaraNe kevalasya AkASasya eva praTamaH sargaH SrUyate
   chāndogye ca kevalasya tejasaḥ prathamaḥ sargaḥ /	CAndogye ca kevalasya tejasaH praTamaH sargaH /
   naca śrutyantarānurodhenāsahāyasyādhigatasyāpi sasahāyatākalpanaṃ	na ca Sruti antara anuroDena asahAyasya aDigatasya api sa sahAya tA kalpanam
   yuktamasāhatvāvagamavirodhāt /	yuktam asAha tva avagama viroDAt /
   śrutasiddhyarthaṃ khalvaśrutaṃ kalpyate na tu tadvidhātāya, vihanyate	Sruta sidDi arTam Kalu aSrutam kalpyate na tu tad viDAtAya, vihanyate
   cāsahāyatvaṃ śrutaṃ kalpitena sasahāyatvena /	ca asahAya tvam Srutam kalpitena sa sahAya tvena /
   naca parasparānapekṣāṇāṃ vrīhiyavavadvikalpaḥ /	na ca paraspara anapekzANAm vrIhi yava vat vikalpaH /
   anuṣṭhānaṃ hi vikalpyate na vastu /	anuzWAnam hi vikalpyate na vastu /
   nahi sthāṇupuruṣavikalpo vastuni pratiṣṭhāṃ labhate /	na hi sTANu puruza vikalpaH vastuni pratizWAm laBate /
   naca sargabhedena vyavasthopapadyate, sāṃpratikasargavadbhūtapūrvasyāpi	na ca sarga Bedena vyavasTA upapadyate, sAMpratika sarga vat BUta pUrvasya api
   tathātvāt /	taTA tvAt /
   na khalviha sarge kṣīrāddadhi jāyate sargāntare ti dadhnaḥ kṣīramiti	na Kalu iha sarge kzIrAt daDi jAyate sarga antare ti daDnaH kzIram iti

   tadidamuktam  # na saṃbhāvayituṃ śakyamiti.# /	tat idam uktam # na saMBAvayitum Sakyam iti.# /

   tūṣayitvānaikāntikatvenāpi dūṣayati yattūkaṃ samānajātīyamiti /	tUzayitvA anEkAntika tvena api dUzayati yat tUkam samAna jAtIyam iti /
   # nāpyenekamevo.#pādānamupādeya # mārabhate.# /	# na api enekam eva u.#pAdAnam upAdeya # mAraBate.# /
   yatra hi kṣīraṃ dadhibhāvena pariṇamate tatra	yatra hi kzIram daDi BAvena pariNamate tatra

   kṣīramekamupādeyadadhibhāvena pariṇamate /	kzIram ekam upAdeya daDi BAvena pariNamate /
   yathā niravayavaparamāṇuvādināṅkṣīraparamāṇurdadhiparamāṇubhāveneti /	yaTA niravayava paramANu vAdinA aFkzIra paramANuH daDi paramANu BAvena iti /
   śeṣamatirohitārtham //7 //	Sezam ati rohita arTam //7 //
   # etena mātariśvā vyākhyātaḥ.# /	# etena mAtariSvA vyAKyAtaH.# /

   'vāyuścāntarikṣametadamṛtam' iti dvayoramṛtatvamuktvā punaḥ pavanasya	avAyuH ca antarikzam etat amRtam a iti dvayoH amRta tvam uktvA punar pavanasya
   viśeṣeṇāha  # saiṣānastamitā devatā yadvāyuriti.# /	viSezeNa aha # sA ezAnastamitA devatA yat vA AyuH iti.# /
   tasmādabhyāsānnāpekṣikaṃ vāyoramṛtatvamapi tvautpattikameveti prāptam /	tasmAt aByAsAt na Apekzikam vAyoH amRta tvam api tvOtpattikam eva iti prAptam /
   tadidamuktaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā  # astamayapratiṣedhādamṛtatvādiśravaṇācceti.# /	tat idam uktam BAzya kRtA # astamaya pratizeDAt amRta tva Adi SravaNAt ca iti.# /
   cena samuccayārthenābhyāso darśitaḥ /	cena samuccaya arTena aByAsaH darSitaH /
   evaṃ prāpta ucyate ekavijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñānāt,	evam prAptaH ucyate eka vijQAnena sarva vijQAna pratijQAnAt,
   pratijñāvākyārthasya prādhānyāt, tadupapadanārthatvācca vākyāntarāṇāṃ,	pratijQA vAkya arTasya prADAnya at, tad upapadana arTa tvAt ca vAkya antarANAM,
   teṣāmapi cādvaitapratipādakānāṃ mātariśvotpattikramapratipādakānāṃ	tezAm api ca advEta pratipAdakAnAm mAtariSva utpatti krama pratipAdakAnAm
   bahulamupalabdheḥ,	bahulam upalabDeH,

   etadanurodhenāmṛtatvāstamayapratiṣedhāvāpekṣikatvena netavyāviti /	etad anuroDena amRta tva astamaya pratizeDO= Apekzika tvena netavyO= iti /
   bhūyasīḥ śrutīrapekṣya dve api śrutī śabdamātramukte //8 //	BUyasIH SrutIH apekzya dve api SrutI Sabda mAtra mukte //8 //
   # esaṃbhavastu sato 'nupapatteḥ.# /	# esaMBavaH tu sataH anupapatteH.# /

   kathamutpattyāśaṅkā /	kaTam utpatti ASaFkA /

   brahmajijñāsādhikārādarśanānupapatterata āha  # viyatpavanayoriti.# /	brahma jijQAsA aDikArA darSana anupapatteH atas Aha # viyat pavanayoH iti.# /

   vyākhyātavyā /	vyAKyAtavyA /

   # tathā vikārebhya iti.# /	# taTA vikAreByaH iti.# /

   yuktaṃ, na tu viparyayaḥ /	yuktaM, na tu viparyayaH /

   naca niradhiṣṭhāno vibhrama ityāha  # nāpyasata iti.# /	na ca niraDizWAnaH viBramaH iti Aha # na api asataH iti.# /

   'navasthāprasaṅgāditi.# /	anavasTA prasaFgAt iti.# /

   vikārasya na samāropitopādāna ityupapāditaṃ mādhyamikamataniṣedhādhikāre,	vikArasya na samAropita upAdAnaH iti upapAditam mADyamika mata nizeDa aDikAre,

   'nupapatteḥ' iti kleśena vyākhyeyam /	anupapatteH a iti kleSena vyAKyeyam /

   tadāstāṃ tāvat //9 //	tadA AstAm tAvat //9 //
   # tejo 'tastathāhyāha.# /	# tejaH atas taTA hi Aha.# /
   yadyapi 'vāyoragniḥ' ityapādānapañcamī	yadi api avAyoH agniHa iti apAdAna paQcamI

   tathāpi bahuśrutivirodhena durbalāpyupapadavibhaktirevātrocitā /	taTA api bahu Sruti viroDena durbalA api upapada viBaktiH eva atra ucitA /

   pravartate /	pravartate /

   varṣati' ityetena tasmādabhyavahārthaṃ vrīhiyavādyevātrādbhyo jāyata iti	varzati a iti etena tasmAt aByavaha arTam vrIhi yava Adi eva atra AdByaH jAyate iti
   vivakṣitam /	vivakzitam /
   kārṣṇyamapi hi saṃbhavati kasyacidadanīsya /	kArzNyam api hi saMBavati kasyacid adanIsya /

   tatra kim 'adbhyaḥ pṛthivī' iti pṛthivīśabdo 'nnaparatayā nīyatāmuta	tatra kim aadByaH pRTivI a iti pRTivI SabdaH anna para tayA nIyatAm uta

   'nnakāraṇe pṛthivyāmiti rāddhāntaḥ //12 //	anna kAraNe pRTivyAm iti rAdDa antaH //12 //
   # tadabhidhyānādeva tu talliṅgātsaḥ.# /	# tad aBiDyAnAt eva tu tad liFgAt saH.# /

   prastāvasya ca liṅgasya ca pāramparyeṇāpi mūlākāraṇasya brahmaṇa	prastAvasya ca liFgasya ca pAramparyeNa api mUlAkAraNasya brahmaNa
   upapatte , svatantrāṇāmevākāśādīnāṃ vāṭvādikāraṇatvamiti jagato	upapatte , svatantrANAm eva AkASa AdInAm vA awu Adi kAraNa tvam iti jagataH

   naca cetanānāṃ svakāryasvātantryamityetadapyaikāntikaṃ paratantrāṇāmapi	na ca cetanAnAm sva kArya svAtantryam iti etat api EkAntikam paratantrANAm api

   nimittakāraṇabhūtastaṃ taṃ vikāraṃ vāṭvādikaṃ sṛjatīti yuktam /	nimitta kAraNa BUtaH tam tam vikAram vA awvAdikam sRjati iti yuktam /
   itarathā liṅgaprastāvau kleśitau syātāmiti /	itaraTA liFga prastAvO kleSitO syAtAm iti /
   # parameśvarāveśavaśāditi.# /	# parameSvara AveSa vaSAt iti.# /

   sākṣātparameśvara evādhiṣṭhātā nimittakāraṇaṃ na tvākāśādibhāvamāpannaḥ /	sAkzAt parameSvaraH eva aDizWAtA nimitta kAraNam na tu AkASa Adi BAvam ApannaH /
   ākāśādibhāvamāpannastūpādānamiti siddham //13 //	AkASa Adi BAvam ApannaH tu upAdAnam iti sidDam //13 //
   # viparyayeṇa tu kramo 'ta upapadyate ca.# /	# viparyayeNa tu kramaH atas upapadyate ca.# /
   utpattau mahābhūtānāṃ kramaḥ śruto nāpyaye 'pyayamātrasya śrutatvāt /	utpattO mahABUtAnAm kramaH SrutaH na api aye api aya mAtrasya Sruta tvAt /
   tatrava niyame saṃbhavati nāniyamaḥ /	tatrava niyame saMBavati na aniyamaH /
   vyavasthārahito hi saḥ /	vyavasTA rahitaH hi saH /
   naca vyavasthāyāṃ satyāmavyavasthā yujyate /	na ca vyavasTAyAm satyAm avyavasTA yujyate /
   tatra kramabhedāpekṣāyāṃ kiṃ dṛṣṭo 'pyayakramo ghaṭādīnāṃ	tatra krama Beda apekzAyAm kim dRzwaH api ayakramaH Gawa AdInAm
   mahābhūtāpyayakramaniyāmako 'stvāho śrauta utpattikrama iti viśaye	mahABUta apyayakrama niyAmakaH astu Aho SrOtaH utpatti kramaH iti viSaye
   śrautasya śrautāntaramabhyarhitaṃ samānajātīyatayā tasyaiva	SrOtasya SrOta antaram aByarhitam samAna jAtIya tayA tasya eva
   buddhisāṃnidhyāt /	budDi sAMniDyAt /
   na dṛṣṭaṃ, viruddhajātīyatvāt /	na dRzwaM, virudDa jAtIya tvAt /
   tasmācchrautenaivotpattikrameṇāpyayakramo niyamyata iti prāpta	tasmAt SrOtena eva utpatti krameNa api aya kramaH niyamyate iti prApta
   ucyate apyayasya kramāpekṣāyāṃ khalūtpattikramo niyāmako bhavet, na	ucyate  apyayasya krama apekzAyAm Kalu utpatti kramaH niyAmakaH Bavet, na
   tvastyapyayasya kramāpekṣā, dṛṣṭānumānopanītena kramabhedena	tu asti apyayasya krama apekzA, dRzwa anumAna upanItena krama Bedena
   śrutyanusāriṇo 'pyayakramasya bādhyamānatvāt /	Sruti anusAriNaH api ayakramasya bADyamAna tvAt /

   na caitadasti /	na ca etat asti /

   uddhṛtya mānamunmānaṃ bālāgrāduddhṛtaḥ śatatamo bhāgastasmādapi	udDRtya mAnam unmAnam bAla agrAt udDRtaH SatatamaH BAgaH tasmAt api

   ārāgrādiddhṛtaṃ mānamārāgrāmātramiti //22 //	ArA agra Adi dDRtam mAna mAra agrA mAtram iti //22 //
   sūtrāntaramavatārayituṃ codayati  # nanvaguṇatve satīti.# /	sUtra antaram avatArayitum codayati # nanu aguNa tve sati iti.# /
   aṇurātmā na śarīravyāpīti na sarvāṅgīṇaśaityopalabdhiḥ syādityarthaḥ /	aNuH AtmA na SarIra vyApI iti na sarva aFgINa SEtya upalabDiH syAt iti arTaH /
   # avirodhaścandanavat.# /	# aviroDaH candanavat.# /
   tvaksaṃyukto hi jīvaḥ tvakca sakalaśarīravyāpinīti tvagvyāpyātmasaṃbandhaḥ	tvac saMyuktaH hi jIvaH tvac ca sakala SarIra vyApinI iti tvac vyApya Atma saMbanDaH
   sakalaśaityopalabdhau samartha ityarthaḥ //23 //	sakala SEtya upalabDO samarTaH iti arTaH //23 //
   # avasthitivaiśeṣyāditi cennābhyupagamāddhṛdi hi.# /	# avasTiti vESezyAt iti ced na aByupagamAt hRdi hi.# /
   candanabindoḥ pratyakṣato 'lpīyastvaṃ buddhvā yuktā kalpanā bhavati, yasya	candana bindoH pratyakzataH alpIyaH tvam budDvA yuktA kalpanA Bavati, yasya
   tu saṃdigdhamaṇutvaṃ sarvāṅgīṇaṃ ca kāryamupalabhyate tasya	tu saMdigDam aNu tvam sarva aFgINam ca kAryam upalaByate tasya
   vyāpitvamautsargikamapahāya neyaṃ kalpanāvakāśaṃ labhata iti śaṅkārthaḥ /	vyApi tvam Otsargikam apahAya na iyam kalpanA avakASam laBate iti SaFkA arTaH /
   naca haricandanabindudṛṣṭāntenāṇatvānumānaṃ jīvasya,	na ca haricandana bindu dRzwAntena aNatva anumAnam jIvasya,
   pratidṛṣṭāntasaṃbhavenānaikāntikatvādityāha  # na cātrānumānamiti.# /	pratidRzwAnta saMBavena anEkAntika tvAt iti a aha # na ca atra anumAnam iti.# /
   śaṅkāmimāmapākaroti  # atrocyata iti.# /	SaFkAmimAm apAka roti # atra ucyate iti.# /

   vaibhācchutyantaramupanyastam //24 //	vEBAt Suti antaram upanyastam //24 //
   # guṇādvā lokavat.# /	# guNAt vA lokavat.# /
   ye tu sāvayavatvāccandanabindoraṇusaṃcāreṇa dehavyāptirupapadyate na	ye tu sAvayava tvAt candana bindoH aNu saMcAreNa deha vyAptiH upapadyate na
   tvātmano 'navayavasyāṇusaṃcāraḥ saṃbhavī, tasmādvaiṣamyamiti manyante tān	tu AtmanaH anavayavasya aNusaMcAraH saMBavI, tasmAt vEzamyam iti manyante tAn
   pratidamucyate guṇādvā lokavaditi /	pratidam ucyate guNAt vA loka vat iti /
   tadvibhajate  # caitanya iti.# /	tad viBajate # cEtanyaH iti.# /

   yathā pradīpasyālpatve 'pi tadguṇaḥ prabhāsakalagṛhaudaravyāpinīti //25 //	yaTA pradIpasya alpa tve api tad guNaH praBAsakala gRha Odara vyApinI iti //25 //

   draṣṭavyam /	drazwavyam /

   # tadguṇasāratvāttu tadvyapadeśaḥ prājñavat /	# tad guNa sAra tvAt tu tad vyapadeSaH prAjQa vat /
   kamṭakatodane 'pīti.# /	kamwaka todane api iti.# /
   mahadalpayoḥ saṃyogo 'lpamavaruṇaddhi na mahāntaṃ, na jātu	mahat alpayoH saMyogaH alpam avaruNadDi na mahAntaM, na jAtu
   ghaṭakarakādisaṃyogā nabhaso tabho vyaśruvate 'pitvalpāneva	Gawa karaka Adi saMyogAH naBasaH taBaH vyaSruvate api tvalpAn eva
   ghaṭakarakādīn, itarathā yatra nabhastatra sarvatra ghaṭakarakādyupalambha	Gawa karaka AdIn, itaraTAH yatra naBaH tatra sarvatra Gawa karaka Adi upalamBa
   iti, te 'pi nabhaḥparimāṇaḥ prasajyeranniti /	iti, te api naBaH parimANaH prasajyeran= iti /

   samastaśarīravyāpitvādekadeśe 'pyadhiṣṭhitā tvagadhiṣṭhitaiveti	samasta SarIra vyApi tvAt eka deSe api aDizWitA tvac aDizWitA eva iti
   śarīravyāpī jīvaḥ śaknoti sarvāṅgīṇaṃ śaityamanubhavituṃ tvagindriyeṇa	SarIra vyApI jIvaH Saknoti sarva aFgINam SEtyam anuBavitum tvac indriyeNa
   gaṅgāyām /	gaFgAyAm /

   tasyāsarvāṅgīṇatvāt /	tasya asarva aFgINa tvAt /

   # guṇatvameva hīti.# /	# guNa tvam eva hi iti.# /
   idameva hi guṇānāṃ guṇatvaṃ yaddravyadeśatvam /	idam eva hi guNAnAm guNa tvam yat dravya deSa tvam /
   ata eva hi hemante viṣaktāvayavāpyadravyagate 'tisāndre śītasparśe	atas eva hi hemante vizakta avayavApya dravya gate ati sAndre SIta sparSe
   'nubhūyamānepyanudbhūtaṃ rūpaṃ nopalabhyate yathā, tathā mṛgamadādīnāṃ	anuBUyamAnepya nudBUtam rUpam na upalaByate yaTA, taTA mRgamada AdInAm
   gandhavāhaviprakīrṇasūkṣmāvayavānāmatisāndre gandhe 'nubhūyamāne	ganDa vAha viprakIrNa sUkzma avayavAnAm atisAndre ganDe anuBUyamAne
   rūpasparśau nānubhūyete tatkasya hetoḥ, anudbhūtatvāttayorgandhasya	rUpa sparSO na anuBUyete tat kasya hetoH, anudBUta tvAt tayoH ganDasya
   codbhūtatvāditi /	ca udBUta tvAt iti /

   apica caitanyaṃ nāma na gumo jīvasya guṇānaḥ, kintu rūpabhāvaḥ /	api ca cEtanyam nAma na gumaH jIvasya guNAnaH, kintu rUpa BAvaH /
   naca svabhāvasya vyāpitve bhāvasyāvyāpitvaṃ, tattvapracyuterityāha  # yadi	na ca svaBAvasya vyApi tve BAvasya avyApi tvaM, tattva pracyuteH iti Aha # yadi
   ca caitanyamiti.# /	ca cEtanyam iti.# /
   tadevaṃ śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇasiddhe jīvasyāvikāritayā paramātmatve, tathā	tat evam Sruti smRti itihAsa purANa sidDe jIvasya avikAritayA paramAtma tve, taTA
   śrutyāditaḥ paramamahattve ca, yā nāmāṇutvaśrutayastāstadanurodhena	Sruti AditaH parama mahat tve ca, yAH nAma aNu tva SrutayaH tAH tad anuroDena
   buddhiguṇasāratayā vyākhyeyā ityāha  # tadguṇasāratvāditi.# /	budDi guNa sAra tayA vyAKyeyAH iti Aha # tad guNa sAra tvAt iti.# /
   tadvyācaṣṭe  # tasyā buddheriti.# /	tat vyAcazwe # tasyAH budDeH iti.# /
   ātmanā svasaṃbandhinyā buddherupasthāpitatvāttadā parāmarśaḥ /	AtmanA sva saMbanDinyAH budDeH upasTApita tvAt tadA parAmarSaH /
   nahi śuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvasyātmanastattvaṃ saṃsāribhiranubhūyate /	na hi SudDa budDa mukta svaBAvasya AtmanaH tattvam saMsAriBiH anuBUyate /
   apitu yo 'yaṃ mithyājñānadveṣādyanuṣaktaḥ sa eva pratyātmamanubhavagocaraḥ	api tu yaH ayam miTyAjQAna dveza Adi anuzaktaH saH eva pratyAtmam anuBava gocaraH
   naca brahmasvabhāvasya jīvātmanaḥ kūṭasthanityasya svata	na ca brahma svaBAvasya jIva AtmanaH kUwasTa nityasya svata
   icchādveṣānupaṅgasaṃbhava iti buddhiguṇānāṃ teṣāṃ tadabhedādhyāsena	icCA dveza anupaFga saMBavaH iti budDi guNAnAm tezAm tad aBeda aDyAsena
   taddharmatvādhyāsaḥ, upadarāvādhyastasyeva candramaso bimbasya toyakampe	tad Darma tva aDyAsaH, upadara avADyaH tasya iva candramasaH bimbasya toya kampe
   kamapvattvādhyāsa ityupapāditamadhyāsabhāṣye /	kam apvat tva aDyAsaH iti upapAditam aDyAsa BAzye /
   tathāca buddhyādyupādhikṛtamasya jīvatvamiti buddherantaḥkaraṇasyāṇutayā	taTA ca budDi Adi upADikRtam asya jIva tvam iti budDeH antaHkaraNasya aNutayA
   so 'pyaṇuvyapadeśabhāgbhavati, nabha iva karakopahitaṃ karakaparimāṇam.	saH api aNu vyapadeSa BAj Bavati, naBaH iva karaka upahitam karaka parimANam.

   anuśayabījaṃ pūrvapakṣī prakaṭayati  # nanu suṣuptapralayayoriti /	anuSaya bIjam pUrva pakzI prakawayati # nanu suzupta pralayayoH iti /

   'bhivyaktiyogāt.# /	aBivyakti yogAt.# /

   # nityopalabdhyanupalabdhiprasaṅgonyataraniyamo vānyathā.# /	# nitya upalabDi anupalabDi prasaFgonyatara niyamaH vA anyaTA.# /
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   antaḥkaraṇe 'pi sati tasya nityasaṃnidhānāt kasmānnityopalabdhyanupalabdhī	antaHkaraNe api sati tasya nitya saMniDAnAt kasmAt nitya upalabDi anupalabDI
   na prasajyete /	na prasajyete /
   athādṛṣṭavipākakādācitkatvāt sāmarthyapratibandhāpratibandhābhyāmantaḥ	aTa adRzwa vipAkakAdAcitka tvAt sAmarTya pratibanDa apratibanDAByAm antar 
   karaṇasya nāyaṃ prasaṅgaḥ /	karaNasya na ayam prasaFgaH /

   tatkimantargaḍunāntaḥkaraṇeneti codayati  # athavānyatarasyātmana iti.# /	tat kim antar gaxuna antaHkaraNena iti codayati # aTavA anyatarasya AtmanaH iti.# /

   avadhānaṃ khalvanuvubhūpā śuśrūṣā vā /	avaDAnam Kalu anuvuBUpA SuSrUzA vA /

   atraivārthe śrutiṃ darśayati  # tathā ceti.# //32 //	atra eva arTe Srutim darSayati # taTA ca iti.# //32 //
   # kartā śāstrārthavattvāt.# /	# kartA SAstra arTavat tvAt.# /
   nanu 'tadguṇasāratvāt' ityanenaiva jīvasya kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ ca	nanu atad guNa sAra tvAt a iti anena eva jIvasya kartR tvam BoktR tvam ca
   labdhameveti tadvyutpādanamanarthakamityata āha tadguṇasāratvādhikāreṇeti	labDam eva iti tad vyutpAdanam anarTakam iti atas Aha tat guNa sAra tva aDikAreNa iti
   tasyaivaiṣa prapañco ye bhoktaiva na karteti tannirākaraṇārthaḥ /	tasya eva eza prapaQcaH ye BoktA eva na kartA iti tad nirAkaraNa arTaH /
   'śāstraphalaṃ prayoktari tallakṣaṇatvāt' ityāha sma bhagavān jaiminiḥ /	aSAstra Palam prayoktari tad lakzaNa tvAt a iti Aha sma BagavAn jEminiH /
   prayoktaryanuṣṭhātari /	prayoktari anuzWAtari /
   kartarīti yāvat /	kartarI iti yAvat /
   śāstraphalaṃ svargādi /	SAstra Palam svarga Adi /
   kutaḥ /	kutas /
   prayoktṛphalasādhanatālakṣaṇatvāt śāstrasya vidheḥ /	prayoktR Pala sADana tA lakzaNa tvAt SAstrasya viDeH /
   kartrapekṣitopāyatā hi vidhiḥ /	kartR apa Ikzita upAya tA hi viDiH /
   buddhiścetkartrī bhoktā cātmā tato yasyāpekṣitopāyo bhoktuna tasya	budDiH ced kartrI BoktA ca AtmA tatas yasya apekzita upAyaH Boktuna tasya
   kartṛtvaṃ yasya kartṛtvaṃ naca tasyāpekṣitopāyā iti kiṃ kena saṃgatamiti	kartR tvam yasya kartR tvam na ca tasya apekzita upAyAH iti kim kena saMgatam iti
   śāstrasyānarthakatvamavidyamānābhidheyatvaṃ tathā cāprayojanakatvaṃ syāt /	SAstrasya anarTaka tvam avidyamAna aBiDeya tvam taTA ca aprayojanaka tvam syAt /
   yathā ca tadguṇasāratayāsyāvastusadapi bhoktṛtvaṃ sāṃvyavahārikamevaṃ	yaTA ca tad guNa sAra tayA asya avastusat api BoktR tvam sAMvyavahArikam evam
   kartṛtvamapi sāṃvyavahārikaṃ na tu bhāvikam /	kartR tvam api sAMvyavahArikam na tu BAvikam /
   avidyāvadviṣayatvaṃ ca śāstrasyopapāditamadhyāsabhāṣya iti sarvamavadātam	avidyAvat vizaya tvam ca SAstrasya upapAditam aDyAsa BAzyaH iti sarvam avadAtam
   vihāropadeśāt /	vihAra upadeSAt /
   vihāraḥ saṃcāraḥ kriyā, tatra svātantryaṃ nākartuḥ saṃbhavati /	vihAraH saMcAraH kriyA, tatra svAtantryam na akartuH saMBavati /
   tasmādapi kartā jīvaḥ //34 //	tasmAt api kartA jIvaH //34 //
   # upādānāt.# /	# upAdAnAt.# /
   tadeteṣāṃ prāṇānāmindriyāṇāṃ vijñānena buddhyā vijñānaṃ	tat etezAm prANAnAm indriyANAm vijQAnena budDyA vijQAnam
   grahaṇaśaktimādāyopādāyetyupādāne svātantryaṃ nākartuḥ saṃbhavati //35 //	grahaNa Saktim AdAya upAdAya iti upAdAne svAtantryam na akartuH saMBavati //35 //
   # vyapadeśācca kriyāyāṃ cennirdeśaviparyayaḥ.# /	# vyapadeSAt ca kriyAyAm ced nirdeSa viparyayaH.# /
   abhyuccayamātrametatra samgupapattiḥ /	aByuccaya mAtram etatra samgupapattiH /
   vijñānaṃ kartṛ yajñaṃ tanute /	vijQAnam kartR yajQam tanute /
   sarvatra hi buddhiḥ karaṇarūpā karaṇatvenaiva vyapadiśyate na kartṛtvena,	sarvatra hi budDiH karaNa rUpA karaNa tvena eva vyapadiSyate na kartR tvena,
   iha tu kartṛtvena, tasyā vyapadeśe viparyayaḥ syāt /	iha tu kartR tvena, tasyAH vyapadeSe viparyayaH syAt /
   tasmādātmaiva vijñānamiti vyapadiṣṭaḥ /	tasmAt AtmA eva vijQAnam iti vyapadizwaH /
   tena karteti //36 //	tena kartA iti //36 //
   sūtrāntaramavatārayituṃ codayati atrāha yadīti /	sUtra antaram avatArayitum codayati  atra Aha yadi iti /
   prajñāvān svatantra iṣṭamovātmanaḥ saṃpādayennāniṣṭam /	prajQAvAn svatantraH izwam aH va AtmanaH saMpAdayet na anizwam /
   aniṣṭasaṃpattirapyasyopalabhyate /	anizwa saMpattiH api asya upalaByate /
   tasmānna svatantrastathā ca na kartā /	tasmAt na svatantraH taTA ca na kartA /
   tallakṣaṇatvāttasyetyarthaḥ /	tad lakzaNa tvAt tasya iti arTaH /
   asyottaram  # upalabdhidaniyamaḥ.# /	asya uttaram # upalabDit aniyamaH.# /
   karaṇādīni kārakāntarāṇi kartā prayuṅkte na tvayaṃ kārakāntaraiḥ	karaNa AdIni kAraka antarANi kartA prayuFkte na tu ayam kAraka antarEH
   prayujyata ityetāvanmātramasya svātantryaṃ na tu kāryakriyāyāṃ na	prayujyate iti etAvat mAtram asya svAtantryam na tu kArya kriyAyAm na
   kārakāntarāṇyapekṣata iti /	kAraka antarANi apekzate iti /
   īdṛśaṃ hi svātantryaṃ neśvarasyāpyatrabhavato 'stītyutsannasaṃkathaḥ kartā	IdRSam hi svAtantryam na ISvarasya api atraBavataH asti iti utsanna saMkaTaH kartA
   syāt /	syAt /
   tathā	taTA
   cāyamadṛṣṭaparipākavaśādiṣṭamabhiprepsustatsādhanavibhrameṇāniṣṭopāyaṃ	ca ayam adRzwa paripAka vaSa At izwam aBiprepsuH tad sADana viBrameNa anizwa upAyam
   vyāpārayannaniṣṭaṃ prāpnuyādityaniyamaḥ kartṛtvaṃ ceti na virodhaḥ /	vyApArayan= anizwam prApnuya Aditya niyamaH kartR tvam ca iti na viroDaH /
   # viṣayaprakalpanamātraprayojanatvāditi.# /	# vizaya prakalpana mAtra prayojana tvAt iti.# /
   nityacaitanyasvabhāvasya khalvātmana indriyādīti karaṇāni	nitya cEtanya svaBAvasya Kalu AtmanaH indriya Adi iti karaNAni

   vijñānamiti cākhyāyate, tatra cāsyāsti svātantryamityarthaḥ //37 //	vijQAnam iti ca AKyAyate, tatra ca asya asti svAtantryam iti arTaH //37 //
   # śaktiviparyayāt.# /	# Sakti viparyayAt.# /
   pūrvaṃ kāraṇakavibhaktiviparyaya uktaḥ /	pUrvam kAraNaka viBakti viparyayaH uktaH /
   saṃprati kārakaśaktiviparyaya ityapunaruktam /	saMprati kAraka Sakti viparyayaH iti apunaruktam /
   aviparyayāya tu karaṇāntarakalpanāyāṃ nāmni visaṃvāda iti //38 //	aviparyayAya tu karaNa antara kalpanAyAm nAmni visaMvAdaH iti //38 //
   samādhyabhāvācca /	samADi aBAvAt ca /
   samādhiriti saṃyamamupalakṣayati /	samADiH iti saMyamam upalakzayati /
   dhāraṇādhyānasamādhayo hi saṃyamapadevadanīyāḥ /	DAraNA DyAna samADayaH hi saMyama pad evadanIyAH /
   yathāhuḥ 'trayamekatra saṃyamaḥ' iti /	yaTA AhuH  atrayam ekatra saMyamaHa iti /
   atra śrotavyo mantavya iti dhāraṇopadeśaḥ /	atra SrotavyaH mantavyaH iti DAraNa upadeSaH /
   nididhyāsitavya iti dhyānopadeśaḥ /	nidiDyAsitavyaH iti DyAna upadeSaH /
   draṣṭavya iti samādherupadeśaḥ /	drazwavyaH iti samADeH upadeSaH /

   so 'yamiha kartātmā samādhāvupadiśyamāna ātmanaḥ kartṛtvamavaitīti	saH ayam iha kartA AtmA samADO= upadiSyamAnaH AtmanaH kartR tvam avEtIti
   sūtrārthaḥ //39 //	sUtra arTaH //39 //
   # yathā ca takṣobhayathā.# /	# yaTA ca takzoBa yaTA.# /
   avāntarasaṃgatimāha  # evaṃ tāvaditi.# /	avAntara saMgatim Aha # evam tAvat iti.# /
   vimṛśati  # tatpunariti.# /	vimRSati # tat punar iti.# /
   pūrvapakṣaṃ gṛhṇāti  # tatreti.# /	pUrva pakzam gRhNAti # tatra iti.# /
   śāstrārthavattvādayo hi hetava ātmanaḥ kartṛtvamāpādayanti /	SAstra arTavat tva AdayaH hi hetavaH AtmanaH kartR tvam ApAdayanti /
   naca svābhāvike kartṛtve saṃbhavatyasatyapavāde tadaupādhikaṃ yuktam.	na ca svABAvike kartR tve saMBavati asati apavAde tad OpADikam yuktam.
   atiprasaṅgāt /	atiprasaFgAt /
   naca muktyabhāvaprasaṅgo 'syāpavādakaḥ, yathā jñānasvabhāvo jñeyābhāve 'pi	na ca mukti aBAva prasaFgaH asya apavAdakaH, yaTA jQAna svaBAvaH jQeya aBAve api
   nājño bhavatyevaṃ kartṛsvabhāvo 'pi kriyāveśābhāve 'pi nākartā /	na ajQaH Bavati evam kartR svaBAvaH api kriyA AveSa aBAve api na akartA /
   tasmāt svābhāvikamevāsya kartṛtvamiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate /	tasmAt svABAvikam eva asya kartR tvam iti prApte aBiDIyate /
   nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvaṃ hi brahma bhūyobhūyaḥ śrūyate /	nitya SudDa budDa mukta svaBAvam hi brahma BUyas BUyas SrUyate /
   tadasya buddhatvamasatyapi boddhavye yuktaṃ,	tat asya budDa tvam asati api bodDavye yuktaM,
   vahnerivāsatyapi dāhye dagdhṛtvaṃ, tacchīlasya tasyāvagamāt /	vahneH iva asati api dAhye dagDR tvaM, tad SIlasya tasya avagamAt /
   kartṛtvaṃ tvasya kriyāveśādavagantavyam /	kartR tvam tu asya kriyA veSAt avagantavyam /
   naca nityodāsīnasya kūṭasthasya nityasyāsakṛcchutasya saṃbhavati, tasya ca	na ca nitya udAsInasya kUwasTasya nityasya asakRt Sutasya saMBavati, tasya ca
   kadācidapyasaṃsarge kathaṃ tacchaktiyogo nirviṣayāyāḥ śakteraṃsabhavāt	kadAcid api asaMsarge kaTam tat Sakti yogaH nirvizayAyAH SakteH aMsa BavAt
   tathāca yadi tatsidhyarthaṃ tadviṣaḥ kriyāveśo 'byupeyate tathā sati	taTA ca yadi tat siDi arTam tat vizaH kriyA veSaH abyupeyate taTA sati
   tatsvabhāvasya svabhāvocchedābhāvādbhāvanāśaprasaṅgaḥ, naca muktasyāsti	tad svaBAvasya svaBAva ucCeda aBAvAt BAva nASa prasaFgaH, na ca muktasya asti
   kriyāyoga iti /	kriyA yogaH iti /

   syādityāśayavānāha  # na svābhāvikaṃ kartṛtvamātmana iti.# /	syAt iti ASaya vAn Aha # na svABAvikam kartR tvam AtmanaH iti.# /
   abhiprāyamabudhvā codayati  # nanu sthitāyāmapīti.# /	aBiprAyam abuDvA codayati # nanu sTitAyAm api iti.# /

   # yathā hīneti.# /	# yaTA hIna iti.# /
   'sruveṇāvadyapi' iti māṃsapuroḍāśāvadānāsaṃbhavāt, saṃbhavācca	asruveNa avadi api a iti mAMsa puroxASa avadAna asaMBavAt, saMBavAt ca

   rūpādibuddhipañcakakāryavyavasthātaścakṣurādibuddhīndriyakaraṇapañcakavyavasthā	rUpa Adi budDi paQcaka kArya vyavasTAtaH cakzuH Adi budDIndriya karaNa paQcaka vyavasTA

   apica  # pañcavṛttirmanovadvyapadiśyate.# /	apica # paQcavRttiH manaH vat vyapadiSyate.# /

   salilādibuddhayaḥ /	salila Adi budDayaH /

   ataḥ so 'pi saṃgṛhītaḥ /	atas saH api saMgRhItaH /

   # aṇuśca.# /	# aNuH ca.# /

   yathā vibhuna ākāśasya kuṭakarakādyavacchedātkuṭādisāmyamiti prāpta āha  #	yaTA viBunaH AkASasya kuwa karaka Adi avacCedAt kuwa Adi sAmyam iti prAptaH Aha #
   aṇuśca.# /	aNuH ca.# /
   utkrāntigatyāgatiśrutibhya ādhyātmikasya prāṇasyāvacchinnatā na vibhutvam	utkrAnti gati Agati SrutiByaH ADyAtmikasya prANasya avacCinna tA na viBu tvam
   duradhigamatāmātreṇa ca śarīravyāpino 'pyaṇutvamupacaryate na	duraDi gamatA mAtreNa ca SarIra vyApinaH api aNu tvam upacaryate na
   tvaṇutvamityuktamadhastāt /	tu aNu tvam iti uktam aDastAt /
   yattvasya vibhutvānmānaṃ tadādhidaivikena sūtrātmanā samaṣṭivyaṣṭirūpeṇa	yat tvasya viBu tvAt mAnam tad ADidEvikena sUtra AtmanA samazwi vyazwi rUpeNa
   na tvādhyātmikena rūpeṇa /	na tu ADyAtmikena rUpeNa /

   prāṇasyāhuḥ svarūpato na tu karakākāśavatparopādhikatayā kathañcinnatavyā	prANasya AhuH svarUpataH na tu karaka AkASa vat para upADika tayA kaTaQcid natavyA
   iti //13 //	iti //13 //
   # jyotirādyadhiṣṭhānaṃ tu tadāmananāt.# /	# jyotiH Adi aDizWAnam tu tadAmananAt.# /
   yaddhi tatkāryaṃ kurvaddṛṣṭaṃ tatsvamahimnaiva karotityeṣa	yat hi tat kAryam kurvat dRzwam tat sva mahimnA eva kara utiti eza
   tāvadutsargaḥtha parādhiṣṭhānaṃ tu tasya balavatpramāṇāntaravaśāt.	tAvat utsargaHTa parADizWAnam tu tasya balavat pramANa antara vaSAt.
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   vāsyādīnāṃ takṣādyadhiṣṭhitānāmacetanānāṃ	vA asya AdInAm takza Adi aDizWitAnAm acetanAnAm

   na /	na /

   kiñcitkāryamutpadyeta virodhāt /	kiQcid kAryam utpadyeta viroDAt /
   apica ya indriyāṇāmadhiṣṭhātā sa eva bhokteti devatānāṃ bhoktṛtvena	apica yaH indriyANAm aDizWAtA saH eva BoktA iti devatAnAm BoktR tvena
   svāmitvaṃ śarīra iti na jīvaḥ svāmī syādbhoktā ca /	svAmi tvam SarIraH iti na jIvaH svAmI syAt BoktA ca /
   tasmādagnyādyupacāro vāgādiṣu prakāśakatvādinā kenacinnimittena	tasmAt agni Adi upacAraH vAc Adizu prakASaka tva AdinA kenacid nimittena
   gamayitatavyo natu svarūpeṇāgnyādidevatānāṃ mukhādyanupraveśa iti prāptam	gamayitatavyaH na tu sva rUpeNa agni Adi devatAnAm muKa Adi anupraveSaH iti prAptam
   evaṃ prāpte ucyate nānāvidhāsu tāvacchutiṣu smṛtiṣu ca tatra tatra	evam prApte ucyate nAnAviDAsu tAvat Sutizu smRtizu ca tatra tatra
   vāgādiṣvagnyādidevatādhiṣṭhānavagamyate /	vAc Adizu agni Adi devatA DizWA anavagamyate /
   naca tadasatyāmanupapattau kleśena vyākhyātumucitam /	na ca tat asatyAm anupapattO kleSena vyAKyAtum ucitam /
   naca svarūpopayogabhedajñānavirahiṇo jīvasyendriyādhiṣṭhātṛtvasaṃbhavaḥ,	na ca svarUpa upayoga Beda jQAna virahiNaH jIvasya indriya aDizWAtR tva saMBavaH,
   saṃbhavati tu devatānāmindriyādyārṣeṇa jñānena sākṣātkṛtavatīnāṃ	saMBavati tu devatAnAm indriya Adi ArzeNa jQAnena sAkzAtkRtavatInAm
   tatsvarūpabhedatadupayogabhedavijñānam /	tad svarUpa Beda tad upayoga Beda vijQAnam /
   tasmāttāstā eva devatāstattatkaraṇādhiṣṭhātrya iti yuktaṃ na tu jīvaḥ /	tasmAt tAH tAH eva devatAH tad tad karaNa aDizWAtryaH iti yuktam na tu jIvaH /
   bhavatu vā jīvo 'pyadhiṣṭhātā tathāpyadoṣaḥ /	Bavatu vA jIvaH api aDizWAtA taTA api adozaH /
   anekeṣāmadhiṣṭhātaṇāmekaḥ parameśvaro 'sti niyantāntaryāmī	anekezAm aDizWAtaNAm ekaH parameSvaraH asti niyantA antaryAmI
   tadśādvipratipitsavo 'pi na vipratipattumarhanti /	tad SAt vipratipitsavaH api na vipratipattum arhanti /
   tathā caikavākyatayā na tatkāryotpattipratyūhaḥ /	taTA ca eka vAkya tayA na tad kArya utpatti pratyUhaH /

   bhoktā tu jīva eva /	BoktA tu jIvaH eva /

   tasmāt prāṇānāmadhiṣṭhātryo devatā iti siddham, śeṣamatirohitārtham //14	tasmAt prANAnAm aDizWAtryaH devatAH iti sidDam, Sezam ati rohita arTam //14
   # ta indriyāṇi tadvyapadeśādanyatra śreṣṭhāt.# /	# te indriyANi tad vyapadeSAt anyatra SrezWAt.# /
   mā bhūt prāṇo vṛttirindriyāmām /	mA BUt prANaH vRttiH indriyAmAm /
   indriyāṇyevāsya jyeṣṭhasya ca prāṇasya vṛttayo bhaviṣyanti /	indriyANi eva asya jyezWasya ca prANasya vRttayaH Bavizyanti /
   tadbhāvābhāvānuvidhāyibhāvābhāvatvamindriyāṇāṃ śrutyanubhavasiddhaṃ,	tad BAva aBAva anuviDAyi BAva aBAva tvam indriyANAm Sruti anuBava sidDaM,
   tathāca prāṇaśabdasyaikasyānyāṭyamanekārtvaṃ na bhaviṣyati /	taTA ca prANa Sabdasya ekasya anyAwyam anekA rtvam na Bavizyati /
   vṛttīnāṃ vṛttimatastattvāntaratvābhāvāt /	vRttInAm vRttimataH tattva antara tva aBAvAt /

   indriyeṣu lākṣaṇikatvaṃ vā /	indriyezu lAkzaNika tvam vA /
   naca mukhyasaṃbhave lakṣaṇā yuktā ughanyatvāt /	na ca muKya saMBave lakzaNAH yuktAH uGanya tvAt /

   'pīndriyebhyo 'sti bhedena vyapadeśa ityanindriyatvaprasaṅgaḥ /	api indriyeByaH asti Bedena vyapadeSaH iti anindriya tva prasaFgaH /

   śrutiḥ /	SrutiH /

   yāpi ca prāṇarūpatāmindriyāṇāmabhidadhāti śrutiḥ, tatrāpi	yA api ca prANa rUpa tAm indriyANAm aBidaDAti SrutiH, tatra api
   paurvāparyālocanāyāṃ bheda eva pratīyata ityuktaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā /	pOrvAparya AlocanAyAm BedaH eva pratIyate iti uktam BAzya kRtAH /

   gobalīvardanyāyena /	go balIvarda nyAyena /

   vāgādivatprāṇo 'pīndriyamiti prāptam /	vAc Adi vat prANaH api indriyam iti prAptam /
   evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate indriyāṇi vāgādini śreṣṭhāt prāṇādanyatra /	evam prApte aBiDIyate indriyANi vAc Adini SrezWAt prANAt anyatra /
   kutaḥ tenendriyaśabdena teṣāmeva vāgādīnāṃ vyapadeśāt /	kutaH tena indriya Sabdena tezAm eva vAc AdInAm vyapadeSAt /
   nahi mukhye prāṇā indriyaśabdo dṛṣṭacaraḥ /	na hi muKye prANAH indriya SabdaH dRzwa caraH /
   indraliṅgatā tu vyutpattimātranimittaṃ yathā gacchatīti gauriti /	indra liFga tA tu vyutpatti mAtra nimittam yaTA gacCati iti gOH iti /
   pravṛttinimittaṃ tu dehādhiṣṭhānatve sati rūpādyālocanakaraṇatvam /	pravRtti nimittam tu deha aDizWAna tve sati rUpa Adi Alocana karaNa tvam /
   idaṃ cāsya dehādhiṣṭhānatvaṃ yaddehānugrahopaghātābhyāṃ	idam ca asya deha aDizWAna tvam yat deha anugraha upaGAtAByAm
   tadanugrahopaghātau /	tad anugraha upaGAtO /

   tasmādrūḍhervāgādaya evendriyāṇi na prāṇa iti siddham /	tasmAt rUXeH vAc AdayaH eva indriyANi na prANaH iti sidDam /
   bāṣyakārīyaṃ tvadhikaraṇaṃ bhedaśruterityādiṣu sūtreṣu neyam //17 //	bAzya kArI iyam tu aDikaraNam Beda SruteH iti Adizu sUtrezu na iyam //17 //
   saṃjñāmūrtikḷptistu trivṛtkurvata upadeśāt /	saMjQA mUrti k?ptiH tu trivRt kurvataH upadeSAt /
   satprakriyāyāṃ 'tatteja aikṣata' ityādinā saṃdarbheṇa tejo 'bannānāṃ	sat prakriyAyAm atat tejaH Ekzata a ityAdinA saMdarBeNa tejaH abannAnAm
   sṛṣṭiṃ vidhāyopadiśyate 'seyaṃ devataikṣata hantāhamimāstisro devatā anena	sRzwim viDAya upadiSyate  aseyam devatA Ekzata hanta aham imAH tisraH devatAH anena
   jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi tāsāṃ trivṛtaṃ trivṛtamekaikāṃ	jIvena AtmanA anupraviSya nAma rUpe vyAkaravANi tAsAm trivRtam trivRtam ekEkAm
   karavāṇi' iti /	karavANi a iti /
   asyārthaḥ pūrvoktaṃ bahubhavanamīkṣaṇaprayojanamadyāpi sarvathā na	asya arTaH pUrva uktam bahu Bavanam IkzaNa prayojanam adya api sarvaTA na
   niṣpannamiti punarīkṣāṃ kṛtavatī bahubhavanameva prayojanamuddiśya kathaṃ	nizpannam iti punar IkzAm kRtavatI bahu Bavanam eva prayojanam uddiSya kaTam
   hantedānīmahamimā yathoktāsteja ādyāstisro devatāḥ pūrvasṛṣṭāvubhūtena	hanta idAnIm aham imAH yaTA uktAH tejaH AdyAH tisraH devatAH pUrva sRzwO= uBUtena
   saṃprati smaraṇasaṃnidhāpitena jīvena prāṇādharaṇakartrātmanānupraviśya	saMprati smaraNa saMniDApitena jIvena prANa aDaraNa kartR AtmanA anupraviSya
   buddhyādibhūtamātrāyāmadarśa iva mukhabimbaṃ toya iva candramaso bimbaṃ	budDi Adi BUta mAtrAyAm adarSaH iva muKa bimbam toyaH iva candramasaH bimbam
   chāyāmātratayānupraviśya nāma ca rūpaṃ ca te vyākaravāṇi vispaṣṭaṃ	CAyA mAtra tayA anupraviSya nAma ca rUpam ca te vyAkaravANi vispazwam
   karavāṇīdamasya nāmedaṃ ca rūpamiti /	karavANI damasya nAma idam ca rUpam iti /
   tāsāṃ tisṛṇāṃ devatānāṃ trivṛtaṃ trivṛtaṃ tejo 'bannātmanā tryātmikāṃ	tAsAm tisRNAm devatAnAm trivRtam trivRtam tejaH abanna AtmanA tri AtmikAm
   tryātmikāmekaikāṃ devatāṃ karavāṇīti /	tri AtmikAm ekEkAm devatAm karavANi iti /
   tatra saṃśayaḥ kiṃ jīvakartṛkamidaṃ nāmarūpavyākaraṇamāho	tatra saMSayaH kim jIvakartRkam idam nAma rUpa vyAkaraNam Aho
   parameśvarakartṛkamiti /	parameSvara kartRkam iti /
   yadi jīvakartṛkaṃ tataḥ 'ākāśo ha vai nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā'	yadi jIvakartRkam tatas aAkASaH ha vE nAma nAma rUpayoH nirvahitA a
   ityādiśrutivirodhādanadhyavasāyaḥ /	ityAdi Sruti viroDAt anaDyavasAyaH /
   atha parameśvarakartṛkaṃ, tato na virodhaḥ /	aTa parameSvara kartRkaM, tatas na viroDaH /
   tatra ḍitthaḍavitthādināmakaraṇe ca ghaṭapaṭādirūpakaraṇe ca	tatra xitTaxavitTa Adi nAmakaraNe ca Gawa pawa Adi rUpa karaNe ca
   jīvakartṛtvadarśanādihāpi trivṛtkaraṇe nāmarūpakaraṇe cāsti saṃbhāvanā	jIvakartR tva darSanAt iha api trivRt karaNe nAma rUpa karaNe ca asti saMBAvanA
   jīvasya /	jIvasya /
   tathāca yogyatvādanena jīveneti vyākaravāṇīti pradhānakriyayā saṃbadhyate,	taTA ca yogya tvAt anena jIvena iti vyAkaravANi iti praDAna kriyayA saMbaDyate,
   na tvānantaryādanupraviśyetyanena saṃbadhyate /	na tvA anantaryAt anupraviSya iti anena saMbaDyate /
   pradhānapadārthasaṃbandho hi sākṣātsarveṣāṃ guṇabhūtānāṃ	praDAna padArTa saMbanDaH hi sAkzAt sarvezAm guNa BUtAnAm
   padārthānāmautsargikastādarthyātteṣām /	padArTAnAm OtsargikaH tAdarTyAt tezAm /
   tasya tu kkacitsākṣādasaṃbhavātparamparāśrayaṇaṃ, sākṣātsaṃbhavaśca	tasya tu kkacid sAkzAt asaMBavAt parampara ASrayaNaM, sAkzAt saMBavaH ca
   yogyatayā darśitaḥ /	yogyatayA darSitaH /
   nanu seyaṃ devateti parameśvarakartṛtvaṃ śrūyate /	nanu sA iyam devatA iti parameSvara kartR tvam SrUyate /
   satyam /	satyam /
   prayojakatayā tu tadbhaviṣyati /	prayojaka tayA tu tat Bavizyati /
   yathā loke cāreṇāhaṃ parasainyamanupraviśya saṃkalayānīti /	yaTA loke cAreNa aham para sEnyam anupraviSya saMkalayAni iti /
   yadi punarasya sākṣātkartṛbhāvo bhavedanena jīvenetyanarthakaṃ syāt /	yadi punar asya sAkzAt kartR BAvaH Bavet anena jIvena iti anarTakam syAt /
   nahi jīvasyānyathā karaṇabhāvo bhavitumarhati /	na hi jIvasya anyaTA karaNa BAvaH Bavitum arhati /
   prayojakakartustatsākṣātkartā karaṇaṃ bhavati pradhānakriyoddeśena	prayojaka kartuH tad sAkzAt kartA karaNam Bavati praDAna kriyA uddeSena
   prayojakena prayojyakarturvyāpanāt /	prayojakena prayojya kartuH vyApanAt /
   tasmādatra jīvasya kartṛtvaṃ nāmarūpavyākaraṇe 'nyatra tu parameśvarasyeti	tasmAt atra jIvasya kartR tvam nAma rUpa vyAkaraNe anyatra tu parameSvarasya iti
   virodhādanadhyavasāya iti prāptam /	viroDAt anaDyavasAyaH iti prAptam /
   evaṃ prāpta ucyate parameśvarasyaivehāpi nāmarūpavyākartṛtvamupadiśyate na	evam prAptaH ucyate  parameSvarasya eva iha api nAma rUpa vyAkartR tvam upadiSyate na
   tu jīvasya, tasya pradhānakriyāsaṃbandhaṃ pratyayogyatvāt /	tu jIvasya, tasya praDAna kriyA saMbanDam pratyayogya tvAt /
   nanvanyatra ḍitthajavitthādināmaka4maṇi ghaṭaśarāvādirūpakarmaṇi ca	nanu anyatra xitTa javitTa Adi nAmaka4maNi Gawa SarAva Adi rUpa karmaNi ca
   kartṛtvadarśanādihāpi yogyatā saṃbhāvyata iti cet /	kartR tva darSanAt iha api yogyatA saMBAvyate iti ced /
   na /	na /
   nirinadīsamudrādinirmāṇāsāmarthyenārthāpattyabhāvaparicchinnena	nirinadI samudra Adi nirmANa asAmarTyena arTa apatti aBAva paricCinnena
   saṃbhāvanāpabādhanāt /	saMBAvanA apabADanAt /
   tasmāt parameśvarasyaivātra sākṣātkartṛtvamupadiśyate na jīvasya /	tasmAt parameSvarasya eva atra sAkzAtkartR tvam upadiSyate na jIvasya /
   anupraviśyetyanena tu saṃnihitenāsya saṃbandho yogyatvāt /	anupraviSya iti anena tu saMnihitena asya saMbanDaH yogya tvAt /
   na cānarthakyaṃ trivṛtkaraṇasya bhoktṛjīvārthatayā	na ca AnarTakyam trivRt karaNasya BoktR jIva arTa tayA
   tadanupraveśābhidhānasyārthavattvāt /	tad anupraveSa aBiDAnasya arTavat tvAt /
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   anupraviśya vyākaravāṇīti samānakartṛtve ktvaḥ smaraṇāt	anupraviSya vyAkaravANi iti samAna kartR tve ktvaH smaraNAt 
   praveśanakarturjīvasyaiva vyākartṛtvamupadiśyate 'nyathā tu parameśvarasya	praveSana kartuH jIvasya eva vyAkartR tvam upadiSyate anyaTA tu parameSvarasya
   vyākartṛtve jīvasya praveṣṭṛtve bhinnakartṛkatvena ktvaḥ prayogo	vyAkartR tve jIvasya pravezwR tve Binna kartRka tvena ktvaH prayogaH 
   vyāhanyetetyatrāha  # naca jīvo nāmeti.# /	vyAhanyeta iti atra aha # na ca jIvaH nAma iti.# /
   atirohitārthamanyat //20 //	atirohita arTam anyat //20 //
   # māṃsādi bhaumaṃ yathāśabdamitarayośca.# /	# mAMsa Adi BOmam yaTASabdam itarayoH ca.# /
   atra bhāṣyakṛtottarasūtraśeṣatayā sūtrametadviṣayopadarśanaparatayā	atra BAzya kRta uttara sUtra Seza tayA sUtram etat vizaya upadarSana para tayA
   vyākhyātam /	vyAKyAtam /
   śaṅkānirākaraṇārthatvamapyasya śakyaṃ vaktum /	SaFkA nirAkaraNa arTa tvam api asya Sakyam vaktum /
   tathāhi yo 'nnasyāṇiṣṭho bhāgastanmanastejasastu yo 'ṇiṣṭho bāgaḥ sa	taTA hi yaH annasya aNizWaH BAgaH tad manaH tejasaH tu yaH aNizWaH bAgaH sa
   vāgityatra hi kāṇādānāṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ cāsti vipratipattiḥ /	vAc iti atra hi kANAdAnAm sAMKyAnAm ca asti vipratipattiH /
   tatra kāṇādā mano nityamācakṣate /	tatra kANAdAH manaH nityam Acakzate /
   sāṃkhyāstvāhaṅkārike vāṅmanase /	sAMKyAH tu A ahaFkArike vAc manase /
   annabhāgatāvacanaṃ tvasyānnasaṃbandhalakṣaṇārtham /	anna BAgatA vacanam tu asya anna saMbanDa lakzaNa arTam /
   annopabhoge hi manaḥ svasthaṃ bhavati /	anna upaBoge hi manaH svasTam Bavati /
   evaṃ vāco 'pi pāṭavena tejaḥsāmyamabhyūhanīyam /	evam vAcaH api pAwavena tejaH sAmyam aByUhanIyam /
   tatredamupatiṣṭhate  # māṃsāditi.# /	tatra idam upatizWate # mAMsAditi.# /
   vāṅmanasa iti vaktavye māṃsādyabhidhānaṃ siddhena saha sādhyasyopanyāso	vAc manasaH iti vaktavye mAMsa Adi aBiDAnam sidDena saha sADyasya upanyAsaH 
   dṛṣṭāntalābhāya /	dRzwAnta lABAya /
   yathā māṃsādi bhaumādyevaṃ vāṅmanase api taijasabhaume ityarthaḥ /	yaTA mAMsa Adi BOma Adi evam vAc manase api tEjasa BOme iti arTaH /
   etaduktaṃ bhavati na tāvadbrahmavyatiriktamasti kiñcinnatyam /	etat uktam Bavati na tAvat brahma vyatiriktam asti kiQcinnatyam /
   brahmajñānena sarvajñānapratijñāvyāghātāt, bahuśrutivirodhācca	brahma jQAnena sarva jQAna pratijQA vyAGAtAt, bahu Sruti viroDAt ca
   nāpyāhaṅkārikam, ahaṅkārasya sāṃkhyābhimatasya tattvasyāprāmāṇikatvāt /	na ApyAhaFkAri kam, ahaFkArasya sAMKya aBimatasya tattvasya aprAmANika tvAt /
   tasmādasati bādhake śrutirāñjasī nānyathā kathañcinnetumuciteti	tasmAt asati bADake SrutiH AQjasI na anyaTA kaTaQcid netum ucita iti
   kañciddoṣamityuktaṃ taṃ doṣaṃ darśayannāha pūrvapakṣī  # yadi sarvameva	kaQcid dozam iti uktam tam dozam darSayan= Aha pUrva pakzI # yadi sarvam eva
   iti.# //21 //	iti.# //21 //
   # vaiśeṣyāttu tadvādastadvādaḥ.# //22 //	# vESezyAt tu tad vAdaH tad vAdaH.# //22 //
   tribṛtkaraṇāviśeṣe 'pi yasya ca yatra bhūyastvaṃ tena tasya vyapadeśa	tribRt karaNa aviSeze api yasya ca yatra BUyas tvam tena tasya vyapadeSa
   ityarthaḥ //22 //	iti arTaH //22 //
   iti śrīmadvācaspatimiśraviracite śrīmadbhagavatpādaśārīrakabhāṣyavibhāge	iti SrImat vAcaspati miSravi racite SrImat Bagavat pAda SArIraka BAzya viBAge
   bhāmatyāṃ dvitīyasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //4 //	BAmatyAm dvitIyasya aDyAyasya caturTaH pAdaH //4 //
   iti śrīmadbrahmasūtraśāṅkarabhāṣye 'virodhākhyo dvitīyo 'dhyāyaḥ	iti SrImat brahmasUtra SAFkara BAzye aviroDa AKyaH dvitIyaH aDyAyaH
   ____________________________Adhyāya 3____________________________ /	____________________________ADyAyaH 3____________________________ /
   # atha tṛtīyo 'dhyāyaḥ.# /	# aTa tRtIyaH aDyAyaH.# /
   # tadantarapratipattau raṃhati saṃpariṣvaktaḥ praśnanirūpaṇābhyām.# /	# tad antara pratipattO raMhati saMparizvaktaH praSna nirUpaNAByAm.# /
   dvitīyatṛtīyādhyāyayorhetumadbhāvalakṣaṇaṃ saṃbandhaṃ darśayan	dvitIya tRtIyA DyAyayoH hetumat BAva lakzaNam saMbanDam darSayan
   sukhāvabodhārthamarthasaṃkṣepamāha  # dvitīye 'dhyāya iti.# /	suKa avaboDa arTam arTa saMkzepa mAha # dvitIye aDyAyaH iti.# /
   smṛtinyāyaśrutivirodhaparihāreṇa hi anadhyavasāyalakṣaṇamaprāmāṇyaṃ	smRti nyAya Sruti viroDa parihAreNa hi anaDyavasAya lakzaNam aprAmANyam
   parihṛtaṃ tathāca niścalīkṛte tārtīyo vicāro bhavatyanyathā tu nirbījatayā	parihRtam taTA ca niScalIkRte tArtIyaH vicAraH Bavati anyaTA tu nirbIja tayA
   na sidhyediti /	na siDyet iti /
   avāntarasaṃgatiṃ darśayitun # tatra va jīvavyatiriktāni tattvāni	avAntara saMgatim darSayitun # tatra va jIva vyatiriktAni tattvAni
   jīvopakaraṇāni.#cetyuktam /	jIva upakaraNA ni.#ca iti uktam /
   adhyāyārthasaṃkṣepamuktvā pādārthasaṃkṣepamāha  # tatra prathame tāvatpada	aDyAya arTa saMkzepam uktvA pAda arTa saMkzepamAha # tatra praTame tAvat pada
   iti.# /	iti.# /
   tasya prayojanamāha vairāgya iti /	tasya prayojana m Aha vErAgyaH iti /
   pūrvāparapariśodhanāya bhūmikāmāracayati #  jīvo mukhyaprāṇasaciva iti /	pUrva apara pariSoDanAya BUmikAm Aracayati #  jIvaH muKya prANa sacivaH iti /
   karaṇopādānavadbhūtopādānasyāśrutatvāditi.# /	karaNa upAdAna vat BUta upAdAnasya aSruta tvAt iti.# /
   atra ca karaṇopādānaśrutyaiva bhautikatvāt karaṇānāṃ	atra ca karaNa upAdAna SrutyA eva BOtika tvAt karaNAnAm
   bhūtopādānasiddherindriyopādānātiriktabhūtavivakṣayādhikaraṇārambhaḥ /	BUta upAdAna sidDeH indriya upAdAna atirikta BUta vivakzaya aDikaraNa AramBaH /
   yadi bhūtānyādāyāgamiṣyattadā tadapi karaṇopādānadevaśroṣyat /	yadi BUtAni AdAya Agamizyat tadA tat api karaNa upAdAna deva Srozyat /
   naca śrūyate tasmānna bhūtapariṣvakto raṃhasyapi tu karaṇamātrapariṣvaktaḥ	na ca SrUyate tasmAt na BUta parizvaktaH raMhasi api tu karaNa mAtra parizvaktaH
   nahyāgamaikagamyer'the tadabhāvaḥ prameyābhāvaṃ na paricchettumarhati /	na hi Agama eka gamyer aTe tad aBAvaH prameya aBAvam na paricCettum arhati /
   naca dehāntarārambhānyathānupapattyā bhūtapariṣvaktasya raṃhaṇakalpaneti	na ca deha antara AramBAni aTa anupapattyA BUta parizvaktasya raMhaNa kalpanA iti
   yuktamityāha  # sulabhāśca sarvatra bhūtamātrā iti /	yuktam iti Aha # sulaBAH ca sarvatra BUtamAtrAH iti /
   dyuparjanya iti.# /	dyuparjanyaH iti.# /
   iha hi kāyārambhaṇāmagnihotrāpūrvapariṇāmalakṣaṇaṃ śraddhāditvena pañcadhā	iha hi kAya AramBaNAm agnihotrA pUrva pariNAma lakzaNam SradDA Adi tvena paQcaDA
   pravibhajya dyuprabhṛtiṣvagniṣu	praviBajya dyu praBRtizu agnizu
   hetavyatvenopāsanamuttaramārgapratipattisādhanaṃ vivakṣantyāha	hetavya tvena upAsanam uttara mArga pratipatti sADanam vivakzanti Aha
   śrutiḥ 'asau vāva loko gautamāgniḥ' ityādi /	SrutiH  aasO vAva lokaH gOtama agniHa ityAdi /
   atra sāyaṃprātaragnihotrāhuto, hute paya ādisādhane	atra sAyaMprAtar agnihotra Ahuto, hute payaH Adi sADane
   śraddhāpūrvamāhavanīyāgnisamiddhūmārciraṅgāravisphuliṅgabhāvite	SradDA pUrvam AhavanIya agni samiD DUma arciH aFgAra visPuliFga BAvite
   kartrādikārakabhāvite cāntarikṣaṃ krameṇotkrāmya dyulokaṃ praviśantyau	kartR Adi kAraka BAvite ca antarikzam krameNa utkrAmya dyu lokam praviSantyO
   sūkṣmabhūte dravadravyapayaḥprabhṛtyapsaṃbandhādapśabdavācye,	sUkzma BUte drava dravya payaH praBRti apsaMbanDa At ap Sabda vAcye,
   śraddhāhetukatvācca śraddhāśabdavācye /	SradDA hetuka tvAt ca SradDA Sabda vAcye /
   tayorāhutyoradhikaraṇamagniranye ca samiddhūmārciraṅgāravisphuliṅgā	tayoH AhutyoH aDikaraNam agniH anye ca samiD DUma arciH aFgAra visPuliFgA
   rūpakatvena nirdiśyante /	rUpaka tvena nirdiSyante /
   asau vāva dyuloko gautamāgniḥ /	asO vAva dyulokaH gOtama agniH /
   yathāgnihotrādhikaraṇamāhavanīya evaṃ	yaTA agnihotra aDikaraNam AhavanIyaH evam
   śraddhaśabdavācyāgnihotrāhutipariṇāmāvasthārūpāḥ sūkṣmā yā āpaḥ	SradDa Sabda vAcya agnihotra Ahuti pariNAma avasTA rUpAH sUkzmAH yAH ApaH
   śraddhābhāvitāstadadhikaraṇaṃ dyulokaḥ /	SradDA BAvitAH tad aDikaraNam dyulokaH /
   asyāditya eva samit /	asya AdityaH eva samiD /
   tena hīddho 'sau dyuloko dīpyate 'taḥ samindhanātsamit tasyādityasya	tena hi idDaH asO dyulokaH dIpyate atas saminDanAt samiD tasya Adityasya
   raśmayo dhūmā indhanādivādityādraśmīnāṃ samutthānāt /	raSmayaH DUmAH inDanAt iva AdityAt raSmInAm samutTAnAt /
   ahararthiḥ /	ahar arTiH /
   prakāśasāmānyādādityakāryatvācca /	prakASa sAmAnyAt Aditya kArya tvAt ca /
   candramā aṅgāraḥ /	candramAH aFgAraH /
   tadetasminnagnau devā yajamānaprāṇā agnyādirūpā adhidevam /	tat etasmin= agnO devAH yajamAna prANAH agni Adi rUpAH aDidevam /
   śraddhāṃ juhvati śraddhā coktā /	SradDAm juhvati SradDA ca uktA /
   parjanyo vāva gautamāgniḥ parjanyo nāma vṛṣṭyupakaraṇābhimānī	parjanyaH vAva gOtama agniH parjanyaH nAma vRzwi upakaraNa aBimAnI
   devatāviśeṣaḥ /	devatA viSezaH /
   tasya vāyureva samit /	tasya vAyuH eva samiD /
   vāyunā hi parjanyo 'gniḥ samidhyate, purovātādiprābalye vṛṣṭidarśanāt /	vAyunA hi parjanyaH agniH samiDyate, purovAta Adi prAbalye vRzwi darSanAt /
   abhraṃ dhūmaḥ /	aBram DUmaH /
   dhūkāryatvāt dhūmasādṛśyācca /	DUkArya tvAt DUma sAdRSyAt ca /
   vidyudarciḥ /	vidyut arciH /
   prakāśasāmānyāt /	prakASa sAmAnyAt /
   aśaniraṅgārāḥ kāṭhinyādvidyutsaṃbandhācca /	aSaniH aFgArAH kAWinyAt vidyut saMbanDAt ca /
   garjitaṃsa moghānāṃ visphuliṅgāḥ viprakīrṇatāsāmānyāt /	garjitaMsa moGAnAm visPuliFgAH viprakIrNa tA sAmAnyAt /
   tasmindevā yajamānaprāṇā agnirūpāḥ somaṃ rājānaṃ juhvati tasya	tasmin devAH yajamAna prANAH agni rUpAH somam rAjAnam juhvati tasya
   somasyāhutervarṣaṃ bhavati /	somasya AhuteH varzam Bavati /
   etaduktaṃ bhavati śraddhākhyā āpo dyulokamāhutitvena praviśya candrākāreṇa	etat uktam Bavati SradDA AKyAH ApaH dyulokam Ahuti tvena praviSya candra AkAreNa
   pariṇatāḥ satyo dvitīye paryāye parjanyāgnau hutā vṛṣṭitvena pariṇamanta	pariNatAH satyaH dvitIye paryAye parjanya agnO hutAH vRzwi tvena pariNamanta
   iti /	iti /
   'pṛthivī vāva gautamāgniḥ' tasya pṛthivyākhyasyāgnaiḥ saṃvatsara eva samit	apRTivI vAva gOtama agniHa tasya pRTivI AKyasya agnEH saMvatsaraH eva samiD 
   saṃvatsareṇa kālena hi samiddhā bhūmirvrīhyādiniṣpattaye kalpate /	saMvatsareNa kAlena hi samidDA BUmiH vrIhi Adi nizpattaye kalpate /
   ākāśo dhūmaḥ pṛthivyagnerutthita ivākāśo dṛśyate /	AkASaH DUmaH pRTivI agneH utTitaH iva AkASaH dRSyate /
   rātrirarciḥ pṛthivyā śyāmāyā anurūpā śyāmatayā rātriragnerivānurupamarciḥ	rAtriH arciH pRTivyA SyAmAyAH anurUpA SyAma tayA rAtriH agneH iva anurupamarciH
   diśoṅgārāḥ prage rātrirūpārciḥśamane upaśāntānāṃ prasannānāṃ diśāṃ	diSoFgArAH prage rAtri rUpa arciH Samane upaSAntAnAm prasannAnAm diSAm
   darśanāt /	darSanAt /
   avāntaradiśo visphuliṅgāḥ kṣudratvasāmyāt /	avAntara diSaH visPuliFgAH kzudra tva sAmyAt /
   tasminnagnau śraddhāsomapariṇāmakrameṇāgatā apo vṛṣṭirūpeṇa pariṇatā devā	tasmin= agnO SradDA soma pariNAma krameNa AgatAH apaH vRzwi rUpeNa pariNatA devA
   juhvati tasyā āhuterannaṃ vrīhiyavādi bhavati /	juhvati tasyAH AhuteH annam vrIhi yava Adi Bavati /
   puruṣo vāva gautamāgnistasya vāgeva samit /	puruzaH vAva gOtama agniH tasya vAc eva samiD /
   vācā khalvayaṃ tālvādyaṣṭasthānasthitayā	vAcA Kalu ayam tAlu Adi azwa sTAna sTitayA
   varṇapadavākyābhivyaktikrameṇārthajātaṃ prakāśayan samidhyate /	varNa pada vAkya aBivyakti krameNa arTa jAtam prakASayan samiDyate /
   prāṇo dhūmaḥ /	prANaH DUmaH /
   dhūmavanmukhānnirgamanāt /	DUma vat muKAt nirgamanAt /
   jihvārciḥ lohitatvasāmyāt /	jihvA arciH lohita tva sAmyAt /
   cakṣuraṅgārāḥ prabhāśrayatvāt /	cakzuH aFgArAH praBA ASraya tvAt /
   śrotraṃ visphuliṅgāḥ viprakīrṇatvāt /	Srotram visPuliFgAH viprakIrNa tvAt /
   tā evāpaḥ śraddhādipariṇāmakrameṇāgatāḥ vrīhyādirūpeḥ pariṇatā satyaḥ	tAH eva apaH SradDA Adi pariNAma krameNa AgatAH vrIhi Adi rUpeH pariNatA satyaH
   puruṣe 'gnau hutāstāsāṃ pariṇāmo retaḥ saṃbhavati /	puruze agnO hutAH tAsAm pariNAmaH retaH saMBavati /
   yoṣā vāva gautamāgniḥ tasyā upastha eva samit /	yozA vAva gOtama agniH tasyAH upasTaH eva samiD /
   tena hi sā putrādyutpādanāya samidhyate yadupamantrayate sa dhūmaḥ /	tena hi sA putra Adi utpAdanAya samiDyate yat upamantrayate sa DUmaH /
   strīsaṃbhavādupamantraṇasya lomāni vā dhūmaḥ yonirarciḥ lohitatvāt /	strI saMBavAt upamantraNasya lomAni vA DUmaH yoniH arciH lohita tvAt /
   yadantaḥ karoti maithunaṃ te 'ṅgārāḥ /	yat antar karoti mETunam te aFgArAH /

   nahīṣṭādikāriṇaścandramaṇḍalādavaruhya ramaṇīyaṃ ninditāṃ vā yoniṃ	na hi izwa Adi kAriNaH candra maNxalAt avaruhya ramaNIyam ninditAm vA yonim

   tatkasya hetoḥ /	tat kasya hetoH /
   pitṛyāṇena pathāvarohāt /	pitRyANena paTA avarohAt /
   tadyadi kṣudrajantavo 'pyanenaiva pathāvaroheyuḥ, naitadeṣāṃ	tat yadi kzudra jantavaH api anena eva paTA avaroheyuH, na etat ezAm
   janmamaraṇaprabandhavattṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ bhavet /	janma maraNa prabanDavat tRtIyam sTAnam Bavet /
   tato 'vagacchāmaḥ saṃyamanaṃ sapta ca yātanābhūmīryamavaśatayā	tatas avagacCAmaH saMyamanam sapta ca yAtanA BUm Iryam avaSatayA
   pratipadyamānā aniṣṭādikāriṇo na candramaṇḍalādavarohantīti /	pratipadyamAnAH anizwa Adi kAriNaH na candra maNxalAt avarohanti iti /
   tasmāt 'ye vai ke ca' itīṣṭādikāriviṣayaṃ na sarvaviṣayam /	tasmAt aye vE ke ca a iti izwa Adi kAri vizayam na sarva vizayam /
   pañcamyāmāhutāviti ca svārthavidhānaparaṃ na	paQcamyAm AhutO= iti ca sva arTa viDAna param na

   # jīvajañ.#jarāyujam /	# jIva jaQ.#jarAyu jam /
   # saṃśokajaṃ.#saṃsvedajam //12 //	# saMSoka jaM.#saMsveda jam //12 //
   sābhāvyāpattirupapatteḥ /	sABAvya ApattiH upapatteH /
   yadyapi yathetamākāśamākāśādvāyumityato na tādātmyaṃ sphuṭamavagamyate	yadi api yaTetam AkASam AkASAt vAyum iti atas na tAdAtmyam sPuwam avagamyate
   tathāpi vāyurbhūtvetyādeḥ sphuṭataraṃ	taTA api vAyuH BUtvA ityAdeH sPuwataram
   tādātmyāvagamādyathetamākāśamityetadapi tādātmya evāvatiṣṭhate /	tAdAtmya avagamAt yaTetam AkASam iti etat api tAdAtmyaH eva avatizWate /
   na cānyasyānyabhāvānupapattiḥ /	na ca anyasya anya BAva anupapattiH /
   manuṣyaśarīrasya nandikeśvarasya devadeharūpapariṇāmasmaraṇāddevadehasya	manuzya SarIrasya nandikeSvarasya deva deha rUpa pariNAma smaraNAt deva dehasya
   ca nahuṣasya tiryaktvasmaraṇāt /	ca nahuzasya tiryaktva smaraNAt /
   tasmānmukhyārthaparityāgena na gauṇī vṛttirāśrayaṇīyā /	tasmAt muKya arTa parityAgena na gONI vRttiH ASrayaNIyAH /
   gauṇyāṃ ca vṛttau lakṣaṇāśabdaḥ prayukto guṇe lakṣaṇāyāḥ saṃbhavāt /	gONyAm ca vRttO lakzaNA SabdaH prayuktaH guNe lakzaNAyAH saMBavAt /
   yathāhuḥ 'lakṣyamāṇaguṇairyogādvṛtteriṣṭā tu gauṇatā' iti /	yaTA AhuH  alakzyamANa guNEH yogAt vRtteH izwA tu gONa tA a iti /
   evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ sābhāvyāpattiḥ /	evam prApte brUmaH sABAvya ApattiH /
   samāno bhāvo rūpaṃ yeṣāṃ te sabhāvāsteṣāṃ bhāvaḥ sābhāvyaṃ sārūpyaṃ	samAnaH BAvaH rUpam yezAm te saBAvAH tezAm BAvaH sA BAvyam sArUpyam
   sādṛśyamiti yāvat /	sAdRSyam iti yAvat /
   kutaḥ  # upapatteḥ.# /	kutas  # upapatteH.# /

   upapadyate.# /	upapadyate.# /

   'jagaraśarīrasyābhāvāt /	ajagara SarIrasya aBAvAt /

   śilpiśatenāpi kriyate /	Silpi Satena api kriyate /

   sūkṣmaśarīrākāśayoryugapadbhāvānna parasparātmatvaṃ bhavitumarhati /	sUkzma SarIra AkASayoH yugapad BAvAt na paraspara Atma tvam Bavitum arhati /
   evaṃ vāṭvādiṣvapi yojyam /	evam vA awu Adizu api yojyam /

   # nāticireṇa viśeṣāt.# /	# na aticireNa viSezAt.# /
   'durniṣprapataram' iti duḥkhena niḥsaraṇaṃ brūte na tu vilambeneti manyate	aduH nizprapataram a iti duHKena niHsaraNam brUte na tu vilambena iti manyate
   pūrvapakṣī /	pUrva pakzI /
   vinā sthūlaśarīraṃ na sūkṣmaśarīre duḥkhabhāgīti durniṣprapataraṃ vilambaṃ	vinA sTUlaSarIram na sUkzma SarIre duHKa BAgI iti durnizprapataram vilambam
   lakṣayatīti rāddhāntaḥ //23 //	lakzayati iti rAdDa antaH //23 //
   # anyādhiṣṭhiteṣu pūrvavadabhilāpāt.# /	# anya aDizWitezu pUrvavat aBilApAt.# /
   ākāśasārūpyaṃ vāyudhūmādisaṃparko 'nuśayināmukta ihedānīṃ vrīhiyavā	AkASa sArUpyam vAyu DUma Adi saMparkaH anuSayinA muktaH iha idAnIm vrIhi yavA
   oṣādhivanaspatayastilamāṣā iti jāyanta iti śrūyate /	oza aDivanaspatayaH tila mAzAH iti jAyante iti SrUyate /
   tatra saṃśayaḥ kimanuśayināṃ bhogādhiṣṭhānaṃ vrīhiyavādayaḥ sthāvarā	tatra saMSayaH kim anuSayinAm Boga aDizWAnam vrIhi yava AdayaH sTAvarA
   bhavanti, āhosvit kṣetrajñāntarādhiṣṭhiteṣveṣu saṃsargamātramanubhavantīti	Bavanti, Ahosvit kzetrajQa antara aDizWitezu ezu saMsarga mAtram anuBavanti iti
   tatra manuṣyo jāyate devo jāyata ityādau prayoge janeḥ śarīraparigrahe	tatra manuzyaH jAyate devaH jAyate iti AdO prayoge janeH SarIra parigrahe
   prasiddhatvādatrāpi vrīhyādiśarīraparigraha eva janirmukhyārtha iti	prasidDa tvAt atra api vrIhi Adi SarIra parigrahaH eva janiH muKyA arTaH iti
   vrīhyādiśarīrā evānuśayina iti yuktam /	vrIhi Adi SarIrAH eva anuSayinaH iti yuktam /
   naca ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā itivat karmaviśeṣāsaṃkīrtanāmāttadabhāve	na ca ramaNIya caraNAH kapUya caraNAH iti vat karma viSeza asaMkIrta nAmAt tad aBAve
   vrīhyādīnāṃ śarīrabhāvābhāvātkṣetrajñānantarādhiṣṭhitānāmeva	vrIhi AdInAm SarIra BAva aBAvAt kzetrajQA anantara aDizWitAnAm eva
   yatsaṃparkamātramiti sāṃpratam /	yat saMparka mAtram iti sAMpratam /

   sāṃpratam /	sAMpratam /

   sāvadyaphalatayā candralokabhogāntaraṃ	sAvadya Pala tayA candra loka Boga antaram
   sthāvaśarīrabhogyaduḥkhaphalatvasyāpyupapatteḥ /	sTAva SarIra Bogya duHKa Pala tvasya api upapatteH /
   naca 'na hiṃsyātsarvā bhūtāni' iti	na ca ana hiMsyAt sarvA BUtAni a iti
   sāmānyaśāstrasyāgnīṣomīyapaśuhiṃsāviṣayaviśeṣaśāstreṇa bādhanaṃ,	sAmAnya SAstrasya agnIzomIya paSu hiMsA vizaya viSeza SAstreNa bADanaM,
   sāmānyaśāstrasya hiṃsāmānyadvāreṇa viśeṣopasarpaṇaṃ vilambeneti	sAmAnya SAstrasya hiMsAmAnya dvAreNa viSeza upasarpaNam vilambena iti
   sākṣādviśeṣaspṛśaḥ śāstracchīghratarapravṛttāddurbalatvāditi sāṃpratam /	sAkzAt viSeza spRSaH SAstra= SIGratara pravRttAt durbala tvAt iti sAMpratam /
   nahi balavadityeva durbalaṃ bādhate kintu sati virodhe /	na hi balavat iti eva durbalam bADate kintu sati viroDe /
   na cehāsti virodhaḥ, bhinnagocaracāritvāt /	na ca iha asti viroDaH, Binna gocara cAri tvAt /
   'agnīṣomīyaṃ paśumālabhet ' iti hi kratuprakaraṇe samāmnātaṃ	aagnIzomIyam paSum AlaBet a iti hi kratu prakaraNe samAmnAtam
   kratvarthatāmasya gamayati na tvapanayati niṣedhāpāditāmasya puruṣaṃ	kratu arTa tAm asya gamayati na tu apanayati nizeDa ApAdi tAm asya puruzam
   pratyanarthahetutām /	pratyanarTa hetu tAm /

   virodhaḥ /	viroDaH /
   yathāhuḥ 'yo nāma kratumadhyasthaḥ kalañjādīni bhakṣayet /	yaTA AhuH  ayaH nAma kratu maDya sTaH kalaQja AdIni Bakzayet /

   'bhidhīyate bhavedetadevaṃ yadi ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā	aBiDIyate Bavet etat evam yadi ramaNIya caraNAH kapUya caraNA
   itivadvrīhyādiṣvanuśayavatāṃ kamaviśeṣaḥ kīrtyeta na caitadasti /	iti vat vrIhi Adizu anuSayavatAm kama viSezaH kIrtyeta na ca etat asti /
   na ceṣṭādeḥ karmaṇaḥ sthāvaśarīropabhogyaduḥkhaphalaprasavahetubhāvaḥ	na cezwA AdeH karmaNaH sTAva SarIra upaBogya duHKa Pala prasava hetu BAvaH
   saṃbhavati, tasya dharmatvena sukhaikahetutvāt /	saMBavati, tasya Darma tvena suKa eka hetu tvAt /

   duḥkhaphalavatsaṃbhavaḥ /	duHKa Pala vat saMBavaH /
   puruṣārthāyā eva na hiṃsyāditi pratiṣedhāt /	puruza arTAyAH eva na hiMsyAt iti pratizeDAt /
   tathāhi na hiṃsyāditi niṣedhasya niṣedhyādhīnanirūpaṇatayā yadarthaṃ	taTA ahi na hiMsyAt iti nizeDasya nizeDya aDIna nirUpaNa tayA yad arTam
   niṣedhyaṃ tadartha eva niṣedho vijñāyate /	nizeDyam tad arTaH eva nizeDaH vijQAyate /

   samāmnātaṃ yenānṛtatavadanavadasya niṣedhasya kratvarthate niṣedho 'pi	samAmnAtam yena anRta ta vadana vadasya nizeDasya kratvarTate nizeDaH api
   kratvarthaḥ syāt /	kratu arTaH syAt /

   bhavet /	Bavet /
   evaṃ hi satyājyabhāragaritairapyaṅgāntarairājyabhāgasādhyaḥ kratūpakāro	evam hi satya Ajya BAra garitEH api aFga antarEH Ajya BAga sADyaH kratu upakAraH 
   vijñāyate /	vijQAyate /
   tasmādanārabhyādhītena na hiṃsyādityanenābhihitasya vidhyupahitasya	tasmAt anAraBya aDItena na hiMsyAt iti anena aBihitasya viDi upahitasya
   puruṣavyāpārasya	puruza vyApArasya

   eva bhāvyo 'vatiṣṭhate /	eva BAvyaH avatizWate /

   vidhirupasaṃkrāmati, tena puruṣārtho niṣedhya iti tadadhīnanirūpaṇo	viDiH upasaMkrAmati, tena puruza arTaH nizeDya iti tad aDIna nirUpaNaH 
   niṣedho 'pi puruṣārtho bhavati /	nizeDaH api puruza arTaH Bavati /
   tathā cāyamarthaḥ saṃpadyate yatpuruṣārthaṃ hananaṃ tanna kuryāditi /	taTA ca ayam arTaH saMpadyate yat puruza arTam hananam tat na kuryAt iti /
   kratvarthasyāpi na niṣedhe hiṃsāyāḥ kratūpakārakatvamapi kalpyate /	kratu arTasya api na nizeDe hiMsAyAH kratu upakAraka tvam api kalpyate /

   saṃbhavataḥ /	saMBavataH /

   śuddhasukhaphalatvameveṣṭādīnāṃ na	SudDa suKa Pala tvam eva izwa AdInAm na

   # apica mukhye 'nuśayināṃ vrīhyādijanmanīti.# /	# apica muKye anuSayinAm vrIhi Adi janmani iti.# /
   vrīhyādibhāvamāpannāḥ khalvanuśayinaḥ puruṣairupabhuktā retaḥ	vrIhi Adi BAvam ApannAH Kalu anuSayinaH puruzEH upaBuktAH retaH
   sigbhāvamanubhavantī śrūyate /	sigBAvam anuBavantI SrUyate /

   vrīhyādidehatve hi vrīhyādiṣu lūneṣvavahantinā phalīkṛteṣu ca	vrIhi Adi deha tve hi vrIhi Adizu lUnezu avahantinA PalIkRtezu ca
   vrīhyādidehavināśādanuśayinaḥ pravaseyuriti kathamanuśayināṃ	vrIhi Adi deha vinASAt anuSayinaH pravaseyuH iti kaTam anuSayinAm
   retaḥsigbhāvaḥ saṃsargamātre tu saṃsargiṣu vrīhyādiṣu naṣṭeṣvapi na	retaH sigBAvaH saMsarga mAtre tu saMsargizu vrIhi Adizu nazwezu api na

   śeṣamuktam //24 //	Sezam uktam //24 //
   # retaḥsigyogo 'tha.# /	# retaH sigyogaH aTa.# /

   tasmādapi saṃsargamātramiti gamyate //26 //	tasmAt api saMsarga mAtram iti gamyate //26 //
   tatkimidānīṃ sarvatraivānuśayināṃ saṃsargamātraṃ tathāca ramaṇīyacaraṇā	tat kim idAnIm sarvatra eva anuSayinAm saMsarga mAtram taTA ca ramaNIya caraNA
   ityādiṣu tathābhāva āpadyeteti netyāha  # yoneḥ śarīram.# /	ityAdizu taTA aBAvaH Apadyeta iti na iti Aha # yoneH SarIram.# /
   sugamam //27 //	sugamam //27 //
   iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīkamīmāṃsābhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ	iti SrI vAcaspati miSravi racite SArIkamImAMsA ABAzya viBAge BAmatyAm
   tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //	tRtIyasya aDyAyasya praTamaH pAdaH //

   # tṛtīyādhyāye dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ.#	# tRtIya aDyAye dvitIyaH pAdaH.#
   # saṃdhye sṛṣṭirāha hi.# //1 //	# saMDye sRzwiH Aha hi.# //1 //
   idānīṃ tu tasyaiva jīvasyāvasthābhedaḥ svayañjyotiṣṭvasiddhyartha	idAnIm tu tasya eva jIvasya avasTA BedaH svayan jyotizwu asidDi arTa
   prapañcayate  # kiṃ prabodha iva svapne 'pi pāramārthikī	prapaQcayate # kim praboDaH iva svapne api pAramArTikI
   sṛṣṭirāhosvinmāyāmayīti.# /	sRzwiH Ahosvit mAyA mayI iti.# /

   yadā nāḍyo vā purītadvā suṣuptasthānaṃ tadā viparītagrahaṇanivṛttāvapi na	yadA nAxyaH vA purI tadvA suzupta sTAnam tadA viparIta grahaNa nivRttO= api na
   jīvasya paramātmabhāva iti /	jIvasya paramAtma BAvaH iti /
   avidyānivṛttāvapi jīvasya paramātmabhāvāya kāraṇāntaramapekṣitavyaṃ tacca	avidyA nivRttO= api jIvasya paramAtma BAvAya kAraNa antaram apekzitavyam tat ca
   karmaiva na tu tattajñānaṃ viparītajñānanivṛttimātreṇa tasyopayogāt,	karma eva na tu tat ta jQAnam viparIta jQAna nivRtti mAtreNa tasya upayogAt,
   viparītajñānanivṛtteśca vināpi tattvajñānaṃ suṣuptāvapi saṃbhavāt /	viparIta jQAna nivRtteH ca vinA api tattva jQAnam suzuptO= api saMBavAt /

   ata tu paramātmaiva nāḍīpurītasmṛtidvārā suṣuptisthānaṃ tato	atas tu paramAtmA eva nAxI purIta smRti dvArA suzupti sTAnam tatas 
   viparītajñānanivṛtterasti mātrayā paramātmabhāva upayogaḥ /	viparIta jQAna nivRtteH asti mAtrayA paramAtma BAvaH upayogaH /

   vyutthānaṃ bhavati /	vyutTAnam Bavati /

   nilayaṃ prati vikalpaḥ /	nilayam prati vikalpaH /

   parasparānapekṣā nāḍyadayo 'pi vikalpamarhanti /	paraspara anapekzA nAxI a dayaH api vikalpam arhanti /

   samuccayaśravaṇam /	samuccaya SravaNam /

   vikalpena /	vikalpena /

   śakroti /	Sakroti /

   tasmādapyātmasthānavasya dvāraṃ nāḍyādītyāha  # apica	tasmAt api Atma sTAna vasya dvAram nAxI AdItya aha # apica

   svādhyāyādhyayanavidhyāpāditupuruṣārthatvasya vedarāśerekenāpi varṇena	svADyAya aDyayana viDyA pAditu puruza arTa tvasya veda rASeH ekena api varNena
   nāpuruṣārthena bhavituṃ yuktam /	na apuruza arTena Bavitum yuktam /

   # sa eva tu karmānusmṛtiśabdavidhibhyaḥ.# /	# saH eva tu karma anusmRti Sabda viDiByaH.# /

   tatpradhānatvāt' iti vinigamanakāraṇavacanamanavakāśaṃ syāt.# /	tad praDAna tvAt a iti vinigamana kAraNa vacanam anavakASam syAt .# /

   samucchettum /	samucCettum /

   śūnyaṃ jagadbhavet /	SUnyam jagat Bavet /

   vidhinā /	viDinA /
   nahi vidhiśatenāpi vinā tattvāvabodhanaṃ pravartasvātmajñāna iti vā kuru	na hi viDi Satena api vinA tattva avaboDanam pravartasva Atma jQAnaH iti vA kuru
   prapañcapravilayaṃ veti pravartitaḥ śaknoti prapañcapravilayaṃ kartum /	prapaQca pravilayam vA iti pravartitaH Saknoti prapaQca pravilayam kartum /

   draṣṭavya' ityādayo na tu vidhaya iti /	drazwavya a ityAdayaH na tu viDayaH iti /

   eṣa savitā sapati /	eza savitA sapati /

   etattyaṃ nityaparokṣamityarthaḥ /	etat tyam nitya parokzam iti arTaH /

   ca sāmyamityadhidaivatam /	ca sAmyam iti aDidEvatam /

   pakṣaḥ /	pakzaH /

   śūnyavādaprasaṅgāditi.# /	SUnya vAda prasaFgAt iti.# /

   na cetīti saṃnidhānāviśeṣātsarvasya pratiṣedhyatvamiti yuktam /	na ca iti iti saMniDAna aviSezAt sarvasya pratizeDya tvam iti yuktam /

   yuktaṃ yannaisargikāvidyāprāptaḥ prapañcaḥ pratiṣidhyate	yuktam yat nEsargika avidyA prAptaH prapaQcaH pratiziDyate
   prāptipūrvakatvātpratiṣedhasya /	prApti pUrvaka tvAt pratizeDasya /

   tathāca yastasya śabdaḥ prāpakaḥ sa tatpara iti sa brahmaṇi pramāṇamiti	taTA ca yaH tasya SabdaH prApakaH sa tad paraH iti sa brahmaNi pramANam iti
   kathamasya niṣedho 'pi pramāṇavān /	kaTam asya nizeDaH api pramANavAn /

   tadanupapatteḥ /	tad anupapatteH /
   na cāvāṅmanasagocaro buddhāvalokhituṃ śakyaḥ /	na ca avAc manasa gocaraH budDa avaloKitum SakyaH /
   aśakyaśca kathaṃ niṣidhyate /	aSakyaH ca kaTam niziDyate /
   prapañcastvanādyavidyāsiddho 'nūdya brahmaṇi pratiṣidyata iti yuktam /	prapaQcaH tu anAdya vidyA sidDaH anUdya brahmaNi pratizidyate iti yuktam /
   tadimāmanupapattimabhipretyoktam 'nāpi brahmapratiṣedha upapadyate' iti /	tat imAm anupapattim aBipretya uktam  anApi brahma pratizeDaH upapadyate a iti /

   iti tatrāha  # vāṅmanasātītatvamapīti.# /	iti tatra aha # vAc manasA atIta tvam api iti.# /
   pratipādayanti vedāntā mahatā prayatnena brahma /	pratipAdayanti vedAntAH mahatA prayatnena brahma /

   upapādayitum /	upapAdayitum /

   # karmaṇo vā kācidavastheti.# /	# karmaNaH vA kAcid avasTA iti.# /
   karmaṇo 'vāntaravyāpāraḥ /	karmaNaH avAntara vyApAraH /

   tannirvāhayituṃ tasyaivāvāntaravyāpāro bhavati /	tat nirvAhayitum tasya eva avAntara vyApAraH Bavati /

   asatsvapyāgneyādiṣu tadupattyapūrvāṇāṃ paramāpūrve janayitavye	asatsu api Agneya Adizu tad upatti apUrvANAm paramA pUrve janayitavye
   tadavāntaravyāpāratvāt /	tat avAntara vyApAra tvAt /

   vicchinnaṃ tu tat /	vicCinnam tu tat /

   bhedadhiyamapanetumutsahate /	Beda Diyam apanetum utsahate /

   bhavatu saṃjñāntarātkarmabhedaḥ prastute tu kimāyātamityata āha  # asti	Bavatu saMjQA antarAt karma BedaH prastute tu kim AyAtam iti atas Aha # asti
