   na cāsti viśeṣo yato granthe mukhyāvijñāne gauṇī bhavet /	na ca asti viSezaH yatas granTe muKya avijQAne gONI Bavet /
   praṇayanaṃ ca granthajñānayorabhinnaṃ pravṛttinimittam /	praNayanam ca granTa jQAnayoH aBinnam pravRtti nimittam /
   tasmājjñānasyāpi vācikā samākhyā /	tasmAt jQAnasya api vAcikA samAKyA /
   tathāca yadā jyotiṣṭomasaṃnidhau śrūyamāṇaṃ samākhyāntaraṃ tatpratikamapi	taTA ca yadA jyotizwoma saMniDO SrUyamANam samAKyA antaram tad pratikam api

   atra hi dravyadevatāsaṃbandhānumito yāgo vidhīyate /	atra hi dravya devatA saMbanDa anumitaH yAgaH viDIyate /
   tadanantacaraṃ cadamāmnāyate 'vājibhyo vājinam' iti /	tad ananta caram cadamAm nAyate  avAjiByaH vAjinam a iti /
   atredaṃ saṃdihyate kiṃ pūrvāsminneva karmaṇi vājinaṃ guṇo vidhīyate uta	atra idam saMdihyate kim pUrvA asmin= eva karmaNi vAjinam guNaH viDIyate uta
   karmāntaraṃ dravyadevatāntaraviśiṣṭamapūrvaṃ vidhīyata iti /	karma antaram dravya devatA antara viSizwam apUrvam viDIyate iti /
   kiṃ tāvat prāptam, dravyadevatāntaraviśiṣṭakarmāntaravidhau	kim tAvat prAptam, dravya devatA antara viSizwa karma antara viDO
   vidhigauravaprasaṅgāt karmāntarāpūrvāntarakalpanāgauravaprasaṅgācca na	viDi gOrava prasaFgAt karma antarA pUrva antara kalpanA gOrava prasaFgAt ca na
   karmāntaravidhānamapi tu pūrvasminneva karmaṇi vājinadravyavidhiḥ /	karma antara viDAnam api tu pUrvasmin= eva karmaNi vA ajina dravya viDiH /
   na cotpattiśiṣṭamikṣāguṇāvarodhāttatra vājinamalabdhāvakāśaṃ karmāntaraṃ	na ca utpatti Sizwam ikzA guNa avaroDAt tatra vAjinam alabDa avakASam karma antaram
   gocarayatīti yuktam /	gocarayati iti yuktam /
   ubhayorapi vākyayoḥ samasamayapravṛtterāmikṣāvājinayorutpattau samaṃ	uBayoH api vAkyayoH sama samaya pravRtteH AmikzA vAjinayoH utpattO samam

   tatkathamanayāvaruddhaṃ karma na vājinaṃ niviśet /	tat kaTam anayA avarudDam karma na vAjinam niviSet /
   na ca vaiśvadevītyatra śrauta āmikṣāsaṃbandho viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ yena	na ca vESvadevI iti atra SrOtaH AmikzA saMbanDaH viSvezAm devAnAm yena
   vājinasaṃbandhādvākyagamyādbalavānbhavedubhayorapi	vAjina saMbanDAt vAkya gamyAt balavAn Bavet uBayoH api
   padāntarāpekṣapratītitayā vākyagamyatvāviśeṣāt /	pada antara apekza pratIti tayA vAkya gamya tva aviSezAt /
   no khalu vaiśvadevītyukte āmikṣāpadānapekṣāmāmikṣāmadhyavasyāmaḥ /	no Kalu vESvadevI iti ukte AmikzApada an apekzAm AmikzAmaDyavasyAmaH /
   astu vā śrautatvaṃ tathāpi vājibhya iti padaṃ vājamannamāmikṣā	astu vA SrOta tvam taTA api vAjiByaH iti padam vAjam annam AmikzA
   tadeṣāmastīti vyutpattyā tatsaṃbandhino viśvāndevānupalakṣayati /	tat ezAm asti iti vyutpattyA tad saMbanDinaH viSvAn devAn upalakzayati /
   yadyapi viśvadevaśabdādvājipadaṃ bhinnaṃ, yena ca śabdena codanā	yadi api viSvadeva SabdAt vAji padam Binnan, yena ca Sabdena codanA
   tenaivoddeśe devatātvaṃ na śabdāntareṇānyathārthaikatvena	tena eva uddeSe devatA tvam na Sabda antareNa anyaTArTa eka tvena
   sūryādityapadayoḥ sūryādityacarvorekadaivatyaprasaṅgāt, tathāpi	sUrya Aditya padayoH sUrya Aditya carvoH eka dEvatya prasaFgAt, taTA api
   vājinnitīneḥ sarvanāmārthe smaraṇāt saṃnihitasya ca sarvanāmārthatvāt,	vAjinnitIneH sarva nAma arTe smaraNAt saMnihitasya ca sarva nAma arTa tvAt,
   viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ ca viśvadevāpadena saṃnidhāpanāttatpadapuraḥsarā evaite	viSvezAm devAnAm ca viSva deva Apadena saMniDApanAt tad pada puraHsarAH eva ete
   vājipadenopasthāpyā na tu sūryādityapadavatsvatantrāḥ /	vAji padena upasTApyAH na tu sUrya Aditya pada vat svatantrAH /
   tathāca tadupalakṣaṇārthaṃ vājipadaṃ viśvadevopahitāmeva	taTA ca tad upalakzaNa arTam vAji padam viSvadeva upahitAm eva
   devatāmupalakṣayatīti na śabdāntarāddevatābhedaḥ /	devatAm upalakzayati iti na Sabda antarAt devatA BedaH /
   tataścāmikṣāsaṃbandhopajīvanena viśvebhyo vājinaṃ vidhīyamānaṃ nāmikṣayā	tatas ca AmikzA saMbanDa upajIvanena viSveByaH vAjinam viDIyamAnam nAmikzayA
   bādhyate kintu tayā saha samuccīyata iti na karmāntaramapi tu vākyābhyāṃ	bADyate kintu tayA saha samuccIyate iti na karma antaram api tu vAkyAByAm
   dravyayuktamekaṃ karma vidhīyata iti prāpta ucyate syādetadevaṃ yadi	dravya yuktam ekam karma viDIyate iti prAptaH ucyate syAt etat evam yadi
   vaiśvadevīti taddhitaśrutyāmikṣā nocyeta /	vESvadevI iti tad hita Sruti AmikzA na ucyeta /
   taddhitasya tvasyeti sarvanāmārthe smaraṇāt saṃnihitasya ca viśeṣyasya	tat hitasya tu asya iti sarva nAma arTe smaraNAt saMnihitasya ca viSezyasya
   sarvanāmārthatvāttatraiva taddhitasyāpi vṛttirnatu viśveṣu deveṣaṣu /	sarva nAma arTa tvAt tatra eva tat hitasya api vRttiH na tu viSvezu devezazu /
   na tatsaṃbandhe, nāpi tatsaṃbandhimātre /	na tad saMbanDe, na api tad saMbanDi mAtre /
   nanvevaṃ sati kasmādvaiśvadevīśabdamātrādeva nāmikṣāṃ pratīmaḥ kimiti	nanu evam sati kasmAt vESvadevI Sabda mAtrAt eva nAmikzAm pratImaH kim iti
   cāmikṣāpadamapekṣāmahe /	cAmikzA padam apekzAmahe /
   taddhitāntasya padasyābhidhānāparyavasānānna pratīmastatparyavasānāya	tat hita antasya padasya aBiDAna aparyavasAnAt na pratImaH tad paryavasAnAya
   cāpekṣamahe /	ca apekza mahe /
   avasitābhidhānaṃ hi padaṃ samarthamarthadhiyamādhātum /	avasita aBiDAnam hi padam samarTam arTaDiyam ADAtum /
   idaṃ tu saṃnihitaviśeṣābhidhāyi tatsaṃnidhimapekṣamāṇaṃ	idam tu saMnihita viSeza aBiDAyi tad saMniDim apekzamANam
   saṃnidhāpakamāmikṣāpadamapekṣata iti kuta āmikṣāpadānapekṣa	saMniDApakam Amikza Apadam apekzate iti kutas AmikzApada anapekza
   āmikṣāpratyayaprasaṅgaḥ /	AmikzA pratyaya prasaFgaH /
   kuto vā tatrānapekṣā /	kutas vA tatra anapekzA /
   ataśca satyāmapi padāntarāpekṣāyāṃ yatpadaṃ padāntarāpekṣamabhidhatte	atas ca satyAm api pada antara apekzAyAm yat padam pada antara apekzam aBiDatte
   tatpramāṇabhūtaprathamabhāvipadāvagamyatvācchrautaṃ balīyaśca /	tad pramANa BUta praTama BAvi padO= agamya tvAt SrOtam balIyaH ca /
   yattu paryavasitābhidhānapadābhihitapadārthavagamagamyaṃ	yat tu paryavasita aBiDAna pada aBihita padArTa vagam agamyam
   tattaccaramapratītivākyagamyaṃ durbalaṃ ceti	tad tad carama pratIti vAkya gamyam durbalam ca iti
   taddhitaśrutyavagatāmikṣālakṣaṇaguṇāvarodhātpūrvakarmāsaṃyogi	tad hita Sruti avagata AmikzA lakzaNa guNa avaroDAt pUrva karma asaMyogi
   vājinadravyaṃ sasaṃbandhi pūrvasmādbhinatti vājipadaṃ kathañcidyaugikaṃ	vAjina dravyam sa saMbanDi pUrvasmAt Binatti vAji padam kaTaQcid yOgikam
   sāpekṣāvṛtti viśvadevaśabdāṃ devatāṃ vaiśvadevīpadādāmikṣādravyaṃ	sa apekzA vRtti viSvadeva SabdAm devatAm vESvadevI padAt AmikzA dravyam
   pratyupasarjanībhūtāmavagatāmupalakṣayiṣyati /	pratyupasarjanIBUtAm avagatAm upalakzayizyati /
   prakṛtaṃ hi sarvanāmapadagocaraḥ /	prakRtam hi sarvanAma pada gocaraH /
   pradhānaṃ ca prakṛtamucyate nopasarjanam /	praDAnam ca prakRtam ucyate na upasarjanam /
   prāmāṇike ca vidhikalpanāgaurave abhyupetavye eva pramāṇasya	prAmANike ca viDi kalpanA gOrave aByupetavye eva pramANasya
   tattvaviṣayatvāt /	tattva vizaya tvAt /
   tasmādyatheha pūrvakarmāsaṃbhavino guṇātkarmabheda evamihāpi	tasmAt yaTA iha pUrva karma asaMBavinaH guNAt karma BedaH evam iha api
   pañcāgnividyāyāḥ ṣaḍagnividyā bhinnā, evaṃ prāṇasaṃvādeṣūnādhikabhāvena	paQca agni vidyAyAH zaz agni vidyA BinnA, evam prANa saMvAda izu unADika BAvena
   vidyābeda iti /	vidyA bedaH iti /
   tathā dharmaviśeṣo 'pi karmabhedasya pratipādaka iti /	taTA Darma viSezaH api karma Bedasya pratipAdakaH iti /
   tathāhi kārīrivākyānyadhīyānāstaittirīyā bhūmau bhojanamācaranti	taTA hi kArIri vAkyAni aDIyAnAH tEttirIyAH BUmO Bojanam Acaranti
   nācarantyanye /	na Acaranti anye /
   tathāgnimadhīyānāḥ kecidupādhyāyasyodakumbhamāharanti nāharantyanye /	taTA agnim aDIyAnAH kecid upADyAyasya uda kumBam Aharanti na Aharanti anye /
   tathāśvamedhadhīyānāḥ kecidaśvasya ghāsamānayanti nānayantyanye /	taTA aSvameDa DIyAnAH kecid aSvasya GAsam Anayanti na Anayanti anye /
   kecittyanye /	kecid ti anye /
   kecittvācarantyanyameva dharmam /	kecid tva Acaranti anyam eva Darmam /
   naca tānyeva karmāṇi bhūmibhojanādijanitamupakāramākāṅkṣanti nākāṅkṣanti	na ca tAni eva karmANi BUmi Bojana Adi janitam upakAram AkAFkzanti na AkAFkzanti
   ceti yujyate /	ca iti yujyate /
   ato 'vagamyate bhinnāni tāsu śākhāsu karmāṇīti /	atas avagamyate BinnAni tAsu SAKAsu karmANi iti /
   astu prastute kimāyātamityata āha  # asti cātreti.# /	astu prastute kim AyAtam iti atas Aha # asti ca atra iti.# /
   anyeṣāṃ śākhināṃ nāstīti śeṣaḥ /	anyezAm SAKinAm na asti iti SezaH /
   # evaṃ punaruktyādayo 'pīti.# /	# evam punarukti AdayaH api iti.# /
   ' samidho yajati' ityādiṣu pañcakṛtvo 'bhyasto yajatiśabdaḥ /	a samiDaH yajati a ityAdizu paQca kRtvas aByastaH yajati SabdaH /
   tatra kimekā karmabhāvanā kiṃvā pañcaiveti /	tatra kim ekA karma BAvanA kiMvA paQca eva iti /
   kiṃ tāvatprāptaṃ, dhātvarthānubandhabhedena śabdāntarādhikaraṇe	kim tAvat prAptaM, DAtu arTa anubanDa Bedena Sabda antara aDikaraNe
   bhāvanābhedābhidhānāddhātvarthasya ca dhātubhedamantareṇa bhedānupapatteḥ	BAvanA Beda aBiDAnAt DAtu arTasya ca DAtu Bedam antareNa Beda anupapatteH
   'samidho yajati' iti prathamabhāvinā vākyena vihitā karmabhāvanā	asamiDaH yajati a iti praTama BAvinA vAkyena vihitA karma BAvanA
   viparīvartamānoparitanairvākyaranūdyate /	viparIvartamAna uparitanEH vAkyaranu udyate /
   naca prayojanābhāvādananuvādaḥ pramāṇasiddhasyāprayojanasyānanuyojyatvāt /	na ca prayojana aBAvAt ananuvAdaH pramANa sidDasya aprayojanasya ananuyojya tvAt /
   karmabhāvanābhede cānekāpūrvakalpanāprasaṅgādekāpūrvavāntaravyāpāramekaṃ	karma BAvanA Bede ca aneka apUrva kalpanA prasaFgAt eka apUrvavAntara vyApAram ekam
   karmeti prāptam /	karma iti prAptam /
   evaṃ prāpta ucyate parasparānapekṣāṇi hi samidādivākyānīti /	evam prAptaH ucyate  paraspara anapekzANi hi samiD Adi vAkyAni iti /
   sarvāṇyeva prāthamyārhaṇyapi yugapadadhyayanānupapatteḥ krameṇādhītānīti /	sarvANi eva prATamyA arhaNI api yugapad aDyayana anupapatteH krameNa aDItAni iti /
   na tvayameṣāṃ prayojakaḥ kramaḥ /	na tu ayam ezAm prayojakaH kramaH /
   parasparāpekṣāṇāmekavākyatve hi prayojakaḥ syāt /	paraspara apekzANAm eka vAkya tve hi prayojakaH syAt /
   tena prāthamyābhāvāt prāptamityeva nāstīti kasya ko 'nuvādaḥ /	tena prATamyA BAvAt prAptam iti eva na asti iti kasya kaH anuvAdaH /
   kathañcidvaparivṛttimātrasyautsargikāpravṛttapravartanālakṣaṇavidhitvāpavādasāmarthyābhāvāt	kaTaQcid va parivRtti mAtrasya OtsargikA pravRtta pravartanA lakzaNa viDi tva apavAda sAmarTya aBAvAt
   guṇaśravaṇe hi guṇaviśiṣṭakarmavidhāne vidhigauravabhiyā	guNa SravaNe hi guNa viSizwa karma viDAne viDi gOrava BiyA
   guṇamātravidhānalāghavāya karmānuvādapekṣāyāṃ viparivṛtterupakāraḥ /	guNa mAtra viDAna lAGavAya karma anuvAda pekzAyAm viparivRtteH upakAraH /
   yathā 'dadhnā juheti' iti dadhividhipare vākye viparivṛttyapekṣāyām	yaTA adaDnA juheti a iti daDi viDi pare vAkye viparivRtti apekzAyAm
   'agnihotraṃ juheti' iti vihitasya homasya viparīvartamānasyānuvādaḥ /	aagnihotram juheti a iti vihitasya homasya viparIvartamAnasya anuvAdaH /
   na cātra guṇādbhedaḥ, samidādipadānāṃ karmanāmadheyānāṃ	na ca atra guNAt BedaH, samiD Adi padAnAm karma nAmaDeyAnAm
   guṇavacanatvābhāvāt /	guNa vacana tva aBAvAt /
   agṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatayā ca kiṃvacanavihitakiṅkarmānuvādena kasya	agRhyamANa viSeza tayA ca kiMvacana vihita kiFkarma anuvAdena kasya
   guṇavidhitvamiti na vinigamyate /	guNa viDi tvam iti na vinigamyate /
   na cāpūrvā nāma jyotirādivadvidhānasaṃbandhaṃ prathamamavagataṃ, yataḥ	na ca apUrvA nAma jyotiH Adi vat viDAna saMbanDam praTamam avagataM, yatas 
   pūrvabuddhivicchedena vidhīyamānaṃ ka4ma pūrvasmātsaṃjñāto vyavacchindyāt	pUrva budDi vicCedena viDIyamAnam ka4ma pUrvasmAt saMjQAtaH vyavacCindyAt 
   kintu prathamata eva karmasāmānādhikaraṇyenāvagatāḥ	kintu praTamatas eva karma sAmAnADi karaNyena avagatAH
   samidādayastadvaśātkarmanāmadheyatāṃ pratipadyamānā ākhyātasyānuvādatve	samiD AdayaH tad vaSAt karma nAmaDeya tAm pratipadyamAnAH AKyAtasya anuvAda tve
   'nuvādā vidhitve vidhayo na tu svātantryeṇa kasyacidīśate /	anuvAdAH viDi tve viDayaH na tu svAtantryeNa kasyacid ISate /
   tasmāt svarasasiddhāprāptakarmavidhiparatvātkarmaṇyayamabhyāso	tasmAt svarasa sidDa aprApta karma viDi para tvAt karmaNi ayam aByAsaH 
   bhāvanānubandhabhūtāni bhindāno bhāvanāṃ bhinatti yathā tathā	BAvanA anubanDa BUtAni BindAnaH BAvanAm Binatti yaTA taTA
   śākhāntaravihitā api vidyāḥ śākhāntaravihitābhyo vidyābhyo 'bhyāso	SAKA antara vihitAH api vidyAH SAKA antara vihitAByaH vidyAByaH aByAsaH 
   bhetsyatīti /	Betsyati iti /
   aśakteśca /	aSakteH ca /
   nahyekaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvavedāntapratyayātmikāmupāsanāmupasaṃhartuṃ śaknoti	na hi ekaH puruzaH sarva vedAnta pratyaya AtmikAm upAsanAm upasaMhartum Saknoti
   sarvavedāntādhyayanāsāmarthyādanadhītārthopasaṃhāre	sarva vedAnta aDyayanA sAmarTyAt anaDIta arTa upasaMhAre
   'dhyayanavidhānavaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt /	aDyayana viDAna vEyarTya prasaFgAt /
   pratiśākhaṃ bhede tūpāsanānāṃ nāyaṃ doṣaḥ /	pratiSAKam Bede tu upAsanAnAm na ayam dozaH /
   samāptibhedācca /	samApti BedAt ca /
   keṣāñcit śākhināmoṅkārasārvātmyakathane samāptiḥ /	kezAQcid SAKinA amoFkAra sArvAtmya kaTane samAptiH /
   keṣāñcidanyatra /	kezAQcid anyatra /
   tasmādapyupāsanābhedaḥ /	tasmAt api upAsana aBedaH /
   anyārthadarśanādapi bhedaḥ /	anya arTa darSanAt api BedaH /
   tathāhi 'naitadacīrṇavrato 'dhīte' iti	taTA hi  anEtat acIrNa vrataH aDIte a iti
   acīrṇavratasyādhyayanābhāvadarśanādupāsanābhāvaḥ /	acIrNa vratasya aDyayana aBAva darSanAt upAsana aBAvaH /
   kkacidacīrṇavratasyādhyayanadarśanādupāsanāvagamyate /	kkacit acIrNa vratasya aDyayana darSanAt upAsana avagamyate /
   tasmādupāsanābheda iti /	tasmAt upAsana aBedaH iti /
   atra siddhāntamāha  # sarvavedāntapratyayaṃ cedanādyaviśeṣāt.# /	atra sidDAntam Aha # sarva vedAnta pratyayam ced anAdya viSezAt.# /
   tadvyācaṣṭe  # sarvavedāntapratyayāni.#sarvavedāntapramāṇāni # vijñānāni	tat vyAcazwe # sarva vedAnta pratyaya ani.#sarva vedAnta pramANAni # vijQAnAni
   tasmiṃstasmin vedānte tāni tānyeva bhavitumarhanti.# /	tasmin= tasmin vedAnte tAni tAni eva Bavitum arhanti.# /
   yānyekasmin vedānte tānyeva vedāntāntareṣvapītyarthaḥ /	yAni ekasmin vedAnte tAni eva vedAnta antarezu api iti arTaH /
   codanādyaviśeṣāt /	codanA Adi aviSezAt /
   ādiśabdena saṃyogarūpākhyāḥ saṃgṛhyante /	Adi Sabdena saMyoga rUpa AKyAH saMgRhyante /
   atra ca codyata iti codanā puruṣaprayatnaḥ /	atra ca codyate iti codanA puruza prayatnaH /
   sa hi puruṣasya vyāpāraḥ /	sa hi puruzasya vyApAraH /
   tatra khalvayaṃ homādidhātvarthāvicchinne pravartate /	tatra Kalu ayam homa Adi DAtu arTa avicCinne pravartate /
   tasya devatoddeśena tyāgasyāsecanādikasyāvacchedyaḥ puruṣaprayatnaḥ sa eva	tasya devatA uddeSena tyAgasya Asecana Adikasya avacCedyaH puruza prayatnaH saH eva
   śākhāntare yathaivamihāpi prāṇajyeṣṭhatvaśreṣṭhatvavedanaviṣayaḥ	SAKA antare yaTA evam iha api prANa jyezWa tva SrezWa tva vedana vizayaH
   puruṣaprayatnaḥ sa eva śākhāntareṣvapīti /	puruza prayatnaH saH eva SAKA antarezu api iti /
   evaṃ phalasaṃyogo 'pi jyeṣṭhaśreṣṭhabhavanalakṣaṇaḥ sa eva /	evam Pala saMyogaH api jyezWa SrezWa Bavana lakzaNaH saH eva /
   rūpamapi tadeva /	rUpam api tat eva /
   yathā yāgasya yadekasyāṃ śākhāyāṃ dravyadevatārūpaṃ tadeva	yaTA yAgasya yat ekasyAm SAKAyAm dravya devatA rUpam tat eva
   śākhāntareṣvapīti /	SAKA antarezu api iti /
   evaṃ vedanasyāpi yadekatra prāṇajyeṣṭhatvaśreṣṭhatvarūpaṃ	evam vedanasya api yat ekatra prANa jyezWa tva SrezWa tva rUpam
   viṣayastacchākhāntareṣvapīti //1 //	vizayaH tad SAKA antarezu api iti //1 //
   # kañcidviśeṣamiti.# /	# kaQcid viSezam iti.# /
   yuktaṃ yadagnīṣomīyasyotpannasya paścādekādaśakapālatvādisaṃbandhe	yuktam yat agnIzomIyasya utpannasya paScAt ekAdaSa kapAla tva Adi saMbanDe
   'pyabheda iti /	api aBedaH iti /
   yathotpannasya tasya sarvatra pratyabhijñāyamānatvādiha	yaTA utpannasya tasya sarvatra pratyaBijQAyamAna tvAt iha
   tvagniṣūtvapattigata eva guṇabheda iti kathaṃ vaiśvadevīvanna bhedaka iti	tu agnizu utva patti gataH eva guNa BedaH iti kaTam vESvadevI vat na BedakaH iti
   viśeṣaḥ /	viSezaH /
   tamimaṃ viśeṣamabhipretyāśaṅkate sūtrakāraḥ  # bhedānneti cediti.# /	tam imam viSezam aBipretya ASaFkate sUtra kAraH # BedAt na iti ced iti.# /
   parihāraḥ sūtrāvayavaḥ  # na ekasyāmapīti.# /	parihAraH sUtra avayavaH # na ekasyAm api iti.# /
   pañcaiva sāṃpādikā agnayo vājasaneyināmapi chāndogyānāmiva vidhīyante /	paQca eva sAMpAdikAH agnayaH vAjasaneyinAm api CAndogyAnAm iva viDIyante /
   ṣaṣṭhastvagniḥ saṃpadvyatirekāyānūdyate na tu vidhīyate /	zazWaH tu agniH saMpad vyatiH ekAyAnu udyate na tu viDIyate /
   vaiśvadevyāṃ tūtpattau guṇo vidhīyata iti bhavatu bhedaḥ /	vESvadevyAm tu utpattO guNaH viDIyate iti Bavatu BedaH /
   athavā chāndogyānāmapi ṣaṣṭho 'gniḥ paṭhyata eva /	aTavA CAndogyAnAm api zazWaH agniH paWyatas eva /
   athavā bhavatu vājasaneyināṃ ṣaṣṭhāgnividhānaṃ mā ca bhūcchāndogyānāṃ	aTavA Bavatu vAjasaneyinAm zazWa agni viDAnam mA ca BUt CAndogyAnAm
   tathāpi pañcatvasaṃkhyāyā avidhānānnotpattiśiṣṭatvaṃ saṃkhyāyāḥ	taTA api paQcatva saMKyAyAH aviDAnAt na utpatti Sizwa tvam saMKyAyAH
   kintūtpanneṣvagniṣu pracayaśiṣṭā saṃkhyānūdyate sāṃpādikānagnīnavacchetuṃ,	kintu utpannezu agnizu pracaya SizwA saMKyA anUdyate sAMpAdika anagnIna vat SetuM,
   tena yeṣāmutpattisteṣāṃ pratyabhijñānāt /	tena yezAm utpattiH tezAm pratyaBijQAnAt /
   apratyabhijñāyamānāyāśca saṃkhyāyā anuvādyatvenānutpattervidhīyamānasya	apratyaBijQAyamAnAyAH ca saMKyAyAH anuvAdya tvena anutpatteH viDIyamAnasya
   cādhikasya ṣoḍaśigrahaṇavadvikalpasaṃbhavānna śākhāntare jñānabhedaḥ /	ca aDikasya zoxaSigrahaNa vat vikalpa saMBavAn na SAKA antare jQAna BedaH /
   utpattiśiṣṭatve 'siddhe prāṇasaṃvādādayo 'pi prāṇasaṃvādādayo 'pi bhavanti	utpatti Sizwa tve asidDe prANa saMvAda AdayaH api prANa saMvAda AdayaH api Bavanti
   pratyabhijñānādabhinnāstāsu tāsu śākhāsviti //2 //	pratyaBijQAnAt aBinnAH tAsu tAsu SAKAsu iti //2 //
   # svādhyāyasya tathātvena hi samācāre 'dhikārācca savavacca tanniyamaḥ.# /	# svADyAyasya taTAtvena hi samAcAre aDikArAt ca savavat ca tat niyamaH.# /
   yairātharvaṇikagranthopāyā vidyā veditavyāṃ teṣāmeva	yEH ATarvaNika granTa upAyAH vidyA veditavyAm tezAm eva
   śirovratapūrvādhyayanaprāptagranthabodhitā phalaṃ prayacchati nānyathā /	SiraH vrata pUrva aDyayana prApta granTa boDitA Palam prayacCati na anyaTA /
   anyeṣāṃ tu chāndogyādīnāṃ saiva vidyā cīrṇaśirovratānāṃ	anyezAm tu CAndogya AdInAm sA eva vidyA cIrNa SiraH vratAnAm
   phaladetyātharvaṇagranthādhyayanasaṃbandhādavagamyate /	Pala dA iti ATarvaNa granTa aDyayana saMbanDAt avagamyate /
   tatsaṃbandhaśca vedavrateneti 'naitadacīrṇavrato 'dhīte' iti	tad saMbanDaH ca veda vratena iti anEtat acIrNa vrataH aDIte a iti
   samāmnānādavagamyate /	samAmnAnAt avagamyate /
   'teṣāmevaitāṃ brahmavidyāṃ vadeta' iti vidyāsaṃyoge 'pyetāmiti	atezAm eva etAm brahma vidyAm vadeta a iti vidyA saMyoge api etAm iti
   prakṛtaparāmarśinā sarvanāmnādhyāyanasaṃbandhāvirodhādātharchavihitaiva	prakRta parAmarSinA sarva nAmnA aDyAyana saMbanDa aviroDAt ATarCavi hitA eva
   vidyocyata iti /	vidyA ucyate iti /
   savā homāḥ sapta sauryādayaḥ śataudanāntā śataudanāntā ātharvaṇikānāṃ ta	savA homAH sapta sOrya AdayaH Sata odana antA Sata odana antAH ATarvaNikAnAm ta
   ekasminnevārtharvaṇike 'gnau kriyante na tretāyām //3 //	ekasmin= eva arTarvaNike agnO kriyante na tretAyAm //3 //
   # vidyaikatvaṃ darśayati ca.# /	# vidyA eka tvam darSayati ca.# /
   bhūyobhūyo vidyaikatvasya vedadarśanādyatrāpi saguṇabrahmavidyānāṃ na	BUyas BUyas vidyA eka tvasya veda darSanAt yatra api sa guNa brahma vidyAnAm na
   sākṣādveda ekatvamāha tāsāmapi tatprāyapaṭhitānāṃ tadvidhānāṃ	sAkzAt vedaH eka tvam Aha tAsAm api tad prAya paWitAnAm tadviDAnAm
   prāyadarśanādekatvameva /	prAya darSanAt eka tvam eva /
   tathāhyagryaprāye likhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhavedayamagrya iti buddhiriti /	taTA hi agrya prAye liKitam dRzwvA Bavet ayam agryaH iti budDiH iti /
   yacca kāṭhakādisamākhyayopāsanābheda iti tadayuktam /	yat ca kAWaka Adi samAKyayA upAsanA BedaH iti tat ayuktam /
   etā hi pauruṣeyyaḥ samākhyāḥ kāṭakādipravacanayogāttāsāṃ śākhānāṃ na	etAH hi pOruzeyyaH samAKyAH kAwaka Adi pravacana yogAt tAsAm SAKAnAm na
   tūpāsanānām /	tu upAsanAnAm /

   viśeṣyate /	viSezyate /

   śakyaṃ kalpayitum /	Sakyam kalpayitum /

   kaṭhādipuruṣapravacananimittāścaitāḥ samākhyāḥ kaṭhādibhyaḥ prāk nāsanniti	kaWa Adi puruza pravacana nimittAH ca etAH samAKyAH kaWa AdiByaH prAk na Asan= iti

   tasmānna samākhyāto bhedaḥ /	tasmAt na samAKyAtaH BedaH /
   abhyāso 'pi nātra bhedakaḥ /	aByAsaH api na atra BedakaH /
   yuktaṃ yadekaśākhāgato yajatyabhyāsaḥ samidādīnāṃ bhedaka iti /	yuktam yat eka SAKA gataH yajati aByAsaH samiD AdInAm BedakaH iti /
   tatra hi vidhitvamautsargikamajñātajñāpanamapravṛttapravartanaṃ ca	tatra hi viDi tvam Otsargikam ajQAta jQApanam apravRtta pravartanam ca
   kupyeyātām 'śākhāntare tvadhyetṛpuruṣabhedādekatve 'pi	kupyeyAtAm aSAKA antare tu aDyetR puruza BedAt eka tve api

   svaśākhāyāmadhyayananiyamaḥ /	sva SAKAyAm aDyayana niyamaH /

   'dhigamyopasaṃhariṣyati /	aDigamya upasaMharizyati /

   samāptaḥ' iti tasmātsamāptibhedo 'pi na sādhanamupāsanābhedasya /	samAptaH a iti tasmAt samApti BedaH api na sADanam upAsana aBedasya /
   tadevamasati bādhake codanādyaviśeṣātsarvavedāntapratyayāni karmāṇi tāni	tat evam asati bADake codana Adi aviSezAt sarva vedAnta pratyayAni karmANi tAni
   tānyeveti siddham //4 //	tAni eva iti sidDam //4 //
   kañcidviśeṣamāśaṅkya pūrvatantraprasādhitam /	kaQcid viSezam ASaFkya pUrva tantra prasADitam /
   vakṣyamāṇārthasiddhyarthamarthamāha rasa sūtrakṛt //	vakzyamANa arTa sidDi arTam arTam Aha rasa sUtra kRt //
   cintāprayojanapradarśanārthaṃ sūtram  #	cintA prayojana pradarSana arTam sUtram #
   upasaṃhāror'thābhedādvidhiśeṣavatsamāne ca.# /	upasaMhAroH aTa aBedAt viDi Seza vat samAne ca.# /
   atraidamāśaṅkate bhavatu sarvaśākhāpratyayamekaṃ vijñānaṃ tathāpi	atra Edam ASaFkate  Bavatu sarva SAKA pratyayam ekam vijQAnam taTA api
   śākhāntaroktānāṃ tadaṅgāntarāṇāṃ na śākhāntarokte tasminnupasaṃhāro	SAKA antara uktAnAm tad aFga antarANAm na SAKA antara ukte tasmin= upasaMhAraH 
   bhavitumarhati /	Bavitum arhati /
   tasyaikasya karmaṇo yāvanmātramaṅgajātamekasyāṃ śākhāyāṃ vihitaṃ	tasya ekasya karmaNaH yAvat mAtram aFga jAtam ekasyAm SAKAyAm vihitam
   tāvnamātreṇaivopakārasiddheradhikānapekṣaṇāt /	tAvna mAtreNa eva upakAra sidDeH aDika anapekzaNAt /

   naca vihitam /	na ca vihitam /
   tasmādyathā naimittikaṃ karma sakalāṅgavadvihitamapi aśaktau	tasmAt yaTA nEmittikam karma sakala aFga vat vihitam api aSaktO
   yāvacchakyamaṅgamanuṣṭhātuṃ tāvanmātrajanyenopakāreṇaupakṛtaṃ	yAvat Sakyam aFgam anuzWAtum tAvat mAtra janyena upakAreNa OpakRtam
   bhavatyevamihāpyaṅgāntarāvidhānādeva bhaviṣyatīti /	Bavati evam iha api aFga antara aviDAnAt eva Bavizyati iti /

   nopakārāvacchedo yujyate /	na upakAra avacCedaH yujyate /
   nahi tadeva karma sattadaṅgamapekṣate nāpekṣate ceti yujyate /	na hi tat eva karma sat tad aFgam apekzate na apekzate ca iti yujyate /
   naimittike tu nimittānurodhādavaśyakartavye sarvāṅgopasaṃhārasya	nEmittike tu nimitta anuroDAt avaSya kartavye sarva aFga upasaMhArasya
   sadātanatvāsaṃbhavādupakārāvacchedaḥ kalpyate /	sadAtana tva asaMBavAt upakAra avacCedaH kalpyate /

   'pyupakārāvacchedaḥ syāt /	api upakAra avacCedaH syAt /
   iha tu śākhāntare katipayāṅgavidhānaṃ tāni vidhatte netarāṇi parisaṃcaṣṭe	iha tu SAKA antare katipaya aFga viDAnam tAni viDatte na itarANi parisaMcazwe
   naca tadupakārapiṇḍe codakaprāpte ājyabhagavattanmātravidhānam /	na ca tad upakAra piNxe ca udaka prApte Ajya Bagavat tanmAtra viDAnam /
   tasmāttattvena karmaṇāṃ sarvāṅgasaṅgama autsargiko 'sati balavati bādhake	tasmAt tattvena karmaNAm sarva aFga saFgamaH OtsargikaH asati balavati bADake
   nāpavadituṃ yukta iti //5 //	na apavaditum yuktaH iti //5 //
   # anyathātvaṃ śabdāditi cennāviśeṣāt.# /	# anyaTAtvam SabdAt iti ced na aviSezAt.# /
   dvayā dviprakārāḥ prājāpatyā devāścāsurāśca /	dvayAH dvi prakArAH prAjApatyAH devAH ca asurAH ca /
   tataḥ kānīyasā eva devā jyāyasā asurāḥ /	tatas kAnIyasAH eva devAH jyAyasA asurAH /
   śāstrajanyayā sāttvikyā buddhyā saṃpannā devāḥ /	SAstra janyayA sAttvikyAH budDyA saMpannAH devAH /
   te hi dīvyanta iti devāḥ /	te hi dIvyante iti devAH /
   śāstrayuktyaparikalpitamatayastāmasavṛttipradhānā asurā asubhiḥ	SAstra yuktya parikalpita matayaH tAmasa vRtti praDAnAH asurAH asuBiH
   prāṇairanindriyairagṛhītaisteṣu teṣu viṣayeṣu ramanta ityasurā ata eva te	prANEH anindriyEH agRhItEH tezu tezu vizayezu ramantaH iti asurAH atas eva te
   jyāyāṃsaḥ /	jyAyAMsaH /

   karmaṇoti /	karmaNoti /
   te ha vācamūcurityādinā saṃdarbheṇa	te ha vAcam UcuH iti AdinA saMdarBeNa

   prāṇābhimānavatīṃ devatāmūcustvaṃ na udgāyeti /	prANa aBimAnavatIm devatAm UcuH tvam naH udgAya iti /

   prāṇenodgātrā no 'smān devā atyeṣyantīti /	prANena udgAtrAH naH asmAn devAH atyezyanti iti /
   tamabhidrutya pāpmanāvidhyannasurā yathāśmānamṛtvā prāpya mṛttvālloṣṭo vā	tam aBidrutya pApmanA viDi anna surAH yaTA aSmAnam RtvA prApya mRd tvAt lozwaH vA
   vidhvaṃsata evaṃ vidhvaṃsamānā viṣvañco 'surā vineśuḥ /	viDvaMsate evam viDvaMsamAnAH vizvaQcaH asurAH vineSuH /
   tadetat saṃkṣipyāha  # vājasaneyaka iti.# /	tat etat saMkzipya aha # vAjasaneyakaH iti.# /
   tathā chāndogye 'pyetaduktamityāha  # tathā chāndogye 'pīti.# /	taTA CAndogye api etat uktam iti Aha # taTA CAndogye api iti.# /
   viṣayaṃ darśayitvā vimṛśati  # tatra saṃśaya iti.# /	vizayam darSayitvA vimRSati # tatra saMSayaH iti.# /
   pūrvapakṣaṃ gṛhṇāti  # vidyaikatvamiti.# /	pUrva pakzam gRhNAti # vidyA eka tvam iti.# /
   pūrvapakṣamākṣipati  # nanu na yuktamiti.# /	pUrva pakzam Akzipati # nanu na yuktam iti.# /
   ekatrodgātṛtvenocyate prāṇa ekatra codgānatvena kriyākartrośca sphuṭo	ekatra udgAtR tvena ucyate prANaH ekatra ca udgAna tvena kriyA kartroH ca sPuwaH 
   bheda ityarthaḥ /	BedaH iti arTaH /
   samādhatte  # naiṣa doṣa iti.# /	samADatte # na eza dozaH iti.# /
   bahutararūpapratyabhijñā nādapratyabhijñāyamānaṃ kiñcillakṣaṇayā netavyam	bahutara rUpa pratyaBijQA nAda pratyaBijQAyamAnam kiQcid lakzaNayA netavyam
   na kevalaṃ śākhāntare, ekasyāmapi śākhāyāṃ dṛṣṭametanna ca tatra	na kevalam SAKA antare, ekasyAm api SAKAyAm dRzwam etat na ca tatra
   vidyābheda ityāha  # vājasanetyake 'pi ceti.# /	vidyA BedaH iti Aha # vAjasanetyake api ca iti.# /

   eva lakṣaṇīya iti pūrvapakṣaḥ //6 //	eva lakzaNIyaH iti pUrva pakzaH //6 //
   # na vā prakaraṇabhedātparovarīyastvādivat.# /	# na vA prakaraNa BedAt paras varIyaH tu Adivat.# /

   copasaṃhāravarṇanādekasminvākye tasyaiva codgīthasya punajhapunaḥ	ca upasaMhAra varNanAdekasmin vAkye tasya eva ca udgITasya puna JapunaH
   saṃkīrtanāllakṣaṇāyāṃ ca chāndogye vājasaneyake pramāṇābhāvādvidyābheda	saMkIrtanAt lakzaNAyAm ca CAndogye vAjasaneyake pramANa aBAvAt vidyA Beda
   iti rāddhāntaḥ /	iti rAdDa antar /
   # oṃkārasyopāsyatvaṃ prastutya rasatamādiguṇopavyākhyānamoṅkārasya.# /	# oMkArasya upAsya tvam prastutya rasa tama Adi guNa upavyAKyAnam oFkArasya.# /
   oṃkāra tathāhi bhūtapṛthivyoṣadhipuruṣavāgṛksāmnāṃ pūrvasyottaramuttaraṃ	oMkAra taTA hi BUta pRTivI ozaDi puruza vAc RksAmnAm pUrvasya uttaram uttaram
   rasatayā sāratayoktam /	rasa tayA sAratayA uktam /
   teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ rasatama oṃkāra uktaśchāndogye /	tezAm sarvezAm rasatamaH oMkAraH uktaH CAndogye /
   # naca vivakṣitārthabheda iti.# /	# na ca vivakzita arTa BedaH iti.# /
   ekatrodgīthodgātārāvupāsyatvena vivakṣitāvekatra tadavayava oṃkāra iti /	ekatra udgITa udgAtArO= upAsya tvena vivakzitO= ekatra tad avayavaH oMkAraH iti /
   tathā hyabhyudayavākye iti /	taTA hi aByudaya vAkye iti /
   evaṃ hi śrūyate 'vivā etaṃ prajayā paśubhirardhayati vardhayatyasya	evam hi SrUyate  avivA etam prajayA paSuBiH arDayati varDayati asya
   bhrātṛvyaṃ yasya havirniruptaṃ purastāccandramā abhyudeti sa tredhā	BrAtRvyam yasya haviH niruptam purastAt candramAH aByudeti sa treDA
   taṇḍulānvibhajedye madhyamāḥ syustānagnaye dātre puroḍāśamaṣṭākapālaṃ	taNxulAn viBajet ye maDyamAH syuH tAn agnaye dAtre puroxASam azwAkapAlam
   nirvapedye sthiviṣṭhāstānindrāya pradātre dadhaṃścaruṃ ye kṣodiṣṭhāstān	nirvapedye sTivizWAH tAn indrAya pradAtre daDan= carum ye kzodizWAH tAn
   viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāya śṛte carum' iti /	vizNave SipivizwAya SRte caruma iti /
   tatra saṃdehaḥ kiṃ kālārādhe yāgāntaramidaṃ codyata uta teṣveva karmasu	tatra saMdehaH kim kAla ArADe yAga antaram idam ca udyataH uta tezu eva karmasu
   prakṛteṣu kālāparādhe nimitte devatāpanaya iti /	prakRtezu kAla aparADe nimitte devatA apanayaH iti /
   eṣa tāvadatra viṣayaḥ amāvāsyāyāmeva darśakarmārthaṃ	eza tAvat atra vizayaH amAvAsyAyAm eva darSa karma arTam
   vedikriyāgnipraṇayanakriyā vratādiśca yajamānasaṃskāraḥ /	vedi kriyA agni praNayana kriyA vrata AdiH ca yajamAna saMskAraH /
   dadhyarthaśca dohaḥ /	daDi arTaH ca dohaH /
   pratipadi ca darśakarmapravṛttirityanuṣṭhānakramastāttvikaḥ /	pratipadi ca darSa karma pravRttiH iti anuzWAna kramaH tAttvikaH /
   yasya tu yajamānasya kutaścidbhamanibandhanāccaturdaśyāmevāmāvāsyābuddhau	yasya tu yajamAnasya kutaScid Bama nibanDanAt caturdaSyAm eva amAvAsya abudDO
   pravṛttaprayogasya candramā abhyudīyate tatredaṃ śrūyate 'yasya	pravRtta prayogasya candramAH aByudIyate tatra idam SrUyate  ayasya
   havirniruptam' iti /	haviH niruptam a iti /
   tena yajamānenābhyuditenāmāvāsyāyāmeva nimittādhikāraṃ parisamāpya	tena yajamAnena aByuditena amAvAsyAyAm eva nimitta aDikAram parisamApya
   purastadahareva vedyuddharaṇādikarma kṛtvā pratipadi darśaḥ	puras tat ahar eva vedI ut DaraNa Adi karma kRtvA pratipadi darSaH
   pravartayitavyaḥ /	pravartayitavyaH /
   tatrābhāyudaye kiṃ naimittikamidaṃ karmāntaraṃ darśāccodyata uta	tatra aBAyudaye kim nEmittikam idam karma antaram darSAt ca udyate uta
   tasminneva darśakarmaṇi pūrvadevatāpanayanena devanāntaraṃ vidhīyata iti /	tasmin= eva darSa karmaNi pUrvadevatA apanayanena devana antaram viDIyate iti /
   tatra havirbhāgamātraśravaṇāccaruvidhānasāmarthyācca karmāntaram /	tatra haviH BAga mAtra SravaNAt caru viDAna sAmarTyAt ca karma antaram /
   yadi hi pūrvadevatābhyo havīṃṣi vibhajediti śrūyate tatastānyeva havīṃṣi	yadi hi pUrva devatAByaH havIMzi viBajet iti SrUyate tatas tAni eva havIMzi
   devatāntareṇa yujyamānāni na karmāntaraṃ gamayitumarhanti kintu	devatA antareNa yujyamAnAni na karma antaram gamayitum arhanti kintu
   prakṛtameva karma taddhaviṣkamapanītapūrtadevatākaṃ devatāntarayuktaṃ syāt	prakRtam eva karma tat havizkam apanIta pUrta devatAkam devatA antara yuktam syAt 
   atra punastredhā taṇḍulān vibhajediti haviṣa eva madhyamādikrameṇa	atra punar treDA taNxulAn viBajet iti havizaH eva maDyama Adi krameNa
   vibhāgaśravaṇādanapanītā haviṣi pūrvadevatā iti pūrvadavatāvaruddhe haviṣi	viBAga SravaNAt anapanItAH havizi pUrva devatAH iti pUrva davata avarudDe havizi
   devatāntaramalabdhāvakāśaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ karmāntarameva gocarayet /	devatA antaram alabDa avakASam SrUyamANam karma antaram eva gocarayet /
   apica prāpte pūrvasmin karmaṇi dadhnastaṇḍulānāṃ cendrādidevatā	api ca prApte pUrvasmin karmaNi daDnaH taNxulAnAm ca indra Adi devatA
   saṃbandhaśca vidhātavyaḥ /	saMbanDaH ca viDAtavyaH /
   carutvaṃ cātra vihitaṃ nāstīti tadapiva vidhātavyam /	caru tvam ca atra vihitam na asti iti tat apiva viDAtavyam /
   tathā prāpte karmaṇyanekaguṇavidhānādvākyaṃ bhidyeta /	taTA prApte karmaNi aneka guNa viDAnAt vAkyam Bidyeta /
   karmāntaraṃ tvapūrvaṃ śakyamekenaiva prayatnenānekaguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ	karma antaram tu apUrvam Sakyam ekena eva prayatnena aneka guNa viSizwam
   vidhātumiti nimitte karmāntarameva vidhīyate /	viDAtum iti nimitte karma antaram eva viDIyate /
   darśastu lupyate kālāparādhāditi prāpta ucyate na karmāntaram /	darSaH tu lupyate kAla aparADAt iti prAptaH ucyate na karma antaram /
   pūrvadavatāto haviṣo vibhāgapūrvaṃ nimitte devatāntaravidhānāt /	pUrva davatAtaH havizaH viBAga pUrvam nimitte devatA antara viDAnAt /
   carvarthasya cārthaprāpteḥ /	carvarTasya ca arTa prApteH /
   bhavedetadevaṃ yadā tredhā taṇḍulān vibhajediti taṇḍulānāṃ tredhā	Bavet etat evam yadA treDA taNxulAn viBajet iti taNxulAnAm treDA
   vibhāgavidhānaparametadvākyaṃ syādapi tu vākyāntaraprāptaṃ taṇḍulānāṃ	viBAga viDAna param etat vAkyam syAt api tu vAkya antara prAptam taNxulAnAm
   tredhātvamanūdya vibhajedityetāvadvidhatte tatra vākyānyapanīte pūrvavat	treDA tvam anUdya viBajet iti etAvat viDatte tatra vAkyAni apanIte pUrvavat 
   devatāsaṃbandhe haviṣastasminneva karmaṇyapratyūhaṃ devatāntarasaṃbandhaṃ	devatA saMbanDe havizaH tasmin= eva karmaNi apratyUham devatA antara saMbanDam
   vidhātuṃ śaknuvanti /	viDAtum Saknuvanti /
   tathāca dravyamukhena prakṛtamukhapratyabhijñānāt devatāntarasaṃbandhe 'pi	taTA ca dravya muKena prakRta muKa pratyaBijQAnAt devatA antara saMbanDe api
   na karmāntarakalpanābhavitumarhati /	na karma antara kalpanA Bavitum arhati /
   tataśca samāpte 'pi naimittikādhikārasiddhyarthaṃ tānyeva punaḥ	tatas ca samApte api nEmittika aDikAra sidDi arTam tAni eva punar 
   karmāṇyanuṣṭheyāni /	karmANi anuzWeyAni /
   naca dadhani carumiti carusaptamyarthayorvidhānaṃ tayorapyarthaprāptatvāt	na ca daDani carum iti caru saptamI arTayoH viDAnam tayoH api arTa prApta tvAt 
   prakṛte hi karmaṇi taṇḍulapeṣaṇaprathanaṃ puroḍāśapākādi dadhipayasī ca	prakRte hi karmaNi taNxula pezaNa praTanam puroxASa pAka Adi daDi payasI ca
   prāptāni tatrābhyudayanimitte dadhiyuktānāṃ payoyuktānāṃ ca taṇḍulānāṃ	prAptAni tatra aByudaya nimitte daDi yuktAnAm payaH yuktAnAm ca taNxulAnAm
   vibhajediti vākyena pūrvadevatāpanayaṃ kṛtvā ye madhyamā	viBajet iti vAkyena pUrva devatA apanayam kRtvA ye maDyamA
   ityādibhirvākyairdevatāntarasaṃbandhaḥ kṛtaḥ /	ityAdiBiH vAkyEH devatA antara saMbanDaH kRtaH /
   naca prabhūtadhipayaḥ saṃsaktairalpaistaṇḍulaiḥ puroḍāśakriyā saṃbhavati /	na ca praBUta DipayaH saMsaktEH alpEH taNxulEH puroxASa kriyA saMBavati /
   iti puroḍāśanivṛttau tadarthasya prathanasyāpi nivṛttiranivṛttastu pāko	iti puroxASa ni vRttO tad arTasya praTanasya api nivRttiH anivRttaH tu pAko
   'pavādābhāvāttathā cārthaprāptaścodyate /	apavAda aBAvAt taTA ca arTa prAptaH codyate /
   bhavatu vā anekavākyakalpanam /	Bavatu vE aneka vAkya kalpanam /
   prakṛtādhikārāvagamabalādasyāpi nyāyyatvāditi /	prakRta aDikAra avagama balAt asya api nyAyya tvAt iti /
   tasmāttadevedaṃ karma na tu karmāntaramiti siddham /	tasmAt tat eva idam karma na tu karma antaram iti sidDam /
   paśukāmavākye tvapūrvakarmavidhirabhyudayavākyasārūpye 'pi /	paSu kAma vAkye tu apUrva karma viDiH aByudaya vAkya sArUpye api /
   'yaḥ paśukāmaḥ syātso 'māvāsyāmiṣṭvā vatsānapākuryādye	ayaH paSu kAmaH syAt saH amAvAsyAm izwvA vatsa an apAkurya At ye
   sthaviṣṭhāstānagnaye sanimate 'ṣṭhākapālaṃ nirvapedye madhyamāstān viṣṇave	sTavizWAH tAn agnaye sa nimate azWA kapAlam nirvapedye maDyamAH tAn vizNave
   śipiviṣṭāya śṛte caruṃ ye kṣodiṣṭhāstanindrāya pradātre dadhaṃścarum' iti	SipivizwAya SRte carum ye kzodizWAH tanindrAya pradAtre daDan= caruma iti
   atra hi amāvāsyāmiṣṭveti samāpte yāge paśukāmeṣṭividhānaṃ nātra pūrvasya	atra hi amAvAsyAm izwvA iti samApte yAge paSu kAma izwi viDAnam na atra pUrvasya
   karmaṇo 'nanuvṛtteryāgāntaravidhiriti yuktam /	karmaNaH ananu vRtteH yAga antara viDiH iti yuktam /
   # parovarīyastvādivat.# /	# paras varIyaH tu Adivat.# /
   yathodgīthopāsanāsāmye 'pi	yaTA udgITa upAsanA sAmye api
   ādityagatahiraṇyaśmakṣutvādiguṇaviśiṣṭodgīthopāsanātaḥ	Aditya gata hiraNyaSma kzu tvA Adi guNa viSizwa udgITa upAsanAtaH
   parovarīyastvaguṇaviśiṣṭodgīthopāsanā bhinnā tadvadidamapīti /	paras varIyaH tu aguNa viSizwa udgITa upAsanA BinnA tadvat idam api iti /

   ityākāśaśabdena paramātmānaṃ nirdiśati //7 //	iti AkASa Sabdena paramAtmAnam nirdiSati //7 //

   saṃjñaikatvaṃ tu śrutibāhyatayā bahiraṅgaṃ ca pauruṣeyatayā sāpekṣaṃ ca /	saMjQA eka tvam tu Sruti bAhya tayA bahis aFgam ca pOruzeya tayA sa apekzam ca /
   tasmādurbalaṃ nāmedasādhanāyālamiti //8 //	tasmAt urbalam nAma ida sADanAya alam iti //8 //
   # vyāpteśca samañjasam /	# vyApteH ca samaQjasam /

   gauṇī buddhiradhyāsaḥ /	gONI budDiH aDyAsaH /
   yathā māṇavake 'nivṛttāyāmeva māṇavakabuddhivyāpadeśavṛttau	yaTA mANavake anivRttAyAm eva mANavaka budDi vyApadeSa vRttO
   siṃhabuddhivyapadeśavṛttiḥ siṃho māṇavaka iti, evaṃ pratimāyāṃ	siMha budDi vyapadeSa vRttiH siMhaH mANavakaH iti, evam pratimAyAm
   vāsudevabuddhirnāmni ca brahmabuddhistathoṅkāga udgīthabuddhivyapadeśāviti	vAsudeva budDiH nAmni ca brahmabudDiH taTA uFkAgaH udgITa budDi vyapadeSO= iti
   apavādaikatvaviśeṣaṇāni coktāni /	apavAda ekatva viSezaNAni ca uktAni /
   ekārthe '	eka arTe a
   pi ca śabdadvayaprayogo dṛśyate /	pi ca Sabda dvaya prayogaH dRSyate /

   iti /	iti /
   vimṛśyānadhyavasāyalakṣaṇaṃ pakṣaṃ gṛhṇāti  # tatrānyatama iti.# /	vimRSya anaDyavasAya lakzaNam pakzam gRhNAti # tatra anyatamaH iti.# /

   kiṅgato 'yamoṅkārastattadāpyādiguṇaviśiṣṭastasmai tasmai	kiFgataH ayam oFkAraH tad tadA api Adi guNa viSizwaH tasmE tasmE
   kāmāvāptyādiphalāyopāsyatvenādhikriyata ityapekṣāyāmudgīthapadeneti	kAma avApti Adi PalAya upAsya tvena aDikriyate iti apekzAyAm udgITa padena iti
   viśiṣyate /	viSizyate /
   udgīthapadenokārādyavayavaghaṭitasāmabhaktibhedābhidhāyinā	udgITa padena ukAra Adi avayava Gawita sAma Bakti Beda aBiDAyinA
   samudāyasyāvayavabhāvānupapattestatsaṃbandhavayava oṃkāro lakṣyate, na	samudAyasya avayava BAva anupapatteH tad saMbanDa vayavaH oMkAraH lakzyate, na
   punaroṅkāreṇāvayavina udgīthasya lakṣaṇā /	punar oFkAreNa avayavinaH udgITasya lakzaNA /
   oṃkārasyaivopariṣṭāttu tattadguṇaviśiṣṭasya tattatphalaviśiṣṭasya	oMkArasya eva uparizwAt tu tad tad guNa viSizwasya tad tad Pala viSizwasya
   copavyākhyāsyamānatvāt /	ca upavyAKyAsyamAna tvAt /
   dṛṣṭaśca samudāyaśabdo 'vayave lakṣaṇayā yathā grāmo dagdhaḥ paṭo dagdha	dRzwaH ca samudAya SabdaH avayave lakzaNayA yaTA grAmaH dagDaH pawaH dagDa
   iti tadekadeśadāhe /	iti tad eka deSa dAhe /
   adhyāse tu lakṣaṇā phalakalpanā ca /	aDyAse tu lakzaNA Pala kalpanA ca /
   tathāhi āptyādiguṇakapraṇavopāsanādidamudgīthatopāsanaṃ praṇavasyānyat /	taTA hi Apti Adi guNaka praNava upAsanAt idamudgITa tA upAsanam praNavasya anyat /
   nacātrāpyādi upāsaneṣviva phalaṃ śrūyate /	na ca atra api Adi upAsanezu iva Palam SrUyate /
   tasmāt kalpanīyam /	tasmAt kalpanIyam /
   udgīthasaṃbandhipraṇavopāsanādhikārapare vākye nāyaṃ doṣaḥ /	udgITa saMbanDi praNava upAsana aDikAra pare vAkye na ayam dozaH /
   apica gauṇyā vṛtterlakṣaṇāvṛttirbalīyasī lāghavāt /	api ca gONyA vRtteH lakzaNAvRttiH balIyasI lAGavAt /
   lakṣaṇāyā hi lakṣaṇīyaparatvaṃ padasya tasyaiva vākyārthāntarbhāvāt /	lakzaNAyAH hi lakzaNIya para tvam padasya tasya eva vAkya arTa antarBAvAt /
   yathā gāṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa iti lakṣyamāṇasya tīrasya vākyārthe 'ntarbhāvo	yaTA gAFgAyAm GozaH iti lakzyamANasya tIrasya vAkya arTe antarBAvaH 
   'dhikaraṇatayā /	aDikaraNa tayA /
   gaurvāhīka ityatra tu gosaṃbandhitīṣṭhanmūtrapurīṣādilakṣaṇayā na	gOH vAhIkaH iti atra tu go saMbanDi tIzWat mUtra purIza Adi lakzaNayA na
   tatparatvaṃ gośabdasya /	tad paratvam go Sabdasya /

   vṛtterdurbalatvaṃ tadidamuktaṃ lakṣaṇāyāmapi tviti /	vRtteH durbala tvam tat idam uktaM lakzaNAyAm api tu iti /

   āmikṣāpadaṃ hi rūpeṇāmikṣāyāṃ pravartate /	AmikzA padam hi rUpeNa AmikzAyAm pravartate /

   atirohitamanyat //10 //	atirohitam anyat //10 //

   yathaikasya brahmaṇaḥ /	yaTA ekasya brahmaNaH /
   saṃyadvāmatvādayaḥ satyakāmādayaśca guṇā na saṃkīryeran /	saMyat vAma tva AdayaH satya kAma AdayaH ca guNAH na saMkIryeran /

   saṃkīryeran /	saMkIryeran /

   nahi brahmaṇo dharmiṇaḥ sattve kaścidviśeṣa iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /	na hi brahmaNaH DarmiNaH sattve kaScid viSezaH iti pUrvaH pakzaH /
   rāddhāntastu vāstavavidheyayorvastudharmatayā cānuṣṭheyatayā	rAdDa antaH tu vAstava viDeyayoH vastu Darma tayA ca anuzWeya tayA
   cāvyavasthāvyavasthe vyavatiṣṭhete /	ca avyavasTA vyavasTe vyavatizWete /
   vastudharmo hi yāvadvastu vyavatiṣṭhate /	vastu DarmaH hi yAvat vastu vyavatizWate /
   nāsāvekatrokte 'nyatrānukto nāstīti śakyaṃ vaktum /	nAsO= ekatra ukte anyatra anuktaH na asti iti Sakyam vaktum /
   vidheyastu puruṣaprayatnatantraḥ puruṣaprayatnaśca yatra yāvadguṇaviśiṣṭe	viDeyaH tu puruza prayatna tantraH puruza prayatnaH ca yatra yAvat guNa viSizwe
   brahmaṇi coditaḥ sa tāvatyevāvatiṣṭhate nāvihitamapi guṇaṃ	brahmaNi coditaH sa tAvatI eva avatizWate na avihitam api guNam
   cotarīkartumarhati /	ca utarIkartum arhati /
   tasya vidhitantratvādvidheśca vyavasthānāt /	tasya viDi tantra tvAt viDeH ca vyavasTAnAt /
   tasmādānandavijñānādayo brahmatattvātmatayoktā yatra yatra brahma śrūyate	tasmAt Ananda vijQAna AdayaH brahma tattva Atma tayA uktAH yatra yatra brahma SrUyate
   tatra tatrānuktā api labhyante /	tatra tatra anuktAH api laByante /
   saṃyadvāmādayaścopāsanāprayatnavidhiviṣayā yathāvidhyavatiṣṭhante na tu	saMyat vAma AdayaH ca upAsanA prayatna viDi vizayAH yaTAviDi avatizWante na tu
   yathāvastviti siddham /	yaTAvastu iti sidDam /
   priyaśirastvādīnāṃ tūpāsyatvamāropya nyāyo darśitaḥ /	priya SiraH tu AdInAm tu upAsya tvam Aropya nyAyaH darSitaH /

   pramodaḥ prakṛṣṭo modastāvimau parasparāpekṣāvupacayāpacayau //11 //	pramodaH prakRzwaH modaH tO= imO paraspara apekzO= upacaya apacayO //11 //
   # ādhyānāya prayojanābhāvāt /	# ADyAnAya prayojana aBAvAt /
   indriyebhyaḥ parā hyarthā iti.# /	indriyeByaH parAH hi arTAH iti.# /
   kimatra sarveṣāmevārthādīnāṃ paratvaṃ pratipādayiṣitam, āho puruṣasyaiva	kim atra sarvezAm eva arTa AdInAm paratvam pratipAdayizitam, Aho puruzasya eva
   tatpratipādanārthaṃ cetareṣāṃ paratvapratipādanam /	tad pratipAdana arTam ca itarezAm paratva pratipAdanam /
   tatra pratyekamarthādiparatvapratipādanaśruteḥ śrūyamāṇatattatparatve ca	tatra pratyekam arTa Adi paratva pratipAdana SruteH SrUyamANa tad tatparatve ca
   saṃbhavati na tattadatikarme sarveṣāmekaparatvādhyavasānaṃ nyāṭyam /	saMBavati na tad tad ati karme sarvezAm eka paratva aDyavasAnam nyAwyam /
   na ca prayojanābhāvādasaṃbhavaḥ /	na ca prayojana aBAvAt asaMBavaH /
   sarveṣāmeva pratyekaṃ paratvābhidhānasyādhyānaprayojanatvāt /	sarvezAm eva pratyekam paratva aBiDAnasya aDyAna prayojana tvAt /
   tattadādhyānānāṃ ca prayojanavattvasmṛteḥ /	tad tad ADyAnAnAm ca prayojanavat tva smRteH /
   tathāhi smṛtiḥ  'daśa manvantarāṇīha tiṣṭhantīndriyacintakāḥ /	taTA hi smRtiH adaSa manvantarANi iha tizWanti indriya cintakAH /
   bhautikāstu śataṃ pūrṇaṃ sahasraṃ tvābhimānikāḥ //	BOtikAH tu Satam pUrNam sahasram tvA aBimAnikAH //
   bauddhā daśa sahasrāṇi tiṣṭhanti vigatajvarāḥ /	bOdDAH daSa sahasrANi tizWanti vigata jvarAH /
   pūrṇaṃ śatasahasraṃ tu tiṣṭhantyanyaktacintakāḥ /	pUrNam Sata sahasram tu tizWanti anyakta cintakAH /
   puruṣaṃ nirguṇaṃ prāpya kālasaṃkhyā na vidyate /	puruzam nirguNam prApya kAla saMKyA na vidyate /
   ' iti /	a iti /
   prāmāṇikasya vākyabhedasyābhyupeyatvāt pratyekaṃ teṣāmarthādīnāṃ	prAmANikasya vAkya Bedasya aByupeya tvAt pratyekam tezAm arTa AdInAm
   paratvaparāṇyetāni vākyānīti prāptaya ucyate indriyebhyaḥ parā hyarthā	paratva parANi etAni vAkyAni iti prAptayaH ucyate indriyeByaH parA hi arTA

   sarveṣām /	sarvezAm /
   dṛṣṭaṃ ca viṣṇoḥ paramapadajñānasya nikhilānarthasaṃsārakāraṇāvidyopaśamaḥ	dRzwam ca vizNoH parama pada jQAnasya niKila anarTa saMsAra kAraNa avidyA upaSamaH
   tattvajñānodayasya viparyāsopaśamalakṣaṇatveta tatra tatra darśanāt /	tattva jQAna udayasya viparyAsa upaSama lakzaNa tveta tatra tatra darSanAt /
   arthādiparatvapratyayasya tu na dṛṣṭamasti prayojanam /	arTa Adi paratva pratyayasya tu na dRzwam asti prayojanam /

   tasmāddṛṣṭaprayojanavattvāt, puruṣaparatvapratupādanārtho 'yaṃ saṃdarbha	tasmAt dRzwa prayojanavat tva at, puruza paratva pratupAdana arTaH ayam saMdarBa
   iti gamyate /	iti gamyate /

   nanvatrādhyānavidhirnāsti tatkathamucyate ādhyānāyetyata āha  #	nanu atra aDyAna viDiH na asti tat kaTam ucyate ADyAnAya iti atas Aha #
   ādhyānāyeti.# //14 //	ADyAnAya iti.# //14 //
   # ātmaśabdācca.# /	# Atma SabdAt ca.# /
   anadhigatārthapratipādanasvabhāvatvāpramāṇānāṃ viśeṣataścāgamasya,	anaDigata arTa pratipAdana svaBAva tva apramANAnAm viSezataH ca Agamasya,
   puruṣaśabdavācyasya cātmanaḥ svayaṃ śrutyaiva	puruza Sabda vAcyasya ca AtmanaH svayam SrutyA eva
   duradhigamatvāvadhāraṇādvastutaśca duradhigamatvādarthādīnāṃ ca	duraDigamatva avaDAraNAt vastutas ca duraDigama tvAt arTa AdInAm ca
   sugamatvāttatparatvamevārthādiparatvābhidhānasyetyarthaḥ /	sugama tvAt tatpara tvam eva arTa Adi paratva aBiDAnasya iti arTaH /
   śruterāśayātiśa ivāśayātiśayaḥ /	SruteH ASaya atiSas iva ASaya atiSayaH /
   tattātparyateti yāvat /	tat tAt paryata iti yAvat /
   kiñca śrutyantarāpekṣitābhidhānādapyevameva /	kiQca Sruti antara apekzita aBiDAnAt api evam eva /
   arthādiparatve tu svarūpeṇa vivakṣite nāpekṣitaṃ śrutirācaṣṭe ityāha  #	arTa Adi paratve tu svarUpeNa vivakzite na apekzitam SrutiH Acazwe iti Aha #
   apica so 'dhvanaḥ pāramāpnotīti.# //15 //	api ca saH aDvanaH pAram Apnoti iti.# //15 //
   # ātmagṛhītiritaravaduttarāt.# /	# Atma gRhI tiH itara vat uttarAt.# /
   śrutismṛtyorhi lokasṛṣṭiḥ parameśvarādhiṣṭhitā	Sruti smRtyoH hi loka sRzwiH parameSvara aDizWitA
   parameśvarahiraṇyagarbhakartṛkopalabdhā seyamiha	parameSvara hiraNyagarBa kartRkA upalabDA sA iyam iha
   mahābhūtasargamanabhidhāya prāthamikī	mahABUta sargam anaBiDAya prATamikI
   lokasṛṣṭirupalabhyamānāvāntareśvarakāryā prāgutpatterātmaikatvāvadhāraṇaṃ	loka sRzwiH upalaByamAnO= Antara ISvara kAryA prAk utpatteH Atma ekatva avaDAraNam
   cāvāntareśvarasaṃbandhitayā gamayati /	ca ava antara ISvara saMbanDi tayA gamayati /
   pārameśvarasargasya mahābhūtākāśāditvādasya ca tadvaiparītyāt /	pArameSvara sargasya mahABUta AkASa Adi tvAt asya ca tad vEparItyAt /
   asti hi tasyaivaikasya vikārāntarāpekṣayāgnatvamasti cekṣaṇam /	asti hi tasya eva ekasya vikAra antara apekza yAgna tvam asti ca IkzaNam /
   api caitasminnaitareyake pūrvasminprakaraṇe prajāpatikartṛkaiva	api ca etasmin= Etareyake pUrvasmin prakaraNe prajApati kartRkA eva
   lokasṛṣṭiruktā /	loka sRzwiH uktAH /
   tadanusārādapyetadeva vijñāyate /	tad anusArAt api etat eva vijQAyate /
   apica tābhyo gāmānayadityādayaśca vyavahāraḥ śrutyoktā	api ca tAByaH gAm Anayat iti AdayaH ca vyavahAraH SrutyA uktA
   viśeṣavatsvātmaparamātmaṣu prasiddhāḥ /	viSeza vatsvAtma paramAtmazu prasidDAH /
   tato 'pyavāntareśvara eva vijñāyate /	tatas api avAntara ISvaraH eva vijQAyate /
   ātmaśabdaprayogaścātrāpi dṛṣṭastasmādaparātmābhilāpo 'yamiti prāpta	Atma Sabda prayogaH ca atra api dRzwaH tasmAt apara AtmA aBilApaH ayam iti prApta
   ucyati paramātmano gṛhītiriha yathā itareṣu sṛṣṭiśravaṇeṣu 'etasmādātmana	ucyati paramAtmanaH gRhItiH iha yaTA itarezu sRzwi SravaNezu aetasmAt Atmana
   ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' ityādiṣu /	AkASaH saMBUtaH a ityAdizu /
   tasmāduttarātsa aikṣatetīkṣaṇapūrvakasraṣṭṛtvaśravaṇādātmetyavadhāraṇācca	tasmAt uttarAt sa Ekzateti IkzaNa pUrvaka srazwR tva SravaNAt AtmA iti avaDAraNAt ca
   etadabhisaṃhitam mukhyaṃ tāvat sargātprākkevalatvamātmapadatvaṃ sraṣṭṛtvaṃ	etat aBisaMhitam  muKyam tAvat sargAt prAk kevala tvam Atma pada tvam srazwR tvam
   ca parameśvarasyātra bhavataḥ /	ca parameSvarasya atra BavataH /
   tadasatyāmanupapattau nānyatra vyākhyātumucitam /	tat asatyAm anupapattO na anyatra vyAKyAtum ucitam /
   naca mahābhūtasṛṣṭyanabhidhānena lokasṛṣṭyabhidhānamanupapattibījam /	na ca mahABUta sRzwi anaBiDAnena loka sRzwi aBiDAnam anupapatti bIjam /
   ākāśapūrvikāyāṃ vastuto brahmaṇaḥ sṛṣṭau yathā	AkASa pUrvikAyAm vastutas brahmaNaH sRzwO yaTA
   kkacittejaḥpūrvakasṛṣṭyabhidhānaṃ na virudhyate 'etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ	kkacid tejaH pUrvaka sRzwi aBiDAnam na viruDyate aetasmAt AtmanaH AkASaH
   saṃbhūtaḥ' iti darśanāt /	saMBUtaH a iti darSanAt /

   kalpanīyam /	kalpanIyam /

   apica svādhyāyavidhyadhīnagrahaṇo	api ca svADyAya viDi aDIna grahaNaH

   paramātmana ityatraivoktam /	paramAtmanaH iti atra eva uktam /

   copakramabhedādbhinnārthatvam /	ca upakrama BedAt Binna arTa tvam /
   sa ātmā tattvamasīti copasaṃhāra upakramānurodhena saṃpattyarthatayā	saH AtmA tat tvam asi iti ca upasaMhAraH upakrama anuroDena saMpatti arTa tayA
   vyākhyeyaḥ /	vyAKyeyaH /
   taddhi satsāmānyaṃ paramātmatayā saṃpādanīyam /	tat hi sat sAmAnyam paramAtma tayA saMpAdanIyam /
   tadvijñānena ca sarvavijñānaṃ mahāsāmānyasya sattāyāḥ	tad vijQAnena ca sarva vijQAnam mahA sAmAnyasya sattAyAH
   samastavastuvistāravyāpitvādityevaṃ prāpta	samasta vastu vistAra vyApi tvAt iti evam prApta
   ucyate ātmagṛhītirvājasaneyināmiva chāndogyānāmapyuttarātma ātmā	ucyate a Atma gRhItiH vAjasaneyinAm iva CAndogyAnAm api uttarAtmaH AtmA
   tattvamasīti tādātmyopadeśāt /	tat tvam asi iti tAdAtmya upadeSAt /

   sattvaṃ sattvaṃ tvātmadhātoreva tattvena nirvācyatvāttasmādātmaiva sanniti	sattvam sattvam tu Atma DAtoH eva tattvena nirvAcya tvAt tasmAt AtmA eva san= iti
   abhyupetyāha /	aByupetya Aha /
   sacchabdasya sattāsāmānyābhidhāyitvātprativyakti ca tasya pravṛtterātmani	sat Sabdasya sattA sAmAnya aBiDAyi tvAt prativyakti ca tasya pravRtteH Atmani
   cānyatra ca sacchabdapravṛtteḥ saṃśaye satyupasaṃhārānurodhena	ca anyatra ca sat Sabda pravRtteH saMSaye sati upasaMhAra anuroDena
   sadevetyātmanyevāvasthāpyate /	sat A iva iti Atmani eva avasTApyate /
   nītārthopakramānurodhena hyupasaṃhāravarṇanā na punaḥ	nIta arTa upakrama anuroDena hi upasaMhAra varNanA na punar 
   saṃdigdhārthenopakrameṇopasaṃhāro varṇanīyaḥ /	saMdigDa arTena upakrameNa upasaMhAraH varNanIyaH /
   apica saṃpattau phalaṃ kalpanīyam /	api ca saMpattO Palam kalpanIyam /
   naca sāmānyamātre jñāte viśeṣajñānasaṃbhavaḥ /	na ca sAmAnya mAtre jQAte viSeza jQAna saMBavaH /
   na khalvākārādvṛkṣe jñāte śiṃśapādayastadviśeṣā jñātā bhavanti /	na Kalu a AkArAt vRkze jQAte SiMSapA AdayaH tad viSezAH jQAtAH Bavanti /
   tadevamavadhāraṇādi sarvamanātmārthatve syādanupapannamiti	tat evam avaDAraNa Adi sarvam anAtma arTa tve syAt anupapannam iti
   chāndogyasyātmārthatvemeveti siddham /	CAndogyasya Atma arTa tvem eva iti sidDam /
   atra ca pūrvasmin pūrvapakṣe hiraṇyagarbhopāsanā siddhānte tu	atra ca pUrvasmin pUrva pakze hiraNyagarBa upAsanA sidDAnte tu
   brahmabhāvaneti //16 //	brahma BAvanA iti //16 //
   # kāryākhyānādapūrvam.# /	# kArya AKyAnAt apUrvam .# /
   viṣayamāha  # chāndogā vājasaneyinaśceti.# /	vizaya m Aha # CAndogAH vAjasaneyinaH ca iti.# /
   ananaṃ prāṇanaṃ anaḥ prāṇaḥ taṃ prāṇamanagnaṃ kurvantaḥ /	ananam prANanam anaH prANaH tam prANam anagnam kurvantaH /
   # anagnatācintanamiti.# /	# anagna tA cintanam iti.# /
   manyanta iti mananaṃ jñānaṃ tadvyānaparyantamiti cintanamuktam /	manyante iti mananam jQAnam tad vyAna paryantam iti cintanam uktam /
   saṃśayamāha  # tatkimiti.# /	saMSayamAha # tat kim iti.# /
   khuraravamātreṇāpātata ubhayavidhānapakṣaṃ gṛhītvā madhyamaṃ	Kura rava mAtreNa apAtataH uBaya viDAna pakzam gRhItvA maDyamam
   pakṣamālambate pūrvapakṣī  # athavācanameveti.# /	pakzam Alambate pUrva pakzI # aTa vAcanam eva iti.# /
   yadyevamanagnatāsaṃkīrtanasya kiṃ prayojanamityata āha  # tasyaiva tu	yadi evam anagna tA saMkIrtanasya kim prayojanam iti atas Aha # tasya eva tu
   stutyarthamiti.# /	stuti arTam iti.# /
   ayamabhisandhiḥ yadyapi smārtaṃ prāyatyārthamācamanamasti tathāpi	ayam aBisanDiH yadi api smArtam prAyatya arTam Acamanam asti taTA api
   prāṇopāsanaprakaraṇe 'vidhānāttadaṅgatvenāprāptamiti	prANa upAsana prakaraNe aviDAnAt tad aFga tvena aprAptam iti
   vidhānamarthavadbhavati, anṛtavadanapratiṣedha iva smārte	viDAnam arTavat Bavati, anRta vadana pratizeDaH iva smArte
   jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇe samāmnāto nānṛtaṃ vadediti pratiṣedho	jyotizwoma prakaraNe samAmnAtaH na anRtam vadet iti pratizeDaH 
   jyotiṣṭomāṅgatayārthavāniti /	jyotizwoma aFga tayA arTavAn iti /
   rāddhāntanamāha  # evaṃ prāpta iti.# /	rAdDAntanam Aha # evam prAptaH iti.# /
   codayati  # nanviyaṃ śrutiriti.# /	codayati # nanu iyam SrutiH iti.# /

   yathā hi śvādimaryādasyānnasyāttumaśakyatvādannadṛṣṭiścodyate	yaTA hi Sva Adi maryAdasya annasyAt tum aSakya tvAt anna dRzwiH ca udyate

   śeṣamatirohitārtham //18 //	Sezam ati rohita arTam //18 //
   # samāna evaṃ cābhedāt.# /	# samAnaH evam ca aBedAt.# /

   dvayorvidyāvidhyorekaśākhāgatayoragṛhmamāṇaviśeṣatayā kasya ko 'nuvāda iti	dvayoH vidyA viDyoH eka SAKA gatayoH agRhmamANa viSeza tayA kasya kaH anuvAdaH iti
   viniścayābhāvādajñātajñāpanāpravṛttapravartanārūpasya ca vidhitvasya	viniScaya aBAvAt ajQAta jQApana apravRtta pravartanA rUpasya ca viDi tvasya
   svarasasiddherubhayatropasanābhedaḥ /	svarasa sidDeH uBayatra upasana aBedaH /

   tasmātsamidho yajatītyādivadabhyāsādupāsanābheda iti prāpta	tasmAt samiDaH yajati ityAdi vat aByAsAt upAsana aBedaH iti prApta

   yathā yatra	yaTA yatra
   chatracāmarapatākāhāstikāścīyaśaktikayāṣṭīkadhānuṣkakārpāṇikaprāsikapadātipracayastatrāsti	Catra cAmara patAkA hAstikAH cIya SaktikayAzwIka DAnuzka kArpANika prAsika padAti pracayaH tatra asti
   rājeti gamyate na tu katipayagajavājipadātibhāji tadamātye, tathehāpi /	rAjA iti gamyate na tu katipaya gaja vAji padAti BAji tad amAtye, taTA iha api /

   pratyabhijñānadārḍhyārthatvāt /	pratyaBijQAna dArXya arTa tvAt /

   anuvādamātrasyāpi tatra tatropalabdheḥ /	anuvAda mAtrasya api tatra tatra upalabDeH /
   tasmāttadeva bṛhadāraṇyake 'pyupāsanaṃ tadguṇenopasaṃhārāditi siddham //19	tasmAt tat eva bRhadAraNyake api upAsanam tad guNena upasaMhArAt iti sidDam //19
   # saṃbandhādevamanyatrāpi.# /	# saMbanDAt evam anyatra api.# /
   yadyekasyāmapi śākhāyāṃ tattvena pratyabhijñānādupāsanasya tatra vihitānāṃ	yadi ekasyAm api SAKAyAm tattvena pratyaBijQAnAt upAsanasya tatra vihitAnAm
   dharmāṇāṃ saṃkaraḥ /	DarmANAm saMkaraH /

   saṃkaraprasaṅgāt /	saMkara prasaFgAt /

   satyaṃ yatra svarūpamātrasaṃbandho dharmāṇāṃ śrūyate tatraivaṃ svarūpasya	satyam yatra sva rUpa mAtra saMbanDaH DarmANAm SrUyate tatra evam svarUpasya
   pratyabhijñāyamānatvāttanmātrasaṃbandhitvācca dharmāṇām /	pratyaBijQAyamAna tvAt tanmAtra saMbanDi tvAt ca DarmANAm /
   yatra tu saviśeṣaṇaṃ pradhānamavagamyate tatra saviśeṣaṇasyaiva tasya	yatra tu sa viSezaNam praDAnam avagamyate tatra sa viSezaNasya eva tasya
   dharmābhisaṃbandho na nirviśeṣaṇasya nāṭyanyaviśeṣaṇasahitasya /	Darma aBisaMbanDaH na nirviSezaNasya nAwI anya viSezaNa sahitasya /
   nahi daṇḍinaṃ puruṣamānayetyukte damḍarahitaḥ kamaṇḍalumānānīyate /	na hi daNxinam puruzam AnayA iti ukte damxa rahitaH kamaNxalumAn AnIyate /
   tasmādadhidaivaṃ satyasyopaniṣaduktā na tasyaivādhyātmaṃ bhavitumarhati /	tasmAt aDidEvam satyasya upanizad uktAH na tasya eva aDyAtmam Bavitum arhati /
   yathā cācāryasya gacchato 'nugamanaṃ vihitaṃ na tiṣṭhato bhavati,	yaTA ca AcAryasya gacCataH anugamanam vihitam na tizWataH Bavati,

   # darśayati ca.# /	# darSayati ca.# /
   atideśādapyevameva tattve hi nātideśaḥ syāditi //22 //	atideSAt api evam eva tattve hi na ati deSaH syAt iti //22 //
   saṃbhṛtidyuvyāptyapi cātaḥ /	saMBRti dyuvyApti api ca atas /
   'brahmajyeṣṭhā vīryā saṃbhṛtāni brahmāgne jyeṣṭhaṃ divamātatāna /	abrahma jyezWA vIryA saMBRtAni brahma agne jyezWam divam AtatAnaH /
   brahma bhūtānāṃ prathamaṃ tu jajñe tenārhati brahmaṇā spardhituṃ kaḥ /	brahma BUtAnAm praTamam tu jajQe tena arhati brahmaNA sparDitum kaH /
   ' brahma jyeṣṭhaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni brahmajyeṣṭhā jajñe āsa /	a brahma jyezWam yezAm tAni brahma jyezWAH jajQe Asa /
   yadyapi tāsu tāsu	yadi api tAsu tAsu
   śāṇḍilyādividyāsvāyatanabhedaparigraheṇādhyatmikāyatanatvaṃ saṃbhṛtyādīnāṃ	SANxilya Adi vidyAsu Ayatana Beda parigraheNa aDyatmika Ayatana tvam saMBRtya AdInAm
   guṇānāmādhidaikatvamityāyatanabhedaḥ pratibhāti, tathāpi jyāyān diva	guNAnAm ADida eka tvam iti Ayatana BedaH pratiBAti, taTA api jyAyAn diva
   ityādinā saṃdarbheṇādhidaivikavibhūtipratyabhijñānātṣoḍaśakalādyāsu ca	ityAdinA saMdarBeNa ADidEvika viBUti pratyaBijQAnAt zoxa SakalA AdyAsu ca
   vidyāsvāyatanāśravaṇādantato brahmāśrayatayā sāmyena pratyabhijñāsaṃbhavāt	vidyAsu Ayatana aSravaNAt antatas brahma ASraya tayA sAmyena pratyaBijQA saMBavAt 
   saṃbṛtyādīnāṃ guṇānāṃ śāṇḍilyādividyāsu ṣoḍaśakalādividyāsu copasaṃhāra	saMbRtya AdInAm guNAnAm SANxilya Adi vidyAsu zoxaSa kalA Adi vidyAsu ca upasaMhAra
   iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /	iti pUrvaH pakzaH /
   rāddhāntastu mithaḥ samānaguṇaśravaṇaṃ pratyabhijñāya yadvidyā apūrvānapi	rAdDa antaH tu  miTas samAna guNa SravaNam pratyaBijQAya yat vidyA apUrvAn api
   tatrāśrutānguṇānupasaṃhārayati na tviha saṃbhṛtyādiguṇakabrahmavidyāyaṃ	tatra aSrutAn guNAn upasaMhArayati na tu iha saMBRtya Adi guNaka brahma vidyA ayam
   śāṇḍilyādividyāgataguṇaśravaṇamasti /	SANxilya Adi vidyA gata guNa SravaNam asti /

   tasmāstatprakaraṇādhīnatvāttāvanmātraṃ grahīṣyate naitāvanmātreṇa	tasmAH tad prakaraNa aDIna tvAt tAvat mAtram grahIzyate na etAvat mAtreNa
   saṃbhṛtyādīnanukraṣṭumarhati /	saMBRtya AdIn anukrazwum arhati /

   tasmātsaṃbhṛtiśca dyuvyāptiśca tadidaṃ saṃbhṛtidyuvyāptyapi cātaḥ	tasmAt saMBRtiH ca dyuvyAptiH ca tat idam saMBRti dyuvyApti api ca atas 
   pratyabhijñānābhāvānna śāṇḍilyādividyāsūpasaṃhriyata iti siddham //23 //	pratyaBijQAna aBAvAt na SANxilya Adi vidyA su upasaMhriyate iti sidDam //23 //
   # puruṣavidyāyamitra cetareṣāmanāmnānāt.# /	# puruza vidyAyamitra ca itarezAm anAmnAnAt.# /
   puruṣayajñatvamubhayatrāpyaviśiṣṭam /	puruza yajQa tvam uBayatra api aviSizwam /
   naca viduṣo yajñasyeti na sāmānādhikaraṇyasaṃbhavaḥ /	na ca viduzaH yajQasya iti na sAmAnADikaraNya saMBavaH /
   yajñasyātmetyātmaśabdasya svarūpavacanatvāt /	yajQasya AtmA iti Atma Sabdasya svarUpa vacana tvAt /
   yajñasya svarūpaṃ yajamānastasya ca cetanatvādviduṣa iti	yajQasya svarUpam yajamAnaH tasya ca cetana tvAt viduzaH iti
   sāmānādhikaraṇyasaṃbhavaḥ /	sAmAnADikaraNya saMBavaH /
   tasmātpuruṣayajñatvāviśeṣānmaraṇāvabhṛthatvādisāmānyāccaikavidyādhyavasāne	tasmAt puruza yajQa tva aviSezAt maraNa avaBRTa tva Adi sAmAnyAt ca eka vidyA aDyavasAne
   ubhayatra ubhayadharmopasaṃhāra iti prāptam /	uBayatra uBaya Darma upasaMhAraH iti prAptam /
   evaṃ prāpta ucyate yādṛśaṃ tāṇḍināṃ paiṅgināṃ ca puruṣayajñasaṃpādanaṃ	evam prAptaH ucyate yAdRSam tANxinAm pEFginAm ca puruza yajQa saMpAdanam
   tadāyuṣaśca tredhā vyavasthitasya savanatrayasaṃpādanam /	tadA AyuzaH ca treDA vyavasTitasya savana traya saMpAdanam /
   aśiśiṣādīnāṃ ca dīkṣādibhāvasaṃpādanaṃ naivaṃ taittirīyāṇām /	aSiSiza AdInAm ca dIkzA Adi BAva saMpAdanam na evam tEttirIyANAm /
   teṣāṃ na tāvat puruṣe yajñasaṃpattiḥ /	tezAm na tAvat puruze yajQa saMpattiH /
   nahyātmā yajamāna ityatrāyamātmaśabdaḥ svarūpavacanaḥ /	na hi AtmA yajamAnaH iti atra ayam Atma SabdaH svarUpa vacanaH /
   nahi yajñasvarūpaṃ yajamāno bhavati /	na hi yajQa svarUpam yajamAnaH Bavati /
   kartṛkarmaṇorabhedābhāvāt /	kartR karmaNoH aBeda aBAvAt /
   cetanācetanayoścaikyānupapatteḥ yajñakarmaṇoścācetanatvāt /	cetanA cetanayoH ca ekya anupapatteH yajQa karmaNoH ca acetana tvAt /
   yajamānasya cetanatvāt /	yajamAnasya cetana tvAt /
   ātmanastu cetanasya yajamānatvaṃ ca vidvattvaṃ copapadyate /	AtmanaH tu cetanasya yajamAna tvam ca vidvat tvam ca upapadyate /
   tathā cāyamarthaḥ evaṃ viduṣaḥ puruṣasya yaḥ saṃbandhī yajñaḥ tasya	taTA ca ayam arTaH evam viduzaH puruzasya yaH saMbanDI yajQaH tasya
   saṃbandhitayā yajamāna ātmā tathā cātmano yajamānatvaṃ ca	saMbanDi tayA yajamAnaH AtmA taTA ca AtmanaH yajamAna tvam ca
   vidvatsaṃbandhitā ca yajñasya mukhye syātāmitarachātmaśabdasya	vidvat saMbanDi tA ca yajQasya muKye syAtAm itara CA Atma Sabdasya
   svarūpavācitve viduṣo yajñasyeti ca yajamāno yajñasvarūpamiti ca gauṇe	svarUpa vAci tve viduzaH yajQasya iti ca yajamAnaH yajQa svarUpam iti ca gONe
   syātām /	syAtAm /
   naca satyāṃ gatau tadyuktam /	na ca satyAm gatO tat yuktam /
   tasmātpuruṣayajñatā taittirīye nāstīti tayā tāvanna sāmyam /	tasmAt puruza yajQa tA tEttirIye na asti iti tayA tAvat na sAmyam /
   naca patnīyajamānavedavidyādisaṃpādanaṃ taittirīyāṇāmivi tāṇḍināṃ	na ca patnI yajamAna veda vidyA Adi saMpAdanam tEttirIyANAm ivi tANxinAm
   paiṅgināṃ vā vidyate savanasaṃpattirapyeṣāṃ vilakṣaṇaiva /	pEFginAm vA vidyate savana saMpattiH api ezAm vilakzaNA eva /
   tasmādbhūyo vailakṣaṇye sati na	tasmAt BUyas vElakzaNye sati na
   kiñcinmātrasālakṣaṇyādvidyaikatvamucitamatiprasaṅgāt /	kiQcinmAtra sAlakzaNyAt vidyA eka tvam ucita m ati prasaFgAt /
   apica tasyaivaṃ viduṣa ityanuvādaśrutau satyāmanekārthavidhāne	api ca tasya evam viduzaH iti anuvAda SrutO satyAm aneka arTa viDAne
   vākyabhedadoṣaprasaktirityarthaḥ /	vAkya Beda doza prasaktiH iti arTaH /
   api ceyaṃ paiṅgināṃ tāṇḍināṃ ca puruṣayajñavidyāphalāntarayuktā svatantrā	api ca iyam pEFginAm tANxinAm ca puruza yajQa vidyA Pala antara yuktA svatantrA
   pratīyate /	pratIyate /
   taittirīyāṇāṃ tu evaṃviduṣa iti	tEttirIyANAm tu evaMvid uzaH iti
   śravaṇātpūrvoktaparāmarśāttatphalatvaśruteśca pāratantryam /	SravaNAt pUrva ukta parAmarSAt tad Pala tva SruteH ca pAratantryam /
   naca svatantraparantrayoraikyamucitamityāha apica sasaṃnyāsāmātmavidyāmiti	na ca svatantra parantrayoH Ekyam ucitam iti Aha  apica sa saMnyAsAm Atma vidyAm iti
   upasaṃharati tasmāditi //24 //	upasaMharati  tasmAt iti //24 //
   # vedhādyarthabhedāt.# /	# veDa Adi arTa BedAt.# /

   karmāṇi samamnātīni /	karmANi samamnAtIni /
   saṃśayamāha  # kimima iti.# /	saMSayam Aha # kim ime iti.# /
   pūrvapakṣaṃ gṛhṇāti  # upasaṃhāra evaiṣāṃ vidyāsviti.# /	pUrva pakzam gRhNAti # upasaMhAraH eva ezAm vidyAsu iti.# /
   saphalā hi sarvā vidyā āmnātāstatsannidhau mantrāḥ /	saPalAH hi sarvAH vidyAH AmnAtAH tad sanniDO mantrAH /
   karmāṇi ca samāmnātāni 'phalavatsannidhāphalaṃ tadaṅgam' iti	karmANi ca samAmnAtAni aPala vat sanniDA Palam tat aFgam a iti
   nyāyādvidyāṅgābhāvena vijñāyante /	nyAyAt vidyA aFga aBAvena vijQAyante /
   codayati  # nanveṣāmiti.# /	codayati # nanu ezAm iti.# /
   nahyatra śrutiliṅgavākyaprakaraṇasthānasamākhyānāni santi viniyojakāni	na hi atra Sruti liFga vAkya prakaraNa sTAna samAKyAnAni santi viniyojakAni
   pramāṇāni, nahi yathā darśapūrṇamāsāvārabhya samidādayaḥ samāmrātāstathā	pramANAni, na hi yaTA darSa pUrNamAsO= AraBya samiD AdayaH samAmrAtAH taTA
   kāñcidvidyāmārabhya mantrā vā karmāṇi vā samāmrātāni /	kAQcid vidyAm AraBya mantrAH vA karmANi vA samAmrAtAni /
   na cāsati sāmānyasaṃbandhe saṃbandhisaṃnidhānamātrāttādarthyasaṃbhavaḥ /	na ca asati sAmAnya saMbanDe saMbanDi saMniDAna mAtrAt tAt arTya saMBavaH /
   naca śrutasvāṅgaparipūrṇā vidyā etānākāṅkṣitumarhati yena	na ca Sruta sva aFga paripUrNA vidyA etAn AkAFkzitum arhati yena
   prakaraṇāpaditasāmānyasaṃbandhānāṃ saṃnidhirviśeṣasaṃbandhāyā	prakaraNa Apadita sAmAnya saMbanDAnAm saMniDiH viSeza saMbanDAyA
   bhavedityarthaḥ /	Bavet iti arTaH /
   samādhatte  # bāḍhamanupalabhamānā apīti.# /	samADatte # bAXam anupalaBamAnAH api iti.# /
   mā nāma bhūtphalavatīnāṃ vidyānāṃ paripūrṇāṅgānāmākāṅkṣā //	mA nAma BUt PalavatInAm vidyAnAm paripUrNa aFgAnAm AkAFkzAH //
   mantrāṇāṃ tu svādhyāyavidhyāpāditapuruṣārthabhāvanāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca	mantrANAm tu svADyAya viDi ApAdita puruza arTa BAvanAm karmaNAm ca
   pravargyādīnāṃ svavidhyāpāditapuruṣārthabhāvānāṃ	pravargya AdInAm sva viDi ApAdita puruza arTa BAvAnAm
   puruṣābhilaṣitamākāṅkṣatāṃ saṃnidhānādanyatārākāṅkṣānibandho	puruza aBilazitam AkAFkzatAm saMniDAnAt anya tArA kAFkzA nibanDo
   raktapaṭanyāyena saṃbandhaḥ /	rakta pawa nyAyena saMbanDaH /

   naca pravargyādīnāṃ piṇḍapitṛyajñavatsvargaḥ kalpanāspadaṃ,	na ca pravargya AdInAm piNxa pitR yajQa vat svargaH kalpanA AspadaM,
   phalavatsaṃnidhānena tadavarohāt /	Palavat saMniDAnena tad avarohAt /
   # anumāsyāmahe saṃnidhisāmārthyāditi.# /	# anumAsyAmahe saMniDi sAma arTya At iti.# /
   idaṃ khalu nivṛttākāṅkṣāyā vidyāyāḥ saṃnidhāne śrutamanākāṅkṣāyā	idam Kalu nivRtta AkAFkzAyAH vidyAyAH saMniDAne Srutam anAkAFkzAyA

   kalpayati /	kalpayati /

   vākyārthaḥ' ityatra /	vAkya arTaH a iti atra /

   kratusaṃyogena kratusaṃbandhaṃ pratipadyate /	kratu saMyogena kratu saMbanDam pratipadyate /

   yuktaṃ, tadetadāha  # kathaṃ ca pravargyāditi.# /	yuktan, tat etat A aha # kaTam ca pravargya At iti.# /

   hṛdayapadasyopāsanāyāṃ samavetārthatvāttadanusāreṇa tadekavākyatāpannāpi	hRdaya padasya upAsanAyAm samaveta arTa tvAt tad anusAreNa tat eka vAkyatA ApannA api

   mantrāṇām /	mantrANAm /
   naca mantraviniyogo nopāsaneṣu dṛṣṭo yenātyantādṛṣṭaṃ kalpyata ityāha  #	na ca mantra viniyogaH na upAsanezu dRzwaH yena atyanta adRzwam kalpyate iti Aha #

   na cohāsti virodhaḥ /	na ca Uha asti viroDaH /
   vākyena viniyuktasyāpi jyotiṣṭome pravargyasya saṃnidhinā vidyāyāmapi	vAkyena viniyuktasya api jyotizwome pravargyasya saMniDinA vidyAyAm api
   viniyogasaṃbhavāt /	viniyoga saMBavAt /
   yathā 'brahmavarcasakāmo bṛhaspatisavena yajeta' iti brahmavarcasaphalo	yaTA abrahmavarcasa kAmaH bRhaspati savena yajeta a iti brahmavarcasa PalaH 
   'pi bṛhaspatisavo vājapeyāṅgatvena codyate vājapeyeneṣṭvā bṛhaspatisavena	api bRhaspati savaH vAjapeya aFga tvena ca udyate vAjapeyena izwvA bRhaspati savena
   yajeteti /	yajeta iti /
   atra hi ktvaḥ samānakartṛkatvamavagamyate dhātusaṃbandhe pratyayavidhānāt	atra hi ktvaH samAna kartRka tvam avagamyate DAtu saMbanDe pratyaya viDAnAt 
   dhātvarthāntarasaṃbandhaśca kathaṃ ca samānaḥ kartā syāt /	DAtvarTa antara saMbanDaH ca kaTam ca samAnaH kartA syAt /
   yadyakaḥ prayogo bhavet /	yadyakaH prayogaH Bavet /
   prayogāviṣṭaṃ hi kartṛtvam /	prayoga Avizwam hi kartR tvam /
   tacca prayogabhede kathamekam /	tat ca prayoga Bede kaTam ekam /
   tasmātsamānakartṛkatvādekaprayogatvaṃ	tasmAt samAna kartRka tvAt eka prayoga tvam
   vājapeyabṛhaspatisavayordhātvarthāntarasaṃbandhācca /	vAjapeya bRhaspati savayoH DAtu arTa antara saMbanDAt ca /
   naca guṇapradhānabhāvamantareṇaikaprayogatā saṃbandhaśca tatrāpi	na ca guNa praDAna BAvam antareNa eka prayoga tA saMbanDaH ca tatra api
   vājapeyasya prakaraṇe samāmnānādvājapeyaḥ pradhānam /	vAjapeyasya prakaraNe samAmnAnAt vAjapeyaH praDAnam /
   aṅgaṃ bṛhaspatisavaḥ /	aFgam bRhaspati savaH /
   naca 'darśapūrṇamāsābhyāmiṣṭvā somena yajeta'	na ca adarSa pUrNamAsAByAm izwvA somena yajeta a
   ityatrāṅgapradhānabhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /	iti atra aFga praDAna BAva prasaFgaH /
   nahyetadvacanaṃ kasyaciddarśapūrṇamāsamya somasya vā prakaraṇe samāmnātam	na hi etat vacanam kasyacid darSa pUrNam Asamya somasya vA prakaraNe samAmnAtam
   tathāca dvayoḥ sādhikāratayā agṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatayā guṇapradhānabhāvaṃ prati	taTA ca dvayoH sADikAra tayA agRhyamANa viSeza tayA guNa praDAna BAvam prati
   vinigamanābhāvenādhiṣṭhānamātravivakṣayā lākṣaṇikaṃ	vinigamana aBAvena aDizWAna mAtra vivakzayA lAkzaNikam
   samānakartṛkatvamityadoṣaḥ /	samAna kartRka tvam iti adozaH /

   tathāpyanārabhyādhītasyaivārabhyādhīte pratyabhijñānamiti yuktam /	taTA api anAraBya aDItasya eva AraBya aDIte pratyaBijQAnam iti yuktam /
   tathā sati dvayorapi pṛthagadhikāratayā pratītaṃ samapradhānatvamatyaktaṃ	taTA sati dvayoH api pRTak aDikAra tayA pratItam sama praDAna tvam atyaktam
   bhaveditarathā tu guṇapradhānabhāvena tattyāgo bhavet /	Bavet itaraTA tu guNa praDAna BAvena tad tyAgaH Bavet /
   tasmātkālārtho 'yaṃ saṃyoga iti siddham /	tasmAt kAla arTaH ayam saMyogaH iti sidDam /
   siddhāntamupakramate  # evaṃ prāpta iti.# /	sidDAntam upakramate # evam prAptaH iti.# /
   hṛdayaṃ pravidhyetyayaṃ mantraḥ svarasatastāvadābhicārikakarmasamavetaṃ	hRdayam praviDya iti ayam mantraH svarasataH tAvat ABicArika karma samavetam
   sakalaireva padairarthamabhidadhadupalabhyate	sakalEH eva padEH arTam aBidaDat upalaByate
   tadasyābhidhānasāmarthyalakṣaṇaṃ liṅgaṃ vākyaprakaraṇābhyāṃ	tat asya aBiDAna sAmarTya lakzaNam liFgam vAkya prakaraNAByAm
   kramādbalīyobhyāmapi balavatkimaṅga punaḥ kramāt, tasmālliṅgena	kramAt balIyoByAm api balavat kim aFga punar kramAt, tasmAt liFgena
   saṃnidhimapodyābhicārikakarmaśeṣatvamevāpādyate /	saMniDim apodya ABicArika karma Seza tvam eva ApAdyate /
   yadyapi copāsanāsu hṛdayapadamātrasya samavetārthatvam /	yadi api ca upAsanAsu hRdaya pada mAtrasya samaveta arTa tvam /

   ābhicārike tu karmaṇi sarveṣāmarthasamavāya iti kimekapadasamavetārthatā	ABicArike tu karmaNi sarvezAm arTa samavAyaH iti kim eka pada samaveta arTa tA
   kariṣyati /	karizyati /

   hṛdayapadasyābhicāre 'pi samavetārthasyetarapadaikavākyatāpannasya	hRdaya padasya aBicAre api samaveta arTasya itara pada eka vAkyatA Apannasya
   vākyapramāṇasahitasyābhicārikātkarmaṇaḥ saṃnidhinācālayitumaśakyatvādevaṃ	vAkya pramANa sahitasya ABicArikAt karmaNaH saMniDinA AcAlayitum aSakya tvAt evam
   'deva savitaḥ prasuva yajñam' ityāderapi yajñaprasavaliṅgasya yajñaṅgatve	adeva savitar prasuva yajQam a ityAdeH api yajQa prasava liFgasya yajQaFga tve
   siddhe jaghanyo vidyāsaṃnidhiḥ kiṃ kariṣyati /	sidDe jaGanyaH vidyA saMniDiH kim karizyati /
   evamanyeṣāmapi śvetāśva ityevamādīnāṃ keṣāñcilliṅgena keṣāñcicchutyā #	evam anyezAm api SvetASvaH iti evamAdInAm kezAQcid liFgena kezAQcid SutyAH #

   saṃnidhiriti.# /	saMniDiH iti.# /
   prathamatantragator'thaḥ smāryate /	praTama tantra gator aTaH smAryate /
