   iti cintā /	iti cintA /
   atrodāharaṇam astyaindrī ṛk 'kadācanastarīrasi nendra' ityādikā	atra udAharaNam  asti EndrI Rc akadAcanaH tarIH asi na indra a iti AdikA
   śrutirviniyokī 'aindrayā gārhapatyamupatiṣṭhate' iti /	SrutiH viniyokI aEndrayA gArhapatyam upatizWate a iti /
   atra hi sāmarthyalakṣaṇālliṅgādindre viniyogaḥ pratibhāti /	atra hi sAmarTya lakzaNAt liFgAt indre viniyogaH pratiBAti /
   śruteśca gārhapatyamiti dvitīyāto gārhapatyasya śeṣitvaṃ aindriyeti	SruteH ca gArhapatyam iti dvitIyAtas gArhapatyasya Sezi tvam Endriya iti
   catṛtīyāśruteraindyā ṛcaḥ śeṣatvamavagamyate /	catRtIya aSruteH EndyAH RcaH Seza tvam avagamyate /
   yadyapi gārhapatyamiti dvitīyāśruterāgneyīmṛcaṃ prati gārhapatyasya	yadi api gArhapatyam iti dvitIya aSruteH AgneyIm Rcam prati gArhapatyasya
   śeṣitvenopapatteḥ /	Sezi tvena upapatteH /
   yadyapi caindrayeti ca tṛtīyāśruteraindrayā indraṃ prati	yadi api ca Endraya iti ca tRtIyA SruteH EndrayA indram prati
   śeṣatvanopapatteravirodhaḥ /	Seza tvana upapatteH aviroDaH /
   padāntarasaṃbandhe tu vākyasyaiva liṅgena virodho na tu śruteḥ /	pada antara saMbanDe tu vAkyasya eva liFgena viroDaH na tu SruteH /
   tatra ca viparītaṃ balābalam /	tatra ca viparItam balAbalam /
   tathāpi śrutivākyayo rūpato vyāpārabhedādadoṣaḥ /	taTA api Sruti vAkyayoH rUpataH vyApAra BedAt adozaH /
   dvitīyātṛtīyāśrutī hi kārakavibhaktitayā kriyāṃ prati prakṛtyarthasya	dvitIyA tRtIya aSrutI hi kAraka viBakti tayA kriyAm prati prakRti arTasya
   karmakaraṇabhāvamavagamayata iti viniyojike /	karma karaNa BAvam avagamayate iti viniyojike /
   kriyāṃ prati hi karmaṇaḥ śeṣitvaṃ karaṇasya ca śeṣatvamiti hi viniyogaḥ /	kriyAm prati hi karmaNaH Sezi tvam karaNasya ca Seza tvam iti hi viniyogaH /
   padāntarānapekṣe ca kriyāṃ prati śeṣaśeṣitve śrutimātrātpratiyete iti	pada antara anapekze ca kriyAm prati Seza Sezi tve Sruti mAtrAt pratiyete iti
   śraute /	SrOte /
   so 'yaṃ śrutitiḥ sāmānyāvagato viniyogaḥ padāntaravaśādviśeṣe 'vasthāpyate	saH ayam SrutitiH sAmAnya avagataH viniyogaH pada antara vaSAt viSeze avasTApyate
   so 'yaṃ viśiṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandho vākyagocaraḥ,	saH ayam viSizaNa viSezya BAva lakzaNaH saMbanDaH vAkya gocaraH,
   śeṣaśeṣibhāvastu śrautaḥ,	Seza Sezi BAvaH tu SrOtaH,
   tasmādvākyalabhyaṃ viśiṣamapekṣya śrautaḥ śeṣaśeṣibhāvo liṅgena virudhyata	tasmAt vAkya laByam viSizam apekzya SrOtaH Seza Sezi BAvaH liFgena viruDyata
   iti śrutiliṅgavirodhe kiṃ liṅgānuguṇena gārhatvamiti dvitīyāśrutiḥ	iti Sruti liFga viroDe kim liFga anuguNena gArhatvam iti dvitIya aSrutiH
   saptamyarthe vyākhyāyatāṃ gārhapatyasamīpe aindrayendra upastheya iti /	saptamI arTe vyAKyAyatAm gArhapatya samIpe Endraya indraH upasTeyaH iti /
   āho śrutyanuguṇatayā liṅgaṃ vyākhyayatām /	Aho Sruti anuguNa tayA liFgam vyAKyayatAm /
   prabhavati hi svocitāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ gārhapatya itīndra	praBavati hi sva ucitAyAm kriyAyAm gArhapatyaH iti indra
   indarteraiśvaryavacanatvāditi /	indarteH ESvarya vacana tvAt iti /
   kiṃ tāvatprāptaṃ śruterliṅgaṃ balīya iti /	kim tAvat prAptam SruteH liFgam balIyaH iti /
   no khalu yatrāsamarthaṃ tacchutisahasreṇāpi tatra viniyoktuṃ śakyate /	no Kalu yatra asamarTam tad Suti sahasreNa api tatra viniyoktum Sakyate /
   yathā agninā siñcet pāthasā dahediti /	yaTA agninA siQcet pATasA dahet iti /
   tasmātsāmarthyaṃ purodhāya śrutyā viniyoktavyam /	tasmAt sAmarTyam puroDAya SrutyA viniyoktavyam /
   taccāsyā ṛcaḥ pramāṇāntarataḥ śabdataśca indre pratīyate /	tat ca asyAH RcaH pramANa antarataH SabdataH ca indre pratIyate /
   tathāhi viditapadatadarthaḥ kadācanetyṛcaḥ spaṣṭamindramavagacchati,	taTA ahi vidita pada tad arTaH kadAcana iti RcaH spazwam indram avagacCati,
   śabdāccaindrayetyataḥ /	SabdAt cEndraya iti atas /
   tasmāddārudahanasyeva dahanasya saliladahane viniyogo gārhapatye viniyoga	tasmAt dAru dahanasya iva dahanasya salila dahane viniyogaH gArhapatye viniyoga
   aindrayāḥ /	EndrayAH /
   naca śrutyanurodhājjaghanyāmāsthāyā vṛttiṃ sāmarthyakalpaneti sāmpratam /	na ca Sruti anuroDAt jaGanyAm AsTAyAH vRttim sAmarTya kalpanA iti sAmpratam /
   samarthyasya pūrvabhāvitayā tadanurodhenaiva śrutivyavasthāpanāt /	samarTyasya pUrva BAvitayA tad anuroDena eva Sruti vyavasTApanAt /
   tasmādaindrayendra eva gārhapatyasamīpa upasthātavya iti prāpte	tasmAt Endraya indraH eva gArhapatya samIpaH upasTAtavyaH iti prApte
   'bhidhīyate 'liṅgajñānaṃ purodhāya na śrutervinayoktṛtā /	aBiDIyate  aliFga jQAnam puroDAya na SruteH vinaya uktRtA /
   śrutijñānaṃ purodhāya liṅgaṃ tu viniyojakam' /	Sruti jQAnam puroDAya liFgam tu viniyojakam a /
   yadi hi sāmarthyamavagamya śruterviniyogamavadhārayetpramātā tataḥ	yadi hi sAmarTyam avagamya SruteH viniyogam avaDArayet pramAtA tatas 
   śruterviniyogaṃ prati liṅgajñānāpekṣatvāddurbalatvaṃ bhavet /	SruteH viniyogam prati liFga jQAna apekza tvAt durbala tvam Bavet /
   na tvetadasti /	na tu etat asti /
   śrutirviniyogāya samarthyamapekṣate nāpekṣate sāmarthyavijñānam /	SrutiH viniyogAya samarTyam apekzate na apekzate sAmarTya vijQAnam /
   avagate tu tato viniyoge nāsamarthasya sa iti tannirvāhāya sāmarthyaṃ	avagate tu tatas viniyoge na asamarTasya saH iti tat nirvAhAya sAmarTyam
   kalpyate /	kalpyate /
   tacchutiviniyogātpūrvamasti sāmarthyam /	tad Suti viniyogAt pUrvam asti sAmarTyam /
   na tu pūrvamagamyate /	na tu pUrvam agamyate /
   viniyoge tu siddhe tadanyathānupapattyā paścātpratīyata iti	viniyoge tu sidDe tad anyaTA anupapattyA paScAt pratIyate iti
   śrutiviniyogātparācīnā sāmarthyapratītistadanurodhenāvasthāpanīyā /	Sruti viniyogAt parAcInA sAmarTya pratItiH tad anuroDena avasTApanIyA /
   liṅgaṃ tu na svato viniyojakamapi tu viniyokīṃ kalpyitvā śrutim /	liFgam tu na svatas viniyojakam api tu viniyokIm kalpyitvA Srutim /
   tathāhi na svarasato liṅgādanenendra upasthātavya iti pratīyate,	taTA ahi na svarasataH liFgAt anena indraH upasTAtavyaH iti pratIyate,
   kintvīdṛgindra iti tasya tu prakaraṇāmnānasāmartyāt sāmānyataḥ	kintvI dRS indraH iti tasya tu prakaraNa AmnAnasa amartyAt sAmAnyatas 
   prakaraṇāpatitaidamarthyasya tadanyathānupapattyā viniyogakalpanāyāmapi	prakaraNa Apati tEdamarTyasya tat anyaTA anupapattyA viniyoga kalpanAyAm api
   śrautādviniyogātkalpanīyasya viniyogasyārthaviprakarṣācchutireva	SrOtAt viniyogAt kalpanIyasya viniyogasya arTa viprakarzAt SutiH eva
   kalpayitumucitā na tu tadartho viniyogaḥ /	kalpayitum ucitAH na tu tad arTaH viniyogaH /
   nahi śrutamanupapannaṃ śākyamarthenopapādayitum /	na hi Srutam anupapannam SAkyam arTena upapAdayitum /
   nahi trayo 'tra brahmaṇāḥ kaṭhakauṇḍinyāviti vākyaṃ	na hi trayaH atra brahmaNAH kaWa kONxinyO= iti vAkyam
   pramāṇāntaropasthāpitena māṭhareṇopapādayanti, upapādayato vā nopahasanti	pramANa antara upasTApitena mAWareNa upapAdayanti, upapAdayataH vA na upahasanti
   śabdāḥ /	SabdAH /
   māṭharaśceti tu śrāvayantamanumanyante /	mAWaraH ca iti tu SrAvayantam anumanyante /
   tasmācchutārthasamutthānānupapattiḥ śrutenaivārthāntareṇopapādanīyā,	tasmAt Suta arTa samutTAna anupapattiH Srutena eva arTa antareNa upapAdanIyA,
   nārthāntaramātreṇa pramāṇāntaropanīteneti lokasiddham /	na arTa antara mAtreNa pramANa antara upanItena iti loka sidDam /
   naca lokasiddhasya niyogānuyogau yujyete	na ca loka sidDasya niyoga anuyogO yujyete
   śabdārthajñānopāyabhūtalokavirodhāt /	Sabda arTa jQAna upAya BUta loka viroDAt /
   tasmādviniyojikā śrutiḥ kalpanīyā /	tasmAt viniyojikA SrutiH kalpanIyAH /
   tathāca yāvalliṅgādviniyojikāṃ śrutiṃ kalpayituṃ	taTA ca yAvat liFgAt viniyojikAm Srutim kalpayitum
   prakāntavyāpārastāvatpratyakṣayā śrutyā gārhapatye viniyogaḥ siddha iti	prakAnta vyApAraH tAvat pratyakzayA SrutyA gArhapatye viniyogaH sidDaH iti
   nivṛttākāṅkṣaṃ prakaramamiti kasyānupapattyā liṅgaṃ viniyokīṃ	nivRtta AkAFkzam prakaramam iti kasya anupapattyA liFgam viniyokIm
   śrutimupakalpyet /	Srutim upakalpyet /
   mantrasamāmnānasya pratyakṣayaiva viniyogaśrutyopapāditatvāt /	mantra samAmnAnasya pratyakzayA eva viniyoga SrutyA upapAdita tvAt /
   yathāhuḥ 'yāvadajñātasaṃdigdhaṃ jñeyaṃ tātpramitsyate /	yaTA AhuH  ayAvat ajQAta saMdigDam jQeyam tAt pramitsyate /
   pramite tu pramātṛṇāṃ pramautsukyaṃ vihanyate' iti /	pramite tu pramAtRNAm pramOtsukyam vihanyate a iti /
   tasmātpratītaśrautaviniyogopapattyai mantrasya sāmarthye tadanuguṇatvena	tasmAt pratIta SrOta viniyoga upapattyE mantrasya sAmarTye tad anuguNa tvena
   nīyamānaṃ prathamāṃ vṛttimajahajjaghanyayāpi neyamiti siddham /	nIyamAnam praTamAm vRttim ajahat jaGanyayA api na iyam iti sidDam /
   liṅgavākyayoriha virodho yathā 'syonaṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomi ghṛtasya dhārayā	liFga vAkyayoH iha viroDaH yaTA  asya Unam te sadanam kRNomi GRtasya DArayA
   suśeṣaṃ kalpyāmi /	su Sezam kalpyAmi /
   tasminsīdāmṛte pratitiṣṭha vrīhīṇāṃ medha sumanasyamānaḥ' iti /	tasmin sIda am Rte pratitizWa vrIhINAm meDa sumanasyamAnaH a iti /
   kimayaṃ kṛtsna eva mantraḥ sadanakaraṇe puroḍāśāsādane ca prayoktavya uta	kim ayam kRtsnaH eva mantraH sadana karaNe puroxASa AsAdane ca prayoktavyaH uta
   kalpyāmyanta upastaraṇe tasmintsīdetyevamādistu puroḍāśāsādana iti /	kalpyAmi antaH upastaraNe tasmin tsIda iti evamAdiH tu puroxASa AsAdanaH iti /
   yadi vākyaṃ balīyaḥ kṛtsnau mantra ubhayatra, suśevaṃ kalpyāmītyetadapekṣo	yadi vAkyam balIyaH kRtsnO mantraH uBayatra, su Sevam kalpyAmi iti etat apekzaH 
   hi tasminsīdetyādiḥ pūrveṇaikavākyatāmupaiti yatkalpayāmi tasmintsīdeti /	hi tasmin sIdA iti AdiH pUrveNa eka vAkyatAm upEti yat kalpayAmi tasmin tsIdA iti /
   atha liṅgaṃ balīyastataḥ kalpyāmyantaḥ sadanakaraṇe tatprakāśane hi	aTa liFgam balIyaH tatas kalpyAmi antar sadana karaNe tad prakASane hi
   tatsamartham /	tat samarTam /
   tasmintsīdeti puroḍāśāsādane tatra hi tatsamarthamiti /	tasmin tsIdA iti puroxASa AsAdane tatra hi tat samarTam iti /
   kiṃ tāvatprāptam /	kim tAvat prAptam /
   liṅgādvākyaṃ balīya ityubhayatra kṛtsnasya viniyoga iti /	liFgAt vAkyam balIyaH iti uBayatra kRtsnasya viniyogaH iti /
   iha hi yattatpadasamabhivyāhāreṇa vibhajyamānasākāṅkṣatvādekavākyatāyāṃ	iha hi yat tat pada samaBivyAhAreNa viBajya mAna sAkAFkza tvAt eka vAkya tAyAm
   siddhāyāṃ tadanurodhena paścāttadabhidhānasāmārthyaṃ kalpanīyam /	sidDAyAm tad anuroDena paScAt tad aBiDAna sAmArTyam kalpanIyam /
   yathā devasyatvetimantre 'gnye nirvapāmīti padayoḥ samavetārthatvena	yaTA devasyatvA iti mantre agnye nirvapAmi iti padayoH samaveta arTa tvena
   tadekavākyatayā padāntarāṇāṃ tatparatvena tatra sāmarthyakalpanā /	tad eka vAkya tayA pada antarANAm tad paratvena tatra sAmarTya kalpanA /
   tadevaṃ pratītaikavākyatānirvāhāya tadanuguṇatayā sāmarthyaṃ kḷptaṃ sanna	tat evam pratIta eka vAkya tA nirvAhAya tad anuguNa tayA sAmarTyam k?ptam sanna
   tadvyāpādayitumarhati, api tu viniyojikāṃ śrutiṃ mantraḥ prayoktavya iti	tad vyApAdayitum arhati, api tu viniyojikAm Srutim mantraH prayoktavyaH iti
   prāptam /	prAptam /
   evaṃ prāpte ucyate bhavedetadevaṃ yadyekavākyatāvagamapūrvaṃ	evam prApte ucyate  Bavet etat evam yadi eka vAkyata avagama pUrvam
   sāmarthyāvadhāraṇamapi tu avadhṛtasāmarthyānāṃ padānāṃ praśliṣṭapāṭhitānāṃ	sAmarTya avaDAraNam api tu avaDRta sAmarTyAnAm padAnAm praSlizwa pAWitAnAm
   sāmarthyavaśena prayojanaikatvenekavākyatvāvadhāraṇam /	sAmarTya vaSena prayojana eka tvena ika vAkya tva avaDAraNam /
   yavanti padāni pradhānamekamarthamavagamayituṃ samarthāni vibhāge	yavanti padAni praDAnam ekam arTam avagamayitum samarTAni viBAge
   sākāṅkṣāṇi tānyekaṃ vākyam /	sa AkAFkzANi tAni ekam vAkyam /
   anuṣṭheyaścārtho mantreṣu prakāśyamānaḥ pradhānam /	anuzWeyaH ca arTaH mantrezu prakASyamAnaH praDAnam /
   sadanakaraṇapuroḍāśāsādane cānuṣṭheyatayā pradhāne /	sadana karaNa puroxASa AsAdane ca anuzWeya tayA praDAne /
   tayośca sadanakaraṇaṃ kalpayāmyanto mantraḥ samarthaḥ prakāśayituṃ	tayoH ca sadana karaNam kalpayAmi antaH mantraH samarTaH prakASayitum
   puroḍāśāsādanaṃ ca tasminsīdetyādiḥ /	puroxASa AsAdanam ca tasmin sIda iti AdiH /
   tataśca yāvadekavākyatāvaśena sāmarthyamanumīyate tāvatpratītaṃ	tatas ca yAvat eka vAkyatA vaSena sAmarTyam anumIyate tAvat pratItam
   sāmarthyamekaikasya bhāgasyaikaikasminnarthe viniyojikāṃ śrutiṃ kalpayati	sAmarTyam ekEkasya BAgasya ekEkasmin= arTe viniyojikAm Srutim kalpayati
   tathāca śrutyaivaikaikasya bhāgasyaikatra viniyoge sati	taTA ca SrutyA eva ekEkasya BAgasya ekatra viniyoge sati
   prakaraṇapāṭhopapattau na vākyakalpitaṃ liṅgaṃ viniyojikāṃ śrutimaparāṃ	prakaraNa pAWa upapattO na vAkya kalpitam liFgam viniyojikAm Srutim aparAm
   kalpayitumarhatītyekavākyatābuddhirutpannāpyābhāsībhavati liṅgena bādhanāt	kalpayitum arhati iti eka vAkyatA budDiH utpannA apya ABAsIBavati liFgena bADanAt 
   yatra tu virodhakaṃ liṅgaṃ nāsti tatra samavetārthaikadvitripadaikavākyatā	yatra tu viroDakam liFgam na asti tatra samaveta arTa eka dvi tri pada eka vAkyatA
   padāntarāṇāmapi sāmarthyaṃ kalpayatīti bhavati vākyasya viniyojakatvam /	pada antarANAm api sAmarTyam kalpayati iti Bavati vAkyasya viniyojaka tvam /
   yathātraiva syonaṃ ta ityādīnām /	yaTA atra eva syonam te iti AdInAm /
   tasmādvākyālliṅgaṃ balīya siddham //	tasmAt vAkyAt liFgam balIya sidDam //
   vākyaprakaraṇayorvirodhodāharaṇam /	vAkya prakaraNayoH viroDa udAharaNam /
   atra ca padānāṃ parasparāpekṣāvaśātkasmiṃścidviśiṣṭa ekasminnarthe	atra ca padAnAm paraspara apekzA vaSAt kasmiMScid viSizwaH ekasmin= arTe
   paryavasitānāṃ vākyatvaṃ, labdhavākyabhāvanāṃ ca punaḥ	paryavasitAnAm vAkya tvaM, labDa vAkya BAvanAm ca punar 
   kāryāntarāpekṣāvaśena vākyāntareṇa saṃbandhaḥ prakaraṇam /	kArya antara apekzA vaSena vAkya antareNa saMbanDaH prakaraNam /
   kartavyāyāḥ khalu phalabhāvanāyā labdhadhātvarthakaraṇāyā	kartavyAyAH Kalu Pala BAvanAyAH labDa DAtu arTa karaNAyAH 
   itikartavyatākāṅkṣāyā vacanaṃ prakaraṇamācakṣate vṛddhāḥ /	itikartavya tA kAFkzAyAH vacanam prakaraNam Acakzate vRdDAH /
   yathā 'darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta' iti /	yaTA adarSa pUrNamAsAByAm svarga kAmaH yajeta a iti /
   etaddhi vacanaṃ prakaraṇam /	etat hi vacanam prakaraNam /
   tadetasmin svapadagaṇena kiyatyapyarthe paryavasite	tat etasmin sva pada gaNena kiyati api arTe paryavasite
   karaṇopakāralakṣaṇakāryāntarāpekṣāyāṃ 'samidho yajati'	karaNa upakAra lakzaNa kArya antara apekzAyAm asamiDaH yajati a
   ityādivākyāntarasaṃbandhaḥ /	ityAdi vAkya antara saMbanDaH /
   samidādibhāvanā hi svavidhyupahitāḥ puruṣe hitaṃ bhāvyapekṣamāṇā	samiD Adi BAvanAH hi sva viDi upahitAH puruze hitam BAvi apekzamANA
   viśvajitryāyena vānuṣaṅgato vārthavādato vā phalāntarāpratilambhena	viSva jitryAyena vA anuzaFgataH vA arTa vAdataH vA Pala antara apratilamBena
   darśapūrṇamāsabhāvanāṃ nirvārayitumīśate /	darSa pUrNamAsa BAvanAm nirvArayitum ISate /
   tasmāttadakāṅkṣāyāmupanipatitānyetāni vākyāni svakāryāpekṣāṇi	tasmAt tat akAFkzAyAm upanipatitAni etAni vAkyAni sva kArya apekzANi
   tadapekṣitakaraṇopakāralakṣaṇaṃ kāryamasādya nirvaṇvanti ca nirvārayanti	tad apekzita karaNa upakAra lakzaNam kAryam asAdya nirvaNvanti ca nirvArayanti
   ca pradhānam /	ca praDAnam /
   so 'yamanayornaṣṭāśvadagdharathavatsaṃyogaḥ /	saH ayam anayoH nazwa aSva dagDa raTa vat saMyogaH /
   tadevaṃ lakṣaṇayorvākyaprakaraṇayorvirodhodāharaṇaṃ sūktavākanigadaḥ /	tat evam lakzaNayoH vAkya prakaraNayoH viroDa udAharaNam sUktavAka nigadaH /
   tatra hi paurṇamāsīdevatā amāvasyādevatāḥ samāmnātāḥ /	tatra hi pOrNamAsI devatAH amAvasyA devatAH samAmnAtAH /
   taśca na mitha ekavākyatāṃ gantumarhantīti liṅgena	taH ca na miTas eka vAkyatAm gantum arhanti iti liFgena
   paurṇamāsīyāgādindrāgnīśabda utkraṣṭavyaḥ amāvāsyāyāṃ ca	pOrNamAsI yAgAt indra agnI SabdaH utkrazwavyaH amAvAsyAyAm ca
   samavetārtatvātprayoktavyaḥ /	samaveta Arta tvAt prayoktavyaH /
   athedānīṃ saṃdihyate kiṃ yadindrāgnipadaikavākyatayā pratīyate	aTa idAnIm saMdihyate kim yat indra agni pada eka vAkya tayA pratIyate
   'avivṛdhethāṃ maho jyāyo 'kātām' iti tannotākraṣṭavyamutendrāgniśabdābhyāṃ	aavivRDeTAm mahaH jyAyaH akAtAm a iti tat notA krazwavyamuta indra agni SabdAByAm
   sahotkraṣṭavyamiti /	saha utkrazwavyam iti /
   tatra yadi prakaraṇaṃ balīyastato 'panītadevatāko 'pi śeṣaḥ prayoktavyo	tatra yadi prakaraNam balIyaH tatas apanIta devatAkaH api SezaH prayoktavyaH 
   'tha vākyaṃ tato tatra devatāśabdastatraiva prayoktavyaḥ /	aTa vAkyam tatas tatra devatA SabdaH tatra eva prayoktavyaH /
   kiṃ tāvatprāptamapanītadevatāko 'pi śeṣaḥ prayoktavyaḥ	kim tAvat prAptam apanIta devatAkaH api SezaH prayoktavyaH
   prakaraṇasyaivāṅgasaṃbandhapratipādakatvāt /	prakaraNasya eva aFga saMbanDa pratipAdaka tvAt /
   phalavatī hi bāvanā pradhānetikartavyatātvamāpādayati /	PalavatI hi bAvanA praDAna itikartavyatA tvam ApAdayati /
   tadupajīvanena śrutyādīnāṃ viśeṣasaṃbandhāpādakatvāt /	tat upajIvanena Sruti AdInAm viSeza saMbanDa ApAdaka tvAt /
   ataḥ pradhānabhāvanāvacanalakṣaṇaprakaraṇavirodhe tadupajīvivākyaṃ	atas praDAna BAvanA vacana lakzaNa prakaraNa viroDe tad upajIvi vAkyam
   bādhyata iti prāptam /	bADyate iti prAptam /
   evaṃ prāpta ucyate bhavedetadevaṃ yadi viniyojyasvarūpasāmarthyamanapekṣya	evam prAptaH ucyate  Bavet etat evam yadi viniyojya svarUpa sAmarTyam anapekzya
   prakaramaṃ viniyojayet /	prakaramam viniyojayet /
   api tu viniyogāya tadapekṣaye 'nyathā pūṣādyanumantraṇamantrasya	api tu viniyogAya tad apekzaye anyaTA pUzA Adi anumantraNa mantrasya
   dvadaśopasattāyāśca notkarṣaḥ syāt /	dvadaSa upasattAyAH ca na utkarzaH syAt /
   tadrūpālocanāyāṃ ca tadyadeva śīghraṃ pratīyate tattadvalavadviprakṛṣṭaṃ	tad rUpa AlocanAyAm ca tat yat eva SIGram pratIyate tad tad valavat viprakRzwam
   tu durbalam /	tu durbalam /
   tatra yadi tadrūpaṃ śrutyā liṅgena vākyena vānyatra viniyuktaṃ tataḥ	tatra yadi tad rUpam SrutyA liFgena vAkyena vA anyatra viniyuktam tatas 
   prakaramaṃ bhaṅktvotkṛṣyate, piriśiṣṭaistu prakaraṇasyetikartavyatāpekṣā	prakaramam BaFktvA utkRzyate, piriSizwEH tu prakaraNasya iti kartavya tApekzA
   puryate /	puryate /
   atha svasya śīghrapravṛttaṃ śrutyādi nāsti tataḥ prakaramaṃ viniyojakam /	aTa svasya SIGra pravRttam Sruti Adi na asti tatas prakaramam viniyojakam /
   yathā samidādeḥ /	yaTA samiD AdeH /
   tadiha prakaraṇādvākyasya śīghrapravṛttatvamutacyate /	tat iha prakaraNAt vAkyasya SIGra pravRtta tvam utacyate /
   prakaraṇe hi svārthapūrṇānāṃ vākyanāmupakāryopakārakākāṅkṣāmātraṃ dṛśyate	prakaraNe hi sva arTa pUrNAnAm vAkyanAm upakArya upakAraka AkAFkzA mAtram dRSyate
   vākye tu padānāṃ pratyakṣasaṃbandhaḥ /	vAkye tu padAnAm pratyakza saMbanDaH /
   tataśca saha prasthitayorvākyaprakaraṇayoryāvatprakaraṇenaikavākyatā	tatas ca saha prasTitayoH vAkya prakaraNayoH yAvat prakaraNena eka vAkyatA
   kalpyate tāvadvākyenābhidhānasāmarthyaṃ, yāvaditaratra vākyena sāmarthyaṃ	kalpyate tAvat vAkyena aBiDAna sAmarTyan, yAvat itaratra vAkyena sAmarTyam
   tāvaditaratra sāmarthyena śrutistāvadiha śrutyā viniyogastāvatā ca	tAvat itaratra sAmarTyena SrutiH tAvat iha SrutyA viniyogaH tAvatA ca
   vicchinnāyāmākāṅkṣāyāṃ śrutyanumāne vihate prakaraṇenāntarā kalpitaṃ	vicCinnAyAm AkAFkzAyAm Sruti anumAne vihate prakaraNena antarA kalpitam
   vilīyanta iti vākyabalīyastvāttaddevatāśeṣaṇāmapakarṣa eveti siddham //	vilIyante iti vAkya balIyaH tvAt tad devatA SezaNAm apakarzaH eva iti sidDam //
   kramaprakaraṇavirodhodāharaṇam /	krama prakaraNa viroDa udAharaNam /
   rājasūyaprakaraṇe pradhānasyaivābhiṣecanīyasya saṃnidhau	rAjasUya prakaraNe praDAnasya eva aBizecanIyasya saMniDO
   śaunaḥśepopākhyānādyāmnātaṃ, tatkiṃ samastasya	SOnaHSepa upAKyAna Adi AmnAtaM, tat kim samastasya
   rājasūyasyāṅgamutibhiṣecanīyasya /	rAjasUyasya aFga mutiBizecanIyasya /
   yadi prakaramaṃ balīyastataḥ samastasya rājasūyasya, atha kramastato	yadi prakaramam balIyaH tatas samastasya rAjasUyasya, aTa kramaH tatas 
   'bhiṣecanīyasyaiveti, kiṃ tāvatprāptam /	aBizecanIyasya eva iti, kim tAvat prAptam /
   nākāhkṣāmātraṃ hi saṃbandhahatuḥ /	na akAhkzA mAtram hi saMbanDa hatuH /
   gāmānaya prasādaṃ paśyeti gāmityasya kriyāmātrāpekṣiṇaḥ paśyetyanenāpi	gAm Anaya prasAdam paSya iti gAm ityasya kriyA mAtra apekziNaH paSya iti anena api
   saṃbandhasaṃbhavādvinigamanābhāvaprasaṅgāt /	saMbanDa saMBavAt vinigamana aBAva prasaFgAt /
   tasmātsaṃnidhānaṃ saṃbandhakāraṇam /	tasmAt saMniDAnam saMbanDa kAraNam /
   tathā cānayetyananaiva gāmityasya saṃbandho vinigamyate /	taTA ca anayA iti ananA eva gAm ityasya saMbanDaH vinigamyate /
   naca saṃnidhānamapi saṃbandhakāraṇam /	na ca saMniDAnam api saMbanDa kAraNam /
   ayameti putro rājñaḥ puruṣo 'pasāryatāmityatra rājña ityasya	ayam eti putraH rAjQaH puruzaH apasAryatAm iti atra rAjQaH iti asya
   putrapuruṣapadasaṃnidhānāviśeṣānmā bhūdavinigamanā /	putra puruza pada saMniDAna aviSezAt mA BUt avinigamanA /
   tasmādākāṅkṣā niścayaheturvaktavyā /	tasmAt AkAFkzA niScaya hetuH vaktavyA /
   atra putraśabdasya saṃbandhivacanatayā samutthitākāṅkṣasyāntike	atra putra Sabdasya saMbanDi vacana tayA samutTita AkAFkzasya antike
   yadupanipatitaṃ saṃbandhyantarākāṅkṣaṃ padaṃ tasya tenaivākāṅkṣāparipūrteḥ	yat upanipatitam saMbanDi antara AkAFkzam padam tasya tena eva AkAFkzA paripUrteH
   puruṣapadena puruṣarūpamātrābhidhāyinā svatantreṇaiva na saṃbandhaḥ kintu	puruza padena puruza rUpa mAtra aBiDAyinA svatantreNa eva na saMbanDaH kintu
   pareṇāpasāryatāmityanenāpasaraṇīyāpekṣeṇeti /	pareNa apasAryatAm iti anena apasaraNIya apekzeNa iti /
   satyapi saṃnidhāne ākāṅkṣābhāvādasaṃbandhaḥ /	sati api saMniDAne AkAFkzA BAvAt asaMbanDaH /
   tathā cābhāṇakaḥ 'taptaṃ taptena saṃbadhyate' iti /	taTA ca ABANakaH  ataptam taptena saMbaDyate a iti /
   tathā cākāṅkṣitamapi na yāvatsaṃnidhāpyate tāvanna saṃbadhyate /	taTA ca AkAFkzitam api na yAvat saMniDApyate tAvat na saMbaDyate /
   tathā saṃnihitamapi yāvannākāṅkṣyate na tāvatsaṃbadhyata iti dvayoḥ	taTA saMnihitam api yAvat na AkAFkzyate na tAvat saMbaDyate iti dvayoH
   saṃbandhaṃ prati samānabalatvātkramaprakaraṇayoḥ samuccayāsaṃbhavācca	saMbanDam prati samAna bala tvAt krama prakaraNayoH samuccaya asaMBavAt ca
   vikalpena rājasūyābhiṣecanīyayorviniyogaḥ śaunaḥśepopākhyānādīnāmiti	vikalpena rAjasUya aBizecanIyayoH viniyogaH SOnaHSepa upAKyAna AdInAm iti
   prāptam /	prAptam /
   evaṃ prāpta ucyate rājasūyake kathaṃbhāvāpekṣā hi pavitrādārabhya	evam prAptaH ucyate rAjasUyake kaTaMBAva apekzA hi pavitrAt AraBya
   kṣatrasya dhṛtiṃ yāvadanuvartate /	kzatrasya DRtim yAvat anuvartate /
   tathāca 'avicchinne kathaṃbhāve yatpradhānasya paṭhyate /	taTA ca  aavicCinne kaTaMBAve yat praDAnasya paWyate /
   anirjñātaphalaṃ karma tasya prakaraṇāṅgatā ' iti nyāyādrājasūyāṅgatā	anirjQAta Palam karma tasya prakaraNa aFgatA a iti nyAyAt rAjasUya aFga tA
   śaunaḥśopopākhyānādīnām /	SOnaHSopa upAKyAna AdInAm /
   abhiṣecanīyasya tu svavākyopāttapadārthanirākāṅkṣasya	aBizecanIyasya tu sva vAkya upAtta padArTa nirAkAFkzasya
   saṃnidhipāṭhenākāṅkṣotthāpanīyā yāvattāvatsiddhākāṅkṣeṇa	saMniDi pAWena AkAFkza utTApanIyA yAvat tAvat sidDa AkAFkzeNa
   rājasūyenaikavākyatā kalpyate /	rAjasUyena eka vAkyatA kalpyate /
   yāvaccābhiṣecanīyaikavākyatayā liṅgaṃ kalpyate tāvatkḷptaliṅgaṃ viniyokrīṃ	yAvat ca aBizecanIya eka vAkya tayA liFgam kalpyate tAvat k?pta liFgam viniyokrIm
   śrutiṃ kalpyati yāvadvākyakalpitena liṅgena śrutiritaratra kalpte	Srutim kalpyati yAvat vAkya kalpitena liFgena SrutiH itaratra kalpte
   tāvatkḷptayā śrutyā viniyoge sati prakaraṇapāṭhopapattau	tAvat k?ptayA SrutyA viniyoge sati prakaraNa pAWa upapattO
   saṃnidhānaparikalpitamantarā vilīyate /	saMniDAna parikalpitam antarA vilIyate /
   pramāṇābhāve 'pratibhatvāt /	pramANa aBAve apratiBa tvAt /
   prakaraṇinaśca rājasūyasya sa4vadā buddhisāṃniśyena	prakaraNinaH ca rAjasUyasya sa4vadA budDi sAMniSyena
   tatsaṃnidherakalpanīyatvāt /	tad saMniDerakalpanIya tvAt /
   tasmātprakaraṇavirodhe kramasya bādha eva naca vikalpo durbalatvāditi	tasmAt prakaraNa viroDe kramasya bADaH eva na ca vikalpaH durbala tvAt iti
   siddham //	sidDam //
   kramasamākhyayorvirodhodāharaṇam pauroḍāśika iti samākhyāte kāṇḍe	krama samAKyayoH viroDa udAharaNam  pOroxASikaH iti samAKyAte kANxe
   sānnāṭyakrame ca śundhadhvaṃ daivyāya karmaṇa iti śundhanārtho mantraḥ	sAnnAwya krame ca SunDaDvam dEvyAya karmaNaH iti SunDana arTaH mantraH
   samāmnātaḥ, tatra saṃdihyate kiṃ samākhyānasya balīyastvātpuroḍāśapātrāṇāṃ	samAmnAtaH, tatra saMdihyate kim samAKyAnasya balIyaH tvAt puroxASa pAtrANAm
   śundhena viniyoktavyaḥ, āho sānnāṭyapātrāṇāṃ śundhena kramo balīyāniti /	SunDena viniyoktavyaH, Aho sAnnAwya pAtrANAm SunDena kramaH balIyAn iti /
   kintāvatprāptam /	kintA vat prAptam /
   samākhyānāṃ balīya iti pauroḍāśikaśabdena hi puroḍāśasaṃbandhīnītyucyante	samAKyAnAm balIyaH iti pOroxASika Sabdena hi puroxASa saMbanDIni iti ucyante
   tānyadhikṛtya pravṛttaṃ kāṇḍaṃ pauroḍāśikam /	tAni aDikRtya pravRttam kANxam pOroxASikam /
   tataśca yāvatkrameṇa prakaraṇādyanumānaparamparayā saṃbandhaḥ	tatas ca yAvat krameNa prakaraNa Adi anumAna paramparayA saMbanDaH
   pratipādanīyaḥ yāvatsamākhyayā śrutyaiva sākṣādeva sa pratipādita iti	pratipAdanIyaH yAvat samAKyayA SrutyA eva sAkzAt eva sa pratipAditaH iti
   arthaviprakarṣeṇa kramātsamākhyaiva balīyasīti puroḍāśapātraśundhena	arTa viprakarzeNa kramAt samAKyA eva balIyasi iti puroxASa pAtra SunDena
   mantraḥ prayoktavyaḥ na sānnāṭyapātraśundhana iti prāptam /	mantraH prayoktavyaH na sAnnAwya pAtra SunDanaH iti prAptam /
   evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate samākhyānātkramo balavānarthaviprakarṣāditi /	evam prApte aBiDIyate  samAKyAnAt kramaH balavAn arTa viprakarzAt iti /
   tathāhi samākhyā na tāvatsaṃbandhasya vācikā kintu pauroḍāśaviśiṣṭaṃ	taTA hi samAKyA na tAvat saMbanDasya vAcikA kintu pOroxASa viSizwam
   kāṇḍamāha /	kANxam Aha /
   tadviśiṣṭatvānyathānupapattyā tava saṃbandhaḥ kāṇḍasyānumīyate na tu	tad viSizwa tvAni aTa anupapattyA tava saMbanDaH kANxasya anumIyate na tu
   sākṣānmantrabedasya /	sAkzAt mantra bedasya /
   taddhāreṇa ca tanmadhyapātino mantrabedasyāpi tadanumānam /	tad DAreNa ca tad maDya pAtinaH mantra bedasya api tad anumAnam /
   na cāsau saṃbandho 'pi śrutyaiva śeṣaśeṣibhāvaḥ pratīyate /	na ca asO saMbanDaH api SrutyA eva Seza Sezi BAvaH pratIyate /
   api tu saṃbandhamātram /	api tu saMbanDa mAtram /
   tasmācchatisādṛśyamasya dūrāpetamiti krameṇa nāsya spardhocitā /	tasmAt Sati sAdRSyam asya dUra apetam iti krameNa na asya sparDA ucitA /
   tatrāpi ca sāmānyato darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇāpāditaidamarthyasya	tatra api ca sAmAnyatas darSa pUrNamAsa prakaraNa ApAdi tA EdamarTyasya
   śaunaḥśepopākhyānādivaccārādupakārakatayā prakṛtamātrasaṃbandhānupapattiḥ	SOnaHSepa upAKyAna Adi vat cArAt upakAraka tayA prakRta mAtra saMbanDa anupapattiH
   mantrasya prayogasamavetārthasmāraṇena sāmavāyikāṅgatvāt /	mantrasya prayoga samaveta arTa smAraNena sAmavAyika aFga tvAt /
   tathāca yaṃ kañcitprakṛtaprayogagatamarthaṃ prakāśayato 'sya	taTA ca yam kaQcid prakRta prayoga gatam arTam prakASayataH asya
   prakaraṇāṅgatvamaviruddhamiti viśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ sānnāṭyakramaḥ sānnāṭyaṃ	prakaraNa aFga tvam avirudDam iti viSeza apekzAyAm sAnnAwya kramaH sAnnAwyam
   prati prakaraṇādyanumānadvāreṇa viniyogaṃ kalpayitumutsahate na tu	prati prakaraNa Adi anumAna dvAreNa viniyogam kalpayitum utsahate na tu
   samākhyānam /	samAKyAnam /
   tasya durbalatvāt /	tasya durbala tvAt /
   tathāhi samākhyā saṃbandhanibandhanā sati tatsidhyarthaṃ	taTA hi samAKyA saMbanDa nibanDanA sati tat siDi arTam
   saṃnidhimupakalpayati yāvattādvaidikena pratyakṣadṛṣṭena	saMniDim upakalpayati yAvat tAt vEdikena pratyakza dRzwena
   saṃnidhānenākāṅkṣā kalpyate /	saMniDAnena AkAFkzA kalpyate /
   yāvacca kḷptena saṃnidhānenākāṅkṣā kalpyate tāvaditaratra	yAvat ca k?ptena saMniDAnena AkAFkzA kalpyate tAvat itaratra
   kḷptayākāṅkṣayaikavākyatā tāvaditaratraikavākyatayā	k?ptayA kAFkzaya eka vAkya tA tAvat itaratra eka vAkya tayA
   kḷptayopakārasāmarthyam /	k?ptayA upakAra sAmarTyam /
   yāvaccātraikavākyatayopakārasāmarthyaṃ tāvaditaratra liṅgena viniyojikā	yAvat cAtra eka vAkya tayA upakAra sAmarTyam tAvat itaratra liFgena viniyojikA
   śrutiḥ /	SrutiH /
   yāvadatra liṅgena viniyojikā śrutistāvaditaratra kḷptayā śrutyā viniyoga	yAvat atra liFgena viniyojikA SrutiH tAvat itaratra k?ptayA SrutyA viniyoga
   iti tāvataiva prakaraṇapāṭhopapatteḥ sarvaṃ samākhyānakalpitaṃ	iti tAvatA eva prakaraNa pAWa upapatteH sarvam samAKyAna kalpitam
   vicchinnamūlatvāttūyamānaśasyamiva nirbījaṃ bhavati /	vicCinna mUla tvAt tUyamAna Sasyam iva nirbIjam Bavati /
   puroḍāśābhidhāyakramantrābāhulyātkāṇḍasya pauroḍāśikasamākhyeti mantavyam	puroxASa aBiDAyakramantrA bAhulyAt kANxasya pOroxASika samAKyA iti mantavyam
   'ekadvitricatuṣpañcavastvantarayakāritam /	aeka dvi tri catuzpaQca vastu antaraya kAritam /
   śrutyarthaṃ prati vaiṣamyaṃ liṅgādīnāṃ pratīyate //	Sruti arTam prati vEzamyam liFga AdInAm pratIyate //
   ' ityarthaviprakarṣa uktaḥ /	a iti arTa viprakarzaH uktaH /
   tatrāpi ca 'bādhikaiva śrutirnityaṃ samākhyā bādhyate sadā /	tatra api ca abADikA eva SrutiH nityam samAKyA bADyate sadA /
   madhyamānāṃ tu bādhyatvaṃ bādhakatvamapekṣayā //	maDyamAnAm tu bADya tvam bADaka tvam apekzayA //
   ' iti viśeṣa ukto vṛddhaiḥ /	a iti viSezaH uktaH vRdDEH /
   tadvayaṃ vistarādbibhyato 'pi prathamatantrānabhijñānukampayā nidhrā	tat vayam vistarAt biByataH api praTama tantra anaBijQA anukampayA niDrA
   vistare patitāḥ sma ityuparamyate /	vistare patitAH smaH iti uparamyate /
   tasmādyathānujñāpanānujñayoḥ prajñātakramayorupahūta upahūyasvetyevaṃ	tasmAt yaTA anujQApana anujQayoH prajQA takra mayoH upahUtaH upahUyasva iti evam
   mantravāmnātau deśasāmānyāttathaivāṅgatayā prāpnutaḥ /	mantra vAmnAtO deSa sAmAnyAt taTA eva aFga tayA prApnutaH /
   upahūta iti liṅgato 'nujñāmantro nānujñāpane upahūyasveti ca liṅgato	upahUtaH iti liFgataH anujQA mantraH na anujQApane upahUyasva iti ca liFgataH 
   'nujñāpano ca mantro nānujñāyām /	anujQApanaH ca mantraH na anujQAyAm /
   tadiha liṅgena kramaṃ bādhitvā viparītaṃ śeṣatvamāpādyate /	tat iha liFgena kramam bADitvA viparItam Seza tvam ApAdyate /
   yāvaddhi sthānena prakaraṇamutpādyaikavākyatvaṃ kalpyate tāvalliṅgena	yAvat hi sTAnena prakaraNam utpAdya eka vAkya tvam kalpyate tAvat liFgena
   śrutiṃ kalpayitvā sādhito viniyoga iti akalpitaliṅgaśruteḥ kramasya bādhaḥ	Srutim kalpayitvA sADitaH viniyogaH iti akalpita liFga SruteH kramasya bADaH
   tadvidihāpi viniyoge pratyekāntaritena liṅgena caturantaritasya	tat vid ihA api viniyoge pratyekAntaritena liFgena catur antaritasya
   vidyākramasya bādha iti /	vidyA kramasya bADaH iti /
   yadyapi prathamatantra evāyamartha upapāditastathāpi virodhe	yadi api praTama tantraH eva ayam arTaH upapAditaH taTA api viroDe
   tadupapādanamiha tvavirodhaḥ /	tad upapAdanam iha tu aviroDaH /
   nahi liṅgenābhicārikakarmasaṃbandhaḥ vidyāsaṃbandhena kramakṛtena	na hi liFgena ABicArika karma saMbanDaH vidyA saMbanDena krama kRtena
   virudhyate /	viruDyate /
   naca viniyuktaviniyogalakṣaṇo 'tra virodho bṛhaspatisave 'pi tatprasaṅgāt	na ca viniyukta viniyoga lakzaNaH atra viroDaH bRhaspati save api tad prasaFgAt 
   athaiva pratītivirodho naca vastuvirodhaḥ sa vidyāyāṃ viniyoge 'pi tulyaḥ	aTa eva pratIti viroDaH na ca vastu viroDaH sa vidyAyAm viniyoge api tulyaH
   tasmādavirodhādvedhāmantrasyopāsanāṅgatvamityastyabhyadhikā śahkā /	tasmAt aviroDAt veDAmantrasya upAsana aFga tvam iti asti aByaDikA SahkAH /
   tatrocyate 'nahi liṅgavirodhena kramabādho 'bhidhīyate /	tatra ucyate  anahi liFga viroDena krama bADaH aBiDIyate /
   kintu liṅgaparicchinne na kramaḥ kalpanākṣamaḥ' /	kintu liFga paricCinne na kramaH kalpanA kzamaH a /
   prakaraṇapāṭhopapattyā hi śrutiliṅgatvākyaprakaraṇairaviniyuktaḥ krameṇa	prakaraNa pAWA upapattyA hi Sruti liFga tvAkya prakaraNEH aviniyuktaH krameNa
   prakaraṇavākyaliṅgaśrutikalpanāprāmālikayā viniyujyate /	prakaraNa vAkya liFga Sruti kalpanA prAmAlikayA viniyujyate /
   tadā viniyuktasya prakaraṇapāṭhānarthakyaprasaṅgāt /	tadA viniyuktasya prakaraNa pAWA narTakya prasaFgAt /
   upapādite tu śrutyādibiḥ prakaraṇapāṭhe kṣīṇatvādarthāpatteḥ kramo na	upapAdite tu Sruti AdibiH prakaraNa pAWe kzINa tvAt arTApatteH kramaH na
   svocitāṃ pramāmutpādayitumarhati pramityābhāvāditi /	sva ucitAm pramAm utpAdayitum arhati pramitya aBAvAt iti /
   bṛhaspatisavasya tu ktvāśrutireva	bRhaspati savasya tu ktvA SrutiH eva
   dhātusaṃbandhādhikārakātsamānakartṛkatāyāṃ vihitā saṃyogapṛthaktvena	DAtu saMbanDa aDikArakAt samAna kartRka tAyAm vihitA saMyoga pRTaktvena
   viniyuktamapi viniyojayantī na śakyā śrutyantareṇa niroddhuṃ svapramāmiti	viniyuktam api viniyojayantI na SakyA Sruti antareNa nirodDum sva pramAm iti
   vaiṣamyam /	vEzamyam /
   tadidamuktam  # vājapeye tu bṛhaspatisavasya spaṣṭaṃ viniyogāntaramiti /	tat idam uktam # vAjapeye tu bRhaspati savasya spazwam viniyoga antaram iti /
   api caiko 'yaṃ pravargya iti.# /	api ca ekaH ayam pravargyaH iti.# /
   tulyabalatayā bṛhaspatisamasya tulyatāśaṅkāpākaraṇadvāreṇa samuccayo na tu	tulya bala tayA bRhaspati samasya tulya tA SaFkA pAkaraNa dvAreNa samuccayaH na tu
   pṛthaguktitayā parasparāpekṣatvāditi /	pRTak ukti tayA paraspara apekza tvAt iti /
   saṃnidhipāṭhamupapādayati  # araṇyādivacanavāditi.# //25 //	saMniDi pAWam upapAdayati # araNya Adi vacana vAditi.# //25 //
   # hānau tūpāyanaśabdaśeṣatvāt kuśācchandastutyupagānavattaduktam.# /	# hAnO tu upAyana Sabda Seza tvAt kuSAt Candastuti upagAna vat tat uktam .# /
   yatra hānopāyane śrūyete tatrāvivādaḥ saṃnipāte	yatra hAna upAyane SrUyete tatra avivAdaH saMnipAte
   yatrāpyupāyanamātraśravaṇaṃ tatrāpi nāntarīyakatayā hānamākṣiptamityasti	yatra api upAyana mAtra SravaNam tatra api na antarIyaka tayA hAnam Akziptam iti asti
   saṃnipātaḥ /	saMnipAtaH /
   yatra tu hānamātraṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ śrutaṃ na śrūyate upāyanaṃ, tatra	yatra tu hAna mAtram sukRta duzkRtayoH Srutam na SrUyate upAyanaM, tatra
   kimupāyanamupādānaṃ saṃnipatenna veti saṃśayaḥ /	kim upAyanam upAdAnam saMnipatet na vA iti saMSayaH /
   atra pūrvapakṣaṃ gṛhṇāti  # asaṃnipāta iti.# /	atra pUrva pakzam gRhNAti # asaMnipAtaH iti.# /
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   yathā śrūyamāṇamekatra śākhāyāmupāsanāṅgaṃ tasminnevopāsane śākhāntare	yaTA SrUyamANam ekatra SAKAyAm upAsana aFgam tasmin= eva upAsane SAKA antare
   'śrūyamāṇamupasaṃhriyate /	aSrUyamANam upasaMhriyate /
   evaṃ śākhāntaraśrutamupāyanamupasaṃhariṣyata ityata āha  #	evam SAKA antara Srutam upAyanam upasaMharizyate iti atas Aha #
   vidyāntaragocaratvācceti.# /	vidyA antara gocara tvAt ca iti.# /
   ekatve hyupāsanakarmaṇāmanyatra utānāmapyanyatra samavāyo ghaṭate /	eka tve hi upAsana karmaNAm anyatra utAnAm api anyatra samavAyaH Gawate /
   na tvihopāsanānāmekatvaṃ, saguṇanirguṇatvena bhedādityarthaḥ /	na tu iha upAsanAnAm eka tvan, sa guNa nirguNa tvena BedAt iti arTaH /
   nanu yathopāyanaṃ śrutaṃ hānamupasthāpayatyevaṃ hānamapi upāyanamityata	nanu yaTA upAyanam Srutam hAnam upasTApayati evam hAnam api upAyanam ityata
   āha  # api cātmakartṛkamiti.# /	Aha # api ca Atma kartRkam iti.# /
   grahaṇaṃ hi na svāmino 'pagamamantareṇa bhavatīti	grahaNam hi na svAminaH apagamam antareNa Bavati iti
   grahaṇādapagamasiddhiravaśyaṃbhāvinī /	grahaNAt apagama sidDiH avaSyaMBAvinI /
   apagamastvasatyapyanyena grahaṇe dṛṣṭo yathā prāyaścittenāpagatirenasa iti	apagamaH tu asati api anyena grahaNe dRzwaH yaTA prAyaScittena apagatiH enasaH iti
   kartṛbhedakathanaṃ tvetadupodbalārthaṃ na punaravaśyaṃbhāvasya	kartR Beda kaTanam tu etat upodbala arTam na punar avaSyaMBAvasya
   prayojakamupāyanenānaikāntyāditi /	prayojakam upAyanena anEkAntyAt iti /
   siddhāntamupakramate  # asyāṃ prāptāviti.# /	sidDAntam upakramate # asyAm prAptO= iti.# /
   ayamasyārthaḥ karmāntare vihitaṃ hi na karmāntara upasaṃhriyate	ayam asya arTaH karma antare vihitam hi na karma antaraH upasaMhriyate
   pramāṇābhāvāt /	pramANa aBAvAt /
   yatpunarna vidhīyate kintu stutyarthaṃ siddhatayā saṃkīrtyate tadasati	yat punar na viDIyate kintu stuti arTam sidDa tayA saMkIrtyate tat asati
   bādhake devatādhikaraṇanyāyena śabdataḥ pratīyamānaṃ parityaktumaśakyam /	bADake devatA aDikaraNa nyAyena SabdataH pratIyamAnam parityaktum aSakyam /
   tathāca vidhūtayoḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayornirguṇāyāṃ vidyāyāmaśvaromādivatkiṃ	taTA ca viDUtayoH sukRta duzkRtayoH nirguNAyAm vidyAyAm aSva roma Adi vat kim
   bhavatvityākāṅkṣāyāṃ na tāvatprāyaścitteneva tadvilayasaṃbhavastathā	Bavatu iti AkAFkzAyAm na tAvat prAyaScittena iva tad vilaya saMBavaH taTA
   satyaśvaromarāhudṛṣṭāntānupapatteḥ /	sati aSva romarAhu dRzwAnta anupapatteH /
   na jātvaśvaromarāhumukhayorvilayanamasti /	na jAtu aSva romarAhu muKayoH vilayanam asti /
   api tvaśvacandrābhyāṃ vibhāgaḥ /	api tu aSva candrAByAm viBAgaH /
   naca naṣṭe vidhūnanapramocanārthasaṃbhavaḥ /	na ca nazwe viDUnana pramocana arTa saMBavaH /
   tasmādarthavādasyāpekṣāyāṃ śabdasaṃnidhikṛto 'pi viśeṣa upāyanaṃ buddhau	tasmAt arTa vAdasya apekzAyAm Sabda saMniDi kRtaH api viSezaH upAyanam budDO
   saṃnidhāpayituṃ śakrotyapekṣāṃ pūrayitumiti /	saMniDApayitum Sakroti apekzAm pUrayitum iti /
   nirguṇāpi vidyā hānopāyanābhyāṃ stotavyā /	nirguNA api vidyA hAna upAyanAByAm stotavyAH /
   stutiprakarṣastu prayojanaṃ na pramāṇam /	stuti prakarzaH tu prayojanam na pramANam /
   aprakarṣe 'pi stutyupapatteḥ /	aprakarze api stuti upapatteH /
   na cārthavādāntarāpekṣārthavādāntarāṇāṃ na dṛṣṭā /	na ca arTa vAda antara apekzA arTa vAda antarANAm na dRzwAH /
   naca tairna pūraṇamityāha  # prasiddhā ceti /	na ca tEH na pUraNamiti Aha # prasidDA ca iti /
   vidyāstutyarthatvāccāsyopāyanavādasyeti.# /	vidyA stuti arTa tvAt ca asya upAyana vAdasya iti.# /
   yadyapyanyadīye api sukṛtaduṣkṛte anyasya phalaṃ prayacchataḥ, yathā	yadi api anyadIye api sukRta duzkRte anyasya Palam prayacCataH, yaTA
   putrasya śrāddhakarma pitustṛptiṃ yathā ca piturvaiśvānarīyeṣṭiḥ putrasya	putrasya SrAdDa karma pituH tRptim yaTA ca pituH vESvAnarIya izwiH putrasya
   nāryāśca surāpānaṃ bharturnarakam /	nAryAH ca surA pAnam BartuH narakam /
   tathāpyanyadīye api sukṛtaduṣkṛte sākṣādanyasminna saṃbhavata ityāśayena	taTA api anyadIye api sukRta duzkRte sAkzAt anyasmin na saMBavate iti ASayena
   śaṅkā /	SaFkA /
   phalataḥ prāptyā stutiriti parihāraḥ /	PalataH prAptyA stutiH iti parihAraH /
   # guṇopasaṃhāravivakṣāyā.#mityapi na svarūpataḥ	# guNa upasaMhAra vivakzAyA.#m iti api na svarUpataH
   sukṛtaduṣkṛtasaṃcārābhiprāyam /	sukRta duzkRta saMcAra aBiprAyam /
   nanu vidyāguṇopasaṃhārādhikāre ko 'yamakāṇḍe stutyarthavicāra	nanu vidyA guNa upasaMhAra aDikAre kaH ayam akANxe stuti arTa vicAra
   itiśaṅkāmupasaṃhārannapākaroti  # tasmādguṇopasaṃhāravicāraprasaṅgeneti.#	itiSaFkAm upasaMhAran= apAka roti # tasmAt guNa upasaMhAra vicAra prasaFgena iti.#
   vidyāguṇopasaṃhāraprasaṅgataḥ stutiguṇopasaṃhāro vicāritaḥ /	vidyA guNa upasaMhAra prasaFgataH stuti guNa upasaMhAraH vicAritaH /
   prayojanaṃ copāsake sauhārdamācaritavyaṃ na svasauhārdamiti chanda	prayojanam ca upAsake sOhArdam Acaritavyam na sva sOhArdam iti Canda
   evācchanda ācchādanādācchabdo bhavati /	eva AcCandaH AcCAdana AdAt SabdaH Bavati /
   # yathaiva cāviśeṣopagānamiti.# /	# yaTA eva ca aviSeza upagAnam iti.# /
   ṛtvija upagāyantītyaviśeṣeṇopagānamṛtvijām /	RtvijaH upagAyanti iti aviSezeNa upagAnam RtvijAm /
   bhāllavinastu viśeṣeṇa nādhvaryupagāyatīti /	BAllavinaH tu viSezeNa na aDvarI upagAyati iti /
   tadetasmādbhāllavināṃ vākyamṛtvija upagāyantītyetaccheṣaṃ vijñāyate /	tat etasmAt BAllavinAm vAkyam RtvijaH upagAyanti iti etat Sezam vijQAyate /
   etaduktaṃ bhavati adhvaryuvarjitā ṛtvija upagāyantīti /	etat uktam Bavati  aDvaryu varjitAH RtvijaH upagAyanti iti /
   kasmātpunarevaṃ vyākhyāyate /	kasmAt punar evam vyAKyAyate /
   nanu svatantrāṇyeva santu vākyānītyata āha  # śrutyantarakṛtamiti.# /	nanu svatantrANi eva santu vAkyAni iti atas Aha # Sruti antara kRtam iti.# /
   aṣṭadoṣavikalpaprasaṅgabhayena vākyāntarasya vākyāntaraśeṣatvamatrabhavato	azwa doza vikalpa prasaFga Bayena vAkya antarasya vAkya antara Seza tvam atraBavataH 
   jaiminerapi saṃmatamityāha  # taduktaṃ dvādaśalakṣaṇyām.# /	jEmineH api saMmata m iti Aha # tat uktam dvAdaSa lakzaNyAm.# /
   'api tu vākyaśeṣaḥ syādanyāṭyatvādvikalpasya vidhīnāmekadeśaḥ syāt'	aapi tu vAkya SezaH syAt anyAwya tvAt vikalpasya viDInAm eka deSaH syAt a
   ityetadeva sūtramarthadvāreṇa paṭhati  # api tu	iti etat eva sUtram arTa dvAreNa paWati # api tu
   vākyaśeṣatvāditaraparyudāsaḥ syātpratiṣedhe vikalpaḥ.#syātsa cānyāṭya iti	vAkya Seza tvAt itara paryudAsaH syAt pratizeDe vikalpaH.#syAt sa ca anyAwyaH iti
   śeṣaḥ /	SezaH /
   evaṃ kila śrūyate 'eṣa vai saptadaśaḥ prajāpatiryajñe yajñe 'nvāyatta' iti	evam kila SrUyate  aeza vE saptadaSaH prajApatiH yajQe yajQe anvAyatta a iti
   tato nāyuyājeṣu yeyajāmahaṃ karotīti /	tatas nAyuyAjezu yeya jAm aham karoti iti /
   tadatrānārabhya kañcidyajñaṃ yajñeṣu yeyajāmahakaraṇamupadiṣṭam /	tat atra anAraBya kaQcid yajQam yajQezu yeyajAmaha karaNam upadizwam /
   tadupadiśya cāmnātaṃ nānuyājeṣviti /	tat upadiSya ca AmnAtam na anuyAjezu iti /
   tatra saṃśayaḥ kiṃ vidhipratiṣedhayorvikalpa uta paryudāso	tatra saMSayaH kim viDi pratizeDayoH vikalpaH uta paryudAsaH 
   'nuyājavarjiteṣu yeyajāmahaḥ kartavya iti /	anuyAja varjitezu yeya jAm ahaH kartavyaH iti /
   mā bhūdarthaprāptasya śāstrīyeṇa niṣedhe vikalpaḥ /	mA BUt arTa prAptasya SAstrIyeNa nizeDe vikalpaH /
   dṛṣṭaṃ hi tādātvikīmasya sundaratāṃ gamayati nāyatau doṣavattāṃ niṣedhati	dRzwam hi tAdAtvikImasya sundara tAm gamayati na AyatO dozavattAm nizeDati
   tasya tatraudāsīnyāt /	tasya tatra OdAsInyAt /
   niṣedhaśāstraṃ tu tādātvikaṃ saundaryamabādhamānameva pravṛttyunmukhaṃ	nizeDa SAstram tu tAdAtvikam sOndaryam abADamAnam eva pravRtti unmuKam
   naraṃ nivārayadāyatyāmasya duḥkhaphalatvamavagamayati /	naram nivArayat Ayati Amasya duHKa Pala tvam avagamayati /
   yathāha 'akartavyo duḥkhaphalaḥ' iti /	yaTA aha  aakartavyaH duHKa PalaHa iti /
   tato gārataḥ pravṛttamapyāyatyāṃ duḥkhato vibhyataṃ puruṣaṃ śaknoti	tatas gArataH pravRttam api AyatyAm duHKataH viByatam puruzam Saknoti
   nivārayitumiti balīyayān śāstrīyaḥ pratiṣedho gārataḥ pravṛtteriti na tayā	nivArayitum iti balIyayAn SAstrIyaH pratizeDaH gArataH pravRtteH iti na tayA
   vikalpamarhati /	vikalpam arhati /
   śāstrīyau tu vidhiniṣedhau tulyabalatayā ṣoḍaśigrahaṇavadvakalpyete /	SAstrIyO tu viDi nizeDO tulya balatayA zoxaSi grahaNa vat vakalpyete /
   tatra hi vidhidarśanātpradhānasyopakārabhūyastvaṃ kalpyate /	tatra hi viDi darSanAt praDAnasya upakAra BUyaH tvam kalpyate /
   niṣedhadarśanācca vaiguṇye 'pi phalasiddhiravagamyate /	nizeDa darSanAt ca vEguNye api Pala sidDiH avagamyate /
   tathāha 'arthaprāptavaditi cenna tulyatvādubhayaṃ śabdalakṣaṇaṃ' iti /	taTA aha  aarTa prApta vat iti ced na tulya tvAt uBayam Sabda lakzaNama iti /
   naca vācyaṃ yāvadyajatiṣu yeyajāmahakaraṇaṃ	na ca vAcyam yAvat yajatizu yeyajAmaha karaNam
   yāvadyajatisāmānyadvāreṇānuyājaṃ yajativiśeṣamupasarpati	yAvat yajati sAmAnya dvAreNa anuyAjam yajati viSezam upasarpati
   tāvadanuyājagatena niṣedhena tanniṣiddhamiti śīghrapravṛtteḥ	tAvat anuyAja gatena nizeDena tat nizidDam iti SIGra pravRtteH
   sāmānyaśāstradviśeṣaniṣedho balavāniti /	sAmAnya SAstra dviSeza nizeDaH balavAn iti /
   yato bhavatvevaṃvidhiṣu brāhmaṇebhyo dadhi dīyatāṃ takraṃ kauṇḍinyāyeti /	yatas Bavatu evaMviDizu brAhmaNeByaH daDi dIyatAm takram kONxinyAya iti /
   tatra takradhaprāptyai tadvidhimapekṣate pravartitumiha tu	tatra takraDa prAptyE tad viDim apekzate pravartitum iha tu
   prāptapūrvakatvāpratiṣedhasya yeyajāmahasya cānyato 'prāptestanniṣedhena	prApta pUrvaka tva apratizeDasya yeyajAmahasya ca anyatas aprApteH tad nizeDena
   niṣedhaprāptyai tadvidhirapekṣaṇīyaḥ /	nizeDa prAptyE tad viDiH apekzaNIyaH /
   naca sāpekṣatayā niṣedhādvidhireva balīyānityatulyaśiṣṭatayā na vikalpaḥ	na ca sa apekza tayA nizeDAt viDiH eva balIya anitya tulya Sizwa tayA na vikalpaH
   kintu niṣedhasyaiva bādhanamiti sāṃprataṃ, tathā sati niṣedhaśāstraṃ	kintu nizeDasya eva bADanam iti sAMprataM, taTA sati nizeDa SAstram
   pramattagītaṃ syāt /	pramatta gItam syAt /
   naca yadyuktaṃ tulyaṃ hi sāṃpradāyikam /	na ca yadi uktam tulyam hi sAMpradAyikam /
   naca na tau paśau karotītivadarthavādatā /	na ca na tO paSO karoti iti vat arTa vAda tA /
   asamevatārthatvāt /	asamevatA arTa tvAt /
   paśau hi nājyabhāgau sta ityupapadyate /	paSO hi na Ajya BAgO staH iti upapadyate /
   na cātra tathā yeyajāmahābhāvaḥ, yajatiṣu yeyajāmahavidhānāt /	na ca atra taTA yeyajAmahABAvaH, yajatizu yeyajAmaha viDAnAt /
   anuyājānāṃ ca tadbhāvāt /	anuyAjAnAm ca tad BAvAt /
   naca paryudāsastadānanuyājeṣviti, kātyāyanamatena niyamaprasakteḥ /	na ca paryudAsaH tadA ananuyAjezu iti, kAtyAyana matena niyama prasakteH /
   tasmādvihitapratiṣiddhatayā vikalpa iti prāptam /	tasmAt vihita pratizidDa tayA vikalpaH iti prAptam /
   evaṃ prāpta ucyate uktaṃ ṣoḍaśigrahaṇayorvikalpa iti /	evam prAptaH ucyate uktam zoxaSigrahaNayoH vikalpaH iti /
   nahi tatrānyā gatirasti /	na hi tatra anyA gatiH asti /
   tenādoṣaduṣṭo 'pi vikalpa āsthīyate pakṣe 'pi prāmāṇyānmā	tena adoza duzwaH api vikalpaH AsTIyate pakze api prAmANyAt mA
   bhūtpramatagītateti /	BUt pramata gIta tA iti /
   iha tu paryudāsenāpyupapattau saṃbhavantyāmanyāṭyaṃ vikalpāśraṇamayuktam /	iha tu paryudAsena api upapattO saMBavanti Am anyAwyam vikalpa ASraNam ayuktam /
   evaṃ hi tadā nañaḥ saṃbandho 'nanuyājeṣu yajatiṣvanuyājavartiteṣu	evam hi tadA naQaH saMbanDaH ananuyAjezu yajatizu anuyAja vartitezu
   yeyajāmahaḥ kartavya iti /	yeya jAmahar kartavyaH iti /
   kimato yadyavam /	kim atas yat yavam /
   etadato bhavati nānuyājeṣvityetadvākyamaparipūrṇaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃ	etat atas Bavati na anuyAjezu iti etat vAkyam aparipUrNam sa AkAFkzam
   pūrvavākyaikadeśena saṃbhantasyate	pUrva vAkya eka deSena saMBantasyate
   yadetadyeyajāmahaṅkarotītyetannānuyājeṣu yāvaduktaṃ	yat etat yeya jAm ahaFkaroti iti etat na anuyAjezu yAvat uktam
   syādanuyājavarjitoṣviti tāvaduktaṃ bhavati nānuyājeṣviti /	syAt anuyAja varjita Uzu iti tAvat uktam Bavati na anuyAjezu iti /
   tathāca yajitaviśeṣaṇārthatvādananuyājavidhirevāyamiti pratiṣedhābhāvānna	taTA ca yajita viSezaNa arTa tvAt ananuyAja viDiH eva ayam iti pratizeDa aBAvAt na
   vikalpaḥ /	vikalpaH /
   na cābhiyuktatarapāṇinivirodhe kātyāyanasyāsadvāditvaṃ nityasamāsavādinaḥ	na ca aBiyuktatara pANi niviroDe kAtyAyanasya asat vAdi tvam nitya samAsa vAdinaH
   saṃbhavati /	saMBavati /
   sa hi vibhāṣādhikāre samāsaṃ śāsti /	sa hi viBAzA aDikAre samAsam SAsti /
   tasmādanuyājavarjiteṣu yeyajāmahavidhānamiti siddham /	tasmAt anuyAja varjitezu yeya jAmaha viDAnam iti sidDam /
   varṇakāntaramāha  # athavaitāsviti.# /	varNaka antaram Aha # aTavA etAsu iti.# /
   yathā hi sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoramūrtayoḥ kalpanaṃ nāñjasaṃ	yaTA hi sukRta duzkRtayoH amUrtayoH kalpanam na aQjasam
   sūrtyanuvidhāyitvātkampasya /	sUrti anuviDAyi tvAt kampasya /
   tathānyadīyayoranyatra saṃcāro 'pyanupapanno 'mūrtatvādeva /	taTA anyadIyayoH anyatra saMcAraH api anupapannaH amUrta tvAt eva /
   tasmādyatra vidhūnanamātraṃ śrutaṃ tatra kampanena varaṃ	tasmAt yatra viDUnana mAtram Srutam tatra kampanena varam
   svakāryarambhāccālanamātrameva lakṣyatāṃ na tu tato 'pagatyānyatra	sva kArya ramBAt cAlana mAtram eva lakzyatAm na tu tatas apagatya anyatra
   saṃcāraḥ kalpanāgauravaprasaṅgāt /	saMcAraH kalpanA gOrava prasaFgAt /
   tasmātsvakāryārambhāccālanaṃ vidhūnanamiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate yatra	tasmAt sva kArya AramBAt cAlanam viDUnanam iti prApte aBiDIyate yatra
   tāvadupāyanaśrutistatrāvaśyaṃ tyāgo vidhūnanaṃ vaktavyam /	tAvat upAyana SrutiH tatra avaSyam tyAgaH viDUnanam vaktavyam /
   kkacidapi codvidhūnanaṃ tyāge vartate tathā satyanyatrāpi tatraiva	kkacid api ca udviDUnanam tyAge vartate taTA sati anyatra api tatra eva
   vartitumarhati /	vartitum arhati /
   evaṃ hi na varteta yadi vidhūnanamiha mukhyaṃ labhyeta /	evam hi na varteta yadi viDUnanam iha muKyam laByeta /
   na caitadasti /	na ca etat asti /
   tatrāpi svakāryāccālanasya lakṣyamāṇatvāt /	tatra api sva kAryAt cAlanasya lakzyamANa tvAt /
   naca prāmāṇikaṃ kalpanāgauravaṃ lohagandhitāmācarati /	na ca prAmANikam kalpanA gOravam loha ganDi tAm Acarati /
   apicānekārthatvāddhātatūnāṃ tyāge 'pi vidhūyate mukhyageva bhaviṣyati /	apicA aneka arTa tvAt DAtatUnAm tyAge api viDUyate muKya geva Bavizyati /
   prācuryeṇa tyāge 'pi loke prayogadarśanāt /	prAcuryeNa tyAge api loke prayoga darSanAt /
   vinigamanahetorabhāvāt /	vinigamana hetoH aBAvAt /
   gaṇakārasya copalakṣaṇatvenāpyarthanirdeśasya tatra darśanāt /	gaNakArasya ca upalakzaNa tvena api arTa nirdeSasya tatra darSanAt /
   tasmāddhānārtha evātreti yuktam //26 //	tasmAt DAna arTaH eva atra iti yuktam //26 //
   # sāṃparāye tartavyābhāvāttathā hyanye.# /	# sAMparAye tartavya aBAvAt taTA hi anye.# /
   nanu pāṭhakramādardhapathe sukṛtaduṣkṛtataraṇe pratīyete /	nanu pAWa kramAt arDa paTe sukRta duzkRta taraNe pratIyete /
   vidyāsāmarthyācca prāgevāvagamyete /	vidyA sAmarTyAt ca prAk eva avagamyete /
   tathā śāṭhyāyanināṃ tāṇḍināṃ ca śruteḥ /	taTA SAWyAyaninAm tANxinAm ca SruteH /
   śrutyarthau ca pāṭhakramādbalīyāṃsau, 'agnihotraṃ juhoti yavāgūṃ pacati'	Sruti arTO ca pAWa kramAt balIyAMsO, aagnihotram juhoti yavAgUm pacati a
   ityatra yathā /	iti atra yaTA /
   tasmātpūrvapakṣābhāvādanārabhyametat /	tasmAt pUrva pakza aBAvAt anAraByam etat /
   atrocyate /	atra ucyate /
   naitatpāṭhakramamātramapi tu śrutistatsukṛtaduṣkṛte vidhūnuta iti /	na etat pAWa krama mAtram api tu SrutiH tad sukRta duzkRte viDUnutaH iti /
   taditi hi sarvanāma tasmādarthe sannihitaparāmarśakaṃ tasya hetubhāvamāha	tat iti hi sarvanAma tasmAt arTe sannihita parAmarSakam tasya hetu BAvam Aha
   sannihitaṃ ca yadanantaraṃ śrutam /	sannihitam ca yat anantaram Srutam /
   taccārdhapathavarti virajānadīmano 'bhigamanamityardhapatha eva	tat ca arDa paTa varti virajAnadI manaH aBigamanam iti arDa paTaH eva
   sukṛtaduṣkṛtatyāgaḥ /	sukRta duzkRta tyAgaH /
   naca śrutyantaravirodhaḥ /	na ca Sruti antara viroDaH /
   ardhapathe 'pi pāpavidhūnane brahmalokasaṃbhavātprākkālatopapatteḥ /	arDa paTe api pApa viDUnane brahma loka saMBavAt prAk kAlatA upapatteH /
   evaṃ śāṭhyāyanināmapyavirodhaḥ /	evam SAWyAyaninAm api aviroDaH /
   nahi tatra jīvanniti vā jīvata iti vā śrutam /	na hi tatra jIvan= iti vA jIvate iti vA Srutam /
   tathā cārdhapatha eva sukṛtaduṣkṛtavimokaḥ /	taTA ca arDa paTaH eva sukRta duzkRta vimokaH /
   evañca na paryaṅkavidyātastatprakṣaya iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /	evaQca na paryaFka vidyAtaH tad prakzayaH iti pUrvaH pakzaH /
   rāddhāntastu vidyāsāmarthyavidhūtakalmaṣasya jñānavata uttareṇa pathā	rAdDa antaH tu vidyA sAmarTya viDUta kalmazasya jQAnavataH uttareNa paTA
   gacchato brahmaprāptirna cāprakṣīṇakalmaṣasyottaramārgagamanaṃ saṃbhavati	gacCataH brahma prAptiH na ca aprakzINa kalmazasya uttara mArga gamanam saMBavati
   yathā yavāgūpākātprāgnāgnihotram /	yaTA yavAgU pAkAt prAgna agnihotram /
   yamaniyamādyanuṣṭhānasahitāyā vidyāyā uttareṇa mārgeṇa	yama niyama Adi anuzWAna sahitAyAH vidyAyAH uttareNa mArgeNa
   paryaṅkasthabrahmaprāptyupāyatvaśravaṇāt /	paryaFka sTa brahma prApti upAya tva SravaNAt /
   aprakṣīṇapāpmanaśca tadanupapatteḥ /	aprakzINa pApmanaH ca tad anupapatteH /
   vidyaiva tādṛśī kalmaṣaṃ kṣapayati kṣapitakalmaṣaṃ cottaramārgaṃ	vidyA eva tAdRSI kalmazam kzapayati kzapita kalmazam ca uttara mArgam
   prāpayatīti kathamardhapathe kalmaṣayaḥ /	prApayati iti kaTam arDa paTe kalmazayaH /
   tasmātpāṭhakramabādhenārthakramo 'nusartavyaḥ /	tasmAt pAWa krama bADena arTa kramaH anusartavyaH /
   nanu na pāṭhakramamātramatra, taditi sarvanāmaśrutyā	nanu na pAWa krama mAtram atra, tat iti sarvanAma SrutyA
   saṃnihitaparāmarśādityuktam /	saMnihita parAmarSAt iti uktam /
   tadayuktaṃ, buddhisaṃnidhānamātramatropayujyate nānyat, taccānantarasyeva	tat ayuktan, budDi saMniDAna mAtram atra upayujyate na anyat, tat ca anantarasya iva
   vidyāprakaraṇādvidyāyā apīti samānā śrutirubhayatrāpīti /	vidyA prakaraNAt vidyAyAH api iti samAnA SrutiH uBayatra api iti /
   arthapāṭhau pariśiṣyete tatra cārtho balīyāniti /	arTa pAWO pariSizyete tatra ca arTaH balIyAn iti /
   naca tāṇḍyādiśrutyavirodhaḥ pūrvapakṣe /	na ca tANxyAdi Srutya viroDaH pUrva pakze /
   aśva iva romāṇi vidhūyeti hi svatantrasya puruṣasya vyāpāraṃ brūte, naca	aSvaH iva romANi viDUya iti hi svatantrasya puruzasya vyApAram brUte, na ca
   paretasyāsti svātantryam, tasmāttadvirodhaḥ //27 //	paretasya asti svAtantryam, tasmAt tat viroDaH //27 //
   # chandata ubhayāvirodhāt.# /	# CandataH uBaya aviroDAt.# /
   kebhyaścitpadebhya idaṃ sūtram /	keByaH cit padeByaH idam sUtram /
   nanu yathā paretasyottareṇa pathā brahmaprāptirbhavatīti vidyāphalamevaṃ	nanu yaTA paretasya uttareNa paTA brahma prAptiH Bavati iti vidyA Palam evam
   tasyaivārdhapathe sukṛtaduṣkṛtahānirapi bhaviṣyatīti śaṅkāpadāni tebhya	tasya eva arDa paTe sukRta duzkRta hAniH api Bavizyati iti SaFkA padAni teBya
   uttaramidaṃ sūtram /	uttaram idam sUtram /
   yadvyācaṣṭe  # yadi ca dehādapasṛptasyeti.# /	yat vyAcazwe # yadi ca dehAt apasRptasya iti.# /
   vidyāphalamapi brahmaprāptirnāparetasya bhavitumarhati śaṅkāpadebhyaḥ /	vidyA Palam api brahma prAptiH na aparetasya Bavitum arhati SaFkA padeByaH /
   yathāhuḥ nājanitvā tatra gacchantīti /	yaTA AhuH na ajanitvA tatra gacCanti iti /
   sukṛtaduṣkṛtaprakṣayastu satyapi naraśarīre saṃbhavatīti samarthasya	sukRta duzkRta prakzayaH tu sati api nara SarIre saMBavati iti samarTasya
   hetoryamaniyamādisahitāyā vidyāyāḥ karyakṣayāyogādyukto jīvata eva	hetoH yama niyama Adi sahitAyAH vidyAyAH karya kzaya ayogAt i uktaH jIvate eva
   sukṛtaduṣkṛtakṣaya iti siddham /	sukRta duzkRta kzayaH iti sidDam /
   chandataḥ svacchandataḥ svecchayeti yāvat /	CandataH svacCandataH sva icCayA iti yAvat /
   svecchayānuṣṭhānaṃ yamaniyamādisahitāyā vidyāyāḥ /	sva icCayA anuzWAnam yama niyama Adi sahitAyAH vidyAyAH /
   # tasya.#jīvataḥ puruṣasya syānna mṛtasya /	# tasya.#jIvataH puruzasya syAt na mRtasya /
   tatpūrvakaṃ casukṛtaduṣkṛtahānaṃ syājjīvata eva /	tad pUrvakam casukRta duzkRta hAnam syAt jIvataH eva /
   samarthasya kṣepāyogāt /	samarTasya kzepA yogAt /
   evaṃ kāraṇānantaraṃ kāryotpāde sati	evam kAraNa anantaram kArya utpAde sati
   nimittanaimittakayostadbhāvasyopapattistāṇḍiśāṭhyāyaniśrutyośca	nimitta nEmittakayoH tad BAvasya upapattiH tANxi SAWyAya niSrutyoH ca
   saṃgatiritarathā svātantryābhāvenāsaṃgatiruktā syāt /	saMgatiH itaraTA svAtantrya aBAvena asaMgatiH uktA syAt /
   tadanenobhayavirodho vyākhyataḥ /	tat anena uBaya viroDaH vyAKyataH /
   ye tu parasya viduṣaḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛte kathaṃ paratra saṃkrāmata iti	ye tu parasya viduzaH sukRta duzkRte kaTam paratra saMkrAmataH iti
   śaṅkottaratayā sūtraṃ vyācakhyuḥ /	SaFkottara tayA sUtram vyAcaKyuH /
   chandataḥ saṃkalpata iti śrutismṛtyoravirodhādevaḥ /	CandataH saMkalpate iti Sruti smRtyoraviroDAt evaH /
   na tvatrāgamagamyer'the svātantryeṇa yuktirniveśanīyete /	na tu atra Agama gamyer aTe svAtantryeNa yuktiH niveSanIyete /
   teṣāmadhikaraṇaśarīrānupraveśe	tezAm aDikaraNa SarIra anupraveSe
   saṃbhavatyarthāntaropavarṇanamasaṅgatameveti //28 //	saMBavati arTa antara upavarNa nama saFgatam eva iti //28 //
   # gaterarthavattvamubhayathānyathā hi virodhaḥ.# /	# gateH arTavat tvam uBayaTA anyaTA hi viroDaH.# /
   yathā hānisaṃnidhāvupāyanamanyatra śrutamiti, tatrāpi kevalā hāniḥ śrūyate	yaTA hAni saMniDO= upAyanam anyatra Srutam iti, tatra api kevalA hAniH SrUyate
   tatrāpi upāyanamupasthāpayatyevaṃ tatsannidhāveva devayānaḥ panthāḥ śruta	tatra api upAyanam upasTApayati evam tad sanniDO= eva deva yAnaH panTAH Sruta
   iti yatrāpi sukṛtaduṣkṛtahāniḥ kevalā śrutā tatrāpi devayānaṃ	iti yatra api sukRta duzkRta hAniH kevalA SrutA tatra api deva yAnam
   panthānamupasthāpayitumarhati /	panTAnam upasTApayitum arhati /
   naca nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyamupaitītyanena virodhaḥ /	na ca niraQjanaH paramam sAmyam upEti iti anena viroDaH /
   devayānena pathā brahmalokaprāptau nirañjanasya paramasāmyopapatteḥ /	deva yAnena paTA brahma loka prAptO niraQjanasya parama sAmya upapatteH /
   tasmāddhānimātre devayānaḥ panthāḥ saṃbadhyata iti prāptam /	tasmAt hAni mAtre deva yAnaH panTAH saMbaDyate iti prAptam /
   evaṃ prāptam ucyate vidvān puṇyapāpe vidhūyanirañjanaḥ paramaṃ	evam prAptam ucyate  vidvAn puNya pApe viDUya niraQjanaH paramam
   sāmyamupaitīti hi viduṣo vidhūtapuṇyapāpasya vidyayā kṣemaprāptimāha /	sAmyam upEti iti hi viduzaH viDUta puNya pApasya vidyayA kzema prAptim Aha /
   bhramanibandhano 'kṣemo yāthātmyajñānalakṣaṇayā vidyāyā vinivartanīyaḥ /	Brama nibanDanaH akzemaH yATAtmya jQAna lakzaNayA vidyAyAH vinivartanIyaH /
   nāsau deśaviśeṣamapekṣate /	na asO deSa viSezam apekzate /
   nahi jātu rajjau sarpabhramanivṛttaye samutpannaṃ rajjutattavajñānaṃ	na hi jAtu rajjO sarpa Brama nivRttaye samutpannam rajju tattava jQAnam
   deśaviśeṣamapekṣate /	deSa viSezam apekzate /
   vidyotpādasyaiva svavirodhyavidyānivṛttirūpatvāt /	vidyA utpAdasya eva sva viroDi avidyA nivRtti rUpa tvAt /
   naca vidyotpādāyā brahmalokaprāptirapekṣaṇīyā /	na ca vidyA utpAdAyAH brahma loka prAptiH apekzaNIyAH /
   yamaniyamādiviśuddhasattvasyehaiva śravaṇādibhirvidyotpādāt /	yama niyama Adi viSudDa sattvasya iha eva SravaNa AdiBiH vidyA utpAdAt /
   yadi paramārabdhakāryakarmakṣapaṇāya śarīrapātāvadhyapekṣeti na	yadi parama ArabDa kArya karma kzapaNAya SarIra pAtO= aDi apekzA iti na
   devayānenāstīhārtha iti śrutidṛṣṭavirodhānnāpekṣitavya iti /	deva yAnena asti iha arTaH iti Sruti dRzwa viroDAt na apekzitavyaH iti /
   asti tu paryaṅkavidyāyāṃ tasmārtha ityuktaṃ dvitīyena sūtreṇeti /	asti tu paryaFka vidyAyAm tasma arTaH iti uktam dvitIyena sUtreNa iti /
   ye tu yadi puṇyamapi nivartate kimarthā tarhi gatarityāśaṅkya	ye tu yadi puNyam api nivartate kimarTA tarhi gatar iti ASaFkya
   sūtramavatārayanti /	sUtram avatArayanti /
   gaterarthavattvamubhayathā duṣkṛtanivṛttyā sukṛtanivṛttyā ca /	gateH arTavat tvam uBayaTA duzkRta nivRttyA su kRta nivRttyA ca /
   yadi punaḥ puṇyamanuvarteta brahmalokagatasyāpīha	yadi punar puNyam anuvarteta brahma loka gatasya api iha
   puṇyaphalopabhogāyavṛttiḥ syāt /	puNya Pala upaBogAya vRttiH syAt /
   tathā caitena pratipādyamānāgatyanāvṛttiśrutivirodhaḥ /	taTA ca etena pratipAdyamAna AgatyanAvRtti Sruti viroDaH /
   tasmādduṣkṛtasyeva sukṛtasyāpi prakṣaya iti taiḥ	tasmAt duzkRtasya iva sukRtasya api prakzayaH iti tEH
   punaranāśaṅkanīyamevāśaṅkitam /	punar anASaFkanIyam eva ASaFkitam /
   vidyākṣiptāyāṃ hi gatau keyamāśaṅkā yadi kṣīṇasukṛtaḥ kimarthamayaṃ yātīti	vidyA kziptAyAm hi gatO kA iyam ASaFkA yadi kzINa sukRtaH kimarTa mayam yAti iti
   nahyeṣā sukṛtanibandhanā gatirapi tu vidyānibandhanā /	na hi ezA su kRta nibanDanA gatiH api tu vidyA nibanDanA /
   tasmādvṛddhoktamevopavarṇanaṃ sādhviti //29 //	tasmAt vRdDa uktam eva upavarNanam sADu iti //29 //
   aniyamaḥ sarvāsāmavirodhaḥ śabdānumānābhyām /	aniyamaH sarvAsAm aviroDaH Sabda anumAnAByAm /
   prakaraṇaṃ hi dharmāṇāṃ niyāmakam /	prakaraNam hi DarmANAm niyAmakam /
   yadi tu tannādriyate tato darśapūrṇamāsajyotiṣṭomādidharmāḥ saṃkīryeran /	yadi tu tat na Adriyate tatas darSa pUrNamAsa jyotizwoma Adi DarmAH saMkIryeran /
   naca teṣāṃ vikṛtiṣu sauryādiṣu dvādaśāhādiṣu codakataḥ prāptiḥ /	na ca tezAm vikRtizu sOrya Adizu dvAdaSa aha Adizu ca udakataH prAptiH /
   sarvatraupadeśikatvāt /	sarvatra OpadeSika tvAt /
   naca darvihomasyāprakṛtivikārasyādharmakatvam /	na ca darvi homasya aprakRti vikArasya aDarmaka tvam /
   naca sarvadharmayuktaṃ karma kiñcidapi śakyamanuṣṭhātum /	na ca sarva Darma yuktam karma kiQcid api Sakyam anuzWAtum /
   na caivaṃ sati śrutyādoya'pi viniyojakāsteṣāmapi hi prakaraṇena	na ca evam sati Sruti Adoya api viniyojakAH tezAm api hi prakaraNena
   sāmānyasaṃbandhe sati viniyojakatvāt /	sAmAnya saMbanDe sati viniyojaka tvAt /
   yatrāpi vināprakaraṇaṃ śrutyādibhyo viniyogo 'vagamyate tatrāpi	yatra api vinA aprakaraNam Sruti AdiByaH viniyogaH avagamyate tatra api
   tannirvāhāya prakaraṇasyāvaśyaṃ kalpanīyatvāt /	tat nirvAhAya prakaraNasya avaSyam kalpanIya tvAt /
   tasmātprakaraṇaṃ viniyogāya tanniyamāya cāvaśyābhyupetavyamanyathā	tasmAt prakaraNam viniyogAya tat niyamAya ca avaSya aByupetavyam anyaTA
   śrutyadīnāmaprāmāṇyaprasakteḥ /	Sruti adIna Am aprAmANya prasakteH /
   tasmādyāsvevopāsanāsu devayānaḥ pitṛyāṇo vā panthā āmnātastāsveva na	tasmAt yAsu eva upAsanAsu deva yAnaH pitRyANaH vA panTAH AmnAtaH tAsu eva na
   tūpāsanāntareṣu tadanāmnānāt /	tu upAsana antarezu tad anAmnAnAt /
   naca 'ye ceme 'raṇye śraddhātapa ityupāsate' iti	na ca aye ca ime araNye SradDA AtapaH iti upAsate a iti
   sāmānyavacanātsarvavidyāsu tatpathaprāptiḥ /	sAmAnya vacanAt sarva vidyAsu tat paTa prAptiH /
   śraddhātapaḥparāyaṇānāmeva tatra tatpathaprāptiḥ śrūyate, na tu	SradDA tapaH parAyaNAnAm eva tatra tat paTa prAptiH SrUyate, na tu
   vidyāparāyaṇānām /	vidyA parAyaNAnAm /
   apicaivaṃ satyekasyāṃ vidyāyāṃ mārgopadeśaḥ sarvāsu vidyāsvityekatraiva	api cA evam sati ekasyAm vidyAyAm mArga upadeSaH sarvAsu vidyAsu iti ekatra eva
   mārgopadeśaḥ kartavyo na vidyāntare /	mArga upadeSaH kartavyaH na vidyA antare /
   vidyāntare ca śrūyate /	vidyA antare ca SrUyate /
   tasmānna sarvopāsanāsu pathiprāptiriti prāptam /	tasmAt na sarva upAsanAsu paTiprAptiH iti prAptam /
   evaṃ prāpte ucyate 'ye ceme 'raṇye śraddhātapa ityupāsate' iti na	evam prApte ucyate  aye ca ime araNye SradDA AtapaH iti upAsate a iti na
   śraddhātapomātrasya pathiprāptimāhāpi tu vidyayā tadārohāntītyatra	SradDA AtapaH mAtrasya paTi prAptim AhA api tu vidyayA tadA Aroha anti iti atra
   nāvidvāṃsastapasvina iti kevalasya tapasaḥ śraddhāyāśca	na avidvAMsaH tapasvinaH iti kevalasya tapasaH SradDAyAH ca
   tatprāptipratiṣedhādvidyāsahite śraddhātapasī tatprāpyupāyatayā vadan	tad prApti pratizeDAt vidyA sahite SradDA tapasI tad prApi upAya tayA vadan
   vidyāntarīlānāmapi pañcāgnividyāvidbhiḥ samānamārgatāṃ darśayati /	vidyA antarIlAnAm api paQca agni vidyA vidBiH samAna m Arga tAm darSayati /
   tathānyatrāpi pañcāgnividyādhikāre 'bhidhīyate 'ya evametādvidurye cāmī	taTA anyatra api paQca agni vidyA aDikAre aBiDIyate  ayaH evam etAt viduH ye ca AmI
   araṇye śraddhāṃ satyamupāsate' iti /	araNye SradDAm satyam upAsate a iti /
   satyaśabdasya brahmaṇyevānapekṣapravṛttitvāt /	satya Sabdasya brahmaNi eva anapekza pravRtti tvAt /
   tadeva hi satyamanyasya mithyātvena kathañcidāpekṣikasatyatvāt /	tat eva hi satyam anyasya miTyA tvena kaTaQcid Apekzika satya tvAt /
   pañcāgnividāṃ cetthaṃvittayaivopāttatvāt /	paQca agni vidAm ca itTaMvittayA eva upAtta tvAt /
   vidyāsāhacaryācca vidyāntaraparāyaṇānāmevedamupādānaṃ nyāṭyam /	vidyA sAhacaryAt ca vidyA antara parAyaNAnAm eva idam upAdAnam nyAwyam /
   mārgadvayabhraṣṭānāṃ cādhogatiśravaṇāt /	mArga dvaya BrazwAnAm ca aDas gati SravaNAt /
   tatrāpi ca yogyatayā devayānasyaivehādhvano 'bhisaṃbandhaḥ /	tatra api ca yogyatayA deva yAnasya eva iha aDvanaH aBisaMbanDaH /
   etaduktaṃ bhavati bhavetprakaraṇaṃ niyāmakaṃ yadyaniyamapratipādakaṃ	etat uktam Bavati Bavet prakaraNam niyAmakam yadi aniyama pratipAdakam
   vākyaṃ śrautaṃ smārtaṃ vā na syādasti tu tattasya ca prakaraṇādbalīyastvam	vAkyam SrOtam smArtam vA na syAt asti tu tat tasya ca prakaraNAt balIyaH tvam
   tasmādaniyamo vidyāntareṣvapi saguṇeṣu devayānaḥ panthā	tasmAt aniyamaH vidyA antarezu api sa guNezu deva yAnaH panTA
   asakṛnmārgopadeśasya ca prayojanaṃ varṇitaṃ bāṣyakṛteti //31 //	asakRt mArga upadeSasya ca prayojanam varNitam bAzya kRtA iti //31 //
   # yāvadadhikāramavasthitigadhikārikāṇām.# /	# yAvat aDikAram avasTiti gaDi kArikANAm.# /
   saguṇānāṃ vidyāyāṃ cintāṃ kṛtvā nirguṇāyāṃ cintayati /	sa guNAnAm vidyAyAm cintAm kRtvA nirguNAyAm cintayati /
   nirguṇāyāṃ vidyāyāṃ nāpavargaḥ palaṃ bhavitumarhati /	nirguNAyAm vidyAyAm na apavargaH palam Bavitum arhati /
   śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇeṣu viduṣāmapyapāntaratamaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ	Sruti smRti itihAsa purANezu viduzAm api apAntara tamaH praBRtInAm
   tattaddehaparigrahaparityāgau śrūyete /	tad tad deha parigraha parityAgO SrUyete /
   tadapavargaphalatve nopapadyate /	tad apavarga Pala tve na upapadyate /
   apavṛktasya tadanupapatteḥ /	apavRktasya tad anupapatteH /
   upapattau vā tallakṣaṇāyogāt /	upapattO vA tad lakzaNA yogAt /
   apunāvṛttirhi tallakṣaṇam /	apunA AvRttiH hi tad lakzaNam /
   tena satyāmapi vidyāyāṃ tadanupapatterna mokṣaḥ /	tena satyAm api vidyAyAm tad anupapatteH na mokzaH /
   phalaṃ, vidyāyāṃ vibhūtayastu tāstāstasyāḥ phalam /	PalaM, vidyAyAm viBUtayaH tu tAH tAH tasyAH Palam /
   apunarāvṛttiśrutiḥ punastatpraśaṃsārtheti manyate /	apunarAvRtti SrutiH punar tad praSaMsA arTa iti manyate /
   naca 'tāvadevāsya ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye 'tha saṃpatsye' iti śruterviduṣo	na ca atAvat eva asya ciram yAvat na vimokzye aTa saMpatsye a iti SruteH viduzaH 
   dehapātāvadhipratīkṣāvadvasiṣṭhādīnāmapi	deha pAta avaDi pratIkzAvat vasizWa AdInAm api
   prārabdhakarmaphalopabhogapratīkṣeti sāṃpratam /	prArabDa karma Pala upaBoga pratIkzA iti sAMpratam /
   yena hi karmaṇā vasiṣṭhādīnāmārabdhaṃ śarīraṃ tatpratīkṣā syāt /	yena hi karmaNA vasizWa AdInAm ArabDam SarIram tat pratIkzA syAt /
   tathāca na śarīrāntaraṃ te gṛhṇīyuḥ /	taTA ca na SarIra antaram te gRhNIyuH /

   adhikāraṃ samāpyaite pratiśanti paraṃ padam //	aDikAram samApya ete pratiSanti param padam //
   nirguṇāyāṃ vidyāyāmapavargalakṣaṇaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ na stutimātratayā	nirguNAyAm vidyAyAm apavarga lakzaNam SrUyamANam na stuti mAtra tayA
   vyākhyāyamucitam /	vyAKyAyam ucitam /

   naca yatra tātparyaṃ tadanyathayituṃ yuktam /	na ca yatra tAtparyam tat anyaTayitum yuktam /

   brahmavidyāyāmanirmokṣānna brahmavidyā mokṣasya heturiti sāmpratam /	brahma vidyA AyAm anirmokzAt na brahma vidyA mokzasya hetuH iti sAmpratam /

   pibantāvityatra ca dvitvasaṃkhyotpattau pratīyate tena samānatautsargikī /	pibantO= iti atra ca dvi tva saMKyA utpattO pratIyate tena samAna tOtsargikI /
   pibantāviti dvayoḥ pibantā yā sā bādhanīyā, sā copakramopasaṃhārānurodhena	pibantO= iti dvayoH pibantA yA sA bADanIyA, sA ca upakrama upasaMhAra anuroDena
   na dvayorapi tu chatrinyāyena lākṣāṇikī vyākhyeyā /	na dvayoH api tu Catri nyAyena lAkzANikI vyAKyeyAH /
   yena hyupakramyate yena copasaṃsthite tadanurodhena madhyaṃ jñeyam /	yena hi upakramyate yena ca upasaMsTite tad anuroDena maDyam jQeyam /
   yathā jāmitvadoṣasaṃkīrtanopakrame tatpratisamādhānopasaṃhāre ca saṃdarbhe	yaTA jAmi tva doza saMkIrtana upakrame tad pratisamADAna upasaMhAre ca saMdarBe
   madhyapātino viṣṇurūpāṃśu yaṣṭavyo 'jāmitvāyetyādayaḥ	maDya pAtinaH vizNu rUpAMSu yazwavyaH ajAmi tvAya iti AdayaH
   pṛthagvidhitvamalabhamānā vidhitvamavivakṣitvārthavādatayā nītāstatkasya	pRTagviDi tvam alaBamAnAH viDi tvam avivakzitvA arTa vAda tayA nItAH tat kasya
   hetorekavākyatā hi sādhīyasī vākyabhedāditi /	hetoH eka vAkyatA hi sADIyasI vAkya BedAt iti /
   tathehāpi tadanurodhena pibadapibatsamūhaparaṃ lakṣaṇīyaṃ pibantāvityanena	taTA iha api tad anuroDena pibat apibatsamUha param lakzaNIyam pibantO= iti anena
   tathāca vedyābhedādvidyābheda iti /	taTA ca vedya aBedAt vidyA BedaH iti /

   paramātmavidyaivāvagamyate /	parama Atma vidyA eva avagamyate /

   darśayitumasāvanūdyate /	darSayitum asO= anUdyate /

   # antarā bhūtagrāmavatsvātmanaḥ.# /	# antarA BUta grAma vatsvAtmanaH.# /

   kimasti bhedo na veti viśaye bheda eveti bhrūmaḥ /	kim asti BedaH na vA iti viSaye BedaH eva iti BrUmaH /

   tatsyaivaikasya punaḥ	tat sya eva ekasya punar 
   śruteraviśeśādānarthakyaprasaṅgādyajatyabhyāsavadbhedaḥ prāptaḥ /	SruteH aviSeSAt AnarTakya prasaFgAt yajati aByAsa vat BedaH prAptaH /
   na caikasyaiva tāṇḍināṃ navakṛtva upadeśe 'pi yathā bhedo na bhavati 'sa	na ca ekasya eva tANxinAm nava kRtvas upadeSe api yaTA BedaH na Bavati asa
   ātmā tattvamati śvetaketo' ityatra tathehāpyabheda iti yuktam /	AtmA tattvam ati SvetaketaH a iti atra taTA iha api aBedaH iti yuktam /
   bhūya eva mā bhagavān vijñāpayatu, iti hi tatra śrūyate tenābhedo yujyate	BUyas eva mA BagavAn vijQApayatu, iti hi tatra SrUyate tena aBedaH yujyate
   na ceha tathāsti /	na ca iha taTA asti /

   pathyaṃ vadantyāptāḥ /	paTyam vadanti AptAH /

   naca sarvathā paunaruktyam /	na ca sarvaTA pOnaruktyam /

   pūrvapakṣaikadeśī taṃ prati sarvāntaratvavirodho darśitaḥ //35 //	pUrva pakza eka deSI tam prati sarva antara tva viroDaH darSitaH //35 //
   # anyathā bhedānupapattiriti cennopadeśāntaravaditi.# /	# anyaTA Beda anupapattiH iti ca inna upadeSa antara vat iti.# /

   sugamamanyat //36 //	sugamam anyat //36 //
   # vyatihāro virsiṣanti hītaravat.# /	# vyatihAraH virsizanti hi itaravat.# /
   utkṛṣṭasya nikṛṣṭarūpāpatternobhayatrobhayarūpānucintanam /	utkRzwasya nikRzwa rUpA patteH na uBayatra uBaya rUpa anucintanam /
   api tu nikṛṣṭe jīva utkṛṣṭarūpābhedacintanam /	api tu nikRzwe jIvaH utkRzwa rUpa aBeda cintanam /
   evaṃ hi nikṛṣṭa utkṛṣṭo bhavatīti prāptam /	evam hi nikRzwaH utkRzwaH Bavati iti prAptam /
   evaṃ prāpta	evam prApta
   ucyate itaretarānuvādenetaretarūpavidhānādubhayatrābhayacintanaṃ vidhīyate	ucyate itara itara anuvAdena itareta rUpa viDAnAt uBayatra aBaya cintanam viDIyate
   itarathā tu yo 'haṃ so 'sāvityetāvadevocyeta /	itaraTA tu yaH aham saH asO= iti etAvat eva ucyeta /
   jīvātmānamanūdyeśvaratvamasya vidhīyeta /	jIvAtmAnam anUdyeSvara tvam asya viDIyeta /
   na tvīśvarasya jīvātmatvaṃ yo 'sau so 'hamiti /	na tu ISvarasya jIva Atma tvam yaH asO saH aham iti /
   yathā tattvamasītyatra /	yaTA tat tvam asi iti atra /
   tasmādubhayarūpamubhayatrādhyānāyopadiśyate /	tasmAt uBaya rUpam uBayatra aDyAnAya upadiSyate /
   nanvevamutkṛṣṭasya nikṛṣṭaprasaṅga ityuktaṃ tatkimidānīṃ saguṇe	nanu evam utkRzwasya nikRzwa prasaFgaH iti uktam tat kim idAnIm sa guNe

   kasmaicitphalāya tathā dhyānamātraṃ vidhīyatena tvasya	kasmEcid PalAya taTA DyAna mAtram viDIyatena tu asya

   na ti nikṛṣṭatā bhavatyutkṛṣṭasya /	na ti nikRzwa tA Bavati utkRzwasya /
   anvācayaśiṣṭaṃ tu tādātmyadārḍhyaṃ bhavannopekṣāmahe /	anvAcaya Sizwam tu tAdAtmya dArXyam Bavat na upekzAmahe /
   # satyakāmādiguṇopadeśa.#iva tadguṇeśvarasiddhiriti	# satya kAma Adi guNa upadeSa. #iva tad guNa ISvara sidDiH iti
   siddhamubhayatrobhayātmatvādhyanamiti //37 //	sidDam uBayatra uBaya Atma tva aDyanam iti //37 //
   # saiva hi satyādayaḥ.# /	# sA eva hi satya AdayaH.# /
   tadvai tadetadeva tadāsa satyameva sa yo haitanmahadyakṣaṃ prathamajaṃ	tat vE tat etat eva tadAsa satyam eva sa yaH ha etat mahat yakzam praTama jam
   veda satyaṃ brahmeti jayatīmāṃllokāñjita ityasāvasadya evametanmahadyakṣaṃ	veda satyam brahma iti jayati imAn= lokAn jitaH iti asO= asadyaH evam etat mahat yakzam
   prathamajaṃ veda satyaṃ brahmeti satyaṃ hyeva brahma /	praTama jam veda satyam brahma iti satyam hi eva brahma /
   pūrvoktasya hṛdayākhyasya brahmaṇaḥ satyamityupāsanamena saṃdarbheṇa	pUrva uktasya hRdaya AKyasya brahmaNaH satyam iti upAsanamena saMdarBeNa
   vidhīyate /	viDIyate /
   taditi hṛdayākhyaṃ brahmaikena tadā parāmṛśati /	tat iti hRdaya AKyam brahma ekena tadA parAmRSati /
   etadeveti vakṣyamāṇaṃ prakārāntaramasya parāmṛśati /	etat eva iti vakzyamANam prakAra antaram asya parAmRSati /
   tattādāgre āsa babhūva /	tad tAda agre Asa baBUva /
   kiṃ tadityata āha satyameva /	kim tat iti atas Aha satyam eva /
   sacca mūrtaṃ tyaccāmūrtaṃ ca sattyam /	sat ca mUrtam tyat cAmUrtam ca sattyam /
   tadupāsakasya phalamāha sa yo haitamiti /	tad upAsakasya Palam Aha sa yaH ha etam iti /
   yaḥ prathamajaṃ yakṣaṃ pūjyaṃ veda /	yaH praTama jam yakzam pUjyam veda /
   kathaṃ vedetyata āha satyaṃ brahmetīti /	kaTam veda iti atas Aha satyam brahma iti iti /
   sa jayatīmān lokān /	sa jayati imAn lokAn /
   kiñca jito vaśīkṛta inuśabda itthaṃśabdasyārthe vartate /	kiQca jitaH vaSIkRtaH inu SabdaH itTaMSabdasya arTe vartate /
   vijetavyatvena buddhisaṃnihitaṃ śatruṃ parāmṛśati asāviti /	vijetavya tvena budDi saMnihitam Satrum parAmRSati  asO= iti /
   asadbhavennaśyet /	asat Bavet naSyet /
   uktamartha nigamayati ya evametaditi /	uktam arTa nigamayati yaH evam etat iti /
   evaṃ vidvānkasmājjayatītyata āha satyameva yasmādbrahmeti /	evam vidvAn kasmAt jayati iti atas Aha satyam eva yasmAt brahma iti /
   atastadupāsanāt phalotpādo 'pi satya ityarthaḥ /	atas tad upAsanAt Pala utpAdaH api satyaH iti arTaH /
   tadyattatsatyaṃ kimatau /	tat yat tat satyam kim atO /

   kasmiṃnnālambane tadupāsanīyamityata uttaram sa ādityo ya eṣa ityādinā	kasmiMnna Alambane tat upAsanIyam iti atas uttaram saH AdityaH yaH ezaH ityAdinA
   tasyopaniṣadaharahamiti /	tasya upanizad ahar aham iti /
   hanti pāpmānaṃ jahāti ca ya evaṃ vedetyantena /	hanti pApmAnam jahAti ca yaH evam veda iti antena /
   upaniṣat rahasyaṃ nāma /	upanizad rahasyam nAma /
   tasya nirvacanaṃ hanti pāpmānaṃ jahāti ceti /	tasya nirvacanaM hanti pApmAnam jahAti ca iti /
   hanterjahātervā rūpametat /	hanteH jahAteH vA rUpam etat /
   tathāca nirvacanaṃ kurvanphalaṃ pāpahānimāheti /	taTA ca nirvacanam kurvan Palam pApa hAni mAha iti /
   tamimaṃ viṣayamāha bhāṣyakāraḥ  # yo vai haitamiti /	tam imam vizayam Aha BAzya kAraH # yaH vE ha etam iti /
   sanāmākṣaropāsanāmiti.# /	sa nAma akzara upAsanAm iti.# /
   tathāca śrutiḥ 'tadetadakṣaraṃ satyamiti sa ityekamakṣaraṃ tītyekamakṣaraṃ	taTA ca SrutiH  atat etat akzaram satyam iti saH iti ekam akzaram ti iti ekam akzaram
   yamityekamakṣaraṃ prathamottame akṣare satyaṃ madhyato 'nṛtaṃ	yam iti ekam akzaram praTama uttame akzare satyam maDyatas anRtam
   tadetadanṛmubhayataḥ satyena parigṛhītaṃ satyabhūyameva bhavati	tat etat anRmuBayataH satyena parigRhItam satya BUyam eva Bavati
   naivaṃvidvāṃsamanṛtaṃ hinasti' iti /	na evaMvid vAMsam anRtam hinasti a iti /
   tītīkārānubandha uccāraṇārthaḥ /	tItIkAra anubanDaH uccAraNa arTaH /
   niranubandhastakāro draṣṭavyaḥ /	niranubanDa stakAraH drazwavyaH /
   atra hi prathamottame akṣare satyaṃ mṛtyurūpābhāvāt /	atra hi praTama uttame akzare satyam mRtyu rUpa aBAvAt /
   madhyato madhye 'nṛtamanṛtaṃ hi mṛtyuḥ /	maDyatas maDye anRtam anRtam hi mRtyuH /

   yadyapi tadyatsatyamiti prakṛtānukarṣeṇābedaḥ pratīyate tathāpi	yadi api tat yat satyam iti prakRta anukarzeNa AbedaH pratIyate taTA api
   phalabhedena bhedaḥ sādhyabhedeneva nityakāmyadiṣayordarśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ	Pala Bedena BedaH sADya Bedena iva nitya kAmya dizayoH darSa pUrNamAsAByAm
   svargakāmo yajeta yāvajjīvaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeteti śāstrayoḥ	svarga kAmaH yajeta yAvajjIvam darSa pUrNamAsAByAm yajeta iti SAstrayoH
   satyapyanubandhābhede bheda iti prāpte pratyucyate ekaiveyaṃ vidyā	sati api anubanDa aBede BedaH iti prApte pratyucyate  ekA eva iyam vidyA
   tatsatyamiti prakṛtaparāmarśādabhedena pratyabhijñānāt /	tat satyam iti prakRta parAmarSAt aBedena pratyaBijQAnAt /
   naca phalabhedaḥ /	na ca Pala BedaH /
   tasyopaniṣadaharahamiti tasyaiva yadaṅgāntaraṃ rahasyanāmnopāsanaṃ	tasya upanizad ahar aham iti tasya eva yat aFga antaram rahasya nAmnA upAsanam
   tatpraśaṃsārthor'thavādo 'yaṃ na phalavidhiḥ /	tad praSaMsA arToH aTavAdaH ayam na Pala viDiH /
   yadi punarvidyāvidhāvadhikāraśravaṇābhāvāttatkalpanāyāmārthavādikaṃ phalaṃ	yadi punar vidyAviDO= aDikAra SravaNa aBAvAt tad kalpana AyAma arTa vAdikam Palam
   kalpyeta tato jāteṣṭāvivāgṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatayā saṃvalitādhikārakalpanā	kalpyeta tatas jAtA izwO= iva agRhyamANa viSeza tayA saMvalita aDikAra kalpanA
   tataśca samastārthavādikaphalayuktamekamevopāsanamiti siddham /	tatas ca samasta arTa vAdika Pala yuktam ekam eva upAsanam iti sidDam /
   parakīyaṃ vyākhyānamupanyasyati  # kecitpunariti.# /	parakIyam vyAKyAnam upanyasyati # kecid punar iti.# /
   vājasaneyakamapyakṣyādityaviṣayaṃ chāndogyamapītyupāsyābhedādabhedaḥ /	vAjasaneyakam api akzi Aditya vizayam CAndogyam api iti upAsya aBedAt aBedaH /
   tataśca vājasaneyoktānāṃ satyādīnāmupasaṃhāra ityatrārthe saiva hi	tatas ca vAjasaneya uktAnAm satya AdInAm upasaMhAraH iti atra arTe sA eva hi
   satyādaya iti sūtraṃ vyākhyātaṃ tadetaddūṣayati  # tanna sādhviti /	satya AdayaH iti sUtram vyAKyAtam tat etat dUzayati # tat na sADu iti /
   jyotiṣṭomakarmasaṃbandhinīyamudgīthavyapāśrayeti.# /	jyotizwoma karma saMbanDinIya mudgITa vyapASraya iti.# /
   anubandhābhede 'pi sādhyabhedādbheda iti vidyābhedādanupasaṃhāra iti //38	anubanDa aBede api sADya BedAt BedaH iti vidyA BedAt anupasaMhAraH iti //38
   # kāmādītaratra tatra cāyatanādibhyaḥ.# /	# kAma Adi itaratra tatra ca Ayatana AdiByaH.# /
   chāndogyavājasaneyavidyayoryadyapi saguṇanirguṇatvena bhedaḥ /	CAn dogya vAja saneya vidyayoH yadi api sa guNa nirguNa tvena BedaH /
   tathāhi chāndogye 'atha ya ihātmānamanuvidya vrajanti etāṃśca satyānkāmān'	taTA hi CAndogye  aaTa ye iha AtmAnam anuvidya vrajanti etAn= ca satyAn kAmAn a
   ityātmavatkāmānāmapi vedyatvaṃ śrūyate /	iti Atma vat kAmAnAm api vedya tvam SrUyate /
   vājasaneye tu nirguṇameva paraṃ brahmopadiśyate 'vimokṣāya brūhi' iti	vAjasaneye tu nirguNam eva param brahma upadiSyate avimokzAya brUhi a iti
   tathāpi tayoḥ parasparaguṇopasaṃhāraḥ /	taTA api tayoH paraspara guNa upasaMhAraH /
   nirguṇāyāṃ tāvadvidyāyāṃ brahmastutyarthameva	nirguNAyAm tAvat vidyAyAm brahmastutyarTam eva
   saguṇavidyāsaṃbandhiguṇopasaṃhāraḥ saṃbhavī /	sa guNa vidyA saMbanDi guNa upasaMhAraH saMBavI /
   saguṇāyāṃ ca yadyapyādhyānāya na vaśitvādiguṇopasaṃhārasaṃbhavaḥ /	sa guNAyAm ca yadi api ADyAnAya na vaSi tva Adi guNa upasaMhAra saMBavaH /
   nahi nirguṇāyāṃ vidyāyāmādhāyātavyatvenaite coditā yenātrādhyeyatvena	na hi nirguNAyAm vidyAyAmADAyAtavya tvena ete coditAH yena atra aDyeya tvena
   saṃbadhyerannapi tu satyakāmādiguṇanāntarīyakatvenaiteṣāṃ	saMbaDyeran= api tu satya kAma Adi guNanA antarIyaka tvena etezAm
   prāptirityupasaṃhāra ucyate /	prAptiH iti upasaMhAraH ucyate /
   evaṃ vyavasthita eṣa saṃkṣepo 'dhikaraṇārthasya sāmyabāhulye	evam vyavasTitaH eza saMkzepaH aDikaraNa arTasya sAmya bAhulye
   'pyekatrākāśādhāratvasyāparatra cākāśatādātmyasya śravaṇādbhede vidyayorna	api ekatra AkASa ADAra tvasya aparatra ca AkASa tAdAtmyasya SravaNAt Bede vidyayoH na
   parasparaguṇopasaṃhāra iti pūrvapakṣaḥ /	paraspara guNa upasaMhAraH iti pUrva pakzaH /

   'nyatra ca daharākāśādhāraḥ sa evokta iti sarvasāmyādbrahmaṇyubhayatrāpi	anyatra ca dahara AkASa ADAraH saH eva uktaH iti sarva sAmyAt brahmaNi uBayatra api

   # ādāradalopaḥ.# /	# AdAradala upaH.# /

   adbhiriti tu pratinidhyupādānamāvaśyakatvasūcanārthaṃ bhāṣyakārasya //40	adBiH iti tu pratiniDi upAdAnam AvaSyaka tva sUcana arTam BAzya kArasya //40

   sāmānyaśāstrabādhāyāṃ viśeṣaśāstrasyātibhāro nāstītyarthaḥ //41 //	sAmAnya SAstra bADAyAm viSeza SAstrasya atiBAraH na asti iti arTaH //41 //
   # tannirdhāraṇāniyamastaddṛṣṭeḥ pṛthagdhyapratibandhaḥ phalam.# /	# tad nirDAraNA niyamaH tat dRzweH pRTak hya pratibanDaH Palam.# /
   yathaiva 'yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavati na sa pāpaṃ ślokaṃ śṛṇoti'	yaTA eva ayasya parNa mayI juhUH Bavati na sa pApam Slokam SRNoti a

   parārthatvāt /	para arTa tvAt /

   parṇatāyāṃ phalaśruterarthavādamātratvam /	parNa tAyAm Pala SruteH arTa vAda mAtra tvam /

   vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt /	vAkya Beda prasaFgAt /
   upāsanānāṃ tu vyāpārātmatvena svata eva phalasaṃbandhopapatteḥ	upAsanAnAm tu vyApAra Atma tvena svatas eva Pala saMbanDa upapatteH
   udgīthādyāśrayaṇaṃ phale vidhānaṃ na virudhyate viśiṣṭavidhānāt /	udgITa Adi ASrayaNam Pale viDAnam na viruDyate viSizwa viDAnAt /
   phalāya khalūdgīthasādhanakamupāsanaṃ vidhīyamānaṃ na vākyabhedamāvahati /	PalAya Kalu udgITa sADanakam upAsanam viDIyamAnam na vAkya Bedam Avahati /

   arthavādamātratve 'tyantaparokṣā vṛttiryathā na tathā phalaparatve /	arTavAda mAtra tve atyanta parokzA vRttiH yaTA na taTA Pala paratve /

   # pradānavadeva taduktam.# /	# pradAna vat eva tat uktam .# /

   manograhaṃ gṛhṇāmi' iti /	manograham gRhNAmia iti /
