   mlecchaprasiddhirivāndhrāṇāṃ kṣatriyajātau	mlecCa prasidDiH iva anDrANAm kzatriya jAtO
   rājaśabdaprasiddhistadavadhāraṇakāraṇamiti kṣatriya eva rājeti na	rAja Sabda prasidDiH tad avaDAraNa kAraNam iti kzatriyaH eva rAjA iti na
   brāhmaṇavaiśyayoḥ prāptiriti rājasūyaprakaraṇaṃ bhittvā	brAhmaNa vESyayoH prAptiH iti rAjasUya prakaraNam BittvA
   brāhmaṇādikartṛkāṇi pṛthageva karmāṇi prāpyanta iti na naimittikāni /	brAhmaNa Adi kartRkANi pRTak eva karmANi prApyante iti na nEmittikAni /
   tatra kiṃ tāvatprāptaṃ, naimittikānīti /	tatra kim tAvat prAptan, nEmittikAni iti /
   rājyasya kartā rājetyāryāṇāmāndhrāṇāṃ cāvivādaḥ /	rAjyasya kartA rAjA iti AryANAmAnDrANAm ca avivAdaH /
   tathāhi brāhmaṇādiṣu prajāpālanakartṛṣu	taTA hi brAhmaNa Adizu prajA pAlana kartRzu
   kanakadaṇḍātapatraśvetacāmarādilāñchaneṣu rājapadamāndhrāścāryāścāvivādaṃ	kanaka daNxa Atapatra Sveta cAmara Adi lAQCanezu rAja pada mAnDrAH ca AryAH ca avivAdam
   prayuñjānā dṛśyante /	prayuQjAnAH dRSyante /
   tenāvipratipatrvipratipattāvapyāryāndhraprayogayoryavavarāhavadāryaprasiddherāndhraprasiddhito	tena avipratipatrvipratipatta avapi AryAnDra prayogayoH yava vara Aha vat Arya prasidDeH AnDra prasidDito
   balīyasītvāt /	balIyasI tvAt /
   balavadāryaprasiddhivirodhe tvatanmūlāyāḥ pāṇinīyaprasiddheḥ 'virodhe	balavat Arya prasidDi viroDe tu atad mUlAyAH pANinIya prasidDeH aviroDe
   tvanapekṣaṃ syāt' iti nyāyena bādhanāttadanuguṇatayā vā	tu anapekzam syAt a iti nyAyena bADanAt tad anuguNa tayA vA
   kathañcinnasvanakulādivadanvākhyānāmātraparatayā nīyamānatvādrajyasya	kaTaQcinna sva nakula Adi vat anvAKyAnA mAtra para tayA nIyamAna tvAt rajyasya
   kartā rājeti siddhe nimittārthāḥ śrutayaḥ /	kartA rAjA iti sidDe nimitta arTAH SrutayaH /
   tathāca yadiśabdo 'pyāñjasaḥ syāditi prāptam /	taTA ca yadi SabdaH api AQjasaH syAt iti prAptam /
   evaṃ prāpta ucyate 'rūpato na viśeṣo 'sti hyāryamlecchaprayogayoḥ /	evam prAptaH ucyate  arUpataH na viSezaH asti hi Ari amlecCa prayogayoH /
   vaidikādvākyaśeṣāttu viśeṣastatra darśitaḥ' //	vEdikAt vAkya SezAt tu viSezaH tatra darSitaH a //
   tadiha rājaśabdasya karmayogādvā kartari prayogaḥ kartṛprayogādvā	tat iha rAja Sabdasya karma yogAt vA kartari prayogaH kartR prayogAt vA
   karmaṇīti viśaye vaidikavākyaśeṣavadabhiyuktatarasyātrabhavataḥ pāṇineḥ	karmaNi iti viSaye vEdika vAkI aSezavat aBiyuktatarasya atraBavataH pANineH
   smṛternirṇāyate prasiddhirāndhraṇāmanādirādimatī cāryāṇāṃ	smRteH nirNAyate prasidDiH AnDraNAm anAdiH AdimatI cAryANAm
   prasiddhirgogāvyādiśabdavat /	prasidDiH go gAvi Adi Sabda vat /
   naca saṃbhāvitādimadbhāvā prasiddhiḥ	na ca saMBAvita Adimad BAvA prasidDiH
   pāṇinimsṛtimapodyānādiprasiddhimādimatīṃ kartumatsahate /	pANi nimsRtim apa udyAna Adi prasidDim AdimatIm kartumat sahate /
   gāvyādiśabdaprasiddheranāditvena gavādipadaprasiddherapyādimattvāpatteḥ /	gAvi Adi Sabda prasidDeH anAdi tvena gavA Adi pada prasidDeH api Adimattva ApatteH /
   tasmātpāṇinīyasmṛtyanumatāndhraprasiddhibalīyastvena kṣatriyatvajātau	tasmAt pANinIya smRti anumata anDra prasidDi balIyaH tvena kzatriya tva jAtO
   rājaśabde mukhye tatkartaryatajjātau rājaśabdo gauṇa iti	rAja Sabde muKye tad kartari a tad jAtO rAja SabdaH gONaH iti
   kṣatriyasyaivākārādrājasūye tatprakaraṇamapodyāveṣṭerutkarṣaḥ /	kzatriyasya eva AkArAt rAjasUye tad prakaraNam apodya Ava izweH utkarzaH /
   anvayānurodhī yadiśabdo na tvapūrvavidhausati tamanyathayitumarhati /	anvaya anuroDI yadi SabdaH na tu apUrva viDOsati tam anyaTayitum arhati /
   ata evāhuḥ 'yadi śabdaparityāgo rucyadhyahārakalpanā' iti /	atas eva AhuH  ayadi Sabda parityAgaH rucyaDyahAra kalpanA a iti /
   iyaṃ ca rājasūyādadhikārāntarametayānnādyakāmaṃ yājayediti nāstītikṛtvā	iyam ca rAjasUyAt aDikAra antaram etayA annAdya kAmam yAjayet iti na asti iti kRtvA
   cintā /	cintA /
   etasmiṃstvadhikāre 'nnādyakāmasya traivarṇikya	etasmin= tu aDikAre annAdya kAmasya trEvarNikya

   eka ātmanaḥ śarīre bhāvāt /	ekaH AtmanaH SarIre BAvAt /
   adhikāraṇatātparyamāha  # iheti.# /	aDikAraNa tAtparyamAha # iha iti.# /

   nasūtrakāreṇa tatroktaṃ yena punaruktaṃ bhavedapi tu	nasUtra kAreNa tatra uktam yena punaruktam Bavet api tu
   bhāṣyakṛtetyatratyasyaivārthasyāpakarṣaḥ pramāṇalakṣaṇopayogitayā tatra	BAzya kRtA iti atratyasya eva arTasya apakarzaH pramANa lakzaNa upayogi tayA tatra
   kṛta iti /	kRtaH iti /

   kṛtaḥ /	kRtaH /
   vicārasyāsya pūrvottaratantraśeṣatvamāha  # iha ceti.# /	vicArasya asya pUrva uttara tantra Seza tvam Aha # iha ca iti.# /
   pūrvādhikaraṇasaṃgatimāha  # apiceti.# /	pUrva aDikaraNa saMgati mAha # apicA iti.# /
   nanvātmāstitvopapattaya evātrocyantāṃ kiṃ tadākṣepeṇetyata	nanu Atma astitva upapattayaH eva atra ucyantAm kim tad AkzepeNa iti ata
   āha ākṣepapūrvikā hīti /	Aha Akzepa pUrvikA hi iti /
   ākṣepamāha  # atraike dehamātrātmadarśina iti.# /	AkzepamAha # atra eke deha mAtra Atma darSinaH iti.# /
   yadyapi samastavyasteṣu pṛthivyaptejovāyuṣu na caitanyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tathāpi	yadi api samasta vyastezu pRTivI ap tejaH vAyuzu na cEtanyam dRzwam taTA api
   kāyākārapariṇateṣu bhaviṣyati /	kAya akAra pariNatezu Bavizyati /
   nahi kiṇvādayaḥ samastavyastā na madanā dṛṣṭā iti madirākārapariṇatā na	na hi kiNva AdayaH samasta vyastAH na madanAH dRzwAH iti madirA AkAra pariNatA na
   madayanti /	madayanti /
   ahamiti cānubhave deha eva gaurādyakāraḥ prathate /	aham iti ca anuBave dehaH eva gOra Adi akAraH praTate /
   na tu tadatiriktaḥ tadadhiṣṭhānaḥ kuṇḍa eva dadhīti /	na tu tad atiriktaH tad aDizWAnaH kuNxaH eva daDi iti /
   ata evāhaṃ sthūlo gacchāmītyādisāmānādhikaraṇyopapattirahamaḥ sthūlādibhiḥ	atas eva aham sTUlaH gacCAmi ityAdi sAmAna aDikaraNyA upapattiH ahamaH sTUla AdiBiH
   na jātu dadhisamānādhikaraṇāni madhurādīni	na jAtu daDi samAna aDikaraNAni maDura AdIni
   kuṇḍasyaikādhikaraṇyamanubhavanti sitaṃ madhuraṃ kuṇḍamiti /	kuNxasya eka aDikaraNyam anuBavanti sitam maDuram kuNxam iti /
   na cāpratyakṣamātmatattvamanumānādibhiḥ śakyamunnetum /	na ca apratyakzam Atma tattvam anumAna AdiBiH Sakyam unnetum /
   na khalvapratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamasti /	na Kalva pratyakzam pramANam asti /
   uktaṃ hi 'deśakālādirūpāṇāṃ bhedādbhinnāsu śaktiṣu /	uktam hi  adeSa kAla Adi rUpANAm BedAt BinnAsu Saktizu /
   bhavānāmanumānena prasiddhiratidurlabhā' iti /	BavAnAm anumAnena prasidDiH ati durlaBA a iti /
   yadā ca upalabdhisādhyanāntarīyakabhāvasya liṅgasyeyaṃ gatistadā kaiva	yadA ca upalabDi sADyana AntarIyaka BAvasya liFgasya iyam gatiH tadA kA eva
   kathā dṛṣṭavyabhicārasya śabdasyārthāpatteścātyantaparokṣārthagocarāyā	kaTA dRzwa vyaBicArasya Sabdasya arTa ApatteH ca atyanta parokza arTa gocarAyAH 
   upamānasya heturbhāṣyakṛtā vyākhyātaḥ /	upamAnasya hetuH BAzya kRtA vyAKyAtaH /
   ceṣṭā hitāhitaprāptiparihārārtho vyāpāraḥ /	cezwA hita ahita prApti parihAra arTaH vyApAraH /
   sa ca śarīrādhīnatayā dṛśyamānaḥ śarīradharma evaṃ prāṇaḥ	sa ca SarIra aDIna tayA dRSyamAnaH SarIra DarmaH evam prANaH
   śvāsapraśvāsādirūpaḥ śarīradharma eva /	SvAsa praSvAsa Adi rUpaH SarIra DarmaH eva /
   icchāprayatnādayaśca yadyapyāntarāḥ tathāpi śarīrātiriktasya	icCA prayatna AdayaH ca yadi api AntarAH taTA api SarIra atiriktasya
   tadāśrayānupalabdheḥ sati śarīre bhāvāt antaḥ śarīrāśrayā eva, anyathā	tad ASraya anupalabDeH sati SarIre BAvAt antar SarIra ASrayAH eva, anyaTA
   dṛṣṭahānādṛṣṭakalpanāprasaṅgāt /	dRzwa hAna adRzwa kalpanA prasaFgAt /
   śarīrātirikta ātmani pramāṇābhāvāccharīre ca saṃbhavāccharīre ca	SarIra atiriktaH Atmani pramANa aBAvAt SarIre ca saMBavAt SarIre ca
   saṃbhavāccharīramevecchādimadātmeti prāpta ucyate  //53 //	saMBavAt SarIram eva icCA AdimadAtmA iti prAptaH ucyate //53 //
   # vyatirekastadbhāvābhāvitvānna tūpalabdhivat.# /	# vyatirekaH tad BAva aBAvi tvAt na tu upalabDivat.# /
   nāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamiti bruvāṇaḥ praṣṭavyo jāyate kuto	na apratyakzam pramANam iti bruvANaH prazwavyaH jAyate kuto
   bhavānanumānādīnāmaprāmāṇyamavadhāritavāniti /	BavAn anumAna AdInAm aprAmANyam avaDAritavAn iti /
   pratyakṣaṃ hi liṅgādirūpamātragrāhi nāprāmāṇyameṣāṃ viniścetumarhati /	pratyakzam hi liFga Adi rUpa mAtra grAhi na aprAmANyam ezAm viniScetum arhati /
   nahi dhūmajñānamivaiṣāmindriyārthasannikarṣādaprāmāṇyajñānamudetumarhati /	na hi DUma jQAnam iva ezAm indriya arTa sannikarzAt aprAmANyajQAnam udetum arhati /
   kintu deśakālāvasthārūpabhedena vyabhācirotprekṣayā /	kintu deSa kAla avasTA rUpa Bedena vyaBAcirotprekzayA /
   na caitāvānpratyakṣasya vyāpāraḥ saṃbhavati /	na ca etAvAn pratyakzasya vyApAraH saMBavati /
   yathāhuḥ nahīdamiyato vyāpārānkartuṃ samarthaṃ	yaTA AhuH nahi idam iyataH vyApArAn kartum samarTam
   saṃnihitaviṣayabalenotpatteravicārakatvāditi /	saMnihita vizaya balena utpatteH avicAraka tvAt iti /
   tasmādasminnanicchatāpi pramāṇāntaramabhyupeyam /	tasmAt asmin= anicCatA api pramANa antaram aByupeyam /
   apica pratipannaṃ pumāṃsamapahāyāpratipannasaṃdigdhāḥ prekṣāvadbhiḥ	api ca pratipannam pumAMsam apahAya apratipanna saMdigDAH prekzAvadBiH
   pratipādyante /	pratipAdyante /
   na caiṣāmitthaṃbhāvo bhavatpratyakṣagocaraḥ /	na ca ezAm itTaMBAvaH Bavat pratyakza gocaraH /
   na khalvete gauratvādivatpratyakṣagocarāḥ kintu vacanaceṣṭādiliṅgānumeyāḥ	na Kalu ete gOra tva Adi vat pratyakza gocarAH kintu vacana cezwA Adi liFga anumeyAH
   naca liṅgaṃ pramāṇaṃ yata ete sidhyanti /	na ca liFgam pramANam yatas ete siDyanti /
   na puṃsāmitthaṃbhāvamavijñāya yaṃ kañcana puruṣaṃ pratipipātayiṣato	na puMsAm itTaMBAvam avijQAya yam kaQcana puruzam pratipipAtayizataH 
   'navadheyavacanasya prekṣāvattā nāma /	anavaDeya vacanasya prekzAvattA nAma /
   apica paśavo 'pi hitāhitaprāptiparihārārthinaḥ komalaśaṣpaśyāmalāyāṃ bhuvi	api ca paSavaH api hita ahita prApti parihAra arTinaH komala Sazpa SyAmalAyAm Buvi
   pravartante /	pravartante /
   pariharanti cāśyānatṛṇakaṇṭakākīrṇām /	pariharanti ca aSyAna tRNa kaNwaka AkIrNAm /
   nāstikastu paśorapi paśuriṣṭaniṣṭasādhanamavidvān /	nAstikaH tu paSoH api paSuH izwa nizwa sADanam avidvAn /
   na khalvasminnumānagocara pravṛttinivṛttigocare pratyakṣaṃ prabhavati /	na Kalu asminnumAna gocara  pravRtti nivRtti gocare pratyakzam praBavati /
   naca parapratyāyanāya śabdaṃ prayuñjīta śābdasyārthasyāpratyakṣatvāt /	na ca para pratyAyanAya Sabdam prayuQjIta SAbdasya arTasya apratyakza tvAt /
   tadeva mā nāma bhūnnāstikasya janmāntaramasminneva janmanyupasthito 'sya	tat eva mA nAma BUt nAstikasya janma antaram asmin= eva janmani upasTitaH asya
   mūkatvapravṛttinivṛttiviraharūpo mahānnarakaḥ /	mUka tva pravRtti nivRtti viraha rUpaH mahAn narakaH /
   parākrāntaṃ cātra sūribhiḥ /	parAkrAntam ca atra sUriBiH /
   atyantaparokṣagocarāpyanyathānupapadyamānārthaprabhavārthāpattiḥ /	atyanta parokza gocarA api anyaTA anupapadyamAna arTa praBava arTa ApattiH /
   bhūyaḥsāmānyayogena copamānamupapāditaṃ pramāṇalakṣaṇe /	BUyas sAmAnya yogena ca upamAnam upapAditam pramANa lakzaNe /
   tadatrāstu tāvatpramāṇāntaraṃ pratyaśramevāhaṃpratyayaḥ	tat atra astu tAvat pramANa antaram pratyaSram eva ahaMpratyayaH
   śarīrātiriktamālambata ityanvayatirekābhyāmavadhāryate /	SarIra atiriktam AlambataH iti anvayatiH ekAByAm avaDAryate /
   yogavyāghravatsvapnadaśāyāṃ ca śarīrāntaraparigrahābhimāne	yoga vyAGra vat svapna daSAyAm ca SarIra antara parigraha aBimAne
   'pyahaṅkārāspadasya pratyabhijñāyamānatvamityuktam /	api ahaFkAra Aspadasya pratyaBijQAyamAna tvam iti uktam /
   sūtrayojanā tu na tvavyatiriktaḥ kintu vyatirikta ātmā dehāt /	sUtra yojanA tu na tu avyatiriktaH kintu vyatiriktaH AtmA dehAt /
   kutastadbhāvābhāvitvāt /	kutas tad BAva aBAvi tvAt /
   caitanyādiryadi śarīraguṇaḥ tato 'nena viśeṣaguṇena bhavitavyam. na tu	cEtanya AdiH yadi SarIra guNaH tatas anena viSeza guNena Bavitavyam. na tu
   saṃkhyāparimāṇasaṃyogādivatsāmānyaguṇena /	saMKyA parimANa saMyoga Adi vat sAmAnya guNena /
   tathāca ye bhūtaviśeṣaguṇaste yāvadbhūtabhāvino dṛṣṭā yathā rūpādayaḥ /	taTA ca ye BUta viSeza guNaH te yAvat BUta BAvinaH dRzwAH yaTA rUpa AdayaH /
   nahyasti saṃbhavaḥ bhūtaṃ ca rūpādirahitaṃ ceti /	na hi asti saMBavaH BUtam ca rUpa Adi rahitam ca iti /
   tasmādbhūtaviśeṣaguṇarūpādivaidharmyānna caitanyaṃ śarīraguṇaḥ /	tasmAt BUta viSeza guNa rUpa Adi vEDarmyAt na cEtanyam SarIra guNaH /
   etenecchādīnāṃ śarīraviśeṣaguṇatvaṃ pratyuktam /	etena icCA AdInAm SarIra viSeza guNa tvam pratyuktam /
   prāṇaceṣṭādayo yadyapi dehadharmā eva tathāpi na dehamātraprabhavāḥ /	prANa cezwA AdayaH yadi api deha DarmAH eva taTA api na deha mAtra praBavAH /
   mṛtāvasthāyāmapi prasaṅgāt /	mRta avasTAyAm api prasaFgAt /
   tasmādyasyaite adhiṣṭānāddehadharmā bhavanti sa dehātirikta ātmā /	tasmAt yasya ete aDizwAnAt deha DarmAH Bavanti sa deha atiriktaH AtmA /
   adṛṣṭakāraṇatve 'bhyupagamyamāne tasyāpi	adRzwa kAraNa tve aByupagamyamAne tasya api
   dehāśrayatvānupapatterātmaivābhyupetavya iti /	deha ASraya tva anupapatteH AtmA eva aByupetavyaH iti /
   vaidharmyāntaramāha  # dehadharmāśceti.# /	vEDarmya antaram Aha # deha DarmAH ca iti.# /
   svaparapratyakṣā hi dehadharmā dṛṣṭā yathā rūpādayaḥ /	sva para pratyakzAH hi deha DarmA dRzwAH yaTA rUpa AdayaH /
   icchādayastu svapratyakṣā eveti dehadharmavaidharmyam /	icCA AdayaH tu sva pratyakzAH eva iti deha Darma vEDarmyam /
   tasmādapi dehātiriktadharmā iti /	tasmAt api deha atirikta DarmAH iti /
   tatra yadyapi caitanyamapi bhūtaviśeṣaguṇastathāpi yāvadbhūtamanuvarteta /	tatra yadi api cEtanyam api BUta viSeza guNaH taTA api yAvat BUtam anuvarteta /
   naca madaśaktyā vyabhicāraḥ /	na ca mada SaktyA vyaBicAraH /
   sāmarthyasya sāmānyaguṇatvāt /	sAmarTyasya sAmAnya guNa tvAt /
   apica madaśaktiḥ pratimadirāvayavaṃ mātrayāvatiṣṭhate tadvaddehe 'pi	api ca mada SaktiH pratimadira avayavam mAtrayA avatizWate tadvat dehe api
   caitanyaṃ tadavayaveṣvapi mātrayā bhavet /	cEtanyam tad avayavezu api mAtrayA Bavet /
   yathā caikasmindehe bahavaścetayeran /	yaTA ca ekasmin dehe bahavaH cetayeran /
   naca bahūnāṃ cetanānāmanyonyābhiprāyānuvidhānasaṃbhava iti ekapāśanibaddhā	na ca bahUnAm cetanAnAm anyonya aBiprAya anuviDAna saMBavaH iti eka pASa nibadDA
   iva bahavo vihaṅgamāḥ viruddhādikriyābhimukhāḥ samarthā api na	iva bahavaH vihaFgamAH virudDa Adi kriyA aBimuKAH samarTAH api na
   hastamātramapi deśamatipatitumutsahante /	hasta mAtram api deSam atipatitum utsahante /
   evaṃ śarīramapi na kiñcitkartumutsahate /	evam SarIram api na kiQcid kartum utsahate /
   api nānvayamātrāttaddharmadharmibhāvaḥ /	api na anvaya mAtrAt tad Darma Darmi BAvaH /
   śakyo viniścetuṃ, mā bhūdākāśasya sarvo dharmaḥ sarveṣvanvayāt /	SakyaH viniScetuM, mA BUt AkASasya sarvaH DarmaH sarvezu anvayAt /
   api tvanvayavyatirekābhyām /	api tu anvaya vyatirekAByAm /
   saṃdigdhaścātra vyatirekaḥ /	saMdigDaH ca atra vyatirekaH /
   tathāca sādhakatvamanvayamātrasyetyāha  # apica sati hi tāvaditi.# /	taTA ca sADaka tvam anvaya mAtrasya iti Aha # apica sati hi tAvat iti.# /
   dūṣaṇāntaraṃ vivakṣuriṇāmabhedo rūpādirna tu	dUzaNa antaram vivakzuH iNAma BedaH rUpa AdiH na tu
   bhūtacatuṣṭayādarthāntaramevaṃ bhūtapariṇāmabheda eva caitanyaṃ na tu	BUta catuzwayAt arTa antaram evam BUta pariNAma BedaH eva cEtanyam na tu
   bhūtebhyor'thāntaraṃ, yena 'pṛthivyāpastejo vāyuriti tattvāni' iti	BUteByor aTa antaran, yena apRTivI ApaH tejaH vAyuH iti tattvAni a iti
   pratijñāvyāghātaḥ syādityarthaḥ /	pratijQA vyAGAtaH syAt iti arTaH /
   etaduktaṃ bhavati caturṇāmeva bhūtānāṃ jagatpariṇāmo na tvasti	etat uktam Bavati  caturNAm eva BUtAnAm jagat pariNAmaH na tu asti
   tattvāntaraṃ yasya pariṇāmo rūpādayo 'nyadvā pariṇāmāntaramiti /	tattva antaram yasya pariNAmaH rUpa AdayaH anyat vA pariNAma antaram iti /
   atroktābhistāvadupapattibhirdehadharmatvaṃ nirastaṃ	atra uktABiH tAvat upapattiBiH deha Darma tvam nirastam
   tathāpyupapattyantarābhidhitsayāha  # cettarhīti.# /	taTA api upapatti antara aBiDitsayA aha # ced tarhi iti.# /
   bhūtadharmā rūpādayo jaḍatvādviṣayā eva dṛṣṭā na tu viṣayiṇaḥ /	BUta DarmAH rUpa AdayaH jaxa tvAt vizayAH eva dRzwAH na tu vizayiNaH /
   naca keṣāñcidviṣayāṇāmapi viṣayitvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti vācyam /	na ca kezAQcit vizayANAm api vizayi tvam Bavizyati iti vAcyam /
   svātmani vṛttivirodhāt /	sva Atmani vRtti viroDAt /
   na copalabdhāveṣa prasaṅgastasyā ajaḍāyāḥ svayaṃprakāśatvābhyupagamat /	na ca upalabDO= eza prasaFgaH tasyAH ajaxAyAH svayaMprakASa tva aByupagamat /
   kṛtopapādanaṃ caitatpurastāt /	kRta upapAdanam ca etat purastAt /
   upalabdhivaditi sūtrāvayavaṃ yojayati  # yathaivāsyā iti.# /	upalabDi vat iti sUtra avayavam yojayati # yaTA eva asyAH iti.# /
   upalabdhigrāhiṇa eva pramāṇāccharīvyatireko 'pyalagamyate /	upalabDi grAhiNaH eva pramANAt SarIvyatirekaH api alagamyate /
   tasyāstataḥ svayaṃprakāśapratyayena bhūtadharmebhyo jaḍebhyo vailakṣaṇyena	tasyAH tatas svayaMprakASa pratyayena BUta DarmeByaH jaxeByaH vElakzaNyena
   vyatirekaniścayāt /	vyatireka niScayAt /
   astu tarhi vyatirekādupalabdhirbhūtebhyaḥ svatantrā tathāpyātmani	astu tarhi vyatirekAt upalabDiH BUteByaH svatantrA taTA api Atmani
   pramāṇābhāva ityata āha  # upalabdhisvarūpa eva ca na ātmeti.# /	pramANa aBAvaH iti atas Aha # upalabDi svarUpaH eva ca naH AtmA iti.# /
   ājānatastāvadupalabdhibhedo nānubhūyata iti viṣayabhedādabhyupeyaḥ /	AjAnataH tAvat upalabDi BedaH na anuBUyate iti vizaya BedAt aByupeyaH /
   na copalabdhivyatirekiṇāṃ viṣayāṇāṃ prathā saṃbhavatītyupapādatam /	na ca upalabDi vyatirekiNAm vizayANAm praTA saMBavati iti upapAdatam /
   naca viṣayabhedagrāhi pramāṇamastīti copapāditaṃ	na ca vizaya Beda grAhi pramANam asti iti ca upapAditam
   brahmatattvasamīkṣāyāmasmābhiḥ /	brahma tattva samIkzAyAm asmABiH /
   evaṃ ca sati viṣayarūpatadbhedāveva sudurlabhāviti dūranirastā	evam ca sati vizaya rUpa tad BedO= eva su durlaBO= iti dUra nirastA
   viṣayabhedādupalabdhibhedasaṃkathā /	vizaya BedAt upalabDi Beda saMkaTA /
   tenopalabdherupalabdhṛtvamapi na tāttvikam /	tena upalabDeH upalabDR tvam api na tAttvikam /
   kintvavidyākalpitam /	kintvavidyA kalpitam /
   tatrāvidyādaśāyāmapyupalabdherabheda ityāha  # ahamidamadrākṣamiti ceti.#	tatra avidyAt aSAyAm api upalabDeH aBedaH iti Aha # aham idam adrAkzam iti ca iti.#
   na kevalaṃ tāttvikābhedānnityatvamatāttvikādapi nityatvameveti tasyārthaḥ	na kevalam tAttvika aBedAt nitya tvam atAt tvikAt api nitya tvam eva iti tasya arTaH
   # smṛtyādyupapatteśca.# /	# smRti Adi upapatteH ca.# /
   nānātve hi nānyenopalabdhe 'nyasya puruṣasya smṛtirupapadyata ityarthaḥ /	nAnAtve hi na anyena upalabDe anyasya puruzasya smRtiH upapadyate iti arTaH /
   nirākṛtamapyarthaṃ nirākaraṇāntarāyānubhāṣate  # yattūktamiti.# /	nirAkRtam api arTam nirAkaraNa antarAya anuBAzate # yat tu uktam iti.# /
   yo hi dehavyāpārādupalabdhirutpadyate tena dehadharma iti manyate taṃ	yaH hi deha vyApArAt upalabDiH utpadyate tena deha DarmaH iti manyate tam
   pratīdaṃ dūṣaṇam  # na cātyantaṃ dehasyeti.# /	pratIdam dUzaNam # na ca atyantam dehasya iti.# /
   prakṛtamupasaṃharati  # tasmādanavadyamiti.# //54 //	prakRtam upasaMharati # tasmAt anavadyam iti.# //54 //
   # aṅgavabaddhāstu na śākhāsu hi prativedam.# /	# aFgava badDAH tu na SAKAsu hi prativedam.# /
   svarādibhedātprativedamudgīthādayo bhidyante /	svara Adi BedAt prativeda mudgITa AdayaH Bidyante /
   tadanubaddhāstu pratyayāḥ pratiśākhaṃ vihitā bhedena /	tad anubadDAH tu pratyayAH pratiSAKam vihitAH Bedena /
   tatra saṃśayaḥ kiṃ yasminvede yadudrīthādayo vihitāsteṣāmeva	tatra saMSayaH kim yasmin vede yat u drITa AdayaH vihitAH tezAm eva
   tadvedavihitāḥ pratyayā utānyavedavihitānāmapyudrīthādīnāṃ te pratyayā iti	tad veda vihitAH pratyayAH uta anya veda vihitAnAm api udrITa AdInAm te pratyayAH iti
   kiṃ tāvatprāptam /	kim tAvat prAptam /
   'omityakṣaramudrīthamupāsti' ityudrīthaśravaṇenodrīthasāmānyamavagamyate /	aomiti akzara mudrITam upAsti a iti udrITa SravaNena udrITa sAmAnyam avagamyate /
   nirviśeṣasya ca tasyānupapatterviśeṣakāṅkṣāyāṃ svaśākhāvihitasya viśeṣasya	nirviSezasya ca tasya anupapatteH viSeza kAFkzAyAm sva SAKA vihitasya viSezasya
   saṃnidhānāttenaivākāṅkṣāvinivṛtterna śākhāntarīyamudrīthāntaramapekṣate /	saMniDAnAt tena eva AkAFkzA vinivRtteH na SAKA antarIyam udrITa antaram apekzate /
   na caivaṃ saṃnidhānena śrutipīḍā, yadi hi śrutisamarpitamarthamapabādhena	na ca evam saMniDAnena Sruti pIxA, yadi hi Sruti samarpitam arTam apabADena
   tataḥ śrutiṃ pīḍayenna caitadasti /	tatas Srutim pIxayet na ca etat asti /
   nahyudrīthaśrutyabhihitalakṣitau sāmānyaviśeṣau bādhitau svaśākhāgatayoḥ	na hi udrITa Sruti aBihita lakzitO sAmAnya viSezO bADitO sva SAKA gatayoH
   svīkaraṇācchākhāntarīyāsvīkāre 'pi /	svIkaraNAt SAKA antarIyAsu IkAre api /
   yathāhuḥ 'jātivyaktī gṛhītveha vayaṃ tu śrutilakṣite /	yaTA AhuH  ajAti vyaktI gRhItvA iha vayam tu Sruti lakzite /
   kṛṣṇādi yadi muñcāmaḥ kā śrutistatra pīḍyate' //	kRzNa Adi yadi muQcAmaH kA SrutiH tatra pIxyate a //
   evaṃ prāptam /	evam prAptam /
   evaṃ prāpta ucyate udrīthāṅgavavaddhāstu pratyayā nānāśākhāsu	evam prAptaH ucyate udrITAFgavavat DAH tu pratyayAH nAnA SAKAsu
   prativedamanuvarteranna pratiśākhaṃ vyavatiṣṭheran /	prativedam anuvarteran na pratiSAKam vyavatizWeran /
   udrīthamityādisāmānyaśruteraviśeṣāt etaduktaṃ bhavati yuktaṃ śuklaṃ	udrITam ityAdi sAmAnya SruteH aviSezAt etat uktam Bavati yuktam Suklam
   paṭamānayetyādau paṭaśrutimaviśeṣapravṛttāmapi	pawamAnayA ityAdO pawa Srutim aviSeza pravRttAm api
   saṃnidhānācchuklaśrutirbādhata iti /	saMniDAnAt Sukla SrutiH bADataH iti /
   viśiṣṭārthapratyāyanapratyuktatvātpadānāṃ samabhivyāhārasya /	viSizwa arTa pratyAyana pratyukta tvAt padAnAm samaBivyAhArasya /
   anyathā tadanupapatteḥ /	anyaTA tad anupapatteH /
   naca svārthamasmārayitvā viśiṣṭārthapratyāyanaṃ padānāmiti	na ca sva arTam asmArayitvA viSizwa arTa pratyAyanam padAnAm iti
   viśiṣṭārthaprayuktaṃ svārthasmāraṇaṃ na svaprayojakamapavādhitumutsahate /	viSizwa arTa prayuktam sva arTa smAraNam na sva prayojakam apavADitum utsahate /
   mā ca vādhiprayojakābhāvena svārthasmāraṇamapīti yuktamaviśeṣapravṛttāyā	mA ca vA aDi prayojaka aBAvena sva arTa smAraNam api iti yuktam aviSeza pravRttAyA
   api śruterekasminneva viśeṣe avasthāpanam /	api SruteH ekasmin= eva viSeze avasTApanam /
   iha tūdrīthaśruteraviśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭārthapratyāyakatvāt /	iha tu udrITa SruteH a viSezeNa viSizwa arTa pratyAyaka tvAt /
   saṃkoce pramāṇaṃ kiñcinnāsti /	saMkoce pramANam kiQcid nA asti /
   naca saṃnidhimātramapabādhitumarhati /	na ca saMniDi mAtram apabADitum arhati /
   śrutisāmānyadvāreṇa ca sarvaviśeṣagāminyāḥ śruterekasminnavasthānaṃ	Sruti sAmAnya dvAreNa ca sarva viSeza gAminyAH SruteH ekasmin= avasTAnam
   pīḍaiva /	pIxA eva /
   tasmātsarvodrīthaviṣayāḥ pratyayā iti //55 //	tasmAt sarva udrITa vizayAH pratyayAH iti //55 //
   mantrādivadvāvirodhaḥ /	mantra Adi vat vAviroDaH /
   viruddhamiti naḥ saṃpratyayo yatpramāṇena nopalabhyate /	virudDam iti naH saMpratyayaH yad pramANena na upalaByate /
   upalabdhaṃ ca mantrādiṣu śākhāntarīyeṣi śākhāntarīyakarmasaṃbandhitvam /	upalabDam ca mantra Adizu SAKA antarIyezi SAKA antarIya karma saMbanDi tvam /
   tadvadihāpīti darśanādavirodhaḥ /	tadvat iha api iti darSanAt aviroDaH /
   etacca darśitaṃ bhāṣyeṇa sugameneti //56 //	etat ca darSitam BAzyeNa sugamena iti //56 //
   # bhūmnaḥ kratuvajjyāyastvaṃ tathāhi darśayati.# /	# BUmnaH kratu vat jyAyaH tvam taTA hi darSayati.# /
   vaiśvānaravidyāyāṃ chāndogye kiṃ vyastopāsanaṃ samastopāsanameveti /	vESvAnara vidyAyAm CAndogye kim vyasta upAsanam samasta upAsanam eva iti /
   tatra divameva bhagavo rājanniti hovāceti pratyakamupāsanaśruteḥ pratyekaṃ	tatra divam eva BagavaH rAjan= iti ha uvAca iti pratyakam upAsana SruteH pratyekam
   ca phalavattvāmnānātsamastopāsane ca phalavattvaśruterubhayathāpyupāsanam	ca Palavat tva AmnAnAt samasta upAsane ca Palavat tva SruteH uBa yaTA api upAsanam
   naca yathā vaiśvānarīyeṣṭau yadaṣṭākapālo bhavatītyādīnāmavayujyavādānāṃ	na ca yaTA vESvAnarIya izwO yat azwAkapAlaH Bavati ityAdInAm avayujyavAdAnAm
   pratyekaṃ phalaśravaṇe 'pyarthavādamātratvaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ	pratyekam Pala SravaNe api arTa vAda mAtra tvam vESvAnaram dvAdaSa kapAlam
   nirvapedityasyaiva tu phalavattvamevamatrāpi bhavitumarhati /	nirvapediti asya eva tu Palavat tvam evam atra api Bavitum arhati /
   tatra hi dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapediti /	tatra hi dvAdaSa kapAlam nirvapet iti /
   vidhibhaktiśrutiryadaṣṭākapālo bhavatītyādiṣu vartamānāpadeśaḥ /	viDi Bakti SrutiH yat azwAkapAlaH Bavati ityAdizu vartamAna apadeSaH /
   naca vacanāni tvapūrvatvāditi vidhikalpanā /	na ca vacanAni tu apUrva tvAt iti viDi kalpanA /
   avayujyavādena stutyāpyupapatteḥ /	avayujya vAdena stutyA api upapatteH /
   iha tu samaste vyaste ca vartamānāpadeśasyāviśeṣādagṛhyamāṇaviśeṣaśatayā	iha tu samaste vyaste ca vartamAna apadeSasya aviSezAt agRhyamANa viSeza SatayA
   ubhayatrāpi vidhikalpanāyāḥ phalakalpanāyāśca bhedāt /	uBayatra api viDi kalpanAyAH Pala kalpanAyAH ca BedAt /
   nindāyāśca samastopāsanārambhe vyastopāsane 'pyupapatteḥ /	nindAyAH ca samasta upAsana AramBe vyasta upAsane api upapatteH /
   śyāmo vāśvāhutimabhyavaharatītivadubhayavidhamupāsanamiti prāpta	SyAmaH vA aSu Ahutim aByavaharati iti vat uBayaviDam upAsanam iti prApta
   ucyate samastopāsanasyaiva jyāyastvaṃ na vyastopāsanasya /	ucyate  samasta upAsanasya eva jyAyaH tvam na vyasta upAsanasya /
   yadyapi vartamānāpadeśatvamubhayatrāpyaviśiṣṭaṃ tathāpi	yadi api vartamAna apadeSa tvam uBayatra api aviSizwam taTA api

   kaikeyamājagmiḥ /	kEkeyam AjagmiH /

   samañja,mityarthaḥ //57 //	samaQja,m iti arTaH //57 //
   nānāśabdādibhedāt /	nAnA Sabda Adi BedAt /
   siddhaṃ kṛtvā vidyābhedamadhastanaṃ vicārajātamabhinirvartitam /	sidDam kRtvA vidyA Bedam aDastanam vicAra jAtam aBinirvartitam /
   saṃprati tu sarvāsāmīśvaragocarāṇāṃ vidyānāṃ kimabhedo bhedo vā, evaṃ	saMprati tu sarvAsAm ISvara gocarANAm vidyAnAm kim aBedaH BedaH vA, evam
   prāṇādigocarāsviti vicārayitavyam /	prANa Adi gocarAsu iti vicArayitavyam /
   nanu yathā pratyayābhidheyāyā apūrvabhāvanāyā ājānato bhedabhāve 'pi	nanu yaTA pratyaya aBiDeyAyAH apUrva BAvanAyAH AjAnataH Beda BAve api
   dhātvarthena nirūpyamāṇatvāttasya ca	DAtu arTena nirUpyamANa tvAt tasya ca
   yāgāderbhedātprakṛtyarthayāgādidhātvarthānubandhabhedādbhedaḥ /	yAga AdeH BedAt prakRti arTa yAga Adi DAtu arTa anubanDa BedAt BedaH /
   tadanuraktāyā eva tasyāḥ pratīyamānatvāt /	tad anuraktAyAH eva tasyAH pratIyamAna tvAt /
   evaṃ vidyānāmapi rūpato vedyasyeśvarasyābhede 'pi	evam vidyAnAm api rUpataH vedyasya ISvarasya aBede api
   tattatsatyasaṃkalpatvādiguṇopadhānabhedādvidyābheda iti nāstyabhedāśaṅkā /	tad tad satya saMkalpa tva Adi guNa upaDAna BedAt vidyA BedaH iti na asti aBeda ASaFkA /
   ucyateyuktamanubandhabhedātkāryarūpāṇāmapūrvabhāvanānāṃ bheda iti /	ucyateyuktam anubanDa BedAt kArya rUpANAm apUrva BAvanAnAm BedaH iti /
   iha brahmaṇaḥ siddharūpatvājguṇānāmapi satyasaṃkalpatvādīnāṃ tadāśrayāṇāṃ	iha brahmaNaH sidDa rUpa tvAt guNAnAm api satya saMkalpa tva AdInAm tad ASrayANAm
   siddhatayā sarvatrābhedo vidyāsu /	sidDa tayA sarvatra aBedaH vidyAsu /
   nahi viśālavakṣāścakorekṣaṇaḥ kṣatriyayuvā duśryavanadharmeti	na hi viSAla vakzAH cakora IkzaNaH kzatriya yuvA duSryavana DarmA iti
   ekatropadiṣṭo 'nyatra siṃhāsyo vṛṣaskandhaḥ	ekatra upadizwaH anyatra siMhAsyaH vRza skanDaH
   evopadiśyamānaścakorekṣaṇatvādyapajahāti na khalu pratyupadeśaṃ vastu	eva upadiSyamAnaH cakora IkzaNa tva AdyapajahAti na Kalu pratyupadeSam vastu
   bhidyate /	Bidyate /
   tasya sarvatra tādavasthyāt /	tasya sarvatra tAdavasTyAt /
   atādavasthye vā tadeva na bhavet /	atAdavasTye vA tat eva na Bavet /
   nahi vastu vikalpyata iti /	na hi vastu vikalpyate iti /
   tasmādvedyābhedādvidyānāṃ bheda iti prāptam /	tasmAt vedyA BedAt vidyAnAm BedaH iti prAptam /
   evaṃ prāpta ucyate bhavedetadevaṃ yadi vastuniṣṭānyupāsanavākyāni kintu	evam prAptaH ucyate  Bavet etat evam yadi vastu nizwAni upAsana vAkyAni kintu
   tadviṣayāmupāsanābhāvanāṃ vidadhati /	tad vizayAm upAsana aBAvanAm vidaDati /
   sā ca kāryarūpā /	sA ca kArya rUpAH /
   yadyapi copāsanābhāvanā upāsanādhīnanirūpaṇopāsanaṃ	yadi api ca upAsanA BAvanA upAsana aDIna nirUpaNa upAsanam
   copāsyādhīnanirūpaṇamupāsyaṃ ceśvarādi vyavasthitarūpam,	ca upAsya aDIna nirUpaNam upAsyam ca ISvara Adi vyavasTita rUpam,
   tathāpyupāsanaviṣayībhāvo 'sya kadācitkasyācitkenacidrūpeṇetyapariniṣṭhita	taTA api upAsana vizayIBAvaH asya kadAcid kasya acid kenacid rUpeNa iti aparinizWita
   eva /	eva /
   yathaikaḥ strīkāyaḥ kenacidbhakṣyatayā kenacidupagantavyatayā	yaTA ekaH strI kAyaH kenacid Bakzya tayA kenacid upagantavya tayA
   kenacidapatyatayā kenacinmātṛtayā kenacidupekṣaṇīyatayā viṣayīkriyamāṇaḥ	kenacid apatya tayA kenacid mAtR tayA kenacid upekzaNIya tayA vizayI kriyamANaH
   puruṣecchātantraḥ /	puruza icCAtantraH /
   evamihāpi upāsanāni puruṣecchātantratayā vidheyatāṃ nātikrāmanti /	evam iha api upAsanAni puruza icCA tantra tayA viDeya tAm na atikrAmanti /
   naca tattadguṇatayopāsanāni guṇabhedānna bhidyante /	na ca tad tad guNa tayA upAsanAni guNa BedAt na Bidyante /
   na cāgnihotramivopasanāṃ vidhāya dadhitaṇḍulādiguṇavadiha	na ca agnihotram iva upasanAm viDAya daDi taNxula Adi guNavat iha
   satyasaṃkalpatvādiguṇavidhiryenaikaśāstratvaṃ syāt /	satya saMkalpa tva Adi guNa viDiH yena eka SAstra tvam syAt /
   api tūtpattāvevopāsanānāṃ tattadguṇaviśiṣṭānāmavagamāt /	api tu utpattO= eva upAsanAnAm tad tad guNa viSizwAnAm avagamAt /
   tatrāgṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatayā sarvāsāṃ bedastulyaḥ /	tatra agRhyamANa viSeza tayA sarvAsAm bedaH tulyaH /
   naca samastaśākhāvihitasarvaguṇopasaṃhāraḥ śakyānuṣṭhānastasmādbedaḥ /	na ca samasta SAKA vihita sarva guNa upasaMhAraH Sakya anuzWAnaH tasmAt bedaH /
   # na cāsminpakṣe sāmānā santaḥ satyakāmādayaiti.# /	# na ca asmin pakze sAmAnA santaH satyakAma AdayEti.# /
   kecitkhalu guṇāḥ kāsucidvidyāsu samānāstenaikavidyātve āvartayitavyāḥ /	kecid Kalu guNAH kAsucid vidyAsu samAnAH tena eka vidyA tve AvartayitavyAH /
   ekatroktatvāt /	ekatra ukta tvAt /
   vidyābhede tu na paunaruktyamekasyāṃ vidyāyāmuktā vidyāntare noktā iti	vidyA Bede tu na pOnaruktyam ekasyAm vidyAya amuktAH vidyA antare na uktAH iti
   vidyāntarasyāpi tadguṇatvāya vaktavyā anuktānāmaprāpteriti //58 //	vidyA antarasya api tad guNa tvAya vaktavyA anuktAnAm aprApteH iti //58 //
   # vikalpo 'viśiṣṭaphalatvāt.# /	# vikalpaH aviSizwa Pala tvAt.# /
   agnihotradarśapūrṇamāsādiṣu pṛthagadhikārāṇāmapi succayo dṛṣṭo	agnihotra darSa pUrNamAsa Adizu pRTak aDikArANAm api succayaH dRzwaH 
   niyamavāṃsteṣāṃ nityatvādupāsanāstu kāmyatayā na nityāstasmānnāsāṃ	niyamavAn= tezAm nitya tvAt upAsanAH tu kAmya tayA na nityAH tasmAt nAsAm
   samuccayaniyamaḥ /	samuccaya niyamaH /
   tena samānaphalānāṃ darśapūrṇamāsajyotiṣṭomādīnāmiva na niyamavānvikalpaḥ	tena samAna PalAnAm darSa pUrNamAsa jyotizwoma AdInAm iva na niyamavAn vikalpaH
   phabhūmārthinaḥ samuccayasyāpi saṃbhavāditi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /	PaBUma arTinaH samuccayasya api saMBavAt iti pUrvaH pakzaH /
   upāsanānāmamūṣāmupāsyasākṣātkaraṇasādhyatvātphalabhedasyaikenopāsanenopāsyasākṣātkaraṇe	upAsanAnAm amUzAm upAsi asAkzAt karaNa sADya tvAt Pala Bedasya ekena upAsanena upAsya sAkzAt karaNe
   tata eva phalaprakilābhe tu kṛtamupāsanāntareṇa /	tatas eva Pala prakila ABe tu kRtam upAsana antareNa /
   naca sākṣātkaraṇasyātiśayasaṃbhavasyopāyasahasrairapi	na ca sAkzAtkaraNasya atiSaya saMBavasya upAya sahasrEH api
   tādavasthyāttanmātrasādhyatvācca phalāvāpteḥ /	tAdavasTyAt tanmAtra sADya tvAt ca Pala avApteH /
   upāsanāntarābhyāse ca cittaikāgratāvyāghātena kasya cidupāsanāniṣpatteriha	upAsana antara aByAse ca citta ekAgra tAvyAGAtena kasya cit upAsana anizpatteH iha
   vikalpa eva niyamavāniti rāddhāntaḥ //59 //	vikalpaH eva niyamavAn iti rAdDa antaH //59 //
   # kāmyāstu yathākāmaṃ samuccīyeranna vā pūrvahetvabhāvāt.# /	# kAmyAH tu yaTAkAmam samuccIyeran na vA pUrva hetu aBAvAt.# /
   yāsūpāsanāsu vinopāsyasākṣātkāraṇamadṛṣṭenaiva kāmyasādhanaṃ tāsāṃ	yAsu upAsanAsu vinA upAsya sAkzAt kAraNam adRzwena eva kAmya sADanam tAsAm
   kāmyadarśapaurṇamāsādivatpuruṣecchāvaśena vikalpasamuccayāviti sāmpratam	kAmya darSa pOrNamAsa Adi vat puruza icCA vaSena vikalpa samuccayO= iti sAmpratam
   # aṅgeṣu yathāśrayabhāvaḥ.# /	# aFgezu yaTA ASraya BAvaH.# /
   tannirdhāraṇāniyamastaddṛṣṭeḥ pṛthagdhyapratibandhaḥ phalamityatropasanāsu	tad nirDAraNA niyamaH tat dRzweH pRTak hya pratibanDaH Palam iti atra upasanAsu
   phalaśruteḥ parṇamayīnyāyenārthavādatayopāsanānāṃ kratvarthatvena	Pala SruteH parNa mayI nyAyena arTavAda tayA upAsanAnAm kratu arTa tvena
   samuccayaniyamamāśaṅkya puruṣārthatayaikaprayogavacanagrahaṇābhāve	samuccaya niyamam ASaFkya puruza arTa tayA eka prayoga vacana grahaNa aBAve
   samuccayaniyamo nirastaḥ /	samuccaya niyamaH nirastaH /
   iha tu satyapi puruṣārthatve kasmānnaikaprayogavacanagrahaṇaṃ bhavatīti	iha tu sati api puruza arTa tve kasmAt na eka prayoga vacana grahaNam Bavati iti
   pūrvoktamarthamākṣipan pratyavatiṣṭhate /	pUrva uktam arTam Akzipan pratyavatizWate /
   yadyapi hi kāmyā etā upāsanāstathāpi na svatantrā bhavitumarhanti /	yadi api hi kAmyAH etAH upAsanAH taTA api na svatantrA Bavitum arhanti /
   tathā sati hi kratvarthānāśritatayā kratuprayogādbahirapyamūṣāṃ prayogaḥ	taTA sati hi kratu arTAn ASrita tayA kratu prayogAt bahis api amUzAm prayogaH
   prasajyate /	prasajyate /
   naca prayujyante tatkasya hotoḥ /	na ca prayujyante tat kasya hotoH /
   kratvarthāśritānāmeva tāsāṃ tattatphaloddeśena vidhānāditi /	kratu arTa ASritAnAm eva tAsAm tad tad Pala uddeSena viDAnAt iti /
   evaṃ cāśrayatantratvādāśritānāṃ prayogavacanenāśrayāṇāṃ	evam ca ASraya tantra tvAt ASritAnAm prayoga vacanena ASrayANAm
   samuccayaniyamenāśritānāmapi samuccayaniyamo yukta itarathā	samuccaya niyamena ASritAnAm api samuccaya niyamaH yuktaH itaraTA
   tadāśritatvānupapatteḥ /	tad ASrita tva anupapatteH /
   sa ca prayogavacana upāsanāḥ	sa ca prayoga vacanaH upAsanAH
   samuccitanvaṃstattatphalakāmanānāmavaśyaṃbhāvamākṣipati tadabhāve tāsāṃ	samucci tanvan= tad tad Pala kAmanAnAm avaSyaMBAvam Akzipati tad aBAve tAsAm
   samuccayaniyamābhāvāditi manvānasya pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /	samuccaya niyama aBAvAt iti manvAnasya pUrvaH pakzaH /
   rāddhāntastu yathāvihitoddiṣṭapadārthanurodhī prayogavacano na	rAdDAntaH tu yaTA vihita uddizwa padArTa nuroDI prayoga vacanaH na
   padārthasvabhāvānanyathayitumarhati /	padArTa svaBAvAn anyaTayitum arhati /
   kintu tadavirodhenāvatiṣṭhate /	kintu tad aviroDena avatizWate /
   tatra kratvarthānāṃ nityavadāmnānāttathābhāvasya na	tatra kratu arTAnAm nitya vat AmnAnAt taTA BAvasya na
   saṃbhavānniyamenaitāntsamuccinotu /	saMBavAn niyamena etAn tsamuccinotu /
   kāmāvabaddhāstūpāsanāḥ kāmānamanityatvānna samuccayena niyantumarhati /	kAma avabadDAH tu upAsanAH kAmAnam anitya tvAt na samuccayena niyantum arhati /
   nahi kāmā vidhīyate yena samuccīyerannapi tūddiśyante /	nahi kAmAH viDIyate yena samuccIyeran= api tu uddiSyante /
   mānāntarānusārī coddeśo na tadvirodhenoddeśyamanyathayatī /	mAna antara anusArI ca uddeSaH na tad viroDena uddeSyam anyaTayatI /
   tathā satyuddeśānupapatteḥ /	taTA sati uddeSa anupapatteH /
   tasmātkāmānāmanityatvāttadavabaddhānāmupāsanānāmapyanityatvam /	tasmAt kAmAnAm anitya tvAt tad avabadDAnAm upAsanAnAm api anitya tvam /
   nityānityasaṃyogavirodhāt satyapi tadāśrayāṇāṃ nityatve idameva	nitya anitya saMyoga viroDAt sati api tad ASrayANAm nitya tve idam eva
   cāśrayatantratvamāśritānāṃ yadāśraye satyeva vṛttirnāsatīti /	ca ASraya tantra tvam ASritAnAm yad ASraye sati eva vRttiH na asati iti /
   na tu tatra vṛttireva nāvṛttiriti tadidamuktam āśrayatantrāṇyapi hīti //61	na tu tatra vRttiH eva na AvRttiH iti tat idam uktam  ASraya tantrANi api hi iti //61
   # samāhārāt /	# samAhArAt /
   hotṛṣadanāddhaivāpi durudgīthamanusamāharatīti.# /	hotRzadanAt ha eva api durudgITam anusamAharati iti.# /
   apirbhinnakamo dirudgīthamapīti /	apiH Binna kamaH dirudgITam api iti /
   vedāntarohitapraṇavodgīthaikatvapratyayasāmarthyāddhotṛkarmaṇaḥ	vedAnta rohita praNava udgITa eka tva pratyaya sAmarTyAt hotR karmaNaH
   śaṃsanādudrātā pratisamādadhāti kiṃ tadityata āha durudrīthamapi	SaMsanAt udrAtA pratisamAdaDAti kim tat iti atas Aha durudrITam api
   vedāntarodite caudrātre karmaṇi utpannaṃ kṣatam /	vedAntara udite ca OdrAtre karmaNi utpannam kzatam /
   evaṃ bruvanvedāntaroditasya pratyasyetyādi yojanīyam //63 //	evam bruvan veda antara uditasya pratyasya ityAdi yojanIyam //63 //
   # guṇasādhāraṇyaśruteśca.# /	# guNa sADa araNya SruteH ca.# /
   asya sūtrasyānvayamukhena vyatirekamukhena ca vyākhyā /	asya sUtrasya anvaya muKena vyatireka muKena ca vyAKyA /
   śeṣamatirohitārtham //64 //	Sezam ati rohita arTam //64 //
   iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ	iti SrI vAcaspati miSravi racite SArIraka Bagavat pAda BAzya viBAge BAmatyAm
   tṛtīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //3 //	tRtIya aDyAyasya tRtIyaH pAdaH //3 //
   # tṛtīyādhyāye caturthaḥ pādaḥ.# /	# tRtIya aDyAye caturTaH pAdaH.# /
   # puruṣārtho 'taḥśabdāditi bādarāyaṇaḥ.# /	# puruza arTaH atas SabdAt iti bAdarAyaNaH.# /
   sthitaṃ	sTitam
   kṛtvopaniṣadāmapavargākhyapuruṣārthasādhanātmajñānaparatvamupāsanānāṃ ca	kRtvA upanizadAm apavarga AKya puruza arTa sADana Atma jQAna paratvam upAsanAnAm ca
   tattatpuruṣārthasādhanatvamadhastanaṃ vicārajātamabhinirvartitam /	tad tad puruza arTa sADana tvam aDastanam vicAra jAtam aBinirvartitam /
   samprati tu kimaupaniṣadātmatattvajñānamapavargasādhanatayā puruṣārthamāho	samprati tu kim Opanizada Atma tattva jQAnam apavarga sADana tayA puruza arTam Aho
   kratuprayogāpekṣitakartṛpratipādakatayā kratvarthamiti mīmāṃsāmahe /	kratu prayoga apekzita kartR pratipAdaka tayA kratu arTam iti mImAMsAmahe /
   yadā ca kratvarthaṃ tadā yāvanmātraṃ kratuprayogavidhināpekṣitaṃ	yadA ca kratu arTam tadA yAvat mAtram kratu prayoga viDinA apekzitam
   kartṛtvamāmuṣmikaphalopabhoktṛtvaṃ ca na caitadanityatve ghaṭate	kartR tvam Amuzmika Pala upaBoktR tvam ca na ca etat anitya tve Gawate
   kṛtavipraṇāśākṛtābhyāgamaprasaṅgādato nityatvamapi, tāvanmātramupaniṣatsu	kRta vipraNASa akRta aByAgama prasaFgAt atas nitya tvam api, tAvat mAtram upanizatsu
   vivakṣitam /	vivakzitam /
   ito 'nyadanapekṣitaṃ viparītaṃ ca nopaniṣadarthaḥ syāt /	itas anyat anapekzitam viparItam ca na upanizad arTaH syAt /
   yathā śuddhatvādi /	yaTA SudDa tva Adi /
   yadyapi jīvānuvādena tasya brahmatvapratipādanaparatvamupaniṣadāmiti	yadi api jIva anuvAdena tasya brahma tva pratipAdana paratvam upanizadAm iti
   mahatā prabandhena tatra tatra pratipāditaṃ tathāpyatra	mahatA prabanDena tatra tatra pratipAditam taTA api atra
   keṣāñcitpūrvapakṣaśahkābījānāṃ nirākaraṇe tadeva sthūṇanikhanananyāyena	kezAQcid pUrva pakza SahkA bIjAnAm nirAkaraNe tat eva sTUNa niKanana nyAyena
   niścalīkriyata ityasti vicāraprayojanam /	niScalIkriyate iti asti vicAra prayojanam /
   tatra yadyapi prokṣaṇādivadātmajñānaṃ na kañcitkratumārabhyādhītam,	tatra yadi api prokzaNa Adi vat Atma jQAnam na kaQcid kratum AraBya aDItam,
   yadyapi ca kartṛmātraṃ nāvyabhicāritakratusaṃbandhaṃ kartṛmātrasya	yadi api ca kartR mAtram na avyaBicArita kratu saMbanDam kartR mAtrasya
   laukikeṣvapi karmasu darśanādyena	lOkikezu api karmasu darSana Adyena
   parṇatādivadanārabhyādhītamapyavyabhicaritakratusaṃbandhajihūdvāreṇa	parNata Adi vat anAraBya aDItam api avyaBicarita kratu saMbanDa jihUdvAreNa
   vākyenaiva kratvarthamāpadyate tathāpi yādṛśa ātmā	vAkyena eva kratu arTam Apadyate taTA api yAdRSaH AtmA
   kartāmuṣmikasvargādiphalabhogabhāgī dehādyatirikte vedāntaiḥ pratipādyate	kartA muzmika svarga Adi Pala Boga BAgI deha Adi atirikte vedAntEH pratipAdyate
   na tādṛśasyāsti laukikeṣu karmasūpayogaḥ /	na tAdRSasya asti lOkikezu karma su upayogaH /
   teṣāmaihikaphalānāṃ śarīrānatiriktenāpi yādṛśatādṛśena kartraupapatteḥ /	tezAm Ehika PalAnAm SarIra anatiriktena api yAdRSa tAdRSena kartR OpapatteH /
   āmuṣmikaphalānāṃ tu vaidikānāṃ karmaṇāṃ tamantareṇāsaṃbhavāttatsaṃbandha	Amuzmika PalAnAm tu vEdikAnAm karmaNAm tam antareNa asaMBavAt tad saMbanDa
   evāyamaupaniṣadaḥ ka4teti	eva ayam OpanizadaH ka4tA iti
   tadavyabhicārāttānyanusmārayajjuhvādivadvākyenaiva tajjñānaṃ	tat avyaBicArAt tAni anusmArayat juhvA Adi vat vAkyena eva tat jQAnam
   parṇatāvatkratvaidamarthyamāpadyata iti phalaśrutirarthavādaḥ /	parNa tA vat kratvEdam arTyam Apadyate iti Pala SrutiH arTa vAdaH /
   taduktam 'dravyasaṃskārakarmasu parārthatvātphalaśrutirarthavādaḥ syāt'	tad ukta m  adravya saMskAra karmasu para arTa tvAt Pala SrutiH arTa vAdaH syAt a
   iti aupaniṣadātmajñānasaṃskṛto hi kartā pāralaukikaphalopabhogayogyo	iti Opanizada Atma jQAna saMskRtaH hi kartA pAralOkika Pala upaBoga yogyaH 
   'smīti vidyāvācchraddhāvānkratuprayogāṅgaṃ nānyathā prokṣitā iva vrīhayaḥ	asmi iti vidyAvAcSradDAvAn kratu prayoga aFgam na anyaTA prokzitAH iva vrIhayaH
   kratvaṅgamiti /	kratu aFgam iti /
   priyādisūcitasya ca saṃsāriṇa evātmano draṣṭavyatvena	priya Adi sUcitasya ca saMsAriNaH eva AtmanaH drazwavya tvena
   pratijñāpanādapahatapāpmatvādi tu tadviśeṣaṇaṃ tasyaiva stutyartham /	pratijQApanAt apahata pApma tva Adi tu tad viSezaNam tasya eva stuti arTam /
   na tu tatparatvamupaniṣadām /	na tu tad para tvam upanizadAm /
   tasmātkratvarthamevātmajñānaṃ kartṛsaṃskāradvārā na punaḥ puruṣārthamiti /	tasmAt kratvarTam eva Atma jQAnam kartR saMskAra dvArAH na punar puruza arTam iti /
   etadupodbalārthaṃ ca brahmavidāmācārādiḥ śrutyavagata upanyastaḥ /	etat upodbala arTam ca brahma vidAm AcAra AdiH Sruti avagataH upanyastaH /
   na kevalaṃ vākyādātmajñānasya kratvarthatvam /	na kevalam vAkyAt Atma jQAnasya kratu arTa tvam /
   tṛtīyāśruteśca /	tRtIyA SruteH ca /
   na tvetatprakṛtodgīthavidyāviṣayaṃ yadeva vidyayeti	na tu etat prakRta udgITa vidyA vizayam yat eva vidyayA iti
   sarvanāmavadhāraṇābhyāṃ vyāpteradhigamat /	sarvanAmavaDAraNAByAm vyApteH aDigamat /
   yathā ya eva dhūmavāndeśaḥ sa vahvimāniti /	yaTA yaH eva DUmavAn deSaH sa vahu imAn iti /
   samanvārambhavacanaṃ ca phalārambhe vidyākarmaṇoḥ sāhityaṃ darśayati /	samanvAramBa vacanam ca Pala AramBe vidyA karmaNoH sAhityam darSayati /
   tacca yadyapyāpneyādiyagaṣaṭkavatsamapradhānatvenāpi bhavati tathāpyuktayā	tat ca yadi api Apneya Adi yaga zawka vat sama praDAna tvena api Bavati taTA api uktayA
   yuktyā vidyāyāḥ karma pratyaṅgabhāvenaiva netavyam /	yuktyA vidyAyAH karma pratyaFga BAvena eva netavyam /
   vedārthajñānavataḥ karmavidhānādupaniṣado 'pi vedārtha iti tajjñānamapi	veda arTa jQAnavataH karma viDAnAt upanizadaH api veda arTaH iti tat jQAnam api
   karmāṅgamiti //1 //	karma aFgam iti //1 //
   # niyamācca.# /	# niyamAt ca.# /
   sugamam //7 //	sugamam //7 //
   # siddhāntayati adhikopadeśāttu bādarāyaṇasyaivaṃ taddarśanāt.# /	# sidDAntayati  aDika upadeSAt tu bAdarAyaNasya evam tad darSanAt.# /
   yadi śarīrādyatiriktaḥ kartā bhoktātmetyetanmatra upaniṣadaḥ paryavasitāḥ	yadi SarIra Adi atiriktaH kartA BoktA AtmA iti etat matraH upanizadaH paryavasitAH
   syustataḥ syādevaṃ, na tvetadasti /	syuH tatas syAt evaM, na tu etat asti /
   tāstvevaṃbhūtajīvānuvādena tasya	tAH tu evaMBUta jIva anuvAdena tasya
   śuddhabuddhodāsīnabrahmarūpatāpratipādanaparā iti tatra tatrāsakṛdāveditam	SudDa budDa udAsIna brahma rUpa tA pratipAdana parAH iti tatra tatra asakRt Aveditam
   anadhigatārthabodhanasvarasatā hi śabdasya pramāṇāntarasiddhānuvādena /	anaDigata arTa boDana svarasa tA hi Sabdasya pramANa antara sidDa anuvAdena /
   tathā caupaniṣadātmajñānasya kratvanuṣṭhānavirodhinaḥ kratusaṃbandha eva	taTA ca Opanizada Atma jQAnasya kratu anuzWAna viroDinaH kratu saMbanDaH eva
   nāsti /	na asti /
   kimaṅga punaḥ tadavyabhicārastataśca kratuśeṣatā /	kim aFga punar tat avyaBicAraH tatas ca kratu Seza tA /
   tathāca nāpavargaphalaśruterarthavādamātratvamapi tu phalaparatvameva /	taTA ca na apavarga Pala SruteH arTa vAda mAtra tvam api tu Pala paratvam eva /
   ata eva priyādisūcitena saṃsāriṇātmanopakramasya tasyaivātmano	atas eva priya Adi sUcitena saMsAriNa AtmanA upakramasya tasya eva AtmanaH 
   'dhikopadidikṣāyāṃ paramātmanātyantābheda upadiśyate /	aDika upadidikzAyAm paramAtmanA atyanta aBedaH upadiSyate /
   yathā samāropitasya bhujagasya rajjurūpādatyantābhedaḥ pratipādyate yo	yaTA samAropitasya Bujagasya rajju rUpAt atyanta aBedaH pratipAdyate yaH 
   'yaṃ sarpaḥ sā rajjuriti /	ayam sarpaH sA rajjuH iti /
   yathā vidyāyāḥ karmāṅgatve darśanamupanyastamevakarmāṅgatve darśanamuktam	yaTA vidyAyAH karma aFga tve darSanam upanyastam eva karma aFga tve darSanam uktam
   tatra karmāṅgatvadarśanānāmanyathāsiddhiruktā kevalavidyādarśanānāṃ tu	tatra karma aFga tva darSanAnAm anyaTA sidDiH uktA kevala vidyA darSanAnAm tu

   # asārvatrikī.# /	# asArvatrikI.# /

   suvyavasthāpyeta /	su vyavasTApyeta /

   pāriśeṣyātparivrāḍiti vakṣyati /	pAriSezyAt parivrAj iti vakzyati /

   # vidhirvā dhāraṇavat.# /	# viDiH vA DAraNavat.# /

   tathāpyāśramāntarāṇāṃ pūrvasiddherabhāvātparāmarśānupapatteḥ, aparāmarśe	taTA api ASrama antarANAm pUrva sidDeH aBAvAt parAmarSa anupapatteH, aparAmarSe
   ca stuterasaṃbhavena kiṃparatayā ekavākyatāstvitī tāṃ bhaṅktvā	ca stuteH a saMBavena kiMparatayA eka vAkyatAH tu itI tAm BaFktvA

   atrāvāntaravicāramārabhate  # sā ca kiṃ caturṣviti.# /	atra avAntara vicAram AraBate # sA ca kim caturzu iti.# /

   tatra pūrvapakṣamāha  # tatra tapaḥśabdeneti.# /	tatra pUrva pakzam Aha # tatra tapaH Sabdena iti.# /
   ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ /	ayam aBisaMDiH /
   yadi tāvadbrahmasaṃstha iti padaṃ pratyastamityāvayavārthaṃ parivrājake	yadi tAvat brahma saMsTaH iti padam pratyastam iti a avayava arTam parivrAjake
   'śvakarṇādipadavadrūḍhaṃ tadāśramaprāptimātreṇaivāmṛtībhāva iti na	aSva karNa Adi pada vat rUXam tad ASrama prApti mAtreNa eva amRtIBAvaH iti na
   tadbhāvāyā brahmajñānamapekṣeta /	tad BAvAyAH brahma jQAnam apekzeta /
   tathāca nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāyeti virodhaḥ /	taTA ca na anyaH panTAH vidyate ayanAya iti viroDaH /
   naca saṃbhatyavayavārthe samudāyasaktikalpanā /	na ca saMBati avayava arTe samudAya sakti kalpanA /
   tasmādbrahmaṇi saṃsthāsyeti /	tasmAt brahmaNi saMsTAsya iti /
   brahmasaṃsthaḥ /	brahma saMsTaH /
   evañca caturṣvāśrameṣu yasyaiva brahmaṇi niṣṭhatvamāśramiṇaḥ sa	evaQca caturzu ASramezu yasya eva brahmaNi nizWa tvam ASramiNaH sa
   brahmasaṃstho 'mṛtatvametīti yuktam /	brahma saMsTaH amRta tvam eti iti yuktam /
   tatra tāvadbrahmacārigṛhasthau svaśabdābhihitau tapaḥpadena ca	tatra tAvat brahmacAri gRhasTO sva Sabda aBihitO tapaH padena ca
   tapaḥpradhānatayā bhikṣuvānaprasthāvupasthāpitau /	tapaH praDAna tayA BikzuvAn aprasTO= upasTApitO /
   bhikṣurapi hi samādhikaśaucāṣṭagrāsībhojananiyamādbhavati	BikzuH api hi sama aDika SOca azwa grAsI Bojana niyamAt Bavati
   vānaprasthavattapaḥpradhānaḥ /	vAnaprasTa vat tapaH praDAnaH /

   yadi tāvatkarmayogaḥ karmitā sā bhikṣorapi kāyavāṅmanobhirasti /	yadi tAvat karma yogaH karmitA sA BikzoH api kAya vAc manoBiH asti /
   atha ye na brahmārpaṇena karma kurvanti kintu kāmārthitayā te karmiṇaḥ /	aTa ye na brahma arpaNena karma kurvanti kintu kAma arTitayA te karmiNaH /
   tathā sati gṛhasthādayo 'pi brahmārpaṇena karma kurvāṇā na karmiṇaḥ /	taTA sati gRhasTa AdayaH api brahma arpaNena karma kurvANAH na karmiNaH /
   tasmādbrahmaṇi tātparyaṃ brahmaniṣṭhatā na tu karmatyāgaḥ /	tasmAt brahmaNi tAtparyam brahma nizWatA na tu karma tyAgaH /
   pramāṇavirodhāt /	pramANa viroDAt /

   evañca trayo 'pyāśramā abrahmasaṃsthāḥ santaḥ puṇyalokabhājo bhavanti yaḥ	evaQca trayaH api ASramAH abrahma saMsTAH santaH puNya loka BAjaH Bavanti yaH
   punareteṣu brahmasaṃsthaḥ so 'mṛtatvabhāgiti /	punar etezu brahma saMsTaH saH amRta tva BAj iti /
   naca yeṣāṃ puṇyalokabhāktvaṃ teṣāmevāmṛtatvamiti virodhaḥ /	na ca yezAm puNya loka BAj tvam tezAm eva amRta tvam iti viroDaH /
   yathā devadattayajñadattau mandaprajñāvabhūtāṃ saṃprati tayoryajñādattastu	yaTA devadatta yajQadattO manda prajQA a= aBUtAm saMprati tayoH yajQAt attaH tu
   śāstrābhyāsātpaṭuprajño vartate iti tathehāpi ya evābrahmasaṃsthāḥ /	SAstra aByAsAt pawu prajQaH vartate iti taTA iha api yaH eva abrahma saMsTAH /
   puṇyalokabhājasta eva brahmasaṃsthā amṛtatvabhāja	puNya loka BAjaH te eva brahma saMsTAH amRta tva BAja
   ityavasthābhedādavirodhaḥ /	iti avasTA BedAt aviroDaH /
   tathāca brahmasaṃstha iti yaugikaṃ padaṃ prakṛtaviṣayaṃ bhaviṣyati /	taTA ca brahma saMsTaH iti yOgikam padam prakRta vizayam Bavizyati /
   yathā āgnepyāgnīdhramupatiṣṭhata ityatra viniyuktāpi prakṛtaivāgneyī	yaTA AgnepyAgnIDram upatizWate iti atra viniyuktA api prakRtA eva AgneyI
   gṛhyate /	gRhyate /
   naca viniyuktaviniyogavirodhaḥ /	na ca viniyukta viniyoga viroDaH /
   yadi hyatrāgnotyupadiśyeta tato yathā pratītā tathoddiśyate /	yadi hi atra agnoti upadiSyeta tatas yaTA pratItA taTA uddiSyate /
   viniyuktā ca pratītirbhavediti viniyuktaviniyogavirodhaḥ /	viniyuktA ca pratItiH Bavet iti viniyukta viniyoga viroDaH /
   iha tu āgnīdhropasthāne sā vidheyatvena viniyujyate /	iha tu AgnIDra upasTAne sA viDeya tvena viniyujyate /
   na tūddiśyate /	na tu uddiSyate /
   vidheyatvena ca viniyoge āgneyīpadārthāpekṣaṇātprakṛtātikrame	viDeya tvena ca viniyoge AgneyI padArTa apekzaNAt prakRta atikrame
   pramāṇābhāvāt /	pramANa aBAvAt /

   naca yātayāmatayā na viniyogaḥ /	na ca yAtayAmatayA na viniyogaH /
   vācasteme sarveṣāmeva mantrāṇāṃ viniyogādanyatrāpyaviniyogaprasaṅgāt /	vAcaH teme sarvezAm eva mantrANAm viniyogAt anyatra api aviniyoga prasaFgAt /
   tathehāpi prakṛtā evāśramā buddhiviparivartinaḥ parāmṛśyante nānuktaḥ	taTA iha api prakRtAH eva ASramAH budDi viparivartinaH parAmRSyante na anuktaH
   parivrāḍeveti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /	parivrAj A iva iti pUrvaH pakzaH /
   rāddhāntamupakramate  # tadayuktam /	rAdDa antam upakramate # tat ayuktam /
   nahi satyāṃ gatau vānaprasthaviśeṣeneti.# /	na hi satyAm gatO vAnaprasTa viSezena iti.# /

   samāpanamucitam /	samApanam ucitam /

   iti.# /	iti.# /
   na khalu parākādibhiḥ kāyakleśapradhāno yathā vānaprasthastathā bhikṣuḥ	na Kalu parAka AdiBiH kAya kleSa praDAnaH yaTA vAnaprasTaH taTA BikzuH

   siddhasaṃkhyābhedeṣu ca saṃkhyāntarābhidhānamaśliṣṭamityāha  # catuṣṭvena	sidDa saMKyA Bedezu ca saMKyA antara aBiDAnam aSlizwam iti Aha # catuzwvena
   ceti /	ca iti /

   na tāvantraya iti bhikṣusaṃgrahe tadvarjanamete traya ityatra vartuṃ	na tAvantrayaH iti Bikzu saMgrahe tat varjanam ete trayaH iti atra vartum
   śakyam /	Sakyam /

   tatsaṃsthānyatatsaṃsthāni ca bhikṣustatsaṃstha ityeva /	tad saMsTAni atad saMsTAni ca BikzuH tad saMsTaH iti eva /

   tatrāñjasī nānyatra /	tatra aQjasI na anyatra /
   # śamadamādistu tadīya iti.# /	# Sama dama AdiH tu tadIyaH iti.# /

   evātyarecayaditi.# /	eva atyarecayat iti.# /
   etaduktaṃ bhavati brahmaparatayā sarveṣaṇāparityāgalakṣaṇo nyāso brahmeti	etat uktam Bavati brahma para tayA sarva IzaNA parityAga lakzaNaH nyAsaH brahma iti
   tathā cedṛśaṃ nyāsalakṣaṇaṃ brahmasaṃsthatvaṃ bhikṣorevāsādhāraṇaṃ	taTA ca IdRSam nyAsa lakzaNam brahma saMsTa tvam BikzA UH eva asA DAraNam
   netareṣāmāśramiṇām /	na itarezAm ASramiNAm /

   na tvanadhikṛtaṃ pratītyarthaḥ //20 //	na tu anaDikRtam prati iti arTaH //20 //
   # stutimātramupādānāditi cennāpūrvatvāt.# /	# stuti mAtram upAdAnAt iti ced na apUrva tvAt.# /
   yadyatra saṃnidhāna upāsanāvidhirnāsti tataḥ pradeśāntarasthito 'pi	yadi atra saMniDAnaH upAsana aviDiH na asti tatas pradeSa antara sTitaH api
   vidhivyabhicāritatadvidhisaṃbandhenodgīthenopasthāpitaḥ sa eṣa rasānāṃ	viDi vyaBicArita tad viDi saMbanDena udgITena upasTApitaH saH eza rasAnAm
   rasatama ityādinā padasaṃdarbheṇaikavākyabhāvamupagataḥ stūyate /	rasatamaH ityAdinA pada saMdarBeNa eka vAkya BAvam upagataH stUyate /
   nahi samabhivyāhṛtairevaikavākyatā bhavatīti kaścinniyamaheturasti /	na hi samaBivyAhRtEH eva eka vAkyatA Bavati iti kaScid niyama hetuH asti /
   anuṣaṅgātideśalabdhairapi	anuzaFga atideSa labDEH api

   tasyaiva vidheḥ stutirna tūpāsanāviṣayasamarpaṇapara	tasya eva viDeH stutiH na tu upAsanA vizaya samarpaNa para

   'bhidhīyate na tāvaddūrasthena karmavidhivākyenaikavākyatāsaṃbhavaḥ /	aBiDIyate na tAvat dUra sTena karma viDi vAkyena eka vAkyatA saMBavaH /
   pratītasamabhivyāhṛtānāṃ vidhinaikavākyatayā stutyarthatvamarthavādānāṃ	pratIta samaBivyAhRtAnAm viDinA eka vAkya tayA stuti arTa tvam arTa vAdAnAm
   raktapaṭanyāyena bhavati /	rakta pawa nyAyena Bavati /

   ata eva	atas eva
   vidherapekṣābhāvātpravartanātmakasyānuṣaṅgatideśādibhirarthavādaprāptyabhidhānamasamañjasam	viDeH apekzA BAvAt pravartana Atmakasya anuzaFga tideSa AdiBiH arTavAda prApti aBiDAnam asamaQjasam

   ' bhāvanāyāḥ khalu kartṛsamīhitānukūlatvaṃ vidhirniṣedhaśca	a BAvanAyAH Kalu kartR samIhita anukUla tvam viDiH nizeDaH ca
   karturahitānukūlatvam /	kartuH ahita anukUla tvam /

   duḥkhaphalaḥ' iti /	duHKa PalaHa iti /
   etaccāsmābhirupapāditaṃ nyāyakaṇikāyām /	etat ca asmABiH upapAditam nyAya kaNikAyAm /

   yathāhuḥ kamabhvastayaḥ kriyāsāmānyavacanā iti /	yaTA AhuH kam aBvastayaH kriyA sAmAnya vacanAH iti /
   ata eva kṛbhvastīnudāhṛtavān /	atas eva kRBvastIn udAhRtavAn /

   bhavatiścaiṣa janmani /	BavatiH ca eza janmani /
   yathā kulālavyāpārādghaṭo bhavati bījādaṅkuro bhavatīti prayuñjate /	yaTA kulAla vyApArAt GawaH Bavati bIjAt aFkuraH Bavati iti prayuQjate /

   tasmādasti sattāyāṃ na janmanīti //21 //	tasmAt asti sattAyAm na janmani iti //21 //
   # pāriplavārthā iti cenna viśeṣitatvāt.# /	# pAriplava arTAH iti ced na viSezita tvAt.# /
   yadyapi upaniṣadākhyānāni vidyāsaṃnidhau śrutāni tathāpi 'sarvāṇyākhyānāni	yadi api upanizad AKyAnAni vidyA saMniDO SrutAni taTA api asarvANi AKyAnAni
   pāriplave' iti sarvaśrutyā niḥśeṣārthatayā durbalasya	pAriplave a iti sarva SrutyA niHSeza arTa tayA durbalasya
   saṃnidherbādhitatvātpariplavārthānyevākhyānāni /	saMniDeH bADita tvAt pariplava arTAni eva AKyAnAni /
   naca sarvā dāśatayīranubrūyāditi viniyoge 'pi dāśatayīnāṃ	na ca sarvAH dASa tayIH anubrUyAt iti viniyoge api dASa tayInAm

   tathehāpi satyapi pāriplave viniyege saṃnidhānādvidyāṅgatvamapi	taTA iha api sati api pAriplave viniyege saMniDAnAt vidyA aFga tvam api
   bhaviṣyatīti vācyam /	Bavizyati iti vAcyam /

   tasmātpāriplavārthānyevākhyānānīti prāpta ucyate naiṣāmākhyānānāṃ	tasmAt pAriplava arTAni eva AKyAnAni iti prAptaH ucyate nA ezAm AKyAnAnAm
   pāriplave viniyogaḥ /	pAriplave viniyogaH /

   rājetyādīni teṣāmeva tatra viniyogaḥ, tānyeva hi pāriplavena viśeṣitāni /	rAjA ityAdIni tezAm eva tatra viniyogaH, tAni eva hi pAriplavena viSezitAni /

   yathā sarve brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyā ityatra nimintrātāpekṣaḥ sarvaśabdaḥ /	yaTA sarve brAhmaNAH BojayitavyAH iti atra nimintra AtApekzaH sarva SabdaH /
   tathā copaniṣadākhyānānāṃ vidyāsaṃnidhirapratidvandīṃ vidyaikavākyatāṃ so	taTA ca upanizad A AKyAnAnAm vidyA saMniDiH apratidvandIm vidyA eka vAkyatAm saH 
   'rodīdityādīnāmiva vidhyekavākyatvaṃ gamayatīti siddham /	arodIt iti AdInAm iva viDi eka vAkya tvam gamayati iti sidDam /
   pratipattisaukaryāccetyupākhyānena hi bālā apyavadhīyante yathā	pratipatti sOkaryAt ca iti upAKyAnena hi bAlAH api avaDIyante yaTA
   tantropākhyāyikayeti //23 //	tantra upAKyAyikayA iti //23 //
   # ata eva cāgnīndhanādyanapekṣā.# /	# atas eva ca agni inDana Adi anapekzA.# /
   vidyāyāḥ kratvarthatve sati tathā kratūpakaraṇāya svakāryāya	vidyAyAH kratu arTa tve sati taTA kratu upakaraNAya sva kAryAya
   kraturapekṣitaḥ /	kratuH apekzitaH /
   tadabhāve kasyopakāro vidyayeti /	tad aBAve kasya upakAraH vidyayA iti /
   yadā tu puruṣārthā tadā nānayā kraturapekṣitaḥ svakārye nirapekṣāyā eva	yadA tu puruza arTA tadA na anayA kratuH apekzitaH sva kArye nirapekzAyAH eva
   tasyāḥ sāmarthyāt /	tasyAH sAmarTyAt /
   agnīndhānādinā cāśramakarmāṇyupalakṣyante tadāha  #	agni inDAna AdinA ca ASrama karmANi upalakzyante tadA aha #
   agnīndhanādīvyāśramakarmāṇi vidyayā svārthasiddhau nāpekṣitavyānīti.# /	agni inDana AdIvyASrama karmANi vidyayA sva arTa sidDO na apekzitavyAni iti.# /
   svārthasiddhau nāpekṣitavyāni na tu svasiddhāviti /	sva arTa sidDO na apekzitavyAni na tu sva sidDO= iti /
   etaccādhikamupariṣṭādvakṣyate /	etat ca aDikam uparizwAt vakzyate /
   tadvivakṣayā caitatprayojanaṃ pūrvatanasyādhikaraṇasyoktam //25 //	tad vivakzayA ca etat prayojanam pUrvatanasya aDikaraNasya uktam //25 //
   adhikavivakṣyeti yaduktaṃ tadadhikamāha  # sarvāpekṣā ca	aDika vivakzya iti yat uktam tad aDikam Aha # sarva apekzA ca
   yajñādiśruteraśvavat.# /	yajQa Adi SruteH aSvavat.# /
   yathā svārthasiddhau nāpekṣyante āśramakarmāṇi evamutpattāvapi	yaTA sva arTa sidDO na apekzyante ASrama karmANi evam utpattO= api
   nāpekṣyeranniti śaṅkā syāt /	na apekzyeran= iti SaFkA syAt /
   naca vividiṣanti yajñenetyādivirodhaḥ /	na ca vividizanti yajQena ityAdi viroDaH /
   nahyeṣa vidhirapi tu vartamānāpadeśaḥ /	na hi eza viDiH api tu vartamAna apadeSaH /
   sa ca stutyāpyupapadyate /	sa ca stutyA api upapadyate /
   apica catasraḥ pratipattayo brahmaṇi /	api ca catasraH pratipattayaH brahmaNi /
   prathamā tāvadupaniṣadvākyaśravaṇamātrādbhavati yāṃ kilācakṣate	praTamA tAvat upanizad vAkya SravaNa mAtrAt Bavati yAm kila Acakzate
   śravaṇamiti /	SravaNam iti /
   dvitīyā mīmāṃsāsahitā tasyādevopaniṣadvākyādyāmācakṣate /	dvitIyA mImAMsA sahitA tasyAt eva upanizad vAkya AdyAm Acakzate /
   mananamiti /	mananam iti /
   tṛtīyā cintā /	tRtIyA cintA /
   santatimayī yāmācakṣate nididhyāsanamiti /	santati mayI yAm Acakzate nidiDi Asanam iti /
   caturthī sākṣātkāravatī vṛttirūpā nāntarīyakaṃ hi tasyāḥ kaivalyamiti /	caturTI sAkzAtkAravatI vRtti rUpA na antarIyakam hi tasyAH kEvalyam iti /
   tatrādye tāvatpratipatti viditapadatadarthasya	tatra Adye tAvat pratipatti vidita padatad arTasya
   viditavākyagatigocaranyāyasya ca puṃsa upapadyete eveti na tatra	vidita vAkya gati gocara nyAyasya ca puMsaH upapadyete eva iti na tatra
   karmāpekṣā /	karma apekzA /
   te eva ca cintāmayīṃ tṛtīyaṃ pratipattiṃ prasuvāte iti na tatrāpi	te eva ca cintA mayIm tRtIyam pratipattim prasuvAte iti na tatra api
   karmāpekṣā /	karma apekzA /
   sā cādaranairantaryadīrghakālasevitā sākṣātkāravatīmādhatta eva	sA ca Adara nErantarya dIrGa kAla sevitA sAkzAtkAravatIm ADattaH eva
   pratipattiṃ caturthīmiti na tatrāpyasti karmāpekṣā /	pratipattim caturTIm iti na tatra api asti karma apekzA /
   tannāntarīyakaṃ ca kaivalyamiti na tasyāpi karmāpekṣā /	tat na AntarIyakam ca kEvalyam iti na tasya api karma apekzA /
   tadevaṃ pramāṇataśca prameyata utpattau ca kārye ca na jñānasya	tat evam pramANataH ca prameyataH utpattO ca kArye ca na jQAnasya
   karmāpekṣeti bījaṃ śaṅkāyām /	karma apekzA iti bIjam SaFkAyAm /
   evaṃ prāpta ucyate utpattau jñānasya karmāpekṣā vidyate vividiṣotpādadvārā	evam prAptaH ucyate utpattO jQAnasya karma apekzA vidyate vividizA utpAda dvArA
   'vividiṣanti yajñena' iti śruteḥ /	avividizanti yajQena a iti SruteH /
   na cedaṃ vartamānāpadeśatvātstutimātramapūrvatvādarthasya /	na ca idam vartamAna apadeSa tvAt stuti mAtram apUrva tvAt arTasya /
   yathā yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavatīti parṇamayatāvidhirapūrvatvānna tvayaṃ	yaTA yasya parNa mayI juhUrBavati iti parNa maya tA viDiH apUrva tvAt na tu ayam
   vartamānāpadeśaḥ, anuvādānupapatteḥ /	vartamAna apadeSaH, anuvAda anupapatteH /
   tasmādutpattau vidyayā śamādivat karmāṇyapekṣyante /	tasmAt utpattO vidyayA Sama Adi vat karmANi apekzyante /
   tatrāpyevaṃviditi vidyāsvarūpasaṃyogādantaraṅgāṇi vidyotpāde śamādīni,	tatra api evaMvid iti vidyA svarUpa saMyogAt antaraFgANi vidyA utpAde Sama AdIni,
   bahiraṅgāṇi karmāṇi vividiṣāsaṃyogāt /	bahis aFgANi karmANi vividizA saMyogAt /
   tathāhi āśramavihitanityakarmānuṣṭhānāddharmasamutpādastataḥ pāpmā	taTA hi a ASrama vihita nitya karma anuzWAnAt Darma samutpAdaH tatas pApmA
   vilīyate /	vilIyate /
   sa hi tattvato 'nityāśuciduḥ khānātmani saṃsāre sati	sa hi tattvataH anitya aSuci duH KAn Atmani saMsAre sati
   nityaśucimukhātmalakṣaṇena vibhrameṇa malinayati	nitya Suci muKa Atma lakzaNena viBrameNa malinayati
   cittasattvamadharmanibandhanatvādvibhramāṇām /	citta sattvam aDarma nibanDana tvAt viBramANAm /
   ataḥ pāpmanaḥ prakṣaye pratyakṣopapattidvārāpāvaraṇe sati	atas pApmanaH prakzaye pratyakza upapatti dvAra apAvaraNe sati
   pratyakṣopapattibhyāṃ saṃsārasya	pratyakza upapattiByAm saMsArasya
   tāttvikīmanityāśuciduḥkharūpatāmapratyūhaṃ viniścineti /	tAttvikIm anitya aSuci duHKa rUpa tAm apratyUham viniScinA iti /
   tato 'sminnanabhiratisaṃjñaṃ vairāgyamupajāyate /	tatas asmin= anaBirati saMjQam vErAgyam upajAyate /
   tatastajjihāsāsyopāvartate /	tatas tad jihAsA asya upAvartate /
   tato hānopāyaṃ prayeṣate paryeṣamāṇaścātmatattvajñānamasyopāya iti	tatas hAna upAyam prayezate paryezamANaH ca Atma tattva jQAnam asya upAyaH iti
   śāstradācāryavacanāccopaśrutya tajjijñāsata iti	SAstra dAcArya vacanAt ca upaSrutya tat jijQAsate iti
   vividiṣopahāramukhenātmajñānotpattāvasti karmāṇamupayogaḥ /	vividizA upahAra muKena Atma jQAna utpattO= asti karmANam upayogaH /
   vividiṣuḥ khalu yukta ekāgratayā śravaṇamanane kartumutsahate /	vividizuH Kalu yuktaH ekAgra tayA SravaNa manane kartum utsahate /
   tato 'sya 'tattvamasi' itivākyannirvicikitsaṃ jñānamutpadyate /	tatas asya atat tvam asi a iti vAkyat nirvicikitsam jQAnam utpadyate /
   naca nirvicikitsaṃ tattvamasīti vākyārthamavadhārayataḥ karmaṇyadhikāro	na ca nirvicikitsam tat tvam asi iti vAkya arTam avaDArayataH karmaNi aDikAraH 
   'sti /	asti /
   yena bhāvanāyāṃ vā bhāvanākārye vā sākṣātkāre karmaṇāmupayogaḥ /	yena BAvanAyAm vA BAvanA kArye vA sAkzAtkAre karmaNAm upayogaH /
   etena vṛttirūrapasākṣātkārakārye 'pavarge karmaṇāmupayogo dūranirasto	etena vRtti rUra pasAkzAtkAra kArye apavarge karmaNAm upayogaH dUra nirastaH 
   veditavyaḥ /	veditavyaH /

   viduṣastatrānadhikārādityuktam /	viduzaH tatra anaDikArAt iti uktam /
   dṛṣṭārtheṣu tu karmasu pratiṣiddhavarjamanadhikāre 'pyasaktasya svārasikī	dRzwa arTezu tu karmasu pratizidDa varjam anaDikAre api asaktasya svArasikI
   pravṛttirupapadyata eva /	pravRttiH upapadyate eva /

   ataśca 'bhrāntyā cellaukikaṃ karma vaidikaṃ ca tathāstu te' iti pralāpaḥ /	atas ca aBrAntyA ced lOkikam karma vEdikam ca taTA astu te a iti pralApaH /
   śamadamādīnāṃ tu	Sama dama AdInAm tu
   vidyotpādāyopāttānāmupariṣṭādavasthāsvābhāvyādanapekṣitānāmapyanuvṛttiḥ /	vidyA utpAdAya upAttAnAm uparizwAt avasTA svABAvyAt anapekzitAnAm api anuvRttiH /
   upapāditaṃ caitadasmābhiḥ prathamasūtra ite neha punaḥ pratyāpyate /	upapAditam ca etat asmABiH praTama sUtraH ite na iha punar pratyApyate /
   tasmādvividiṣotpādadvārāśramakarmaṇāṃ vidyotpattāvupayogo na vidyākārya	tasmAt vividiza utpAda dvAra ASrama karmaNAm vidyA utpattO= upayogaH na vidyA kArya
   iti siddham /	iti sidDam /
   śeṣamatirohitārtham //26 //	Sezam ati rohita arTam //26 //
   sarvānnānumatiśca prāṇātyaye taddarśanāt /	sarvAn na anumatiH ca prANa atyaye tad darSanAt /
   prāṇasaṃvāde sarvendriyāṇāṃ śrūyate /	prANa saMvAde sarva indriyANAm SrUyate /
   eṣa kila vicāraviṣayaḥ sarvāṇi khalu vāgādīnyavajitya prāṇo mukhya	eza kila vicAra vizayaH  sarvANi Kalu vAc AdIni avajitya prANaH muKya
   uvācaitāni kiṃ me 'nnaṃ bhaviṣyatīti, tāni hocuḥ /	uvAca etAni kim me annam Bavizyati iti, tAni ha UcuH /
   yadidaṃ loke 'nnamā ca śvabhya ā ca śakunibhyaḥ sarvaprāṇināṃ yadannaṃ	yat idam loke annamA ca SvaByaH A ca SakuniByaH sarva prANinAm yat annam
   tattavānnamiti /	tat tava annam iti /
   tadanena saṃdarbheṇa prāṇasya sarvamannamityanucintanaṃ vidhāyāha	tat anena saMdarBeNa prANasya sarvam annam iti anucintanam viDAya Aha
   śrutiḥ 'na ha vā evaṃvidi kiñcanānannaṃ bhavati' iti /	SrutiH  anaH ha vE evaMvidi kiQcana anannam Bavati a iti /
   sarvaṃ prāṇasyānnamityevaṃvidi na kiñcinānannaṃ bhavatīti /	sarvam prANasya annam iti evaMvidi na kiQcinA anannam Bavati iti /
   tatra saṃśayaḥ kimetatsarvānnābhyanujñānaṃ śamādivadetadvidyāṅgatayā	tatra saMSayaH kim etat sarvAn na aByanujQAnam Sama Adi vat etat vidyA aFga tayA
   vidhīyata uta stutyarthaṃ saṃkīrtyata iti /	viDIyate uta stuti arTam saMkIrtyate iti /
   tatra yadyapi bhavatīti vartamānāpadeśānna vidhiḥ pratīyate /	tatra yadi api Bavati iti vartamAna apadeSAt na viDiH pratIyate /
   tathāpi yathā yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavatīti vartamānāpadeśādapi	taTA api yaTA yasya parNa mayI juhUH Bavati iti vartamAna apadeSAt api
   palāśamayītvavidhipratipattiḥ pañcamalakārāpattyā tathehāpi	palASa mayI tva viDi pratipattiH paQca malakAra ApattyA taTA iha api
   pravṛttiviśeṣakaratālābhe vidhipratipattiḥ /	pravRtti viSeza kara ta alABe viDi pratipattiH /

   bhakṣyābhakṣyaśāstraṃ ca sāmānyataḥ pravṛttamanena viśeṣaśāstreṇa bādhyate	Bakzya aBakzya SAstram ca sAmAnyatas pravRttam anena viSeza SAstreNa bADyate
   gamyāgamyavivekaśāstramiva sāmānyataḥ pravṛttaṃ	gamya agamya viveka SAstram iva sAmAnyatas pravRttam

   ucyate aśakteḥ kalpanīyatvācchāstrāntaravirodhataḥ /	ucyate aSakteH kalpanIya tvAt SAstra antara viroDataH /
   prāṇasyānnamidaṃ sarvamiti cintanasaṃstavaḥ //	prANasya annam idam sarvam iti cintana saMstavaH //
   na tāvatkauleyakamaryādamannaṃ manuṣyajātinā yugapatparyāyeṇa vā	na tAvat kOleyaka marI Adam annam manuzya jAtinA yugapad paryAyeNa vA
   śakyamattum /	Sakya mattum /
   ibhakarabhakādīnāmannasya śamīkarīrakaṇṭakavaṭakāṣṭhāderekasyāpi	iBakaraBaka AdInAm annasya SamI karIra kaNwaka vawa kAzWa AdeH ekasya api
   aśakyādanatvāt /	aSakyAdana tvAt /
   na cātra liṅ iva sphuṭatarā vidhipratipattirasti /	na ca atra liF iva sPuwatarA viDi pratipattiH asti /
   naca kalpanīyo vidhirapūrvatvābhāvāt /	na ca kalpanIyaH viDiH apUrva tva aBAvAt /
   stutyāpi ca tadupapatteḥ /	stutyA api ca tad upapatteH /

   tasmātsarvaṃ prāṇasyānnamityanucintanavidhānastutiriti sāmpratam /	tasmAt sarvam prANasya annam iti anucintana viDAna stutiH iti sAmpratam /
   śakyatve ca pravṛttiviśeṣakaratopayujyate nāśakyavidhānatve /	Sakya tve ca pravRtti viSeza karatA upayujyate na aSakya viDAna tve /
   prāṇātyasya iti cāvadhāraṇaparaṃ prāṇātyaya eva sarvānnatvam /	prANAti asyaH iti ca avaDAraNa param prANa atyayaH eva sarva anna tvam /
   tatropākhyānācca sphuṭataravidhismṛteśca surāvarjaṃ vidvāṃsamavidvāṃsaṃ	tatra upAKyAnAt ca sPuwatara viDi smRteH ca surA varjam vidvAMsam avidvAMsam
   prati vidhānāt /	prati viDAnAt /
   na tvanyatreti /	na tu anyatra iti /
   # ibhyena.#hastipakena # sāmisvāditā.#nardhabhakṣitān /	# iByena .#hastipakena # sAmi svAdi tA.#narDa BakzitAn /

   munirnirapatrapa ibhyena sāmijagdhānkhādayāmāsa //28 //	muniH nirapatrapaH iByena sAmi jagDAn KAdayAmAsa //28 //
   # vihitatvāccāśramatarmāpi.# /	# vihita tvAt ca ASrama tarmA api.# /
   nityāni hyāśramakarmāṇi yāvajjīvaśruternityehitopāyatayāvaśyaṃ kartavyāni	nityAni hi ASrama karmANi yAvat jIva SruteH nityehita upAya tayA avaSyam kartavyAni
   vividiṣantīti ca vidyāsaṃyogādvidyāyāścāvaśyaṃbhāvaniyamābhāvādanityatā	vividizanti iti ca vidyA saMyogAt vidyAyAH ca avaSyaMBAva niyama aBAvAt anitya tA
   prāpnoti /	prApnoti /
   nityānityasaṃyogaścaikasya na saṃbhavati, avaśyānavaśyaṃbhāvayorekatra	nitya anitya saMyogaH ca ekasya na saMBavati, avaSya an avaSyaMBAvayoH ekatra
   virodhāt /	viroDAt /
   naca vākyabhedādvāstavo virodhaḥ śakyo 'panetum /	na ca vAkya BedAt vAstavaH viroDaH SakyaH apanetum /
   tasmādanadhyavasāya evātreti prāptam /	tasmAt anaDyavasAyaH eva atra iti prAptam /
   etena 'ekasya tūbhayatve saṃyogapṛthaktvam' ityākṣiptam /	etena aekasya tu uBaya tve saMyoga pRTaktvam a iti Akziptam /
   evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate siddhe hi syādvirodho 'yaṃ na tu sādhye kathañcana	evam prApte aBiDIyate  sidDe hi syAt viroDaH ayam na tu sADye kaTaQcana
   vidhyadhīnātmalābhe 'smin yathāvidhi matā sthitiḥ //	viDi aDIna Atma lABe asmin yaTAviDi matA sTitiH //

   na punaḥ siddhe vikalpasaṃbhavaḥ /	na punar sidDe vikalpa saMBavaH /
   tadihaikamevāgnihotrākhyaṃ karma yāvajjīvaśruternimittena yujyamānaṃ	tat iha ekam eva agnihotra AKyam karma yAvat jIva SruteH nimittena yujyamAnam
   nityehitopāttaduritaprakṣayaprayojanamavaśyakartavyaṃ, vidyāṅgatayā ca	nityehita upAtta durita prakzaya prayojanam avaSya kartavyan, vidyA aFga tayA ca
   vidyāyāḥ kādācitkatayānavaśyaṃ bhāve 'pi 'kāmyo vā naimittiko vā vikṛtya	vidyAyAH kAdAcid katayA anavaSyam BAve api akAmyaH vA nEmittikaH vA vikRtya
   niviśate' iti nyāyādanityādhikāreṇa niviśamānamapi na nityamanityayati,	niviSate a iti nyAyAt anitya aDikAreNa niviSamAnam api na nityam anityayati,
   tenāpi tasmiddheriti saṃyogapṛthaktvānna nityānityasaṃyogavirodha ekasya	tena api tasmid DeH iti saMyoga pRTaktvAt na nitya anitya saMyoga viroDaH ekasya
   kāryasyeti siddham /	kAryasya iti sidDam /

   # avidhilakṣaṇatvāditi.# /	# aviDi lakzaNa tvAt iti.# /

   avihite ca tadanupapatteḥ /	avihite ca tad anupapatteH /

   śeṣamatirohitārtham //32 //	Sezam ati rohita arTam //32 //
   # sarvathāpi ta evobhayaliṅgāt.# /	# sarvaTA api te eva uBaya liFgAt.# /
   yathā māsamagnihotraṃ juhvatīti prakaraṇāntarātkarmabheda evamihāpi	yaTA mAsam agnihotram juhvati iti prakaraNa antarAt karma BedaH evam iha api
   'tametaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena'	atam etam veda anuvacanena brAhmaNAH vividizanti yajQena a
   itikratuprakaraṇamatikramyaśravaṇātprakaraṇāntarāttadbuddhivyavacchede	itikratu prakaraNam atikramya SravaNAt prakaraNa antarAt tat budDi vyavacCede
   sati karmāntaramiti prāpta ucyate satyapi prakaraṇāntare tadeva karma,	sati karma antaram iti prAptaH ucyate  sati api prakaraNa antare tat eva karma,
   śruteḥ smṛteśca saṃyogabhedaḥ paraṃ yathā 'agnihotraṃ juhuyātsvargakāmaḥ'	SruteH smRteH ca saMyoga BedaH param yaTA aagnihotram juhuyAt svarga kAmaH a
   'yāvajjīvamagnihotraṃ juhuyāt' iti tadevāgnihotramubhayasaṃyuktam /	ayAvat jIvam agni hotram juhuyAt a iti tat eva agnihotram uBaya saMyuktam /
   nahi prakaraṇāntaraṃ sākṣadbhedakam /	na hi prakaraNa antaram sAkzadBedakam /

   iha tu siddhavadutpannarūpāṇyeva yajñādīni vividiṣāyāṃ viniyuñjāno na	iha tu sidDa vat utpanna rUpANi eva yajQa AdIni vividizAyAm viniyuQjAnaH na

   uttaran # tadadhikārāt.#bhikṣostadadhikārāt /	uttaran # tad aDikArAt.#BikzoH tad aDikArAt /

   sūtrāvayavaṃ yojayituṃ śaṅkate  # nanviti.# /	sUtra avayavam yojayitum SaFkate # nanu iti.# /
   pariharati  # ata āha pakṣeṇeti.# /	pariharati # atas Aha pakzeNa iti.# /
   vidyāvāniti na vidyātiśayo vivakṣitaḥ /	vidyAvAn iti na vidyA atiSayaH vivakzitaH /
   api tu vidyodayāyābhyāse pravṛtto na punarutpannavidyātiśayaḥ /	api tu vidyA udayAya aByAse pravRttaH na punar utpanna vidyA atiSayaH /
   tathācāsya pakṣe kadācidbhedadarśanātsaṃbhava ityarthaḥ /	taTA ca asya pakze kadAcid BedadarSanAt saMBavaH iti arTaH /
   vidhyādirvidhimukhyaḥ pradhānamiti yāvat /	viDi AdiH viDi muKyaH praDAnam iti yAvat /
   ata eva samidādirvidhyantaḥ sa hi vidhiḥ pradhānavidheḥ paścāditi /	atas eva samiD AdiH viDi antaH sa hi viDiH praDAna viDeH paScAt iti /
   tatrāśrūyamāṇavidhitve 'pūrvatvādvidhirāstheya ityarthaḥ //47 //	tatra aSrUyamANa viDi tve apUrva tvAt viDiH AsTeyaH iti arTaH //47 //
   nanu yadyayamāśramo bālyapradhānaḥ kasmātpunargārhasthyenopasaṃharatīti	nanu yadi ayam ASramaH bAlya praDAnaH kasmAt punar gArhasTyena upasaMharati iti
   codayati  # evaṃ bālyādiviśiṣṭeti.# /	codayati # evam bAlya Adi viSizwa iti.# /
   uttaraṃ paṭhati  # kṛtsnabhāvāttu gṛhiṇopasaṃhāraḥ.# /	uttaram paWati # kRtsna BAvAt tu gRhiNA upasaMhAraH.# /
   chāndogye bahulāyāsādhyakarmabahulatvādgārhasthyasya cāśramāntaradharmāṇāṃ	CAndogye bahulAya asADya karma bahula tvAt gArhasTyasya ca ASrama antara DarmANAm
   ca keṣāñcidahiṃsādīnāṃ samavāyāttenopasaṃhāro na punastena	ca kezAQcid ahiMsA AdInAm samavAyAt tena upasaMhAraH na punar tena
   samāpanādityarthaḥ //48 //	samApanAt iti arTaH //48 //
   evaṃ tadāśramadvayopanyāsena kkacitkadāciditarābhāvaśaṅkā mandabuddheḥ	evam tad ASrama dvaya upanyAsena kkacid kadAcid itara aBAva SaFkA manda budDeH
   syāditi tadapākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram  # maunavaditareṣāmapyupadeśāt.# /	syAt iti tad apAkaraNa arTam sUtram # mOna vat itarezAm api upadeSAt.# /
   vṛttirvānaprasthānāmanekavidhairevaṃ brahmācāriṇo 'pīti vṛttibhedo	vRttiH vAnaprasTAnAm anekaviDEH evam brahmAcAriNaH api iti vRtti BedaH 
   'nuṣṭhātāro vā puruṣā bhidyante, tasmāddvitve 'pi bahuvacanamaviruddham	anuzWAtAraH vA puruzAH Bidyante, tasmAt dvi tve api bahuvacanam avirudDam
   # anāviṣkurvannanvayāt.# /	# anAvizkurvan= anvayAt.# /
   bālyeneti yāvadbālacaritaśruteḥ kāmacāravādabhakṣatāyāśacātyantabālyena	bAlyena iti yAvat bAla carita SruteH kAma cAra vAda Bakza tAya aSacA atyanta bAlyena
   prasiddheḥ śaucādiniyamavidhāyinaśca sāmānyaśāstrasyānena viśeṣaśāstreṇa	prasidDeH SOca Adi niyama viDAyinaH ca sAmAnya SAstrasya anena viSeza SAstreNa

   tadeva vidhīyate /	tat eva viDIyate /

   bhaviṣyatīti //50 //	Bavizyati iti //50 //
   # aihikamapyaprastutapratibandhe taddarśanāt.# /	# Ehikam api aprastuta pratibanDe tad darSanAt.# /
   saṃgatimāha  # sarvāpekṣā ceti.# /	saMgati mAha # sarva apekzA ca iti.# /
   kiṃ śravaṇādibhirihaiva vā janmani vidyā sādhyate utāniyama iha vāmutra	kim SravaNa AdiBiH iha eva vA janmani vidyA sADyate uta aniyamaH iha vA amutra
   veti /	vA iti /
   yadyapi karmāṇi yajñādinyaniyataphalāni teṣāṃ ca vidyotpadasādhanatvena	yadi api karmANi yajQa Adinya niyata PalAni tezAm ca vidyA utpada sADana tvena
   vidyotpādasyāniyamaḥ pratibhāti /	vidyA utpAdasya aniyamaH pratiBAti /
   tathāca garbhasthasya vāmadevasyātmapratibodhaśravaṇāt	taTA ca garBa sTasya vAmadevasya Atma pratiboDa SravaNAt
   'anekajanmasaṃsiddhastato yati parāṃ gatim' iti ca	aaneka janma saMsidDaH tatas yati parAm gatim a iti ca
   smaraṇādāmuṣmikatvamapyavagamyate /	smaraNAt Amuzmika tvam api avagamyate /
   tathāpi yajñādīnāṃ prameyāṇāmapramāṇatvācchravaṇādeśca pramāṇatvātteṣāmeva	taTA api yajQa AdInAm prameyANAm apramANa tvAt SravaNa AdeH ca pramANa tvAt tezAm eva
   sākṣādvidyāsādhanatvam /	sAkzAt vidyA sADana tvam /
   yajñādīnāṃ sattvaśuddhyādhānena vā	yajQa AdInAm sattva SudDi ADAnena vA
   vidyotpādakaśravaṇādilakṣaṇapramāṇapravṛttivighnopaśamena vā	vidyA utpAdaka SravaNa Adi lakzaNa pramANa pravRtti viGna upaSamena vA
   vidyāsādhanatvām /	vidyA sADana tvAm /
   śravaṇādīnāṃ tvanapekṣāmāmeva vidyotpādakatvam /	SravaNa AdInAm tu anapekzAmAm eva vidyA utpAdaka tvam /
   naca pramāṇeṣu pravartamānāḥ pramātāra aihikamapi cirabhāvinaṃ pramotpādaṃ	na ca pramANezu pravartamAnAH pramAtAraH Ehikam api cira BAvinam pramA utpAdam
   kāmayante kintu tādātvikameva prāgeva tu pāralaukikam /	kAmayante kintu tAdAtvikam eva prAk eva tu pAralOkikam /
   nahi kumbhalādidṛkṣuścakṣuṣī samunmīlayati kālāntarīyāya kumbhadarśanāya	nahi kumBala Adi dRkzuH cakzuzI samunmIlayati kAla antarIyAya kumBa darSanAya
   kintu tādātvikāya /	kintu tAdAtvikAya /
   tasmādaihika eva vidyotpādo nāniyatakālaḥ /	tasmAt EhikaH eva vidyA utpAdaH na aniyata kAlaH /
   śrutismṛtī ca pāralaukikaṃ vidyotpādaṃ stutyā brātaḥ /	Sruti smRtI ca pAralOkikam vidyA utpAdam stutyA brAtar /
   itthaṃbhūtāni nāma śravaṇādīnyāvaśyakaphalāni yatkālāntare 'pi	itTaMBUtAni nAma SravaNa AdIni AvaSyaka PalAni yad kAla antare api
   vidyāmutpādayantīti /	vidyAm utpAdayanti iti /
   evaṃ prāpta ucyate yata evātra vidyotpāde śravaṇādibhiḥ kartavye	evam prAptaH ucyate yatas eva atra vidyA utpAde SravaNa AdiBiH kartavye
   yajñādīnāṃ sattvāśuddhidvāreṇa vā vighnopaśamadvārā vopayogo 'ta eva teṣāṃ	yajQa AdInAm sattva aSudDi dvAreNa vA viGna upaSama dvArA vA upayogaH atas eva tezAm
   yajñādīnāṃ karmāntarapratibandhāpratibandhābhyāmaniyataphalatvena	yajQa AdInAm karma antara pratibanDa apratibanDAByAm aniyata Pala tvena
   tadapekṣāṇāṃ śravaṇādīnāmapyaniyataphalatvaṃ nyāṭyaniyataphalatvaṃ	tad apekzANAm SravaNa AdInAm api aniyata Pala tvam nyAwya niyata Pala tvam
   nyāṭyamanapahatavighnānāṃ śravaṇādīnāmanutpādakatvādaviśuddhasattvādvā	nyAwyam anapahata viGnAnAm SravaNa AdInAm anutpAdaka tvAt aviSudDa sattvAt vA
   puṃsaḥ pratyanutpādakatvāt /	puMsaH pratyanutpAdaka tvAt /

   śravaṇādīnāmapyaniyataphalatvaṃ yuktamevaṃ śrutismṛtipratibandho na	SravaNa AdInAm api aniyata Pala tvam yuktam evam Sruti smRti pratibanDaH na
   stutimātratvena vyākhyeyo bhaviṣyati /	stuti mAtra tvena vyAKyeyaH Bavizyati /
   puruṣāśca vidyārthinaḥ sādhanasāmarthyānusāreṇa tadanurūpameva	puruzAH ca vidyA arTinaH sADana sAmarTya anusAreNa tad anurUpam eva
   kāmayiṣyante tadidamuktam abhisaṃdherniraṅkaśatvāditi //51 //	kAmayizyante tat idam uktam  aBisaMDeH niraFkaSa tvAt iti //51 //
   # evaṃ muktiphalāniyamastadavasthāvadhṛtestadavasthāvadhṛteḥ.# /	# evam mukti Pala aniyamaH tad avasTA avaDRteH tad avasTA avaDRteH.# /
   yajñādyupakṛtavidyāsādhanaśravaṇādivīryaviśeṣātkila tatphale	yajQa Adi upakRta vidyA sADana SravaNa Adi vIrya viSezAt kila tad Pale
   vidyāyāmaihikamuṣmikatvalakṣaṇa utkarṣo darśitaḥ /	vidyAyAmEhika muzmika tva lakzaNaH utkarzaH darSitaH /
   tathā ca yathā sādhanotkarṣanikarṣābhyāṃ tatphalasya vidyāyā utkarṣāvevaṃ	taTA ca yaTA sADana utkarza nikarzAByAm tad Palasya vidyAyAH utkarzO= evam
   vidyāphalasyāpi mukterutkarṣanikarṣau saṃbhāvyete /	vidyA Palasya api mukteH utkarza nikarzO saMBAvyete /
   naca muktāvaihikāmuṣmikatvalakṣaṇo viśeṣa upapadyate	na ca muktA vEhikAmuzmika tva lakzaNaH viSezaH upapadyate
   brahmopāsanāparipākalabdhajanmani vidyāyāṃ jīvato	brahma upAsana aparipAka labDa janmani vidyAyAm jIvataH 
   mukteravaśyaṃbhāvaniyamātsatyapyārabdhavipākakarmāprakṣaye /	mukteH avaSyaMBAva niyamAt sati api ArabDa vipAka karmA prakzaye /
   tasmānmuktāveva rūpato nikarṣotkarṣau syātām /	tasmAt muktO= eva rUpataH nikarza utkarzO syAtAm /
   apica saguṇānāṃ vidyānāmutkarṣanikarṣābhyāṃ tatphalānāmutkarṣanikarṣau	api ca sa guNAnAm vidyAnAm utkarza nikarzAByAm tad PalAnAm utkarza nikarzO
   dṛṣṭāviti mukterapi vidyāphalatvādrūpataścotkarṣanikarṣau syātāmiti	dRzwO= iti mukteH api vidyA Pala tvAt rUpataH ca utkarza nikarzO syAtAm iti
   prāpata ucyate na muktestatra tatraikarūpyaśruterupapatteśca /	prApataH ucyate  na mukteH tatra tatra ekarUpi aSruteH upapatteH ca /
   sādhyaṃ hi sādhanaviśeśaṣādviśeṣavadbhavati /	sADyam hi sADana viSeSazAt viSeza vat Bavati /
   naca muktirbrahmaṇo nityasvarūpāvasthānalakṣaṇā nityā satī sādhyā	na ca muktiH brahmaNaH nitya svarUpa avasTAna lakzaNA nityA satI sADyA
   bhavitumarhati /	Bavitum arhati /
   naca savāsananiḥśeṣakleśakarmāśayaprakṣayo vidyājarnmaviśeṣavān, yena	na ca sa vAsana niHSeza kleSa karma ASaya prakzayaH vidyA jarnma viSezavAn, yena
   tadviśeṣānmokṣo viśeṣavānbhavet /	tad viSezAt mokzaH viSezavAn Bavet /
   naca sāvaśeṣaḥ kleśādiprakṣayo mokṣāya kalpate /	na ca sa avaSezaH kleSa Adi prakzayaH mokzAya kalpate /
   naca cirācirotpādānutpādāvantareṇa vidyāyāmapi rūpato bhedaḥ	na ca cira acira utpAda an utpAdO= antareNa vidyAyAm api rUpataH BedaH
   kaścidupalakṣyate tasyā apyekarūpatvena śruteḥ /	kaScid upalakzyate tasyAH api eka rUpa tvena SruteH /

   phalasyotkarṣanikarṣau yujyete /	Palasya utkarza nikarzO yujyete /

   tasmāttasyā muktyavasthāyā aikarūpyāvadhṛtermuktilakṣaṇasya phalasyāviśeṣo	tasmAt tasyAH mukti avasTAyAH Eka rUpya avaDRteH mukti lakzaNasya Palasya aviSezaH 
   yukta iti //52 //	yuktaH iti //52 //
   iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ	iti SrI vAcaspati miSravi racite SArIraka Bagavat pAda BAzya viBAge BAmatyAm
   tṛtīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //	tRtIya aDyAyasya caturTaH pAdaH //

   matsarapittanibandhanamacikitsyamarocakaṃ yeṣām //1 //	matsara pitta nibanDanam acikitsyam arocakam yezAm //1 //
   śaṅke saṃprati nirviśaṅkamadhunā svarājyasaukhyaṃ vahannendraḥ	SaFke saMprati nirviSaFka maDunA sva rAjya sOKyam vahannendraH
   sāndratapaḥsthiteṣu kathamapyudvegamabhyeṣyati /	sAndra tapaH sTitezu kaTam api udvegam aByezyati /

   svarge 'pyamī niḥspṛhāḥ //2 //	svarge api amI niHspRhAH //2 //
   # āvṛttirasakṛdupadeśāt.# /	# AvRttiH asakRt upadeSAt.# /
