   tadvicārayoḥ kramamāha   # tṛtīye 'dhyāya iti.# /	tad vicArayoH kramam Aha  # tRtIye aDyAyaH iti.# /
   muktilakṣaṇasya phalasyātyantaparokṣatvāttadarthāni	mukti lakzaNasya Palasya atyanta parokza tvAt tad arTAni
   darśanaśravaṇamanananididhyāsanāni codyamānānyadṛṣṭārthānīti	darSana SravaNa manana nidiDi AsanAni codyamAnAni adRzwa arTAni iti
   yāvadvidhānamanuṣṭheyāni na tu tato 'dhikamāvartanīyāni pramāṇābhāvāt /	yAvat viDAnam anuzWeyAni na tu tatas aDikam AvartanIyAni pramANa aBAvAt /
   yatra punaḥ sakṛdupadeśa upāsītetyādiṣu tatra sakṛdeva prayogaḥ	yatra punar sakRt upadeSaH upAsIta ityAdizu tatra sakRt eva prayogaH
   prayājādivaditi prāpta ucyate /	prayAja Adi vat iti prAptaH ucyate /
   yadyapi muktiradṛṣṭacarī tathāpi savāsanāvidyocchedenātmanaḥ	yadi api muktiH adRzwa carI taTA api sa vAsana avidyA ucCedena AtmanaH
   svarūpāvasthānalakṣaṇāyāstasyāḥ śrutisiddhatvādavidyāyāśca	svarUpa avasTAna lakzaNAyAH tasyAH Sruti sidDa tvAt avidyAyAH ca
   vidyotpādavirodhitayā vidyotpādena samucchedasyāhivibhramasyeva	vidyA utpAda viroDitayA vidyA utpAdena samucCedasya ahi viBramasya iva
   rajjutatvasākṣātkāreṇa samucchedasyopapattisiddhatvādanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ	rajju ta tva sA akzAtkAreNa samucCedasya upapatti sidDa tvAt anvaya vi atirekAByAm
   ca śravaṇamanananididhyāsanābhyāsasyaiva svagocarasākṣātkāraphalatvena	ca SravaNa manana nidiDya Asana aByAsasya eva sva gocara sAkzAtkAra Pala tvena
   lokasiddhatvāsakaladuḥkhavinirmuktaikacaitanyātmako	loka sidDa tvAsakala duHKa vinirmukta eka cEtanya AtmakaH 
   'hamityaparokṣarūpānubhavasyāpi	aham iti aparokza rUpa anuBavasya api

   bhavanti /	Bavanti /
   na ca dṛṣṭārthatve satyadṛṣṭārthatvaṃ yuktam /	na ca dRzwa arTa tve satya dRzwa arTa tvam yuktam /
   na caitānyanāvṛttāni satkāradīrghakālanairantaryeṇa sākṣātkāravate	na ca etAH ni anAvRttAni satkAra dIrGa kAla nErantaryeNa sAkzAt kAravate
   tādṛśānubhavāya kalpante /	tAdRSa anuBavAya kalpante /

   na khalu pittopahṛtendriyasya guḍe tiktatāsākṣātkāro	na Kalu pitta upahRta indriyasya guxe tikta tA sAkzAt kAraH

   atadvato narāntaravacāṃsivopapattisahasrāṇi vā parāmṛśato 'pi thūtkṛtya	atadvataH nara antara vacAMsiva upapatti sahasrANi vA parAmRSataH api TUtkRtya
   guḍatyāgāt /	guxa tyAgAt /

   pratīterāvṛttireveti siddham //1 //	pratIteH AvRttiH eva iti sidDam //1 //
   adhikaraṇārthamuktvā nirupādhibrahmaviṣayatvamasyākṣipati   # atrāha	aDikaraNa arTam uktvA nirupADi brahma vizaya tvam asya akzipati  # atra Aha
   bhavatu nāmeti.# /	Bavatu nAma iti.# /

   nahi brahmānubhavo brahmasākṣātkāro nityaśuddhasvabhāvādbrahmaṇo	na hi brahma anuBavaH brahma sAkzAtkAraH nitya SudDa svaBAvAt brahmaNaH 
   'tiricyate /	atiricyate /
   tathāca nityasya brahmaṇaḥ svabhāvo nitya eveti kṛtamatra pratyayāvṛtyā /	taTA ca nityasya brahmaNaH svaBAvaH nityaH eva iti kRtam atra pratyaya AvRtyAH /

   api nivartanta eva /	api nivartante eva /

   nanūktaṃ saṃbhaviṣyanti sāvasthā jīvātmano yasyāṃ paryāyeṇopabhogādvā	nanu uktam saMBavizyanti sA avasTA jIva AtmanaH yasyAm paryAyeNa upaBogAt vA

   tasmādaviśeṣeṇa puṇyapāpayoraśleṣavināśāviti siddham //14 //	tasmAt aviSezeNa puNya pApayoH aSleza vinASO= iti sidDam //14 //

   yathānuvartante tathehāpīti yuktam /	yaTA anuvartante taTA iha api iti yuktam /

   ucyate /	ucyate /
     satyaṃ na vidyayaikakāryatvaṃ karmaṇāṃ parasparavirodhena sahāsaṃbhavāt	  satyam na vidyayA eka kArya tvam karmaNAm paraspara viroDena saha asaMBavAt 
   vidyotpādakatayā tu karmaṇāmārādupakārakāṇāmastu mokṣopayogaḥ /	vidyA utpAdaka tayA tu karmaNA amArAt upakArakANAm astu mokza upayogaH /
   naca karmaṇāṃ vidyayā virudhyamānānāṃ na vidyākāraṇatvaṃ,	na ca karmaNAm vidyayA viruDyamAnAnAm na vidyA kAraNa tvaM,
   svakāraṇavirodhināṃ kāryāṇāṃ bahulamupalabdheḥ /	sva kAraNa viroDinAm kAryANAm bahulam upalabDeH /

   karmaṇāmupādānamarthavat /	karmaNAm upAdAnam arTavat /
   tadabhāve tatkāryasyānutpādena mokṣasyāsaṃbhavāt /	tad aBAve tad kAryasya anutpAdena mokzasya asaMBavAt /
   evañca vividiṣanti yajñeneti yajñasādhanatvaṃ vidyāya apūrvamarthaṃ	evaQca vividizanti yajQena iti yajQa sADana tvam vidyAya apUrvam arTam
   prāpayataḥ pañcamalakārasya nātyantaparokṣavṛttitayā jñānastutyarthatayā	prApayataH paQca mala kArasya na atyanta parokza vRtti tayA jQAna stuti arTa tayA
   kathañcidvyākhyānaṃ bhaviṣyati /	kaTaQcid vyAKyAnam Bavizyati /

   ata eva cātikrāntaviṣayametatkāryaikatvābhidhānam /	atas eva ca atikrAnta vizayam etat kArya ekatva aBiDAnam /
   etadeva sphorayati   # nahi brahmavida iti.# //16 //	etat eva sPorayati  # na hi brahma vidaH iti.# //16 //
   sūtrāntaramavatārayituṃ pṛcchati   # kiṃviṣayaṃ punaridamiti.# /	sUtra antaram avatArayitum pRcCati  # kiMvizayam punar idam iti.# /
   asyottaraṃ sūtram #    ato 'nyāpi hyekeṣāmubhayoḥ.# /	asya uttaram sUtram #    ataH anyA api hi ekezAm uBayoH.# /
   kāmyakarmaviṣayamaśle,vināśavacanaṃ śākhāntarīyavacanaṃ ca tasya putrā	kAmya karma vizayam aSle, vinASa vacanam SAKA antarIya vacanam ca tasya putrA
   dāyamupayantīti //17 //	dAyam upayanti iti //17 //
   # yadeva vidyayeti hi.# /	# yat eva vidyayA iti hi.# /
   asti vidyāsaṃyuktaṃ yajñādi ya evaṃ vidvānyajetetyādikam /	asti vidyA saMyuktam yajQa Adi yaH evam vidvAn yajeta iti Adikam /
   asti ca kevalam /	asti ca kevalam /
   tatra yathā brāhmaṇāya hiraṇyaṃ dadyādiyukte viduṣe brāhmaṇāya dadyātra	tatra yaTA brAhmaNAya hiraNyam dadya Adi yukte viduze brAhmaNAya dadya atra
   brāhmaṇabruvāya mūkhāyeti viśeṣapratilambhaḥ tatkasya	brAhmaNa bruvAya mUKAya iti viSeza pratilamBaH tat kasya
   hetostasyātiśayavatvāt /	hetoH tasya atiSayava tvAt /
   evaṃ vidyārahitādyajñādervidyāsahitamatiśayavaditi tasyaiva	evam vidyA rahitAt yajQa AdeH vidyA sahitam atiSaya vat iti tasya eva
   paravidyāsādhanatvamupāttaduritakṣayadvārā netasya /	para vidyA sA Dana tvam upAtta durita kzaya dvArAH netasya /
   tasmādvividiṣanti yajñenetyaviśeṣaśrutamapi vidyāsahite	tasmAt vividizanti yajQena iti aviSeza Srutam api vidyA sahite
   yajñādāvupasaṃhartavyamiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate  yadeva vidyayā karāti	yajQa AdO= upasaMhartavyam iti prApte aBiDIyate  yat eva vidyayA karAti
   tadevāsya vīryavattaramiti tarabarthaśrutervidyārahitasya	tat eva asya vIryavattaram iti tarabarTa SruteH vidyA rahitasya
   vīryavattāmātramavagamyate /	vIryavat tA mAtram avagamyate /
   naca sarvathākiñcitkarasya tadupapadyate /	na ca sarvaTA kiQcitkarasya tat upapadyate /
   tasmādastyasyāpi kayāpi mātrayā paravidyotpādopayoga iti vidyārahitamapi	tasmAt asti asya api kayA api mAtrayA para vidyA utpAda upayogaH iti vidyA rahitam api
   yajñādi paravidyārthinānuṣṭheyamiti siddham //18 //	yajQa Adi para vidyA arTinA anuzWeyam iti sidDam //18 //
   # bhogena tvitare kṣapayitvā saṃpadyate.# /	# Bogena tu itare kzapayitvA saMpadyate.# /
   anārabdhakārya ityasya nañaḥ phalaṃ bhogena nivṛttiṃ darśayatyanena	anArabDa kAryaH iti asya naQaH Palam Bogena nivRttim darSayati anena
   sūtreṇa /	sUtreNa /
   asya tūpapādanaṃ purastādapakṛṣya kṛtamiti neha kriyate punaruktibhayāt	asya tu upapAdanam purastAt apakRzya kRtam iti na iha kriyate punarukti BayAt 
   iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ	iti SrI vAcaspati miSravi racite SArIraka Bagavat pAda BAzya viBAge BAmatyAm
   caturthasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ //	caturTasya aDyAyasya praTamaH pAdaH samAptaH //
   # caturthe 'dhyāye dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ.# /	# caturTe aDyAye dvitIyaH pAdaH.# /
   # vāṅmanasi darśanācchabdācca.# /	# vAc manasi darSanAt SabdAt ca.# /
   athāsmin phalavicāralakṣaṇe vāṅmanasi saṃpadyata ityādivicāro 'saṃgata	aTa asmin Pala vicAra lakzaNe vAc manasi saMpadyate ityAdi vicAraH asaMgata
   ityata āha   # athāparāsu vidyāsu phalaprāptaya iti.# /	iti atas Aha  # aTa aparAsu vidyAsu Pala prAptayaH iti.# /
   aparavidyāphalaprāptyarthadevayānamārgārthatvādutkrāntestadgato vicāraḥ	apara vidyA Pala prApti arTa deva yAna mArga arTa tvAt utkrAnteH tad gataH vicAraH
   pāramparyeṇa bhavati phalavicāra iti nāsaṃgata ityarthaḥ /	pAramparyeNa Bavati Pala vicAraH iti na asaMgataH iti arTaH /
   nanvayamutkrāntikramo viduṣo nopapadyate 'na tasya prāṇā utkrāmantyatraiva	nanu ayam utkrAnti kramaH viduzaH na upapadyate ana tasya prANAH utkrAmanti atra eva
   samavanīyante' iti śravaṇāttatkathamasya vidyādhikāra ityata āha   #	samavanIyante a iti SravaNAt tat kaTam asya vidyA aDikAraH iti atas Aha  #
   samānā hi vidvadaviduṣoriti.# /	samAnAH hi vidvat aviduzoH iti.# /
   viṣayamāha   # astīti.# /	vizayam Aha  # asti iti.# /
   vimṛśati   # kimiheti.# /	vimRSati  # kim iha iti.# /
   viśayaḥ saṃśayaḥ /	viSayaH saMSayaH /
   pūrvapakṣamāha   # tatra vāgeveti.# /	pUrva pakzam Aha  # tatra vAc eva iti.# /
   śratilakṣaṇāviśaye saṃśaye /	Srati lakzaNa aviSaye saMSaye /
   siddhāntasūtraṃ pūrayitvā paṭhati   # vāgvṛttirmanasi saṃpadyate iti.# /	sidDAnta sUtram pUrayitvA paWati  # vAc vRttiH manasi saMpadyate iti.# /
   vṛttyadhyāhāraprayojanaṃ praśnapūrvakamāha # kathamiti.# /	vRtti aDyAhAra prayojanam praSna pUrvakam Aha # kaTam iti.# /
   uttarādhikaraṇaparyālocanenaivaṃ pūritamityarthaḥ /	uttara aDikaraNa paryAlocanena evam pUritam iti arTaH /
   tattvasya dharmiṇo vācaḥ pralayavivakṣāyāṃ tviha sarvatraiva paratreha	tattvasya DarmiNaH vAcaH pralaya vivakzAyAm tu iha sarvatra eva para tra iha
   cāvibhāgasāmyātkiṃ paratraiva viṃśiṣyādavibhāga iti na tvatrāpi /	ca aviBAga sAmyAt kim paratra eva viMSizyAt aviBAgaH iti na tu atra api /
   tasmādihāvibhāgenāviṃśiṣato 'tra vṛttyupasaṃhāramātravivakṣā	tasmAt iha aviBAgena AviMSizataH atra vRtti upasaMhAra mAtra vivakzA
   sūtrakārasyeti gamyate /	sUtrakArasya iti gamyate /
   siddhāntahetuṃ praśnapūrvakamāha   # kasmāditi.# /	sidDAnta hetum praSna pUrvakam Aha  # kasmAt iti.# /
   satyāmeva manovṛttau vāgvṛtterupasaṃhāradarśanāt /	satyAm eva manaH vRttO vAc vRtteH upasaMhAra darSanAt /
   vācastūpasaṃhāramadṛṣṭaṃ nāgamo 'pi gamayitumarhati /	vAcastu upasaMhAram adRzwam na AgamaH api gamayitum arhati /
   āgamaprabhavayuktivirodhāśca /	Agama praBava yukti viroDAH ca /
   āgamo hi dṛṣṭānusārataḥ prakṛtau vikārāṇāṃ layamāha /	AgamaH hi dRzwa anusArataH prakRtO vikArANAm layam Aha /
   na ca vācaḥ prakṛtirmano yenāsminniyaṃ līyate /	na ca vAcaH prakRtiH manaH yena asmin= iyam lIyate /
   tasmātvṛttivṛttimatorabhedavivakṣayā vākpadaṃ tadvṛttau vyākhyeyam /	tasmAt vRtti vRttim atora Beda vivakzayA vAc padam tad vRttO vyAKyeyam /
   saṃbhavati ca vāgvṛttervāgaprakṛtāvapi manasi layaḥ /	saMBavati ca vAc vRtteH vAc a prakRtO= api manasi layaH /
   tathā tatra tatra darśanādityāha   # vṛttyudbhavābhibhavāviti //1 //	taTA tatra tatra darSanAt iti Aha  # vRtti udBava aBiBavO= iti //1 //
   ata eva ca sarvāṇyanu.# /	atas eva ca sarvANi anu.# /
   yata eva prakṛtivikārabhāvābhāvanmanasi na svarūpalayo vāco 'pi tu	yatas eva prakRti vikAra BAva aBAvat manasi na sva rUpa layaH vAcaH api tu
   vṛttilayaḥ, ata eva ca sarveṣāṃ cakṣurādīnāmidriyāṇāṃ satyeva savṛttike	vRtti layaH, atas eva ca sarvezAm cakzuH AdI nAmidriyANAm sati eva sa vRttike
   manasi vṛtteranugatirlayo na svarūpalayaḥ /	manasi vRtteH anugatiH layaH na svarUpa layaH /
   vācastu pṛthak grahaṇaṃ pūrvasūtre udāharaṇāpekṣaṃ na tu tadeveha	vAcaH tu pRTak grahaNam pUrva sUtre udAharaNa apekzam na tu tat eva iha
   vivakṣitamityarthaḥ //2 //	vivakzitam iti arTaH //2 //
   # tanmanaḥ prāṇa uttarāt.# /	# tad manaH prANaH uttarAt.# /
   yadi svaprakṛtau vikārasya layastato manaḥ prāṇe saṃpadyate ityatra	yadi sva prakRtO vikArasya layaH tatas manaH prANe saMpadyate iti atra
   manaḥsvarūpasyaiva prāṇe saṃpattyā bhavitavyam /	manaH svarUpasya eva prANe saMpattyA Bavitavyam /
   tathā hi manaḥ iti nopacārato vyākhyānaṃ bhaviṣyati /	taTA hi manaH iti na upacArataH vyAKyAnam Bavizyati /
   saṃbhavati hi prakṛtivikārabhāvaḥ prāṇamanasoḥ /	saMBavati hi prakRti vikAra BAvaH prANa manasoH /
   annamayaṃ hi somya mana ityannātmatāmāha manasaḥ śrutirāpomayaḥ prāṇa iti	anna mayam hi somya manaH iti anna Atma tAm Aha manasaH SrutiH ApaH mayaH prANaH iti
   ca prāṇasyābātmatām /	ca prANasya abAtma tAm /
   prakṛtivikārayostādātmyāt /	prakRti vikArayoH tAdAtmyAt /
   tathā ca prāṇo manasaḥ prakṛtiriti manaso vṛttimataḥ prāṇe laya iti prāpte	taTA ca prANaH manasaH prakRtiH iti manasaH vRttimataH prANe layaH iti prApte
   'bhidhīyate   satyam, āpo 'nnamasṛjanta iti śruterabannayoḥ	aBiDIyate  satyam, ApaH annam asRjantaH iti SruteH abannayoH
   prakṛtivikārabhāvo 'vagamyate /	prakRti vikAra BAvaH avagamyate /
   na tu tadvikārayoḥ prāṇamanasoḥ /	na tu tad vikArayoH prANa manasoH /
   khayoniprāṇāḍikayā tu mitho vikārayoḥ prakṛtivikārabhāvābhyupagame	Ka yoni prANAxikayA tu miTas vikArayoH prakRti vikAra BAva aByupagame
   saṃkarādatiprasaṅgaḥ syāt /	saMkarAt ati prasaFgaH syAt /
   tasmādyo yasya sākṣādvikārastasya tatra laya ityannasyāpsu layo na	tasmAt yaH yasya sAkzAt vikAraH tasya tatra layaH iti annasya apsu layaH na
   tvabvikāre prāṇe 'nnavikārasya manasaḥ /	tu abvikAre prANe anna vikArasya manasaH /
   tathā cātrāpi manovṛttervṛttimati prāṇe layo na tu vṛttimato manasa iti	taTA ca atra api manaH vRtteH vRttimati prANe layaH na tu vRttimataH manasaH iti
   siddham //3 //	sidDam //3 //
   # so 'dhyakṣe tadupagamādibhyaḥ.# /	# saH aDyakze tad upagama AdiByaH.# /
   prāṇastejasīti tejaḥśabdasya bhūtaviśeṣavacanatvādvijñānātmani	prANaH tejasi iti tejaH Sabdasya BUta viSeza vacana tvAt vijQAna Atmani
   cāprasiddheḥ prāṇasya jīvātmanyupagamānugamāvasthānaśrutīnāṃ ca	ca aprasidDeH prANasya jIvAtmani upagama anugama avasTAna SrutInAm ca
   tejoddhāreṇāpyupapatteḥ /	teja udDAreNa api upapatteH /
   tejasi samāpannavṛttiḥ khalu prāṇaḥ /	tejasi samApanna vRttiH Kalu prANaH /
   tejastu jīvātmani samāpannavṛtti /	tejaH tu jIvAtmani samApanna vRtti /
   tadvārā jīvātmasamāpannavṛttiḥ prāṇa ityupapadyate /	tad vArA jIva Atma samApanna vRttiH prANaH iti upapadyate /
   tasmāttejasyeva prāṇavṛttipravilaya iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate    sa	tasmAt tejasi eva prANa vRtti pravilayaH iti prApte aBiDIyate   sa
   prakṛtaḥprāṇo 'dhyakṣe vijñānātmanyavatiṣṭhate tattantravṛttirbhavati /	prakRtaH prANaH aDyakze vijQAna Atmani avatizWate tad tantra vRttiH Bavati /
   kutaḥ   upagamānugamāvasthānebhyo hetubhyaḥ /	kutas   upagama anugama avasTAneByaH hetuByaH /
   tatropagamaśrutimāha   # evamevemamātmānamiti.# /	tatra upagama Srutim Aha  # evam eva imam AtmAnam iti.# /
   anugamanaśrutimāha   # tamutkrāmantamiti.# /	anugamana Srutim Aha  # tam utkrAmantam iti.# /
   avasthānaśrutimāha  # savijñāno bhavatīti ceti.# /	avasTAna Srutim Aha # sa vijQAnaH Bavati iti ca iti.# /
   vijñāyate 'neneti vijñānaṃ pañcavṛttiprāṇasahita indriyagrāmastena	vijQAyate anena iti vijQAnam paQca vRtti prANa sahitaH indriya grAmaH tena
   sahāvatiṣṭhata iti savijñānaḥ /	saha avatizWate iti sa vijQAnaH /
   codayati   # nanu prāmastejasīti śrūyata iti.# /	codayati  # nanu prAmaH tejasi iti SrUyate iti.# /
   adhikāvāpo 'śabdārthavyākhyānam /	aDika AvApaH aSabda arTa vyAKyAnam /
   pariharati   # naiṣa doṣa iti.# /	pariharati  # na eza dozaH iti.# /
   yadyapi prāṇastejasītyatastejasi prāṇavṛttilayaḥ pratīyate, tathāpi	yadi api prANaH tejasi iti atas tejasi prANa vRtti layaH pratIyate, taTA api
   sarvaśākhāpratyayatvena vidyānāṃ śrutyantarālocanayā vijñānātmani layo	sarva SAKA pratyaya tvena vidyAnAm Sruti antara AlocanayA vijQAna Atmani layaH 
   'vagamyate /	avagamyate /
   na ca tejasastatrāpi laya iti sāmpratam /	na ca tejasaH tatra api layaH iti sAmpratam /
   tasyānilākāśakrameṇa paramātmani tatvalayāvagamāt /	tasya anila AkASa krameNa paramAtmani tatvalaya avagamAt /
   tasmāttejograhaṇenopalakṣyate tejaḥ	tasmAt tejaH grahaNena upalakzyate tejaH
   sahacaritadehabījabhūtapañcabhūtasūkṣmaparicārādhyakṣo jīvātmā tasmin	sahacarita deha bIja BUta paQcaBUta sUkzma paricAra aDyakzaH jIvAtmA tasmin
   prāṇavṛttirapyetīti /	prANa vRttiH api eti iti /
   codayati   # nanu ceyaṃ śrutiriti.# /	codayati  # nanu ca iyam SrutiH iti.# /
   tejaḥsahacaritāni bhūtānyupalakṣyantāṃ tejaḥśabdenādhyakṣe tu kimāyātaṃ	tejaH sahacaritAni BUtAni upalakzyantAm tejaH Sabdena aDyakze tu kim AyAtam
   tasya tadasāhacaryādityarthaḥ /	tasya tad asAha caryAt iti arTaH /
   pariharati   # so 'dhyakṣa ityadhyakṣasyāpīti.# /	pariharati  # saH aDyakzaH iti aDyakzasya api iti.# /
   yadā hyayaṃ prāṇo 'ntarāle 'dhyakṣaṃ prāpyādhyasaṃparkavaśādeva	yadA hi ayam prANaH antarAle aDyakzam prApya aDya saMparka vaSAt eva
   tejaḥprabhṛtīni bhūtasūkṣmāṇi prāpnoti tadopapadyate prāṇastesīti /	tejaH praBRtIni BUta sUkzmANi prApnoti tadA upapadyate prANaH tesi iti /
   atraiva dṛṣṭāntamāha    # yo 'pi srughnāditi.# //4 //	atra eva dRzwAntam Aha   # yaH api sruGnAt iti.# //4 //
   sūtrāntaramavatārayituṃ pṛcchati   # kathaṃ tejaḥsahacariteṣviti /	sUtra antaram avatArayitum pRcCati  # kaTam tejaH sahacaritezu iti /
   naikasmindarśayato hi.# /	na ekasmin darSayataH hi.# /
   atra bhāṣyakāro 'numānadarśanamāha   # kāryasya śarīrasyeti.# /	atra BAzya kAraH anumAna darSanam Aha  # kAryasya SarIrasya iti.# /
   sthūlaśarīrānurūpamanumeyaṃ sūkṣmamapi śarīraṃ pañcātmakamityarthaḥ /	sTUla SarIra anurUpam anumeyam sUkzmam api SarIram paQca Atmakam iti arTaH /
   darśayata iti sūtrāvayavaṃ vyācaṣṭe   # darśayataścaitamarthamiti.# /	darSayate iti sUtra avayavam vyAcazwe  # darSayataH ca etam arTam iti.# /
   praśnaprativacanābhiprāyaṃ dvivacanaṃ śrutismṛtyabhiprāyaṃ vā /	praSna prativacana aBiprAyam dvivacanam Sruti smRti aBiprAyam vA /
   aṇvyo mātrāḥ sūkṣmā daśārdhānāṃ pañcabhūtānāmiti /	aNvyaH mAtrAH sUkzmAH daSArDAnAm paQcaBUtAnAm iti /
   śrutyantaravirodhaṃ codayati   # nanu copasaṃhṛteṣu vāgādiṣviti.# /	Sruti antara viroDam codayati  # nanu ca upasaMhRtezu vAc Adizu iti.# /
   karmāśrayateti pratīyate na bhūtāśrayatetyarthaḥ /	karma ASraya tA iti pratIyate na BUtASraya tA iti arTaH /
   pariharati   # atrocyata iti.# /	pariharati  # atra ucyate iti.# /
   grahā indriyāṇi atigrahāstadviṣayāḥ /	grahAH indriyANi atigrahAH tad vizayAH /
   karmaṇāṃ prayojakatvenāśrayatvaṃ bhūtānāṃ tūpādānatvenetyavirodhaḥ /	karmaNAm prayojaka tvena ASraya tvam BUtAnAm tu upAdAna tvena iti aviroDaH /
   praśaṃsāśabdo 'pi karmaṇāṃ prayojakatayā prakṛṣṭamāśrayatvaṃ brūte sati	praSaMsA SabdaH api karmaNAm prayojaka tayA prakRzwam ASraya tvam brUte sati
   nikṛṣṭa āśrayāntare tadupapatterityāha   # praśaṃsāśabdādapi tatreti //6	nikRzwaH ASraya antare tad upapatteH iti Aha  # praSaMsA SabdAt api tatra iti //6
   samānā cāsṛtyupakramādamṛtatvaṃ cānupoṣya.# /	samAnA ca asRti upakramAt amRta tvam ca anupozya.# /
   atrābhṛtatvaprāptiśruteḥ paravidyāvantaṃ pratyetaditi manvānasya pūrvaḥ	atra aBRta tva prApti SruteH para vidyAvantam pratyetat iti manvAnasya pUrvaH
   pakṣaḥ /	pakzaH /
   # viśayānānāṃ.#saṃdihānānāṃ puṃsām /	# viSayAnAnAM.#saMdihAnAnAm puMsAm /
   codayati   # nanu vidyāprakaraṇa iti.# /	codayati  # nanu vidyA prakaraNaH iti.# /
   pariharati   # na svāpādivaditi.# /	pariharati  # na svApa Adi vat iti.# /
   paravidyayaivāmṛtatvaprāptyavasthāmākhyātuṃ tatsadharmāśca	para vidyayA eva amRta tva prApti avasTAm AKyAtum tad saDarmAH ca
   tadvidharmāścānyā apyavasthāstadanuguṇatayākhyāyante /	tad viDarmAH ca anyAH api avasTAH tad anuguNa tayA AKyAyante /
   sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ hi sphuṭataraḥ pratipipādayiṣite vastuni pratyayo	sADarmya vEDarmyAByAm hi sPuwataraH pratipipAdayizite vastuni pratyayo
   bhavatīti /	Bavati iti /
   na tu viduṣaḥ sakāśādviśeṣavanto 'vidvāṃso vidhīyante yena	na tu viduzaH sakASAt viSezavantaH avidvAMsaH viDIyante yena
   vidyāprakaraṇavyākhyāto bhavedapi tu vidyāṃ pratipādayituṃ lokasiddhānāṃ	vidyA prakaraNa vyAKyAtaH Bavet api tu vidyAm pratipAdayitum loka sidDAnAm
   tadanuguṇatayā teṣāmanuvāda iti /	tad anuguNa tayA tezAm anuvAdaH iti /
   evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate    # samānā caiṣotkrāntirvāṅmanasītyādyā	evam prApte aBiDIyate   # samAnA ca ezA utkrAntiH vAc manasi ityAdyA
   vidvadaviduṣoḥ.# /	vidvat aviduzoH.# /
   kutaḥ   # āsṛtyupakṛmāt.# /	kutas   # AsRti upakRmAt.# /
   sṛtiḥ saraṇaṃ devayānena pathā	sRtiH saraNam deva yAnena paTA
   kāryabrahmalokaprāptirāsṛterākāryabrahmalokaprāpteḥ /	kArya brahma loka prAptiH AsRteH AkArya brahma loka prApteH /
   ayaṃ vidyopakrama ārambhaḥ prayatna iti yāvat /	ayam vidyA upakramaH AramBaH prayatnaH iti yAvat /
   tasmādetaduktaṃ bhavati   neyaṃ parā vidyā yato nāḍīdvāramāśrayate /	tasmAt etat uktam Bavati  na iyam parA vidyA yatas nAxI dvAram ASrayate /
   api tvaparavidyeyam /	api tu apara vidyA iyam /
   na cāsyāmātyantikaḥ kleśapradāho yato na tatrotkrāntirbhavet /	na ca asyAm AtyantikaH kleSa pradAhaH yatas na tatra utkrAntiH Bavet /
   tasmādaparavidyāsāmarthyādāpekṣikabhābhūtasaṃplavasthānamamṛtatvaṃ	tasmAt apara vidyA sAmarTyAda apekzi ka BA BUta saMplava sTAnam amRta tvam
   prepsate puruṣārthāya saṃbhavatyeṣa utkrāntibhedavān sṛtyupakramopadeśaḥ /	prepsate puruza arTAya saMBavati ezaH utkrAnti BedavAn sRti upakrama upadeSaH /
   upapūrvāduṣa dāha ityasmādupoṣyeti prayogaḥ //7 //	upapUrvAt uza dAhaH iti asmAt upozya iti prayogaH //7 //
   # tadāpīteḥ saṃsāravyapadeśāt.# /	# tadA apIteH saMsAra vyapadeSAt.# /
   siddhāṃ kṛtvā bījabhāvāvaśeṣaṃ paramātmasaṃpattiṃ vidvadaviduṣorutkrāntiḥ	sidDAm kRtvA bIja BAva avaSezam paramAtma saMpattim vidvat aviduzoH utkrAntiH
   samarthitā /	samarTitA /
   saiva saṃprati cintyate /	sA eva saMprati cintyate /
   kimātmani tejaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ bhūtasūkṣmāṇāṃ tatvapravilaya eva	kimAtmani tejaH praBRtInAm BUta sUkzmANAm tatva pravilayaH eva
   saṃpattirāhosvidbījabhāvāvaśeṣeti /	saMpattiH Aha usvit bIja BAva avaSeza iti /
   yadi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ,	yadi pUrvaH pakzaH,
   notkrāntiḥ /	na utkrAntiH /
   athottaraḥ tataḥ seti /	aTa uttaraH tatas sA iti /
   tatrāprakṛtau na vikāratatvapravilayo yathā manasi na vāgādīnām /	tatra aprakRtO na vikAra tatva pravilayaH yaTA manasi na vAc AdInAm /
   sarvasya ca janimataḥ prakṛtiḥ parā devateti tattvapralaya evātyantikaḥ	sarvasya ca janimataH prakRtiH parA devatA iti tattva pralayaH eva AtyantikaH
   syāttejaḥprabhṛtīnāmiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate   'yonimanye prapadyante	syAt tejaH praBRtInAm iti prApte aBiDIyate  ayonim anye prapadyante
   śarīratvāya dehinaḥ /	SarIra tvAya dehinaH /
   sthāṇumanye 'nusaṃyanti yathākarma yathāśrutam //	sTANum anye anusaMyanti yaTAkarma yaTASrutam //
   ' ityavidyāvataḥ saṃsāramupadiśati śrutiḥ seyamātyantike tattvalaye	a iti avidyAvataH saMsAram upadiSati SrutiH sA iyam Atyantike tattvalaye
   nopapadyate /	na upapadyate /
   na ca prāyaṇasyaivaiṣa mahimā vidvāsamavidvāṃsaṃ vā pratīti	na ca prAyaNasya eva eza mahimA vidvAsam avidvAMsam vA prati iti
   sāṃpratamityāha   # anyathā hi sarvaḥ prāyaṇasamaya eveti.# /	sAMpratam iti Aha  # anyaTA hi sarvaH prAyaNa samayaH eva iti.# /
   vidhiśāstraṃ jyotiṣṭomādiviṣayamanarthakaṃ prāyaṇādevātyantikapralaye	viDi SAstram jyotizwoma Adi vizayam anarTakam prAyaNAt eva Atyantika pralaye
   punarbhavābhāvāt /	punarBava aBAvAt /
   mokṣaśāstraṃ cāprayatnalabhyātprāyaṇādeva jantumātrasya mekṣaprāpteḥ /	mokza SAstram ca aprayatnalaByAt prAyaNAt eva jantu mAtrasya mekza prApteH /
   na kevalaṃ śāstrānarthakyamayuktaśca prāyaṇamātrānmokṣa ityāha   #	na kevalam SAstra anarTakyam a yuktaH ca prAyaNa mAtrAt mokzaH iti Aha  #
   mithyājñāneti.# /	miTyA jQAna iti.# /
   nāsati nidānapraśame praśamastadvato yujyata ityarthaḥ //8 //	na asati nidAna praSame praSamaH tadvataH yujyate iti arTaH //8 //
   athetarabhūtasahitaṃ tejo jīvasyāśrayabhūtamutkrāntamaddehāddehāntaraṃ vā	aTa itara BUta sahitam tejaH jIvasya ASraya BUtam utkrAntamad dehAt deha antaram vA
   saṃcaratkasmādasmābhirna nirīkṣyate /	saMcarat kasmAt asmABiH na nirIkzyate /
   taddhi mahattvādvānekadravyatvādvā rūpavadupalabdavyam /	tat hi mahat tvAt vA aneka dravya tvAt vA rUpavat upalabdavyam /
   kasmānna mūrtāntaraiḥ pratibadhyata iti śaṅkāmapākartumidaṃ sūtram   #	kasmAt na mUrta antarEH pratibaDyate iti SaFkAm apAka rtum idam sUtram  #
   sūkṣmaṃ pramāṇataśca tathopalabdheḥ.# /	sUkzmam pramANataH ca taTA upalabDeH.# /
   cakāre bhinnakramaḥ /	cakAre BinnakramaH /
   na kevalamāpītestadavatiṣṭhate /	na kevalam ApIteH tat avatizWate /
   tacca sūkṣmaṃ svarūpataḥ parimāṇataśca svarūpameva hi tasya tādṛśamadṛśyam	tat ca sUkzmam svarUpataH parimANataH ca svarUpam eva hi tasya tAdRSam adRSyam
   yathā cākṣuṣasya tejaso mahato 'pi adṛṣṭavaśādanudbhūtarūpasparśaṃ hi tat	yaTA cAkzuzasya tejasaH mahataH api adRzwa vaSAt anudBUta rUpa sparSam hi tat 
   parimāṇataḥ saukṣmyaṃ yato nopalabhyate yathā trasareṇavo	parimANataH sOkzmyam yatas na upalaByate yaTA trasareNavaH 
   jālasūryamarīcibhyo 'nyatra pramāṇatastathopalabdhiriti vyācaṣṭe   #	jAla sUrya marIciByaH anyatra pramANataH taTA upalabDiH iti vyAcazwe  #
   tathāhi nāḍīniṣkramaṇa iti.# /	taTA hi nAxI nizkramaNaH iti.# /
   ādigrahaṇena cakṣuṣṭo vā mūrdho vā anyebhyo vā śarīradeśebhya iti	Adi grahaNena cakzuzwaH vA mUrDaH vE anyeByaH vA SarIra deSeByaH iti
   saṃgṛhītam /	saMgRhItam /
   apratighāte hetumāha   # svacchatvācceti.# /	apratiGAte hetum Aha  # svacCa tvAt ca iti.# /
   etadapi hi sūkṣmatvenaiva saṃgṛhītam /	etat api hi sUkzma tvena eva saMgRhItam /
   yathā hi kācābhrapaṭalaṃ svacchasvabhāvasya na tejasaḥ pratidhātam /	yaTA hi kAca aBra pawalam svacCa svaBAvasya na tejasaH pratiDAtam /
   evaṃ sarvameva vastujātamasyeti //9 //	evam sarvam eva vastu jAtam asya iti //9 //
   # nopamardenātaḥ.# /	# na upamardena atas .# /
   ata eva ca svacchatālakṣaṇātsaukṣmyādasaktatvāparanāmnaḥ //10 //	atas eva ca svacCa tA lakzaNAt sOkzmyAt asakta tva apara nAmnaH //10 //
   # asyaiva copapattereṣa ūṣmā.# /	# asya eva ca upapatteH ezaH UzmA.# /
   upapattiḥ prāptiḥ /	upapattiH prAptiH /
   etaduktaṃ bhavati   dṛṣṭaśrutābhyāmūṣmaṇo 'nvayavyatirekābhyāmasti	etat uktam Bavati  dRzwa SrutAByAm UzmaNaH anvaya vyatirekAByAm asti
   sthūlāddehādatiriktaṃ kiñciccadāmātsūkṣmaṃ śarīramiti //11 //	sTUlAt dehAt atiriktam kiQcid cadAmAt sUkzmam SarIram iti //11 //
   # pratiṣedhāditi cenna śārīrāt.# /	# pratizeDAt iti ced na SArIrAt.# /
   adhikaraṇatātparyamāha   # amṛtatvaṃ cīnupoṣyetyato viśeṣaṇāditi.# /	aDikaraNa tAtparyam Aha  # amRta tvam cInupozya iti atas viSezaNAt iti.# /
   viṣayamāha   # athākāmayamāna iti.# /	vizayam Aha  # aTa AkAmayamAnaH iti.# /
   siddhāntimatamāśaṅkya tannirākaraṇena pūrvapakṣī svamatamavasthāpayati   #	sidDAntimatam ASaFkya tad nirAkaraNena pUrva pakzI sva matam avasTApayati  #
   ataḥ paravidyāviṣayātpratiṣedhāditi.# /	atas para vidyA vizayAt pratizeDAt iti.# /
   yadi hi prāṇopalakṣitasya sūkṣmaśarīrasya jīvātmanaḥ	yadi hi prANa upalakzitasya sUkzma SarIrasya jIvAtmanaH
   sthūlaśarīrādutkrāntiṃ pratiṣedhecchrutiḥ tata etadupapadyate /	sTUla SarIrAt utkrAntim pratizeDet SrutiH tatas etat upapadyate /
   na tvetadasti /	na tu etat asti /
   na tasmātprāṇa utkrāmantīti hi tadā sarvanāmnā	na tasmAt prANaH utkrAmanti iti hi tadA sarva nAmnA
   pradhānāvamarśinābhyudayaniḥ śreyasādhikṛto dehi pradhānaṃ parāmṛśyate /	praDAna avamarSinA aByudayaniH Sreyasa aDikRtaH dehi praDAnam parAmRSyate /
   tathā ca tasmāddehino na prāṇaḥ sūkṣmaṃ śarīramutkrāmantyapi tu tatsahitaḥ	taTA ca tasmAt dehinaH na prANaH sUkzmam SarIram utkrAmanti api tu tad sahitaH
   kṣetrajña evotkrāmatīti gamyate /	kzetrajQaH eva utkrAmatI iti gamyate /
   sa punaratikramya brahmanāḍya saṃsāramaṇḍalaṃ hiraṇyagarbhaparyantaṃ	sa punar atikramya brahma nAxya saMsAra maNxalam hiraNyagarBa paryantam
   saliṅgo jīvaḥ parasminbrahmaṇi līyate tasmātparāmapi devatāṃ viduṣa	sa liFgaH jIvaH parasmin brahmaNi lIyate tasmAt parAm api devatAm viduza
   utkrāntirata eva mārgaśrutayaḥ, smṛtiśca mumukṣoḥ	utkrAntiH atas eva mArga SrutayaH, smRtiH ca mumukzoH
   śukasyādityamaṇḍalaprasthānaṃ darśayatīti prāptam //12 //	Sukasya Aditya maNxala prasTAnam darSayati iti prAptam //12 //
   evaṃ prāpte pratyucyate   # spaṣṭo hyekeṣām.# /	evam prApte pratyucyate  # spazwaH hi ekeza Am.# /
   nāyaṃ dehyapādānasya pratiṣedhaḥ /	na ayam dehyapAdAnasya pratizeDaH /
   api tu dehāpādānasya /	api tu deha apAdAnasya /
   tathā hi    ārtabhāgapraśnottare hyekasminpakṣe saṃsāriṇa eva jīvātmano	taTA hi   Arta BAga praSna uttare hi ekasmin pakze saMsAriNaH eva jIva AtmanaH 
   'nutkrāntiṃ parigṛhya na tarhyeṣa bhṛtaḥ prāṇānāmanutkrānteriti	anutkrAntim parigRhya na tarhi eza BRtaH prANAnAm anutkrAnteH iti
   svayamāśaṅkya prāṇānāṃ pravilayaṃ pratijñāya	svayam ASaFkya prANAnAm pravilayam pratijQAya
   tatsiddhyarthamutkrāntyavadherucchvayanādhmāne bruvanyasyocchvayanādhmāne	tad sidDi arTam utkrAnti avaDeH ucCvayana ADmAne bruvanyasya ucCvayana ADmAne
   tasya tadavadhitvamāha /	tasya tat avaDi tvam Aha /
   śarīrasya ca te itiśarīrameva tadapādānaṃ gamyate /	SarIrasya ca te iti SarIram eva tad apAdAnam gamyate /
   nanvevamapyastvaviduṣaḥ saṃsāriṇo viduṣastu kimāyātamityata āha   #	nanu evam api astu aviduzaH saMsAriNaH viduzaH tu kim AyAtam iti atas Aha  #
   tatsāmānyāditi.# /	tad sAmAnyAt iti.# /
   nanu tadā sarvanāmnā pradhānatayā dehi parāmṛṣṭaḥ tatkathamatra	nanu tadA sarva nAmnA praDAna tayA dehi parAmRzwaH tat kaTam atra
   dehāvagatirityata āha   # tatsāmānyaditi.# /	deha avagatiH iti atas Aha  # tad sAmAnyat iti.# /
   nanu tadā sarvanāmnā pradhānatayā dehī parāmṛṣṭaḥ tatkathamatra	nanu tadA sarva nAmnA praDAna tayA dehI parAmRzwaH tat kaTam atra
   dehāvagatirityata āha   # abhedopacāreṇa.# /	deha avagatiH iti atas Aha  # aBeda upacAreNa.# /
   dehadehinordehiparāmarśinā sarvanāmnā deha eva parāmṛṣṭa iti pañcamīpāṭhe	deha dehinoH dehi parAmarSinA sarva nAmnA dehaH eva parAmRzwaH iti paQcamI pAWe
   vyākhyeyam /	vyAKyeyam /
   ṣaṣṭhīpāṭhe tu nopacāra ityāha   # yeṣāṃ tu ṣaṣṭhīti.# /	zazWI pAWe tu na upacAraH iti Aha  # yezAm tu zazWI iti.# /
   api ca prāptipūrvaḥ pratiṣedho bhavati nāprāpte /	api ca prApti pUrvaH pratizeDaH Bavati na aprApte /
   aviduṣo hi dehādutkrāmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭamiti viduṣo 'pi tatsāmānyāddehādutkramaṇe	aviduzaH hi dehAt utkrAmaNam dRzwam iti viduzaH api tad sAmAnyAt dehAt utkramaNe
   prāpte pratiṣedha upapadyate na tu prāṇānāṃ jīvāvadhikaṃ kvacidutkramaṇaṃ	prApte pratizeDaH upapadyate na tu prANAnAm jIvO= aDikam kvacid utkramaNam
   dṛṣṭaṃ yena tanniṣidhyate /	dRzwam yena tat niziDyate /
   apicādvaitaparibhāvanābhuvā prasaṃkhyānena	apicA dvEta pariBAvanA aBuvA prasaMKyAnena
   nirmṛṣṭanikhilaprapañcāvabhāsajātasya gantavyābhāvādeva nāsti	nirmRzwa niKila prapaQca avaBAsa jAtasya gantavya aBAvAt eva na asti
   gatirityāha   # naca brahmavida iti.# /	gatiH iti Aha  # na ca brahma vidaH iti.# /
   apadasya hi brahmavido mārge padaiṣiṇo 'pi devā iti yojanā /	apadasya hi brahma vidaH mArge pada eziNaH api devAH iti yojanA /
   codayati   # nanu gatirapīti.# /	codayati  # nanu gatiH api iti.# /
   pariharati   # saśarīrasyaivāyaṃ yogabalena.# /	pariharati  # sa SarIrasya eva ayam yoga balena.# /
   aparavidyābaleneti //13 //	apara vidyA balena iti //13 //
   # tāni pare tathāhyāha.# /	# tAni pare taTA hi Aha.# /
   pratiṣṭhāvilayanaśrutyorvipratipattervimarśastamapanetumayamārambhaḥ /	pratizWA vilayana SrutyoH vipratipatteH vimarSaH tam apanetum ayam AramBaH /
   tāni punaḥ prāṇaśabdoditānīndriyāṇyekādaśa sūkṣmāṇi ca bhūtāni pañca /	tAni punar prANa Sabda uditAni indriyANi ekAdaSa sUkzmANi ca BUtAni paQca /
   # brahmavidastasminneva parasminnātmanīti.# /	# brahma vidaH tasmin= eva parasmin= Atmani iti.# /
   ārambhabījaṃ vimarśamāha   # nanu gatāḥkalā iti.# /	AramBa bIjam vimarSam Aha  # nanu gatAH kalA iti.# /
   ghrāṇamanasorekaprakṛtitvaṃ vivakṣitvā pañcadaśatvamuktam. /	GrANa manasoH eka prakRti tvam vivakzitvA paQcadaSa tvam uktam. /
   atra śrutyorviṣayavyavasthayā vipratipattyabhāvamāha    # sā khalviti.# /	atra SrutyoH vizaya vyavasTayA vipratipatti aBAvam Aha   # sA Kalu iti.# /
   vyavahāro laukikaḥ. sāṃvyavahārikapramāṇāpekṣeyaṃ śrutiḥ /	vyavahAraH lOkikaH. sAMvyavahArika pramANa apekzA iyam SrutiH /
   na tāttvikapramāṇāpekṣā /	na tAttvika pramANa apekzA /
   itarā tu evamevāsya paridṛṣṭuḥ ityādikā vidvatpratipattyapekṣā	itarA tu evam eva asya paridRzwuH iti AdikA vidvat pratipatti apekzA
   tāttvikapramāṇāpekṣā /	tAttvika pramANa apekzA /
   tasmādviṣayabhedādavipratipattiḥ śrutyoriti //15 //	tasmAt vizaya BedAt avipratipattiH SrutyoH iti //15 //
   # avibhāgo vacanāt.# /	# aviBAgaH vacanAt.# /
   nimittāpāye naimittikasyātyantikāpāyaḥ /	nimitta apAye nEmittikasya Atyantika apAyaH /
   avidyānimittaśca vibhāgo nāvidyāyāṃ vidyayā samūlaghātamapahatāyāṃ	avidyA nimittaH ca viBAgaH na avidyAyAm vidyayA sa mUla GAtam apahatAyAm
   sāvaśeṣo bhavitumarhati /	sa avaSezaH Bavitum arhati /
   tathāpi pravilayasāmānyāt sāvaśeṣatāśaṅkāmatimandāmapanetumidaṃ sūtram	taTA api pravilaya sAmAnyAt sOvaSeza tA SaFkAm atimandAm apanetum idam sUtram
   # tadokograjvalavaṃ tatprakāśitadvāro	# tad oka ugra jvalavam tad prakASi ta dvAraH 
   vidyāsāmarthyāttaccheṣagatyanusmṛtiyogācca hārdānugṛhītaḥ śatādhikayā.# /	vidyA sAmarTyAt tad Seza gati anusmRti yogAt ca hArda anugRhItaH Sata aDika yA.# /
   aparavidyāvido 'viduṣaścotkrāntiruktā /	apara vidyA vidaH aviduzaH ca utkrAntiH uktAH /
   tatra kiṃ vidvānavidvāṃścāviśeṣeṇa mūrdhādibhya utkrāmatyāho	tatra kim vidvAn avidvAn= ca aviSezeNa mUrDa AdiByaH utkrAmati AhaH 
   vidvānmūrdhasthānādeva, apare tu sthānāntarebhya iti /	vidvAn mUrDa sTAnAt eva, apare tu sTAna antareByaH iti /
   atra vidyāsāmarthyamapaśyataḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ /	atra vidyA sAmarTyam apaSyataH pUrva pakzaH /
   tasyopasaṃhṛtavāgādikalāpasyocciktamiṣato vijñānātmanā oka āyatanaṃ	tasya upasaMhRta vAc a Adi kalApasya uccikta mizataH vijQAna AtmanA okaH Ayatanam
   hṛdayaṃ tasyāgraṃ tasya jvalanaṃ yattatprakāśitadvāro viniṣkramadvāro	hRdayam tasya agram tasya jvalanam yat tat prakASita dvAraH vinizkramadvAraH 
   vidvānmūrdhasthānādeva niṣkrāmati nānyebhyaścakṣurādisthānebhyaḥ /	vidvAn mUrDa sTAnAt eva nizkrAmati na anyeByaH cakzuH Adi sTAneByaH /
   kutaḥ   vidyāsāmarthāt hārdavidyāsāmarthyāt /	kutas   vidyA sAmarTAt hArdavidyA sAmarTyAt /
   utkṛṣṭasthānapratilambhāya hi hārdavidyopadeśaḥ /	utkRzwa sTAna pratilamBAya hi hArdavidya upadeSaH /
   mūrdhasthānādaniṣkramaṇe ca notkṛṣṭadeśaprāptiḥ /	mUrDa sTAnAt anizkramaNe ca na utkRzwa deSa prAptiH /
   atha sthānāntarebhyo 'pyutkrāmamankasmāllokamutkṛṣṭaṃ na prāpnotītyata	aTa sTAna antareByaH api utkrAmam ankasmAt lokam utkRzwam na prApnoti iti ata
   āha   # taccheṣagatyanusmṛtiyogācca.# /	Aha  # tad Seza gati anusmRti yogAt ca.# /
   hārdavidyāśeṣabhūtā hi mūrdhanyā nāḍī gatyai upadiṣṭā /	hArda vidya aSeza BUtA hi mUrDanyA nAxI gatyE upadizwA /
   tadanuśīlanena khalvayaṃ jīvo hārdena sūpāsitena	tad anuSIlanena Kalu ayam jIvaH hArdena su upAsitena
   brahmaṇānugṛhītastasyānusmaraṃstadbhāvamāpanno mūrdhanyayaiva śatādhikayā	brahmaNA anugRhItaH tasya anusmaran= tad BAvam ApannaH mUrDanyayA eva Sata aDikayA
   nāḍya niṣkrāmati /	nAxya nizkrAmati /

   siddhāntapakṣapratijñā //18 //	sidDAnta pakza pratijQA //18 //
   pūrvapakṣamāśaṅkate sūtrāvayavena   # niśi neti cet.# /	pUrva pakzam ASaFkate sUtra avayavena  # niSi na iti cet.# /

   # pratāpādikāryadarśanāditi.# /	# pratApa Adi kArya darSanAt iti.# /

   # ataścāyane 'pi dakṣiṇe.# /	# atas ca ayane api dakziNe.# /

   pūrvapakṣabījamāha   # uttarāyaṇamaraṇaprāśastya iti.# /	pUrva pakza bIjam Aha  # uttarAyaNa maraNa prASastyaH iti.# /
   apanodamāha   # prāśastyaprasiddhiriti.# /	apanodam Aha  # prASasti aprasidDiH iti.# /
   ataḥpadaparāmṛṣṭahetubalādaviduṣo maraṇaṃ praśastamuttarāyaṇe	atas pada parAmRzwa hetu balAt aviduzaH maraNam praSastam uttarAyaNe

   # yoginaḥ prati ca smaryate smārte caite.# /	# yoginaH prati ca smaryate smArte ca ete.# /

   gantavyamekaṃ nagaraṃ prati vakreṇādhvanā gatimapekṣya ṛjunādhvanā	gantavyam ekam nagaram prati vakreNa aDvanA gatim apekzya RjunA aDvanA
   gatistvarāvatī kalpyate /	gatiH tvarAvatI kalpyate /
   ekamārgatve tu kamaparamapekṣya tvarā syāt /	eka mArga tve tu kam aparam apekzya tvarA syAt /

   ekatve 'pi patho 'nekaparvavasaṃbhavāt /	eka tve api paTaH aneka parvava saMBavAt /
   gauravānnaiva nānātvaṃ pratyabhijñānaliṅgataḥ //	gOravAt na eva nAnAtvam pratyaBijQAna liFgataH //
   saparvā hi panthā nagarādikamekaṃ gantavyaṃ prāpayati nābhāgaḥ /	sa parvA hi panTAH nagara Adikam ekam gantavyam prApayati nABAgaH /
   tatra kimete raśmyaharvāyusūryādayo 'dhvanaḥ parvāṇaḥ santo 'dhvanaikena	tatra kim ete raSmi ahar vAyu sUrya AdayaH aDvanaH parvANaH santaH aDvana ekena
   yujyante, āho yathāyathamadhvānamapi bhindantīti saṃdehe 'bhede 'pyadhvano	yujyante, Aho yaTAyaTam aDvAnam api Bindanti iti saMdehe aBede api aDvanaH 
   bhāgabhedopapatterna bhāgibhedakalpanocitā, gauravaprasaṅgāt /	BAga Beda upapatteH na BAgi Beda kalpanA ucitA, gOrava prasaFgAt /

   vaktavyam /	vaktavyam /

   tasmādbhūyasāṃ parvaṇāmavirodhenālpānāṃ tadanupraveśa eva yukta iti //1 //	tasmAt BUyasAm parvaNAm aviroDena alpAnAm tad anupraveSaH eva yuktaH iti //1 //
   # vāyumabdādaviśeṣaviśeṣābhyām.# /	# vAyum abdAt aviSeza viSezAByAm .# /
   'śrutyādyabhāve pāṭhasya kramaṃ prati niyantṛtā /	aSruti Adi aBAve pAWasya kramam prati niyantR tA /
   ūrdhvākramaṇamātre ca śrutā vāyornimittatā //	UrDva AkramaNa mAtre ca SrutAH vAyoH nimitta tA //
   ' 'sa vāyumāgacchati tasmai sa tatra vijihīte yathā rathacakrasya khaṃ	a asa vAyum AgacCati tasmE sa tatra vijihIte yaTA raTa cakrasya Kam
   tena sa ūrdhvamākramate' iti hi vāyunimittamūrdhvākramaṇaṃ śrutaṃ na tu	tena saH UrDvam Akramate a iti hi vAyu nimittam UrDvAkramaNam Srutam na tu
   vāyunimittamādityagamanaṃ 'sa ādityaṃ gacchati'	vAyu nimittam Aditya gamanam asaH Adityam gacCati a
   ityādityagamanamātrapratīteḥ /	iti Aditya gamana mAtra pratIteH /
   naca tenetyanantaraśrutordhvīkramaṇakriyāsaṃbandhi	na ca tena iti anantara Sruta UrDvI kramaNa kriyA saMbanDi
   nirākāṅkṣamādityagamanakriyayāpi saṃbanddhumarhati /	nirAkAFkzam Aditya gamana kriyayA api saMbandDum arhati /
   na cādityāgamanasya teneti vinā	na ca Aditya Agamanasya tena iti vinA
   kācidanupapattiryenānyasaṃbaddhamapyanuṣajyate /	kAcid anupapattiH yena anya saMbadDam api anuzajyate /
   tatrāgnilokamāgacchati sa vāyulokamityādisaṃdarbhagatasya pāṭhasya	tatra agni lokam AgacCati sa vAyu lokam ityAdi saMdarBa gatasya pAWasya
   kvacinniyāmakatvena	kvacid niyAmaka tvena
   kḷptasāmarthyādagnivāyuvaruṇakramaniyāmakaśrutyādyabhāvāditi prāpte	k?pta sAmarTyAt agni vAyu varuNa krama niyAmaka Sruti Adi aBAvAt iti prApte
   pratyucyate  ūrdhvaśabdo na lokasya kasyacitpratipādakaḥ /	pratyucyate UrDva SabdaH na lokasya kasyacid pratipAdakaH /
   tadbhedāpekṣayā yuktamādityena viśeṣaṇam //	tad Beda apekzayA yuktam Adityena viSezaNam //

   vyavasthāpyate /	vyavasTApyate /

   padārthamātrapradarśanārtho na tu kramāya prabhavati śrutivirodhāditi	padArTa mAtra pradarSana arTaH na tu kramAya praBavati Sruti viroDAt iti
   siddham /	sidDam /
   vājasaneyināṃ saṃvatsaraloko na paṭhyate chāndogyānāṃ devaloko na paṭhyate	vAjasaneyinAm saMvatsara lokaH na paWyate CAndogyAnAm deva lokaH na paWyate
   tatrobhayānurodhādubhayapāṭhe māsasaṃbandhātsaṃvatsaraḥ pūrvaḥ paścimo	tatra uBaya anuroDAt uBaya pAWe mAsa saMbanDAt saMvatsaraH pUrvaH paScimaH 
   devalokaḥ /	deva lokaH /
   nahi māso devalokena saṃbadhyate kintu saṃvatsareṇa /	na hi mAsaH deva lokena saMbaDyate kintu saMvatsareNa /
   tasmāttayoḥ parasparasaṃbandhānmāsārabhyatvācca saṃvatsarasya māsānantarye	tasmAt tayoH paraspara saMbanDAt mAsa AraBya tvAt ca saMvatsarasya mAsa Anantarye
   sthite devalokaḥ saṃvatsarasya parastādbhavati /	sTite deva lokaH saMvatsarasya parastAt Bavati /
   tatrādityānantaryāya vāyoḥ saṃvatsarādityasya sthāne devalokādvāyumiti	tatra AdityAnantaryAya vAyoH saMvatsara Adityasya sTAne deva lokAt vAyum iti
   paṭhitavyam /	paWitavyam /

   chāndogyapāṭhamātrāpekṣayektaṃ, tadidamāha  # vāyumabdāditi tviti.# //2 //	CAndogya pAWa mAtra apekzayektan, tat idam Aha # vAyum abdAt iti tu iti.# //2 //
   # taḍito 'dhi varuṇaḥ saṃbandhāt.# /	# taxitaH aDi varuNaH saMbanDAt.# /

   tatsaṃbandhāttathendrādirappateḥ para īṣyate //	tad saMbanDAt taTA indra AdiH appateH paraH Izyate //
   āgantūnāṃ niveśo 'nte sthānābhāvātprasādhitaḥ /	AgantUnAm niveSaH ante sTAna aBAvAt prasADitaH /
   tathā cendrādirāgantuḥ paṭhyate cāppateḥ paraḥ //3 //	taTA ca indra AdiH AgantuH paWyate ca appateH paraH //3 //
   # ativāhikāstalliṅgāt.# /	# ativAhikAH tad liFgAt.# /
   mārgacihnasarūpatvāccihnānyevārcirādayaḥ /	mArga cihna sarUpa tvAt cihnAni eva arcira AdayaH /
   bhartṛbhogabhuvo vā syurlokatvānnātivāhikāḥ //	BartR Boga BuvaH vA syuH loka tvAt na ativAhikAH //
   arcirādiśabdā hi jvalanādāvacetaneṣu nirūḍhavṛttayo loke /	arciH Adi SabdAH hi jvalana AdO= acetanezu nirUXa vRttayaH loke /
   na caiṣāṃ tvāvadhikānāmiva niyamavatī saṃvahanasvarūpā svatanantrakriyā	na ca ezAm tvO= aDikAnAm iva niyamavatI saMvahana svarUpA svata nantra kriyA
   buddhipūrvā saṃbhavatyacetanānām /	budDi pUrvA saMBavati acetanAnAm /
   tasmāllokaśabdavācyatvādbharturjīvātmano bhogabhūmaya eveti manyāmahe /	tasmAt loka Sabda vAcya tvAt BartuH jIva AtmanaH Boga BUmayaH eva iti manyAmahe /
   api cārciṣa ityasmādapādānāṃ pratīyate /	api ca arcizaH iti asmAt apAdAnAm pratIyate /
   na heturnāguṇe hetau pañcamī dṛśyate kvacit //	na hetuH na aguNe hetO paQcamI dRSyate kvacid //
   jāḍyādbaddha ityādiṣu guṇavacaneṣu jāḍyādiṣu hetupañcamī dṛṣṭā /	jAxyAt badDaH ityAdizu guNa vacanezu jAxya Adizu hetu paQcamI dRzwA /
   na cārcirādiśabdā guṇavācino yena pañcamyā teṣāṃ vahanaṃ prati	na ca arciH Adi SabdAH guNa vAcinaH yena paQcamyA tezAm vahanam prati
   hetutvamucyate /	hetu tvam ucyate /
   apādānatvaṃ cācetaneṣvapyastīti nātivāhikāḥ /	apAdAna tvam ca acetanezu api asti iti na ativAhikAH /
   na cāmānavasya puruṣasya vidyudādiṣu voḍhṛtvadarśanādarcirādīnāmapi	na ca amAnavasya puruzasya vidyut Adizu voXR tva darSanAt arcirAdInAm api
   voḍhṛtvānnāmānavaḥ puruṣo voḍhā śrūyate /	voXR tvA anna amAnavaH puruzaH voXA SrUyate /
   yataḥ śrūyate tato 'vagacchāmo vidyudādivannārcirādīnāṃ voḍhṛtvamiti /	yatas SrUyate tatas avagacCAmaH vidyut Adi vat na arcira AdInAm voXR tvam iti /

   na svātantryaṃ na cāgnyādyā netāro 'cetanāstu te //	na svAtantryam na ca agni AdyAH netAraH acetanAH tu te //

   # apratīkālambanānnayatīti bādarāyaṇa ubhayathā doṣāttatkratuśca.# /	# apratIka AlambanAt nayati iti bAdarAyaNaH uBayaTA dozAt tad kratuH ca.# /
   abrahmakratavo yānti yathā pañcāgnividyayā /	abrahma kratavaH yAnti yaTA paQca agni vidyayA /
   brahmalokaṃ prayāsyanti pratīkopāsakāstathā //	brahma lokam prayAsyanti pratIka upAsakAH taTA //

   sarvāsām' ityaviśeṣeṇa vidyāntareṣvapi gateravadhāraṇāt /	sarvAsAm a iti aviSezeNa vidyA antarezu api gateH avaDAraNAt /

   'taṃ yathāyathopāsate tadeva bhavati' iti śruterautsargikyānnāsati	atam yaTAyaTA upAsate tat eva Bavati a iti SruteH OtsargikyAn na asati
   viśeṣavacane 'pavādo yujyate /	viSeza vacane apavAdaH yujyate /
   naca pratīkopāsako brahmopāste satyapi brahmetyanugame /	na ca pratIkopAsakaH brahma upAste sati api brahma iti anugame /

   tathā khalvayaṃ nāmāditantro na brahmatantraḥ /	taTA Kalu ayam nAma Adi tantraH na brahmatantraH /
   āśrayāntarapratyayasyāśrayāntare prakṣepaḥ pratīka iti hi vṛddhāḥ /	ASraya antara pratyayasya ASraya antare prakzepaH pratIkaH iti hi vRdDAH /
   brahmāśrayaśca pratyayo nāmādiṣu prakṣipta iti nāmatantraḥ /	brahma ASrayaH ca pratyayaH nAma Adizu prakziptaH iti nAmatantraH /
   tasmānna tadupāsako brahmakratuḥ kintunāmādikratuḥ /	tasmAt na tad upAsakaH brahma kratuH kintu nAm Adi kratuH /
   na ca brahmakratutve nāmādyupāsakānāmaviśeṣāduttarottarotkarṣaḥ saṃbhavī /	na ca brahma kratu tve nAma Adi upAsakAnAm aviSezAt uttarottara utkarzaH saMBavI /
   naca brahmakratustadavayavakraturyena tadavayavāpekṣayotkarṣo varṇyeta /	na ca brahma kratuH tad avayava kratuH yena tad avayava apekzayA utkarzaH varNyeta /

   # caturthe 'dhyāye caturthaḥ pādaḥ.# /	# caturTe aDyAye caturTaH pAdaH.# /
   # saṃpadyāvirbhāvaḥ svenaśabdāt.# /	# saMpadya AvirBAvaH svena SabdAt.# /
   prāgabhūtasya niṣpattau kartṛtvaṃ na sato yataḥ /	prAc aBUtasya nizpattO kartR tvam na sataH yatas /

   abhūtasya ghaṭāderbhavanaṃ niṣpattirna punaratyantasato 'sato vā /	aBUtasya Gawa AdeH Bavanam nizpattiH na punar atyanta sataH asataH vA /
   na jātu gaganatatkusume niṣpadyete /	na jAtu gagana tat kusume nizpadyete /
   svarūpāvasthānaṃ cedātmano muktirna sā niṣpadyeta, tasya	svarUpa avasTAnam ced AtmanaH muktiH na sA nizpadyeta, tasya
   gaganavadatyantasataḥ prāgasattvābhāvāt /	gagana vat ati anta sataH prAc asattva aBAvAt /
   na cāsya bandhābhāvo niṣpadyate, tasya tucchasvabhāvasya	na ca asya banDa aBAvaH nizpadyate, tasya tucCa svaBAvasya
   kāryatvenātucchatvaprasaṅgāt /	kAryatvena atucCatva prasaFgAt /
   phalatvaprasiddheśca mokṣasyākāryasya phalatvānavakalpanādāgantunā rūpeṇa	Pala tva prasidDeH ca mokzasya akAryasya Pala tvAn avakalpanAt AgantunA rUpeNa
   kenacidutpattau sveneti prāptamanūdyata iti prāpte	kenacid utpattO svena iti prAptam anUdyate iti prApte
   'bhidhīyate saṃbhavatyarthavattve hi nānarthakyamupeyate /	aBiDIyate  saMBavati arTavat tve hi na anarTakyam upeyate /
   bandhasya sadasattvābhyāṃ rūpamekaṃ viśiṣyate //	banDasya sat asat tvAByAm rUpam ekam viSizyate //
   anadhigatāvabodhanaṃ hi pramāṇaṃ śābdamagatyā kathañcidanuvādatayā	anaDigata avaboDanam hi pramANam SAbdam agatyA kaTaQcid anuvAda tayA
   varṇyate /	varNyate /
   sakalasāṃsārikadharmāpetaṃ tu prasannamātmarūpamaprasannāttasmādeva	sakala sAMsArika Darma apetam tu prasannam Atma rUpam aprasannAt tasmAt eva
   rūpādvyāvṛttamanadhigatamavabodhayannānuvādo yujyate /	rUpAt vyAvRttam anaDigatam avaboDayat na anuvAdaH yujyate /
   na cāsya niṣpattyasaṃbhavaḥ, sata iva ghaṭādeḥ sāṃvyavahārikeṇa pramāṇena	na ca asya nizpatti asaMBavaH, sataH iva Gawa AdeH sAMvyavahArikeNa pramANena
   bandhavigamasyāpi niṣpatterlokasiddhatvāt /	banDa vigamasya api nizpatteH loka sidDa tvAt /
   vicārāsahatayā tvasiddhirubhayatrāpi tulyā /	vicAra asahatayA tu asidDiH uBayatra api tulyA /
   na hyasadutpattumarhatītyasakṛdāveditam /	na hi asat utpattum arhati iti asakRt Aveditam /
   andho bhavatīti svapnāvasthā darśitā bāhyendriyavyāpārābhāvāt /	anDaH Bavati iti svapna avasTA darSitAH bAhya indriya vyApAra aBAvAt /
   roditīva jāgradavasthā duḥkhaśokādyātmakatvāt /	roditi iva jAgrat avasTA duHKa Soka Adi Atmaka tvAt /
   vināśamevāpīta iti suṣuptiḥ /	vinASam eva ApItaH iti suzuptiH /
   evakāraścevārthe 'navadhāraṇe //1 // //2 //	eva kAraH ca iva arTe anavaDAraNe //1 // //2 //
   # ātmā prakaraṇāt.# /	# AtmA prakaraNAt.# /
   nanu jyotirupasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata iti paurvāparyaśravaṇāt	nanu jyotiH upasaMpadya svena rUpeNa aBinizpadyate iti pOrvAparya SravaNAt 
   svarūpaniṣpatteranyā jyotirupasaṃpattiḥ tathāca bhautikatve 'pi na	sva rUpa nizpatteH anyA jyotiH upasaMpattiH taTA ca BOtika tve api na
   mokṣavyāghātaḥ /	mokza vyAGAtaH /
   bhavedetadevaṃ yadi jyotirupasaṃpadya tat parityajediti śrūyeta /	Bavet etat evam yadi jyotiH upasaMpadya tat parityajet iti SrUyeta /
   tadadhyāhāre 'pi tatpratipādanavaiyarthyaṃ tadaparityāge ca jyotiṣaiva	tat aDyAhAre api tad pratipAdana vEyarTyam tad aparityAge ca jyotizA eva
   svena rūpeṇeti gamyate /	svena rUpeNa iti gamyate /
   tasya ca bhūtatve vikāratvānmaraṇadharmakatvaprasiddheramuktitvamiti	tasya ca BUta tve vikAra tvAt maraNa Darmaka tva prasidDeH amukti tvam iti
   prāpte pratyucyate jyotiṣpadasya mukhyatvaṃ bhautike yadyapi sthitam /	prApte pratyucyate  jyotizpadasya muKya tvam BOtike yadi api sTitam /
   tathāpi prakramādvākyādātmanyevātra yujyate //	taTA api prakramAt vAkyAt Atmani eva atra yujyate //
   paraṃ jyotiriti hi parapadasamabhivyāhārātparatvasya cānapekṣasya	param jyotiH iti hi para pada samaBivyAhArAt paratvasya ca anapekzasya
   brahmaṇyeva pravṛttejyotiṣi cāpare kiñcidapekṣya paratvātparaṃ jyotiriti	brahmaNi eva pravRttA ijyotizi ca apare kiQcid apekzya paratvAt param jyotiH iti
   vākyādātmaivātra gamyate /	vAkyAt AtmA eva atra gamyate /
   prakaraṇaṃ coktam /	prakaraNam ca uktam /
   yat saṃpadya niṣpadyata iti tanmukhaṃ vyādāya svapitītivat /	yat saMpadya nizpadyate iti tad muKam vyAdAya sva piti iti vat /
   tasmājjyotirupasaṃpanno mukta iti sūktam //3 //	tasmAt jyotiH upasaMpannaH muktaH iti sUktam //3 //
   # avibhāgena dṛṣṭatvāt.# /	# aviBAgena dRzwa tvAt.# /
   yadyapi jīvātmā brahmaṇo na bhinna iti tatra tatropapāditaṃ tathāpi sa	yadi api jIvAtmA brahmaNaH na BinnaH iti tatra tatra upapAditam taTA api sa
   tatra paryetītyādhārādheyabhāvavyapadeśasya	tatra paryeti iti ADAra ADeya BAva vyapadeSasya
   saṃpattṛsaṃpattavyabhāvavyapadeśasya ca samādhānārthamāha //4 //	saMpattR saMpattavya BAva vyapadeSasya ca samADAna arTam Aha //4 //
   # brāhmeṇa jaiminirupanyāsādibhyaḥ.# /	# brAhmeNa jEminiH upanyAsa AdiByaH.# /
   upanyāsa uddeśo jñātasya yathā ya ātmāpahatapāpmetyādiḥ /	upanyAsaH uddeSaH jQAtasya yaTA yaH Atma apahata pApma ityAdiH /
   tathājñātajñāpanaṃ vidhiḥ /	taTA ajQAta jQApanam viDiH /
   yathā sa tatra paryeti jakṣadramamāṇa iti, tasya sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro	yaTA sa tatra paryeti jakzat ramamANaH iti, tasya sarvezu lokezu kAma cAraH 
   bhavatītyetadajñātajñāpanaṃ vidhiḥ /	Bavati iti etat ajQAta jQApanam viDiH /
   sarvajñaḥ sarveśvara iti vyapadeśaḥ /	sarvajQaH sarveSvaraH iti vyapadeSaH /
   nāyamuddeśo vidheyāntarābhāvāt /	na ayam uddeSaH viDeya antara aBAvAt /

   siddhavadvyapadeśāt /	sidDa vat vyapadeSAt /
   tannirvacanasāmarthyādayamarthaḥ pratīyate ta ete upanyāsādayaḥ /	tad nirvacana sAmarTyAt ayam arTaH pratIyate te ete upanyAsa AdayaH /
   etebhyo hetubhyaḥ /	eteByaH hetuByaH /
   bhāvābhāvātmakai rūpairbhāvikaiḥ parameśvaraḥ /	BAva aBAva AtmakEH rUpEH BAvikEH parameSvaraH /
   muktaḥ saṃpadyate svairityāha sma kila jaiminiḥ //	muktaH saMpadyate svEH iti Aha sma kila jEminiH //
   na ca citsvabhāvasyātmano 'bhāvātmāno 'pahatapāpmatvādayo bhāvātmanaśca	na ca cit svaBAvasya AtmanaH aBAva AtmAnaH apahata pApma tva AdayaH BAva AtmanaH ca
   sarvajñatvādayo dharmā advaitaṃ ghnanti /	sarvajQa tva AdayaH DarmAH advEtam Gnanti /
   no khalu dharmiṇo dharmā bhidyante, mā	no Kalu DarmiNaH DarmAH Bidyante, mA
   bhūdgavāśvavaddharmidharmabhāvābhāva iti jaiminirācārya uvāca //5 //	BUt gava aSva vat Darmi Darma BAva aBAvaH iti jEminiH AcAryaH uvAca //5 //
   # cititanmātreṇa tadātmakatvādityauḍulomiḥ.# /	# citi tanmAtreNa tad Atmaka tvAt iti OxulomiH.# /
   anekākārataikasya naikatvānnaikatā bhavet /	aneka AkAra tA ekasya na ekatvAt na eka tA Bavet /
   parasparavirodhena na bhedābhedasaṃbhavaḥ //	paraspara viroDena na Beda aBeda saMBavaH //
   na hyekasyātmanaḥ pāramārthikānekadharmasaṃbhavaḥ /	na hi ekasya AtmanaH pAramArTika aneka Darma saMBavaH /
   te cedātmano bhidyante dvaitāpatteradvaitaśrutayo vyāvarteram /	te ced AtmanaH Bidyante dvEta ApatteH advEta SrutayaH vyAvarteram /
   atha na bhidyante tata ekasmādātmano 'bhedānmitho 'pi na bhidyeran /	aTa na Bidyante tatas ekasmAt AtmanaH aBedAt miTas api na Bidyeran /
   ātmarūpavat /	Atma rUpa vat /
   ātmarūpaṃ vā bhidyeta /	Atma rUpam vA Bidyeta /
   bhinnebhyo 'nanyatvānnīlapītarūpavat /	BinneByaH ananya tvAt nIla pIta rUpa vat /
   naca dharmiṇa ātmano na bhidyante mithastu bhidyanta iti sāmpratam /	na ca DarmiNaH AtmanaH na Bidyante miTas tu Bidyante iti sAmpratam /
   dharmyabhedena tadananyatvena teṣāmapyabhedaprasaṅgāt /	Darmya Bedena tat ananya tvena tezAm api aBeda prasaFgAt /

   bhedābhedau ca parasparavirodhādekatrābhāvānna saṃbhavata ityupapāditaṃ	Beda aBedO ca paraspara viroDAt ekatra aBAvAt na saMBavate iti upapAditam
   prathame sūtre /	praTame sUtre /

   śliṣyate /	Slizyate /

   tadidamuktaṃ  # śabdavikalpajā evaite.#apahatapāpmatvādayo na tu	tad idam uktaM # Sabda vikalpa jAH eva ete.#apahata pApma tva AdayaH na tu

   śira itivadavāstavā ityarthaḥ //7 //	SiraH iti vadavAstavAH iti arTaH //7 //
   # saṃkalpādeva tu tacchruteḥ.# /	# saMkalpAt eva tu tat SruteH.# /

   na dṛṣṭaḥ so 'tra yatnasya lāghavādavadhāritaḥ //	na dRzwaH saH atra yatnasya lAGavAt avaDAritaH //
   loke hi kañcidarthaṃ cikīrṣuḥ prayatate prayatamānaḥ samīhate	loke hi kaQcid arTam cikIrzuH prayatate prayatamAnaH samIhate
   samīhānastamarthamāpnotīti kramo dṛṣṭaḥ /	samIhAnaH tam arTam Apnoti iti kramaH dRzwaH /

   'numantavyaḥ /	anumantavyaH /
   avadhāraṇaṃ tu saṃkalpādeveti laukikaṃ yatnagauravamapekṣya	avaDAraNam tu saMkalpAt eva iti lOkikam yatna gOravam apekzya
   vidyāprabhāvato viduṣo yatnalāghavāt /	vidyA praBAvataH viduzaH yatna lAGavAt /
   yallaghu tadasatkalpamiti /	yat laGu tat asat kalpam iti /
   syādetat /	syAt etat /
   yathā manorathamātropasthāpitā strī straiṇānāṃ caramadhātuvisargaheturevaṃ	yaTA manoraTa mAtra upasTApitA strI strENAnAm carama DAtu visarga hetuH evam
   pitrādayo 'pyasya saṃkalpopasthāpitāḥ kalpiṣyante svakāryāyetyata āha  #	pitR AdayaH api asya saMkalpa upasTApitAH kalpizyante sva kAryAya iti atas Aha #
   naca saṃkalpamātrasamutthāpanā iti.# /	na ca saMkalpa mAtra samutTApanAH iti.# /
   santi hi khalu kānicidvastusvarūpasādhyāni kāryāṇi yathā strīvastusādhyāni	santi hi Kalu kAnicid vastu svarUpa sADyAni kAryANi yaTA strI vastu sADyAni
   dantakṣatamaṇimālādīni /	danta kzata maNi mAlA AdIni /
   kānicittu jñānasādhyāni yathoktacaramadhātuvisargaromaharṣādīni /	kAnicid tu jQAna sADyAni yaTA ukta carama DAtu visarga roma harza AdIni /
   tatra manorathamātropanīte pitrādau bhavantu tajjñānamātrasādhyāni kāryāṇi	tatra manoraTa mAtra upanIte pitR AdO Bavantu tad jQAna mAtra sADyAni kAryANi
   natu tatsādhyāni bhavitumarhanti /	na tu tad sADyAni Bavitum arhanti /
   nahi straiṇasya romaharṣādivadbhavanti strīvastusādhyā	na hi strENasya roma harza Adi vat Bavanti strI vastu sADyA
   maṇimālādayastadidamuktaṃ # puṣkalaṃ bhoga.#miti prāpte 'bhidhīyate 	maNi mAlA AdayaH tat idam uktam # puzkalam Boga.#m iti prApte aBiDIyate 
   pitrādīnāṃ samutthānaṃ saṃkalpādeva tacchruteḥ /	pitR AdInAm samutTAnam saMkalpAt eva tat SruteH /
   na cānumānabādho 'tra śrutyā tasyaiva bādhanāt //	na ca anumAna bADaH atra SrutyA tasya eva bADanAt //
   pramāṇāntarānapekṣā hi śrutiḥ svārthaṃ gocarayantī na pramāṇāntareṇa śakyā	pramANa antara anapekzA hi SrutiH sva arTam gocarayantI na pramANa antareNa SakyA
   bādhitum /	bADitum /
   anumānameva tu svotpādāya pakṣadharmatvādivanmānāntarābādhitaviṣayatvaṃ	anumAnam eva tu sva utpAdAya pakza Darma tva Adi vat mAna antara AbADita vizaya tvam
   svasāmagrīmadhyapātenāpekṣamāṇaṃ sāmagrīkhaṇḍanena tadviruddhayā śrutyā	sva sAmagrI maDya pAtena apekzamANam sAmagrIKaNxanena tad virudDayA SrutyA

   sāṃpratam /	sAMpratam /

   daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ sṛjati /	daNxaka araNyam sRjati /
   tasmātsarvamavadātam //8 // //9 //	tasmAt sarvam avadAtam //8 // //9 //
   # abhāvaṃ bādarirāha hyevam.# /	# aBAvam bAdariH Aha hi evam.# /
   anyayogavyacchittyā manaseti viśeṣaṇāt /	anya yoga vyacCittyA manasA iti viSezaNAt /
   dehendriyaviyogaḥ syādviduṣo bādarermatam //	deha indriya viyogaH syAt viduzaH bAdareH matam //
   anekadhābhāvaścarddhiprabhāvabhuvo manobhedādvā stutimātraṃ vā	anekaDA BAvaH ca RdDi praBAva BuvaH manaH BedAt vA stuti mAtram vA
   kathañcidbhūmavidyāyāṃ nirguṇāyāṃ tadasaṃbhavādasatāpi hi guṇena	kaTaQcid BUma vidyAyAm nirguNAyAm tad asaMBavAt asatA api hi guNena
   stutirbhavatyeveti //10 //	stutiH Bavati eva iti //10 //
   # bhāvaṃ jaiminirvikalpāmananāt.# /	# BAvam jEminiH vikalpa AmananAt.# /
   śarīrendriyabhede hi nānābhāvaḥ samañjasaḥ /	SarIra indriya Bede hi nAnABAvaH samaQjasaH /
   na cārthasaṃbhave yuktaṃ stutimātramanarthakam //	na ca arTa saMBave yuktam stuti mAtram anarTakam //
   nahi manomātrabhede sphuṭataro 'nekadhābhāvo yathā śarīrendriyabhede /	na hi manaH mAtra Bede sPuwataraH anekaDA BAvaH yaTA SarIra indriya Bede /
   ata eva saubharerabhivinirmitavividhadehasyāparyāyeṇa māndhātṛkanyābhiḥ	atas eva sOBareH aBivinirmita viviDa dehasya aparyAyeNa mAnDAtR kanyABiH
   pañcāśatā vihāraḥ pairāṇikaiḥ smaryate /	paQcASatA vihAraH pErANikEH smaryate /
   na cārthasaṃbhave stutimātramanarthakamavakalpate /	na ca arTa saMBave stuti mAtram anarTakam avakalpate /
   saṃbhavati cāsyārthavattvam /	saMBavati ca asya arTavat tvam /
   yadyapi nirguṇāyamidaṃ bhaumavidyāyāṃ paṭhyate tathāpi tasyāḥ	yadi api nirguNAyam idam BOma vidyAyAm paWyate taTA api tasyAH
   purastādanena saguṇāvasthāgatenaiśvaryeṇa nirguṇaiva vidyā stūyate /	purastAt anena sa guNa avasTA gatena ESvaryeNa nirguNA eva vidyA stUyate /
   na cānyayogavyavacchedenaiva viśeṣaṇam /	na ca anya yoga vyavacCedena eva viSezaNam /
   yathā caitro dhanurdharaḥ /	yaTA cEtraH DanurDaraH /
   tasmānmanaḥ śarīrendriyayoga aiśvaryaśālināṃ niyameneti mene jaiminiḥ //11	tasmAt manaH SarIra indriya yoga ESvarya SAlinAm niyamena iti mene jEminiH //11
   # dvādaśāhavadubhayavidhaṃ bādarāyaṇo 'taḥ.# /	# dvAdaSa ahavat uBayaviDam bAdarAyaNaH atas .# /
   manaseti kevalamanoviṣayāṃ ca sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavatīti	manasA iti kevala manaH vizayAm ca saH ekaDA Bavati triDA Bavati iti
   śarīrendriyabhedaviṣayāṃ ca śrutimupalabhyāniyamavādī khalu bādarāyaṇo	SarIra indriya Beda vizayAm ca Srutim upalaBya aniyama vAdI Kalu bAdarAyaNaH

   # bhogamātrasāmyaliṅgācca.# /	# Boga mAtra sAmya liFgAt ca.# /

   bhūtānyavanti prīṇayantīti bhojayantīti yāvat /	BUtAni avanti prINayanti iti Bojayanti iti yAvat /
   sūtrāntarāvatāraṇāya śaṅkate  # nanvevaṃ sati sātiśayatvāditi.# /	sUtra antara avatAraNAya SaFkate # nanu evam sati sa atiSaya tvAt iti.# /
   saha parameśvarasyātiśayena vartata iti viduṣa aiśvaryaṃ sātiśayam /	saha parameSvarasya atiSayena vartate iti viduza ESvaryam sa atiSayam /
   yacca kāryaṃ sātiśayaṃ tacca yathā laukikamaiśvaryam /	yat ca kAryam sa atiSayam tat ca yaTA lOkikam ESvaryam /
   tadanena kāryatvamuktam /	tat anena kAryatvam uktam /
   tathāca kāryatvādantavatprāptamiti tacca na yuktamānantyena tadviduṣāṃ	taTA ca kArya tvAt anta vat prAptam iti tat ca na yuktam Anantyena tad viduzAm
   tatra pravṛtteriti //21 //	tatra pravRtteH iti //21 //
   ata uttaraṃ paṭhati  # anāvṛttiḥ śabdādanāvṛttiḥ śabdāt.# /	atas uttaram paWati # anAvRttiH SabdAt anAvRttiH SabdAt.# /
   kimarcirādimārgeṇa brahmalokaprāptānāmaiśvaryasyāntavattvaṃ tvayā sādhyate	kim arciH Adi mArgeNa brahma loka prAptAnAm ESvaryasya antavat tvam tvayA sADyate
   āhosviccandralokādiva brahmalokādetallokaprāptirmukterantavattvam /	Ahosvit candra lokAt iva brahma lokAt etat loka prAptiH mukteH antavat tvam /
   tatra pūrvasmin kalpe siddhasādhanam /	tatra pUrvasmin kalpe sidDa sADanam /
   uttaratra tu śrutismṛtivirodhaḥ /	uttaratra tu Sruti smRti viroDaH /
   tadvidhānāṃ ca kramamuktipratipādanāditi /	tadviDAnAm ca krama mukti pratipAdanAt iti /
   tattvamasivākyārthaikopāsanāparān pratyāha  #	tattvam asi vAkya arTa eka upAsana aparAn pratyAha #
   samyagdarśanavidhvastatamasāmiti.# /	samyak darSana viDvastatamasAmiti.# /
   dvidhāvidyā tamaḥ /	dviDA avidyA tamaH /
   nirupādhibrahmasākṣātkārastattvadarśanam /	nirupADi brahma sAkzAtkAraH tattva darSanam /
   na caitannirvāṇaṃ svarūpāvasthānalakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ yenānityaṃ syādityāha  #	na ca etat nirvANam svarUpa avasTAna lakzaNam kAryam yena anityam syAt iti Aha #
   nityasiddheti.# //22 //	nitya sidDa iti.# //22 //
   bhaṅktvā vādyasurendravṛndamakhilāvidyopadhānātigaṃ	BaFktvA vAdya surendra vRndam aKila avidyA upaDAna atigam
   yenāmnāyapayonidhernayapathā brahmāmṛtaṃ prāpyate /	yena AmnAyapa yoniDeH naya paTAH brahma amRtam prApyate /
   so 'yaṃ śāṅkarabhāṣyajātaviṣayo vācaspateḥ sādaraṃ saṃdarbhaḥ	saH ayam SAFkara BAzya jAta vizayaH vAcaspateH sa Adaram saMdarBaH
   paribhāvyatāṃ sumatayaḥ svārtheṣu ko matsaraḥ //1 //	pariBAvyatAm sumatayaH sva arTezu kaH matsaraH //1 //
   ajñānasāgaraṃ tīrtvā brahmatattvamabhīpsatām /	ajQAna sAgaram tIrtvA brahma tattvam aBIpsatAm /
   nītinaukarṇadhāreṇa mayāpūri manorathaḥ //2 //	nIti nOkarNa DAreNa mayA apUri manoraTaH //2 //
   yannyāyakaṇikātattvasamīkṣātattvabindubhiḥ /	yat nyAya kaNikA tattva samIkzA tattva binduBiH /
   yannyāyasāṃkhyayogānāṃ vedāntānāṃ nibandhanaiḥ //3 //	yat nyAya sAMKya yogAnAm vedAntAnAm nibanDanEH //3 //
   samacaiṣaṃ mahatpuṇyaṃ tatphalaṃ puṣkalaṃ mayā /	sama cEzam mahat puNyam tat Palam puzkalam mayA /
   samarpitamathaitena prīyatāṃ parameśvaraḥ //4 //	samarpitam aTa etena prIyatAm parameSvaraH //4 //
   nṛpāntarāṇāṃ manasāpyagamyāṃ bhrūkṣepamātreṇa cakāra kīrtim /	nRpa antarANAm manasA api agamyAm BrU kzepa mAtreNa cakAra kIrtim /
   kārtasvarāsārasupūritārthasārthaḥ svayaṃ śāstravicakṣaṇaśca //5 //	kArtasvara AsAra su pUrita arTa sArTaH svayam SAstra vicakzaNaH ca //5 //
   nareśvarā yaccaritānukāramicchanti kartuṃ naca pārayanti /	nareSvarAH yat carita anukAram icCanti kartum na ca pArayanti /
   tasminmahīpe mahanīyakīrtau śrīmannṛge 'kāri mayā nibandhaḥ //6 //	tasmin mahIpe mahanIya kIrtO SrImat nRge akAri mayA nibanDaH //6 //
   # iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śaṅkarabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ	# iti SrI vAcaspati miSravi racite SaFkara Bagavat pAda BAzya viBAge BAmatyAm
   caturthasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ.# /	caturTasya aDyAyasya caturTaH pAdaH samAptaH.# /
